GE07mbh_13_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:001.000-0002_01: yaḥ śvetatvam upāgataḥ kṛtayuge tretāyuge raktatāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.000-0002_02: yugme yaḥ kapilaḥ kalau sa bhagavān kṛṣṇatvam abhyāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.000-0002_03: yaṃ vedāntavido vadanti munayo yo yogibhir gīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:001.000-0002_04: sa brahmā yadi vā haro yadi hariḥ pāyāj jagad durgateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.000-0004_04: cintayan vaiśasaṃ ghoraṃ sūtaputrasya pāṇḍavaiḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.001c: na ca me hṛdaye śāntir asti kṛtvedam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.002a: asminn arthe bahuvidhā śāntir uktā tvayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:001.002c: svakṛte kā nu śāntiḥ syāc chamād bahuvidhād api
GE07mbh_13_u:001.003c: śamaṃ nopalabhe vīra duṣkṛtāny eva cintayan
GE07mbh_13_u:001.004c: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghra sīde varṣāsv ivāmbujam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.005a: ataḥ kaṣṭataraṃ kiṃ nu matkṛte yat pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.005f-0006_01: matkṛte nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ kiṃ nu kaṣṭataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.006c: kṛtvedaṃ ninditaṃ karma prāpsyāmaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:001.006d-0007_01: idaṃ tu dhārtarāṣṭrasya śreyo manye janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:001.006d-0007_02: imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaṃ yad asau tvāṃ na paśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007a: ahaṃ tava hy antakaraḥ suhṛdvadhakaras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007c: na śāntim adhigacchāmi paśyaṃs tvāṃ duḥkhitaṃ kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_03: na sa paśyati duṣṭātmā tvām adya patitaṃ kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_04: ataḥ śreyo mṛtaṃ manye neha jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_05: ahaṃ hi samare vīra gamitaḥ śatrubhiḥ kṣayam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_06: abhaviṣyaṃ yadi purā saha bhrātṛbhir acyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_07: na tvām evaṃ suduḥkhārtam adrākṣaṃ sāyakārditam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_08: nūnaṃ hi pāpakarmāṇo dhātrā sṛṣṭāḥ sma he nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_09: anyasminn api loke hi yathā mucyema kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_13_u:001.007d-0008_10: tathā praśādhi māṃ rājan mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.008c: karmaṇy asmin mahābhāga sūkṣmaṃ hy etad atīndriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.010c: sarpeṇa daṣṭaṃ svaṃ putram apaśyad gatacetanam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.011a: atha taṃ snāyupāśena baddhvā sarpam amarṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.012a: tāṃ cābravīd ayaṃ te sa putrahā pannagādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.012c: brūhi kṣipraṃ mahābhāge vadhyatāṃ kena hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.013a: agnau prakṣipyatām eṣa cchidyatāṃ khaṇḍaśo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.013c: na hy ayaṃ bālahā pāpaś ciraṃ jīvitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:001.014a: visṛjainam abuddhis tvaṃ na vadhyo 'rjunaka tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.014c: ko hy ātmānaṃ guruṃ kuryāt prāptavye sati cintayan
GE07mbh_13_u:001.015d-0009_01: yadi vāsmiṃs tu nihate pannage 'rjunaka tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.015d-0009_02: jīved ayaṃ bālako me tan na me 'rjunaka priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.016a: na cāmṛtyur bhavitā vai hate 'smin; ko vātyayaḥ syād ahate 'smiñ janasya
GE07mbh_13_u:001.016b-0010_01: hatvā cainaṃ nāmṛtaḥ syād ayaṃ me
GE07mbh_13_u:001.016b-0010_02: jīvaty asmin ko 'tyayaḥ syād ayaṃ te
GE07mbh_13_u:001.016b-0011_02: jīvaty asmin ko vyasuḥ syād anante
GE07mbh_13_u:001.016c: asyotsarge prāṇayuktasya jantor; mṛtyor lokaṃ ko nu gacched anantam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.017a: jānāmy evaṃ neha guṇāguṇajñāḥ; sarve niyuktā guravo vai bhavanti
GE07mbh_13_u:001.017c: svasthasyaite tūpadeśā bhavanti; tasmāt kṣudraṃ sarpam enaṃ haniṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:001.018a: samīpsantaḥ kālayogaṃ tyajanti; sadyaḥ śucaṃ tv arthavidas tyajanti
GE07mbh_13_u:001.018c: śreyaḥ kṣayaḥ śocatāṃ nityaśo hi; tasmāt tyājyaṃ jahi śokaṃ hate 'smin
GE07mbh_13_u:001.019a: na caivārtir vidyate 'smadvidhānāṃ; dharmārāmaḥ satataṃ sajjano hi
GE07mbh_13_u:001.019c: nityāyasto bālajano na cāsti; dharmo hy eṣa prabhavāmy asya nāham
GE07mbh_13_u:001.020a: na brāhmaṇānāṃ kopo 'sti kutaḥ kopāc ca yātanā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.020c: mārdavāt kṣamyatāṃ sādho mucyatām eṣa pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.021a: hatvā lābhaḥ śreya evāvyayaṃ syāt; sadyo lābho balavadbhiḥ praśastaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.021c: kālāl lābho yas tu sadyo bhaveta; hate śreyaḥ kutsite tvīdṛśe syāt
GE07mbh_13_u:001.022a: kārthaprāptir gṛhya śatruṃ nihatya; kā vā śāntiḥ prāpya śatruṃ namuktvā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.022c: kasmāt saumya bhujage na kṣameyaṃ; mokṣaṃ vā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsya kuryām
GE07mbh_13_u:001.023a: asmād ekasmād bahavo rakṣitavyā; naiko bahubhyo gautami rakṣitavyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.023c: kṛtāgasaṃ dharmavidas tyajanti; sarīsṛpaṃ pāpam imaṃ jahi tvam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.024a: nāsmin hate pannage putrako me; saṃprāpsyate lubdhaka jīvitaṃ vai
GE07mbh_13_u:001.024c: guṇaṃ cānyaṃ nāsya vadhe prapaśye; tasmāt sarpaṃ lubdhaka muñca jīvam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.025a: vṛtraṃ hatvā devarāṭ śreṣṭhabhāg vai; yajñaṃ hatvā bhāgam avāpa caiva
GE07mbh_13_u:001.025c: śūlī devo devavṛttaṃ kuru tvaṃ; kṣipraṃ sarpaṃ jahi mā bhūd
GE07mbh_13_u:001.027a: īṣad ucchvasamānas tu kṛcchrāt saṃstabhya pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.028a: ko nv arjunaka doṣo 'tra vidyate mama bāliśa
GE07mbh_13_u:001.028c: asvatantraṃ hi māṃ mṛtyur vivaśaṃ yad acūcudat
GE07mbh_13_u:001.029a: tasyāyaṃ vacanād daṣṭo na kopena na kāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.029c: tasya tat kilbiṣaṃ lubdha vidyate yadi kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.030c: kāraṇaṃ vai tvam apy atra tasmāt tvam api kilbiṣī
GE07mbh_13_u:001.031c: kāraṇatve prakalpyante tathā tvam api pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:001.032a: kilbiṣī cāpi me vadhyaḥ kilbiṣī cāsi pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:001.032c: ātmānaṃ kāraṇaṃ hy atra tvam ākhyāsi bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_13_u:001.033a: sarva ete hy asvavaśā daṇḍacakrādayo yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.033c: tathāham api tasmān me naiṣa hetur matas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:001.034a: atha vā matam etat te te 'py anyonyaprayojakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.035a: evaṃ sati na doṣo me nāsmi vadhyo na kilbiṣī
GE07mbh_13_u:001.035c: kilbiṣaṃ samavāye syān manyase yadi kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.035d-0012_01: kilbiṣaṃ manyase hi tvaṃ vadhyam evaṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_13_u:001.036a: kāraṇaṃ yadi na syād vai na kartā syās tvam apy uta
GE07mbh_13_u:001.036c: vināśe kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ ca tasmād vadhyo 'si me mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.037a: asaty api kṛte kārye neha pannaga lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:001.037c: tasmān nātraiva hetuḥ syād vadhyaḥ kiṃ bahu bhāṣase
GE07mbh_13_u:001.038a: kāryābhāve kriyā na syāt saty asaty api kāraṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:001.038c: tasmāt tvam asmin hetau me vācyo hetur viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.039a: yady ahaṃ kāraṇatvena mato lubdhaka tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.039c: anyaḥ prayoge syād atra kilbiṣī jantunāśane
GE07mbh_13_u:001.040a: vadhyas tvaṃ mama durbuddhe bālaghātī nṛśaṃsakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:001.040c: bhāṣase kiṃ bahu punar vadhyaḥ san pannagādhama
GE07mbh_13_u:001.041a: yathā havīṃṣi juhvānā makhe vai lubdhakartvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.041c: na phalaṃ prāpnuvanty atra paraloke tathā hy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:001.042a: tathā bruvati tasmiṃs tu pannage mṛtyucodite
GE07mbh_13_u:001.042c: ājagāma tato mṛtyuḥ pannagaṃ cābravīd idam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.043c: vināśahetur nāsya tvam ahaṃ vā prāṇinaḥ śiśoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.044a: yathā vāyur jaladharān vikarṣati tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.044d-0013_01: tadvidhas tadvaśe cāhaṃ kālasya vaśagaś ciram
GE07mbh_13_u:001.045a: sāttvikā rājasāś caiva tāmasā ye ca ke cana
GE07mbh_13_u:001.045c: bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:001.046a: jaṅgamāḥ sthāvarāś caiva divi vā yadi vā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:001.046c: sarve kālātmakāḥ sarpa kālātmakam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:001.047a: pravṛttayaś ca yā loke tathaiva ca nivṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.047c: tāsāṃ vikṛtayo yāś ca sarvaṃ kālātmakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.048a: ādityaś candramā viṣṇur āpo vāyuḥ śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.048c: agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.049a: saritaḥ sāgarāś caiva bhāvābhāvau ca pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:001.049c: sarve kālena sṛjyante hriyante ca tathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.050a: evaṃ jñātvā kathaṃ māṃ tvaṃ sadoṣaṃ sarpa manyase
GE07mbh_13_u:001.050c: atha caivaṃgate doṣo mayi tvam api doṣavān
GE07mbh_13_u:001.051a: nirdoṣaṃ doṣavantaṃ vā na tvā mṛtyo bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:001.051c: tvayāhaṃ codita iti bravīmy etāvad eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:001.052a: yadi kāle tu doṣo 'sti yadi tatrāpi neṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:001.052c: doṣo naiva parīkṣyo me na hy atrādhikṛtā vayam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.053a: nirmokṣas tv asya doṣasya mayā kāryo yathā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:001.053c: mṛtyo vidoṣaḥ syām eva yathā tan me prayojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.055a: mṛtyoḥ śrutaṃ me vacanaṃ tava caiva bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_13_u:001.055c: naiva tāvad vidoṣatvaṃ bhavati tvayi pannaga
GE07mbh_13_u:001.056a: mṛtyus tvaṃ caiva hetur hi jantor asya vināśane
GE07mbh_13_u:001.056c: ubhayaṃ kāraṇaṃ manye na kāraṇam akāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.057a: dhiṅ mṛtyuṃ ca durātmānaṃ krūraṃ duḥkhakaraṃ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:001.057c: tvāṃ caivāhaṃ vadhiṣyāmi pāpaṃ pāpasya kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.058c: nāvāṃ doṣeṇa gantavyau yadi samyak prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:001.059a: yuvām ubhau kālavaśau yadi vai mṛtyupannagau
GE07mbh_13_u:001.059c: harṣakrodhau kathaṃ syātām etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:001.060a: yāḥ kāś cid iha ceṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvāḥ kālapracoditāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.060c: pūrvam evaitad uktaṃ hi mayā lubdhaka kālataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.061a: tasmād ubhau kālavaśāv āvāṃ tad diṣṭakāriṇau
GE07mbh_13_u:001.061c: nāvāṃ doṣeṇa gantavyau tvayā lubdhaka karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:001.062c: abravīt pannagaṃ mṛtyuṃ lubdham arjunakaṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.063a: naivāhaṃ nāpy ayaṃ mṛtyur nāyaṃ lubdhaka pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.063c: kilbiṣī jantumaraṇe na vayaṃ hi prayojakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.064a: akarod yad ayaṃ karma tan no 'rjunaka codakam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.065a: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tenāyaṃ nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.067a: yathā mṛtpiṇḍataḥ kartā kurute yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_13_u:001.068c: tathā karma ca kartā ca saṃbaddhāv ātmakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.069a: evaṃ nāhaṃ na vai mṛtyur na sarpo na tathā bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:001.069c: na ceyaṃ brāhmaṇī vṛddhā śiśur evātra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.070a: tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu brāhmaṇī gautamī nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:001.071a: naiva kālo na bhujago na mṛtyur iha kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.071c: svakarmabhir ayaṃ bālaḥ kālena nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.072a: mayā ca tat kṛtaṃ karma yenāyaṃ me mṛtaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.072c: yātu kālas tathā mṛtyur muñcārjunaka pannagam
GE07mbh_13_u:001.073a: tato yathāgataṃ jagmur mṛtyuḥ kālo 'tha pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.074a: etac chrutvā śamaṃ gaccha mā bhūś cintāparo nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:001.075a: na tu tvayā kṛtaṃ pārtha nāpi duryodhanena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:001.075c: kālena tat kṛtaṃ viddhi vihatā yena pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:001.076a: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā babhūva vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.001c: śrutaṃ me mahad ākhyānam idaṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:002.002a: bhūyas tu śrotum icchāmi dharmārthasahitaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:002.002c: kathyamānaṃ tvayā kiṃ cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:002.003a: kena mṛtyur gṛhasthena dharmam āśritya nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.003c: ity etat sarvam ācakṣva tattvena mama pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:002.004c: yathā mṛtyur gṛhasthena dharmam āśritya nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.005a: manoḥ prajāpate rājann ikṣvākur abhavat sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.006a: daśamas tasya putras tu daśāśvo nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:002.007a: daśāśvasya sutas tv āsīd rājā paramadhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.007c: satye tapasi dāne ca yasya nityaṃ rataṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.008c: dhanurvede ca vede ca nirato yo 'bhavat sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.009a: madirāśvasya putras tu dyutimān nāma pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.010a: putro dyutimatas tv āsīt suvīro nāma pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.012d-0016_01: ikṣvākos tu śataṃ putrā daśāśvo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.012d-0016_03: tasya ca dyutimān nāma suvīras tasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.012d-0016_04: durjayas tasya tasyāpi duryodhana iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.013c: viṣayaś ca prabhāvaś ca tulyam evābhyavartata
GE07mbh_13_u:002.013d-0017_01: viṣaye vāsavas tasya samyag eva pravarṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:002.014a: ratnair dhanaiś ca paśubhiḥ sasyaiś cāpi pṛthagvidhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.015a: na tasya viṣaye cābhūt kṛpaṇo nāpi durgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.015c: vyādhito vā kṛśo vāpi tasmin nābhūn naraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:002.018a: taṃ narmadā devanadī puṇyā śītajalā śivā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.019a: tasya jajñe tadā nadyāṃ kanyā rājīvalocanā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.019c: nāmnā sudarśanā rājan rūpeṇa ca sudarśanā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021a: tām agniś cakame sākṣād rājakanyāṃ sudarśanām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_03: tasyā manoramaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā devo hutāśanaḥ agniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_08: bhrūlatālalitaṃ kāntam anaṅgo bādhate hi mām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_10: dṛṣṭvā te patralekhāṅkam anaṅgo bādhate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_16: samāḥ snigdhāḥ sujātāś ca sahitāś ca dvijās tava
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_17: dvijapriye prasīdasva bhaja māṃ subhagā hy asi
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_25: mātā pitā prabhavataḥ pradāne bāndhavāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_27: satāṃ madhye niviṣṭāyāḥ kanyāyāḥ śaraṇaṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_28: sāhaṃ nātmavaśā deva pitaraṃ varayasva me
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_29: atha nāticirāt kālād rājā duryodhanaḥ kila
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021b-0019_31: yajñaṃ yakṣye 'ham iti vai saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021c: bhūtvā ca brāhmaṇaḥ sākṣād varayām āsa taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.021d-0021_01: na tu rājā pradānāya tasmai bhāvam akalpayat
GE07mbh_13_u:002.022a: daridraś cāsavarṇaś ca mamāyam iti pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.022c: na ditsati sutāṃ tasmai tāṃ viprāya sudarśanām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.022d-0022_01: iti tasmai na vai kanyāṃ ditsāṃ cakre narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.023c: tato duryodhano rājā vākyam āhartvijas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.024a: duṣkṛtaṃ mama kiṃ nu syād bhavatāṃ vā dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.024c: yena nāśaṃ jagāmāgniḥ kṛtaṃ kupuruṣeṣv iva
GE07mbh_13_u:002.025a: na hy alpaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ no 'sti yenāgnir nāśam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.025c: bhavatāṃ vātha vā mahyaṃ tattvenaitad vimṛśyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.026a: etad rājño vacaḥ śrutvā viprās te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:002.026c: niyatā vāgyatāś caiva pāvakaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.027a: tān darśayām āsa tadā bhagavān havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.027b-0023_01: atha dīkṣām upetasya yajñe tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.027b-0023_03: tataḥ sa bhīto nṛpatir bhṛśaṃ pravyathitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.027b-0023_04: mantriṇo brāhmaṇāṃś caiva papraccha kim idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:002.027b-0023_05: yajñe samiddho bhagavān naṣṭo me havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.027b-0023_07: amānuṣo vikāro 'yam iti tair eva bodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.028a: tato mahātmā tān āha dahano brāhmaṇarṣabhān
GE07mbh_13_u:002.029a: tatas te kālyam utthāya tasmai rājñe nyavedayan
GE07mbh_13_u:002.029c: brāhmaṇā vismitāḥ sarve yad uktaṃ citrabhānunā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.030a: tataḥ sa rājā tac chrutvā vacanaṃ brahmavādinām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.030c: avāpya paramaṃ harṣaṃ tatheti prāha buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:002.031c: nityaṃ sāṃnidhyam iha te citrabhāno bhaved iti
GE07mbh_13_u:002.031e: tam āha bhagavān agnir evam astv iti pārthivam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.032c: dṛṣṭaṃ hi sahadevena diśo vijayatā tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.035a: tasyā rūpeṇa śīlena kulena vapuṣā śriyā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.035c: abhavat prītimān agnir garbhaṃ tasyāṃ samādadhe
GE07mbh_13_u:002.036c: śiśur evādhyagāt sarvaṃ sa ca brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.038a: tām oghavān dadau tasmai svayam oghavatīṃ sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.040a: gṛhasthaś cāvajeṣyāmi mṛtyum ity eva sa prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:002.040c: pratijñām akarod dhīmān dīptatejā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:002.041c: atitheḥ pratikūlaṃ te na kartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:002.042a: yena yena ca tuṣyeta nityam eva tvayātithiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.042c: apy ātmanaḥ pradānena na te kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.043a: etad vrataṃ mama sadā hṛdi saṃparivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:002.043c: gṛhasthānāṃ hi suśroṇi nātither vidyate param
GE07mbh_13_u:002.044a: pramāṇaṃ yadi vāmoru vacas te mama śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:002.044c: idaṃ vacanam avyagrā hṛdi tvaṃ dhārayeḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.045c: nātithis te 'vamantavyaḥ pramāṇaṃ yady ahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:002.046a: tam abravīd oghavatī yatā mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.046c: na me tvadvacanāt kiṃ cid akartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:002.047a: jigīṣamāṇaṃ tu gṛhe tadā mṛtyuḥ sudarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.048a: idhmārthaṃ tu gate tasminn agniputre sudarśane
GE07mbh_13_u:002.048c: atithir brāhmaṇaḥ śrīmāṃs tām āhaughavatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.050a: ity uktā tena vipreṇa rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:002.051a: āsanaṃ caiva pādyaṃ ca tasmai dattvā dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:002.051c: provācaughavatī vipraṃ kenārthaḥ kiṃ dadāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:002.052a: tām abravīt tato vipro rājaputrīṃ sudarśanām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.052c: tvayā mamārthaḥ kalyāṇi nirviśaṅke tad ācara
GE07mbh_13_u:002.053c: pradānenātmano rājñi kartum arhasi me priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.054c: nānyam ātmapradānāt sa tasyā vavre varaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.055a: sā tu rājasutā smṛtvā bhartur vacanam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.055c: tatheti lajjamānā sā tam uvāca dvijarṣabham
GE07mbh_13_u:002.056a: tato rahaḥ sa viprarṣiḥ sā caivopaviveśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:002.058a: tatas tv āśramam āgamya sa pāvakasutas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.059a: tasmai prativacaḥ sā tu bhartre na pradadau tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.059c: karābhyāṃ tena vipreṇa spṛṣṭā bhartṛvratā satī
GE07mbh_13_u:002.060a: ucchiṣṭāsmīti manvānā lajjitā bhartur eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:002.060c: tūṣṇīṃbhūtābhavat sādhvī na covācātha kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:002.061a: atha tāṃ punar evedaṃ provāca sa sudarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.061c: kva sā sādhvī kva sā yātā garīyaḥ kim ato mama
GE07mbh_13_u:002.062c: kathaṃ na pratyudety adya smayamānā yathā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.063a: uṭajasthas tu taṃ vipraḥ pratyuvāca sudarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.063c: atithiṃ viddhi saṃprāptaṃ pāvake brāhmaṇaṃ ca mām
GE07mbh_13_u:002.064c: tais tair atithisatkārair ārjave 'syā dṛḍhaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.065a: anena vidhinā seyaṃ mām arcati śubhānanā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.065c: anurūpaṃ yad atrādya tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:002.066a: kūṭamudgarahastas tu mṛtyus taṃ vai samanvayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:002.067a: sudarśanas tu manasā karmaṇā cakṣuṣā girā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.068a: surataṃ te 'stu viprāgrya prītir hi paramā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:002.069a: atithiḥ pūjito yasya gṛhasthasya tu gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:002.069c: nānyas tasmāt paro dharma iti prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.070a: prāṇā hi mama dārāś ca yac cānyad vidyate vasu
GE07mbh_13_u:002.070c: atithibhyo mayā deyam iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.071a: niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ mayā vākyam etat te samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.071c: tenāhaṃ vipra satyena svayam ātmānam ālabhe
GE07mbh_13_u:002.072a: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.072c: buddhir ātmā manaḥ kālo diśaś caiva guṇā daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:002.073a: nityam ete hi paśyanti dehināṃ dehasaṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.073c: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi karma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:002.074c: tena satyena māṃ devāḥ pālayantu dahantu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:002.075a: tato nādaḥ samabhavad dikṣu sarvāsu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:002.075c: asakṛt satyam ity eva naitan mithyeti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.076a: uṭajāt tu tatas tasmān niścakrāma sa vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.076c: vapuṣā khaṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca vyāpya vāyur ivodyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.077a: svareṇa vipraḥ śaikṣeṇa trīṃl lokān anunādayan
GE07mbh_13_u:002.077c: uvāca cainaṃ dharmajñaṃ pūrvam āmantrya nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.078a: dharmo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te jijñāsārthaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:002.078c: prāptaḥ satyaṃ ca te jñātvā prītir me paramā tvayi
GE07mbh_13_u:002.079a: vijitaś ca tvayā mṛtyur yo 'yaṃ tvām anugacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:002.079c: randhrānveṣī tava sadā tvayā dhṛtyā vaśīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.080a: na cāsti śaktis trailokye kasya cit puruṣottama
GE07mbh_13_u:002.080c: pativratām imāṃ sādhvīṃ tavodvīkṣitum apy uta
GE07mbh_13_u:002.081c: adhṛṣyā yad iyaṃ brūyāt tathā tan nānyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:002.082a: eṣā hi tapasā svena saṃyuktā brahmavādinī
GE07mbh_13_u:002.083c: śarīreṇa mahābhāgā yogo hy asyā vaśe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.084a: anayā saha lokāṃś ca gantāsi tapasārjitān
GE07mbh_13_u:002.084c: yatra nāvṛttim abhyeti śāśvatāṃs tān sanātanān
GE07mbh_13_u:002.085a: anena caiva dehena lokāṃs tvam abhipatsyase
GE07mbh_13_u:002.085c: nirjitaś ca tvayā mṛtyur aiśvaryaṃ ca tavottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.086a: pañca bhūtāny atikrāntaḥ svavīryāc ca manobhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.087a: sneho rāgaś ca tandrī ca moho drohaś ca kevalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.088a: śuklānāṃ tu sahasreṇa vājināṃ ratham uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.088c: yuktaṃ pragṛhya bhagavān vyavasāyo jagāma tam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.089a: mṛtyur ātmā ca lokāś ca jitā bhūtāni pañca ca
GE07mbh_13_u:002.089c: buddhiḥ kālo mano vyoma kāmakrodhau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:002.090a: tasmād gṛhāśramasthasya nānyad daivatam asti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:002.091a: atithiḥ pūjito yasya dhyāyate manasā śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:002.091c: na tat kratuśatenāpi tulyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.092a: pātraṃ tv atithim āsādya śīlāḍhyaṃ yo na pūjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:002.092c: sa dattvā sukṛtaṃ tasya kṣapayeta hy anarcitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:002.093a: etat te kathitaṃ putra mayākhyānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.093c: yathā hi vijito mṛtyur gṛhasthena purābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:002.094a: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam idam ākhyānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:002.095a: ya idaṃ kathayed vidvān ahany ahani bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:003.001a: brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi duṣprāpaṃ tribhir varṇair narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:003.002c: śrotum icchāmi tattvena tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:003.008c: putrāḥ pañcaśatāś cāpi śaptāḥ śvapacatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:003.009c: avākśirā divaṃ nīto dakṣiṇām āśrito diśam
GE07mbh_13_u:003.011c: rambhā nāmāpsarāḥ śāpād yasya śailatvam āgatā
GE07mbh_13_u:003.012a: tathaivāsya bhayād baddhvā vasiṣṭhaḥ salile purā
GE07mbh_13_u:003.012c: ātmānaṃ majjayām āsa vipāśaḥ punar utthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:003.014a: vāgbhiś ca bhagavān yena devasenāgragaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:003.014c: stutaḥ prītamanāś cāsīc chāpāc cainam amocayat
GE07mbh_13_u:003.015c: madhye jvalati yo nityam udīcīm āśrito diśam
GE07mbh_13_u:003.016a: tasyaitāni ca karmāṇi tathānyāni ca kaurava
GE07mbh_13_u:003.016c: kṣatriyasyety ato jātam idaṃ kautūhalaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:003.017a: kim etad iti tattvena prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:003.018a: etat tattvena me rājan sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:003.019c: caṇḍālayonau jāto hi kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:004.001a: śrūyatāṃ pārtha tattvena viśvāmitro yathā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.001c: brāhmaṇatvaṃ gatas tāta brahmarṣitvaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:004.003a: tasya putro mahān āsīj jahnur nāma nareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.005a: vallabhas tasya tanayaḥ sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.007a: kanyā jajñe sutā tasya vane nivasataḥ sataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.008a: tāṃ vavre bhārgavaḥ śrīmāṃś cyavanasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.008c: ṛcīka iti vikhyāto vipule tapasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.009a: sa tāṃ na pradadau tasmai ṛcīkāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_13_u:004.009c: daridra iti matvā vai gādhiḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.010c: śulkaṃ pradīyatāṃ mahyaṃ tato vetsyasi me sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:004.011a: kiṃ prayacchāmi rājendra tubhyaṃ śulkam ahaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:004.011c: duhitur brūhy asaṃsakto mātrābhūt te vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.013c: abravīd varuṇaṃ devam ādityaṃ patim ambhasām
GE07mbh_13_u:004.015c: uvāca yatra te chandas tatrotthāsyanti vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.018a: tat tadā gādhaye tāta sahasraṃ vājināṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:004.018c: ṛcīkaḥ pradadau prītaḥ śulkārthaṃ japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.019a: tataḥ sa vismito rājā gādhiḥ śāpabhayena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:004.019c: dadau tāṃ samalaṃkṛtya kanyāṃ bhṛgusutāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:004.020c: sā ca taṃ patim āsādya paraṃ harṣam avāpa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:004.021a: sa tutoṣa ca viprarṣis tasyā vṛttena bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:004.021d-0025_01: sā ca vavre varaṃ tasmāt putraṃ brahmarṣisattamam
GE07mbh_13_u:004.022a: mātre tat sarvam ācakhyau sā kanyā rājasattamam
GE07mbh_13_u:004.022c: atha tām abravīn mātā sutāṃ kiṃ cid avāṅmukhīm
GE07mbh_13_u:004.023a: mamāpi putri bhartā te prasādaṃ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:004.024a: tataḥ sā tvaritaṃ gatvā tat sarvaṃ pratyavedayat
GE07mbh_13_u:004.024c: mātuś cikīrṣitaṃ rājann ṛcīkas tām athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:004.025a: guṇavantam apatyaṃ vai tvaṃ ca sā janayiṣyathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.025c: jananyās tava kalyāṇi mā bhūd vai praṇayo 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.026a: tava caiva guṇaślāghī putra utpatsyate śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:004.026c: asmadvaṃśakaraḥ śrīmāṃs tava bhrātā ca vaṃśakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:004.027a: ṛtusnātā ca sāśvatthaṃ tvaṃ ca vṛkṣam udumbaram
GE07mbh_13_u:004.028c: tvaṃ ca sā copayuñjīthāṃ tataḥ putrāv avāpsyathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.029c: yad ṛcīkena kathitaṃ tac cācakhyau carudvayam
GE07mbh_13_u:004.029d-0026_01: atha mātā sutā cāpi vyatyāsena carudvayam
GE07mbh_13_u:004.029d-0026_03: dṛṣṭvā kadā cit svāṃ bhāryām ṛcīkas tv abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.030a: tām uvāca tato mātā sutāṃ satyavatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.030c: putri mūrdhnā prapannāyāḥ kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:004.031a: bhartrā ya eṣa dattas te carur mantrapuraskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.031c: etaṃ prayaccha mahyaṃ tvaṃ madīyaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:004.032c: yadi pramāṇaṃ vacanaṃ mama mātur anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:004.032d-0028_01: svam apatyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ hi sarva icchaty anāvilam
GE07mbh_13_u:004.033a: vyaktaṃ bhagavatā cātra kṛtam evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:004.033c: tato me tvaccarau bhāvaḥ pādape ca sumadhyame
GE07mbh_13_u:004.033e: kathaṃ viśiṣṭo bhrātā te bhaved ity eva cintaya
GE07mbh_13_u:004.034a: tathā ca kṛtavatyau te mātā satyavatī ca sā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.034c: atha garbhāv anuprāpte ubhe te vai yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:004.035a: dṛṣṭvā garbham anuprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ sa ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.036c: vyatyāsaḥ pādape cāpi suvyaktaṃ te kṛtaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:004.037a: mayā hi viśvaṃ yad brahma tvaccarau saṃniveśitam
GE07mbh_13_u:004.037c: kṣatravīryaṃ ca sakalaṃ carau tasyā niveśitam
GE07mbh_13_u:004.038c: sā ca kṣatraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vai tata etat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.039a: vyatyāsas tu kṛto yasmāt tvayā mātrā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:004.039c: tasmāt sā brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ mātā te janayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:004.040c: na hi te tat kṛtaṃ sādhu mātṛsnehena bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:004.041c: bhūmau satyavatī rājaṃś chinneva rucirā latā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.042a: pratilabhya ca sā saṃjñāṃ śirasā praṇipatya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:004.043c: prasādaṃ kuru viprarṣe na me syāt kṣatriyaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.044a: kāmaṃ mamograkarmā vai pautro bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:004.044c: na tu me syāt suto brahmann eṣa me dīyatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.045a: evam astv iti hovāca svāṃ bhāryāṃ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.045c: tataḥ sā janayām āsa jamadagniṃ sutaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:004.047c: kṣatriyaḥ so 'py atha tathā brahmavaṃśasya kārakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.049a: madhucchandaś ca bhagavān devarātaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:004.049c: akṣīṇaś ca śakuntaś ca babhruḥ kālapathas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.050a: yājñavalkyaś ca vikhyātas tathā sthūṇo mahāvrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.051a: karṇajaṅghaś ca bhagavān gālavaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.051c: ṛṣir vajras tathākhyātaḥ śālaṅkāyana eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:004.052a: lālāṭyo nāradaś caiva tathā kūrcamukhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.052c: vādulir musalaś caiva rakṣogrīvas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:004.053a: aṅghriko naikabhṛc caiva śilāyūpaḥ sitaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.054a: śyāmāyano 'tha gārgyaś ca jābāliḥ suśrutas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:004.055a: mahān ṛṣiś ca kapilas tatharṣis tārakāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.056c: sūtir vibhūtiḥ sūtaś ca suraṅgaś ca tathaiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:004.058c: ujjayonir adāpekṣī nāradī ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.058d-0029_01: ete cānye ca bahavo mahātmāno jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.059a: tan naiṣa kṣatriyo rājan viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:004.060a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:004.061a: yatra yatra ca saṃdeho bhūyas te rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:004.061c: tatra tatra ca māṃ brūhi cchettāsmi tava saṃśayān
GE07mbh_13_u:005.001c: śrotum icchāmi kārtsnyena tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:005.002-0030_02: vāsavasya ca saṃvādaṃ śukasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.002c: saviṣaṃ kāṇḍam ādāya mṛgayām āsa vai mṛgam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.004c: mahān vanatarur viddho mṛgaṃ tatra jighāṃsatā
GE07mbh_13_u:005.006c: na jahāti śuko vāsaṃ tasya bhaktyā vanaspateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.007c: kṛtajñaḥ saha vṛkṣeṇa dharmātmā sa vyaśuṣyata
GE07mbh_13_u:005.009a: tataś cintām upagataḥ śakraḥ katham ayaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.010a: atha vā nātra citraṃ hīty abhavad vāsavasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:005.010c: prāṇinām iha sarveṣāṃ sarvaṃ sarvatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:005.011c: avatīrya mahīṃ śakras taṃ pakṣiṇam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:005.012a: śuka bhoḥ pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭha dākṣeyī suprajās tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:005.012c: pṛcche tvā śuṣkam etaṃ vai kasmān na tyajasi drumam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.013a: atha pṛṣṭaḥ śukaḥ prāha mūrdhnā samabhivādya tam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.014a: tato daśaśatākṣeṇa sādhu sādhv iti bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.014c: aho vijñānam ity evaṃ tapasā pūjitas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.015c: vijānann api tāṃ prāptiṃ papraccha balasūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.015d-0031_01: jānann api ca tatprāptiṃ pṛcchate pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.016c: kimarthaṃ sevase vṛkṣaṃ yadā mahad idaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.018c: vimṛśya prajñayā dhīra jahīmaṃ hy asthiraṃ drumam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.019a: tad upaśrutya dharmātmā śukaḥ śakreṇa bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.019c: sudīrgham abhiniḥśvasya dīno vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:005.020c: yatrābhavas tatra bhavas tan nibodha surādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:005.021a: asminn ahaṃ drume jātaḥ sādhubhiś ca guṇair yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.021c: bālabhāve ca saṃguptaḥ śatrubhiś ca na dharṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.022b-0032_01: anuraktasya bhaktasya saṃspṛśen na ca pāvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.023c: anukrośaś ca sādhūnāṃ sadā prītiṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:005.024a: tvam eva daivataiḥ sarvaiḥ pṛcchyase dharmasaṃśayān
GE07mbh_13_u:005.024c: atas tvaṃ deva devānām ādhipatye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.025b-0033_01: tadbhaktitas tyājayituṃ na mām arhasi sattama
GE07mbh_13_u:005.025c: samartham upajīvyemaṃ tyajeyaṃ katham adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:005.025d-0034_01: samastham upajīvan vai viṣamasthaṃ kathaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_13_u:005.027a: varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti tadā sa ca vavre varaṃ śukaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.027b-0035_01: punar jīvatv ayaṃ vṛkṣo yadi syān mayy anugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.028a: viditvā ca dṛḍhāṃ śakras tāṃ śuke śīlasaṃpadam
GE07mbh_13_u:005.029a: tataḥ phalāni patrāṇi śākhāś cāpi manoramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.029c: śukasya dṛḍhabhaktitvāc chrīmattvaṃ cāpa sa drumaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:005.030a: śukaś ca karmaṇā tena ānṛśaṃsyakṛtena ha
GE07mbh_13_u:005.031c: sarvārthasiddhiṃ labhate śukaṃ prāpya yathā drumaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.001c: daive puruṣakāre ca kiṃ svic chreṣṭhataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:006.002c: vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ brahmaṇaś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:006.003a: daivamānuṣayoḥ kiṃ svit karmaṇoḥ śreṣṭham ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:006.004c: uvāca madhuraṃ vākyam arthavad dhetubhūṣitam brahmā
GE07mbh_13_u:006.004d-0036_02: parṇān nālāḥ prasūyante nālāt skandhaḥ prasūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:006.004d-0036_03: skandhān nivartate puṣpaṃ puṣpān nivartate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.004d-0036_04: phalān nivartate bījaṃ bījāt syāt saṃbhavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.005a: nābījaṃ jāyate kiṃ cin na bījena vinā phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.005c: bījād bījaṃ prabhavati bījād eva phalaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.006a: yādṛśaṃ vapate bījaṃ kṣetram āsādya karṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.006c: sukṛte duṣkṛte vāpi tādṛśaṃ labhate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.007a: yathā bījaṃ vinā kṣetram uptaṃ bhavati niṣphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.007c: tathā puruṣakāreṇa vinā daivaṃ na sidhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:006.008a: kṣetraṃ puruṣakāras tu daivaṃ bījam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.009c: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate loke kṛtasyāpy akṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:006.010a: śubhena karmaṇā saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ pāpena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:006.010c: kṛtaṃ sarvatra labhate nākṛtaṃ bhujyate kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:006.012c: prāpyate karmaṇā sarvaṃ na daivād akṛtātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:006.013a: tathā svargaś ca bhogaś ca niṣṭhā yā ca manīṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:006.015a: artho vā mitravargo vā aiśvaryaṃ vā kulānvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.016a: śaucena labhate vipraḥ kṣatriyo vikrameṇa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:006.017a: nādātāraṃ bhajanty arthā na klībaṃ nāpi niṣkriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.018a: yena lokās trayaḥ sṛṣṭā daityāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.018c: sa eṣa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ samudre tapyate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.019a: svaṃ cet karmaphalaṃ na syāt sarvam evāphalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:006.019c: loko daivaṃ samālambya udāsīno bhaven na tu
GE07mbh_13_u:006.020a: akṛtvā mānuṣaṃ karma yo daivam anuvartate
GE07mbh_13_u:006.020c: vṛthā śrāmyati saṃprāpya patiṃ klībam ivāṅganā
GE07mbh_13_u:006.021a: na tathā mānuṣe loke bhayam asti śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:006.021c: yathā tridaśaloke hi bhayam alpena jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:006.022c: na daivam akṛte kiṃ cit kasya cid dātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:006.023a: yadā sthānāny anityāni dṛśyante daivateṣv api
GE07mbh_13_u:006.023c: kathaṃ karma vinā daivaṃ sthāsyate sthāpayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:006.024a: na daivatāni loke 'smin vyāpāraṃ yānti kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:006.025a: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca sadā bhavati vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.025c: kasya vācā hy adaivaṃ syād yato daivaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:006.026a: kathaṃ cāsya samutpattir yathā daivaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:006.027a: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.027c: ātmaiva cātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpy akṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:006.028a: kṛtaṃ ca vikṛtaṃ kiṃ cit kṛte karmaṇi sidhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:006.028c: sukṛte duṣkṛtaṃ karma na yathārthaṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:006.029a: devānāṃ śaraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ puṇyair avāpyate
GE07mbh_13_u:006.029c: puṇyaśīlaṃ naraṃ prāpya kiṃ daivaṃ prakariṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:006.030a: purā yayātir vibhraṣṭaś cyāvitaḥ patitaḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:006.031a: purūravāś ca rājarṣir dvijair abhihitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:006.031c: aila ity abhivikhyātaḥ svargaṃ prāpto mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.033a: aśvatthāmā ca rāmaś ca muniputrau dhanurdharau
GE07mbh_13_u:006.034a: vasur yajñaśatair iṣṭvā dvitīya iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.036c: dvijastrīṇāṃ vadhaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ daivena na vāritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.037a: ajñānād brāhmaṇaṃ hatvā spṛṣṭo bālavadhena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:006.038c: purā nṛgaś ca rājarṣiḥ kṛkalāsatvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.039a: dhundhumāraś ca rājarṣiḥ satreṣv eva jarāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:006.040c: punaḥ pratyāhṛtaṃ caiva na daivād bhujasaṃśrayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:006.041c: kiṃ te daivabalāc chāpam utsṛjante na karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:006.042a: pāpam utsṛjate loke sarvaṃ prāpya sudurlabham
GE07mbh_13_u:006.045a: vipulam api dhanaughaṃ prāpya bhogān striyo vā; puruṣa iha na śaktaḥ karmahīno 'pi bhoktum
GE07mbh_13_u:006.045c: sunihitam api cārthaṃ daivatai rakṣyamāṇaṃ; vyayaguṇam api sādhuṃ karmaṇā saṃśrayante
GE07mbh_13_u:006.046a: bhavati manujalokād devaloko viśiṣṭo; bahutarasusamṛddhyā mānuṣāṇāṃ gṛhāṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:006.046c: pitṛvanabhavanābhaṃ dṛśyate cāmarāṇāṃ; na ca phalati vikarmā jīvalokena daivam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.047a: vyapanayati vimārgaṃ nāsti daive prabhutvaṃ; gurum iva kṛtam agryaṃ karma saṃyāti daivam
GE07mbh_13_u:006.047c: anupahatam adīnaṃ kāmakāreṇa daivaṃ; nayati puruṣakāraḥ saṃcitas tatra tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:006.048a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā vai munisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:007.001c: phalāni mahatāṃ śreṣṭha prabrūhi paripṛcchataḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:007.002-0038_01: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:007.002a: rahasyaṃ yad ṛṣīṇāṃ tu tac chṛṇuṣva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:007.002c: yā gatiḥ prāpyate yena pretyabhāve cirepsitā
GE07mbh_13_u:007.003a: yena yena śarīreṇa yad yat karma karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.003c: tena tena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:007.004a: yasyāṃ yasyām avasthāyāṃ yat karoti śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:007.004c: tasyāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ bhuṅkte janmani janmani
GE07mbh_13_u:007.005a: na naśyati kṛtaṃ karma sadā pañcendriyair iha
GE07mbh_13_u:007.005c: te hy asya sākṣiṇo nityaṃ ṣaṣṭha ātmā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:007.006a: cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtām
GE07mbh_13_u:007.007a: yo dadyād aparikliṣṭam annam adhvani vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:007.011a: avākśirās tu yo lambed udavāsaṃ ca yo vaset
GE07mbh_13_u:007.011c: satataṃ caikaśāyī yaḥ sa labhetepsitāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:007.012a: pādyam āsanam evātha dīpam annaṃ pratiśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:007.013c: akṣayās tasya vai lokāḥ sarvakāmagamās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:007.014a: dhanaṃ labheta dānena maunenājñāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:007.016c: svargaṃ satyena labhate dīkṣayā kulam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:007.017c: striyas triṣavaṇaṃ snātvā vāyuṃ pītvā kratuṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:007.018a: salilāśī bhaved yaś ca sadāgniḥ saṃskṛto dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.019a: upavāsaṃ ca dīkṣāṃ ca abhiṣekaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:007.020a: adhītya sarvavedān vai sadyo duḥkhāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:007.020c: mānasaṃ hi caran dharmaṃ svargalokam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:007.020d-0039_01: tatparā ye dvijā loke tasya lokāḥ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:007.021a: yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.021c: yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:007.023a: acodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:007.024a: jīryanti jīryataḥ keśā dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.024c: cakṣuḥśrotre ca jīryete tṛṣṇaikā tu na jīryate
GE07mbh_13_u:007.025a: yena prīṇāti pitaraṃ tena prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.025c: prīṇāti mātaraṃ yena pṛthivī tena pūjitā
GE07mbh_13_u:007.025e: yena prīṇāty upādhyāyaṃ tena syād brahma pūjitam
GE07mbh_13_u:007.026a: sarve tasyādṛtā dharmā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.026c: anādṛtās tu yasyaite sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.027a: bhīṣmasya tad vacaḥ śrutvā vismitāḥ kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:007.028a: yan mantre bhavati vṛthā prayujyamāne; yat some bhavati vṛthābhiṣūyamāṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:007.028c: yac cāgnau bhavati vṛthābhihūyamāne; tat sarvaṃ bhavati vṛthābhidhīyamāne
GE07mbh_13_u:007.029a: ity etad ṛṣiṇā proktam uktavān asmi yad vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:008.001a: ke pūjyāḥ ke namaskāryāḥ kān namasyasi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.001c: etan me sarvam ācakṣva yeṣāṃ spṛhayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.001d-0040_01: yathaiva te namaskāryāḥ proktāḥ śakreṇa mānada
GE07mbh_13_u:008.001d-0040_02: tathaiva mayi cācakṣva yeṣāṃ spṛhayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.002c: manuṣyaloke sarvasmin yad amutreha cāpy uta
GE07mbh_13_u:008.003a: spṛhayāmi dvijātīnāṃ yeṣāṃ brahma paraṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.004a: yeṣāṃ vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca pitṛpaitāmahīṃ dhuram
GE07mbh_13_u:008.004c: udvahanti na sīdanti teṣāṃ vai spṛhayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:008.006a: saṃsatsu vadatāṃ yeṣāṃ haṃsānām iva saṃghaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.007a: samyag uccāritā vācaḥ śrūyante hi yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:008.008a: ye cāpi teṣāṃ śrotāraḥ sadā sadasi saṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.009e: ye cāpi satataṃ rājaṃs teṣāṃ ca spṛhayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:008.010a: śakyaṃ hy evāhave yoddhuṃ na dātum anasūyitam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.010c: śūrā vīrāś ca śataśaḥ santi loke yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:008.011a: dhanyaḥ syāṃ yady ahaṃ bhūyaḥ saumya brāhmaṇako 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.011d-0042_01: bhadraṃ tu janma saṃprāpya bhūyo brāhmaṇako bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:008.012a: na me tvattaḥ priyataro loke 'smin pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:008.012c: tvattaś ca me priyatarā brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.013a: yathā mama priyatarās tvatto viprāḥ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.013c: tena satyena gaccheyaṃ lokān yatra sa śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.014a: na me pitā priyataro brāhmaṇebhyas tathābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.014c: na me pituḥ pitā vāpi ye cānye 'pi suhṛjjanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.015a: na hi me vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid vidyate brāhmaṇeṣv iha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.015c: aṇu vā yadi vā sthūlaṃ viditaṃ sādhukarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.016a: karmaṇā manasā vāpi vācā vāpi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.016c: yan me kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu tenādya na tapāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:008.017a: brahmaṇya iti mām āhus tayā vācāsmi toṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.017c: etad eva pavitrebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paramaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.018c: teṣu me tāta gantavyam ahnāya ca cirāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:008.019a: yathā patyāśrayo dharmaḥ strīṇāṃ loke yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:008.019c: sa devaḥ sā gatir nānyā kṣatriyasya tathā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.020a: kṣatriyaḥ śatavarṣī ca daśavarṣī ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.020c: pitāputrau ca vijñeyau tayor hi brāhmaṇaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.021a: nārī tu patyabhāve vai devaraṃ kurute patim
GE07mbh_13_u:008.022a: putravac ca tato rakṣyā upāsyā guruvac ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:008.023c: āśīviṣān iva kruddhān dvijān upacaret sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.024a: tejasas tapasaś caiva nityaṃ bibhyed yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:008.024c: ubhe caite parityājye tejaś caiva tapas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.025a: vyavasāyas tayoḥ śīghram ubhayor eva vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:008.025c: hanyuḥ kruddhā mahārāja brāhmaṇā ye tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.026a: bhūyaḥ syād ubhayaṃ dattaṃ brāhmaṇād yad akopanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.027a: daṇḍapāṇir yathā goṣu pālo nityaṃ sthiro bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:008.027c: brāhmaṇān brahma ca tathā kṣatriyaḥ paripālayet
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028c: gṛhe caiṣām avekṣethāḥ kaccid astīha jīvanam bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0002: caturṇām api vedānāṃ saṃvādaṃ putra tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0004: sarvaṃ sukṛtam ādatte yaḥ sāye nudyate 'tithiḥ yajurvedaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0005: na skandate na vyathate nāsyordhvaṃ sarpate rajaḥ sāmavedaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0006: variṣṭham agnihotrāc ca brāhmaṇasya mukhe hutam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0007: na ced dhanti pitaraṃ mātaraṃ vā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0009: yat kiṃ cid anyad vṛjinaṃ karoti atharvavedaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0012: yad vā tapas tapyati yaj juhoti
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0015: bhūyas tu śṛṇu rājendra dharmān dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0017: indrāgnyoḥ sūryaśacyoś ca tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0020: yathāhaṃ tatra nāśnāmi yatra nāśnanti vai dvijāḥ sūryaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0022: yathā gobrāhmaṇasyārthe na tapāmi yathābalam śacī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0024: karmaṇā manasā vācā nāvamanye puraṃdaram bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0028: vaitāne karmaṇi tate kuntīputra yathā purā madrarājaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0029: ukto bhagavān yajñārthe tathā tatrāśṛṇod bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0030: kāni tīrthāni bhagavan phalārthāś ceha ke ''śramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0031: ka ijyate kaś ca yajñaḥ ko yūpaḥ kramate ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0038: pṛṣṭas tan me brūhi sarvaṃ maharṣe dvaipāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0046: vettuṃ vedān arhate kṣatriyo vai vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0052: uktaṃ vākyaṃ yad bhavān mām avocat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0054: chettuṃ vispaṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati tvadvidhe vai vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0056: tat tvaṃ vākyaṃ brūhi yat tvaṃ maharṣe
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0065: rūpaṃ paurāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ ca dhruvaṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0066: kas te budhyed vedavādeṣu caital bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0067: loke hy asmiñ śāsakas tvaṃ pitaiva
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0074: viṣṇur yajñas tv ijyate cāpi viṣṇuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0075: kṛṣṇo viṣṇur yaś ca kṛtsnaḥ prabhuś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0082: somaṃ sadbhāvād ye ca jātaṃ pibanti
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0086: om ity etad dhyāyamāno na gacched
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0104: dharmyair arthyair ye yajante dhruvaṃ te
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0116: pādaṃ pādaṃ brāhmaṇā vedam āhus dvaipāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0117: tretākāle taṃ ca taṃ viddhi śīrṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0119: sarve yajñāḥ sarva ijyāś ca kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0126: sa eṣa devaḥ śakram īśaṃ yajānaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0146: evaṃ sarve tv āśramāḥ suvratā ye
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0152: bhaktyā tuṣṭo 'haṃ tasya sattvaṃ prayacche dvaipāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0159: vyāsaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca vidhivat prītātmā pratyapūjayat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001_0163: namaś ca kṛṣṇāya cakāra bhīṣmaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0001: garuḍaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭha iti pūrvaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0003: atra kautūhalaṃ me 'sti śravaṇe jāyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0004: kathaṃ garutmān pakṣīṇāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0005: suparṇo vainateyaś ca kena śatruś ca bhoginām
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0006: kiṃvīryaḥ kiṃbalaś cāsau vaktum arhasi bhārata bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0009: suparṇaṃ śaṃsa ity eva mām āha kurunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0011: tvaṃ hi śaure mahābāho suparṇaḥ procyase purā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0013: tasmāt pūrvaṃ prasādya tvāṃ dharmaputrāya dhīmate vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0014: garuḍaṃ patatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vaktum icchāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0015: yathaiva mā bhavān veda tathā veda yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0016: tathā ca garuḍo rājaṃs tathāsmai brūhi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0019: tathā ca garuḍo rājan suparṇaś ca yathābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0020: yathā ca bhujagān hanti tathā me bruvataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0023: tam ahaṃ tāta dṛṣṭvaiva śastrāṇy utsṛjya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0025: tam ahaṃ kathānte varadaṃ suparṇasya balaujasī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0026: apṛcchaṃ sa ca māṃ prītaḥ pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0027: kadrūś ca vinatā cāstāṃ prajāpatisute ubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0029: prādāt tābhyāṃ varaṃ prīto bhāryābhyāṃ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0030: tatra kadrūr varaṃ vavre putrāṇāṃ daśataḥ śatam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0032: vinatā tu vavre dvau putrau vīrau bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0034: sa tu tābhyāṃ varaṃ prādāt tathety uktvā mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0035: janayām āsa tān putrāṃs tābhyām āsīd yathā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0036: kadrūḥ prajajñe tv aṇḍānāṃ tathaiva daśataḥ śatam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0037: aṇḍe dve vinatā caiva darśanīyatare śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0038: tāni tv aṇḍāni tu tayoḥ kadrūvinatayor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0043: viputrā putrasaṃtāpād aṇḍam ekaṃ bibheda ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0044: kim anena kariṣye 'ham iti vākyam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0045: na hi pañcaśate kāle purā putrau dadarśa sā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0049: putraduḥkhānvitāśocat sa ca pakṣī tathā gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0050: abravīc ca mudā yuktaḥ paryaśrunayanas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0052: na tvayā kāṅkṣitaḥ kālo yāvān evātyagāt purā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0053: āvāṃ bhavāva putrau te śvasanād balavattarau
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0055: tasmāt tvam api me mātar dāsībhāvaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0056: pañca varṣaśatāni tvaṃ spardhase vai yayā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0057: dāsī tasyā bhavitrīti sāśrupātam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0058: eṣa caiva mahābhāge balī balavatāṃ varaḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0060: vinatā putraśokārtā śāpād bhītā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0061: pratīkṣate sma taṃ kālaṃ yaḥ putroktas tadābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0066: yas tv aṇḍāt sa vinirbhinno niṣkrānto bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0074: tasmiṃś ca vihage tatra yathākāmaṃ vivardhati
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0075: kadrūś ca vinatā caiva gacchetāṃ sāgaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0076: dadṛśāte tu te yāntam uccaiḥśravasam antikāt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0078: tataḥ kadrūr hasanty eva vinatām idam abravīt vinatā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0079: hayasya varṇaḥ ko nv atra brūhi yas te mataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0080: ekavarṇo hayo rājñi sarvaśveto mato mama kadrūḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0081: varṇaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ tasya manyase tvaṃ manasvini
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0082: sarvaśveto matas tubhyaṃ ya eṣa hayasattamaḥ vinatā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0084: yady ārye dīvyasi tvaṃ me kaḥ paṇo no bhaviṣyati kadrūḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0085: sā taj jñātvā paṇeyaṃ vai jñātvā tu vipaṇe tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0086: jitā dāsī bhaver me tvam ahaṃ cāpy asitekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0088: rocate me paṇo rājñi dāsītvena na saṃśayaḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0089: satyam ātiṣṭha bhadraṃ te satye sthāsyāmi cāpy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0090: vinatā tu tathety uktvā kṛtasaṃśayanā paṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0091: kadrūr api tathety uktvā putrān idam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0092: mayā kṛtaḥ paṇaḥ putrā mitho vinatayā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0095: jitā dāsī bhavet putrāḥ sā vāhaṃ vā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0097: sāhaṃ dāsī bhaviṣyāmi jitā putrā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0100: nikṛtyā na jayaḥ śreyān mātaḥ satyā giraḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0101: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca na ca dharmo 'tra vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0102: sā tvaṃ dharmād apetaṃ vai kulasyaivāhitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0103: nikṛtyā vijayaṃ mātar mā sma kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0104: yady adharmeṇa vijayaṃ vayaṃ kāṅkṣāmahe kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0105: tvayā nāma nivāryāḥ sma mā kurudhvam iti dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0106: sā tvam asmān api sato vipāpān ṛjubuddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0108: te vayaṃ tvāṃ parityajya draviṣyāma diśo daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0109: yatra vākyaṃ na te mātaḥ punaḥ śroṣyāma īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0110: guror apy avaliptasya kāryākāryam ajānataḥ kadrūḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0113: vakragā mannivṛttyarthaṃ tad ahaṃ vo na rocaye
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0114: na ca tat paṇitaṃ mandāḥ śakyaṃ jetum ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0115: jite nikṛtyā śrutvaitat kṣamaṃ kuruta putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0118: iha cāmutra cārthāya putrān icchanti mātaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0119: seyam īhā vipannā me yuṣmān āsādya saṃgatām
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0120: iha vā tārayet putraḥ pretya vā tārayet pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0121: nātra citraṃ bhavet kiṃ cit punātīti ca putratā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0122: te yūyaṃ tāraṇārthāya mama putrā manojavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0124: jānāmy adharmaṃ sakalaṃ vijitā vinatā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0125: nikṛtyā dāsabhāvas tu yuṣmān apy avapīḍayet
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0126: nikṛtyā vijayo veti dāsatvaṃ vā parājaye
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0127: ubhayaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā jayo vai dhārmiko varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0128: yady apy adharmo vijayo yuṣmān eva spṛśet punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0129: guror vacanam āsthāya dharmo vaḥ sa bhaviṣyati bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0130: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ mātuḥ kruddhāyās te bhujaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0131: kṛcchreṇaivānvamodanta ke cid dhitvā diśo gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0132: ye pratasthur diśas tatra kruddhā tān aśapad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0133: bhujaṃgamānāṃ mātāsau kadrūr vairakarī tadā kadrūḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0140: evaṃ śaptā diśaḥ prāptāḥ pannagā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0141: vihāya mātaraṃ kruddhā gatā vairakarīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0142: tatra ye vṛjinaṃ tasyā anāpannā bhujaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0143: te tasya vājino vālā babhūvur asitaprabhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0144: tān dṛṣṭvā vāladhisthāṃś ca putrān kadrūr athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0145: vinatām atha saṃhṛṣṭā hayo 'sau dṛśyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0146: ekavarṇo na vā bhadre paṇo nau suvyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0147: udakād uttarantaṃ taṃ hayaṃ caiva ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0148: sā tv avakramatir devī vinatā jihmagābhinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0149: abravīd bhaginīṃ kiṃ cid vihasantīva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0150: hanta paśyāva gacchāvaḥ sukṛto nau paṇaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0151: dāsī vā te bhaviṣyāmi tvaṃ vā dāsī bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0152: evaṃ sthiraṃ paṇaṃ kṛtvā hayaṃ te tu dadarśatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0154: sā dṛṣṭvaiva hayaṃ mandaṃ vinatā śokakarśitā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0156: tatra sā vrīlitā vākyaṃ vinatā sāśrubindukā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0159: dāsyaś ca kāmakārā hi bhartṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0161: dāsīvat preṣayām āsa sā ca sarvaṃ cakāra tat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0162: na vivarṇā na saṃkṣubdhā na ca kruddhā na duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0165: atha sma vainateyaṃ vai baladarpau samīyatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0168: tam abravīc ca devarṣir nāradaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0169: kiṃ darpavaśam āpanno na vai paśyasi mātaram
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0172: tam abravīd vainateyaḥ karma kiṃ tan mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0173: janayitrī mayi sute jātā dāsī tapasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0174: athābravīd ṛṣir vākyaṃ dīvyatī vijitā khaga garuḍaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0175: nikṛtyā pannagendrasya mātrā putraiḥ purā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0176: kathaṃ jitā nikṛtyā sā bhagavañ jananī mama
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0177: brūhi tan me yathāvṛttaṃ śrutvā vetsye tataḥ param
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0178: tatas tasya yathāvṛttaṃ sarvaṃ tan nāradas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0180: tac chrutvā vainateyasya kopo hṛdi samāviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0181: jagarhe pannagān sarvān mātrā saha paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0182: tatas tu roṣād duḥkhāc ca tūrṇam utpatya pakṣirāṭ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0183: jagāma yatra mātāsya kṛcchre mahati vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0184: tatrāpaśyat tato dīnāṃ jaṭilāṃ malināṃ kṛśām
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0186: tasya duḥkhāc ca roṣāc ca netrābhyām aśru cāsravat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0187: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca pauruṣe pratitasthuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0189: kadrūm eva sa dharmātmā vacanaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0190: yadi dharmeṇa me mātā jitā yady apy adharmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0191: jyeṣṭhā tvam asi me mātā dharmaḥ sarvaḥ sa me mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0192: iyaṃ tu me syāt kṛpaṇā mayi putre 'mba duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0194: kadrūḥ śrutvāsya tad vākyaṃ vainateyasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0196: nāhaṃ tava na te mātur vainateya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0197: kuryāṃ priyam aniṣṭātmā māṃ bravīṣi khaga dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0198: tāṃ tadā bruvatīṃ vākyam aniṣṭāṃ krūrabhāṣiṇīm
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0200: jyeṣṭhā tvam asi kalyāṇi mātur me bhāmini priyā 13,008.028d@001A_0201
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0201: sodaryā mama cāsi tvaṃ jyeṣṭhā mātā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0203: sūnṛtābhis tvayā mātā nādāsī śakyam aṇḍaja
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0204: amṛtaṃ yady āhares tvaṃ vihaṃga jananīṃ tava bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0205: adāsīṃ mama paśyemāṃ vainateya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0206: tathety uktvā tu vihagaḥ pratijñāya mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0208: kāmaṃ vai sūnṛtā vāco visṛjya ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0209: yac cāpy anujñāṃ mātur vai na ca sā hy anumanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0210: sā mā bahuvidhā vāco vajrakalpā visṛjya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0211: bhagavan vinatā dāsī mama mātā mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0212: kadrūḥ preṣayate caiva dāsīyam iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0213: āharāmṛtam ity eva mokṣyate vinatā tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0214: so 'haṃ mātur vimokṣārtham āhariṣya iti bruvan 13,008.028d@001A_0215
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0215: amṛtaṃ prārthitas tūrṇam āhartuṃ pratinandya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0216: amṛtaṃ tāta duṣprāpaṃ devair api kutas tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0217: rakṣyate hi bhṛśaṃ putra rakṣibhis tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0218: guptam adbhir bhṛśaṃ sādhu sarvataḥ parivāritam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0221: rakṣanty amṛtam atyarthaṃ kiṃkarā nāma rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0222: teṣāṃ śaktyṛṣṭiśūlāṃś ca śataghnyaḥ paṭṭasās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0223: āyudhā rakṣiṇāṃ tāta vajrakalpāḥ śilās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0225: ayasmayena vai tāta vṛtrahantuḥ sma śāsanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0226: tat tvam evaṃvidhaṃ tāta kathaṃ prārthayase 'mṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0228: indreṇa devair nāgaiś ca khaḍgair girijalādibhiḥ garuḍaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0229: putragṛddhyā bravīṣy etac chṛṇu tāta viniścayam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0230: balavān upāyavān asmi bhūyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0231: tam abravīt pitā hṛṣṭaḥ prahasan vai punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0232: yadi tau bhakṣayes tāta krūrau kacchapavāraṇau
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0233: tathā balam ameyaṃ te bhavitā tan na saṃśayaḥ 13,008.028d@001A_0234
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0235: kva tau krūrau mahābhāga vartete hastikacchapau
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0237: parvato vai samudrānte nabhaḥ stabdhveha tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0238: urago nāma duṣprāpaḥ purā devagaṇair api
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0240: tatra panthāḥ kṛtas tāta kuñjareṇa balīyasā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0241: gorutāny ucchrayas tasya nava sapta ca putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0243: tāvān bhūmisamas tāta kṛtaḥ panthāḥ samutthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0244: tena gatvā sa mātaṃgaḥ pipāsur yuddham icchati
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0245: tam atītya tu śailendraṃ hradaḥ kokanadāyutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0246: kanaketi ca vikhyātas tatra kūrmo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0247: gorutāni sa vistīrṇaḥ kacchapaḥ kuñjaraś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0251: yadā sa nāgo vrajati pipāsus taṃ jalāśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0253: nakhaiś ca daśanaiś cāpi nimajyonmajya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0255: nāgarāḍ api toyārthī pipāsuś caraṇair api
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0257: sa tu toyād anuttiṣṭhan vārijo gajayūthapam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0258: nakhaiś ca daśanaiś caiva dviradaṃ pratiṣedhati
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0259: nivārito gajaśreṣṭhaḥ punar gacchati svaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0261: tau gaccha sahitau putra yadi śaknoṣi bhakṣaya
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0262: na tau pṛthak tvayā śakyāv apramattau bale sthitau 13,008.028d@001A_0262
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0263: kathaṃ tau bhagavañ śakyau mayā vāraṇakacchapau kaśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0264: yugapad grahītuṃ tan me tvam upāyaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0265: yoddhukāme gaje tasmin muhūrtaṃ sa jalecaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0266: uttiṣṭhati jalāt tūrṇaṃ yoddhukāmaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0267: jalajaṃ nirjalaṃ tāta pramattaṃ caiva vāraṇam bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0269: ity evam ukto vihagas tad gatvā vanam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0271: tāṃ sa nāgo girer vīthiṃ saṃprāpta iva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0274: mātaṃgaṃ kacchapaṃ caiva praharṣaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0275: atha vegena mahatā khecaraḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0277: tathā gatvā tam adhvānaṃ vāraṇapravaro balī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0284: dantair nakhaiś ca jalajo vārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0285: jalajaṃ vāraṇo 'py evaṃ caraṇaiḥ puṣkareṇa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0288: atha tasmāj jalād rājan kacchapaḥ sthalam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0289: sa tu nāgaḥ prabhagno 'pi pipāsur na nyavartata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0291: taṃ dṛṣṭvā jalajaṃ tūrṇam apasarpantam āhavāt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0293: taṃ roṣāt sthalam uttīrṇam asaṃprāptaṃ gajottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0294: ubhāv eva samastau tu jagrāha vinatāsutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0295: caraṇena tu savyena jagrāha sa gajottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0298: divaṃ khaṃ ca samāvṛtya pakṣābhyām aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0299: tena cotpatatā tūrṇaṃ saṃgṛhītau nakhair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0302: vivalgann iva khe krīḍan khecaro 'bhijagāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0304: niraikṣata na cāpaśyad drumaṃ paryāptam āsitum
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0305: naimiṣaṃ tv atha saṃprāpya devāraṇyaṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0309: tasya śākhābhavat kā cid āyatā pañcayojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0312: attukāmas tataḥ śākhāṃ tasya vegād avāpatat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0313: tāṃ patantīm abhiprekṣya prekṣya carṣigaṇān atha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0316: tasya bhīr āviśat tatra patagendrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0317: tān dṛṣṭvā sa yatīṃs tatra samāsīnān suraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0318: tuṇḍena gṛhya tāṃ śākhām utpapāta khageśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0319: tau ca pakṣī bhujaṃgāśo vyomni krīḍann ivāvrajat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0321: ṛṣayas te 'bruvan sarve garuḍo 'yam iti sma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0322: na tv anyaḥ kṣamate kaś cid yathāyaṃ vīryavān khagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0324: ayaṃ krīḍann ivākāśe tasmād garuḍa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0325: evaṃ te samayaṃ sarve vasavaś ca divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0326: akārṣuḥ pakṣirājasya garuḍety eva nāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0327: sa pakṣī pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ paridhāvaṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0328: mumukṣuḥ śākhinaḥ śākhāṃ na sma deśam apaśyata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0329: sa vācam aśṛṇod divyām upary upari jalpataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0332: pātyatāṃ śākhinaḥ śākhā na hi te dharmaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0333: tac chrutvā garuḍas tūrṇaṃ jagāma lavaṇāmbhasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0334: uddeśaṃ yatra te mandāḥ kuvindāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0335: tato gatvā tataḥ śākhāṃ mumoca patatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0336: tayā hatā janapadās tadā ṣaṭtriṃśato nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0337: sa deśo rājaśārdūla khyātaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0340: upopaviśya śailāgre bhakṣayām āsa tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0341: vāraṇaṃ kacchapaṃ caiva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa patatrirāṭ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0342: tayoḥ sa rudhiraṃ pītvā medasī ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0343: saṃhṛṣṭaḥ patatāṃ śreṣṭho labdhvā balam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0347: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vihagendrasya bhayaṃ tīvram athāviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0348: na tu toyān na rakṣobhyo bhayam asyopapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0349: pakṣitvam ātmano dṛṣṭvā jvalantaṃ ca hutāśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0356: tadā me jananī deva dāsabhāvāt pramokṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0359: tatra me devadeveśa bhayaṃ tīvram athāviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0360: jvalantaṃ pāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā pakṣitvaṃ cātmanaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0361: samatikramituṃ śakyaḥ kathaṃ syāt pāvako mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0362: tasyābhyupāyaṃ varada vaktum īśo 'si me prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0364: agneḥ saṃśamanopāyam utsmayan sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0365: payasā śāmyate vatsa sarpiṣā ca hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0366: śarīrastho 'pi bhūtānāṃ kiṃ punaḥ prajvalan bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0367: navanītaṃ payo vāpi pāvake tvaṃ samādadheḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0368: tato gaccha yathākāmaṃ na tvā dhakṣyati pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0372: tad ādāya tato 'gacchad yatas tad rakṣyate 'mṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0373: sa tatra gatvā patagas tiryak toyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0376: dhūmaketur na jajvāla dhūmam eva sasarja ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0379: te patanti śirobhiś ca jānubhiś caraṇais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0381: utplutya cāvṛtān nāgān hatvā cakraṃ vyatītya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0383: sa bhittvā śirasā jālaṃ vajravegasamo balī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0385: tad ādāyādravac chīghraṃ garuḍaḥ śvasano yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0386: atha saṃnāham akarod vṛtrahā vibudhaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0392: tato vai mātaliṃ prāha śīghraṃ vāhaya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0393: atha divyaṃ mahāghoraṃ garuḍāya sasarja ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0396: tūrṇaṃ vegataro bhūtvā jagāma patatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0398: āyudhānāṃ varaṃ vajram atha śakram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0399: vṛtrahann eṣa vajras te varo labdhaḥ pitāmahāt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0400: ataḥ saṃmānam ākāṅkṣan muñcāmy ekaṃ tanūruham
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0402: hanyās tvaṃ parayā śaktyā gacchāmy aham anāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0403: tat tu tūrṇaṃ tadā vajraṃ svena vegena bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0404: jaghāna parayā śaktyā na cainam adahad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0405: tato devarṣayo rājan gacchanto vai vihāyasā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0406: dṛṣṭvā vajraṃ viṣaktaṃ taṃ pakṣiparṇe 'bruvan vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0410: ṛṣayas taṃ vijānanti cāgneyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0412: tanu parṇaṃ suparṇasya jagṛhur barhiṇas tathā bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0413: mayūrā vismitāḥ sarve ādravanti sma vajriṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0414: tato vajraṃ sahasrākṣo dṛṣṭvā saktaṃ varāyudham
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0415: ṛṣīṃś ca dṛṣṭvā sahasā suparṇam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0416: na te suparṇa paśyāmi prabhāvaṃ tena yodhaye
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0417: ity ukte na mayā rakṣā śakyā kartum ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0418: idaṃ vajraṃ mayā sārdhaṃ nivṛttaṃ hi yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0419: tataḥ sahasranayane nivṛtte garuḍas tathā garuḍaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0420: kadrūm abhyāgamat tūrṇam amṛtaṃ gṛhya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0421: tadāhṛtaṃ mayā śīghram amṛtaṃ jananīkṛte kadrūḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0422: adāsī sā bhavatv adya vinatā dharmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0424: adāsī jananī te 'dya putra kāmavaśā śubhā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0425: evam ukte tadā sā ca saṃprāptā vinatā gṛham
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0428: vadhaṃ ca bhujagendrāṇāṃ ye vālās tasya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0429: babhūvur asitaprakhyā nikṛtyā vai jitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0430: tām uvāca tato nyāyaṃ vihago balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0435: punar harasi durbuddhe mā jātu vṛjinaṃ kṛthāḥ suparṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0437: bhavatyā vacanād etad āharāmṛtam ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0438: āhṛtaṃ tad idaṃ śīghraṃ muktā ca jananī mama
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0439: harāmy eṣa punas tatra yata etan mayāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0440: yadi māṃ bhavatī brūyād amṛtaṃ me ca dīyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0441: tathā kuryāṃ na vā kuryāṃ na hi tvam amṛtakṣamā bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0442: mayā dharmeṇa satyena vinatā ca samuddhṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0443: tato gatvātha garuḍaḥ puraṃdaram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0444: idaṃ mayā vṛtrahantar hṛtaṃ te 'mṛtam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0446: mātā ca mama deveśa dāsītvam upajagmuṣī
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0449: uvāca ca mudā yukto diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0450: ṛṣayo ye sahasrākṣam upāsanti suraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0451: te sarve ca mudā yuktā viśve devās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0452: tatas tam ṛṣayaḥ sarve devāś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0453: ūcuḥ puraṃdaraṃ hṛṣṭā garuḍo labhatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0454: tataḥ śacīpatir vākyam uvāca prahasann iva
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0459: suparṇo vainateyaś ca kīrtito bhadram astu te
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0460: tad etad dadatāṃ śreṣṭha mayākhyānaṃ prakīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:008.028d-001A_0461: suparṇasya mahābāho kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:009.001a: brāhmaṇānāṃ tu ye loke pratiśrutya pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:009.001c: na prayacchanti mohāt te ke bhavanti mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:009.001d-0046_01: dānadharmeṣu bho bhīṣma sadaiva niścayo hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:009.002a: etan me tattvato brūhi dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:009.002c: pratiśrutya durātmāno na prayacchanti ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:009.003a: yo na dadyāt pratiśrutya svalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu
GE07mbh_13_u:009.003c: āśās tasya hatāḥ sarvāḥ klībasyeva prajāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:009.004a: yāṃ rātriṃ jāyate pāpo yāṃ ca rātriṃ vinaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:009.004c: etasminn antare yad yat sukṛtaṃ tasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:009.004e: yac ca tasya hutaṃ kiṃ cit sarvaṃ tasyopahanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:009.007c: sṛgālasya ca saṃvādaṃ vānarasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:009.008a: tau sakhāyau purā hy āstāṃ mānuṣatve paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:009.008c: anyāṃ yoniṃ samāpannau sārgālīṃ vānarīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:009.008d-0048_01: saṃbhāṣamāṇau tu tataḥ sakhyaṃ tatra parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:009.010a: kiṃ tvayā pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:009.010c: yas tvaṃ śmaśāne mṛtakān pūtikān atsi kutsitān
GE07mbh_13_u:009.011a: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca sṛgālo vānaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:009.011c: brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya na mayā tad upākṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0049_01: etan mayā te kathitaṃ sṛgālo 'haṃ yathābhavam vānara uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0049_02: tvaṃ tu vānaratāṃ prāptaḥ karmaṇā kena tad vada
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0049_03: pārakyāṇi purā lobhāt phalāny apahṛtāni ca bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0049_05: evaṃ tau kathayitvā tu karmadoṣān parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0049_06: sṛgālo vānaraś cāpi pratiyātau yathāgatam bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0050_01: sṛgālo vānaraṃ prāha punar eva nṛpottama
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0050_02: kiṃ tvayā pātakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāsi vānaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0051_01: sa cāpy āha brāhmaṇānāṃ phalāhāraḥ plavaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:009.012d-0051_02: tasmān na brāhmaṇasvaṃ tu hartavyaṃ viduṣā sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:009.013a: ity etad bruvato rājan brāhmaṇasya mayā śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:009.014a: śrutaṃ cāpi mayā bhūyaḥ kṛṣṇasyāpi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:009.014c: kathāṃ kathayataḥ pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_13_u:009.014d-0052_01: na hartavyaṃ vipradhanaṃ kṣantavyaṃ teṣu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:009.014d-0052_02: bālāś ca nāvamantavyā daridrāḥ kṛpaṇā api
GE07mbh_13_u:009.015a: evam eva ca māṃ nityaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ saṃdiśanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:009.015c: pratiśrutya bhaved deyaṃ nāśā kāryā hi brāhmaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:009.016a: brāhmaṇo hy āśayā pūrvaṃ kṛtayā pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:009.016c: susamiddho yathā dīptaḥ pāvakas tadvidhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:009.017c: pradaheta hi taṃ rājan kakṣam akṣayyabhug yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:009.018a: sa eva hi yadā tuṣṭo vacasā pratinandati
GE07mbh_13_u:009.019a: putrān pautrān paśūṃś caiva bāndhavān sacivāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:009.019c: puraṃ janapadaṃ caiva śāntir iṣṭeva puṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:009.020a: etad dhi paramaṃ tejo brāhmaṇasyeha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:009.022a: brāhmaṇasya hi dattena dhruvaṃ svargo hy anuttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:009.022c: śakyaṃ prāptuṃ viśeṣeṇa dānaṃ hi mahatī kriyā
GE07mbh_13_u:009.023a: ito dattena jīvanti devatāḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:009.024a: mahad dhi bharataśreṣṭha brāhmaṇas tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:009.024c: velāyāṃ na tu kasyāṃ cid gacched vipro hy apūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.001c: jātyāvarasya rājarṣe doṣas tasya bhaven na vā
GE07mbh_13_u:010.002a: etad icchāmi tattvena vyākhyātuṃ vai pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.002c: sūkṣmā gatir hi dharmasya yatra muhyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.003a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan yathāgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.003c: ṛṣīṇāṃ vadatāṃ pūrvaṃ śrutam āsīd yathā mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:010.004a: upadeśo na kartavyo jātihīnasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:010.004d-0054_01: nādhyāpayec chūdram iha tathā naiva ca yājayet
GE07mbh_13_u:010.005a: nidarśanam idaṃ rājañ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.009c: vālakhilyaiś ca bahubhir yatibhiś ca niṣevitam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.010a: tatra kaś cit samutsāhaṃ kṛtvā śūdro dayānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.010c: āgato hy āśramapadaṃ pūjitaś ca tapasvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.011a: tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā munigaṇān devakalpān mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.013c: tan māṃ tvaṃ bhagavan vaktuṃ pravrājayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:010.014c: śuśrūṣāṃ kartum icchāmi prapannāya prasīda me
GE07mbh_13_u:010.015a: na śakyam iha śūdreṇa liṅgam āśritya vartitum
GE07mbh_13_u:010.015c: āsyatāṃ yadi te buddhiḥ śuśrūṣānirato bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:010.015d-0055_01: śuśrūṣayā parāṃl lokān avāpsyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.016a: evam uktas tu muninā sa śūdro 'cintayan nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:010.016c: katham atra mayā kāryaṃ śraddhā dharme parā ca me
GE07mbh_13_u:010.016e: vijñātam evaṃ bhavatu kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.017a: gatvāśramapadād dūram uṭajaṃ kṛtavāṃs tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.017c: tatra vediṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca devatāyatanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:010.018c: baliṃ ca kṛtvā hutvā ca devatāṃ cāpy apūjayat
GE07mbh_13_u:010.019c: nityaṃ saṃnihitābhiś ca oṣadhībhiḥ phalais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:010.020c: evaṃ hi sumahān kālo vyatyakrāmat sa tasya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:010.021a: athāsya munir āgacchat saṃgatyā vai tam āśramam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.023a: evaṃ sa bahuśas tasya śūdrasya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.023c: so 'gacchad āśramam ṛṣiḥ śūdraṃ draṣṭuṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.024a: atha taṃ tāpasaṃ śūdraḥ so 'bravīd bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.025a: bāḍham ity eva taṃ vipra uvāca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.025c: śucir bhūtvā sa śūdras tu tasyarṣeḥ pādyam ānayat
GE07mbh_13_u:010.025d-0057_01: śucir bhūtvā namaskṛtya tasya pādyam athānayat
GE07mbh_13_u:010.026a: atha darbhāṃś ca vanyāś ca oṣadhīr bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.026c: pavitram āsanaṃ caiva bṛsīṃ ca samupānayat
GE07mbh_13_u:010.027c: kṛtām anyāyato dṛṣṭvā tatas tam ṛṣir abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:010.028c: sa ca tat kṛtavāñ śūdraḥ sarvaṃ yad ṛṣir abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:010.030a: ṛṣiṇā pitṛkārye ca sa ca dharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.030c: pitṛkārye kṛte cāpi visṛṣṭaḥ sa jagāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.031a: atha dīrghasya kālasya sa tapyañ śūdratāpasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.031c: vane pañcatvam agamat sukṛtena ca tena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:010.032a: tathaiva sa ṛṣis tāta kāladharmam avāpya ha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.033a: evaṃ tau tatra saṃbhūtāv ubhau śūdramunī tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:010.033c: krameṇa vardhitau cāpi vidyāsu kuśalāv ubhau
GE07mbh_13_u:010.034c: kalpaprayoge cotpanne jyotiṣe ca paraṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.034e: sakhye cāpi parā prītis tayoś cāpi vyavardhata
GE07mbh_13_u:010.035a: pitary uparate cāpi kṛtaśaucaḥ sa bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:010.036a: sa taṃ purodhāya sukham avasad bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:010.036c: rājyaṃ śaśāsa dharmeṇa prajāś ca paripālayan
GE07mbh_13_u:010.037c: utsmayan prāhasac cāpi dṛṣṭvā rājā purohitam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.037e: evaṃ sa bahuśo rājan purodhasam upāhasat
GE07mbh_13_u:010.038c: utsmayantaṃ ca satataṃ dṛṣṭvāsau manyumān abhūt
GE07mbh_13_u:010.039a: atha śūnye purodhās tu saha rājñā samāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.040c: varam icchāmy ahaṃ tv ekaṃ tvayā dattaṃ mahādyute rājovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:010.041a: varāṇāṃ te śataṃ dadyāṃ kim utaikaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.041c: snehāc ca bahumānāc ca nāsty adeyaṃ hi me tava
GE07mbh_13_u:010.042a: ekaṃ vai varam icchāmi yadi tuṣṭo 'si pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:010.042c: yad dadāsi mahārāja satyaṃ tad vada mānṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.043a: bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:010.043c: yadi jñāsyāmi vakṣyāmi ajānan na tu saṃvade
GE07mbh_13_u:010.044c: śāntihomeṣu ca sadā kiṃ tvaṃ hasasi vīkṣya mām
GE07mbh_13_u:010.045a: savrīḍaṃ vai bhavati hi mano me hasatā tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:010.045c: kāmayā śāpito rājan nānyathā vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:010.046a: bhāvyaṃ hi kāraṇenātra na te hāsyam akāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.046c: kautūhalaṃ me subhṛśaṃ tattvena kathayasva me rājovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:010.047a: evam ukte tvayā vipra yad avācyaṃ bhaved api
GE07mbh_13_u:010.048a: pūrvadehe yathā vṛttaṃ tan nibodha dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.048c: jātiṃ smarāmy ahaṃ brahmann avadhānena me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:010.049c: ṛṣir ugratapās tvaṃ ca tadābhūr dvijasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.050e: bṛsyāṃ darbheṣu havye ca kavye ca munisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.051c: ahaṃ rājā ca viprendra paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.051e: matkṛte hy upadeśena tvayā prāptam idaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.052a: etasmāt kāraṇād brahman prahase tvāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.052c: na tvāṃ paribhavan brahman prahasāmi gurur bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:010.053a: viparyayeṇa me manyus tena saṃtapyate manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.053c: jātiṃ smarāmy ahaṃ tubhyam atas tvāṃ prahasāmi vai
GE07mbh_13_u:010.054a: evaṃ tavograṃ hi tapa upadeśena nāśitam
GE07mbh_13_u:010.055a: itas tvam adhamām anyāṃ mā yoniṃ prāpsyase dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:010.055c: gṛhyatāṃ draviṇaṃ vipra pūtātmā bhava sattama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.056a: tato visṛṣṭo rājñā tu vipro dānāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.056c: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau vittaṃ bhūmiṃ grāmāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.057a: kṛcchrāṇi cīrtvā ca tato yathoktāni dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.057c: tīrthāni cābhigatvā vai dānāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:010.058a: dattvā gāś caiva viprāṇāṃ pūtātmā so 'bhavad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.058c: tam eva cāśramaṃ gatvā cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.059a: tataḥ siddhiṃ parāṃ prāpto brāhmaṇo rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.060a: evaṃ prāpto mahat kṛcchram ṛṣiḥ sa nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:010.060c: brāhmaṇena na vaktavyaṃ tasmād varṇāvare jane
GE07mbh_13_u:010.061a: varjayed upadeśaṃ ca sadaiva brāhmaṇo nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:010.061c: upadeśaṃ hi kurvāṇo dvijaḥ kṛcchram avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:010.062c: na pravaktavyam iha hi kiṃ cid varṇāvare jane
GE07mbh_13_u:010.063a: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyās trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.063c: eteṣu kathayan rājan brāhmaṇo na praduṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:010.064a: tasmāt sadbhir na vaktavyaṃ kasya cit kiṃ cid agrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.064c: sūkṣmā gatir hi dharmasya durjñeyā hy akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.065a: tasmān maunāni munayo dīkṣāṃ kurvanti cādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:010.065c: duruktasya bhayād rājan nānubhāṣanti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:010.067a: upadeśo na kartavyaḥ kadā cid api kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:010.067c: upadeśād dhi tat pāpaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ samavāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:010.068a: vimṛśya tasmāt prājñena vaktavyaṃ dharmam icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:010.068c: satyānṛtena hi kṛta upadeśo hinasti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:010.069c: sa copadeśaḥ kartavyo yena dharmam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:010.070a: etat te sarvam ākhyātam upadeśe kṛte sati
GE07mbh_13_u:010.070c: mahān kleśo hi bhavati tasmān nopadiśet kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:011.001a: kīdṛśe puruṣe tāta strīṣu vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:011.001c: śrīḥ padmā vasate nityaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:011.004a: kānīha bhūtāny upasevase tvaṃ; saṃtiṣṭhatī kāni na sevase tvam
GE07mbh_13_u:011.004c: tāni trilokeśvarabhūtakānte; tattvena me brūhi maharṣikanye
GE07mbh_13_u:011.005a: evaṃ tadā śrīr abhibhāṣyamāṇā; devyā samakṣaṃ garuḍadhvajasya
GE07mbh_13_u:011.005c: uvāca vākyaṃ madhurābhidhānaṃ; manoharaṃ candramukhī prasannā
GE07mbh_13_u:011.006a: vasāmi satye subhage pragalbhe; dakṣe nare karmaṇi vartamāne
GE07mbh_13_u:011.006c: nākarmaśīle puruṣe vasāmi; na nāstike sāṃkarike kṛtaghne
GE07mbh_13_u:011.006e: na bhinnavṛtte na nṛśaṃsavṛtte; na cāpi caure na guruṣv asūye
GE07mbh_13_u:011.007a: ye cālpatejobalasattvasārā; hṛṣyanti kupyanti ca yatra tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:011.007c: na devi tiṣṭhāmi tathāvidheṣu; nareṣu saṃsuptamanoratheṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:011.008a: yaś cātmani prārthayate na kiṃ cid; yaś ca svabhāvopahatāntarātmā
GE07mbh_13_u:011.008c: teṣv alpasaṃtoṣarateṣu nityaṃ; nareṣu nāhaṃ nivasāmi devi
GE07mbh_13_u:011.011a: prakīrṇabhāṇḍām anavekṣyakāriṇīṃ; sadā ca bhartuḥ pratikūlavādinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:011.011c: parasya veśmābhiratām alajjām; evaṃvidhāṃ strīṃ parivarjayāmi
GE07mbh_13_u:011.012a: lolām acokṣām avalehinīṃ ca; vyapetadhairyāṃ kalahapriyāṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:011.012c: nidrābhibhūtāṃ satataṃ śayānām; evaṃvidhāṃ strīṃ parivarjayāmi
GE07mbh_13_u:011.014a: yāneṣu kanyāsu vibhūṣaṇeṣu; yajñeṣu megheṣu ca vṛṣṭimatsu
GE07mbh_13_u:011.014c: vasāmi phullāsu ca padminīṣu; nakṣatravīthīṣu ca śāradīṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:011.015a: śaileṣu goṣṭheṣu tathā vaneṣu; saraḥsu phullotpalapaṅkajeṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:011.016c: vasāmi nityaṃ subahūdakāsu; siṃhair gajaiś cākulitodakāsu
GE07mbh_13_u:011.016e: matte gaje govṛṣabhe narendre; siṃhāsane satpuruṣe ca nityam
GE07mbh_13_u:011.017a: yasmin gṛhe hūyate havyavāho; gobrāhmaṇaś cārcyate devatāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:011.017c: kāle ca puṣpair balayaḥ kriyante; tasmin gṛhe nityam upaimi vāsam
GE07mbh_13_u:011.018a: svādhyāyanityeṣu dvijeṣu nityaṃ; kṣatre ca dharmābhirate sadaiva
GE07mbh_13_u:011.018c: vaiśye ca kṛṣyābhirate vasāmi; śūdre ca śuśrūṣaṇanityayukte
GE07mbh_13_u:011.019a: nārāyaṇe tv ekamanā vasāmi; sarveṇa bhāvena śarīrabhūtā
GE07mbh_13_u:011.019c: tasmin hi dharmaḥ sumahān niviṣṭo; brahmaṇyatā cātra tathā priyatvam
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020a: nāhaṃ śarīreṇa vasāmi devi; naivaṃ mayā śakyam ihābhidhātum
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020c: yasmiṃs tu bhāvena vasāmi puṃsi; sa vardhate dharmayaśorthakāmaiḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0002: mātṝḥ pitṝn gurūṃś caiva ye 'vamanyanti mohitāḥ
