GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0003: ye cāpy anye pare tāta kṛtaghnā nirapatrapāḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0004: teṣāṃ gatiṃ mahābāho śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0005: kṛtaghnānāṃ gatis tāta narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0006: mātāpitṛgurūṇāṃ ca ye na tiṣṭhanta śāsane
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0008: durlabho hi punas teṣāṃ mānuṣye punarudbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0012: tasmiṃś ca tapyati tapo vāsavo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0015: nimīlitākṣas tad varṣaṃ pratyagṛhṇata vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0019: kāruṇyāt tasya dharmas tu ānṛśaṃsyam athākarot
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0022: svaṃ rūpaṃ māhiṣaṃ kṛtvā sumahāntaṃ manoharam
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0028: diśaś ca vipulās tatra girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0029: dṛṣṭvā ca pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ salilena pariplutām
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0030: jalāśayān sa tān dṛṣṭvā vipraḥ pramudito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0031: acintayad vismitaś ca varṣāt kenāsmi rakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0035: pīvaraś caiva balyaś ca bahumāṃso bhaved ayam
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0036: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā dharmasaṃsaktajā muneḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0037: kṛtaghnā narakaṃ yānti ye ca viśvastaghātinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0038: niṣkṛtiṃ neha paśyāmi kṛtaghnānāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0041: kṛtaghnatāṃ ca saṃprāpya maraṇāntā ca niṣkṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0043: tasmāt prāṇān parityakṣye prāyaścittārtham ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0046: nigṛhītaś ca dharmātmā haste dharmeṇa dharmavit
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0050: na kaś cid vatsanābhasya yasya nopahataṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0051: yaś cānavadyaś carati śakto dharmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:011.020d-002_0052: nivartasva mahāprājña pūtātmā hy asi śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.001c: etan me saṃśayaṃ rājan yathāvad vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:012.002c: bhaṅgāśvanena śakrasya yathā vairam abhūt purā
GE07mbh_13_u:012.003c: aputraḥ sa naravyāghra putrārthaṃ yajñam āharat
GE07mbh_13_u:012.005a: indro jñātvā tu taṃ yajñaṃ mahābhāgaḥ sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.005d-0064_01: na caivāsyāntaraṃ rājan sa dadarśa mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.006a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya mṛgayām aṭato nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:012.006c: idam antaram ity eva śakro nṛpam amohayat
GE07mbh_13_u:012.007a: ekāśvena ca rājarṣir bhrānta indreṇa mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.008a: itaś cetaś ca vai dhāvañ śramatṛṣṇārdito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.008e: so 'vagāhya saras tāta pāyayām āsa vājinam
GE07mbh_13_u:012.009a: atha pītodakaṃ so 'śvaṃ vṛkṣe baddhvā nṛpottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.009c: avagāhya tataḥ snāto rājā strītvam avāpa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:012.011a: ārohiṣye kathaṃ tv aśvaṃ kathaṃ yāsyāmi vai puram
GE07mbh_13_u:012.011c: agniṣṭuṃ nāma iṣṭaṃ me putrāṇāṃ śatam aurasam
GE07mbh_13_u:012.012a: jātaṃ mahābalānāṃ vai tān pravakṣyāmi kiṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_13_u:012.013a: mṛdutvaṃ ca tanutvaṃ ca viklavatvaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:012.013e: vyāyāmaḥ karkaśatvaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca puruṣe guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.014a: pauruṣaṃ vipranaṣṭaṃ me strītvaṃ kenāpi me 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:012.014c: strībhāvāt katham aśvaṃ tu punar āroḍhum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:012.015a: mahatā tv atha khedena āruhyāśvaṃ narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.015c: punar āyāt puraṃ tāta strībhūto nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:012.016a: putrā dārāś ca bhṛtyāś ca paurajānapadāś ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:012.016c: kiṃ nv idaṃ tv iti vijñāya vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.017a: athovāca sa rājarṣiḥ strībhūto vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.017c: mṛgayām asmi niryāto balaiḥ parivṛto dṛḍham
GE07mbh_13_u:012.019a: tatrāvagāḍhaḥ strībhūto vyaktaṃ daivān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.019c: atṛpta iva putrāṇāṃ dārāṇāṃ ca dhanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:012.020a: uvāca putrāṃś ca tataḥ strībhūtaḥ pārthivottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.020c: saṃprītyā bhujyatāṃ rājyaṃ vanaṃ yāsyāmi putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.020e: abhiṣicya sa putrāṇāṃ śataṃ rājā vanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.020f-0067_01: evam uktvā putraśataṃ vanam eva jagāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:012.020f-0068_01: sa putrāṇāṃ śataṃ rājā abhiṣicya vanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.022a: atha sā tān sutān gṛhya pūrvaputrān abhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:012.022c: puruṣatve sutā yūyaṃ strītve ceme śataṃ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.023c: sahitā bhrātaras te 'tha rājyaṃ bubhujire tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:012.024a: tān dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛbhāvena bhuñjānān rājyam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:012.025c: bhedayām āsa tān gatvā nagaraṃ vai nṛpātmajān
GE07mbh_13_u:012.026a: bhrātṝṇāṃ nāsti saubhrātraṃ ye 'py ekasya pituḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.027c: kaśyapasya surāś caiva asurāś ca sutās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:012.028a: indreṇa bheditās te tu yuddhe 'nyonyam apātayan
GE07mbh_13_u:012.028c: tac chrutvā tāpasī cāpi saṃtaptā praruroda ha
GE07mbh_13_u:012.029c: kena duḥkhena saṃtaptā rodiṣi tvaṃ varānane
GE07mbh_13_u:012.030a: brāhmaṇaṃ tu tato dṛṣṭvā sā strī karuṇam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:012.030c: putrāṇāṃ dve śate brahman kālena vinipātite
GE07mbh_13_u:012.031a: ahaṃ rājābhavaṃ vipra tatra putraśataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:012.032a: kadā cin mṛgayāṃ yāta udbhrānto gahane vane
GE07mbh_13_u:012.032e: putrān rājye pratiṣṭhāpya vanam asmi tato gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.033a: striyāś ca me putraśataṃ tāpasena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:012.033c: āśrame janitaṃ brahman nītās te nagaraṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:012.034a: teṣāṃ ca vairam utpannaṃ kālayogena vai dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:012.035a: indras tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā abravīt paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.035c: purā suduḥsahaṃ bhadre mama duḥkhaṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:012.036c: indro 'ham asmi durbuddhe vairaṃ te yātitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:012.037a: indraṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rājarṣiḥ pādayoḥ śirasā gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.037e: iṣṭas tridaśaśārdūla tatra me kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:012.038c: putrā vai katame rājañ jīvantu tava śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_13_u:012.038e: strībhūtasya hi ye jātāḥ puruṣasyātha ye 'bhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:012.039a: tāpasī tu tataḥ śakram uvāca prayatāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.039c: strībhūtasya hi ye jātās te me jīvantu vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:012.040a: indras tu vismito hṛṣṭaḥ striyaṃ papraccha tāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.040c: puruṣotpāditā ye te kathaṃ dveṣyāḥ sutās tava
GE07mbh_13_u:012.041a: strībhūtasya hi ye jātāḥ snehas tebhyo 'dhikaḥ katham
GE07mbh_13_u:012.041c: kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me vaktum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:012.042a: striyās tv abhyadhikaḥ sneho na tathā puruṣasya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:012.042c: tasmāt te śakra jīvantu ye jātāḥ strīkṛtasya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:012.043a: evam ukte tatas tv indraḥ prīto vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:012.043c: sarva eveha jīvantu putrās te satyavādini
GE07mbh_13_u:012.044a: varaṃ ca vṛṇu rājendra yaṃ tvam icchasi suvrata
GE07mbh_13_u:012.044c: puruṣatvam atha strītvaṃ matto yad abhikāṅkṣasi
GE07mbh_13_u:012.045a: strītvam eva vṛṇe śakra prasanne tvayi vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:012.046a: evam uktas tu devendras tāṃ striyaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:012.046c: puruṣatvaṃ kathaṃ tyaktvā strītvaṃ rocayase vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:012.047e: etasmāt kāraṇāc chakra strītvam eva vṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:012.048a: rame caivādhikaṃ strītve satyaṃ vai devasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:012.049a: evam astv iti coktvā tām āpṛcchya tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:012.049c: evaṃ striyā mahārāja adhikā prītir ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.001c: kathaṃ vai lokayātrāṃ tu kiṃśīlaś ca samācaret bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.002a: kāyena trividhaṃ karma vācā cāpi caturvidham
GE07mbh_13_u:013.002c: manasā trividhaṃ caiva daśa karmapathāṃs tyajet
GE07mbh_13_u:013.003a: prāṇātipātaṃ stainyaṃ ca paradāram athāpi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.004c: catvāri vācā rājendra na jalpen nānucintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:013.005c: karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti trividhaṃ manasā caret
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006c: śubhāśubhāny ācaran hi tasya tasyāśnute phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-0071_01: śubhāny evācaraṃl loke bhakto nārāyaṇasya hi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-0071_02: tasyaiva tu padaṃ sūkṣmaṃ prasādād aśnuyāt param yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0001: cittaṃ me dūyate tāta loke param avindataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0004: nārāyaṇo hi viśvātmā puruṣaḥ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0006: yudhiṣṭhira mahāprājña mayā dṛṣṭaṃ ca saṃgare yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0007: tvatta eva tu rājendra rājadharmāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0011: kathitā vai mahābhāga tvayā vai madanugrahāt
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0013: ātitheyavidhiś caiva tapāṃsi niyamāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0018: teṣāṃ phalaviśeṣāś ca uñchadharmās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0019: ahany ahani ye proktā mahāyajñā dvijātinām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0022: svāhā svadhā praṇīte ca iṣṭāpūrtaphalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0025: māsapakṣopavāsānāṃ samyag uktaṃ phalaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0026: anāśitānāṃ ye lokā ye ca pañcatapā narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0030: loke cakracarāṇāṃ ca dvijānāṃ yat phalaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0031: annādīnāṃ ca dānānāṃ yat phalaṃ parikīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0033: rājñāṃ dharmāś ca ye loke samyak pālayatāṃ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0034: ye ca satyavratā loke ye ca tīrthe kṛtaśramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0035: mātāpitṛparā ye ca guruvṛttīś ca saṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0037: tyajanty abhimukhāḥ prāṇān nirbhayāḥ sattvam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0038: sahasradakṣiṇānāṃ ca yā gatir dadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0039: ve ca saṃdhyām upāsante samyag uktā mahāvratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0040: tathā yogavidhānaṃ ca yad grantheṣv abhiśabditam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0041: vedādyāḥ śrutayaś cāpi śrutā me kurusattama
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0043: śrutāḥ pañca mahāyāgā yeṣu sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0044: tatprabhedeṣu ye dharmās te 'pi vai kṛtsnaśaḥ śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0045: na ca dūṣayituṃ śakyāḥ sadbhir uktā hi te tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0046: eteṣāṃ kila dharmāṇām uttamo vaiṣṇavo vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0049: phalaṃ hy avaśyaṃ bhoktavyam ṛṣir dvaipāyano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0050: bhogānte cāpi patanaṃ gatiḥ pūrvaṃ prabhāṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0051: na me prītikarās tv ete viṣodarkā hi me matāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0053: diṣṭānte yāni duḥkhāni puruṣo vindate vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0055: tataś cābhyadhikāṃ tīvrāṃ vedanāṃ labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0057: tasmān me niścayo jāto dharmeṣv eteṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0059: taṃ dharmaṃ ceha vettuṃ vai yo jarājanmamṛtyuhā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0064: ātmahetoś ca pāpāni kṛtānīha naraiś ca yaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0069: teṣām eva pravadatāṃ kāruṇyaṃ nāsti yantrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0072: vedanārtā hi krandanti pūrayanto diśo daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0074: teṣām ekaḥ phalaṃ bhuṅkte kaṣṭe vaivasvatakṣaye
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0075: yena naitāṃ gatiṃ gacchen na viṇmūtrāsthipicchile
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0078: yatra vāsakṛto yogaḥ kukṣau vāso vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0080: na caiṣa labhyate kāmo jātamātraṃ hi mānavam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0083: tair garbhavāsaṃ gacchati avaśo jāyate tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0084: avaśaś cehate jantur vrajaty avaśa eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0085: jarasā rūpavidhvaṃsaṃ prāpnoty avaśa eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0086: śarīrabhedam āpnoti jīryaty avaśa eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0087: evaṃ hy aniyato mṛtyur bhavaty eva sadā nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0088: garbheṣu mriyate kaś cij jāyamānas tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0090: madhyabhāve tu naśyanti sthaviro mṛta eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0091: ko janmano nodvijate svayaṃbhūr api yo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0092: kutas tv asmadvidhas tāta maraṇasya vaśānugaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0094: muhūrtam apy ahaṃ śarma na vindāmi mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0096: annair bahuvidhaiḥ puṣṭaṃ vastrair nānāvidhair vṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0104: devāpy adhiṣṭhānavaśās tasmād devaṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0105: kāmānāṃ nāsty adhiṣṭhānam akāmas tu nivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0106: lokasaṃgrahadharmās tu sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0108: kasmāt ko viṣamaṃ duḥkham āroheta vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0110: ko hy ātmānaṃ priyaṃ loke ḍolāsādharmyatāṃ nayet
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0112: asmāl lokāt paraṃ lokam apātheyam adaiśikam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0114: ye tu taṃ kila dharmajñā dharmaṃ nārāyaṇeritam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0116: tatas te na ca paśyanti prāpnuvanti paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0120: snehāpannena pītās tu mātṝṇāṃ vividhāḥ stanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0123: na kva cic ca sukhaṃ prāptaṃ na kva cic chāśvatī gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0124: sthānair mahadbhir vibhraṃśo duḥkhalabdhaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0125: dhananāśaś ca saṃprāpto labdhvā duḥkhena tad dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0126: adhvagānām iva pathi cchāyām āśritya saṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0128: viśramya ca punar yāti karmabhir darśitāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0129: etad īdṛśakaṃ dṛṣṭvā jñātvā caiva samāgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0130: ko na bibhyet kuruśreṣṭha viṣṭhānnasyeva bhojanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0131: buddhiś ca me samutpannā vaiṣṇave dharmavistare
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0132: tad eṣa śirasā pādau gato 'smi bhagavaṃs tava
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0133: śaraṇaṃ ca prapanno 'smi gantavye śaraṇe dhruve
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0135: icchāmi bhavatā trātum ebhyas tvatto mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0137: etad ādyayugodbhūtaṃ tretāyāṃ tat tirohitam bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0138: sa eva dharmam akhilam ṛṣir dvaipāyano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0139: sadṛśaṃ rājaśārdūla vṛttasya ca kulasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0140: ko rājyaṃ vipulaṃ gṛhya sphītākārapuraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0142: rājye rājyaguṇā ye ca tān vyudasya narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0145: dharmo vigrahavān dhīro viduraś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0146: saṃjayaś ca mahātejā ye cānye divyadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0149: anityaṃ duḥkhasaṃtaptaṃ jagad etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0151: anityān satataṃ paśya manuṣyādiṣu kā kathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0152: nityāṃ tu prakṛtīm āhur yāsau prasavadharmiṇī
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0154: tām atyantasukhāṃ saukhyāṃ nirvāṇam iti saṃjñitām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0155: āhur brahmarṣayo hy ādyāṃ bhuvi caiva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0157: sa yāty eva hi nirvāṇaṃ yat tat prakṛtisaṃjñitam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0158: sa eṣa prākṛto dharmo bhrājaty ādiyuge nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0161: prakṛtīnāṃ ca sarvāsām akṛtā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0162: evaṃ prakṛtidharmā hi varāṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0167: jāto mandapracāro hi dharmaḥ kaliyuge nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0168: nityas tu puruṣo jñeyo viśvarūpo nirañjanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0169: brahmādyā api devāś ca yaṃ sadā paryupāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0170: taṃ ca nārāyaṇaṃ viddhi paraṃ brahmeti śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0171: tatkarma kuru kāyena dhyāyasva manasā ca tam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0172: kīrtayasva ca tannāma vācā sarvatra bhūpate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0175: kathitaṃ te mahābāho kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0177: yat prāpya kleśaṃ nāpnoti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0182: sanakaḥ sanandanaś caiva tṛtīyaś ca sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0183: jātamātrāś ca te sarve pratibuddhā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0184: caturthaś caiva teṣāṃ sa bhagavān yogavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0186: hairaṇyagarbhaḥ sa munir vasiṣṭhaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0187: ṣaṣṭhaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa bhagavān ameyātmā triśūladhṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0190: bhṛgur marīcer anujo bhṛgor apy aṅgirās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0193: paṭhyante brahmajā hy ete vidvadbhir amitaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0194: sarvam etan mahārāja kurvann ādigurur mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0197: sanakaprabhṛtayas tatra ye ca prāptāḥ paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0199: sanatkumāras tu vibhur yogam āsthāya yogavit
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0200: trīṃl lokān acarac chaśvad aiśvaryeṇa pareṇa hi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0201: rudraś cāpy aṣṭaguṇitaṃ yogaṃ prāpto mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0203: marīcipramukhās tāta sarve sṛṣṭyartham eva te
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0204: niyuktā rājaśārdūla teṣāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0205: sapta brahmāṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0206: sarve vedeṣu caivoktāḥ khileṣu ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0209: eteṣāṃ pitaras tāta putrā ity anucakṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0211: pitṝṇāṃ caiva rājendra putrā devā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0212: devair vyāptā ime lokā ity evam anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0214: devalāc ca naraśreṣṭha kāśyapāc ca mayā śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0215: gautamād api kauṇḍinyād bhāradvājāt tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0217: pitrā ca mama rājendra śrāddhakāle prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0218: paraṃ rahasyaṃ vedāntaṃ priyaṃ hi paramātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0219: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0224: sa kadā cin mahābhāgo merupṛṣṭhaṃ samāgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0233: sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca yo veda pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0236: prabhavaṃ cāpy ayaṃ caiva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0237: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0238: kālasaṃkhyāṃ ca sargaṃ ca sraṣṭāraṃ puruṣaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0239: yaṃ viśvam upajīvanti yena sarvam idaṃ tatam sanatkumāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0240: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0241: yaṃ viśvam upajīvanti yam āhuḥ puruṣaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0242: taṃ vai śṛṇu mahābuddhe nārāyaṇam anāmayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0243: eṣa nārāyaṇo nāma yaṃ viśvam upajīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0244: eṣa sraṣṭā vidhātā ca hartā pālayitā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0246: etāvad eva vaktavyaṃ mayā nārada pṛcchate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0247: paraṃ na vedmi tat sargaṃ yāvāṃś cāyaṃ yathāpyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0250: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0251: kālasaṃkhyāṃ ca sargaṃ ca sarvam eva mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0252: tamasaḥ kurvataḥ sargaṃ tāmaso hy abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0255: tāni te saṃpravakṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0256: mahārṇavo 'rṇavaś caiva salilaṃ ca guṇās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0257: vedās tapaś ca yajñāś ca dharmāś ca bhagavān vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0258: prāṇaḥ saṃvartako 'gniś ca vyoma kālas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0264: tathaiva divasaṃ prāhur yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0266: paścād buddhvā sasarjāpas tāsu vīryam avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0268: ahaṃkṛtvā tatas tasmin sasarja prabhur īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0272: aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotiṣāṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0273: cakre tirodhāṃ bhagavān etat kṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0275: pañca kalpasahasrāṇi ahar etāvad eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0277: sṛjate ha tv ahaṃkāraṃ parameṣṭhinam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0278: ahaṃkāreṇa vai lokā vyāptāḥ sāhaṃkṛtena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0281: unmajjanti nimajjanti ūrdhvādhas tiryag eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0282: etasyāpi niśām āhus tṛtīyām atha kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0283: trīṇi kalpasahasrāṇi ahar etāvad eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0284: ahaṃkāras tu sṛjati mahābhūtāni pañca vai
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0285: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0287: śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca rase gandhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0288: guṇeṣv eteṣv abhiratāḥ paṅkalagnā iva dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0290: eteṣām iha vai sargaṃ caturtham iha kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0292: ananta iti vikhyātaḥ pañcamaḥ sarga ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0294: manaḥ sarvam idaṃ tāta viśvaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0295: na tathānyāni bhūtāni balavanti yathā manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0296: etasyāpi ha vai sargaṃ ṣaṣṭham āhur dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0297: ahaḥ kalpasahasraṃ vai rātrir etāvatī tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0298: ūrdhvasrotas tu vai sargaṃ saptamaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0299: aṣṭamaṃ cāpy adhaḥsrotas tiryak tu navamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0300: etāni nava sargāṇi tattvāni ca mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0302: sarvasya prabhavaḥ pūrvam ukto nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0304: pravakṣyāmy aparaṃ tattvaṃ yasya yasyeśvaraś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0305: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0306: yathāśrutaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ tattvato vai nibodha me sanatkumāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0307: adhaḥsrotasi sarge ca tiryaksrotasi caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0308: etābhyām īśvaraṃ vidyād ūrdhvasrotas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0310: buddhīndriyāṇām atha tu īśvaro mana ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0311: manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni saguṇāny āhur īśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0313: bhavān hi kuśalaś caiva dharmeṣv eṣu pareṣu vai
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0314: kālāgnir ahnaḥ kalpānte jagad dahati cāṃśubhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0315: tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0318: nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā caiva dagdhā kālāgninā tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0319: jagat pralīnaṃ jagati jagac cāpsu pralīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0320: naṣṭagandhā tadā sūkṣmā jalam evābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0321: tato mayūkhajālena sūryas tv āpīyate jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0325: taṃ tathā visphurantaṃ hi vāyur jarayate mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0326: mahatā balavegena ādatte taṃ hi bhānumān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0327: vāyor api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate yadā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0328: praśāmyati tato vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0329: tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śabdam ādatte vai manas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0330: sa śabdaguṇahīnātmā tiṣṭhate mūrtimāṃs tu vai
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0331: bhuṅkte ca sa tadā vyoma manas tāta digātmakam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0333: saṃkalpātmānam ādatte cittaṃ vai svena tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0334: cittaṃ grasaty ahaṃkāras tadā vai munisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0335: vinaṣṭe ca tadā citte ahaṃkāro 'bhavan mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0337: abhimāne vinaṣṭe tu mahān brahmā virājate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0338: taṃ tadā triṣu lokeṣu mūrtiṣv evāgramūrtijam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0339: yena viśvam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ nirmitaṃ vai guṇārthinā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0343: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ ca śrūyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0344c: bhūtaṃ ghrāṇam adhyātmaṃ gandho 'dhibhūtaṃ vāyur adhidaivataṃ syāt ||5||
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0344d: adhibhūtaṃ sūryo 'dhidaivataṃ syāt ||3|| āpaś caturthaṃ bhūtaṃ jihvādhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0344e: ākāśaṃ prathamaṃ bhūtaṃ śrotram adhyātmaṃ śabdo 'dhibhūtaṃ diśo 'dhidaivatam ||1||
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0344f: vāyur dvitīyaṃ bhūtaṃ tvag adhyātmaṃ sparśo 'dhibhūtaṃ vidyud
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0344g: adhidaivataṃ syāt ||2|| jyotis tṛtīyaṃ bhūtaṃ cakṣur adhyātmaṃ rūpam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0345c: agnir adhidaivataṃ syāt ||6|| mano 'dhyātmaṃ mantavyam adhibhūtaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0345e: ata ūrdhvam indriyam anuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ ||1|| pādāv adhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0345f: 'dhibhūtaṃ prajāpatir adhidaivataṃ syāt ||5|| vāg adhyātmaṃ vaktavyam adhibhūtam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0345g: kartavyam adhibhūtam indro 'dhidaivataṃ syāt ||3|| pāyur adhyātmaṃ visargo
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0345h: gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ viṣṇur adhidaivataṃ syāt ||2|| hastāv adhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0346a: stanitagarjitonmiśraṃ tadvat tatraiva praṇāśāt | evam avyakto
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0346c: cordhvam uttiṣṭhate saṃharate ca ||3|| yathā cāntarikṣād abhrakośam uttiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0346d: guṇān sṛjati saṃharate ca ||2|| yathārṇavād ūrmimālānicayaś
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0346e: krīḍārtham ||1|| yathādityo 'ṃśujālaṃ kṣipati saṃharate ca evam avyakto
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0346f: evam avyakto bhagavān sakṛt kṛtsnān kurute saṃharate ca | kasmāt |
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0347c: yathā kūrmo 'ṅgāni kāmāt prasārayate punaś ca praveśayati evam avyakto
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0347d: lokān prakāśayate praveśayate ca ||1|| evaṃ cetanaś ca bhagavān pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0347e: kriyāvān ajarāmaraḥ kṣetrajño nārāyaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ ||3|| bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0348: ity etan nāradāyoktaṃ kumāreṇa ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003_0349: etac chrutvā dvijo rājan sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0001: ātmany agnīn samādhāya ya ete kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0003: yajanty ārambhayajñaiś ca mānasaṃ yajñam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0004: agnibhyaś ca paraṃ nāsti yeṣām eṣā vyavasthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0005: teṣāṃ gatir mahāprājña kīdṛśī kiṃparāś ca te bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0006: etad icchāmi tattvena tvattaḥ śrotuṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0008: vaikuṇṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ suparṇasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0011: tatra devās tu daiteyair vadhyante bhṛśadāruṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0016: vaikuṇṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ pratipede ca taiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0017: tataḥ sa devaiḥ sahitaḥ padmayonir nareśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0028: lokāṃś ca lokapālāṃś ca ṛṣīṃś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0030: soṃkārāḥ savaṣaṭkārāḥ prāhus tvāṃ yajñam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0031: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0032: tapasvināṃ tapaś caiva daivataṃ devatāsv api
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0034: vaikuṇṭhaṃ tuṣṭuvur devāḥ sarve brahmarṣibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0036: jeṣyadhvaṃ dānavān yūyaṃ mayaiva saha saṃgare
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0037: tato devagaṇānāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca yudhyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0043: sa vijityāsurān sarvān dānavāṃś ca mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0048: idam atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ tan naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0049: devāsure 'smin saṃgrāme trātā yena vayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0050: etad vijñātum icchāmaḥ kuto 'sau kaś ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0051: ko 'yam asmān paritrāya tūṣṇīm eva yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0052: pratiprayāto divyātmā taṃ naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0053: evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair vacanaṃ vacanārthavit brahmā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0055: na hy enaṃ veda tattvena bhuvanaṃ bhuvaneśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0056: saṃkhyātuṃ naiva cātmānaṃ nirguṇaṃ guṇināṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0058: suparṇasya ca saṃvādam ṛṣīṇāṃ cāpi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0059: purā brahmarṣayaś caiva siddhāś ca bhuvaneśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0061: teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ tatra kathānte patatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0069: kautūhalaṃ vainateya paraṃ no hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0070: tasya nānyo 'sti vakteha tvām ṛte pannagāśana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0071: tad ākhyātum ihecchāmo bhavatā praśnam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0075: kiṃ mayā brūta vaktavyaṃ kāryaṃ ca vadatāṃ varāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0076: yūyaṃ hi māṃ yathāyuktaṃ sarvaṃ vai praṣṭum arhatha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0077: namaskṛtvā hy anantāya tatas te ṛṣisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0080: bhavān upāste varadaṃ kuto 'sau kaś ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0081: prakṛtir vikṛtir vāsya kīdṛśī kva nu saṃsthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0082: etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmo devo 'yaṃ kva kṛtālayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0083: eṣa bhaktapriyo devaḥ priyabhaktas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0084: tvaṃ priyaś cāsya bhaktaś ca nānyaḥ kāśyapa vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0086: anādimadhyanidhano na vidmainaṃ kuto hy asau
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0087: vedeṣv api ca viśvātmā gīyate na ca vidmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0089: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0090: guṇāś caiṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bhāvābhāvau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0091: tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva bhāvāś caiva tadātmakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0092: mano buddhiś ca tejaś ca buddhigamyāni tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0093: jāyante tāta kasmād dhi tiṣṭhate teṣv asau vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0095: tasya devasya tattvena tan naḥ śaṃsa yathātatham
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0097: evaṃ bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmas tan naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0098: sthūlato yas tu bhagavāṃs tenaiva svena hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0099: trailokyasya tu rakṣārthaṃ dṛśyate rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0100: mayā tu mahad āścaryaṃ purā dṛṣṭaṃ sanātane
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0102: na sma śakyo mayā vettuṃ na bhavadbhiḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0103: yathā māṃ prāha bhagavāṃs tathā tac chrūyatāṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0107: unmathyāśu girīṃś caiva vikṣobhya ca mahodadhim
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0108: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mama vikrāntaṃ vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0110: avṛthā te 'stu madvākyaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0111: tām evaṃvādinīṃ vācam ahaṃ pratyuktavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0112: jñātum icchāmi kas tvaṃ hi tato me dāsyase varam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0113: prakṛtir vikṛtir vā tvaṃ devo vā dānavo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0115: uvāca varadaḥ prītaḥ kāle tvaṃ mābhivetsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0116: vāhanaṃ bhava me sādho varaṃ dadmi tavottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0117: na te vīryeṇa sadṛśaḥ kaś cil loke bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0118: pataṃga patatāṃ śreṣṭha na devo nāpi dānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0120: tam abravaṃ devadevaṃ mām evaṃvādinaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0121: prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā praṇamya śirasā vibhum
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0122: evam etan mahābāho sarvam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0123: vāhanaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi yathā vadati māṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0124: mamāpi ca mahābuddhe niścayaṃ śrūyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0125: dhvajas te 'haṃ bhaviṣyāmi rathasthasya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0126: tathāstv iti sa mām uktvā bhūyaḥ prāha mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0127: na te gativighāto 'dya bhaviṣyaty amṛtaṃ vinā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0128: evaṃ kṛtvā tu samayaṃ devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0133: sarvam etad yathātathyam uktavān pitur antike
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0134: śrutvā tu bhagavān mahyaṃ dhyānam evānvapadyata
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0135: sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā mām āha vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0136: dhanyo 'sy anugṛhītaś ca yat tvaṃ tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0138: sthūladṛśyaḥ sa bhagavāṃs tena tenaiva hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0142: tato me darśayām āsa toṣayann iva putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0147: tam upāsanti paramaṃ guhyam akṣaram avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0148: samāsādya tu taṃ viśvam ahaṃ mūrdhnā praṇamya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0151: ābhāṣya putra putreti idam āha dhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0153: amuktas tvaṃ na māṃ saṅgair avimukto 'dya paśyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0154: yadā saṅgair vimuktaś ca gatamoho gataspṛhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0155: bhaviṣyasi tadā brahman mām anudhyāsyase dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0157: jñāsyase māṃ tato brahman vītamohaś ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0160: tam evārādhaya kṣipraṃ tam ārādhya na sīdasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0161: so 'ham evaṃ bhagavatā pitrā brahmarṣisattamāḥ suparṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0162: anugīto yathānyāyaṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0164: svam evālayam āsādya tam evārtham acintayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0166: govindaṃ cintayann āse śāśvataṃ param avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0170: tatas tatra hariṃ dṛṣṭvā jagataḥ prabhavaṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0177: saṃstutaḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā vrajeti śreyase rataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0179: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva bhāsayan svena tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0180: tam ahaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ vrajantam amitaujasam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0182: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim aṣṭau tathā śatam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0183: tathā śatasahasraṃ ca śataṃ dviguṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0184: sa gatvā dīrgham adhvānam apaśyam aham adbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0188: tatra śaṃbhus tapas tepe mahādevaḥ sahomayā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0189: sa tena saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā pāvakaṃ samatikramat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0193: atha dṛṣṭiḥ pratihatā mama tatra babhūva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0196: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva na vijajñe tamovṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0197: avijānann ahaṃ kiṃ cit tasmiṃs tamasi saṃvṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0200: prāñjalir manasā bhūtvā vākyam etat tadoktavān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0202: śaraṇaṃ saṃprapannaṃ māṃ trātum arhasy ariṃdama
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0203: ahaṃ tu tattvajijñāsuḥ ko 'si kasyāsi kutra vā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0204: saṃprāptaḥ padavīṃ deva sa māṃ saṃtrātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0207: mohayām āsa māṃ tatra durvibhāvyavapur vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0208: svabhāvam ātmanas tatra darśayan svayam ātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0209: śramaṃ me janayām āsa bhayaṃ cābhayadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0210: khinna ity eva māṃ matvā bhagavān avyayo 'cyutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0211: śabdenāśvāsayām āsa jagāhe ca tamo mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0212: ahaṃ tu khedānugataḥ śramāc calapadaś caran
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0214: tathā gataṃ tu māṃ jñātvā bhagavān amitadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0216: tataḥ pranaṣṭe tamasi tam ahaṃ dīptatejasam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0217: apaśyaṃ tejasā vyāptaṃ madhyāhna iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0218: svayaṃprabhāṃś ca puruṣān striyaś ca paramādbhutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0219: apaśyam aham avyagraṃ tasmin deśe sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0220: na tatra dyotate sūryo nakṣatrāṇi tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0221: na tatra candramā bhāti na vāyur vāti pāṃsulaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0222: tatra tūryāṇy anekāni gītāni madhurāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0226: agatis tatra devānām asurāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0229: yeṣāṃ na devatās tulyāḥ prabhābhir bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0230: sa ca tān apy atikramya daivatair api pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0232: jvālābhir māṃ praviṣṭaṃ ca jvalantaṃ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0234: jvālāmālinam āsādya tam agnim aham avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0236: mayā hi samareṣv agnir anekeṣu mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0237: praviṣṭaś cāpaviddhaś ca na ca māṃ dagdhavān kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0242: bhaktaś cānugataś ceti trātum arhasi māṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0243: yathā māṃ na dahed agniḥ sadyo deva tathā kuru
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0244: evaṃ vilapamānasya jñātvā me vacanaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0245: mā bhair iti vacaḥ prāha meghagambhīranisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0246: sa mām āśvāsya vacanaṃ prāhedaṃ bhagavān vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0247: mama tvaṃ viditaḥ saumya yathāvat tattvadarśane
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0248: jñāpitaś cāpi yat pitrā tac cāpi viditaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0249: vainateya mamāpy evam ahaṃ vedyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0250: mahad etat svarūpaṃ me na te vedyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0251: māṃ hi vindanti vidvāṃso ye jñāne pariniṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0253: bhavāṃs tu satataṃ bhakto manmanāḥ pakṣisattama suparṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0254: sthūlaṃ māṃ vetsyate tasmāj jagataḥ kāraṇe sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0257: sa śanair yāti bhagavān gatyā laghuparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0259: sa gatvā dīrgham adhvānam ākāśam amitadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0261: atha devaḥ samāsādya manasaḥ sadṛśaṃ javam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0264: ayaṃ bho 'ham iti prāha vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0265: śabdānusārī tu tatas taṃ deśam aham āvrajam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0267: sa tat saraḥ samāsādya bhagavān ātmavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0269: viveśa devaḥ svāṃ yoniṃ mām idaṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0270: viśasva salilaṃ saumya sukham atra vasāmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0271: tataś ca prāviśaṃ tatra saha tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0276: aniddhānām iva satām iddhānām iva bhāsvatām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0277: athāhaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ nāpaśyaṃ tatra saṃgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0278: tataḥ saṃmoham āpanno viṣādam agamaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0285: tāni cātra samṛddhāni dṛṣṭavān asmy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0289: samīpe tv adbhutatamam apaśyam aham avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0305: nāntaṃ teṣāṃ prapaśyāmi khedaś ca sahasābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0308: tasmin nu khalu vartāmi loke kiṃ caitad īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0310: na ca paśyāmi taṃ devaṃ yenāham iha coditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0313: mahāñ śabdaḥ prādurāsīt subhṛśaṃ me vyathākaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0315: apaśyaṃ ca suparṇānāṃ sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0340: acyutāya tuṣārāya vīrāya ca samāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0350: ṛce ca yajuṣe sāmne trailokyapataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0363: pāhi māṃ devadeveśa ko 'py ajo 'si sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0365: stavyaṃ stavaṃ stutavatas tat tamo me praṇaśyatu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0367: śṛṇomi ca giraṃ divyām antardhānagatāṃ śivām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0368: mā bhair garutman dānto 'si punaḥ sendrā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0369: svaṃ caiva bhavanaṃ gatvā drakṣyase putrabāndhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0375: yajatas tān ṛṣīn devān vadato dhyāyato munīn
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0376: yuktān siddhān naiṣṭhikāṃś ca japato yajato gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0379: tad adbhutam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismito 'smi tadānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0381: tad atyadbhutasaṃkāśaṃ kim etad iti cintayan
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0383: praṇipatya sudurdharṣaṃ punaḥ punar udīkṣya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0385: avocaṃ tam adīnārthaṃ śreṣṭhānāṃ śreṣṭham uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0387: yad etad adbhutaṃ deva mayā dṛṣṭaṃ tvadāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0389: yadi jānāsi māṃ bhaktaṃ yadi vānugraho mayi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0390: śaṃsa sarvam aśeṣeṇa śrotavyaṃ yadi cen mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0391: svabhāvas tava durjñeyaḥ prādurbhāvo bhavasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0393: brūhi sarvam aśeṣeṇa tad āścaryaṃ mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0394: kiṃ tad atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ teṣv agniṣu samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0395: kāni tāny agnihotrāṇi keṣāṃ śabdaḥ śruto mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0397: etan me bhagavan kṛṣṇa brūhi sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0398: gṛṇanty agnisamīpeṣu ke ca te brahmarāśayaḥ bhagavān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0399: māṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0403: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0404: mano buddhiś ca cetaś ca tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0406: matta etāni jāyante nāham ebhyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0407: sa kiṃ cic chreyasā yuktaḥ śreṣṭhabhāvaṃ vyavasyati
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0408: dharmayuktaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca so 'ham asmi nirāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0411: yat tu me paramaṃ guhyaṃ rūpaṃ sūkṣmārthadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0413: yat tu me paramaṃ guhyaṃ yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0415: matto jātāni bhūtāni mayā dhāryanty aharniśam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0416: mayy eva vilayaṃ yānti pralaye pannagāśana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0417: yo māṃ yathā vedayati tasya tasyāsmi kāśyapa
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0419: māṃ tu jñātuṃ kṛtā buddhir bhavatā pakṣisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0420: śṛṇu yo 'haṃ yataś cāhaṃ yadarthaś cāham udyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0424: ananyamanasas te māṃ sarve vai samupāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0425: yajanto japayajñair māṃ mānasaiś ca susaṃyatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0428: ya evaṃbuddhayo dhīrās te māṃ gacchanti tādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0433: yat tad viyati dṛṣṭaṃ tat saraḥ padmotpalāyutam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0438: ye mayā bhāvitātmāno mayy evābhiratāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0439: upāsate ca mām eva jyotirbhūtā nirāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0440: tair hi tatraiva vastavyaṃ nīrāgātmabhir acyutaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0443: madbhaktāḥ satataṃ te vai bhaktās tān api cāpy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0446: yathāvat tad aśeṣeṇa śrotum arhati me bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0447: ekā mūrtir nirguṇākhyā yogaṃ paramam āsthitā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0452: caturthī me mahāmūrtir jagadvṛddhiṃ dadāti sā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0453: rakṣate cāpi niyatā so 'ham asmi nabhaścara
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0454: mayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ mayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0456: yāni tāny agnihotrāṇi ye ca candrāṃśurāśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0457: gṛṇanti vedaṃ satataṃ teṣv agniṣu vihaṃgama
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0459: teṣām ahaṃ tapo dīptaṃ tejaḥ samyak samāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0460: nityaṃ te mayi vartante teṣu cāham atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0464: mattaś ca saṃprasūtān vai viddhi lokān sadaivatān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0465: mayā cāpi caturdhātmā vibhaktaḥ prāṇiṣu sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0466: ātmabhūto vāsudevo hy aniruddho matau sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0468: anyathā ca caturdhā yat samyak tvaṃ śrotum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0470: brahmaṇaś cāpi saṃbhūtaḥ śiva ity avadhāryatām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0476: yogino yogayuktāś ca te māṃ paśyanti nānyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0478: vartamānaś ca teṣv evaṃ nivṛttaś caiva teṣv aham
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0479: ye vidur jātasaṃkalpās te māṃ paśyanti tādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0480: khaṃ vāyur āpo jyotiś ca pṛthivī ceti pañcamam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0485: te na paśyanti me tattvaṃ tapasā mahatā hy api
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0486: nopavāsair na niyamair na vratair vividhair api
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0487: draṣṭuṃ vā vedituṃ vāpi na śakyā paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0491: te paśyanti svam ātmānaṃ paramātmānam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0493: teṣv eva ca samādhāya samyag eti sa mām ajam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0494: yad etat paramaṃ guhyam ākhyānaṃ paramādbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0495: yatnena tad aśeṣeṇa yathāvac chrotum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0497: te mām upāsate śaśvad yāṃs tāṃs tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0499: śakyo 'haṃ vedituṃ tais tu yan me paramam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0500: ye tu sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca jñātvāpy adhṛtaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0501: na te gacchanty akuśalāḥ parāṃ gatim anuttamām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0503: āsādayati tad brahma yatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0505: madbhaktyā ca dvijaśreṣṭhā gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0506: yad guhyaṃ paramaṃ buddher aliṅgagrahaṇaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0507: tat sūkṣmaṃ gṛhyate viprair yatibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0508: na vāyuḥ pavate tatra na tasmiñ jyotiṣāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0509: na cāpaḥ pṛthivī naiva nākāśaṃ na manogatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0511: sarvebhyaś ca sa tebhyaś ca prabhavaty amalo vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0512: sthūladarśanam etan me yad dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0513: etat sūkṣmasya ca dvāraṃ kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0514: dṛṣṭo vai bhavatā tasmāt sarasy amitavikrama
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0516: eṣa kālas tvayā tatra sarahasyam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0517: māṃ yajñam āhur yajñajñā vedaṃ vedavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0518: munayaś cāpi mām eva japayajñaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0519: vaktā mantā rasayitā ghrātā draṣṭā pradarśakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0520: boddhā bodhayitā cāhaṃ gantā śrotā cidātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0521: mām iṣṭvā svargam āyānti tathā cāpnuvate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0523: ahaṃ tejo dvijātīnāṃ mama tejo dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0524: mama yas tejasā dehaḥ so 'gnir ity eva gamyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0526: sāṃkhyānām idam evāgre mayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0527: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ caivārjavaṃ japam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0528: tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva karmajaṃ ca bhavāpyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0529: sa tadāhaṃ tathārūpas tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0530: tatas tv ahaṃ parataraḥ śakyaḥ kālena veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0531: mama yat paramaṃ guhyaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0532: tad evaṃ paramo guhyo devo nārāyaṇo hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0533: na tac chakyaṃ bhujaṃgāre vettum abhyudayānvitaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0535: gacchanti taṃ mahātmānaḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0536: sthūlo 'ham evaṃ vihaga tvayā dṛṣṭas tathānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0537: etac cāpi na vetty anyas tvām ṛte pannagāśana
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0538: mā matis tava gān nāśam eṣā gatir anuttamā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0539: madbhakto bhava nityaṃ tvaṃ tato vetsyasi me padam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0540: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rahasyaṃ divyamānuṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0541: etac chreyaḥ paraṃ caitat panthānaṃ viddhi mokṣiṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0546: etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ ṛṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0549: puṇyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0550: etat pavitraṃ devānām etad guhyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0551: etaj jñānavatāṃ jñeyam eṣā gatir anuttamā
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0552: ya imāṃ śrāvayed vidvān kathāṃ parvasu parvasu
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0553: sa lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyān devarṣibhir abhiṣṭutān
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0554: śrāddhakāle ca viprāṇāṃ ya imāṃ śrāvayec chuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0555: na tatra rakṣasāṃ bhāgo nāsurāṇāṃ ca vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0557: yaḥ paṭhet satataṃ yuktaḥ sa vrajet tat salokatām
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0558: vedān pārayate vipro rājā vijayavān bhavet bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0559: vaiśyas tu dhanadhānyāḍhyaḥ śūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0560: tatas te munayaḥ sarve saṃpūjya vinatāsutam
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0561: svān eva cāśramāñ jagmur babhūvuḥ śāntitatparāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0563: eṣā śrutir mahārāja dharmyā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0565: mayāpy eṣā kathā tāta kathitā mātur antike
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0570: dhyāyanto manasā viṣṇuṃ gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0571: tad eva paramo mokṣo mokṣadvāraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:013.006d-003A_0572: yathā viniścitātmāno gacchanti paramāṃ gatim yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001c: babhrave viśvamāyāya mahābhāgyaṃ ca tattvataḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_03: yo hi sarvagato devo na ca sarvatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_04: brahmaviṣṇusureśānāṃ sraṣṭā yaḥ prabhur eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_05: brahmādayaḥ piśācāntā yaṃ hi devā upāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_06: prakṛtīnāṃ paratvena puruṣasya ca yaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_08: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ prāhur asac ca sadasac ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_11: ko hi śakto guṇān vaktuṃ devadevasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_13: ko hi śakto bhavaṃ jñātuṃ madvidhaḥ parameśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_17: rudrabhaktyā tu kṛṣṇena jagad vyāptaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_18: taṃ prasādya tadā devaṃ badaryāṃ kila bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_19: arthāt priyataratvaṃ ca sarvalokeṣu vai tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_21: pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu taptavān eṣa mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_23: yuge yuge tu kṛṣṇena toṣito vai maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_24: bhaktyā paramayā rājan prītaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_26: tad ayaṃ dṛṣṭavān sākṣāt putrārthe harir acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_27: yasmāt parataraṃ caiva nānyaṃ paśyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_29: eṣa śakto mahābāhur vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇān vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_30: vibhūtiṃ caiva kārtsnyena satyāṃ māheśvarīṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0073_31: evam uktvā tadā bhīṣmo vāsudevaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0074_01: dhyānenātha japaiḥ kāryā svadharmam ucitā sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.001d-0074_02: deve nārāyaṇe bhaktaḥ śaṃkaraṃ sādhu pūjaya
GE07mbh_13_u:014.002a: surāsuraguro deva viṣṇo tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.002c: śivāya viśvarūpāya yan māṃ pṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.004c: ṛṣayaḥ suvratā dāntāḥ śṛṇvantu gadatas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.006a: na gatiḥ karmaṇāṃ śakyā vettum īśasya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.007c: na vidur yasya nidhanam ādiṃ vā sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.007e: sa kathaṃ naramātreṇa śakyo jñātuṃ satāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.008a: tasyāham asuraghnasya kāṃś cid bhagavato guṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:014.009a: evam uktvā tu bhagavān guṇāṃs tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.009c: upaspṛśya śucir bhūtvā kathayām āsa dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.010a: śuśrūṣadhvaṃ brāhmaṇendrās tvaṃ ca tāta yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:014.011a: yad avāptaṃ ca me pūrvaṃ sāmbahetoḥ suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.011c: yathā ca bhagavān dṛṣṭo mayā pūrvaṃ samādhinā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.012c: atīte dvādaśe varṣe jāmbavaty abravīd dhi mām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.013c: putrārthinī mām upetya vākyam āha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:014.015a: na hi te 'prāpyam astīha triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:014.015c: lokān sṛjes tvam aparān icchan yadukulodvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:014.017c: cāruśravāś cāruyaśāḥ pradyumnaḥ śaṃbhur eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.018a: yathā te janitāḥ putrā rukmiṇyāś cāruvikramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.019a: ity evaṃ codito devyā tām avocaṃ sumadhyamām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.019c: anujānīhi māṃ rājñi kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.019e: sā ca mām abravīd gaccha vijayāya śivāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.020a: brahmā śivaḥ kāśyapaś ca nadyo devā manonugāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.021a: samudrā dakṣiṇā stobhā ṛkṣāṇi pitaro grahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.022a: manvantarāṇi gāvaś ca candramāḥ savitā hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.022c: sāvitrī brahmavidyā ca ṛtavo vatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.023a: kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca nimeṣā yugaparyayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.023c: rakṣantu sarvatra gataṃ tvāṃ yādava sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_13_u:014.024a: evaṃ kṛtasvastyayanas tayāhaṃ; tām abhyanujñāya kapīndraputrīm
GE07mbh_13_u:014.024c: pituḥ samīpe narasattamasya; mātuś ca rājñaś ca tathāhukasya
GE07mbh_13_u:014.025a: tam artham āvedya yad abravīn māṃ; vidyādharendrasya sutā bhṛśārtā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.025c: tān abhyanujñāya tadātiduḥkhād; gadaṃ tathaivātibalaṃ ca rāmam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.026c: so 'vahad dhimavantaṃ māṃ prāpya cainaṃ vyasarjayam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.026d-0079_05: so 'haṃ himavataḥ pārśvaṃ prāpya tārkṣyaṃ vyasarjayam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.027c: kṣetraṃ ca tapasāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paśyāmy āśramam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.030c: bhallātakair madhūkaiś ca campakaiḥ panasais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.032d-0080_02: supuṣpaiś ca latāgulmair nirbhayaiś ca mṛgair yutam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.035a: dhārāninādair vihagapraṇādaiḥ; śubhais tathā bṛṃhitaiḥ kuñjarāṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.035c: gītais tathā kiṃnarāṇām udāraiḥ; śubhaiḥ svanaiḥ sāmagānāṃ ca vīra
GE07mbh_13_u:014.037a: vibhūṣitaṃ puṇyapavitratoyayā; sadā ca juṣṭaṃ nṛpa jahnukanyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.037c: mahātmabhir dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhair; maharṣibhir bhūṣitam agnikalpaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.038a: vāyvāhārair ambupair japyanityaiḥ; saṃprakṣālair yatibhir dhyānanityaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.038c: dhūmāśanair ūṣmapaiḥ kṣīrapaiś ca; vibhūṣitaṃ brāhmaṇendraiḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.040a: suduḥkhān niyamāṃs tāṃs tān vahataḥ sutaponvitān
GE07mbh_13_u:014.041a: supūjitaṃ devagaṇair mahātmabhiḥ; śivādibhir bhārata puṇyakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.041c: rarāja tac cāśramamaṇḍalaṃ sadā; divīva rājan ravimaṇḍalaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.042a: krīḍanti sarpair nakulā mṛgair vyāghrāś ca mitravat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.046c: yat pūjyaḥ pūjayasi no draṣṭavyo draṣṭum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.047a: tam ahaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā mṛgapakṣiṣv athāgniṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:014.047c: dharme ca śiṣyavarge ca samapṛccham anāmayam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.048a: tato māṃ bhagavān āha sāmnā paramavalgunā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.050c: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.050e: toṣayitvā śubhān kāmān prāpnuvaṃs te janārdana
GE07mbh_13_u:014.051a: tejasāṃ tapasāṃ caiva nidhiḥ sa bhagavān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:014.051e: āste devyā sahācintyo yaṃ prārthayasi śatruhan
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054a: viṣṇoś cakraṃ ca tad ghoraṃ vajram ākhaṇḍalasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054d-0085_01: yat tad bhagavatā pūrvaṃ dattaṃ cakraṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054d-0085_05: na śakyaṃ draṣṭum anyena varjayitvā pinākinam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054d-0085_06: sudarśanaṃ bhavety evaṃ bhavenoktaṃ tadā tu tat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054d-0085_07: sudarśanaṃ tadā tasya loke nāma pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054d-0085_08: taj jīrṇam abhavat tāta grahasyāṅgeṣu keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054d-0085_10: na śastrāṇi vahanty aṅge cakravajraśatāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:014.054d-0086_01: sadṛśaṃ bhavatety uktaṃ darśanena tathāstu tat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.057a: tathā putrasahasrāṇām ayutaṃ ca dadau prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.057c: kuśadvīpaṃ ca sa dadau rājyena bhagavān ajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.058a: tathā śatamukho nāma dhātrā sṛṣṭo mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.058e: taṃ prāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ karomīti śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.059a: taṃ vai śatamukhaḥ prāha yogo bhavatu me 'dbhutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.059c: balaṃ ca daivataśreṣṭha śāśvataṃ saṃprayaccha me
GE07mbh_13_u:014.059d-0087_01: tatheti bhagavān āha tasya tad vacanaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.060a: svāyaṃbhuvaḥ kratuś cāpi putrārtham abhavat purā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.061c: yogeśvaraṃ devagītaṃ vettha kṛṣṇa na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.061d-0088_02: ārādhya sa mahādevaṃ prāptavāñ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.061d-0088_04: so 'pi śaṃkaram ārādhya prāptavān atulaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.062c: taiḥ kruddhair bhagavān rudras tapasā toṣito hy abhūt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.063a: tāṃś cāpi daivataśreṣṭhaḥ prāha prīto jagatpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.063d-0089_01: atrer bhāryā sutaṃ dattaṃ somaṃ durvāsasaṃ prabhoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.064a: mahādevasya roṣāc ca āpo naṣṭāḥ purābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:014.064c: tāś ca saptakapālena devair anyāḥ pravartitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.064d-0090_01: tataḥ pānīyam abhavat prasanne tryambake bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.065c: nāhaṃ tasya muner bhūyo vaśagā syāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:014.065e: ity uktvā sā mahādevam agacchac charaṇaṃ kila
GE07mbh_13_u:014.066a: nirāhārā bhayād atres trīṇi varṣaśatāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:014.066c: aśeta musaleṣv eva prasādārthaṃ bhavasya sā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.067a: tām abravīd dhasan devo bhavitā vai sutas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.067b-0091_01: vinā bhartrā carudreṇa bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.067c: vaṃśe tavaiva nāmnā tu khyātiṃ yāsyati cepsitām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.068a: śākalyaḥ saṃśitātmā vai nava varṣaśatāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:014.069a: taṃ cāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭo granthakāro bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.069c: vatsākṣayā ca te kīrtis trailokye vai bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:014.069e: akṣayaṃ ca kulaṃ te 'stu maharṣibhir alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.070a: sāvarṇiś cāpi vikhyāta ṛṣir āsīt kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_13_u:014.070c: iha tena tapas taptaṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣaśatāny atha
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071a: tam āha bhagavān rudraḥ sākṣāt tuṣṭo 'smi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071d-0094_01: śakreṇa tu purā devo vārāṇasyāṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071d-0094_04: nāradena tu bhaktyāsau bhava ārādhitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071d-0094_05: tasya prīto mahādevo jagau devagurur guruḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071d-0094_06: tejasā tapasā kīrtyā tvatsamo na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071d-0094_07: gītenaiva ca divyena nityaṃ mām anuyāsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071d-0095_01: śākalyo granthakartā ca sāvarṇiś ca tathābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.071d-0095_03: lavaṇo 'vadhyatām anyair daśāsyaś ca punar balam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.072a: mayāpi ca yathā dṛṣṭo devadevaḥ purā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.072c: sākṣāt paśupatis tāta tac cāpi śṛṇu mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.073a: yadarthaṃ ca mahādevaḥ prayatena mayā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.073c: ārādhito mahātejās tac cāpi śṛṇu vistaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.074a: yad avāptaṃ ca me pūrvaṃ devadevān maheśvarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.075a: purā kṛtayuge tāta ṛṣir āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.075e: tasyāham abhavaṃ putro dhaumyaś cāpi mamānujaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.076a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya dhaumyena saha mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.077a: tatrāpi ca mayā dṛṣṭā duhyamānā payasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:014.077c: lakṣitaṃ ca mayā kṣīraṃ svāduto hy amṛtopamam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.077d-0097_02: dīyatāṃ dīyatāṃ kṣīraṃ mama mātar itīritam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.078a: tataḥ piṣṭaṃ samāloḍya toyena saha mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.078c: āvayoḥ kṣīram ity eva pānārtham upanīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.079a: atha gavyaṃ payas tāta kadā cit prāśitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.079b-0098_01: pitrāhaṃ yajñakāle hi nīto jñātikulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.079b-0098_02: tatra sā kṣarate devī divyā gauḥ suranandinī
GE07mbh_13_u:014.079b-0098_03: tasyāhaṃ tat payaḥ pītvā rasena hy amṛtopamam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.079b-0098_04: jñātvā kṣīraguṇāṃś caiva upalabhya hi saṃbhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.079c: tataḥ piṣṭarasaṃ tāta na me prītim udāvahat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.080a: tato 'ham abruvaṃ bālyāj jananīm ātmanas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.080d-0099_01: nedaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ mātar yat tvaṃ me dattavaty asi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.080d-0100_01: abhāvāc caiva dugdhasya duḥkhitā jananī tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.082d-0101_07: tapasā japyanityānāṃ śivo naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.083c: kutaḥ kṣīrodanaṃ vatsa sukhāni vasanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084a: taṃ prapadya sadā vatsa sarvabhāvena śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084c: tatprasādāc ca kāmebhyaḥ phalaṃ prāpsyasi putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0001: jananyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā tadāprabhṛti śatruhan
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0002: prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā idam ambām acodayam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0003: ko 'yam amba mahādevaḥ sa kathaṃ ca prasīdati
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0004: kutra vā vasate devo draṣṭavyo vā kathaṃ ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0005: tuṣyate vā kathaṃ śarvo rūpaṃ vā tasya kīdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0006: kathaṃ jñeyaḥ prasanno vā darśayej jananī mama
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0007: evam uktā tadā kṛṣṇa mātā me sutavatsalā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0009: pramārjantī ca gātrāṇi mama vai madhusūdana ambā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0010: dhairyam ālambya jananī idam āha surottama
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0012: durādhṛṣyaś ca durgrāhyo durdṛśyo hy akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0014: sthānāni ca vicitrāṇi prasādāś cāpy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0015: ko hi tattvena tad veda īśasya caritaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0016: kṛtavān yāni rūpāṇi devadevaḥ purā kila
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0017: krīḍate ca yathā śarvaḥ prasīdati yathā ca vai
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0023: tāni te kīrtayiṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0025: viśveṣām api devānāṃ vapur dhārayate bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0031: vapur dhārayate devo bhūyaś ca bilavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0036: karoti vā sa rūpāṇi dhārayaty api parvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0039: aṇḍajānāṃ ca divyānāṃ vapur dhārayate bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0040: daṇḍī chatrī ca kuṇḍī ca dvijānāṃ dhāraṇas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0050: yo hi yaṃ kāmayet kāmaṃ yasminn arthe 'rcyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0051: tat sarvaṃ vetti deveśas taṃ prapadya yadīcchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0052: nandate kupyate cāpi tathā huṃkārayaty api
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0057: vādayaty api vādyāni vicitrāṇi gaṇair vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0058: valgate jṛmbhate caiva rudate rodayaty api
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0060: atīva hasate raudras trāsayan nayanair janam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0061: jāgarti caiva svapiti jṛmbhate ca yathāsukham
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0062: japate japyate caiva tapate tapyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0065: dṛśyate dṛśyate cāpi bālo vṛddho yuvā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0068: gauraḥ śyāmas tathā kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍuro dhūmalohitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0072: hṛdi prāṇo mano jīvo yogātmā yogasaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0073: dhyānaṃ tat paramātmā ca bhāvagrāhyo maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.084d-004_0077: bhaja putra mahādevaṃ tataḥ prāpsyasi cepsitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.085a: jananyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā tadāprabhṛti śatruhan
GE07mbh_13_u:014.086a: tato 'haṃ tapa āsthāya toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.087f-0104_01: evaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu divyam ārādhito mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.088b-0105_01: ekabhakta iti jñātvā jijñāsāṃ kurute tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.088c: śakrarūpaṃ sa kṛtvā tu sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.092a: tato mām āha devendraḥ prītas te 'haṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:014.092c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva mattas tvaṃ yat te manasi vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.093a: śakrasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā nāhaṃ prītamanābhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.093c: abruvaṃ ca tadā kṛṣṇa devarājam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.093d-0106_01: ahaṃ tam abruvaṃ tāta devendraṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:014.094a: nāhaṃ tvatto varaṃ kāṅkṣe nānyasmād api daivatāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.094c: mahādevād ṛte saumya satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:014.094d-0107_01: satyaṃ satyaṃ hi naḥ śakra vākyam etat suniścitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.094d-0107_02: na yan maheśvaraṃ muktvā kathānyā mama rocate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.094d-0108_01: satyaṃ kauśika saṃsārān mā mamāstu vinirvṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.094d-0108_02: adya maheśvarabaddhā kathā mamānyā priyā śrotum
GE07mbh_13_u:014.095a: paśupativacanād bhavāmi sadyaḥ; kṛmir atha vā tarur apy anekaśākhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.095d-0109_03: vāyvambubhujo 'pi sato narasya duḥkhakṣayaḥ kutas tasya
GE07mbh_13_u:014.095d-0109_04: bhavati hi surāsuragurau yasya na viśveśvare bhaktiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.095d-0109_06: yeṣāṃ na kṣaṇam api rucito haracaraṇasmaraṇavicchedaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.095d-0109_09: divasaṃ divasārdhaṃ vā muhūrtaṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ lavam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.095d-0109_10: na hy alabdhaprasādasya bhaktir bhavati śaṃkare
GE07mbh_13_u:014.096a: api kīṭaḥ pataṃgo vā bhaveyaṃ śaṃkarājñayā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.096c: na tu śakra tvayā dattaṃ trailokyam api kāmaye
GE07mbh_13_u:014.096d-0110_01: śvāpi maheśvaravacanād bhavāmi sa hi naḥ paraḥ kāmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.097a: yāvac chaśāṅkaśakalāmalabaddhamaulir; na prīyate paśupatir bhagavān mameśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.098c: ajaram amaram aprasādya rudraṃ; jagati pumān iha ko labheta śāntim
GE07mbh_13_u:014.098d-0111_01: yadi nāma janma bhūyo bhavati madīyaiḥ punar doṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.098d-0111_02: tasmiṃs tasmiñ janmani bhave bhaven me 'kṣayā bhaktiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.098d-0112_01: dhik teṣāṃ dhik teṣāṃ punar api dhig astu dhik teṣām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.098d-0112_02: yeṣāṃ na vasati hṛdaye kupathagativimokṣako rudraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099a: kaḥ punas tava hetur vai īśe kāraṇakāraṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099c: yena devād ṛte 'nyasmāt prasādaṃ nābhikāṅkṣasi upamanyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0001: sad asad vyaktam avyaktaṃ yam āhur brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0002: nityam ekam anekaṃ ca varaṃ tasmād vṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0004: ātmānaṃ paramaṃ yasmād varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0007: tamasaḥ paramaṃ jyotis tapas tadvṛttināṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0008: yaṃ jñātvā nānuśocanti varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0012: yam upāsanti tattvajñā varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0015: yaḥ pūrvam asṛjad devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokabhāvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0016: aṇḍam ākāśam āpūrya varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0017: agnir āpo 'nilaḥ pṛthvī khaṃ buddhiś ca mano mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0018: sraṣṭā caiṣāṃ bhaved yo 'nyo brūhi kaḥ parameśvarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0020: brūhi caiṣāṃ bhavec chakra ko 'nyo 'sti paramaḥ śivāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0022: ārādhya sa tu deveśam aśnute mahatīṃ śriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0024: vidyate vai mahādevād brūhi kaḥ parameśvarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0026: ko 'nyaḥ śaknoti deveśād ṛte saṃpādituṃ sutān
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0028: viddhi tv ete mahādevād brūhi kaḥ parameśvarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0031: kiṃ cātra bahubhiḥ sūktair hetuvādaiḥ puraṃdara
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0033: pūjitaṃ siddhagandharvair devaiś ca ṛṣibhis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0038: dvīpasthāneṣu meroś ca vibhaveṣv antareṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0040: yadi devāḥ surāḥ śakra paśyanty anyāṃ bhavākṛtim
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0041: kiṃ na gacchanti śaraṇaṃ marditāś cāsuraiḥ surāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0047: surāsuraguror vaktre kasya retaḥ purā hutam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0048: kasya vānyasya retas tad yena haimo giriḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0049: digvāsāḥ kīrtyate ko 'nyo loke kaś cordhvaretasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0050: kasya cārdhe sthitā kāntā anaṅgaḥ kena nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0051: brūhīndra paramaṃ sthānaṃ kasya devaiḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0052: śmaśāne kasya krīḍārthaṃ nṛtye vā ko 'bhibhāṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0053: kasyaiśvaryaṃ samānaṃ vā bhūtaiḥ ko vāpi krīḍate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0055: ghuṣyate hy acalaṃ sthānaṃ kasya trailokyapūjitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0056: varṣate tapate ko 'nyo jvalate tejasā ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0057: kasmād oṣadhisaṃpattiḥ ko vā dhārayate vasu
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0058: prakāmaṃ krīḍate ko vā trailokye sacarācare
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0062: nityaṃ karmaphalair hīnaṃ tam ahaṃ kāraṇaṃ vade
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0068: dharmādharmau yataḥ śakra tam ahaṃ kāraṇaṃ vade
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0069: pratyakṣam iha devendra paśya liṅgaṃ bhagāṅkitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0072: nāsti ceśāt paraṃ śakra taṃ prapadya yadīcchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0073: pratyakṣaṃ nanu te sureśa viditaṃ saṃyogaliṅgodbhavaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.099d-005_0078: kāmārthī varayāmi saṃyatamanā mokṣāya śarvaṃ śivam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.100a: hetubhir vā kim anyais te īśaḥ kāraṇakāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.100c: na śuśruma yad anyasya liṅgam abhyarcyate suraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.101a: kasyānyasya suraiḥ sarvair liṅgaṃ muktvā maheśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.101c: arcyate 'rcitapūrvaṃ vā brūhi yady asti te śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102a: yasya brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca tvaṃ cāpi saha daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102c: arcayadhvaṃ sadā liṅgaṃ tasmāc chreṣṭhatamo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102d-0113_01: na padmāṅkā na cakrāṅkā na vajrāṅkā yataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102d-0113_02: liṅgāṅkā ca bhagāṅkā ca tasmān māheśvarī prajā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102d-0113_05: yo 'nyat kāraṇam īśvarāt pravadate devyā ca yan nāṅkitaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102d-0113_06: trailokye sacarācare sa tu pumān bāhyo bhaved durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102d-0113_07: puṃliṅgaṃ sarvam īśānaṃ strīliṅgaṃ viddhi cāpy umām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.102d-0113_08: dvābhyāṃ tanubhyāṃ vyāptaṃ hi carācaram idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.103a: tasmād varam ahaṃ kāṅkṣe nidhanaṃ vāpi kauśika
GE07mbh_13_u:014.103c: gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā śakra yatheṣṭaṃ balasūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:014.104a: kāmam eṣa varo me 'stu śāpo vāpi maheśvarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.104c: na cānyāṃ devatāṃ kāṅkṣe sarvakāmaphalāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:014.105a: evam uktvā tu devendraṃ duḥkhād ākulitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.105c: na prasīdati me rudraḥ kim etad iti cintayan
GE07mbh_13_u:014.109a: kakudaṃ tasya cābhāti skandham āpūrya viṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.110a: tam āsthitaś ca bhagavān devadevaḥ sahomayā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.111c: sahasram iva sūryāṇāṃ sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:014.113a: tejasā tu tadā vyāpte durnirīkṣye samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.113c: punar udvignahṛdayaḥ kim etad iti cintayam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.114a: muhūrtam iva tat tejo vyāpya sarvā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:014.118a: gāyadbhir nṛtyamānaiś ca utpatadbhir itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.119c: tribhir netraiḥ kṛtoddyotaṃ tribhiḥ sūryair ivoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.120a: aśobhata ca devasya mālā gātre sitaprabhe
GE07mbh_13_u:014.122c: pinākam iti vikhyātaṃ sa ca vai pannago mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:014.124b-0118_03: yena ca tripuraṃ dagdhaṃ sarvadevamayaḥ śaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.124b-0118_04: śūlaṃ ca yauvanopetaṃ lavaṇasya kare sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.124c: yat tad astraṃ mahāghoraṃ divyaṃ pāśupataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:014.127a: brāhmān nārāyaṇād aindrād āgneyād api vāruṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:014.128a: yena tat tripuraṃ dagdhvā kṣaṇād bhasmīkṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.128d-0120_01: śūlaṃ ca yauvanāśvaghnaṃ lavaṇasya kare sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.128d-0120_02: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahādevaṃ jānubhyām avanīṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.130c: tad ahaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tāta āścaryādbhutam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.131a: guhyam astraṃ paraṃ cāpi tattulyādhikam eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.131c: yat tac chūlam iti khyātaṃ sarvalokeṣu śūlinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.132a: dārayed yan mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ śoṣayed vā mahodadhim
GE07mbh_13_u:014.132c: saṃhared vā jagat kṛtsnaṃ visṛṣṭaṃ śūlapāṇinā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.133a: yauvanāśvo hato yena māṃdhātā sabalaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.135c: triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā tarjamānam iva sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.136e: dṛṣṭavān asmi govinda tad astraṃ rudrasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_13_u:014.137a: paraśus tīkṣṇadhāraś ca datto rāmasya yaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.137b-0121_01: paramaṃ tīkṣṇasāreṇa śastraṃ tasyāpi yat purā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.143a: skando mayūram āsthāya sthito devyāḥ samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.143c: śaktiṃ kaṇṭhe samādāya dvitīya iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.144a: purastāc caiva devasya nandiṃ paśyāmy avasthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.144c: śūlaṃ viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhantaṃ dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.145c: śakrādyā devatāś caiva sarva eva samabhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.146c: astuvan vividhaiḥ stotrair mahādevaṃ surās tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.147a: brahmā bhavaṃ tadā stunvan rathantaram udīrayan
GE07mbh_13_u:014.147c: jyeṣṭhasāmnā ca deveśaṃ jagau nārāyaṇas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.147e: gṛṇañ śakraḥ paraṃ brahma śatarudrīyam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.148a: brahmā nārāyaṇaś caiva devarājaś ca kauśikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.149a: teṣāṃ madhyagato devo rarāja bhagavāñ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.149d-0124_01: ayutāni ca candrārkān apaśyaṃ divi keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.153d-006_0007: namaḥ pavanavegāya namo devāya vai namaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.153d-006_0050: namo bhavāya śarvāya viśvarūpāya vai namaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.153d-006_0052: namo viśvāya māyāya cintyācintyāya vai namaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.154c: ātmā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ sāṃkhye puruṣa ucyase
GE07mbh_13_u:014.155a: ṛṣabhas tvaṃ pavitrāṇāṃ yogināṃ niṣkalaḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.156c: vasiṣṭhas tvam ṛṣīṇāṃ ca grahāṇāṃ sūrya ucyase
GE07mbh_13_u:014.157a: āraṇyānāṃ paśūnāṃ ca siṃhas tvaṃ parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.158a: ādityānāṃ bhavān viṣṇur vasūnāṃ caiva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.158c: pakṣiṇāṃ vainateyaś ca ananto bhujageṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.159c: sanatkumāro yogīnāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ kapilo hy asi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.160a: śakro 'si marutāṃ deva pitṝṇāṃ dharmarāḍ asi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.160c: brahmalokaś ca lokānāṃ gatīnāṃ mokṣa ucyase
GE07mbh_13_u:014.161a: kṣīrodaḥ sāgarāṇāṃ ca śailānāṃ himavān giriḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.161c: varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇaś cāsi viprāṇāṃ dīkṣito dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.161e: ādis tvam asi lokānāṃ saṃhartā kāla eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.162a: yac cānyad api lokeṣu sattvaṃ tejodhikaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.162c: tat sarvaṃ bhagavān eva iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.163a: namas te bhagavan deva namas te bhaktavatsala
GE07mbh_13_u:014.163c: yogeśvara namas te 'stu namas te viśvasaṃbhava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.164a: prasīda mama bhaktasya dīnasya kṛpaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:014.165c: madbhakta iti deveśa tat sarvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.166c: tena nārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ pādyaṃ cāpi sureśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:014.167a: evaṃ stutvāham īśānaṃ pādyam arghyaṃ ca bhaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.168c: puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ śubhā tāta papāta mama mūrdhani
GE07mbh_13_u:014.169a: dundubhiś ca tato divyas tāḍito devakiṃkaraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.169c: vavau ca mārutaḥ puṇyaḥ śucigandhaḥ sukhāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.170c: abravīt tridaśāṃs tatra harṣayann iva māṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.171c: mayi bhaktiṃ parāṃ divyām ekabhāvād avasthitām
GE07mbh_13_u:014.172a: evam uktās tataḥ kṛṣṇa surās te śūlapāṇinā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.174a: evam uktas tataḥ śarvaḥ surair brahmādibhis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.174c: āha māṃ bhagavān īśaḥ prahasann iva śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.175c: dṛḍhabhakto 'si viprarṣe mayā jijñāsito hy asi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.176a: anayā caiva bhaktyā te atyarthaṃ prītimān aham
GE07mbh_13_u:014.176c: tasmāt sarvān dadāmy adya kāmāṃs tava yathepśitān
GE07mbh_13_u:014.177a: evam uktasya caivātha mahādevena me vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:014.177c: harṣād aśrūṇy avartanta lomaharṣaś ca jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:014.178a: abruvaṃ ca tadā devaṃ harṣagadgadayā girā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.178c: jānubhyām avaniṃ gatvā praṇamya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.179a: adya jāto hy ahaṃ deva adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.179c: yan me sākṣān mahādevaḥ prasannas tiṣṭhate 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.180a: yaṃ na paśyanti cārādhya devā hy amitavikramam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.180c: tam ahaṃ dṛṣṭavān devaṃ ko 'nyo dhanyataro mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.181a: evaṃ dhyāyanti vidvāṃsaḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.181c: ṣaḍviṃśakam iti khyātaṃ yat parātparam akṣaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.182a: sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvatattvādir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.183e: yugānte caiva saṃprāpte rudram aṅgāt sṛjat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.184a: sa rudraḥ saṃharan kṛtsnaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.185a: eṣa devo mahādevo jagat sṛṣṭvā carācaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.185c: kalpānte caiva sarveṣāṃ smṛtim ākṣipya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:014.186d-0127_01: abravaṃ tam ahaṃ bhūyaḥ praṇamya śirasā bhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.187a: yadi deyo varo mahyaṃ yadi tuṣṭaś ca me prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.187b-0128_01: tatas tv aham anujñāta uktavān asmi śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:014.187b-0129_01: taṃ tvāṃ praṇamya śirasā prasādya prārthaye prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:014.187c: bhaktir bhavatu me nityaṃ śāśvatī tvayi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:014.188a: atītānāgataṃ caiva vartamānaṃ ca yad vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:014.188c: jānīyām iti me buddhis tvatprasādāt surottama
GE07mbh_13_u:014.189a: kṣīrodanaṃ ca bhuñjīyām akṣayaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.189c: āśrame ca sadā mahyaṃ sāṃnidhyaṃ param astu te
GE07mbh_13_u:014.190a: evam uktaḥ sa māṃ prāha bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.192c: kṣīrodaḥ sāgaraś caiva yatra yatrecchase mune
GE07mbh_13_u:014.193a: tatra te bhavitā kāmaṃ sāṃnidhyaṃ payaso nidheḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.193b-0132_01: tatra tatraiva sāṃnidhyaṃ kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:014.193c: kṣīrodanaṃ ca bhuṅkṣva tvam amṛtena samanvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.194a: bandhubhiḥ sahitaḥ kalpaṃ tato mām upayāsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.194b-0133_01: akṣayā bāndhavāś caiva kulaṃ gotraṃ ca te sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.194b-0133_02: bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha mayi bhaktiś ca śāśvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:014.195a: tiṣṭha vatsa yathākāmaṃ notkaṇṭhāṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:014.195c: smṛtaḥ smṛtaś ca te vipra sadā dāsyāmi darśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.195d-0134_01: smṛtas tvayā punar vipra kariṣyāmi ca darśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:014.197a: evaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā kṛṣṇa devadevaḥ samādhinā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.197c: tad avāptaṃ ca me sarvaṃ yad uktaṃ tena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_13_u:014.198a: pratyakṣaṃ caiva te kṛṣṇa paśya siddhān vyavasthitān
GE07mbh_13_u:014.199f-0136_01: evam etan mahādevāl labdhavān asmi keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:014.199f-0137_01: prasādād devadevasya īśvarasya mahātmanaḥ vāsudeva uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.000-0138_01: etac chrutvā vacas tasya pratyakṣam iva darśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:015.000-0138_02: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā abruvaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
GE07mbh_13_u:015.000-0138_03: dhanyas tvam asi viprendra kas tvad anyo 'sti puṇyakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:015.000-0138_05: api tāvan mamāpy evaṃ dadyāt sa bhagavāñ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.000-0138_06: darśanaṃ muniśārdūla prasādaṃ cāpi śaṃkaraḥ upamanyur uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.001-0139_05: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau varāṃś cāpi prāpsyasi tvaṃ maheśvarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:015.001-0139_06: sapatnīkād yaduśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:015.001-0139_08: viditaṃ me mahābāho prasādāt tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.001c: kasmāt prasādaṃ bhagavān na kuryāt tava mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:015.002e: japyaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi yena drakṣyasi śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:015.003a: abruvaṃ tam ahaṃ brahmaṃs tvatprasādān mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:015.003d-0140_02: dināny aṣṭau tato jagmur muhūrtam iva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:015.004c: daṇḍī muṇḍī kuśī cīrī ghṛtākto mekhalī tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.005c: tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ cānilāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.008a: tam āsthitaś ca bhagavān devyā saha mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.008c: tapasā tejasā kāntyā dīptayā saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.009a: rarāja bhagavāṃs tatra devyā saha maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.009c: somena sahitaḥ sūryo yathā meghasthitas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.011a: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ; vyāghrājinaṃ jaṭilaṃ daṇḍapāṇim
GE07mbh_13_u:015.012c: candraṃ yathā pariviṣṭaṃ sasaṃdhyaṃ; varṣātyaye tadvad apaśyam enam
GE07mbh_13_u:015.014b-0142_01: ekādaśā gatāś caiva rudrāś cainaṃ sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_13_u:015.017c: brahmarṣayaś ca sasutās tathā devarṣayaś ca vai
GE07mbh_13_u:015.018a: pṛthivī cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi grahās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.019a: muhūrtāś ca nimeṣāś ca tathaiva yugaparyayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.019c: divyā rājan namasyanti vidyāḥ sarvā diśas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.020a: sanatkumāro vedāś ca itihāsās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.020c: marīcir aṅgirā atriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.021c: bhṛgur dakṣaḥ kaśyapaś ca vasiṣṭhaḥ kāśya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.022a: chandāṃsi dīkṣā yajñāś ca dakṣiṇāḥ pāvako haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.023a: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sarve saritaḥ pannagā nagāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.024a: sahasrāṇi munīnāṃ ca ayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.024c: namasyanti prabhuṃ śāntaṃ parvatāḥ sāgarā diśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.024d-0143_01: vṛkṣauṣadhyaś ca rājendra dhātavo vividhās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.025e: vidyādharā dānavāś ca guhyakā rākṣasās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.026a: sarvāṇi caiva bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.027a: purastād viṣṭhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mameśānaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:015.028a: īkṣituṃ ca mahādevaṃ na me śaktir abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.028c: tato mām abravīd devaḥ paśya kṛṣṇa vadasva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.028d-0144_01: tvayā hy ārādhitaś cāhaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.028d-0144_02: tvatsamo nāsti me kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vai priyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.029a: śirasā vandite deve devī prītā umābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:015.029c: tato 'ham astuvaṃ sthāṇuṃ stutaṃ brahmādibhiḥ suraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.029d-0146_06: īkṣituṃ ca mahādevaṃ na me śaktir abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.029d-0146_08: dṛṣṭvā devaṃ tathā devīm astuvaṃ saṃstutaṃ suraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.030a: namo 'stu te śāśvata sarvayone; brahmādhipaṃ tvām ṛṣayo vadanti
GE07mbh_13_u:015.030c: tapaś ca sattvaṃ ca rajas tamaś ca; tvām eva satyaṃ ca vadanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.031a: tvaṃ vai brahmā ca rudraś ca varuṇo 'gnir manur bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.031c: dhātā tvaṣṭā vidhātā ca tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.032a: tvatto jātāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:015.032c: tvam ādiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃhāraś ca tvam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:015.032d-0147_01: tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
GE07mbh_13_u:015.033a: ye cendriyārthāś ca manaś ca kṛtsnaṃ; ye vāyavaḥ sapta tathaiva cāgniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.033c: ye vā divisthā devatāś cāpi puṃsāṃ; tasmāt paraṃ tvām ṛṣayo vadanti
GE07mbh_13_u:015.034a: vedā yajñāś ca somaś ca dakṣiṇā pāvako haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.034c: yajñopagaṃ ca yat kiṃ cid bhagavāṃs tad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:015.035a: iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca vratāni niyamāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:015.035c: hrīḥ kīrtiḥ śrīr dyutis tuṣṭiḥ siddhiś caiva tvadarpaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:015.036a: kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lobho madaḥ stambho 'tha matsaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.036c: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva bhagavaṃs tanayās tava
