GE07mbh_13_u:015.037c: manasaḥ paramā yoniḥ svabhāvaś cāpi śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.038a: ādir guṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhavān vai jīvanāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.038c: mahān ātmā matir brahmā viśvaḥ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.039a: buddhiḥ prajñopalabdhiś ca saṃvit khyātir dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.040a: tvāṃ buddhvā brāhmaṇo vidvān na pramohaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:015.042a: phalaṃ tvam asi tigmāṃśo nimeṣādiṣu karmasu
GE07mbh_13_u:015.042c: tvaṃ vai prabhārciḥ puruṣaḥ sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.042e: aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.043a: tvayi buddhir matir lokāḥ prapannāḥ saṃśritāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:015.044a: yas tvāṃ dhruvaṃ vedayate guhāśayaṃ; prabhuṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ viśvarūpam
GE07mbh_13_u:015.044c: hiraṇmayaṃ buddhimatāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ; sa buddhimān buddhim atītya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:015.045a: viditvā sapta sūkṣmāṇi ṣaḍaṅgaṃ tvāṃ ca mūrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.046a: evam ukte mayā pārtha bhave cārtivināśane
GE07mbh_13_u:015.047a: saviprasaṃghāś ca surāsurāś ca; nāgāḥ piśācāḥ pitaro vayāṃsi
GE07mbh_13_u:015.047c: rakṣogaṇā bhūtagaṇāś ca sarve; maharṣayaś caiva tathā praṇemuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.048a: mama mūrdhni ca divyānāṃ kusumānāṃ sugandhinām
GE07mbh_13_u:015.048c: rāśayo nipatanti sma vāyuś ca susukho vavau
GE07mbh_13_u:015.049a: nirīkṣya bhagavān devīm umāṃ māṃ ca jagaddhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.049c: śatakratuṃ cābhivīkṣya svayaṃ mām āha śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:015.050a: vidmaḥ kṛṣṇa parāṃ bhaktim asmāsu tava śatruhan
GE07mbh_13_u:015.050c: kriyatām ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ prītir hi paramā tvayi
GE07mbh_13_u:015.051a: vṛṇīṣvāṣṭau varān kṛṣṇa dātāsmi tava sattama
GE07mbh_13_u:016.001b-0149_01: mūrdhnā praṇamya tu bhavaṃ devam īśānam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.002a: dharme dṛḍhatvaṃ yudhi śatrughātaṃ; yaśas tathāgryaṃ paramaṃ balaṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.002c: yogapriyatvaṃ tava saṃnikarṣaṃ; vṛṇe sutānāṃ ca śataṃ śatāni
GE07mbh_13_u:016.003a: evam astv iti tad vākyaṃ mayoktaḥ prāha śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.004a: tato māṃ jagato mātā dharaṇī sarvapāvanī
GE07mbh_13_u:016.005a: datto bhagavatā putraḥ sāmbo nāma tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:016.005c: matto 'py aṣṭau varān iṣṭān gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dadāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:016.005e: praṇamya śirasā sā ca mayoktā pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:016.006a: dvijeṣv akopaṃ pitṛtaḥ prasādaṃ; śataṃ sutānām upabhogaṃ paraṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.006c: kule prītiṃ mātṛtaś ca prasādaṃ; śamaprāptiṃ pravṛṇe cāpi dākṣyam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.007a: evaṃ bhaviṣyaty amaraprabhāva; nāhaṃ mṛṣā jātu vade kadā
GE07mbh_13_u:016.007c: bhāryāsahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśaiva; tāsu priyatvaṃ ca tathākṣayatvam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.008a: prītiṃ cāgryāṃ bāndhavānāṃ sakāśād; dadāmi te vapuṣaḥ kāmyatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.008c: bhokṣyante vai saptatir vai śatāni; gṛhe tubhyam atithīnāṃ ca nityam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.009a: evaṃ dattvā varān devo mama devī ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:016.011a: namaskṛtvā tu sa prāha devadevāya suvrata
GE07mbh_13_u:016.011c: nāsti śarvasamo dāne nāsti śarvasamo raṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:016.011e: nāsti śarvasamo devo nāsti śarvasamā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.012a: ṛṣir āsīt kṛte tāta taṇḍir ity eva viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013a: sa dṛṣṭavān mahādevam astauṣīc ca stavair vibhum
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_03: yaṃ paṭhanti sadā sāṃkhyāś cintayanti ca yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_05: utpattau ca vināśe ca kāraṇaṃ yaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_06: devāsuramunīnāṃ ca paraṃ yasmān na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_07: ajaṃ tam aham īśānam anādinidhanaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_09: evaṃ bruvann eva tadā dadarśa tapasāṃ nidhim
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_10: tam avyayam anaupamyam acintyaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_16: yoniṃ viśvasya jagatas tamasaḥ parataḥ param
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_17: paraṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ parebhyaḥ parataḥ param
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_18: yaḥ prāṇavantam ātmānaṃ jyotir jīvasthitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_19: taṃ devaṃ darśanākāṅkṣī bahūn varṣagaṇān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013b-0151_20: tapasy ugre sthito bhūtvā dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva ceśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013c: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitras tvaṃ gatir gatimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:016.013e: atyugraṃ tejasāṃ tejas tapasāṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ viśvāvasuhiraṇyākṣapuruhūtanamaskṛta
GE07mbh_13_u:016.016c: na vidus tvāṃ tu tattvena kuto vetsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.017a: tvattaḥ pravartate kālas tvayi kālaś ca līyate
GE07mbh_13_u:016.017c: kālākhyaḥ puruṣākhyaś ca brahmākhyaś ca tvam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:016.018a: tanavas te smṛtās tisraḥ purāṇajñaiḥ surarṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.019c: vidvāṃso yānti nirmuktāḥ paraṃ bhāvam anāmayam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.020c: dvāraṃ tvaṃ svargamokṣāṇām ākṣeptā tvaṃ dadāsi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.021a: tvam eva mokṣaḥ svargaś ca kāmaḥ krodhas tvam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:016.021c: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva adhaś cordhvaṃ tvam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:016.022a: brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca skandendrau savitā yamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.022c: varuṇendū manur dhātā vidhātā tvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.023a: bhūr vāyur jyotir āpaś ca vāg buddhis tvaṃ matir manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.023c: karma satyānṛte cobhe tvam evāsti ca nāsti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.024c: viśvāviśvaparo bhāvaś cintyācintyas tvam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:016.025a: yac caitat paramaṃ brahma yac ca tat paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.025c: yā gatiḥ sāṃkhyayogānāṃ sa bhavān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.026a: nūnam adya kṛtārthāḥ sma nūnaṃ prāptāḥ satāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:016.027a: aho mūḍhāḥ sma suciram imaṃ kālam acetasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.027c: yan na vidmaḥ paraṃ devaṃ śāśvataṃ yaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.028a: so 'yam āsāditaḥ sākṣād bahubhir janmabhir mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:016.029c: guhāyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma durvijñeyaṃ surair api
GE07mbh_13_u:016.030a: sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvakṛt sarvatomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.031a: prāṇakṛt prāṇabhṛt prāṇī prāṇadaḥ prāṇināṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.031c: dehakṛd dehabhṛd dehī dehabhug dehināṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.034a: ayaṃ ca siddhikāmānām ṛṣīṇāṃ siddhidaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.034c: ayaṃ ca mokṣakāmānāṃ dvijānāṃ mokṣadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.035c: vibharti devas tanubhir aṣṭābhiś ca dadāti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.036a: ataḥ pravartate sarvam asmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.036c: asmiṃś ca pralayaṃ yāti ayam ekaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.037a: ayaṃ sa satyakāmānāṃ satyalokaḥ paraḥ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:016.038a: ayaṃ brahmādibhiḥ siddhair guhāyāṃ gopitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.039a: taṃ tvāṃ devāsuranarās tattvena na vidur bhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.041a: yaṃ jñātvā na punarjanma maraṇaṃ cāpi vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:016.041c: yaṃ viditvā paraṃ vedyaṃ veditavyaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:016.042a: yaṃ labdhvā paramaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.044a: yaṃ ca vedavido vedyaṃ vedānteṣu pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.044c: prāṇāyāmaparā nityaṃ yaṃ viśanti japanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.045a: ayaṃ sa devayānānām ādityo dvāram ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:016.045c: ayaṃ ca pitṛyānānāṃ candramā dvāram ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:016.047a: evaṃ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ārādhya bahubhiḥ stavaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.048a: ṛgbhir yam anuśaṃsanti tantre karmaṇi bahvṛcaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.048c: yajurbhir yaṃ tridhā vedyaṃ juhvaty adhvaryavo 'dhvare
GE07mbh_13_u:016.049a: sāmabhir yaṃ ca gāyanti sāmagāḥ śuddhabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.049b-0153_01: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma stuvanty ātharvaṇā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.049c: yajñasya paramā yoniḥ patiś cāyaṃ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.051a: mṛtyur yamo hutāśaś ca kālaḥ saṃhāravegavān
GE07mbh_13_u:016.051c: kālasya paramā yoniḥ kālaś cāyaṃ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.052c: dhruvaḥ saptarṣayaś caiva bhuvanāḥ sapta eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.053c: brahmādi stambaparyantaṃ bhūtādi sad asac ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:016.054a: aṣṭau prakṛtayaś caiva prakṛtibhyaś ca yat param
GE07mbh_13_u:016.054c: asya devasya yad bhāgaṃ kṛtsnaṃ saṃparivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:016.055a: etat paramam ānandaṃ yat tac chāśvatam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.055c: eṣā gatir viraktānām eṣa bhāvaḥ paraḥ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:016.056a: etat padam anudvignam etad brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:016.057a: iyaṃ sā paramā kāṣṭhā iyaṃ sā paramā kalā
GE07mbh_13_u:016.057c: iyaṃ sā paramā siddhir iyaṃ sā paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.058a: iyaṃ sā paramā śāntir iyaṃ sā nirvṛtiḥ parā
GE07mbh_13_u:016.058c: yaṃ prāpya kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma ity amanyanta vedhasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.059a: iyaṃ tuṣṭir iyaṃ siddhir iyaṃ śrutir iyaṃ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.060c: yā gatir daivatair divyā sā gatis tvaṃ sanātana
GE07mbh_13_u:016.061c: tapyatāṃ yā gatir deva vairāje sā gatir bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:016.062c: yā gatir brahmabhavane sā gatis tvaṃ sanātana
GE07mbh_13_u:016.063c: vikṛtīnāṃ layānāṃ ca sā gatis tvaṃ sanātana
GE07mbh_13_u:016.064c: kaivalyā yā gatir deva paramā sā gatir bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:016.065c: tvatprasādād dhi labhyante na labhyante 'nyathā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:016.066c: jagau ca paramaṃ brahma yat purā lokakṛj jagau upamanyur uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:016.066d-0154_02: uvāca bhagavān deva umayā sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.067c: na vidus tvām iti tatas tuṣṭaḥ provāca taṃ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.069a: ṛṣīṇām abhigamyaś ca sūtrakartā sutas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:016.070a: kaṃ vā kāmaṃ dadāmy adya brūhi yad vatsa kāṅkṣase
GE07mbh_13_u:016.070c: prāñjaliḥ sa uvācedaṃ tvayi bhaktir dṛḍhāstu me
GE07mbh_13_u:016.071a: evaṃ dattvā varaṃ devo vandyamānaḥ surarṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:016.072c: ṛṣir āśramam āgamya mamaitat proktavān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:016.073a: yāni ca prathitāny ādau taṇḍir ākhyātavān mama
GE07mbh_13_u:016.073c: nāmāni mānavaśreṣṭha tāni tvaṃ śṛṇu siddhaye
GE07mbh_13_u:016.074c: śarvasya śāstreṣu tathā daśa nāmaśatāni vai
GE07mbh_13_u:017.001a: tataḥ sa prayato bhūtvā mama tāta yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:017.005a: yat tad rahasyaṃ paramaṃ brahmaproktaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.006a: paratvena bhavaṃ devaṃ bhaktas tvaṃ parameśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:017.006c: tena te śrāvayiṣyāmi yat tad brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.007a: na śakyaṃ vistarāt kṛtsnaṃ vaktuṃ śarvasya kena cit
GE07mbh_13_u:017.008a: yasyādir madhyam antaś ca surair api na gamyate
GE07mbh_13_u:017.008c: kas tasya śaknuyād vaktuṃ guṇān kārtsnyena mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:017.009c: śaktitaś caritaṃ vakṣye prasādāt tasya caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:017.010a: aprāpyeha tato 'nujñāṃ na śakyaḥ stotum īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.010c: yadā tenābhyanujñātaḥ stuvaty eva sadā bhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.011c: nāmnāṃ kaṃ cit samuddeśaṃ vakṣye hy avyaktayoninaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.013c: tāni nirmathya manasā dadhno ghṛtam ivoddhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.014a: gireḥ sāraṃ yathā hema puṣpāt sāraṃ yathā madhu
GE07mbh_13_u:017.014c: ghṛtāt sāraṃ yathā maṇḍas tathaitat sāram uddhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.015e: śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva rakṣoghnaṃ pāvanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:017.017c: sa kṛṣṇa narakaṃ yāti saha pūrvaiḥ sahānugaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.018a: idaṃ dhyānam idaṃ yogam idaṃ dhyeyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.018c: idaṃ japyam idaṃ jñānaṃ rahasyam idam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.018e: idaṃ jñātvāntakāle 'pi gacched dhi paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:017.019a: pavitraṃ maṅgalaṃ puṇyaṃ kalyāṇam idam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.022a: yasmāt taṇḍiḥ purā prāha tena taṇḍikṛto 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:017.022c: svargāc caivātra bhūlokaṃ taṇḍinā hy avatāritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.024a: brahmaṇām api yad brahma parāṇām api yat param
GE07mbh_13_u:017.024c: tejasām api yat tejas tapasām api yat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.025a: śāntīnām api yā śāntir dyutīnām api yā dyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.025c: dāntānām api yo dānto dhīmatām api yā ca dhīḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.026a: devānām api yo devo munīnām api yo muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.026c: yajñānām api yo yajñaḥ śivānām api yaḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.027a: rudrāṇām api yo rudraḥ prabhuḥ prabhavatām api
GE07mbh_13_u:017.027c: yoginām api yo yogī kāraṇānāṃ ca kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.028a: yato lokāḥ saṃbhavanti na bhavanti yataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.029a: aṣṭottarasahasraṃ tu nāmnāṃ śarvasya me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:017.029c: yac chrutvā manujaśreṣṭha sarvān kāmān avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:017.030a: sthiraḥ sthāṇuḥ prabhur bhānuḥ pravaro varado varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031a: jaṭī carmī śikhaṇḍī ca sarvāṅgaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031c: hariś ca hariṇākṣaś ca sarvabhūtaharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031d-0155_03: vṛṣaś ca vṛṣarūpaś ca vṛṣastho vṛṣabhākṣagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031d-0155_04: bhīmaś ca śitikaṇṭhaś ca śivaḥ śvetaḥ śivottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031d-0155_10: divyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ parāgaś ca vīrabhadro vibhinnagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031d-0155_11: śivaḥ śaṃbhur bhuvo bhartā śrīkaṇṭhas tridaśārcitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031d-0155_13: aṇḍaś ca bahiraṇḍaś ca virāḍbhūto viśeṣakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031d-0155_17: viśado vikramaś caiva viśvo viśvasya saṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.031d-0155_21: hiraṇyākṣaḥ sukeśaś ca ṛkṣaḥ kakṣataras tamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.032a: pravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś ca niyataḥ śāśvato dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.034c: mahātmā sarvabhūtaś ca virūpo vāmano manuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.035c: pavitraś ca mahāṃś caiva niyamo niyamāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.036a: sarvakarmā svayaṃbhūś ca ādir ādikaro nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.041a: gaṇakartā gaṇapatir digvāsāḥ kāmya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.042c: aśanī śataghnī khaḍgī paṭṭiśī cāyudhī mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:017.043a: sruvahastaḥ surūpaś ca tejas tejaskaro nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.043c: uṣṇīṣī ca suvaktraś ca udagro vinatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.044a: dīrghaś ca harikeśaś ca sutīrthaḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.045a: ajaś ca mṛgarūpaś ca gandhadhārī kapardy api
GE07mbh_13_u:017.046a: trijaṭaś cīravāsāś ca rudraḥ senāpatir vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.050a: ghoro mahātapāḥ pāśo nityo giricaro nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.055c: jyotiṣām ayanaṃ siddhiḥ saṃdhir vigraha eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.056a: śikhī daṇḍī jaṭī jvālī mūrtijo mūrdhago balī
GE07mbh_13_u:017.058c: meḍhrajo balacārī ca mahācārī stutas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.058d-0159_01: vīṇī ca paṇavī tālī nālī kaṭikaṭus tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.064a: mukhyo 'mukhyaś ca dehaś ca deharddhiḥ sarvakāmadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.065b-0162_01: bhikṣuś ca bhikṣurūpaś ca raudrarūpo 'ṅgirāḥ khagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.067a: munir ātmapatir loke saṃbhojyaś ca sahasradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.067c: pakṣī ca pakṣirūpī ca atidīpto viśāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.068c: vāmadevaś ca vāmaś ca prāgdakṣiṇyaś ca vāmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.068d-0164_01: samīro damanākāro hy artho hy arthakaro vaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.068d-0164_02: vāsudevaś ca devaś ca vāmadevaś ca vāmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.069c: bhikṣuś ca bhikṣurūpaś ca viṣāṇī mṛdur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.070a: mahāseno viśākhaś ca ṣaṣṭibhāgo gavāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.070c: vajrahastaś ca viṣkambhī camūstambhana eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.072d-0165_01: nimittastho nimittaṃ ca nandir nandikaro hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.073a: nandīśvaraś ca nandī ca nandano nandivardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.076a: dambho hy adambho vaidambho vaśyo vaśyakaraḥ kaviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.077a: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma balavāñ śakra eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.077b-0166_01: vajrahastaḥ pratiṣṭambhī camūruḥ stena eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.077c: nītir hy anītiḥ śuddhātmā śuddho mānyo manogatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.077d-0167_01: nityo hy anīśaḥ śuddhātmā śuddho māno gatir haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.081a: svastidaḥ svastibhāvaś ca bhāgī bhāgakaro laghuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.081c: utsaṅgaś ca mahāṅgaś ca mahāgarbhaḥ paro yuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.091c: naktaṃ kaliś ca kālaś ca makaraḥ kālapūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.093a: agaṇaś caiva lopaś ca mahātmā sarvapūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.094c: śākho viśākhas tāmroṣṭho hy ambujālaḥ suniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.095c: gandharvo hy aditis tārkṣyaḥ suvijñeyaḥ susārathiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.097a: ugro vaṃśakaro vaṃśo vaṃśanādo hy aninditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.098c: sa yajñāriḥ sa kāmārir mahādaṃṣṭro mahāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.099a: bāhus tv aninditaḥ śarvaḥ śaṃkaraḥ śaṃkaro 'dhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.100a: ahirbudhno nirṛtiś ca cekitāno haris tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.100c: ajaikapāc ca kāpālī triśaṅkur ajitaḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.101c: dhātā śakraś ca viṣṇuś ca mitras tvaṣṭā dhruvo dharaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.102a: prabhāvaḥ sarvago vāyur aryamā savitā raviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.102c: udagraś ca vidhātā ca māndhātā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.107a: vaṇijo vardhano vṛkṣo nakulaś candanaś chadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.107d-0171_01: prāṇeśo bandhakī vṛkṣo nakulaś cādrikas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.110c: vāhitā sarvabhūtānāṃ nilayaś ca vibhur bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.111a: amoghaḥ saṃyato hy aśvo bhojanaḥ prāṇadhāraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.111c: dhṛtimān matimān dakṣaḥ satkṛtaś ca yugādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.113c: gandhāraś ca surālaś ca tapaḥkarmaratir dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.117a: yuktaś ca yuktabāhuś ca dvividhaś ca suparvaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.117c: āṣāḍhaś ca suṣāḍhaś ca dhruvo harihaṇo haraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.119a: akṣaś ca rathayogī ca sarvayogī mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.121a: mūlo viśālo hy amṛto vyaktāvyaktas taponidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.125a: indur visargaḥ sumukhaḥ suraḥ sarvāyudhaḥ sahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.131c: gabhastir brahmakṛd brahmā brahmavid brāhmaṇo gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.137a: sādhyarṣir vasur ādityo vivasvān savitā mṛḍaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.137c: vyāsaḥ sarvasya saṃkṣepo vistaraḥ paryayo nayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.138c: kalā kāṣṭhā lavo mātrā muhūrto 'haḥ kṣapāḥ kṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.139a: viśvakṣetraṃ prajābījaṃ liṅgam ādyas tv aninditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.139c: sad asad vyaktam avyaktaṃ pitā mātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.140c: nirvāṇaṃ hlādanaṃ caiva brahmalokaḥ parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.146a: prayuktaḥ śobhano vajra īśānaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.146c: guruḥ kānto nijaḥ sargaḥ pavitraḥ sarvavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.149c: vratādhipaḥ paraṃ brahma muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.150a: vimukto muktatejāś ca śrīmāñ śrīvardhano jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:017.150c: yathāpradhānaṃ bhagavān iti bhaktyā stuto mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.151a: yaṃ na brahmādayo devā vidur yaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.151c: taṃ stavyam arcyaṃ vandyaṃ ca kaḥ stoṣyati jagatpatim
GE07mbh_13_u:017.151d-0176_01: namaḥ śivāyeti sadā pradānaṃ bhagavān iti
GE07mbh_13_u:017.151d-0176_02: bhaktyā stuto mayā yat tad vidus tattvaṃ surarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.152a: bhaktim eva puraskṛtya mayā yajñapatir vasuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.153a: śivam ebhiḥ stuvan devaṃ nāmabhiḥ puṣṭivardhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.153c: nityayuktaḥ śucir bhūtvā prāpnoty ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.154a: etad dhi paramaṃ brahma svayaṃ gītaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.154c: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca stuvanty etena tatparam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.156a: tathaiva ca manuṣyeṣu ye manuṣyāḥ pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.156c: āstikāḥ śraddadhānāś ca bahubhir janmabhiḥ stavaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.156d-0177_01: bhaktyā hy ananyam īśānaṃ paraṃ devaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.156d-0177_03: svapanto jāgramāṇāś ca vrajann upaviśaṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.156d-0177_04: unmiṣan nimiṣaṃś caiva cintayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.157a: jāgrataś ca svapantaś ca vrajantaḥ pathi saṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.157b-0178_01: śṛṇvantaḥ śrāvayantaś ca kathayantaś ca te bhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.157c: stuvanti stūyamānāś ca tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.158c: utpannā ca bhave bhaktir ananyā sarvabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.159c: etad deveṣu duṣprāpaṃ manuṣyeṣu na labhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:017.160c: tasyaiva ca prasādena bhaktir utpadyate nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:017.162a: evam anye na kurvanti devāḥ saṃsāramocanam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164a: stavam etaṃ bhagavato brahmā svayam adhārayat
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0179_01: stavam etadgato brahmā svayam ārādhayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_01: gīyate ca sa budhyeta brahmā śaṃkarasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_02: idaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca sarvadā pāpanāśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_03: yogadaṃ mokṣadaṃ caiva svargadaṃ toṣadaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_04: evam etat paṭhante ya ekabhaktyā tu śaṃkare
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_05: yā gatiḥ sāṃkhyayogānāṃ vrajanty etāṃ gatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_06: stavam etaṃ prayatnena sadā rudrasya saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_07: abdam ekaṃ cared bhaktaḥ prāpnuyād īpsitaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164b-0180_08: etad rahasyaṃ paramaṃ brahmaṇo hṛdi saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.164c: brahmā provāca śakrāya śakraḥ provāca mṛtyave
GE07mbh_13_u:017.165a: mṛtyuḥ provāca rudrāṇāṃ rudrebhyas taṇḍim āgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:017.169c: tavāpy aham amitraghna stavaṃ dadmy adya viśrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:017.169e: svargyam ārogyam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ balyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:017.170a: na tasya vighnaṃ kurvanti dānavā yakṣarākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:017.170c: piśācā yātudhānāś ca guhyakā bhujagā api
GE07mbh_13_u:017.171a: yaḥ paṭheta śucir bhūtvā brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.001c: paṭhasva putra bhadraṃ te prīyatāṃ te maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.002a: purā putra mayā merau tapyatā paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.003a: labdhavān asmi tān kāmān ahaṃ vai pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:018.003c: tathā tvam api śarvād dhi sarvān kāmān avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:018.003d-0181_01: kapilaś ca tataḥ prāha sāṃkhyarṣir devasaṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.003d-0181_02: mayā janmāny anekāni śaktyā cārādhito bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.003d-0181_03: prītaś ca bhagavāñ jñānaṃ dadau mama bhavāntakam
GE07mbh_13_u:018.004a: catuḥśīrṣas tataḥ prāha śakrasya dayitaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.005a: mayā gokarṇam āsādya tapas taptvā śataṃ samāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.007c: vivāde sāmni munibhir brahmaghno vai bhavān iti
GE07mbh_13_u:018.008a: so 'ham īśānam anagham astauṣaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.008c: muktaś cāsmy avaśaḥ pāpāt tato duḥkhavināśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.008e: āha māṃ tripuraghno vai yaśas te 'gryaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:018.009a: jāmadagnyaś ca kaunteyam āha dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.009c: ṛṣimadhye sthitas tāta tapann iva vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.010c: śucir bhūtvā mahādevaṃ gatavāñ śaraṇaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:018.011a: nāmabhiś cāstuvaṃ devaṃ tatas tuṣṭo 'bhavad bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.011c: paraśuṃ ca dadau devo divyāny astrāṇi caiva me
GE07mbh_13_u:018.012a: pāpaṃ na bhavitā te 'dya ajeyaś ca bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:018.012c: na te prabhavitā mṛtyur yaśasvī ca bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:018.013a: āha māṃ bhagavān evaṃ śikhaṇḍī śivavigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.013c: yad avāptaṃ ca me sarvaṃ prasādāt tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.013d-0182_03: tatprasādān mayā prāptaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:018.014a: asito devalaś caiva prāha pāṇḍusutaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_13_u:018.014c: śāpāc chakrasya kaunteya cito dharmo 'naśan mama
GE07mbh_13_u:018.014e: tan me dharmaṃ yaśaś cāgryam āyuś caivādadad bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.015a: ṛṣir gṛtsamado nāma śakrasya dayitaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.016a: vasiṣṭho nāma bhagavāṃś cākṣuṣasya manoḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.016e: vartamāne 'bravīd vākyaṃ sāmni hy uccārite mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.017a: rathantaraṃ dvijaśreṣṭha na samyag iti vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:018.017c: samīkṣasva punar buddhyā harṣaṃ tyaktvā dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:018.018a: evam uktvā mahākrodhāt prāha ruṣṭaḥ punar vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.018c: prajñayā rahito duḥkhī nityaṃ bhīto vanecaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.018e: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśāṣṭau ca śatāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:018.020a: tasya vākyasya nidhane pārtha jāto hy ahaṃ mṛgaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.020c: tato māṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptaṃ prāha yogī maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.021c: sāmyaṃ samas tu te saukhyaṃ yuvayor vardhatāṃ kratuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.022a: anugrahān evam eṣa karoti bhagavān vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.022c: paraṃ dhātā vidhātā ca sukhaduḥkhe ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023a: acintya eṣa bhagavān karmaṇā manasā girā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023c: na me tāta yudhiśreṣṭha vidyayā paṇḍitaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_03: tato 'tha bhagavān āha prīto māṃ vai yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_06: evaṃ sahasraśaś cātmā mahādevo varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_07: maṇimanthe 'tha śaile vai purā saṃrādhito mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_09: tato māṃ bhagavān prīta idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_10: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yas te manasi vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_11: tataḥ praṇamya śirasā idaṃ vacanam abruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_12: yadi prīto mahādevo bhaktyā paramayā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.023d-0183_13: nityakālaṃ taveśāna bhaktir bhavatu me sthirā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.024d-0185_01: parāśaraś cāha muniḥ purā mama ca toṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.026a: tulyaṃ mama sahasraṃ tu sutānāṃ brahmavādinām
GE07mbh_13_u:018.028a: api nāmepsitaḥ putro mama syād vai maheśvarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:018.028b-0186_01: tad abhijñāya mām āha śaṃkaras tripurārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.028b-0186_03: tasyāṃ viṣṇukṛtā nāma vidyayā śodhakaḥ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:018.028c: iti matvā hṛdi mataṃ prāha māṃ surasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.029a: mayi saṃbhavatas tasya phalāt kṛṣṇo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:018.029c: sāvarṇasya manoḥ sarge saptarṣiś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:018.030a: vedānāṃ ca sa vai vyastā kuruvaṃśakaras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.030c: itihāsasya kartā ca putras te jagato hitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.031c: ajaraś cāmaraś caiva parāśara sutas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:018.032d-0187_01: māṇḍavyaś cāha deveśa bhakto lokahite bhave
GE07mbh_13_u:018.033a: acauraś cauraśaṅkāyāṃ śūle bhinno hy ahaṃ yadā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.033c: tatrasthena stuto devaḥ prāha māṃ vai maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.034a: mokṣaṃ prāpsyasi śūlāc ca jīviṣyasi samārbudam
GE07mbh_13_u:018.034c: rujā śūlakṛtā caiva na te vipra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:018.034e: ādhibhir vyādhibhiś caiva varjitas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:018.035a: pādāc caturthāt saṃbhūta ātmā yasmān mune tava
GE07mbh_13_u:018.035c: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasy anupamo janma vai saphalaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_13_u:018.037a: evam uktvā tu bhagavān vareṇyo vṛṣavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.038c: abravīn māṃ tato mātā duḥkhitā rudatī bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:018.039c: na tāta taruṇaṃ dāntaṃ pitā tvāṃ paśyate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:018.040c: niyatātmā mahādevam apaśyaṃ so 'bravīc ca mām
GE07mbh_13_u:018.041a: pitā mātā ca te tvaṃ ca putra mṛtyuvivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.041c: bhaviṣyatha viśa kṣipraṃ draṣṭāsi pitaraṃ kṣaye
GE07mbh_13_u:018.042c: apaśyaṃ pitaraṃ tāta iṣṭiṃ kṛtvā viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:018.043a: upaspṛśya gṛhītvedhmaṃ kuśāṃś ca śaraṇād gurūn
GE07mbh_13_u:018.043c: tān visṛjya ca māṃ prāha pitā sāsrāvilekṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.044c: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si me putra kṛtavidya ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.045a: etāny atyadbhutāny eva karmāṇy atha mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.045c: proktāni munibhiḥ śrutvā vismayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046a: tataḥ kṛṣṇo 'bravīd vākyaṃ punar matimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dharmanityaṃ puruhūtam iveśvaraḥ vāsudeva uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_07: brahmatvaṃ keśavatvaṃ vā śakratvaṃ vā suraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_09: manasāpi śivaṃ tāta ye prapadyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_10: vidhūya sarvapāpāni devaiḥ saha vasanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_11: bhittvā chittvā ca kūlāni hatvā sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_12: yajed devaṃ virūpākṣaṃ na sa pāpena lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_14: sarvaṃ tudati tat pāpaṃ bhāvayañ chivam ātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_16: mahādevaprapannānāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_17: evam eva mahādevaṃ bhaktā ye mānavā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:018.046d-0189_18: na te saṃsāravaśagā iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.047a: ādityacandrāv anilānalau ca; dyaur bhūmir āpo vasavo 'tha viśve
GE07mbh_13_u:018.047c: dhātāryamā śukrabṛhaspatī ca; rudrāḥ sasādhyā varuṇo vittagopaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.048a: brahmā śakro māruto brahma satyaṃ; vedā yajñā dakṣiṇā vedavāhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.048c: somo yaṣṭā yac ca havyaṃ haviś ca; rakṣā dīkṣā niyamā ye ca ke cit
GE07mbh_13_u:018.049a: svāhā vaṣaḍ brāhmaṇāḥ saurabheyā; dharmaṃ cakraṃ kālacakraṃ caraṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:018.049c: yaśo damo buddhimatī sthitiś ca; śubhāśubhaṃ munayaś caiva sapta
GE07mbh_13_u:018.050a: agryā buddhir manasā darśane ca; sparśe siddhiḥ karmaṇāṃ yā ca siddhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.050c: gaṇā devānām ūṣmapāḥ somapāś ca; lekhāḥ suyāmās tuṣitā brahmakāyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.051a: ābhāsvarā gandhapā dṛṣṭipāś ca; vācā viruddhāś ca manoviruddhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.051c: śuddhāś ca nirvāṇaratāś ca devāḥ; sparśāśanā darśapā ājyapāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:018.052a: cintāgatā ye ca deveṣu mukhyā; ye cāpy anye devatāś cājamīḍha
GE07mbh_13_u:018.052c: suparṇagandharvapiśācadānavā; yakṣās tathā pannagāś cāraṇāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:018.053a: sūkṣmaṃ sthūlaṃ mṛdu yac cāpy asūkṣmaṃ; sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaduḥkhāntaraṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:018.053c: sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ yat parāṇāṃ paraṃ ca; śarvāj jātaṃ viddhi yat kīrtitaṃ me
GE07mbh_13_u:018.054a: tatsaṃbhūtā bhūtakṛto vareṇyāḥ; sarve devā bhuvanasyāsya gopāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:018.054c: āviśyemāṃ dharaṇīṃ ye 'bhyarakṣan; purātanīṃ tasya devasya sṛṣṭim
GE07mbh_13_u:018.055a: vicinvantaṃ manasā toṣṭuvīmi; kiṃ cit tattvaṃ prāṇahetor nato 'smi
GE07mbh_13_u:018.055c: dadātu devaḥ sa varān iheṣṭān; abhiṣṭuto naḥ prabhur avyayaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:018.056a: imaṃ stavaṃ saṃniyamyendriyāṇi; śucir bhūtvā yaḥ puruṣaḥ paṭheta
GE07mbh_13_u:018.056c: abhagnayogo niyato 'bdam ekaṃ; sa prāpnuyād aśvamedhe phalaṃ yat
GE07mbh_13_u:018.057a: vedān kṛtsnān brāhmaṇaḥ prāpnuyāc ca; jayed rājā pṛthivīṃ cāpi kṛtsnām
GE07mbh_13_u:018.057c: vaiśyo lābhaṃ prāpnuyān naipuṇaṃ ca; śūdro gatiṃ pretya tathā sukhaṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:018.058a: stavarājam imaṃ kṛtvā rudrāya dadhire manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.001c: pāṇigrahaṇakāle tu strīṇām etat kathaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:019.002a: ārṣa eṣa bhaved dharmaḥ prājāpatyo 'tha vāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.002c: yad etat sahadharmeti pūrvam uktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.003a: saṃdehaḥ sumahān eṣa viruddha iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.003c: iha yaḥ sahadharmo vai pretyāyaṃ vihitaḥ kva nu
GE07mbh_13_u:019.004c: pūrvam ekas tu mriyate kva caikas tiṣṭhate vada
GE07mbh_13_u:019.006a: anṛtāḥ striya ity evaṃ sūtrakāro vyavasyati
GE07mbh_13_u:019.006c: yadānṛtāḥ striyas tāta sahadharmaḥ kutaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.007a: anṛtāḥ striya ity evaṃ vedeṣv api hi paṭhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:019.008c: niḥsaṃdeham idaṃ sarvaṃ pitāmaha yathā śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.009a: yad etad yādṛśaṃ caitad yathā caitat pravartitam
GE07mbh_13_u:019.009c: nikhilena mahāprājña bhavān etad bravītu me
GE07mbh_13_u:019.011c: ṛṣer atha vadānyasya kanyāṃ vavre mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.012a: suprabhāṃ nāma vai nāmnā rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:019.013a: sā tasya dṛṣṭvaiva mano jahāra śubhalocanā
GE07mbh_13_u:019.014a: ṛṣis tam āha deyā me sutā tubhyaṃ śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_13_u:019.014b-0190_02: surūpaḥ saṃmato vīraḥ śīlavān bhogabhuk śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.014b-0190_04: sabhṛtyaḥ svajanopeta iha pretya ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:019.014c: gaccha tāvad diśaṃ puṇyām uttarāṃ drakṣyase tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.015a: kiṃ draṣṭavyaṃ mayā tatra vaktum arhati me bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:019.015c: tathedānīṃ mayā kāryaṃ yathā vakṣyati māṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:019.019a: iṣṭaṃ kila girau sthānaṃ tad divyam anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:019.019c: nityaṃ saṃnihito devas tathā pāriṣadāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.020a: tatra devyā tapas taptaṃ śaṃkarārthaṃ suduścaram
GE07mbh_13_u:019.020c: atas tad iṣṭaṃ devasya tathomāyā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.021a: tatra kūpo mahān pārśve devasyottaratas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:019.021c: ṛtavaḥ kālarātriś ca ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.022a: sarve devam upāsante rūpiṇaḥ kila tatra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:019.022c: tad atikramya bhavanaṃ tvayā yātavyam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:019.023c: ramaṇīyaṃ manogrāhi tatra drakṣyasi vai striyam
GE07mbh_13_u:019.024c: draṣṭavyā sā tvayā tatra saṃpūjyā caiva yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:019.025a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vinivṛttas tvaṃ tataḥ pāṇiṃ grahīṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:019.025c: yady eṣa samayaḥ satyaḥ sādhyatāṃ tatra gamyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:020.001c: yatra tvaṃ vadase sādho bhavān bhavatu satyavāk
GE07mbh_13_u:020.002a: tato 'gacchat sa bhagavān uttarām uttamāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_13_u:020.004a: aśoke vimale tīrthe snātvā tarpya ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.004c: tatra vāsāya śayane kauśye sukham uvāsa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.005a: tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ prātar utthāya sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.006c: viśrāntaś ca samutthāya kailāsam abhito yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:020.008a: atha te rākṣasāḥ sarve ye 'bhirakṣanti padminīm
GE07mbh_13_u:020.009a: sa tān pratyarcayām āsa rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE07mbh_13_u:020.010a: te rākṣasās tadā rājan bhagavantam athābruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:020.010c: asau vaiśravaṇo rājā svayam āyāti te 'ntikam
GE07mbh_13_u:020.011a: vidito bhagavān asya kāryam āgamane ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:020.011c: paśyainaṃ tvaṃ mahābhāgaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.012c: vidhivat kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā tato brahmarṣim abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:020.013a: sukhaṃ prāpto bhavān kaccit kiṃ vā mattaś cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_13_u:020.013c: brūhi sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ vakṣyasi dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:020.014a: bhavanaṃ praviśa tvaṃ me yathākāmaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:020.014c: satkṛtaḥ kṛtakāryaś ca bhavān yāsyaty avighnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.015a: prāviśad bhavanaṃ svaṃ vai gṛhītvā taṃ dvijottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:020.015c: āsanaṃ svaṃ dadau caiva pādyam arghyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:020.017a: tatas teṣāṃ niṣaṇṇānāṃ dhanado vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:020.018a: ātithyaṃ paramaṃ kāryaṃ śuśrūṣā bhavatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.018c: saṃvartatām ity uvāca munir madhurayā girā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.019c: alambusā ghṛtācī ca citrā citrāṅgadā ruciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.020a: manoharā sukeśī ca sumukhī hāsinī prabhā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.020c: vidyutā praśamā dāntā vidyotā ratir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:020.021a: etāś cānyāś ca vai bahvyaḥ pranṛttāpsarasaḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.021c: avādayaṃś ca gandharvā vādyāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:020.022a: atha pravṛtte gāndharve divye ṛṣir upāvasat
GE07mbh_13_u:020.022c: divyaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tatra raman vai sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.023a: tato vaiśravaṇo rājā bhagavantam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.023c: sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro yātas tava vipreha paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.024a: hāryo 'yaṃ viṣayo brahman gāndharvo nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.024c: chandato vartatāṃ vipra yathā vadati vā bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:020.025a: atithiḥ pūjanīyas tvam idaṃ ca bhavato gṛham
GE07mbh_13_u:020.025c: sarvam ājñāpyatām āśu paravanto vayaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_13_u:020.027a: prīto 'smi sadṛśaṃ caiva tava sarvaṃ dhanādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:020.027c: tava prasādād bhagavan maharṣeś ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.027e: niyogād adya yāsyāmi vṛddhimān ṛddhimān bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:020.028c: kailāsaṃ mandaraṃ haimaṃ sarvān anucacāra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.029a: tān atītya mahāśailān kairātaṃ sthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:020.029c: pradakṣiṇaṃ tataś cakre prayataḥ śirasā naman
GE07mbh_13_u:020.030a: sa taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā triḥ śailaṃ cottarāmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.032e: maṇibhūmau niviṣṭāś ca puṣkariṇyas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:020.033a: anyāny api suramyāṇi dadarśa subahūny atha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.033c: bhṛśaṃ tasya mano reme maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.034a: sa tatra kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ sarvaratnamayaṃ gṛham
GE07mbh_13_u:020.035c: vimānāni ca ramyāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:020.036c: svayaṃprabhāś ca maṇayo vajrair bhūmiś ca bhūṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.038c: tato 'bhavat tasya cintā kva me vāso bhaved iti
GE07mbh_13_u:020.039a: atha dvāraṃ samabhito gatvā sthitvā tato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:020.039c: atithiṃ mām anuprāptam anujānantu ye 'tra vai
GE07mbh_13_u:020.040c: nānārūpāḥ sapta vibho kanyāḥ sarvā manoharāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.041a: yāṃ yām apaśyat kanyāṃ sa sā sā tasya mano 'harat
GE07mbh_13_u:020.042a: tato dhṛtiḥ samutpannā tasya viprasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.042c: atha taṃ pramadāḥ prāhur bhagavān praviśatv iti
GE07mbh_13_u:020.043a: sa ca tāsāṃ surūpāṇāṃ tasyaiva bhavanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:020.045a: svastīti cātha tenoktā sā strī pratyavadat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.045c: pratyutthāya ca taṃ vipram āsyatām ity uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.046a: sarvāḥ svān ālayān yāntu ekā mām upatiṣṭhatu
GE07mbh_13_u:020.047a: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kanyās tās tam ṛṣiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.047c: nirākrāman gṛhāt tasmāt sā vṛddhātha vyatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_13_u:020.048a: atha tāṃ saṃviśan prāha śayane bhāsvare tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.048c: tvayāpi supyatāṃ bhadre rajanī hy ativartate
GE07mbh_13_u:020.049a: saṃlāpāt tena vipreṇa tathā sā tatra bhāṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.050a: atha sā vepamānāṅgī nimittaṃ śītajaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.051c: sopāgūhad bhujābhyāṃ tu ṛṣiṃ prītyā nararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.052c: duḥkhitā prekṣya saṃjalpam akārṣīd ṛṣiṇā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.053a: brahman na kāmakāro 'sti strīṇāṃ puruṣato dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.053c: kāmena mohitā cāhaṃ tvāṃ bhajantīṃ bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_13_u:020.054a: prahṛṣṭo bhava viprarṣe samāgaccha mayā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.054c: upagūha ca māṃ vipra kāmārtāhaṃ bhṛśaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_13_u:020.055a: etad dhi tava dharmātmaṃs tapasaḥ pūjyate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:020.055c: prārthitaṃ darśanād eva bhajamānāṃ bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_13_u:020.056a: sadma cedaṃ vanaṃ cedaṃ yac cānyad api paśyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:020.056c: prabhutvaṃ tava sarvatra mayi caiva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.057a: sarvān kāmān vidhāsyāmi ramasva sahito mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.058a: tvadvaśāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi raṃsyase ca mayā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.058c: sarvān kāmān upāśnāno ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.059a: nātaḥ paraṃ hi nārīṇāṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ cana vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:020.059c: yathā puruṣasaṃsargaḥ param etad dhi naḥ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:020.060c: na ca dahyanti gacchantyaḥ sutaptair api pāṃsubhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.061a: paradārān ahaṃ bhadre na gaccheyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:020.061d-0193_02: punaś ca pātakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viprakṣetre viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.062a: bhadre niveṣṭukāmaṃ māṃ viddhi satyena vai śape
GE07mbh_13_u:020.062b-0194_02: bījaṃ na śudhyate voḍhur asya cākṛtaniṣkṛteḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.062b-0194_03: mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ śuddho jñeyaḥ putro yathārthataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.063a: evaṃ lokān gamiṣyāmi putrair iti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.063c: bhadre dharmaṃ vijānīṣva jñātvā coparamasva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:020.064a: nānilo 'gnir na varuṇo na cānye tridaśā dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:020.064c: priyāḥ strīṇāṃ yathā kāmo ratiśīlā hi yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.065a: sahasraikā yatā nārī prāpnotīha kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:020.065c: tathā śatasahasreṣu yadi kā cit pativratā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.066a: naitā jānanti pitaraṃ na kulaṃ na ca mātaram
GE07mbh_13_u:020.066c: na bhrātṝn na ca bhartāraṃ na putrān na ca devarān
GE07mbh_13_u:020.067c: doṣāṃś ca mandān mandāsu prajāpatir abhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:020.068a: tataḥ sa ṛṣir ekāgras tāṃ striyaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:020.068c: āsyatāṃ ruciraṃ chandaḥ kiṃ vā kāryaṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:020.069a: sā strī provāca bhagavan drakṣyase deśakālataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.070a: brahmarṣis tām athovāca sa tatheti yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:020.070c: vatsye 'haṃ yāvad utsāho bhavatyā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.071c: cintāṃ paramikāṃ bheje saṃtapta iva cābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:020.072a: yad yad aṅgaṃ hi so 'paśyat tasyā viprarṣabhas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.073c: asyāś ca kāraṇaṃ vettuṃ na yuktaṃ sahasā mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:020.074a: iti cintāviṣaktasya tam arthaṃ jñātum icchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.074c: vyagamat tad ahaḥśeṣaṃ manasā vyākulena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:020.075a: atha sā strī tadovāca bhagavan paśya vai raveḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:020.076a: sa uvāca tadā tāṃ strīṃ snānodakam ihānaya
GE07mbh_13_u:021.001a: atha sā strī tam uktvā tu vipram evaṃ bhavatv iti
GE07mbh_13_u:021.002a: anujñātā ca muninā sā strī tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:021.003c: bhadrāsanaṃ tataś citraṃ ṛṣir anvāviśan navam
GE07mbh_13_u:021.004a: athopaviṣṭaś ca yadā tasmin bhadrāsane tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:021.004c: snāpayām āsa śanakais tam ṛṣiṃ sukhahastavat
GE07mbh_13_u:021.004e: divyaṃ ca vidhivac cakre sopacāraṃ munes tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:021.005a: sa tena susukhoṣṇena tasyā hastasukhena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:021.005c: vyatītāṃ rajanīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nājānāt sa mahāvrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.006a: tata utthāya sa munis tadā paramavismitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.006c: pūrvasyāṃ diśi sūryaṃ ca so 'paśyad uditaṃ divi
GE07mbh_13_u:021.007a: tasya buddhir iyaṃ kiṃ nu mohas tattvam idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:021.007c: athopāsya sahasrāṃśuṃ kiṃ karomīty uvāca tām
GE07mbh_13_u:021.008c: tasya svādutayānnasya na prabhūtaṃ cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.008e: vyagamac cāpy ahaḥśeṣaṃ tataḥ saṃdhyāgamat punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.009a: atha strī bhagavantaṃ sā supyatām ity acodayat
GE07mbh_13_u:021.009c: tatra vai śayane divye tasya tasyāś ca kalpite
GE07mbh_13_u:021.009d-0197_01: pṛthak caiva tathā suptau sā strī sa ca munis tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:021.009d-0197_02: athārdharātre sā strī tu śayanaṃ tad upāgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:021.010a: na bhadre paradāreṣu mano me saṃprasajjati
GE07mbh_13_u:021.010c: uttiṣṭha bhadre bhadraṃ te svapa vai viramasva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:021.011a: sā tadā tena vipreṇa tathā dhṛtyā nivartitā
GE07mbh_13_u:021.011c: svatantrāsmīty uvācainaṃ na dharmacchalam asti te
GE07mbh_13_u:021.012a: nāsti svatantratā strīṇām asvatantrā hi yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.012c: prajāpatimataṃ hy etan na strī svātantryam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:021.013a: bādhate maithunaṃ vipra mama bhaktiṃ ca paśya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:021.013c: adharmaṃ prāpsyase vipra yan māṃ tvaṃ nābhinandasi
GE07mbh_13_u:021.014c: prabhavāmi sadā dhṛtyā bhadre svaṃ śayanaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_13_u:021.015a: śirasā praṇame vipra prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:021.016a: yadi vā doṣajātaṃ tvaṃ paradāreṣu paśyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:021.016c: ātmānaṃ sparśayāmy adya pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva me dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:021.017a: na doṣo bhavitā caiva satyenaitad bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:021.017c: svatantrāṃ māṃ vijānīhi yo 'dharmaḥ so 'stu vai mayi
GE07mbh_13_u:021.017d-0198_01: tvayy āveśitacittā ca svatantrāsmi bhajasva mām aṣṭāvakra uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:021.018-0199_01: anyat karma na cānyasya svātantryaṃ tan na yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:021.018a: svatantrā tvaṃ kathaṃ bhadre brūhi kāraṇam atra vai
GE07mbh_13_u:021.018c: nāsti loke hi kā cit strī yā vai svātantryam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:021.019a: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane
GE07mbh_13_u:021.019c: putrāś ca sthavirībhāve na strī svātantryam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:021.019d-0200_01: na vṛddhām akṣamāṃ manye na cecchā tvayi me 'naghe
GE07mbh_13_u:021.020a: kaumāraṃ brahmacaryaṃ me kanyaivāsmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.020c: kuru mā vimatiṃ vipra śraddhāṃ vijahi mā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:021.021a: yathā mama tathā tubhyaṃ yathā tava tathā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:021.021b-0201_01: aṣṭāvakro 'tha sa muniś cintayām āsa vismitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.021c: jijñāseyam ṛṣes tasya vighnaḥ satyaṃ nu kiṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:021.022a: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ hīdaṃ kiṃ nu śreyo hi me bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:021.023a: kiṃ tv asyāḥ paramaṃ rūpaṃ jīrṇam āsīt kathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:021.024a: yathā paraṃ śaktidhṛter na vyutthāsye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:021.024c: na rocaye hi vyutthānaṃ dhṛtyaivaṃ sādhayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:022.001a: na bibheti kathaṃ sā strī śāpasya paramadyuteḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.001c: kathaṃ nivṛtto bhagavāṃs tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_13_u:022.002c: na cānṛtaṃ te vaktavyaṃ brūhi brāhmaṇakāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.004a: uttarāṃ māṃ diśaṃ viddhi dṛṣṭaṃ strīcāpalaṃ ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:022.005d-0202_02: vidvān suśīlaḥ puruṣaḥ sadāraḥ sukham aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:022.006a: tuṣṭaḥ pitāmahas te 'dya tathā devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.006c: sa tvaṃ yena ca kāryeṇa saṃprāpto bhagavān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:022.007b-0203_03: aparvāsv aniṣiddhāsu rātriṣv apy anṛtau vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.007b-0203_04: rātrau ca nātiniyamo na vai hy aniyamo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.007c: tavopadeśaṃ kartuṃ vai tac ca sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.008a: kṣemī gamiṣyasi gṛhāñ śramaś ca na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.008c: kanyāṃ prāpsyasi tāṃ vipra putriṇī ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.009a: kāmyayā pṛṣṭavāṃs tvaṃ māṃ tato vyāhṛtam uttaram
GE07mbh_13_u:022.010a: gacchasva sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ vānyac chrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:022.011a: ṛṣiṇā prasāditā cāsmi tava hetor dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:022.011c: tasya saṃmānanārthaṃ me tvayi vākyaṃ prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.012a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasyāḥ sa vipraḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.012c: anujñātas tayā cāpi svagṛhaṃ punar āvrajat
GE07mbh_13_u:022.013a: gṛham āgamya viśrāntaḥ svajanaṃ pratipūjya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:022.014a: pṛṣṭaś ca tena vipreṇa dṛṣṭaṃ tv etan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.015c: tasya cottarato deśe dṛṣṭaṃ tad daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:022.016a: tayā cāham anujñāto bhavāṃś cāpi prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.016c: śrāvitaś cāpi tad vākyaṃ gṛham abhyāgataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:022.017a: tam uvāca tato vipraḥ pratigṛhṇīṣva me sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.018a: aṣṭāvakras tathety uktvā pratigṛhya ca tāṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019c: uvāsa muditas tatra āśrame sve gatajvaraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0003: katham etan mahārāja tattvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0004: viruddham iha paśyāmi viyonau brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0006: śubhetaraṃ śubhaṃ vāpi na cintayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0007: īśanty ātmana ity etad gatiś caiṣāṃ na sajjate
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0009: nindyā na caite rājendra pramāṇaṃ hi pramāṇinām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0010: loko 'numanyate caitān pramāṇaṃ hy atra vai tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0014: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0015: rājñāṃ tu kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0016: vaiśyasya vaiśyā vihitā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0017: śūdrasyaikā smṛtā bhāryā pratilome tu saṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0018: śūdrāyās tu naraśreṣṭha catvāraḥ patayaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0019: varṇottamāyās tu patiḥ savarṇas tv eka eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0020: dvau kṣatriyāyā vihitau brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0021: vaiśyāyās tu naraśreṣṭha vihitāḥ patayas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0022: savarṇaḥ kṣatriyaś caiva brāhmaṇaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0023: evaṃ vidhim anusmṛtya tatas te ṛṣibhiḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0025: purāṇābhyām ṛṣibhyāṃ tu mitreṇa varuṇena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0027: kakṣīvān ārṣṭiṣeṇaś ca puruṣaḥ kakṣa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0030: gautamasyaiva tanayā ye dāsyāṃ janitā hy uta
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0032: vainateyas tathā pakṣī turyāyāṃ ca vasiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0034: adṛśyantyāḥ pitā vaiśyo nāmnā citramukhaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0037: śubhāṃ prādād yato jāto brahmarṣis tu parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0039: parāśarāt prasūtaś ca vyāso yogamayo muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0043: jātā brahmarṣayaḥ puṇyā yaiḥ stuto havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0044: droṇaś ca stambamitraś ca śārisṛkvaś ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0048: pāvakāt tāta saṃbhūtā manasā ca maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0053: śaradvataḥ śarastambāt kṛpaś ca kṛpayā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0054: padmāc ca jajñe rājendra somapasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0055: reṇuś ca reṇukā caiva rāmamātā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0059: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca saṃbhūto vedyāṃ kṛṣṇā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0062: mandhaś ca bādalomaś ca jābāliś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0063: manyuś caivopamanyuś ca setukarṇas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0064: ete cānye ca vikhyātāḥ pṛthivyāṃ gotratāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0066: bālāśvo nāma putro 'bhūc chikhāṃ bhittvā viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0071: bhūmeś ca putro narakaḥ saṃvartaś caiva puṣkalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0072: adbhiś caiva mahātejā ṛṣir gārgyo hy ajāyata
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0073: ete cānye ca bahavo rājanyā brāhmaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0076: asminn arthe ca manunā gītaḥ śloko narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0077: dharmaṃ praṇayatā rājaṃs taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0078: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca sādhūnāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0080: tan nātra cintā kartavyā maharṣīṇāṃ samudbhave
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007_0081: yathā sarvagato hy agnis tathā tejo mahātmasu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0001: putraiḥ kathaṃ mahārāja puruṣas tārito bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0002: yāvan na labdhavān putram aphalaḥ puruṣo nṛpa bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0005: parvataṃ nāradaṃ caiva asitaṃ devalaṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0006: āraṇeyaṃ ca raibhyaṃ ca etān atrāgatān purā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0009: ṛṣayas tu muniṃ dṛṣṭvā samutthāyonmukhāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0010: arcayitvārhato vipraṃ kiṃ kurma iti cābruvan mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0012: atra prāpsyāmi dharmāṇām ācārasya ca niścayam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0013: ṛjuḥ kṛtayuge dharmas tasmin kṣīṇe vimuhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0014: yuge yuge maharṣibhyo dharmam icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0015: ṛṣibhir nāradaḥ prokto brūhi yatrāsya saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0016: dharmādharmeṣu tattvajña tvaṃ hi cchettāsi saṃśayān
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0020: yatra te saṃśayo brahman samutpannaḥ sa ucyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0021: dharmaṃ lokopakāraṃ vā yac cānyac chrotum icchasi mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0022: tad ahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi brūhi tvaṃ sumahātapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0024: kathaṃ dharmacchalenāhaṃ prāpnuyām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0025: āsīd dharmaḥ purā vipra catuṣpādaḥ kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0026: tato hy adharmaḥ kālena prasūtaḥ kiṃ cid unnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0028: tasmin vyatīte saṃprāptaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dvāparaṃ yugam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0029: tadā dharmasya dvau pādāv adharmo nāśayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0031: lokavṛttaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca ucyamānaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0035: evaṃ vilulite dharme loke cādharmasaṃyute nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0037: mantrapūtaṃ sadā havyaṃ kavyaṃ caiva na naśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0038: pratigṛhṇanti tad devā dātur nyāyāt prayacchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0039: sattvayuktaṃ ca dātā ca sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0041: catvāro hy atha ye varṇā havyakavyaṃ pradāsyate nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0042: mantrahīnam apanyāyaṃ teṣāṃ dattaṃ kva gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0043: asurān gacchate dattaṃ viprai rakṣāṃsi kṣatriyaiḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0044: vaiśyaiḥ pretāni vai dattaṃ śūdrair bhūtāni gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0046: dāsyanti havyakavyāni teṣāṃ dattaṃ kva gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0048: naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratigṛhṇanti tat svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0049: yātudhānāḥ piśācāś ca bhūtā ye cāpi nairṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0052: yat prayacchanti vidhivat tad vai bhuñjanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0053: śrutaṃ varṇāvare dattaṃ havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca nārada nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0054: saṃprayoge ca putrāṇāṃ kanyānāṃ ca bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0055: kanyāpradānaṃ putrāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ saṃyogam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0056: ānupūrvyān mayā samyag ucyamānaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0057: jātamātrā tu dātavyā kanyakā sadṛśe vare
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0059: yas tu puṣpavatīṃ kanyāṃ bāndhavo na prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0060: māsi māsi gate bandhus tasyā bhrauṇaghnyam āpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0061: yas tu kanyāṃ gṛhe rundhyād grāmyair bhogair vivarjitām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0062: avadhyātaḥ sa kanyāyā bandhuḥ prāpnoti bhrūṇahām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0064: saṃskāraṃ labhate nārī dvitīye sā punaḥ patau
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0065: punar bhūr nāma sā kanyā saputrā havyakavyadā mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0067: yā tu kanyā prasūyeta garbhiṇī yā tu vā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0068: atha dārakriyāṃ bhūyaḥ sā bhajed ṛṣisattama nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0070: tasmāt kurvanti vai bhāvaṃ kumāryas tā na kanyakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0072: gṛhṇīyāt tāṃ caturbhāgaṃ viśuddhāṃ sarjanāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0073: kathaṃ kanyāsu ye jātā bandhūnāṃ dūṣitāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0075: kanyāyās tu pituḥ putrāḥ kānīnā havyakavyadāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0076: antarvatnyās tu yaḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīyāt sa sahoḍhajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0077: atha yenāhito garbhaḥ kanyāyāṃ tatra nārada nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0078: kathaṃ putraphalaṃ tasya bhaved etat pracakṣva me
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0080: bījaṃ ca naśyate teṣāṃ moghaceṣṭā bhavanti te mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0081: atha kā cid bhavet kanyā krītā dattā hṛtāpi vā nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0082: kathaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tasyās tad bhaved ṛṣisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0083: krītā dattā hṛtā caiva yā kanyā pāṇivarjitā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0084: kaumārī nāma sā bhāryā prasaved aurasān sutān mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0085: na patyarthe śubhā proktā tatkarmaṇy aparājite
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0092: evaṃ kanyā parā lakṣmī ratis toṣaś ca dehinām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0094: ānayitvā svakād varṇāt kanyakāṃ yo bhajen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0096: sādhvī kulaṃ vardhayati sādhvī puṣṭir gṛhe parā mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0097: sādhvī lakṣmī ratiḥ sākṣāt pratiṣṭhā saṃtatis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0099: icchāmi yoṣitāṃ śrotuṃ dharmādharmaṃ parigrahe nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0101: pretyeha ca hitā yās tu saputrā havyakavyadāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0103: bhrātṛbhāryā svabhāryeti prasūyet putram aurasam mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0104: trayo bhāryāgamā jñātā yatra dharmo na naśyati nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0105: pañcānyāḥ paścimā brūhi bhāryās tāsāṃ ca ye sutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0106: sagotrabhāryā krītā ca parabhāryā ca kāritā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0107: gatāgatā ca yā bhāryā āśramād āhṛtā ca yā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0108: ete bhāryāgamāḥ pañca punar bhāryā bhavanti yāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0109: etā bhāryā nṛṇāṃ gamyās tatputrā havyakavyadāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0110: śrutā bhāryāś ca putrāś ca vistareṇa mahāmune nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0111: āśramasthāḥ kathaṃ nāryo na duṣyantīti brūhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0113: naṣṭavaṃśyā bhavanty etā bandhūnām atha bhartṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0116: evaṃ nāryo na duṣyanti narāṇāṃ tatprasūtiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0118: parasya bhāryā yā pūrvaṃ mṛte bhartari yā punaḥ 13,022.019d@007A_0119
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0119: anyaṃ bhajati bhartāraṃ sasutā asutā katham
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0120: asūtā vā prasūtā vā gṛhasthānāṃ parastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0122: na cāsāṃ havyakavyāni pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0123: yas tāsu janayet putrān na taiḥ putram avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0124: parakṣetreṣu yo bījaṃ cāpalyād visṛjen naraḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0125: kathaṃ putraphalaṃ tasya bhavet tad ṛṣisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0126: asvāmike parakṣetre yo naro bījam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0128: parakṣetreṣu yo bījaṃ naro darpāt samutsṛjet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0129: kṣetrikasyaiva tad bījaṃ na bījī labhate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0130: nātaḥ param adharmyaṃ cāpy ayaśasyaṃ tathottaram
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0131: garbhādīnāṃ ca bahubhis tāś ca tyājyāḥ sameṣv api 13,022.019d@007A_0131
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0132: atha ye paradāreṣu putrā jāyanti nārada nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0135: jīvaty atha patau kuṇḍo mṛte bhartari golakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0136: te ca jātāḥ parakṣetre dehināṃ pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0138: pitur hi narakāyaite golakas tu viśeṣataḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0139: caṇḍālatulyau tajjau hi paratreha ca naśyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0140: kasya te garhitāḥ putrāḥ pitṝṇāṃ havyakavyadāḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0141: yasya kṣetre prasūyante yo vā tāñ janayet sutān
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0142: kṣetrikaś caiva bījī ca dvāv etau nirayaṃ gatau
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0143: na rakṣati hi yo dārān paradārāṃś ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0144: garhitās te narā nityaṃ dharmācārabahiṣkṛtāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0145: kuṇḍo bhoktā ca bhojī ca kutsitāḥ pitṛdaivataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0147: kasya nityaṃ prayacchanti dharmo vā teṣu kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0148: yātudhānāḥ piśācāś ca pratigṛhṇanti tair hutam
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0149: havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca tair dattaṃ ye ca bhūtā niśācarāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0150: atha te rākṣasāḥ prītāḥ kiṃ prayacchanti dātṛṇām nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0151: kiṃ vā dharmaphalaṃ teṣāṃ bhavet tad ṛṣisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0152: na dattaṃ naśyate kiṃ cit sarvabhūteṣu dātṛṇām mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0153: pretya ceha ca tāṃ puṣṭim upāśnanti pradāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0155: tayor ye bāndhavāḥ ke cit pradāsyanti kathaṃ nu tat nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0156: sādhvījātāḥ sutās teṣāṃ tāṃ vṛttim anutiṣṭhatām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0159: havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca śuddhānāṃ pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0161: pramadānāṃ tu cāpalye doṣam icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0163: dhātā ca samanujñāto viṣṇunā tat tathākarot
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0165: sasarja tābhyāṃ saṃyogam anujñātaś cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0167: tena caiva prasādena sarvāṃl lokān upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0168: tasmāt tu puruṣe doṣo hy adhiko nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0169: vinā garbhaṃ savarṇeṣu na tyājyā gamanāt striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0170: prāyaścittaṃ yathānyāyaṃ daṇḍaṃ kuryāt sa paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0171: śvabhir vā daśanaṃ snānaṃ savanatritayaṃ niśi
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0174: maryādā sthāpitā pūrvam iti tīrthāntaraṃ gate
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0175: tad yoṣitāṃ tu dīrghāyo nāsti doṣo vyatikrame
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0176: bhagastīrthāntare śuddho viṣṇos tu vacanād iha
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0178: āsāṃ śuddhau viśeṣeṇa karmaṇāṃ phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0179: naitā vācyā na vai vadhyā na kleśyāḥ śubham icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0181: māsi māsi rajas tāsāṃ duṣkṛtāny apakarṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0182: striyas toṣakarā nṝṇāṃ striyas tuṣṭipradāḥ sadā mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0184: śrutaṃ balaṃ prabhāvaś ca yoṣitāṃ munisattama nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0188: vṛddhāṃ vandhyāṃ suvratāṃ ca mṛtāpatyām apuṣpiṇīm
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0189: kanyāṃ ca bahuputrāṃ ca varjayan mucyate bhayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0190: vyādhito bandhanastho vā pravāseṣv atha parvasu
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0192: veśanārīṣu vai jātāḥ parapreṣyāsu vā sutāḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0193: kasya te bandhudāyādā bhavanti hi mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0194: paṇyastrīṣu prasūtā ye yasya strī tasya te sutāḥ 13,022.019d@007A_0195
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0195: krayāc ca kṛtrimāḥ putrāḥ pradānāc caiva datrimāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0197: atra cāhitagarbhāyāḥ kasya putraṃ vadanti tam nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0199: ṛtau tasya bhaved garbho yaṃ vā nārī na śaṅkate
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0201: aprasūtāṃ prasūtāṃ vā teṣāṃ pṛcchāmi niṣkṛtim
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0203: ātmavaṃśaḥ svadharmo vā tyajato niṣkṛtir na tu
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0204: yo naras tyajate bhāryāṃ puṣpiṇīm aprasūtikām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0205: sa naṣṭavaṃśaḥ pitṛbhir yuktas tyajyeta daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0208: evaṃ hi bhāryāṃ tyajatāṃ narāṇāṃ nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0210: kīdṛśīṃ saṃtyajan bhāryāṃ naro doṣair na lipyate nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0216: pātake 'pi tu bhartavyau dvau tu mātā pitā tathā mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0218: kathaṃ dharmo 'py adharmo vā bhavatīha mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0219: anṛte 'pi hi satye vā yo nārīṃ dūṣitāṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0220: arakṣamāṇaḥ svāṃ bhāryāṃ naro bhavati bhrūṇahā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0222: lolendriyeti sā rakṣyā na saṃtyājyā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0227: evaṃ nāryo na duṣyanti vyabhicāre 'pi bhartṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0228: māsi māsi bhavet tyāgas tataḥ śuddhā bhavanty uta 13,022.019d@007A_0228
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0229: kāni tīrthāni bhagavan nṛṇāṃ dehāśritāni vai
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0230: tāni vai śaṃsa bhagavan yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0231: sarvatīrtheṣu tīrthajña kiṃ tīrthaṃ paramaṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0234: nṛṇāṃ tīrthāni pañcāhuḥ pāṇau saṃnihitāni vai
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0235: ādyatīrthaṃ tu tīrthānāṃ vaiṣṇavo bhāga ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0239: yāsām abhigraho nāsti tā me kathaya nārada nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0240: vāgur veśyā naṭī gopī tāntukī tunnavāyikī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0242: etāsu jātā nārīṣu sarvavarṇeṣu ye sutāḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0244: ya etāḥ parigṛhṇanti teṣām eva hi te sutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0245: sarvatra tu pravṛttāsu bījaṃ naśyati dehinām mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0248: niyuktā havyakavyeṣu teṣāṃ dattaṃ kathaṃ bhavet nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0250: vrātyeṣv annapradānaṃ tad yathā śūdreṣu vai tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0251: dharmeṣv adhikṛtānāṃ tu narāṇāṃ muhyate manaḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0252: kathaṃ nu vighno bhavati etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0253: arthāś ca nāryaś ca samānam etac
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0257: havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca dharmātmā sarvaṃ tac chrotriyo 'rhati mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0258: dattaṃ hi śrotriye sādhau jvalitāgnāv ivāhutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0260: hitvā kasmāt trayīṃ vidyāṃ vārtāṃ vṛttim upāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0263: ye cānye śrotriyāj jātāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ putragṛdhnubhiḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0266: asaṃskāro vaidikaś ca na mānyaḥ śrotriyātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0267: śuddhānvayaḥ śrotriyas tu sa vidvadbhiḥ samo 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0271: tasmāt teṣv eva te jātāḥ sādhavaḥ kuladhāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0272: svayaṃ krītāsu preṣyāsu prasūyante tu ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0273: kasya nāryaḥ sutāś caiva bhavanti ṛṣisattama nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0274: svadāsyāṃ yo naro mohāt prasūyeta sa pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0275: ihāpi ninditaḥ pretya apatyaṃ preṣyatāṃ nayet
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0276: sā tasya bhāryā putrā ye havyakavyapradās tu te
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0277: tasyā ye bāndhavāḥ ke cid viṣaktāḥ preṣyatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0278: sarve tasyās tu saṃbandhān mucyante preṣyakarmasu
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0279: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yad abhivyāhṛtaṃ tvayā mārkaṇḍeyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:022.019d-007A_0280: atha vā saṃśayaḥ kaś cid bhūyaḥ saṃpraṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:023.001a: kim āhur bharataśreṣṭha pātraṃ viprāḥ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.001c: brāhmaṇaṃ liṅginaṃ caiva brāhmaṇaṃ vāpy aliṅginam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.002c: deyam āhur mahārāja ubhāv etau tapasvinau
GE07mbh_13_u:023.003a: śraddhayā parayā pūto yaḥ prayacched dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:023.003c: havyaṃ kavyaṃ tathā dānaṃ ko doṣaḥ syāt pitāmaha bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.003d-0204_01: brāhmaṇāḥ pātrabhūtāś ca śuddhā naivaṃ pitṛṣv iha
GE07mbh_13_u:023.004a: śraddhāpūto naras tāta durdānto 'pi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.004c: pūto bhavati sarvatra kiṃ punas tvaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:023.005a: na brāhmaṇaṃ parīkṣeta daiveṣu satataṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.005c: kavyapradāne tu budhāḥ parīkṣyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.006a: na brāhmaṇaḥ sādhayate havyaṃ daivāt prasidhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:023.007c: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ purā prāha iha lokeṣu buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:023.008a: apūrvo 'py atha vā vidvān saṃbandhī vātha yo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:023.008c: tapasvī yajñaśīlo vā kathaṃ pātraṃ bhavet tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.009a: kulīnaḥ karmakṛd vaidyas tathā cāpy ānṛśaṃsyavān
GE07mbh_13_u:023.009c: hrīmān ṛjuḥ satyavādī pātraṃ pūrve ca te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.010a: tatredaṃ śṛṇu me pārtha caturṇāṃ tejasāṃ matam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.011a: yathā mahārṇave kṣiptaḥ kṣipraṃ loṣṭo vinaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:023.011c: tathā duścaritaṃ sarvaṃ trayy āvṛttyā vinaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:023.012a: sarve ca vedāḥ saha ṣaḍbhir aṅgaiḥ; sāṃkhyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca kule ca janma
GE07mbh_13_u:023.012c: naitāni sarvāṇi gatir bhavanti; śīlavyapetasya narasya rājan
GE07mbh_13_u:023.013a: adhīyānaḥ paṇḍitaṃ manyamāno; yo vidyayā hanti yaśaḥ pareṣām
GE07mbh_13_u:023.013c: brahman sa tenācarate brahmahatyāṃ; lokās tasya hy antavanto bhavanti
GE07mbh_13_u:023.014a: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.015a: ity uktvā te jagmur āśu catvāro 'mitatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.015c: pṛthivī kāśyapo 'gniś ca prakṛṣṭāyuś ca bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.016a: yad idaṃ brāhmaṇā loke vratino bhuñjate haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.016c: bhuktaṃ brāhmaṇakāmāya kathaṃ tat sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:023.018c: kiṃ niścitaṃ bhavet tatra tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:023.019a: ahiṃsā satyam akrodha ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:023.020a: ye tu dharmaṃ praśaṃsantaś caranti pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_13_u:023.020c: anācarantas tad dharmaṃ saṃkare niratāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:023.021a: tebhyo ratnaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā gām aśvān vā dadāti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.021c: daśa varṣāṇi viṣṭhāṃ sa bhuṅkte nirayam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.023a: vaiśvadevaṃ ca ye mūḍhā viprāya brahmacāriṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:023.023c: dadatīha na rājendra te lokān bhuñjate 'śubhān
GE07mbh_13_u:023.024a: kiṃ paraṃ brahmacaryasya kiṃ paraṃ dharmalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.024c: kiṃ ca śreṣṭhatamaṃ śaucaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:023.025c: maryādāyāṃ sthito dharmaḥ śamaḥ śaucasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.026a: kasmin kāle cared dharmaṃ kasmin kāle 'rtham ācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:023.026c: kasmin kāle sukhī ca syāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:023.027a: kālyam arthaṃ niṣeveta tato dharmam anantaram
GE07mbh_13_u:023.027c: paścāt kāmaṃ niṣeveta na ca gacchet prasaṅgitām
GE07mbh_13_u:023.029a: adhikāre yad anṛtaṃ rājagāmi ca paiśunam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.030a: praharen na narendreṣu na gāṃ hanyāt tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:023.031a: nāgniṃ parityajej jātu na ca vedān parityajet
GE07mbh_13_u:023.031c: na ca brāhmaṇam ākrośet samaṃ tad brahmahatyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:023.032a: kīdṛśāḥ sādhavo viprāḥ kebhyo dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.032c: kīdṛśānāṃ ca bhoktavyaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:023.033c: tādṛśāḥ sādhavo viprās tebhyo dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.035c: svakarmaniratā ye ca tebhyo dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.036a: sāṅgāṃś ca caturo vedān yo 'dhīyīta dvijarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.036c: ṣaḍbhyo nivṛttaḥ karmabhyas taṃ pātram ṛṣayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:023.037a: ye tv evaṃguṇajātīyās tebhyo dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:023.039a: gām aśvaṃ vittam annaṃ vā tadvidhe pratipādayet
GE07mbh_13_u:023.039c: dravyāṇi cānyāni tathā pretyabhāve na śocati
GE07mbh_13_u:023.040c: kim aṅga punar ekaṃ vai tasmāt pātraṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:023.040d-0206_01: tṛpte tṛptāḥ sarvadevāḥ pitaro munayo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:024.001a: śrāddhakāle ca daive ca dharme cāpi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.002a: daivaṃ pūrvāhṇike kuryād aparāhṇe tu paitṛkam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.003c: kālahīnaṃ tu yad dānaṃ taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.004a: laṅghitaṃ cāvalīḍhaṃ ca kalipūrvaṃ ca yat kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.004c: rajasvalābhir dṛṣṭaṃ ca taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.005a: avaghuṣṭaṃ ca yad bhuktam avratena ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.005c: parāmṛṣṭaṃ śunā caiva taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.006c: ruditaṃ cāvadhūtaṃ ca taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.007a: niroṃkāreṇa yad bhuktaṃ saśastreṇa ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.007c: durātmanā ca yad bhuktaṃ taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.008a: parocchiṣṭaṃ ca yad bhuktaṃ paribhuktaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:024.008c: daive pitrye ca satataṃ taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.009c: daivaṃ vāpy atha vā paitryaṃ taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.010c: tribhir varṇair naraśreṣṭha taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.011a: ājyāhutiṃ vinā caiva yat kiṃ cit pariviṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:024.011c: durācāraiś ca yad bhuktaṃ taṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣasāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.012a: ye bhāgā rakṣasāṃ proktās ta uktā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.012c: ata ūrdhvaṃ visargasya parīkṣāṃ brāhmaṇe śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:024.013a: yāvantaḥ patitā viprā jaḍonmattās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:024.013c: daive vāpy atha vā pitrye rājan nārhanti ketanam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.014a: śvitrī kuṣṭhī ca klībaś ca tathā yakṣmahataś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.014c: apasmārī ca yaś cāndho rājan nārhanti satkṛtim
GE07mbh_13_u:024.016a: gāyanā nartakāś caiva plavakā vādakās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:024.016c: kathakā yodhakāś caiva rājan nārhanti ketanam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.017c: tathā vṛṣalaśiṣyāś ca rājan nārhanti ketanam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.018a: anuyoktā ca yo vipro anuyuktaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.018c: nārhatas tāv api śrāddhaṃ brahmavikrayiṇau hi tau
GE07mbh_13_u:024.020a: anagnayaś ca ye viprā mṛtaniryātakāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:024.020c: stenāś ca patitāś caiva rājan nārhanti ketanam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.022a: ṛṇakartā ca yo rājan yaś ca vārdhuṣiko dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.023c: ajapā brāhmaṇāś caiva śrāddhe nārhanti ketanam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.024a: śrāddhe daive ca nirdiṣṭā brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.025a: cīrṇavratā guṇair yuktā bhaveyur ye 'pi karṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.026a: kṣātradharmiṇam apy ājau ketayet kulajaṃ dvijam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.026c: na tv eva vaṇijaṃ tāta śrāddheṣu parikalpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:024.027a: agnihotrī ca yo vipro grāmavāsī ca yo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:024.027c: astenaś cātithijñaś ca sa rājan ketanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.028a: sāvitrīṃ japate yas tu trikālaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.028c: bhikṣāvṛttiḥ kriyāvāṃś ca sa rājan ketanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.028d-0208_01: mātā pātraṃ pitā pātraṃ pātraṃ kṣīṇāś ca bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.028d-0208_02: dīnaḥ pātraṃ vratī pātraṃ pātraṃ vṛttair alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.029c: ahiṃsraś cālpadoṣaś ca sa rājan ketanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.030a: akalkako hy atarkaś ca brāhmaṇo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.030c: sasaṃjño bhaikṣyavṛttiś ca sa rājan ketanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.031a: avratī kitavaḥ stenaḥ prāṇivikrayy atho vaṇik
GE07mbh_13_u:024.031c: paścāc ca pītavān somaṃ sa rājan ketanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.032c: bhavet sarvātithiḥ paścāt sa rājan ketanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.033c: adeyaṃ pitṛdevebhyo yac ca klaibyād upārjitam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.034c: na vyāharati yad yuktaṃ tasyādharmo gavānṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.035a: śrāddhasya brāhmaṇaḥ kālaḥ prāptaṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:024.035c: somakṣayaś ca māṃsaṃ ca yad āraṇyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.035d-0209_01: muhūrtānāṃ trayaṃ pūrvam ahnaḥ prātar iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.035d-0209_04: laukikaṃ saṃgave 'rdhaṃ ca snānādi hy atha madhyame
GE07mbh_13_u:024.035d-0209_05: caturtham aparāhṇaṃ tu trimuhūrtaṃ tu pitryakam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.035d-0209_06: sāyāhnas trimuhūrtaṃ ca madhyamaṃ kavibhiḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.035d-0209_07: caturthe tv aparāhṇākhye śrāddhaṃ kuryāt sadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:024.036a: śrāddhāpavarge viprasya svadhā vai svaditā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:024.036c: kṣatriyasyāpy atho brūyāt prīyantāṃ pitaras tv iti
GE07mbh_13_u:024.038d-0210_03: nānyatra brāhmaṇo brūyāt pūrvaṃ vipreṇa ketitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.038d-0210_04: abhojane ca doṣaḥ syād varjayec chūdraketanam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.038d-0210_07: na pūrvaṃ laṅghayel lobhād ekavarṇo 'pi pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:024.038e: vaiśyasya caiva vaktavyaṃ prīyantāṃ devatā iti
GE07mbh_13_u:024.039e: brahmakṣatre hi mantroktā vaiśyasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.040c: bālvajīty eva vaiśyasya dharma eṣa yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.040d-0211_01: pālāśo dvijadaṇḍaḥ syād aśvatthaḥ kṣatriyasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:024.040d-0211_02: audumbaraś ca vaiśyasya dharma eṣa yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.041a: dātuḥ pratigrahītuś ca dharmādharmāv imau śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:024.042c: yavīyān paśuhiṃsāyāṃ tulyadharmo bhavet sa hi
GE07mbh_13_u:024.043a: atha rājanyavaiśyābhyāṃ yady aśnīyāt tu ketitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.044a: daivaṃ vāpy atha vā pitryaṃ yo 'śnīyād brāhmaṇādiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:024.046a: annenānnaṃ ca yo lipset karmārthaṃ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.048a: pitryaṃ vāpy atha vā daivaṃ dīyate yat pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.048c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ dattaṃ yeṣu mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.049a: yeṣāṃ dārāḥ pratīkṣante suvṛṣṭim iva karṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.051c: arthinaś ca bhavanty arthe teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.052a: taskarebhyaḥ parebhyo vā ye bhayārtā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.052c: arthino bhoktum icchanti teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.053c: baṭavo yasya bhikṣanti tebhyo dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.054a: hṛtasvā hṛtadārāś ca ye viprā deśasaṃplave
GE07mbh_13_u:024.055a: vratino niyamasthāś ca ye viprāḥ śrutasaṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.056d-0212_02: niveśārthaṃ ca vidvāṃsas teṣāṃ dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.056d-0212_03: pitroś ca rakṣaṇārthāya putradārārtham eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:024.056d-0212_05: bālāḥ striyaś ca vāñchanti subhaktaṃ cāpy asādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.056d-0212_06: svargam āyānti dattvaiṣāṃ nirayān nopayānti te
GE07mbh_13_u:024.057c: spṛhayanti ca bhuktānnaṃ teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.058a: tapasvinas taponiṣṭhās teṣāṃ bhaikṣacarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:024.058c: arthinaḥ kiṃ cid icchanti teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:024.059c: nirayaṃ yena gacchanti svargaṃ caiva hi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:024.060c: ye 'nṛtaṃ kathayanti sma te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.062c: sūcakāś ca pareṣāṃ ye te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.063a: prapāṇāṃ ca sabhānāṃ ca saṃkramāṇāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.064a: anāthāṃ pramadāṃ bālāṃ vṛddhāṃ bhītāṃ tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:024.064c: vañcayanti narā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.066c: akṛtajñāś ca mitrāṇāṃ te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.067a: pāṣaṇḍā dūṣakāś caiva samayānāṃ ca dūṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.067c: ye pratyavasitāś caiva te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.067d-0213_02: lābheṣu viṣamāś caiva te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.068c: bhedair ye vyapakarṣanti te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.069a: paryaśnanti ca ye dārān agnibhṛtyātithīṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:024.070c: vedānāṃ lekhakāś caiva te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.071a: cāturāśramyabāhyāś ca śrutibāhyāś ca ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.071c: vikarmabhiś ca jīvanti te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.073a: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva kanyānāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.073c: ye 'ntaraṃ yānti kāryeṣu te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.074c: śalyānāṃ dhanuṣāṃ caiva te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.075a: śalyair vā śaṅkubhir vāpi śvabhrair vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.075c: ye mārgam anurundhanti te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.076a: upādhyāyāṃś ca bhṛtyāṃś ca bhaktāṃś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.076c: ye tyajanty asamarthāṃs tāṃs te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.077c: bandhakāś ca paśūnāṃ ye te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.078c: samarthāś cāpy adātāras te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.078d-0214_03: kṣamiṇāṃ nindakāś caiva te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.079a: kṣāntān dāntāṃs tathā prājñān dīrghakālaṃ sahoṣitān
GE07mbh_13_u:024.079c: tyajanti kṛtakṛtyā ye te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.080a: bālānām atha vṛddhānāṃ dāsānāṃ caiva ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.080c: adattvā bhakṣayanty agre te vai nirayagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.082a: sarveṣv eva tu kāryeṣu daivapūrveṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.082c: hanti putrān paśūn kṛtsnān brāhmaṇātikramaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.083a: dānena tapasā caiva satyena ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.083c: ye dharmam anuvartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.084a: śuśrūṣābhis tapobhiś ca śrutam ādāya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.086a: kṣamāvantaś ca dhīrāś ca dharmakāryeṣu cotthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.087c: nivṛttāś caiva madyebhyas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.088a: āśramāṇāṃ ca kartāraḥ kulānāṃ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.088c: deśānāṃ nagarāṇāṃ ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.089c: kuṭumbānāṃ ca dātāras te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.090a: sarvahiṃsānivṛttāś ca narāḥ sarvasahāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:024.091c: bhrātṝṇāṃ caiva sasnehās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.092a: āḍhyāś ca balavantaś ca yauvanasthāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.092c: ye vai jitendriyā dhīrās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.095a: suvarṇasya ca dātāro gavāṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:024.095c: yānānāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.096c: dātāro vāsasāṃ caiva te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ vihārāvasathodyānakūpārāmasabhāpradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.097c: vaprāṇāṃ caiva kartāras te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.097d-0215_02: ye vai svaśaktitaḥ kuryus te vai nirayaśatravaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.098c: dātāraḥ prārthitānāṃ ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.099a: rasānām atha bījānāṃ dhānyānāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:024.100a: yasmin kasmin kule jātā bahuputrāḥ śatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.100d-0216_02: iṣṭāpūrtaratā ye ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:024.101a: etad uktam amutrārthaṃ daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:024.101c: dharmādharmau ca dānasya yathā pūrvarṣibhiḥ kṛtau
GE07mbh_13_u:025.001a: idaṃ me tattvato rājan vaktum arhasi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:025.002a: vyāsam āmantrya rājendra purā yat pṛṣṭavān aham
GE07mbh_13_u:025.002c: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:025.003a: caturthas tvaṃ vasiṣṭhasya tattvam ākhyāhi me mune
GE07mbh_13_u:025.005c: brūyān nāstīti yaḥ paścāt taṃ vidyād brahmaghātinam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.006c: vṛttiṃ harati durbuddhis taṃ vidyād brahmaghātinam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.007c: utpādayati yo vighnaṃ taṃ vidyād brahmaghātinam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.008a: yaḥ pravṛttāṃ śrutiṃ samyak śāstraṃ vā munibhiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.009c: na prayacchati yaḥ kanyāṃ taṃ vidyād brahmaghātinam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.010a: adharmanirato mūḍho mithyā yo vai dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:025.010b-0218_01: brāhmaṇena ca tat kuryāt taṃ vidyād brahmaghātakam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.010c: dadyān marmātigaṃ śokaṃ taṃ vidyād brahmaghātinam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.011c: hareta yo vai sarvasvaṃ taṃ vidyād brahmaghātinam
GE07mbh_13_u:025.012a: āśrame vā vane vā yo grāme vā yadi vā pure
GE07mbh_13_u:025.012c: agniṃ samutsṛjen mohāt taṃ vidyād brahmaghātinam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.001a: tīrthānāṃ darśanaṃ śreyaḥ snānaṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:026.001c: śravaṇaṃ ca mahāprājña śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.002c: vaktum arhasi me tāni śrotāsmi niyataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:026.003c: śrotum arhasi bhadraṃ te prāpsyase dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.005a: asti me bhagavan kaś cit tīrthebhyo dharmasaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.005c: tat sarvaṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me śaṃsa mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:026.006a: upaspṛśya phalaṃ kiṃ syāt teṣu tīrtheṣu vai mune
GE07mbh_13_u:026.006c: pretyabhāve mahāprājña tad yathāsti tathā vada
GE07mbh_13_u:026.007c: vigāhya vai nirāhāro nirmamo munivad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:026.008c: tā nadīḥ sindhum āsādya śīlavān svargam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:026.008d-0219_01: sindhum āsādya vimalāṃ vigāhya svargam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:026.009a: puṣkaraṃ ca prabhāsaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ sāgarodakam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.009c: devikām indramārgaṃ ca svarṇabinduṃ vigāhya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:026.010c: kuśeśayaṃ ca devatvaṃ pūyate tasya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.012c: tathā kanakhale snātvā dhūtapāpmā divaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:026.014a: yatra bhāgīrathī gaṅgā bhajate diśam uttarām
GE07mbh_13_u:026.014c: maheśvarasya niṣṭhāne yo naras tv abhiṣicyate
GE07mbh_13_u:026.015a: saptagaṅge trigaṅge ca indramārge ca tarpayan
GE07mbh_13_u:026.015c: sudhāṃ vai labhate bhoktuṃ yo naro jāyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.016c: ekamāsaṃ nirāhāraḥ siddhiṃ māsena sa vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:026.018c: deveṣu kīrtiṃ labhate yaśasā ca virājate
GE07mbh_13_u:026.019c: aśvibhyāṃ rūpavarcasyaṃ pretya vai labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.020c: pakṣam ekaṃ nirāhāraḥ svargam āpnoti nirmalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.023a: āśrame kṛttikānāṃ tu snātvā yas tarpayet pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:026.024c: trasānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca dvipadānāṃ bhayaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_13_u:026.024d-0220_01: na kva cid bhayam āpnoti sarvatra labhate śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:026.028a: śyāmāyās tv āśramaṃ gatvā uṣya caivābhiṣicya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:026.028c: trīṃs trirātrān sa saṃdhāya gandharvanagare vaset
GE07mbh_13_u:026.029a: ramaṇyāṃ ca upaspṛśya tathā vai gandhatārike
GE07mbh_13_u:026.031c: vigāhati hy anālambam andhakaṃ vai sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.036c: snātvā tu bharataśreṣṭha nirmalaḥ svargam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:026.037c: vaivasvatasya tīrthe ca tīrthabhūto bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.041a: kalaśyāṃ vāpy upaspṛśya vedyāṃ ca bahuśojalām
GE07mbh_13_u:026.041c: agneḥ pure naraḥ snātvā viśālāyāṃ kṛtodakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.042a: purāpavartanaṃ nandāṃ mahānandāṃ ca sevya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:026.042c: nandane sevyate dāntas tv apsarobhir ahiṃsakaḥ
