GE07mbh_13_u:026.046a: vindhye saṃtāpya cātmānaṃ satyasaṃdhas tv ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.050a: vaivasvatasya sadanaṃ na sa gacchet kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:026.050c: yasya kanyāhrade vāso devalokaṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:026.051c: sidhyate 'tra mahābāho yo naro jāyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.056a: maināke parvate snātvā tathā saṃdhyām upāsya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:026.056c: kāmaṃ jitvā ca vai māsaṃ sarvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:026.056d-0225_03: nandīśvarasya mūrtiṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mucyeta kilbiṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.056d-0225_04: svargamārge naraḥ snātvā svargalokaṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:026.057d-0226_01: darśanād gamanāt pūto bhaved anaśanād api
GE07mbh_13_u:026.058c: adhruvaṃ jīvitaṃ jñātvā yo vai vedāntago dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:026.059a: abhyarcya devatās tatra namaskṛtya munīṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:026.059c: tataḥ siddho divaṃ gacched brahmalokaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.060a: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca yo jitvā tīrtham āvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:026.060c: na tena kiṃ cin na prāptaṃ tīrthābhigamanād bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:026.061a: yāny agamyāni tīrthāni durgāṇi viṣamāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:026.062a: idaṃ medhyam idaṃ dhanyam idaṃ svargyam idaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:026.062c: idaṃ rahasyaṃ devānām āplāvyānāṃ ca pāvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.063a: idaṃ dadyād dvijātīnāṃ sādhūnām ātmajasya vā
GE07mbh_13_u:026.063c: suhṛdāṃ ca japet karṇe śiṣyasyānugatasya vā
GE07mbh_13_u:026.065c: japaṃś cābhyutthitaḥ śaśvan nirmalaḥ svargam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:026.066a: idaṃ yaś cāpi śṛṇuyād rahasyaṃ tv aṅgiromatam
GE07mbh_13_u:026.066c: uttame ca kule janma labhej jātiṃ ca saṃsmaret
GE07mbh_13_u:027.004a: atrir vasiṣṭho 'tha bhṛguḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.005c: uśanā bṛhaspatir vyāsaś cyavanaḥ kāśyapo dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.006c: bharadvājaś ca raibhyaś ca yavakrītas tritas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.007a: sthūlākṣaḥ śakalākṣaś ca kaṇvo medhātithiḥ kṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.008c: jāmadagnyas tathā rāmaḥ kāmyaś cety evamādayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.010a: te pūjitāḥ sukhāsīnāḥ kathāś cakrur maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.011a: bhīṣmas teṣāṃ kathāḥ śrutvā ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.011c: mene divistham ātmānaṃ tuṣṭyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.012a: tatas te bhīṣmam āmantrya pāṇḍavāṃś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.012c: antardhānaṃ gatāḥ sarve sarveṣām eva paśyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.013c: pāṇḍavās tuṣṭuvuḥ sarve praṇemuś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.015a: prabhāvāt tapasas teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ vīkṣya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.015c: prakāśanto diśaḥ sarvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.016a: mahābhāgyaṃ paraṃ teṣām ṛṣīṇām anucintya te
GE07mbh_13_u:027.016c: pāṇḍavāḥ saha bhīṣmeṇa kathāś cakrus tadāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.017a: kathānte śirasā pādau spṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.018a: ke deśāḥ ke janapadā āśramāḥ ke ca parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.018c: prakṛṣṭāḥ puṇyataḥ kāś ca jñeyā nadyaḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:027.020a: imāṃ kaś cit parikramya pṛthivīṃ śailabhūṣitām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.021a: śilavṛtter gṛhaṃ prāptaḥ sa tena vidhinārcitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.021b-0227_01: uvāsa rajanīṃ tatra susukhaṃ sukhabhāg ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.021b-0227_02: śilavṛttis tu yat kṛtyaṃ prātas tat kṛtavāñ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.021c: kṛtakṛtya upātiṣṭhat siddhaṃ tam atithiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.022a: tau sametya mahātmānau sukhāsīnau kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.023a: śilavṛttiḥ kathānte tu siddham āmantrya yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.023c: praśnaṃ papraccha medhāvī yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:027.024a: ke deśāḥ ke janapadāḥ ke ''śramāḥ ke ca parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.024c: prakṛṣṭāḥ puṇyataḥ kāś ca jñeyā nadyas tad ucyatām siddha uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.024d-0228_01: puṣkaraṃ ca prabhāsaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ himavān giriḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.024d-0228_02: gaṅgā ca yamunā caiva vedikā mathurā gayā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.024d-0228_03: sarasvatyāruṇā caiva kurukṣetraṃ pṛthūdakam śilavṛttir uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.024d-0228_05: bālyāt prabhṛti viprendra bhaktiḥ kautukam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.024d-0228_06: māhātmyaṃ prati viprendra gaṅgāyā mama tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.025a: te deśās te janapadās te ''śramās te ca parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.026a: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñais tyāgena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.026c: gatiṃ tāṃ na labhej jantur gaṅgāṃ saṃsevya yāṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.027a: spṛṣṭāni yeṣāṃ gāṅgeyais toyair gātrāṇi dehinām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.027c: nyastāni na punas teṣāṃ tyāgaḥ svargād vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:027.027d-0229_01: tyaktāni yāni vai yeṣāṃ tyāgāt svargo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:027.028a: sarvāṇi yeṣāṃ gāṅgeyais toyaiḥ kṛtyāni dehinām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.028b-0230_01: ye vā yathāvidhi snātā gaṅgāyāṃ sāghamarṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.028c: gāṃ tyaktvā mānavā vipra divi tiṣṭhanti te 'calāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.029a: pūrve vayasi karmāṇi kṛtvā pāpāni ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.029c: paścād gaṅgāṃ niṣevante te 'pi yānty uttamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:027.029d-0231_01: yuktāś ca pātakais tyaktvā dehaṃ śuddhā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:027.030c: vyuṣṭir bhavati yā puṃsāṃ na sā kratuśatair api
GE07mbh_13_u:027.032a: apahatya tamas tīvraṃ yathā bhāty udaye raviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.033a: visomā iva śarvaryo vipuṣpās taravo yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.033c: tadvad deśā diśaś caiva hīnā gaṅgājalaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.034c: kratavaś ca yathāsomās tathā gaṅgāṃ vinā jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:027.035a: yathā hīnaṃ nabho 'rkeṇa bhūḥ śailaiḥ khaṃ ca vāyunā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.035c: tathā deśā diśaś caiva gaṅgāhīnā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.036a: triṣu lokeṣu ye ke cit prāṇinaḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_13_u:027.036c: tarpyamāṇāḥ parāṃ tṛptiṃ yānti gaṅgājalaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.036d-0232_01: anye ca devā munayaḥ pretāni pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:027.036d-0232_02: tarpitās tṛptim āyānti triṣu lokeṣu sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.037a: yas tu sūryeṇa niṣṭaptaṃ gāṅgeyaṃ pibate jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.038c: pibed yaś cāpi gaṅgāmbhaḥ samau syātāṃ na vā samau
GE07mbh_13_u:027.039a: tiṣṭhed yugasahasraṃ tu pādenaikena yaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_13_u:027.039c: māsam ekaṃ tu gaṅgāyāṃ samau syātāṃ na vā samau
GE07mbh_13_u:027.040a: lambetāvākśirā yas tu yugānām ayutaṃ pumān
GE07mbh_13_u:027.040c: tiṣṭhed yatheṣṭaṃ yaś cāpi gaṅgāyāṃ sa viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:027.040d-0233_01: saṃvatsaraṃ jale vāsaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ tatsamaṃ matam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.041a: agnau prāptaṃ pradhūyeta yathā tūlaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:027.042d-0234_01: gaṅgā gaṅgeti yo brūyād yojanānāṃ śatair api
GE07mbh_13_u:027.042d-0234_03: prāyaścittāni dīyante yatra gaṅgā na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:027.042d-0234_04: gaṅgā ca vidyate yatra prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.042d-0234_05: darśanāj jāyate śuddhiḥ snānena paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.042d-0234_07: grāme vā yadi vāraṇye puṇyā sarvatra narmadā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.043a: bhavanti nirviṣāḥ sarpā yathā tārkṣyasya darśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:027.044a: apratiṣṭhāś ca ye ke cid adharmaśaraṇāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:027.044c: teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhā gaṅgeha śaraṇaṃ śarma varma ca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.045c: patato narake gaṅgā saṃśritān pretya tārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.046a: te saṃvibhaktā munibhir nūnaṃ devaiḥ savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.047c: te bhavanti śivā vipra ye vai gaṅgāṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.047d-0235_01: gaṅgām upāśritā ye vai śivās te 'pi bhavanty api
GE07mbh_13_u:027.048a: yathā surāṇām amṛtaṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca yathā svadhā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.048c: sudhā yathā ca nāgānāṃ tathā gaṅgājalaṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.049d-0236_01: upajīvyā yathā dhenur lokānāṃ brāhmam eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.049d-0236_02: haviṣāṃ ca yathā somas taraṇeṣu tathākṣayam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.050a: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ yathā sthānaṃ sarveṣāṃ śreṣṭham ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:027.050c: snātānāṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhā gaṅgā tadvad ihocyate
GE07mbh_13_u:027.055a: gaṅgormibhir atho digdhaḥ puruṣaṃ pavano yadā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.055d-0237_01: tathā spṛśan so 'sya pāpaṃ sarvam eva prakarṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:027.057a: haṃsārāvaiḥ kokaravai ravair anyaiś ca pakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.057c: paspardha gaṅgā gandharvān pulinaiś ca śiloccayān
GE07mbh_13_u:027.059a: na sā prītir diviṣṭhasya sarvakāmān upāśnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.059c: abhavad yā parā prītir gaṅgāyāḥ puline nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.060a: vāṅmanaḥkarmajair grastaḥ pāpair api pumān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:027.060c: vīkṣya gaṅgāṃ bhavet pūtas tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.061a: saptāvarān sapta parān pitṝṃs tebhyaś ca ye pare
GE07mbh_13_u:027.061c: pumāṃs tārayate gaṅgāṃ vīkṣya spṛṣṭvāvagāhya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.062c: gaṅgā tārayate nṝṇām ubhau vaṃśau viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.062d-0239_03: sāyaṃ prātaḥ smared gaṅgāṃ nityaṃ snāne tu kīrtayet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.063a: darśanāt sparśanāt pānāt tathā gaṅgeti kīrtanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:027.064a: ya icchet saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ śrutam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.064c: sa pitṝṃs tarpayed gaṅgām abhigamya surāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.065a: na sutair na ca vittena karmaṇā na ca tat phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.065c: prāpnuyāt puruṣo 'tyantaṃ gaṅgāṃ prāpya yad āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:027.066a: jātyandhair iha tulyās te mṛtaiḥ paṅgubhir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.066c: samarthā ye na paśyanti gaṅgāṃ puṇyajalāṃ śivām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.067c: devaiḥ sendraiś ca ko gaṅgāṃ nopaseveta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.068c: vidyāvadbhiḥ śritāṃ gaṅgāṃ pumān ko nāma nāśrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.069a: utkrāmadbhiś ca yaḥ prāṇaiḥ prayataḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.069c: cintayen manasā gaṅgāṃ sa gatiṃ paramāṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.070a: na bhayebhyo bhayaṃ tasya na pāpebhyo na rājataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.070c: ā dehapatanād gaṅgām upāste yaḥ pumān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:027.071a: gaganād yāṃ mahāpuṇyāṃ patantīṃ vai maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.071c: dadhāra śirasā devīṃ tām eva divi sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:027.072a: alaṃkṛtās trayo lokāḥ pathibhir vimalais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.072c: yas tu tasyā jalaṃ sevet kṛtakṛtyaḥ pumān bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.073a: divi jyotir yathādityaḥ pitṝṇāṃ caiva candramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.073c: deveśaś ca yathā nṝṇāṃ gaṅgeha saritāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.074a: mātrā pitrā sutair dārair viyuktasya dhanena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.074c: na bhaved dhi tathā duḥkhaṃ yathā gaṅgāviyogajam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.075a: nāraṇyair neṣṭaviṣayair na sutair na dhanāgamaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.075c: tathā prasādo bhavati gaṅgāṃ vīkṣya yathā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.076a: pūrṇam induṃ yathā dṛṣṭvā nṛṇāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati
GE07mbh_13_u:027.076c: gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā dṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati
GE07mbh_13_u:027.077c: gaṅgāṃ yo 'nugato bhaktyā sa tasyāḥ priyatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:027.078a: bhūḥsthaiḥ khasthair diviṣṭhaiś ca bhūtair uccāvacair api
GE07mbh_13_u:027.078c: gaṅgā vigāhyā satatam etat kāryatamaṃ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.079a: triṣu lokeṣu puṇyatvād gaṅgāyāḥ prathitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.079b-0240_01: durmṛtān anapatyāṃś ca sā mṛtān anayad divam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.079c: yat putrān sagarasyaiṣā bhasmākhyān anayad divam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.081a: payasvinīṃ ghṛtinīm atyudārāṃ; samṛddhinīṃ veginīṃ durvigāhyām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.081c: gaṅgāṃ gatvā yaiḥ śarīraṃ visṛṣṭaṃ; gatā dhīrās te vibudhaiḥ samatvam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.082a: andhāñ jaḍān dravyahīnāṃś ca gaṅgā; yaśasvinī bṛhatī viśvarūpā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.082c: devaiḥ sendrair munibhir mānavaiś ca; niṣevitā sarvakāmair yunakti
GE07mbh_13_u:027.083c: trilokagoptrīṃ ye gaṅgāṃ saṃśritās te divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.084a: yo vatsyati drakṣyati vāpi martyas; tasmai prayacchanti sukhāni devāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.084c: tadbhāvitāḥ sparśane darśane yas; tasmai devā gatim iṣṭāṃ diśanti
GE07mbh_13_u:027.085a: dakṣāṃ pṛthvīṃ bṛhatīṃ viprakṛṣṭāṃ; śivām ṛtāṃ surasāṃ suprasannām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.085c: vibhāvarīṃ sarvabhūtapratiṣṭhāṃ; gaṅgāṃ gatā ye tridivaṃ gatās te
GE07mbh_13_u:027.086a: khyātir yasyāḥ khaṃ divaṃ gāṃ ca nityaṃ; purā diśo vidiśaś cāvatasthe
GE07mbh_13_u:027.086c: tasyā jalaṃ sevya saridvarāyā; martyāḥ sarve kṛtakṛtyā bhavanti
GE07mbh_13_u:027.087a: iyaṃ gaṅgeti niyataṃ pratiṣṭhā; guhasya rukmasya ca garbhayoṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.087c: prātas trimārgā ghṛtavahā vipāpmā; gaṅgāvatīrṇā viyato viśvatoyā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.088a: sutāvanīdhrasya harasya bhāryā; divo bhuvaś cāpi kakṣyānurūpā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.088c: bhavyā pṛthivyā bhāvinī bhāti rājan; gaṅgā lokānāṃ puṇyadā vai trayāṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.089a: madhupravāhā ghṛtarāgoddhṛtābhir; mahormibhiḥ śobhitā brāhmaṇaiś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:027.089c: divaś cyutā śirasāttā bhavena; gaṅgāvanīdhrās tridivasya mālā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.090a: yonir variṣṭhā virajā vitanvī; śuṣmā irā vārivahā yaśodā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.090c: viśvāvatī cākṛtir iṣṭir iddhā; gaṅgokṣitānāṃ bhuvanasya panthāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.091a: kṣāntyā mahyā gopane dhāraṇe ca; dīptyā kṛśānos tapanasya caiva
GE07mbh_13_u:027.091c: tulyā gaṅgā saṃmatā brāhmaṇānāṃ; guhasya brahmaṇyatayā ca nityam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.092a: ṛṣiṣṭutāṃ viṣṇupadīṃ purāṇīṃ; supuṇyatoyāṃ manasāpi loke
GE07mbh_13_u:027.092c: sarvātmanā jāhnavīṃ ye prapannās; te brahmaṇaḥ sadanaṃ saṃprayātāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.093a: lokān imān nayati yā jananīva putrān; sarvātmanā sarvaguṇopapannā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.093c: svasthānam iṣṭam iha brāhmam abhīpsamānair; gaṅgā sadaivātmavaśair upāsyā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.094a: usrāṃ juṣṭāṃ miṣatīṃ viśvatoyām; irāṃ vajrīṃ revatīṃ bhūdharāṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.094c: śiṣṭāśrayām amṛtāṃ brahmakāntāṃ; gaṅgāṃ śrayed ātmavān siddhikāmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.095a: prasādya devān savibhūn samastān; bhagīrathas tapasogreṇa gaṅgām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.095c: gām ānayat tām abhigamya śaśvan; pumān bhayaṃ neha nāmutra vidyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:027.096a: udāhṛtaḥ sarvathā te guṇānāṃ; mayaikadeśaḥ prasamīkṣya buddhyā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.096c: śaktir na me kā cid ihāsti vaktuṃ; guṇān sarvān parimātuṃ tathaiva
GE07mbh_13_u:027.097a: meroḥ samudrasya ca sarvaratnaiḥ; saṃkhyopalānām udakasya vāpi
GE07mbh_13_u:027.097c: vaktuṃ śakyaṃ neha gaṅgājalānāṃ; guṇākhyānaṃ parimātuṃ tathaiva
GE07mbh_13_u:027.098a: tasmād imān parayā śraddhayoktān; guṇān sarvāñ jāhnavījāṃs tathaiva
GE07mbh_13_u:027.098c: bhajed vācā manasā karmaṇā ca; bhaktyā yuktaḥ parayā śraddadhānaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.099a: lokān imāṃs trīn yaśasā vitatya; siddhiṃ prāpya mahatīṃ tāṃ durāpām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.099c: gaṅgākṛtān acireṇaiva lokān; yatheṣṭam iṣṭān vicariṣyasi tvam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.100a: tava mama ca guṇair mahānubhāvā; juṣatu matiṃ satataṃ svadharmayuktaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.100c: abhigatajanavatsalā hi gaṅgā; bhajati yunakti sukhaiś ca bhaktimantam
GE07mbh_13_u:027.101a: iti paramamatir guṇān anekāñ; śilarataye tripathānuyogarūpān
GE07mbh_13_u:027.101c: bahuvidham anuśāsya tathyarūpān; gaganatalaṃ dyutimān viveśa siddhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.102a: śilavṛttis tu siddhasya vākyaiḥ saṃbodhitas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:027.102c: gaṅgām upāsya vidhivat siddhiṃ prāptaḥ sudurlabhām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.103a: tasmāt tvam api kaunteya bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:027.103c: gaṅgām abhyehi satataṃ prāpsyase siddhim uttamām
GE07mbh_13_u:027.104c: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ parāṃ prītim agacchad bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:027.105a: itihāsam imaṃ puṇyaṃ śṛṇuyād yaḥ paṭheta vā
GE07mbh_13_u:028.001a: prajñāśrutābhyāṃ vṛttena śīlena ca yathā bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:028.001c: guṇaiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair vayasā ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.001d-0245_01: bhavān viśiṣṭo buddhyā ca prajñayā tapasā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:028.001d-0246_01: sarveṣāṃ caiva jātānāṃ satām etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.001e: tasmād bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:028.001f-0247_01: nānyas tvad anyo lokeṣu praṣṭavyo 'sti janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:028.002a: kṣatriyo yadi vā vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:028.002c: brāhmaṇyaṃ prāpnuyāt kena tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:028.003a: tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:028.003c: brāhmaṇyam atha ced icchet tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:028.004a: brāhmaṇyaṃ tāta duṣprāpaṃ varṇaiḥ kṣatrādibhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.004c: paraṃ hi sarvabhūtānāṃ sthānam etad yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:028.005a: bahvīs tu saṃsaran yonīr jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.005c: paryāye tāta kasmiṃś cid brāhmaṇo nāma jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:028.006c: mataṅgasya ca saṃvādaṃ gardabhyāś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:028.007a: dvijāteḥ kasya cit tāta tulyavarṇaḥ sutaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.007c: mataṅgo nāma nāmnābhūt sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.008a: sa yajñakāraḥ kaunteya pitrā sṛṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:028.008d-0248_01: tvarayā taṃ kharair yuktam āsthāya ratham āvrajat
GE07mbh_13_u:028.009a: sa bālaṃ gardabhaṃ rājan vahantaṃ mātur antike
GE07mbh_13_u:028.010a: taṃ tu tīvravraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā gardabhī putragṛddhinī
GE07mbh_13_u:028.010c: uvāca mā śucaḥ putra caṇḍālas tvādhitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:028.011a: brāhmaṇe dāruṇaṃ nāsti maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:028.012a: ayaṃ tu pāpaprakṛtir bāle na kurute dayām
GE07mbh_13_u:028.012c: svayoniṃ mānayaty eṣa bhāvo bhāvaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:028.013a: etac chrutvā mataṅgas tu dāruṇaṃ rāsabhīvacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.014a: brūhi rāsabhi kalyāṇi mātā me yena dūṣitā
GE07mbh_13_u:028.014c: kathaṃ māṃ vetsi caṇḍālaṃ kṣipraṃ rāsabhi śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_13_u:028.015a: kena jāto 'smi caṇḍālo brāhmaṇyaṃ yena me 'naśat
GE07mbh_13_u:028.016a: brāhmaṇyāṃ vṛṣalena tvaṃ mattāyāṃ nāpitena ha
GE07mbh_13_u:028.016c: jātas tvam asi caṇḍālo brāhmaṇyaṃ tena te 'naśat
GE07mbh_13_u:028.017a: evam ukto mataṅgas tu pratyupāyād gṛhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:028.017c: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya pitā vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:028.018c: kasmāt pratinivṛtto 'si kaccin na kuśalaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:028.019a: ayonir agryayonir vā yaḥ syāt sa kuśalī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:028.019c: kuśalaṃ tu kutas tasya yasyeyaṃ jananī pitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.020a: brāhmaṇyāṃ vṛṣalāj jātaṃ pitar vedayatīha mām
GE07mbh_13_u:028.020c: amānuṣī gardabhīyaṃ tasmāt tapsye tapo mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:028.021a: evam uktvā sa pitaraṃ pratasthe kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.021c: tato gatvā mahāraṇyam atapyata mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.022c: mataṅgaḥ susukhaṃ prepsuḥ sthānaṃ sucaritād api
GE07mbh_13_u:028.023a: taṃ tathā tapasā yuktam uvāca harivāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.023c: mataṅga tapyase kiṃ tvaṃ bhogān utsṛjya mānuṣān
GE07mbh_13_u:028.024a: varaṃ dadāni te hanta vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ yad icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:028.024c: yac cāpy avāpyam anyat te sarvaṃ prabrūhi māciram
GE07mbh_13_u:028.025c: gaccheyaṃ tad avāpyeha vara eṣa vṛto mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:028.026a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ tam uvāca puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:028.026b-0249_01: mataṅga durlabham idaṃ vipratvaṃ prārthyate tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:028.027a: śreṣṭhaṃ yat sarvabhūteṣu tapo yan nātivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:028.028c: caṇḍālayonau jātena na tat prāpyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:029.001a: evam ukto mataṅgas tu saṃśitātmā yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:029.002a: tam uvāca tataḥ śakraḥ punar eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:029.002b-0251_01: brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ tāta prārthayāno na lapsyase
GE07mbh_13_u:029.003a: mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ putra naiṣa dharmapathas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:029.003b-0252_01: na hi śakyaṃ tvayā prāptuṃ brāhmaṇyam iha durmate
GE07mbh_13_u:029.004a: mataṅga paramaṃ sthānaṃ vāryamāṇo mayā sakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:029.004c: cikīrṣasy eva tapasā sarvathā na bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:029.005c: sa jāyate pulkaso vā caṇḍālo vā kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:029.006a: puṃścalaḥ pāpayonir vā yaḥ kaś cid iha lakṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:029.006c: sa tasyām eva suciraṃ mataṅga parivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:029.007a: tato daśaguṇe kāle labhate śūdratām api
GE07mbh_13_u:029.008a: tatas triṃśad guṇe kāle labhate vaiśyatām api
GE07mbh_13_u:029.009a: tataḥ ṣaṣṭiguṇe kāle rājanyo nāma jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:029.011a: tatas tu dviśate kāle labhate kāṇḍapṛṣṭhatām
GE07mbh_13_u:029.011b-0253_01: sarvastrīṣu pravṛttāś ca ye ca vedabahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:029.012a: tatas tu triśate kāle labhate dvijatām api
GE07mbh_13_u:029.012c: tāṃ ca prāpya ciraṃ kālaṃ tatraiva parivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:029.013a: tataś catuḥśate kāle śrotriyo nāma jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:029.014a: tadaiva krodhaharṣau ca kāmadveṣau ca putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:029.015a: tāṃś cej jayati śatrūn sa tadā prāpnoti sadgatim
GE07mbh_13_u:029.015c: atha te vai jayanty enaṃ tālāgrād iva pātyate
GE07mbh_13_u:029.016a: mataṅga saṃpradhāryaitad yad ahaṃ tvām acūcudam
GE07mbh_13_u:029.016c: vṛṇīṣva kāmam anyaṃ tvaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ hi sudurlabham bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001-0254_01: evam ukto mataṅgas tu saṃśitātmā yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001-0254_03: taṃ sahasrāvare kāle śakro draṣṭum upāgamat mataṅga uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001-0254_04: tad eva ca punar vākyam uvāca balavṛtrahā
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001-0254_05: idaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vai brahmacārī samāhitaḥ śakra uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001-0254_07: caṇḍālayonau jātena nāvāpyaṃ vai kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001-0254_08: anyaṃ kāmaṃ vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ mā vṛthā te 'stv ayaṃ śramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001a: evam ukto mataṅgas tu bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.001c: atiṣṭhata gayāṃ gatvā so 'ṅguṣṭhena śataṃ samāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.002c: tvagasthibhūto dharmātmā sa papāteti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:030.004c: pūjayan sukham āpnoti duḥkham āpnoty apūjayan
GE07mbh_13_u:030.006c: brāhmaṇaḥ kurute tad dhi yathā yad yac ca vāñchati
GE07mbh_13_u:030.007a: bahvīs tu saṃsaran yonīr jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.007c: paryāye tāta kasmiṃś cid brāhmaṇyam iha vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:030.007d-0256_02: anyaṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ durlabho 'yaṃ hi te varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.008a: kiṃ māṃ tudasi duḥkhārtaṃ mṛtaṃ mārayase ca mām
GE07mbh_13_u:030.008c: taṃ tu śocāmi yo labdhvā brāhmaṇyaṃ na bubhūṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:030.009a: brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi duṣprāpaṃ tribhir varṇaiḥ śatakrato
GE07mbh_13_u:030.010a: yaḥ pāpebhyaḥ pāpatamas teṣām adhama eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012a: ekārāmo hy ahaṃ śakra nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_01: daivaṃ tu nūnam etad vai yad ahaṃ mātṛdoṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_02: etām avasthāṃ saṃprāpto dharmajñaḥ san puraṃdara
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_03: nūnaṃ daivaṃ na śakyaṃ hi pauruṣeṇātivartitum
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_04: yad ahaṃ yatnavān evaṃ na labhe vipratāṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_05: evaṃ gate tu dharmajña dātum arhasi me varam
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_06: yadi te 'ham anugrāhyaḥ kiṃ cid vā sukṛtaṃ mama bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_07: vṛṇīṣveti tadā prāha tatas taṃ balavṛtrahā
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0257_08: coditas tu mahendreṇa mataṅgaḥ prābravīd idam
GE07mbh_13_u:030.012d-0258_01: evaṃ varaṃ vṛṇe deva sa me sidhyatu vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:030.013e: yathā mamākṣayā kīrtir bhavec cāpi puraṃdara
GE07mbh_13_u:030.013f-0259_01: kartum arhasi tad deva śirasā tvāṃ prasādaye indra uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:030.014-0260_01: mataṅga gamyatāṃ śīghram evam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:030.014-0260_02: striyaś ca sarvās tvā loke yakṣyante bhūtikarmaṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:030.014a: chandodeva iti khyātaḥ strīṇāṃ pūjyo bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:030.014b-0261_01: kīrtiś ca te 'tulā vatsa triṣu lokeṣu yāsyati
GE07mbh_13_u:030.015c: prāṇāṃs tyaktvā mataṅgo 'pi prāpa tat sthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:030.016a: evam etat paraṃ sthānaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:030.016c: tac ca duṣprāpam iha vai mahendravacanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:031.001a: śrutaṃ me mahad ākhyānam etat kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:031.001c: suduṣprāpaṃ bravīṣi tvaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:031.002a: viśvāmitreṇa ca purā brāhmaṇyaṃ prāptam ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:031.002c: śrūyate vadase tac ca duṣprāpam iti sattama
GE07mbh_13_u:031.003a: vītahavyaś ca rājarṣiḥ śruto me vipratāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.003c: tad eva tāvad gāṅgeya śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:031.003d-0263_03: tac ca rājan mayā sarvaṃ śrutaṃ buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:031.003d-0263_05: vītahavyas tu rājarṣir viśruto vai pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:031.004a: sa kena karmaṇā prāpto brāhmaṇyaṃ rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:031.004c: vareṇa tapasā vāpi tan me vyākhyātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:031.005a: śṛṇu rājan yathā rājā vītahavyo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.005c: kṣatriyaḥ san punaḥ prāpto brāhmaṇyaṃ lokasatkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:031.006c: babhūva putro dharmātmā śaryātir iti viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.007c: hehayas tālajaṅghaś ca vatseṣu jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:031.008a: hehayasya tu putrāṇāṃ daśasu strīṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:031.009c: dhanurvede ca vede ca sarvatraiva kṛtaśramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.010c: haryaśva iti vikhyāto babhūva jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.012a: taṃ tu hatvā naravaraṃ hehayās te mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.014a: sa pālayann eva mahīṃ dharmātmā kāśinandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.014c: tair vītahavyair āgatya yudhi sarvair vinirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.015a: tam apy ājau vinirjitya pratijagmur yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:031.016a: divodāsas tu vijñāya vīryaṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:031.020a: sa niṣpatya dadau yuddhaṃ tebhyo rājā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.021a: sa tu yuddhe mahārāja dinānāṃ daśatīr daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:031.022a: hatayodhas tato rājan kṣīṇakośaś ca bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.023a: sa tv āśramam upāgamya bharadvājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.023d-0265_01: prapadya śaraṇaṃ tasya mūrdhnā ca nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_13_u:031.023d-0265_02: uvāca bhagavantaṃ taṃ putraṃ mānyaṃ bṛhaspateḥ rājovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:031.024a: bhagavan vaitahavyair me yuddhe vaṃśaḥ praṇāśitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.024c: aham ekaḥ paridyūno bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.024d-0266_01: tam uvāca bharadvājo jyeṣṭhaḥ putro bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.024d-0266_03: kim āgamanakṛtyaṃ te sarvaṃ prabrūhi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:031.024d-0266_04: yat te priyaṃ tat kariṣye na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:031.025a: śiṣyasnehena bhagavan sa māṃ rakṣitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:031.025c: niḥśeṣo hi kṛto vaṃśo mama taiḥ pāpakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.026c: na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ saudeva vyetu te bhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:031.027a: aham iṣṭiṃ karomy adya putrārthaṃ te viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:031.028a: tata iṣṭiṃ cakārarṣis tasya vai putrakāmikīm
GE07mbh_13_u:031.028c: athāsya tanayo jajñe pratardana iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.029a: sa jātamātro vavṛdhe samāḥ sadyas trayodaśa
GE07mbh_13_u:031.029c: vedaṃ cādhijage kṛtsnaṃ dhanurvedaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:031.030c: tejo laukyaṃ sa saṃgṛhya tasmin deśe samāviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:031.031a: tataḥ sa kavacī dhanvī bāṇī dīpta ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.031a-0268_02: bandibhir vandyamānaś ca babhau sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.031c: prayayau sa dhanur dhunvan vivarṣur iva toyadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.032a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ harṣaṃ sudevatanayo yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:031.032c: mene ca manasā dagdhān vaitahavyān sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.034a: tatas tu vaitahavyānāṃ vadhāya sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.035a: sarathaḥ sa tu saṃtīrya gaṅgām āśu parākramī
GE07mbh_13_u:031.038a: astraiś ca vividhākārai rathaughaiś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:031.039a: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya teṣāṃ rājā pratardanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.041a: hateṣu teṣu sarveṣu vītahavyaḥ suteṣv atha
GE07mbh_13_u:031.041c: prādravan nagaraṃ hitvā bhṛgor āśramam apy uta
GE07mbh_13_u:031.042a: yayau bhṛguṃ ca śaraṇaṃ vītahavyo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.042c: abhayaṃ ca dadau tasmai rājñe rājan bhṛgus tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:031.042e: tato dadāv āsanaṃ ca tasmai śiṣyo bhṛgos tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:031.042f-0269_01: āsanaṃ śiṣyamadhye ca bhṛgur anyat samādiśat
GE07mbh_13_u:031.044a: bho bhoḥ ke 'trāśrame santi bhṛgoḥ śiṣyā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.044c: draṣṭum icche munim ahaṃ tasyācakṣata mām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:031.045a: sa taṃ viditvā tu bhṛgur niścakrāmāśramāt tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:031.045c: pūjayām āsa ca tato vidhinā parameṇa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:031.046a: uvāca cainaṃ rājendra kiṃ kāryam iti pārthivam
GE07mbh_13_u:031.046c: sa covāca nṛpas tasmai yad āgamanakāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:031.046d-0270_01: tam abhyanandad bhagavān satkāreṇa svayaṃ bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.046d-0270_02: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān kiṃ kāryam iti satkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:031.046d-0270_03: tam uvāca tato rājā daivodāsiḥ pratardanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.047a: ayaṃ brahmann ito rājā vītahavyo visarjyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:031.047c: asya putrair hi me brahman kṛtsno vaṃśaḥ praṇāśitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.048c: asyedānīṃ vadhād brahman bhaviṣyāmy anṛṇaḥ pituḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.049a: tam uvāca kṛpāviṣṭo bhṛgur dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.049c: nehāsti kṣatriyaḥ kaś cit sarve hīme dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.050a: evaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā bhṛgos tathyaṃ pratardanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.050c: pādāv upaspṛśya śanaiḥ prahasan vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:031.051a: evam apy asmi bhagavan kṛtakṛtyo na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.051c: yad eṣa rājā vīryeṇa svajātiṃ tyājito mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:031.051d-0271_01: ṛṣer hi vacanaṃ satyaṃ sarve syur brāhmaṇā iti
GE07mbh_13_u:031.052a: anujānīhi māṃ brahman dhyāyasva ca śivena mām
GE07mbh_13_u:031.052c: tyājito hi mayā jātim eṣa rājā bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:031.054a: bhṛgor vacanamātreṇa sa ca brahmarṣitāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.055c: śakras tvam iti yo daityair nigṛhītaḥ kilābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:031.056a: ṛgvede vartate cāgryā śrutir atra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:031.056c: yatra gṛtsamado brahman brāhmaṇaiḥ sa mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:031.058a: varcāḥ sutejasaḥ putro vihavyas tasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.058c: vihavyasya tu putras tu vitatyas tasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.059a: vitatyasya sutaḥ satyaḥ santaḥ satyasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.059c: śravās tasya sutaś carṣiḥ śravasaś cābhavat tamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.060c: prakāśasya ca vāgindro babhūva jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.061c: ghṛtācyāṃ tasya putras tu rurur nāmodapadyata
GE07mbh_13_u:031.062c: śunako nāma viprarṣir yasya putro 'tha śaunakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:031.064a: tathaiva kathito vaṃśo mayā gārtsamadas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.001a: ke pūjyāḥ ke namaskāryā mānavair bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:032.001c: vistareṇa tad ācakṣva na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:032.004a: bahumānaḥ paraḥ keṣu bhavato yān namasyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:032.004c: śakyaṃ cec chrotum icchāmi brūhy etad dharmavittama
GE07mbh_13_u:032.005a: śṛṇu govinda yān etān pūjayāmy arimardana
GE07mbh_13_u:032.005c: tvatto 'nyaḥ kaḥ pumāṃl loke śrotum etad ihārhati
GE07mbh_13_u:032.006c: sthāṇuṃ skandaṃ tathā lakṣmīṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:032.007c: satataṃ ye namasyanti tān namasyāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:032.009c: saṃtuṣṭāś ca kṣamāyuktās tān namasyāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:032.010a: samyag dadati ye ceṣṭān kṣāntā dāntā jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.010c: sasyaṃ dhanaṃ kṣitiṃ gāś ca tān namasyāmi yādava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.011a: ye te tapasi vartante vane mūlaphalāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.013a: ye vedaṃ prāpya durdharṣā vāgmino brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.013c: yājanādhyāpane yuktā nityaṃ tān pūjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:032.014c: ā pṛṣṭhatāpāt svādhyāye yuktās tān pūjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:032.016a: suvratā munayo ye ca brahmaṇyāḥ satyasaṃgarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.017c: niḥsukhā nirdhanā ye ca tān namasyāmi yādava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.018c: ahiṃsāniratā ye ca ye ca satyavratā narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.018e: dāntāḥ śamaparāś caiva tān namasyāmi keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.020c: śiṣṭācārapravṛttāś ca tān namasyāmy ahaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.021a: brāhmaṇās triṣu lokeṣu ye trivargam anuṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.022a: abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāś ca sudhābhakṣāś ca ye sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.022c: vrataiś ca vividhair yuktās tān namasyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.023a: ayonīn agniyonīṃś ca brahmayonīṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:032.023c: sarvabhūtātmayonīṃś ca tān namasyāmy ahaṃ dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:032.024a: nityam etān namasyāmi kṛṣṇa lokakarān ṛṣīn
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025a: tasmāt tvam api vārṣṇeya dvijān pūjaya nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025c: pūjitāḥ pūjanārhā hi sukhaṃ dāsyanti te 'nagha yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0004: kiṃ tasya bharataśreṣṭha phalaṃ bhavati tattvataḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0009: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā viśuddhātmā trāsād aṅkam upāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0010: āśvāsyāśvasihīty āha na te 'sti bhayam aṇḍaja
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0011: bhayaṃ te sumahat kasmāt kutra kiṃ vā kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0012: yena tvam iha saṃprāpto visaṃjño bhrāntacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0015: matsakāśam anuprāptaṃ na tvāṃ kaś cit samutsahet
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0018: tyajeyaṃ bhava viśrabdhaḥ kapota na bhayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0019: mamaitad vihitaṃ bhakṣyaṃ na rājaṃs trātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0020: atikrāntaṃ ca prāptaṃ ca prayatnāc copapāditam
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0021: māṃsaṃ ca rudhiraṃ cāsya majjā medaś ca me hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0022: paritoṣakaro hy eṣa mama māsyāgrato bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0023: tṛṣṇā me bādhate 'tyugrā kṣudhā nirdahatīva mām
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0024: muñcainaṃ na hi śakṣyāmi rājan mandayituṃ kṣudhām
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0025: mayā hy anusṛto hy eṣa matpakṣanakhavikṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0026: kiṃ cid ucchvāsaniḥśvāsaṃ na rājan goptum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0027: yadi svaviṣaye rājan prabhus tvaṃ rakṣaṇe nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0028: khecarasya tṛṣārtasya na tvaṃ prabhur atho mama
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0030: viṣayeṣv indriyāṇāṃ ca ākāśe mā parākrama
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0031: prabhutvaṃ hi parākramya samyak pakṣahareṣu te bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0032: yadi tvam iha dharmārthī mām api draṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0033: śrutvā śyenasya tad vākyaṃ rājarṣir vismayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0034: saṃbhāvya cainaṃ tad vākyaṃ tadarthī pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0035: govṛṣo vā varāho vā mṛgo vā mahiṣo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0037: śaraṇāgataṃ na tyajeyam iti me vratam āhitam śyenaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0038: na muñcati mamāṅgāni dvijo 'yaṃ paśya vai dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0039: na varāhaṃ na cokṣāṇaṃ na cānyān vividhān dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0040: bhakṣayāmi mahārāja kim annādyena tena me
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0041: yas tu me vihito bhakṣaḥ svayaṃ devaiḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0042: śyenāḥ kapotān khādanti sthitir eṣā sanātanī
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0043: uśīnara kapote tu yadi snehas tavānagha rājā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0044: tatas tvaṃ me prayacchādya svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0045: mahān anugraho me 'dya yas tvam evam ihāttha mām
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0052: niruddhaṃ gaganaṃ sarvaṃ śubhraṃ meghaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0053: mahī pracalitā cāsīt tasya satyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0054: sa rājā pārśvataś caiva bāhubhyām ūrutaś ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0055: tāni māṃsāni saṃchidya tulāṃ pūrayate śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0056: tathāpi na samas tena kapotena babhūva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0058: tulāṃ tataḥ samārūḍhaḥ svaṃ māṃsakṣayam utsṛjan
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0059: tataḥ sendrās trayo lokās taṃ narendram upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0062: divyaiś ca susukhair mālyair abhivṛṣṭaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0064: nṛttaś caivopagītaś ca pitāmaha iva prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0067: sa rājarṣir gataḥ svargaṃ karmaṇā tena śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0068: śaraṇāgateṣu caivaṃ tvaṃ kuru sarvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0071: sādhuvṛtto hi yo rājā sadvṛttam anutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0072: kiṃ na prāptaṃ bhavet tena svavyājeneha karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0074: kāśīnām īśvaraḥ khyātas triṣu lokeṣu karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0076: so 'pi gaccheta tām eva gatiṃ bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0077: idaṃ vṛttaṃ hi rājarṣer vṛṣadarbhasya kīrtayan
GE07mbh_13_u:032.025d-008_0078: pūtātmā vai bhavel loke śṛṇuyād yaś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.026a: asmiṃl loke sadā hy ete paratra ca sukhapradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.026c: ta ete mānyamānā vai pradāsyanti sukhaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:032.027a: ye sarvātithayo nityaṃ goṣu ca brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:032.027c: nityaṃ satye ca niratā durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:032.028a: nityaṃ śamaparā ye ca tathā ye cānasūyakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.028c: nityaṃ svādhyāyino ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:032.029a: sarvān devān namasyanti ye caikaṃ devam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.029c: śraddadhānāś ca dāntāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:032.030c: bhavanti ye dānaratā durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:032.030d-0273_04: śiṣṭānnabhojino ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:032.031a: agnīn ādhāya vidhivat prayatā dhārayanti ye
GE07mbh_13_u:032.031c: prāptāḥ somāhutiṃ caiva durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:032.032a: mātāpitror guruṣu ca samyag vartanti ye sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:032.032c: yathā tvaṃ vṛṣṇiśārdūlety uktvaivaṃ virarāma saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:032.033c: samyak pūjaya yena tvaṃ gatim iṣṭām avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:033.001a: kiṃ rājñaḥ sarvakṛtyānāṃ garīyaḥ syāt pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:033.001c: kiṃ kurvan karma nṛpatir ubhau lokau samaśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:033.002d-0274_01: brāhmaṇānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ ca pūjā ca sukham icchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.004a: etat kṛtyatamaṃ rājño nityam eveti lakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:033.005a: ye cāpy eṣāṃ pūjyatamās tān dṛḍhaṃ pratipūjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:033.005c: teṣu śānteṣu tad rāṣṭraṃ sarvam eva virājate
GE07mbh_13_u:033.006a: te pūjyās te namaskāryās te rakṣyāḥ pitaro yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:033.006c: teṣv eva yātrā lokasya bhūtānām iva vāsave
GE07mbh_13_u:033.007a: abhicārair upāyaiś ca daheyur api tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:033.008a: nāntam eṣāṃ prapaśyāmi na diśaś cāpy apāvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.009a: vidyan teṣāṃ sāhasikā guṇās teṣām atīva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:033.009c: kūpā iva tṛṇacchannā viśuddhā dyaur ivāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:033.010b-0276_01: mānyās teṣāṃ sādhavo ye na nindyāś cāpy asādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.011a: kṛṣigorakṣyam apy anye bhaikṣam anye 'py anuṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.015a: naite devair na pitṛbhir na gandharvair na rākṣasaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.015c: nāsurair na piśācaiś ca śakyā jetuṃ dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.016a: adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpy adaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:033.016c: yam iccheyuḥ sa rājā syād yaṃ dviṣyuḥ sa parābhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:033.017a: parivādaṃ ca ye kuryur brāhmaṇānām acetasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.017b-0277_01: satyaṃ bravīmi te rājan vinaśyeyur asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:033.017e: parikupyanti te rājan satataṃ dviṣatāṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.018a: brāhmaṇā yaṃ praśaṃsanti puruṣaḥ sa pravardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:033.018c: brāhmaṇair yaḥ parākruṣṭaḥ parābhūyāt kṣaṇād dhi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.020a: dramiḷāś ca kaliṅgāś ca pulindāś cāpy uśīnarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.020c: kaulāḥ sarpā māhiṣakās tās tāḥ kṣatriyajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.021c: śreyān parājayas tebhyo na jayo jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:033.022a: yas tu sarvam idaṃ hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ ca na tatsamam
GE07mbh_13_u:033.022c: brahmavadhyā mahān doṣa ity āhuḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:033.023a: parivādo dvijātīnāṃ na śrotavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:033.024a: na sa jāto janiṣyo vā pṛthivyām iha kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:033.025a: durgraho muṣṭinā vāyur duḥsparśaḥ pāṇinā śaśī
GE07mbh_13_u:033.025c: durdharā pṛthivī mūrdhnā durjayā brāhmaṇā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:034.002a: ete bhogair alaṃkārair anyaiś caiva kim icchakaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.002c: sadā pūjyā namaskāryā rakṣyāś ca pitṛvan nṛpaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.002e: ato rāṣṭrasya śāntir hi bhūtānām iva vāsavāt
GE07mbh_13_u:034.003a: jāyatāṃ brahmavarcasvī rāṣṭre vai brāhmaṇaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.003d-0278_01: iti māṃ nāradaḥ prāha satataṃ sarvabhūtaye
GE07mbh_13_u:034.004c: vāsayeta gṛhe rājan na tasmāt param asti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:034.006a: ādityaś candramā vāyur bhūmir āpo 'mbaraṃ diśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.007a: na tasyāśnanti pitaro yasya viprā na bhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:034.007c: devāś cāpy asya nāśnanti pāpasya brāhmaṇadviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.008a: brāhmaṇeṣu tu tuṣṭeṣu prīyante pitaraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:034.008c: tathaiva devatā rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:034.009a: tathaiva te 'pi prīyante yeṣāṃ bhavati tad dhaviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.009c: na ca pretya vinaśyanti gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:034.010a: yena yenaiva haviṣā brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.010c: tena tenaiva prīyante pitaro devatās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:034.011a: brāhmaṇād eva tad bhūtaṃ prabhavanti yataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.011c: yataś cāyaṃ prabhavati pretya yatra ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:034.012a: vedaiṣa mārgaṃ svargasya tathaiva narakasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:034.013a: ye cainam anuvartante te na yānti parābhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:034.013c: na te pretya vinaśyanti gacchanti na parābhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:034.014a: ye brāhmaṇamukhāt prāptaṃ pratigṛhṇanti vai vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.014c: kṛtātmāno mahātmānas te na yānti parābhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:034.015a: kṣatriyāṇāṃ pratapatāṃ tejasā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:034.015c: brāhmaṇeṣv eva śāmyanti tejāṃsi ca balāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:034.017c: prakṣipyātha ca kumbhān vai pāragāminam ārabhet
GE07mbh_13_u:034.018a: yat kiṃ cit kathyate loke śrūyate paśyate 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:034.018c: sarvaṃ tad brāhmaṇeṣv eva gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:034.020a: mātaraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ pṛcche tvā saṃśayaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:034.020c: kena svit karmaṇā pāpaṃ vyapohati naro gṛhī
GE07mbh_13_u:034.021a: brāhmaṇān eva seveta pavitraṃ hy etad uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:034.022a: ato bhūtir ataḥ kīrtir ato buddhiḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:034.022c: apareṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca parebhyaś caiva ye pare
GE07mbh_13_u:034.023a: brāhmaṇā yaṃ praśaṃsanti puruṣaḥ sa pravardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:034.025a: paśya candre kṛtaṃ lakṣma samudre lavaṇodakam
GE07mbh_13_u:034.026a: teṣām eva prabhāvena sahasranayano hy asau
GE07mbh_13_u:034.027a: icchan bhūtiṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca lokāṃś ca madhusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:034.028a: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā medinyā madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:034.028c: sādhu sādhv ity athety uktvā medinīṃ pratyapūjayat
GE07mbh_13_u:035.002a: sarvān naḥ suhṛdas tāta brāhmaṇāḥ sumanomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:035.003a: sarvān no dviṣatas tāta brāhmaṇā jātamanyavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:035.004c: sṛṣṭvā dvijātīn dhātā hi yathāpūrvaṃ samādadhat
GE07mbh_13_u:035.005a: na vo 'nyad iha kartavyaṃ kiṃ cid ūrdhvaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:035.005c: guptā gopāyata brahma śreyo vas tena śobhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:035.006a: svam eva kurvatāṃ karma śrīr vo brāhmī bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:035.007a: na śaudraṃ karma kartavyaṃ brāhmaṇena vipaścitā
GE07mbh_13_u:035.007c: śaudraṃ hi kurvataḥ karma dharmaḥ samuparudhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:035.008a: śrīś ca buddhiś ca tejaś ca vibhūtiś ca pratāpinī
GE07mbh_13_u:035.011a: yac caiva mānuṣe loke yac ca deveṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:035.011c: sarvaṃ tat tapasā sādhyaṃ jñānena vinayena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:035.011d-0281_03: arakṣitāś ca yuṣmābhir viruddhā yānti viplavam
GE07mbh_13_u:035.012a: ity etā brahmagītās te samākhyātā mayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:035.012c: viprānukampārtham idaṃ tena proktaṃ hi dhīmatā
GE07mbh_13_u:035.013a: bhūyas teṣāṃ balaṃ manye yathā rājñas tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:035.013c: durāsadāś ca caṇḍāś ca rabhasāḥ kṣiprakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:035.014a: santy eṣāṃ siṃhasattvāś ca vyāghrasattvās tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:035.017a: mekalā dramiḍāḥ kāśāḥ pauṇḍrāḥ kollagirās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:035.018a: kirātā yavanāś caiva tās tāḥ kṣatriyajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:035.020a: aśakyaṃ spraṣṭum ākāśam acālyo himavān giriḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:035.020c: avāryā setunā gaṅgā durjayā brāhmaṇā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:035.021c: brāhmaṇā hi mahātmāno devānām api devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:035.023c: pratigrahaṃ ye neccheyus te 'pi rakṣyās tvayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:036.002a: śakro hy ajñātarūpeṇa jaṭī bhūtvā rajoruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.002c: virūpaṃ rūpam āsthāya praśnaṃ papraccha śambaram
GE07mbh_13_u:036.003c: śreṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ kena manyante tan me prabrūhi pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.004a: nāsūyāmi sadā viprān brahmāṇaṃ ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_13_u:036.005a: śrutvā ca nāvajānāmi nāparādhyāmi karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:036.006a: te viśrabdhāḥ prabhāṣante saṃyacchanti ca māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:036.007a: te mā śāstrapathe yuktaṃ brahmaṇyam anasūyakam
GE07mbh_13_u:036.007c: samāsiñcanti śāstāraḥ kṣaudraṃ madhv iva makṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.008a: yac ca bhāṣanti te tuṣṭās tat tad gṛhṇāmi medhayā
GE07mbh_13_u:036.010a: etat pṛthivyām amṛtam etac cakṣur anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:036.010c: yad brāhmaṇamukhāc chāstram iha śrutvā pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:036.011a: etat kāraṇam ājñāya dṛṣṭvā devāsuraṃ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:036.011c: yuddhaṃ pitā me hṛṣṭātmā vismitaḥ pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_13_u:036.012a: dṛṣṭvā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ tu mahimānaṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:036.012c: paryapṛcchat katham ime siddhā iti niśākaram
GE07mbh_13_u:036.012d-0282_01: sa pṛṣṭas tān uvācedaṃ siddhāṃs tatra niśākaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.013a: brāhmaṇās tapasā sarve sidhyante vāgbalāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:036.013c: bhujavīryā hi rājāno vāgastrāś ca dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.014a: pravasan vāpy adhīyīta bahvīr durvasatīr vasan
GE07mbh_13_u:036.014c: nirmanyur api nirmāno yatiḥ syāt samadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.015a: api cej jātisaṃpannaḥ sarvān vedān pitur gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:036.015c: ślāghamāna ivādhīyed grāmya ity eva taṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.016a: bhūmir etau nigirati sarpo bilaśayān iva
GE07mbh_13_u:036.017c: garbheṇa duṣyate kanyā gṛhavāsena ca dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.017d-0283_02: nityaṃ pūjyāś ca vandyāś ca dvijā lokadvayecchubhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:036.018a: ity etan me pitā śrutvā somād adbhutadarśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:036.019c: dvijān saṃpūjayām āsa mahendratvam avāpa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:037.001a: apūrvaṃ vā bhavet pātram atha vāpi ciroṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:037.001c: dūrād abhyāgataṃ vāpi kiṃ pātraṃ syāt pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:037.002a: kriyā bhavati keṣāṃ cid upāṃśuvratam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:037.002c: yo yo yāceta yat kiṃ cit sarvaṃ dadyāma ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:037.004a: apūrvaṃ vāpi yat pātraṃ yac cāpi syāc ciroṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:037.004c: dūrād abhyāgataṃ cāpi tat pātraṃ ca vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:037.005c: pātraṃ vidyāma tattvena yasmai dattaṃ na saṃtapet
GE07mbh_13_u:037.006c: sarve pūjyāś ca mānyāś ca śrutavṛttopasaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:037.007c: tasmān nityaṃ parīkṣeta puruṣān praṇidhāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:037.008c: adroho nātimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā tapaḥ śamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:037.009a: yasminn etāni dṛśyante na cākāryāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:037.009c: bhāvato viniviṣṭāni tat pātraṃ mānam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:037.010a: tathā ciroṣitaṃ cāpi saṃpratyāgatam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:037.010c: apūrvaṃ caiva pūrvaṃ ca tat pātraṃ mānam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:037.013b-0284_01: vidyātapobhyāṃ hīnena na tu grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:037.013b-0284_02: gṛhṇan pratigraham atho nayaty ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:037.013b-0284_04: ye lokā dānaśīlānāṃ sa tān āpnoti puṣkalān
GE07mbh_13_u:037.013c: ākroṣṭā cātivaktā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ sadaiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:037.014a: sarvābhiśaṅkī mūḍhaś ca bālaḥ kaṭukavāg api
GE07mbh_13_u:037.014c: boddhavyas tādṛśas tāta naraśvānaṃ hi taṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:037.015a: yathā śvā bhaṣituṃ caiva hantuṃ caivāvasṛjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:037.015e: alpaśrutāḥ kutarkāś ca dṛṣṭāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ kupaṇḍitāḥ śrutismṛtītihāsādipurāṇāraṇyavedinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:037.016c: anurundhyād bahujñāṃś ca sārajñāṃś caiva paṇḍitān
GE07mbh_13_u:037.017a: lokayātrā ca draṣṭavyā dharmaś cātmahitāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:037.017c: evaṃ naro vartamānaḥ śāśvatīr edhate samāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:037.018a: ṛṇam unmucya devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:037.018c: pitṝṇām atha viprāṇām atithīnāṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_13_u:037.019c: evaṃ gṛhasthaḥ karmāṇi kurvan dharmān na hīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:037.019d-0285_01: pātrāṇām uttamaṃ pātraṃ tad āhur dharmacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.001c: striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ laghucittāḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:038.003a: lokān anucaran dhīmān devarṣir nāradaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:038.004c: saṃśayo hṛdi me kaś cit tan me brūhi sumadhyame
GE07mbh_13_u:038.005a: evam uktā tu sā vipraṃ pratyuvācātha nāradam
GE07mbh_13_u:038.005c: viṣaye sati vakṣyāmi samarthāṃ manyase ca mām
GE07mbh_13_u:038.006a: na tvām aviṣaye bhadre niyokṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:038.006c: strīṇāṃ svabhāvam icchāmi tvattaḥ śrotuṃ varānane
GE07mbh_13_u:038.007a: etac chrutvā vacas tasya devarṣer apsarottamā
GE07mbh_13_u:038.007c: pratyuvāca na śakṣyāmi strī satī nindituṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.008a: viditās te striyo yāś ca yādṛśāś ca svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.008c: na mām arhasi devarṣe niyoktuṃ praśna īdṛśe
GE07mbh_13_u:038.009a: tām uvāca sa devarṣiḥ satyaṃ vada sumadhyame
GE07mbh_13_u:038.009c: mṛṣāvāde bhaved doṣaḥ satye doṣo na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:038.010a: ity uktā sā kṛtamatir abhavac cāruhāsinī
GE07mbh_13_u:038.010c: strīdoṣāñ śāśvatān satyān bhāṣituṃ saṃpracakrame pañcacūḍovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:038.011a: kulīnā rūpavatyaś ca nāthavatyaś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.011c: maryādāsu na tiṣṭhanti sa doṣaḥ strīṣu nārada
GE07mbh_13_u:038.012a: na strībhyaḥ kiṃ cid anyad vai pāpīyastaram asti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:038.012c: striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ tathā tvam api vettha ha
GE07mbh_13_u:038.013c: patīn antaram āsādya nālaṃ nāryaḥ pratīkṣitum
GE07mbh_13_u:038.014a: asaddharmas tv ayaṃ strīṇām asmākaṃ bhavati prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:038.014c: pāpīyaso narān yad vai lajjāṃ tyaktvā bhajāmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:038.015a: striyaṃ hi yaḥ prārthayate saṃnikarṣaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:038.015c: īṣac ca kurute sevāṃ tam evecchanti yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.017a: nāsāṃ kaś cid agamyo 'sti nāsāṃ vayasi saṃsthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.017c: virūpaṃ rūpavantaṃ vā pumān ity eva bhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:038.018a: na bhayān nāpy anukrośān nārthahetoḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:038.020a: yāś ca śaśvad bahumatā rakṣyante dayitāḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.021a: paṅguṣv api ca devarṣe ye cānye kutsitā narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.021c: strīṇām agamyo loke 'smin nāsti kaś cin mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:038.022a: yadi puṃsāṃ gatir brahma kathaṃ cin nopapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:038.022c: apy anyonyaṃ pravartante na hi tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:038.023a: alābhāt puruṣāṇāṃ hi bhayāt parijanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:038.023c: vadhabandhabhayāc cāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.024b-0287_01: suhṛdy avadyahṛdyās tā vairakopālayāḥ sma tāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.024c: prājñasya puruṣasyeha yathā vācas tathā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.026a: idam anyac ca devarṣe rahasyaṃ sarvayoṣitām
GE07mbh_13_u:038.026c: dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hṛdyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.026d-0288_02: yoniḥ svadyati nārīṇāṃ dṛteḥ pādād ivodakam
GE07mbh_13_u:038.027c: rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti bhartāraṃ paramaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.028c: tathaiva bahu manyante yathā ratyām anugraham
GE07mbh_13_u:038.029c: kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo vahnir ity ekataḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:038.030a: yataś ca bhūtāni mahānti pañca; yataś ca lokā vihitā vidhātrā
GE07mbh_13_u:038.030c: yataḥ pumāṃsaḥ pramadāś ca nirmitās; tadaiva doṣāḥ pramadāsu nārada
GE07mbh_13_u:039.001a: ime vai mānavā loke strīṣu sajjanty abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.001e: striyaś ca puruṣeṣv eva pratyakṣaṃ lokasākṣikam
GE07mbh_13_u:039.002a: atra me saṃśayas tīvro hṛdi saṃparivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:039.002c: katham āsāṃ narāḥ saṅgaṃ kurvate kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:039.002e: striyo vā teṣu rajyante virajyante 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.003a: iti tāḥ puruṣavyāghra kathaṃ śakyāḥ sma rakṣitum
GE07mbh_13_u:039.003c: pramadāḥ puruṣeṇeha tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:039.004c: na cāsāṃ mucyate kaś cit puruṣo hastam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.004e: gāvo navatṛṇānīva gṛhṇanty eva navān navān
GE07mbh_13_u:039.005a: śambarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucer api
GE07mbh_13_u:039.005c: baleḥ kumbhīnaseś caiva sarvās tā yoṣito viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.006a: hasantaṃ prahasanty etā rudantaṃ prarudanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:039.006d-0289_01: yadi jihvāsahasraṃ syāj jīvec ca śaradāṃ śatam
GE07mbh_13_u:039.007a: uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ yac ca veda bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.007c: strībuddhyā na viśiṣyete tāḥ sma rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.008a: anṛtaṃ satyam ity āhuḥ satyaṃ cāpi tathānṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:039.008b-0290_01: doṣāspade 'śucau deśe hy āsāṃ raktās tv aho narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.008c: iti yās tāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣair iha
GE07mbh_13_u:039.010c: apāstāś ca tathā rājan vikurvanti manaḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:039.010d-0291_01: imāḥ prajā mahābāho dhārmikya iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:039.011a: kas tāḥ śakto rakṣituṃ syād iti me saṃśayo mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:039.011c: tan me brūhi mahābāho kurūṇāṃ vaṃśavardhana
GE07mbh_13_u:039.012a: yadi śakyā kuruśreṣṭha rakṣā tāsāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:039.012c: kartuṃ vā kṛtapūrvā vā tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:040.001a: evam etan mahābāho nātra mithyāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:040.001c: yathā bravīṣi kauravya nārīṃ prati janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:040.002c: yathā rakṣā kṛtā pūrvaṃ vipulena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.003a: pramadāś ca yathā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:040.003c: yadarthaṃ tac ca te tāta pravakṣye vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:040.004a: na hi strībhya paraṃ putra pāpīyaḥ kiṃ cid asti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:040.004c: agnir hi pramadā dīpto māyāś ca mayajā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:040.004e: kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo mṛtyur ity ekataḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.005a: imāḥ prajā mahābāho dhārmikā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:040.005c: svayaṃ gacchanti devatvaṃ tato devān iyād bhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:040.006c: nivedya mānasaṃ cāpi tūṣṇīm āsann avāṅmukhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.007a: teṣām antargataṃ jñātvā devānāṃ sa pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.008a: pūrvasarge tu kaunteya sādhvyo nārya ihābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:040.008c: asādhvyas tu samutpannā kṛtyā sargāt prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.009a: tābhyaḥ kāmān yathākāmaṃ prādād dhi sa pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.009c: tāḥ kāmalubdhāḥ pramadāḥ prāmathnanta narāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.010a: krodhaṃ kāmasya deveśaḥ sahāyaṃ cāsṛjat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.011a: na ca strīṇāṃ kriyā kā cid iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.011c: nirindriyā amantrāś ca striyo 'nṛtam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.012c: durvāgbhāvaṃ ratiṃ caiva dadau strībhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.013a: na tāsāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ śakyaṃ puṃsā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:040.013c: api viśvakṛtā tāta kutas tu puruṣair iha
GE07mbh_13_u:040.014a: vācā vā vadhabandhair vā kleśair vā vividhais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.014c: na śakyā rakṣituṃ nāryas tā hi nityam asaṃyatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.015a: idaṃ tu puruṣavyāghra purastāc chrutavān aham
GE07mbh_13_u:040.015c: yathā rakṣā kṛtā pūrvaṃ vipulena gurustriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.016c: tasya bhāryā rucir nāma rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:040.019c: tasmād yatnena bhāryāyā rakṣaṇaṃ sa cakāra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:040.020a: sa kadā cid ṛṣis tāta yajñaṃ kartumanās tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.020c: bhāryāsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ syād ity acintayat
GE07mbh_13_u:040.021c: āhūya dayitaṃ śiṣyaṃ vipulaṃ prāha bhārgavam
GE07mbh_13_u:040.022c: putra prārthayate nityaṃ tāṃ rakṣasva yathābalam
GE07mbh_13_u:040.023a: apramattena te bhāvyaṃ sadā prati puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_13_u:040.023c: sa hi rūpāṇi kurute vividhāni bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:040.024a: ity ukto vipulas tena tapasvī niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.025c: punaś cedaṃ mahārāja papraccha prathitaṃ gurum
GE07mbh_13_u:040.026a: kāni rūpāṇi śakrasya bhavanty āgacchato mune
GE07mbh_13_u:040.026c: vapus tejaś ca kīdṛg vai tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:040.027a: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai vipulāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_13_u:040.028c: tāṃs tān vikurute bhāvān bahūn atha muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.030a: śikhī jaṭī cīravāsāḥ punar bhavati putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:040.030c: bṛhaccharīraś ca punaḥ pīvaro 'tha punaḥ kṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.031a: gauraṃ śyāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇaṃ vikurute punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.031c: virūpo rūpavāṃś caiva yuvā vṛddhas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:040.032a: prājño jaḍaś ca mūkaś ca hrasvo dīrghas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:040.032c: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaś caiva vaiśyaḥ śūdras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:040.034a: daivaṃ daityam atho rājñāṃ vapur dhārayate 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:040.035a: catuṣpād bahurūpaś ca punar bhavati bāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.036a: na śakyam asya grahaṇaṃ kartuṃ vipula kena cit
GE07mbh_13_u:040.036c: api viśvakṛtā tāta yena sṛṣṭam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:040.037c: vāyubhūtaś ca sa punar devarājo bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:040.038d-0294_01: sā tvayā satataṃ rakṣyā ity uktvā prayayau muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.039c: kratāv upahitaṃ nyastaṃ haviḥ śveva durātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:040.040a: evam ākhyāya sa munir yajñakāro 'gamat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.041a: vipulas tu vacaḥ śrutvā guroś cintāparo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:040.041c: rakṣāṃ ca paramāṃ cakre devarājān mahābalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:040.042a: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gurudārābhirakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:040.042c: māyāvī hi surendro 'sau durdharṣaś cāpi vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:040.043c: uṭajaṃ vā tathā hy asya nānāvidhasarūpatā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.044c: tasmād imāṃ saṃpraviśya ruciṃ sthāsye 'ham adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:040.045a: atha vā pauruṣeṇeyam aśakyā rakṣituṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.047a: yady ucchiṣṭām imāṃ patnīṃ ruciṃ paśyeta me guruḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.048a: na ceyaṃ rakṣituṃ śakyā yathānyā pramadā nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.048c: māyāvī hi surendro 'sāv aho prāpto 'smi saṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:040.049a: avaśyakaraṇīyaṃ hi guror iha hi śāsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:040.049c: yadi tv etad ahaṃ kuryām āścaryaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.050d-0295_03: garbhasaṃstho yathā putro jāyamāno na lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:040.050d-0295_04: evaṃ jñānī na laukyaiś ca karmabhir naiva duṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:040.051a: yathā hi śūnyāṃ pathikaḥ sabhām adhyāvaset pathi
GE07mbh_13_u:040.053a: ity evaṃ dharmam ālokya vedavedāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.053c: tapaś ca vipulaṃ dṛṣṭvā guror ātmana eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:040.054a: iti niścitya manasā rakṣāṃ prati sa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.054c: ātiṣṭhat paramaṃ yatnaṃ yathā tac chṛṇu pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:040.055d-0296_01: vipulo 'tha ruciṃ tasmin yogāt tāṃ praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:040.056a: netrābhyāṃ netrayor asyā raśmīn saṃyojya raśmibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.056c: viveśa vipulaḥ kāyam ākāśaṃ pavano yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:040.058c: uvāsa rakṣaṇe yukto na ca sā tam abudhyata
GE07mbh_13_u:040.059a: yaṃ kālaṃ nāgato rājan gurus tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:040.059c: kratuṃ samāpya svagṛhaṃ taṃ kālaṃ so 'bhyarakṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:041.001c: idam antaram ity evaṃ tato 'bhyāgād athāśramam
GE07mbh_13_u:041.003a: sa dadarśa tam āsīnaṃ vipulasya kalevaram
GE07mbh_13_u:041.005a: sā tam ālokya sahasā pratyutthātum iyeṣa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:041.005c: rūpeṇa vismitā ko 'sīty atha vaktum ihecchatī
GE07mbh_13_u:041.007c: tvadartham āgataṃ viddhi devendraṃ māṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_13_u:041.008c: tat paryāpnuhi māṃ subhru purā kālo 'tivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:041.009a: tam evaṃvādinaṃ śakraṃ śuśrāva vipulo muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.010a: na śaśāka ca sā rājan pratyutthātum aninditā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.010c: vaktuṃ ca nāśakad rājan viṣṭabdhā vipulena sā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.011a: ākāraṃ gurupatnyās tu vijñāya sa bhṛgūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.011e: babandha yogabandhaiś ca tasyāḥ sarvendriyāṇi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.012a: tāṃ nirvikārāṃ dṛṣṭvā tu punar eva śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.013a: ehy ehīti tataḥ sā taṃ prativaktum iyeṣa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:041.013c: sa tāṃ vācaṃ guroḥ patnyā vipulaḥ paryavartayat
GE07mbh_13_u:041.014a: bhoḥ kim āgamane kṛtyam iti tasyāś ca niḥsṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.015a: vrīḍitā sā tu tad vākyam uktvā paravaśā tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.015c: puraṃdaraś ca saṃtrasto babhūva vimanās tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.016a: sa tad vaikṛtam ālakṣya devarājo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:041.018a: sa taṃ ghoreṇa tapasā yuktaṃ dṛṣṭvā puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.019c: svaṃ kalevaram āviśya śakraṃ bhītam athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:041.020c: na ciraṃ pūjayiṣyanti devās tvāṃ mānuṣās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.021a: kiṃ nu tad vismṛtaṃ śakra na tan manasi te sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:041.022c: mayeyaṃ rakṣyate mūḍha gaccha pāpa yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:041.023a: nāhaṃ tvām adya mūḍhātman daheyaṃ hi svatejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.023c: kṛpāyamāṇas tu na te dagdhum icchāmi vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:041.024a: sa ca ghoratapā dhīmān gurur me pāpacetasam
GE07mbh_13_u:041.024c: dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ nirdahed adya krodhadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:041.025a: naivaṃ tu śakra kartavyaṃ punar mānyāś ca te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.026a: amaro 'smīti yad buddhim etām āsthāya vartase
GE07mbh_13_u:041.026c: māvamaṃsthā na tapasām asādhyaṃ nāma kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:041.027a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ śakro vipulasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.028c: kṛtvā yajñaṃ yathākāmam ājagāma svam āśramam
GE07mbh_13_u:041.030a: abhivādya ca śāntātmā sa guruṃ guruvatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.031c: nivedayām āsa tadā vipulaḥ śakrakarma tat
GE07mbh_13_u:041.032a: tac chrutvā sa munis tuṣṭo vipulasya pratāpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:041.033a: vipulasya gurau vṛttiṃ bhaktim ātmani ca prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:041.033c: dharme ca sthiratāṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv ity uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:041.034c: vareṇa cchandayām āsa sa tasmād guruvatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.001a: vipulas tv akarot tīvraṃ tapaḥ kṛtvā guror vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.002a: sa tena karmaṇā spardhan pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:042.002c: cacāra gatabhīḥ prīto labdhakīrtir varo nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:042.003a: ubhau lokau jitau cāpi tathaivāmanyata prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.003c: karmaṇā tena kauravya tapasā vipulena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:042.004a: atha kāle vyatikrānte kasmiṃś cit kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:042.004c: rucyā bhaginyā dānaṃ vai babhūva dhanadhānyavat
GE07mbh_13_u:042.005a: etasminn eva kāle tu divyā kā cid varāṅganā
GE07mbh_13_u:042.007a: tāny agṛhṇāt tato rājan rucir nalinalocanā
GE07mbh_13_u:042.007c: tadā nimantrakas tasyā aṅgebhyaḥ kṣipram āgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:042.008a: tasyā hi bhaginī tāta jyeṣṭhā nāmnā prabhāvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:042.011a: sā bhartre sarvam ācaṣṭa ruciḥ surucirānanā
GE07mbh_13_u:042.011c: bhaginyā bhāṣitaṃ sarvam ṛṣis tac cābhyanandata
GE07mbh_13_u:042.012c: puṣpārthe codayām āsa gaccha gaccheti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:042.012d-0298_01: gaccha gaccheti puṣpārtham āśramaṃ me 'tha bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:042.013a: vipulas tu guror vākyam avicārya mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.013c: sa tathety abravīd rājaṃs taṃ ca deśaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:042.014a: yasmin deśe tu tāny āsan patitāni nabhastalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:042.014c: amlānāny api tatrāsan kusumāny aparāṇy api
GE07mbh_13_u:042.015a: tataḥ sa tāni jagrāha divyāni rucirāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:042.016c: tato jagāma tūrṇaṃ ca campāṃ campakamālinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:042.017a: sa vane vijane tāta dadarśa mithunaṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:042.018c: ekas tu na tathā rājaṃś cakratuḥ kalahaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.019a: tvaṃ śīghraṃ gacchasīty eko 'bravīn neti tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.019c: neti neti ca tau tāta parasparam athocatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.020a: tayor vispardhator evaṃ śapatho 'yam abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:042.021a: āvayor anṛtaṃ prāha yas tasyātha dvijasya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:042.021c: vipulasya pare loke yā gatiḥ sā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_13_u:042.022c: evaṃ tīvratapāś cāhaṃ kaṣṭaś cāyaṃ parigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.023a: mithunasyāsya kiṃ me syāt kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yato gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.025a: tataḥ ṣaḍ anyān puruṣān akṣaiḥ kāñcanarājataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.026a: kurvataḥ śapathaṃ taṃ vai yaḥ kṛto mithunena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:042.026c: vipulaṃ vai samuddiśya te 'pi vākyam athābruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:042.027a: yo lobham āsthāyāsmākaṃ viṣamaṃ kartum utsahet
GE07mbh_13_u:042.027c: vipulasya pare loke yā gatis tām avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:042.028a: etac chrutvā tu vipulo nāpaśyad dharmasaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:042.029a: sa pradadhyau tadā rājann agnāv agnir ivāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.030a: tasya cintayatas tāta bahvyo dinaniśā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.030c: idam āsīn manasi ca rucyā rakṣaṇakāritam
GE07mbh_13_u:042.031c: vidhāya na mayā coktaṃ satyam etad guros tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:042.032a: etad ātmani kauravya duṣkṛtaṃ vipulas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:042.032c: amanyata mahābhāga tathā tac ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:042.033a: sa campāṃ nagarīm etya puṣpāṇi gurave dadau
GE07mbh_13_u:042.033c: pūjayām āsa ca guruṃ vidhivat sa gurupriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.001a: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya śiṣyaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:043.001c: devaśarmā mahātejā yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa devaśarmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:043.002a: kiṃ te vipula dṛṣṭaṃ vai tasminn adya mahāvane
GE07mbh_13_u:043.002c: te tvā jānanti nipuṇa ātmā ca rucir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:043.003a: brahmarṣe mithunaṃ kiṃ tat ke ca te puruṣā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:043.003c: ye māṃ jānanti tattvena tāṃś ca me vaktum arhasi devaśarmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:043.004a: yad vai tan mithunaṃ brahmann ahorātraṃ hi viddhi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:043.004c: cakravat parivarteta tat te jānāti duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:043.005a: ye ca te puruṣā vipra akṣair dīvyanti hṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_13_u:043.005c: ṛtūṃs tān abhijānīhi te te jānanti duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:043.006a: na māṃ kaś cid vijānīta iti kṛtvā na viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:043.006c: naro rahasi pāpātmā pāpakaṃ karma vai dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:043.007a: kurvāṇaṃ hi naraṃ karma pāpaṃ rahasi sarvadā
GE07mbh_13_u:043.007c: paśyanti ṛtavaś cāpi tathā dinaniśe 'py uta
GE07mbh_13_u:043.007d-0299_01: tathaiva hi bhaveyus te lokāḥ pāpakṛto yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:043.007d-0299_02: kṛtvā nācakṣataḥ karma mama tac ca tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:043.008a: te tvāṃ harṣasmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā guroḥ karmānivedakam
GE07mbh_13_u:043.008c: smārayantas tathā prāhus te yathā śrutavān bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:043.009c: puruṣe pāpakaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā śubhakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.010a: tat tvayā mama yat karma vyabhicārād bhayātmakam
GE07mbh_13_u:043.010b-0300_01: tat tvayā vai tathā kāryam abhicārabhayātmakam
GE07mbh_13_u:043.010c: nākhyātam iti jānantas te tvām āhus tathā dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:043.011a: te caiva hi bhaveyus te lokāḥ pāpakṛto yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:043.011c: kṛtvā nācakṣataḥ karma mama yac ca tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:043.012a: tathā śakyā ca durvṛttā rakṣituṃ pramadā dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:043.012c: na ca tvaṃ kṛtavān kiṃ cid āgaḥ prīto 'smi tena te
GE07mbh_13_u:043.012d-0301_01: manodoṣavihīnānāṃ na doṣaḥ syāt tathā tava
GE07mbh_13_u:043.012d-0301_03: yateś ca kāmukānāṃ ca yoṣidrūpe 'nyathā matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.012d-0301_04: aśikṣayaiva manasaḥ prāyo lokas tu vañcyate
GE07mbh_13_u:043.012d-0301_05: lolety udvijate loko vaktrāsava iti spṛhā
GE07mbh_13_u:043.012d-0301_08: niṣkaṣāyo viśuddhas tvaṃ rucyāveśān na dūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.013a: yadi tv ahaṃ tvā durvṛttam adrākṣaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:043.013c: śapeyaṃ tvām ahaṃ krodhān na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:043.014a: sajjanti puruṣe nāryaḥ puṃsāṃ so 'rthaś ca puṣkalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.014c: anyathā rakṣataḥ śāpo 'bhaviṣyat te gatiś ca sā
GE07mbh_13_u:043.015a: rakṣitā sā tvayā putra mama cāpi niveditā
GE07mbh_13_u:043.015c: ahaṃ te prītimāṃs tāta svasti svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:043.016a: ity uktvā vipulaṃ prīto devaśarmā mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.018a: tasmād bravīmi pārtha tvā striyaḥ sarvāḥ sadaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:043.018c: ubhayaṃ dṛśyate tāsu satataṃ sādhv asādhu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:043.021a: evam etāsu rakṣā vai śakyā kartuṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.021c: anyathā rājaśārdūla na śakyā rakṣituṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.022c: nāsām asti priyo nāma maithune saṃgame nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.023a: etāḥ kṛtyāś ca kāryāś ca kṛtāś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:043.023c: na caikasmin ramanty etāḥ puruṣe pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:043.024a: nāsu sneho nṛbhiḥ kāryas tathaiverṣyā janeśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:043.024c: khedam āsthāya bhuñjīta dharmam āsthāya caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:043.026a: tenaikena tu rakṣā vai vipulena kṛtā striyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:043.026c: nānyaḥ śakto nṛloke 'smin rakṣituṃ nṛpa yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.001a: yan mūlaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prajanasya gṛhasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:044.001c: pitṛdevātithīnāṃ ca tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:044.002a: ayaṃ hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmaś cintyatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.003a: śīlavṛtte samājñāya vidyāṃ yoniṃ ca karma ca
GE07mbh_13_u:044.003c: adbhir eva pradātavyā kanyā guṇavate vare
GE07mbh_13_u:044.003e: brāhmaṇānāṃ satām eṣa dharmo nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:044.004a: āvāhyam āvahed evaṃ yo dadyād anukūlataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.004c: śiṣṭānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.005c: abhipretā ca yā yasya tasmai deyā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:044.005e: gāndharvam iti taṃ dharmaṃ prāhur dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.006a: dhanena bahunā krītvā saṃpralobhya ca bāndhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:044.006c: asurāṇāṃ nṛpaitaṃ vai dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.007a: hatvā chittvā ca śīrṣāṇi rudatāṃ rudatīṃ gṛhāt
GE07mbh_13_u:044.007d-0304_01: suptāṃ mattāṃ pramattāṃ vā raho yatropagacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:044.008a: pañcānāṃ tu trayo dharmyā dvāv adharmyau yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:044.008c: paiśāca āsuraś caiva na kartavyau kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:044.009a: brāhmaḥ kṣātro 'tha gāndharva ete dharmyā nararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:044.009c: pṛthag vā yadi vā miśrāḥ kartavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.010a: tisro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya dve bhārye kṣatriyasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:044.010c: vaiśyaḥ svajātiṃ vindeta tāsv apatyaṃ samaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:044.011a: brāhmaṇī tu bhavej jyeṣṭhā kṣatriyā kṣatriyasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:044.011c: ratyartham api śūdrā syān nety āhur apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.012d-0305_04: kāmo yasyāṃ niṣiddhaś ca ke cid icchanti cāpadi
GE07mbh_13_u:044.014a: yasyās tu na bhaved bhrātā pitā vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:044.014c: nopayaccheta tāṃ jātu putrikādharmiṇī hi sā
GE07mbh_13_u:044.015a: trīṇi varṣāṇy udīkṣeta kanyā ṛtumatī satī
GE07mbh_13_u:044.015c: caturthe tv atha saṃprāpte svayaṃ bhartāram arjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:044.016a: prajano hīyate tasyā ratiś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:044.017a: asapiṇḍā ca yā mātur asagotrā ca yā pituḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.017c: ity etām anugaccheta taṃ dharmaṃ manur abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:044.018a: śulkam anyena dattaṃ syād dadānīty āha cāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.018c: balād anyaḥ prabhāṣeta dhanam anyaḥ pradarśayet
GE07mbh_13_u:044.019a: pāṇigrahītā tv anyaḥ syāt kasya kanyā pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:044.019c: tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:044.020a: yat kiṃ cit karma mānuṣyaṃ saṃsthānāya prakṛṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:044.020c: mantravan mantritaṃ tasya mṛṣāvādas tu pātakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.021c: mṛṣokte daṇḍam arhanti nety āhur apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.022a: na hy akāmena saṃvādaṃ manur evaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_13_u:044.022c: ayaśasyam adharmyaṃ ca yan mṛṣā dharmakopanam
GE07mbh_13_u:044.023c: dharmato yāṃ prayacchanti yāṃ ca krīṇanti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:044.024c: tathā sidhyanti te mantrā nādattāyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:044.025a: yas tv atra mantrasamayo bhāryāpatyor mithaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.025c: tam evāhur garīyāṃsaṃ yaś cāsau jñātibhiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.026a: devadattāṃ patir bhāryāṃ vetti dharmasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:044.026c: sā daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ vācam anṛtāṃ paryudasyati
GE07mbh_13_u:044.027a: kanyāyāṃ prāptaśulkāyāṃ jyāyāṃś ced āvrajed varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.028a: tasminn ubhayato doṣe kurvañ chreyaḥ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:044.028c: ayaṃ naḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmaś cintyatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.029a: tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:044.029c: tad etat sarvam ācakṣva na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:044.030a: na vai niṣṭhākaraṃ śulkaṃ jñātvāsīt tena nāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:044.030c: na hi śulkaparāḥ santaḥ kanyāṃ dadati karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:044.031a: anyair guṇair upetaṃ tu śulkaṃ yācanti bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.032a: tac ca tāṃ ca dadāty eva na śulkaṃ vikrayo na saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.032c: pratigṛhya bhaved deyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.033a: dāsyāmi bhavate kanyām iti pūrvaṃ nabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:044.033c: ye caivāhur ye ca nāhur ye cāvaśyaṃ vadanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:044.034a: tasmād ā grahaṇāt pāṇer yācayanti parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:044.034c: kanyāvaraḥ purā datto marudbhir iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:044.035c: tan mūlaṃ kāmamūlasya prajanasyeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.036a: samīkṣya ca bahūn doṣān saṃvāsād vidviṣāṇayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.036c: yathā niṣṭhākaraṃ śulkaṃ na jātv āsīt tathā śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:044.037c: jitvā ca māgadhān sarvān kāśīn atha ca kosalān
GE07mbh_13_u:044.038a: pāṇau gṛhītā tatraiva visṛjyā iti me pitā
GE07mbh_13_u:044.038c: abravīd itarāṃ kanyām āvahat sa tu kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.039a: apy anyām anupapraccha śaṅkamānaḥ pitur vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.039c: atīva hy asya dharmepsā pitur me 'bhyadhikābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:044.040a: tato 'ham abruvaṃ rājann ācārepsur idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.040c: ācāraṃ tattvato vettum icchāmīti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.041a: tato mayaivam ukte tu vākye dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.041c: pitā mama mahārāja bāhlīko vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:044.042a: yadi vaḥ śulkato niṣṭhā na pāṇigrahaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:044.043a: na hi dharmavidaḥ prāhuḥ pramāṇaṃ vākyataḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:044.043c: yeṣāṃ vai śulkato niṣṭhā na pāṇigrahaṇāt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:044.044a: prasiddhaṃ bhāṣitaṃ dāne teṣāṃ pratyasanaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.044c: ye manyante krayaṃ śulkaṃ na te dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.045a: na caitebhyaḥ pradātavyā na voḍhavyā tathāvidhā
GE07mbh_13_u:044.045c: na hy eva bhāryā kretavyā na vikreyā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:044.046a: ye ca krīṇanti dāsīvad ye ca vikrīṇate janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.046c: bhavet teṣāṃ tathā niṣṭhā lubdhānāṃ pāpacetasām
GE07mbh_13_u:044.047a: asmin dharme satyavantaṃ paryapṛcchanta vai janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.048a: pāṇigrahītā cānyaḥ syād atra no dharmasaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.048c: tan naś chindhi mahāprājña tvaṃ hi vai prājñasaṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.048e: tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ cakṣur bhavatu no bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:044.049a: tān evaṃ bruvataḥ sarvān satyavān vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:044.049c: yatreṣṭaṃ tatra deyā syān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:044.049e: kurvate jīvato 'py evaṃ mṛte naivāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.050a: devaraṃ praviśet kanyā tapyed vāpi mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.050c: tam evānuvratā bhūtvā pāṇigrāhasya nāma sā
GE07mbh_13_u:044.051a: likhanty eva tu keṣāṃ cid apareṣāṃ śanair api
GE07mbh_13_u:044.051c: iti ye saṃvadanty atra ta etaṃ niścayaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:044.052a: tat pāṇigrahaṇāt pūrvam uttaraṃ yatra vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:044.053c: pāṇigrāhasya bhāryā syād yasya cādbhiḥ pradīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:045.001a: kanyāyāḥ prāptaśulkāyāḥ patiś cen nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:045.001c: tatra kā pratipattiḥ syāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:045.002a: yāputrakasyāpy arikthasya pratipat sā tadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:045.003a: atha cet sāharec chulkaṃ krītā śulkapradasya sā
GE07mbh_13_u:045.004a: na tasyā mantravat kāryaṃ kaś cit kurvīta kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:045.005a: svayaṃ vṛteti sāvitrī pitrā vai pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_13_u:045.005c: tat tasyānye praśaṃsanti dharmajñā netare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.006a: etat tu nāpare cakrur na pare jātu sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.007a: asminn eva prakaraṇe sukratur vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:045.008c: anupraśnaḥ saṃśayo vā satām etad upālabhet
GE07mbh_13_u:045.009a: asad eva hi dharmasya pramādo dharma āsuraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.009c: nānuśuśruma jātv etām imāṃ pūrveṣu janmasu
GE07mbh_13_u:045.010a: bhāryāpatyor hi saṃbandhaḥ strīpuṃsos tulya eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.010c: ratiḥ sādhāraṇo dharma iti cāha sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.011a: atha kena pramāṇena puṃsām ādīyate dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:045.011c: putravad dhi pitus tasya kanyā bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:045.012a: yathaivātmā tathā putraḥ putreṇa duhitā samā
GE07mbh_13_u:045.012c: tasyām ātmani tiṣṭhantyāṃ katham anyo dhanaṃ haret
GE07mbh_13_u:045.013a: mātuś ca yautakaṃ yat syāt kumārībhāga eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.013c: dauhitra eva vā riktham aputrasya pitur haret
GE07mbh_13_u:045.014a: dadāti hi sa piṇḍaṃ vai pitur mātāmahasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:045.015a: anyatra jātayā sā hi prajayā putra īhate
GE07mbh_13_u:045.016c: vikrītāsu ca ye putrā bhavanti pitur eva te
GE07mbh_13_u:045.019a: yo manuṣyaḥ svakaṃ putraṃ vikrīya dhanam icchati
GE07mbh_13_u:045.019c: kanyāṃ vā jīvitārthāya yaḥ śulkena prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:045.020c: svedaṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca tasmin preta upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:045.021a: ārṣe gomithunaṃ śulkaṃ ke cid āhur mṛṣaiva tat
GE07mbh_13_u:045.021c: alpaṃ vā bahu vā rājan vikrayas tāvad eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.022a: yady apy ācaritaḥ kaiś cin naiṣa dharmaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:045.023a: vaśyāṃ kumārīṃ vihitāṃ ye ca tām upabhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:045.023c: ete pāpasya kartāras tamasy andhe 'tha śerate
GE07mbh_13_u:045.024a: anyo 'py atha na vikreyo manuṣyaḥ kiṃ punaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:045.024c: adharmamūlair hi dhanair na tair artho 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:046.001c: yasyāḥ kiṃ cin nādadate jñātayo na sa vikrayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.002a: arhaṇaṃ tat kumārīṇām ānṛśaṃsyatamaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:046.002c: sarvaṃ ca pratideyaṃ syāt kanyāyai tad aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.003a: pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiś caiva śvaśurair atha devaraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.004a: yadi vai strī na roceta pumāṃsaṃ na pramodayet
GE07mbh_13_u:046.004c: amodanāt punaḥ puṃsaḥ prajanaṃ na pravardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:046.005a: pūjyā lālayitavyāś ca striyo nityaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:046.005b-0307_01: striyo yatra ca pūjyante ramante tatra devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.005c: apūjitāś ca yatraitāḥ sarvās tatrāphalāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.005e: tadaiva tat kulaṃ nāsti yadā śocanti jāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.006c: naiva bhānti na vardhante śriyā hīnāni pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:046.007a: striyaḥ puṃsāṃ paridade manur jigamiṣur divam
GE07mbh_13_u:046.008c: striyo mānanam arhanti tā mānayata mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.009a: strīpratyayo hi vo dharmo ratibhogāś ca kevalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:046.012a: nāsti yajñaḥ striyaḥ kaś cin na śrāddhaṃ nopavāsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:046.012c: dharmas tu bhartṛśuśrūṣā tayā svargaṃ jayaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:046.013a: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane
GE07mbh_13_u:046.013c: putrās tu sthavirībhāve na strī svātantryam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:046.014a: śriya etāḥ striyo nāma satkāryā bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:046.014c: lālitā nigṛhītā ca strī śrīr bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:047.001c: atīva saṃśayacchettā bhavān vai prathitaḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:047.002a: kaś cit tu saṃśayo me 'sti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:047.002c: asyām āpadi kaṣṭāyām anyaṃ pṛcchāma kaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_13_u:047.003a: yathā nareṇa kartavyaṃ yaś ca dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.003c: etat sarvaṃ mahābāho bhavān vyākhyātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.004c: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca ratim icchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.005c: ānupūrvyeṇa kas teṣāṃ pitryaṃ dāyādyam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.006a: kena vā kiṃ tato hāryaṃ pitṛvittāt pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:047.006c: etad icchāmi kathitaṃ vibhāgas teṣu yaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.007a: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyas trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.008a: vaiṣamyād atha vā lobhāt kāmād vāpi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:047.008c: brāhmaṇasya bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:047.009a: śūdrāṃ śayanam āropya brāhmaṇaḥ pīḍito bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.010a: tatra jāteṣv apatyeṣu dviguṇaṃ syād yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.010c: atas te niyamaṃ vitte saṃpravakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:047.011a: lakṣaṇyo govṛṣo yānaṃ yat pradhānatamaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.011c: brāhmaṇyās tad dharet putra ekāṃśaṃ vai pitur dhanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:047.012a: śeṣaṃ tu daśadhā kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.012c: tatra tenaiva hartavyāś catvāro 'ṃśāḥ pitur dhanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:047.013a: kṣatriyāyās tu yaḥ putro brāhmaṇaḥ so 'py asaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.013c: sa tu mātṛviśeṣeṇa trīn aṃśān hartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.014a: varṇe tṛtīye jātas tu vaiśyāyāṃ brāhmaṇād api
GE07mbh_13_u:047.016c: savarṇāsu tu jātānāṃ samān bhāgān prakalpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.017c: triṣu varṇeṣu jāto hi brāhmaṇād brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.018a: smṛtā varṇāś ca catvāraḥ pañcamo nādhigamyate
GE07mbh_13_u:047.018c: haret tu daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ śūdrāputraḥ pitur dhanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:047.019a: tat tu dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.019c: avaśyaṃ hi dhanaṃ deyaṃ śūdrāputrāya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:047.020a: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharma iti tasmai pradīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:047.021a: yadi vāpy ekaputraḥ syād aputro yadi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.021d-0308_01: smṛta ekaś caturbhāgaḥ kanyābhāgas tu dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.022a: traivārṣikād yadā bhaktād adhikaṃ syād dvijasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:047.022c: yajeta tena dravyeṇa na vṛthā sādhayed dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:047.023a: trisāhasraparo dāyaḥ striyo deyo dhanasya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:047.023c: tac ca bhartrā dhanaṃ dattaṃ nādattaṃ bhoktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.024c: nāpahāraṃ striyaḥ kuryuḥ pativittāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:047.025a: striyās tu yad bhaved vittaṃ pitrā dattaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.025c: brāhmaṇyās tad dharet kanyā yathā putras tathā hi sā
GE07mbh_13_u:047.025e: sā hi putrasamā rājan vihitā kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:047.026c: etad dharmam anusmṛtya na vṛthā sādhayed dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:047.027a: śūdrāyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto yady adeyadhanaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.028a: brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto brāhmaṇaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.028c: kṣatriyāyāṃ tathaiva syād vaiśyāyām api caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:047.029a: kasmāt te viṣamaṃ bhāgaṃ bhajeran nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:047.029c: yadā sarve trayo varṇās tvayoktā brāhmaṇā iti
GE07mbh_13_u:047.030a: dārā ity ucyate loke nāmnaikena paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:047.031a: tisraḥ kṛtvā puro bhāryāḥ paścād vindeta brāhmaṇīm
GE07mbh_13_u:047.031c: sā jyeṣṭhā sā ca pūjyā syāt sā ca tābhyo garīyasī
GE07mbh_13_u:047.032c: havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca yac cānyad dharmayuktaṃ bhaved gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:047.033a: na tasyāṃ jātu tiṣṭhantyām anyā tat kartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.033c: brāhmaṇī tv eva tat kuryād brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.034a: annaṃ pānaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
