GE07mbh_13_u:047.034c: brāhmaṇyai tāni deyāni bhartuḥ sā hi garīyasī
GE07mbh_13_u:047.035c: tatrāpy eṣa mahārāja dṛṣṭo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.036a: atha ced anyathā kuryād yadi kāmād yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.037a: brāhmaṇyāḥ sadṛśaḥ putraḥ kṣatriyāyāś ca yo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.037c: rājan viśeṣo nāsty atra varṇayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_13_u:047.038a: na tu jātyā samā loke brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.038c: brāhmaṇyāḥ prathamaḥ putro bhūyān syād rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:047.039a: yathā na sadṛśī jātu brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.039c: kṣatriyāyās tathā vaiśyā na jātu sadṛśī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.040a: śrīś ca rājyaṃ ca kośaś ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.040c: vihitaṃ dṛśyate rājan sāgarāntā ca medinī
GE07mbh_13_u:047.041a: kṣatriyo hi svadharmeṇa śriyaṃ prāpnoti bhūyasīm
GE07mbh_13_u:047.041c: rājā daṇḍadharo rājan rakṣā nānyatra kṣatriyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:047.042a: brāhmaṇā hi mahābhāgā devānām api devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.043a: praṇītam ṛṣibhir jñātvā dharmaṃ śāśvatam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:047.044a: dasyubhir hriyamāṇaṃ ca dhanaṃ dārāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.044c: sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ trātā bhavati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.045a: bhūyān syāt kṣatriyāputro vaiśyāputrān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.045d-0309_01: vaiśyāputro 'pi bhūyāṃś ca śūdrāputrān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.045d-0309_02: bhayaṃ saṃjanayaty eva tasmād deyadhanas tv asau
GE07mbh_13_u:047.046a: uktaṃ te vidhivad rājan brāhmaṇasve pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:047.046c: itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ kathaṃ viniyamo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.047c: tṛtīyā ca bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:047.048a: eṣa eva kramo hi syāt kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.048c: aṣṭadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ kṣatriyasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:047.049a: kṣatriyāyā haret putraś caturo 'ṃśān pitur dhanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:047.049c: yuddhāvahārikaṃ yac ca pituḥ syāt sa harec ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:047.050a: vaiśyāputras tu bhāgāṃs trīn śūdrāputras tathāṣṭamam
GE07mbh_13_u:047.050c: so 'pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.051a: ekaiva hi bhaved bhāryā vaiśyasya kurunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:047.051c: dvitīyā vā bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:047.052c: śūdrāyāṃ caiva kaunteya tayor viniyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.053a: pañcadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ vaiśyasvaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:047.053c: tayor apatye vakṣyāmi vibhāgaṃ ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:047.054c: pañcamas tu bhaved bhāgaḥ śūdrāputrāya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:047.055a: so 'pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:047.055c: tribhir varṇais tathā jātaḥ śūdro deyadhano bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.056a: śūdrasya syāt savarṇaiva bhāryā nānyā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:047.056c: śūdrasya samabhāgaḥ syād yadi putraśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:047.057c: sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ samabhāgo dhane smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.058a: jyeṣṭhasya bhāgo jyeṣṭhaḥ syād ekāṃśo yaḥ pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.058c: eṣa dāyavidhiḥ pārtha pūrvam uktaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:047.060a: harej jyeṣṭhaḥ pradhānāṃśam ekaṃ tulyāsuteṣv api
GE07mbh_13_u:047.060c: madhyamo madhyamaṃ caiva kanīyāṃs tu kanīyasam
GE07mbh_13_u:047.061a: evaṃ jātiṣu sarvāsu savarṇāḥ śreṣṭhatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:047.061c: maharṣir api caitad vai mārīcaḥ kāśyapo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:048.001a: arthāśrayād vā kāmād vā varṇānāṃ vāpy aniścayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:048.002c: ko dharmaḥ kāni karmāṇi tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:048.003c: asṛjat sa ha yajñārthe pūrvam eva prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.004a: bhāryāś catasro viprasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:048.005a: paraṃ śavād brāhmaṇasyaiṣa putraḥ; śūdrāputraṃ pāraśavaṃ tam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.005c: śuśrūṣakaḥ svasya kulasya sa syāt; svaṃ cāritraṃ nityam atho na jahyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:048.006a: sarvān upāyān api saṃpradhārya; samuddharet svasya kulasya tantum
GE07mbh_13_u:048.006c: jyeṣṭho yavīyān api yo dvijasya; śuśrūṣavān dānaparāyaṇaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_13_u:048.007c: hīnavarṇas tṛtīyāyāṃ śūdra ugra iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.008a: dve cāpi bhārye vaiśyasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:048.008c: śūdrā śūdrasya cāpy ekā śūdram eva prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:048.012a: bandī tu jāyate vaiśyān māgadho vākyajīvanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.015a: yathā caturṣu varṇeṣu dvayor ātmāsya jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:048.015c: ānantaryāt tu jāyante tathā bāhyāḥ pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.016a: te cāpi sadṛśaṃ varṇaṃ janayanti svayoniṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:048.017a: yathā ca śūdro brāhmaṇyāṃ jantuṃ bāhyaṃ prasūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:048.018a: pratilomaṃ tu vartanto bāhyād bāhyataraṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.018c: hīnā hīnāt prasūyante varṇāḥ pañcadaśaiva te
GE07mbh_13_u:048.019c: vrātyānām atra jāyante sairandhrā māgadheṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:048.029c: pracchannā vā prakāśā vā veditavyāḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.030a: caturṇām eva varṇānāṃ dharmo nānyasya vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:048.030c: varṇānāṃ dharmahīneṣu saṃjñā nāstīha kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:048.031c: bāhyā bāhyais tu jāyante yathāvṛtti yathāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:048.032b-0311_02: vaseyur ete pitryais tu vartayantaḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.033a: gobrāhmaṇārthe sāhāyyaṃ kurvāṇā vai na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.034c: manujavyāghra bhavati tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.035a: yathopadeśaṃ parikīrtitāsu; naraḥ prajāyeta vicārya buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:048.035c: vihīnayonir hi suto 'vasādayet; titīrṣamāṇaṃ salile yathopalam
GE07mbh_13_u:048.036a: avidvāṃsam alaṃ loke vidvāṃsam api vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.037a: svabhāvaś caiva nārīṇāṃ narāṇām iha dūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:048.041a: pitryaṃ vā bhajate śīlaṃ mātṛjaṃ vā tathobhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:048.041c: na kathaṃ cana saṃkīrṇaḥ prakṛtiṃ svāṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:048.042a: yathaiva sadṛśo rūpe mātāpitror hi jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:048.042c: vyāghraś citrais tathā yoniṃ puruṣaḥ svāṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:048.043c: saṃśrayaty eva tacchīlaṃ naro 'lpam api vā bahu
GE07mbh_13_u:048.044c: svavarṇam anyavarṇaṃ vā svaśīlaṃ śāsti niścaye
GE07mbh_13_u:048.047a: jyāyāṃsam api śīlena vihīnaṃ naiva pūjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:048.047c: api śūdraṃ tu sadvṛttaṃ dharmajñam abhipūjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:048.048a: ātmānam ākhyāti hi karmabhir naraḥ; svaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.048c: pranaṣṭam apy ātmakulaṃ tathā naraḥ; punaḥ prakāśaṃ kurute svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:048.049a: yoniṣv etāsu sarvāsu saṃkīrṇāsv itarāsu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:048.049c: yatrātmānaṃ na janayed budhas tāḥ parivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:049.001a: brūhi putrān kuruśreṣṭha varṇānāṃ tvaṃ pṛthak
GE07mbh_13_u:049.001c: kīdṛśyāṃ kīdṛśāś cāpi putrāḥ kasya ca ke ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002c: atra no muhyatāṃ rājan saṃśayaṃ chettum arhasi bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_01: ātmā putras tu vijñeyaḥ prathamo bahudhā pare
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_02: sve kṣetre saṃskṛte yas tu putram utpādayet svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_05: putrikā syād duhitari saṃkalpenāpi vā sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_06: talpe jātaḥ pramītasya klībasya patitasya vā
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_07: svadharmeṇa niyukto yaḥ sa putraḥ kṣetrajaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_08: mātā pitā ca dadyātāṃ yam adbhiḥ putram āpadi
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_11: putraṃ putraguṇair yuktaṃ vijñeyas tu sa kṛtrimaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_12: utpadyate yas tu gūḍhaṃ na ca jñāyeta kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_13: sa bhaved gūḍhajo nāma tasya syād yasya talpajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_15: yaḥ putraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād apaviddhaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_16: pitṛveśmani kanyā tu yaṃ putraṃ janayed rahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_17: kānīnaṃ taṃ vaden nāmnā voḍhuḥ kanyāsamudbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_18: yā garbhiṇī saṃskriyate jñātājñātāpi vā satī
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_19: voḍhuḥ sa garbho bhavati sahoḍha iti cocyate
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_20: yā patyā vā parityaktā atha vā svecchayāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_22: mātāpitṛvihīno vā sakto vā syād akāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_23: ātmānaṃ sparśayed yas tu svayaṃdattaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_24: krīṇīyād yas tv apatyārthaṃ mātāpitror yam antikāt
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_25: sa sutas tasya sadṛśaḥ krīto nāma budhaiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0313_26: dvādaśaite pare prāhur evaṃ dharmasya pāṭhakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0314_01: sā ced akṣatayoniḥ syād gatapratyāgatāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0314_02: paunarbhavena bhartrā sā punaḥ saṃskāram arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_01: yaṃ brāhmaṇas tu śūdrāyāṃ kāmād utpādayet sutam
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_02: sa pārayann eva śavas tasmāt pāraśavaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_03: dāsyāṃ vā dāsadāsyāṃ vā yaḥ śūdrasya suto bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_04: so 'nujñāto hared aṃśam iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_07: bhrātṝṇām ekajātānām ekaś cet putravān bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_08: sarvāṃs tāṃs tena putreṇa putriṇo manur abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_09: sarvāsām ekapatnīnām ekā cet putriṇī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:049.002d-0315_10: sarvās tās tena putreṇa prāha putravatīr manuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.003a: ātmā putras tu vijñeyas tasyānantarajaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.003c: niyuktajaś ca vijñeyaḥ sutaḥ prasṛtajas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:049.004c: tathā dattakṛtau putrāv adhyūḍhaś ca tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.005c: ity ete te samākhyātās tān vijānīhi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:049.006a: ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajāḥ ke syuḥ ke vāpy apasadās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:049.006c: etat sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ vyākhyātuṃ me tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:049.007a: triṣu varṇeṣu ye putrā brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:049.007c: varṇayoś ca dvayoḥ syātāṃ yau rājanyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:049.008c: ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajās te hi tathaivāpasadāñ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:049.009a: caṇḍālo vrātyavenau ca brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāsu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:049.010c: brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāyāṃ ca kṣatriyasyaika eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:049.011a: brāhmaṇyāṃ lakṣyate sūta ity ete 'pasadāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.011c: putrareto na śakyaṃ hi mithyā kartuṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:049.012a: kṣetrajaṃ ke cid evāhuḥ sutaṃ ke cit tu śukrajam
GE07mbh_13_u:049.012c: tulyāv etau sutau kasya tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:049.013a: retajo vā bhavet putras tyakto vā kṣetrajo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:049.013c: adhyūḍhaḥ samayaṃ bhittvety etad eva nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:049.014a: retojaṃ vidma vai putraṃ kṣetrajasyāgamaḥ katham
GE07mbh_13_u:049.014c: adhyūḍhaṃ vidma vai putraṃ hitvā ca samayaṃ katham
GE07mbh_13_u:049.015a: ātmajaṃ putram utpādya yas tyajet kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_13_u:049.015c: na tatra kāraṇaṃ retaḥ sa kṣetrasvāmino bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:049.016a: putrakāmo hi putrārthe yāṃ vṛṇīte viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:049.016c: tatra kṣetraṃ pramāṇaṃ syān na vai tatrātmajaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:049.017c: na hy ātmā śakyate hantuṃ dṛṣṭāntopagato hy asau
GE07mbh_13_u:049.018a: kaś cic ca kṛtakaḥ putraḥ saṃgrahād eva lakṣyate

GE07mbh_13_u:053.020a: atha sarvam upanyastam agrataś cyavanasya tat
GE07mbh_13_u:053.020c: tataḥ sarvaṃ samānīya tac ca śayyāsanaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.022a: na ca tau cakratuḥ kopaṃ daṃpatī sumahāvratau
GE07mbh_13_u:053.023a: tatraiva ca sa rājarṣis tasthau tāṃ rajanīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.023c: sabhāryo vāgyataḥ śrīmān na ca taṃ kopa āviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:053.024a: nityaṃ saṃskṛtam annaṃ tu vividhaṃ rājaveśmani
GE07mbh_13_u:053.024c: śayanāni ca mukhyāni pariṣekāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.025c: na śaśāka tato draṣṭum antaraṃ cyavanas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.026a: punar eva ca viprarṣiḥ provāca kuśikaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.026c: sabhāryo māṃ rathenāśu vaha yatra bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:053.027a: tatheti ca prāha nṛpo nirviśaṅkas tapodhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.028a: ity uktaḥ sa munis tena rājñā hṛṣṭena tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.029a: sajjīkuru rathaṃ kṣipraṃ yas te sāṃgrāmiko mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.031a: tataḥ sa taṃ tathety uktvā kalpayitvā mahāratham
GE07mbh_13_u:053.031c: bhāryāṃ vāme dhuri tadā cātmānaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.032c: sarvam etat tato dattvā nṛpo vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:053.033a: bhagavan kva ratho yātu bravītu bhṛgunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.033c: yatra vakṣyasi viprarṣe tatra yāsyati te rathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.034a: evam uktas tu bhagavān pratyuvācātha taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.035a: śramo mama yathā na syāt tathā me chandacāriṇau
GE07mbh_13_u:053.035c: sukhaṃ caivāsmi voḍhavyo janaḥ sarvaś ca paśyatu
GE07mbh_13_u:053.036a: notsāryaḥ pathikaḥ kaś cit tebhyo dāsyāmy ahaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_13_u:053.036c: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ye kāmān arthayiṣyanti māṃ pathi
GE07mbh_13_u:053.037a: sarvaṃ dāsyāmy aśeṣeṇa dhanaṃ ratnāni caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:053.038a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā bhṛtyān athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:053.038c: yad yad brūyān munis tat tat sarvaṃ deyam aśaṅkitaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.039a: tato ratnāny anekāni striyo yugyam ajāvikam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.040a: anvagacchanta tam ṛṣiṃ rājāmātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.040c: hāhābhūtaṃ ca tat sarvam āsīn nagaram ārtimat
GE07mbh_13_u:053.041c: pṛṣṭhe viddhau kaṭe caiva nirvikārau tam ūhatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.042c: kathaṃ cid ūhatur vīrau daṃpatī taṃ rathottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.044a: tau dṛṣṭvā pauravargas tu bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.044c: abhiśāpabhayāt trasto na ca kiṃ cid uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:053.045a: dvandvaśaś cābruvan sarve paśyadhvaṃ tapaso balam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.045c: kruddhā api muniśreṣṭhaṃ vīkṣituṃ naiva śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.045d-0325_01: brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:053.045d-0325_02: īdṛśaṃ ratham āruhya ko 'nyo jīvitum utsahet
GE07mbh_13_u:053.046c: rājñaś cāpi sabhāryasya dhairyaṃ paśyata yādṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.047a: śrāntāv api hi kṛcchreṇa ratham etaṃ samūhatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.047c: na caitayor vikāraṃ vai dadarśa bhṛgunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.048a: tataḥ sa nirvikārau tau dṛṣṭvā bhṛgukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.048c: vasu viśrāṇayām āsa yathā vaiśravaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.050a: avatīrya rathaśreṣṭhād daṃpatī tau mumoca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:053.050c: vimocya caitau vidhivat tato vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:053.051c: dadāni vāṃ varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tad brūtām iti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:053.052a: sukumārau ca tau vidvān karābhyāṃ munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.053a: athābravīn nṛpo vākyaṃ śramo nāsty āvayor iha
GE07mbh_13_u:053.053c: viśrāntau svaḥ prabhāvāt te dhyānenaiveti bhārgava
GE07mbh_13_u:053.054a: atha tau bhagavān prāha prahṛṣṭaś cyavanas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.054c: na vṛthā vyāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yan mayā tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:053.055c: kaṃ cit kālaṃ vrataparo nivatsyāmīha pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:053.056a: gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ putra viśrāntaḥ punar eṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:053.056c: ihasthaṃ māṃ sabhāryas tvaṃ draṣṭāsi śvo narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:053.057a: na ca manyus tvayā kāryaḥ śreyas te samupasthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.057c: yat kāṅkṣitaṃ hṛdisthaṃ te tat sarvaṃ saṃbhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:053.059a: na me manyur mahābhāga pūto 'smi bhagavaṃs tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.060a: pratodena vraṇā ye me sabhāryasya kṛtās tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.060c: tān na paśyāmi gātreṣu svastho 'smi saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.061a: imāṃ ca devīṃ paśyāmi mune divyāpsaropamām
GE07mbh_13_u:053.061c: śriyā paramayā yuktāṃ yathādṛṣṭāṃ mayā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.062a: tava prasādāt saṃvṛttam idaṃ sarvaṃ mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:053.062c: naitac citraṃ tu bhagavaṃs tvayi satyaparākrama
GE07mbh_13_u:053.063a: ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ cyavanaḥ kuśikaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.063c: āgacchethāḥ sabhāryaś ca tvam iheti narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:053.064a: ity uktaḥ samanujñāto rājarṣir abhivādya tam
GE07mbh_13_u:053.066a: tair vṛtaḥ kuśiko rājā śriyā paramayā jvalan
GE07mbh_13_u:053.067c: bhuktvā sabhāryo rajanīm uvāsa sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:053.068a: tatas tu tau navam abhivīkṣya yauvanaṃ; parasparaṃ vigatajarāv ivāmarau
GE07mbh_13_u:053.068c: nanandatuḥ śayanagatau vapurdharau; śriyā yutau dvijavaradattayā tayā
GE07mbh_13_u:053.069a: sa cāpy ṛṣir bhṛgukulakīrtivardhanas; tapodhano vanam abhirāmam ṛddhimat
GE07mbh_13_u:053.069c: manīṣayā bahuvidharatnabhūṣitaṃ; sasarja yan nāsti śatakrator api
GE07mbh_13_u:054.001a: tataḥ sa rājā rātryante pratibuddho mahāmanāḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:054.002e: tatra divyān abhiprāyān dadarśa kuśikas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:054.003a: parvatān ramyasānūṃś ca nalinīś ca sapaṅkajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.003c: citraśālāś ca vividhās toraṇāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:054.005a: campakāṃs tilakān bhavyān panasān vañjulān api

GE07mbh_13_u:054.006c: tatra tatra parikḷptā dadarśa sa mahīpatiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:054.013a: kāntābhir aparāṃs tatra pariṣvaktān dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:054.013c: na dadarśa ca tān bhūyo dadarśa ca punar nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.014c: haṃsān sumadhurāṃś cāpi tatra śuśrāva pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.015c: svapno 'yaṃ cittavibhraṃśa utāho satyam eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:054.016a: aho saha śarīreṇa prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:054.016c: uttarān vā kurūn puṇyān atha vāpy amarāvatīm
GE07mbh_13_u:054.017a: kiṃ tv idaṃ mahad āścaryaṃ saṃpaśyāmīty acintayat
GE07mbh_13_u:054.019a: tam abhyayāt praharṣeṇa narendraḥ saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_13_u:054.019c: antarhitas tato bhūyaś cyavanaḥ śayanaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:054.020a: tato 'nyasmin vanoddeśe punar eva dadarśa tam
GE07mbh_13_u:054.020e: evaṃ yogabalād vipro mohayām āsa pārthivam
GE07mbh_13_u:054.021a: kṣaṇena tad vanaṃ caiva te caivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.022a: niḥśabdam abhavac cāpi gaṅgākūlaṃ punar nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:054.023a: tataḥ sa rājā kuśikaḥ sabhāryas tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:054.023c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptas tad dṛṣṭvā mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:054.024c: paśya bhadre yathā bhāvāś citrā dṛṣṭāḥ sudurlabhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.025c: tapasā tad avāpyaṃ hi yan na śakyaṃ manorathaiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:054.028d-0326_01: brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ loke tal labdhvā durlabhaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.028d-0326_02: siddhis tatrāpi duṣprāpā siddher api parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.029a: brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ loke rājyaṃ hi sulabhaṃ naraiḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:054.031a: ity uktaḥ sahabhāryas tam abhyagacchan mahāmunim
GE07mbh_13_u:054.031c: śirasā vandanīyaṃ tam avandata sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:054.032a: tasyāśiṣaḥ prayujyātha sa munis taṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_13_u:054.033a: tataḥ prakṛtim āpanno bhārgavo nṛpate nṛpam
GE07mbh_13_u:054.033c: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā tarpayann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:054.034a: rājan samyag jitānīha pañca pañcasu yat tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:054.035a: samyag ārādhitaḥ putra tvayāhaṃ vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:054.035c: na hi te vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:054.036c: prīto 'smi tava rājendra varaś ca pratigṛhyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:054.037c: vartitaṃ bhṛguśārdūla yan na dagdho 'smi tad bahu
GE07mbh_13_u:054.038a: eṣa eva varo mukhyaḥ prāpto me bhṛgunandana

GE07mbh_13_u:054.040a: yadi tu prītimān vipra mayi tvaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:054.040c: asti me saṃśayaḥ kaś cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:055.001a: varaś ca gṛhyatāṃ matto yaś ca te saṃśayo hṛdi
GE07mbh_13_u:055.001c: taṃ ca brūhi naraśreṣṭha sarvaṃ saṃpādayāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:055.002a: yadi prīto 'si bhagavaṃs tato me vada bhārgava
GE07mbh_13_u:055.003c: akiṃcid uktvā gamanaṃ bahiś ca munipuṃgava
GE07mbh_13_u:055.004a: antardhānam akasmāc ca punar eva ca darśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:055.004c: punaś ca śayanaṃ vipra divasān ekaviṃśatim
GE07mbh_13_u:055.005a: tailābhyaktasya gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ ca gṛhe mama
GE07mbh_13_u:055.005e: niryāṇaṃ ca rathenāśu sahasā yat kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.006a: dhanānāṃ ca visargasya vanasyāpi ca darśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:055.007c: punaś cādarśanaṃ tasya śrotum icchāmi kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:055.008a: atīva hy atra muhyāmi cintayāno divāniśam
GE07mbh_13_u:055.008e: etad icchāmi kārtsnyena satyaṃ śrotuṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_13_u:055.009a: śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣeṇa yad idaṃ yena hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.009c: na hi śakyam anākhyātum evaṃ pṛṣṭena pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:055.010c: śrutavān asmi yad rājaṃs tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:055.013a: tato 'ham āgamya purā tvām avocaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:055.013c: niyamaṃ kaṃ cid ārapsye śuśrūṣā kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:055.014a: na ca te duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cid aham āsādayaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:055.014c: tena jīvasi rājarṣe na bhavethās tato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.015c: supto 'smi yadi māṃ kaś cid bodhayed iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:055.016a: yadā tvayā sabhāryeṇa saṃsupto na prabodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:055.016c: ahaṃ tadaiva te prīto manasā rājasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:055.017a: utthāya cāsmi niṣkrānto yadi māṃ tvaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:055.017c: pṛccheḥ kva yāsyasīty evaṃ śapeyaṃ tvām iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:055.018a: antarhitaś cāsmi punaḥ punar eva ca te gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:055.019a: kṣudhito mām asūyethāḥ śramād veti narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:055.019c: etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya karśitau vāṃ mayā kṣudhā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.020a: na ca te 'bhūt susūkṣmo 'pi manyur manasi pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:055.020c: sabhāryasya naraśreṣṭha tena te prītimān aham
GE07mbh_13_u:055.021a: bhojanaṃ ca samānāyya yat tad ādīpitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.021c: krudhyethā yadi mātsaryād iti tan marṣitaṃ ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:055.021d-0327_01: rathena vāhitaś cāpi śramāt krodhodbhavāya te
GE07mbh_13_u:055.022a: tato 'haṃ ratham āruhya tvām avocaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:055.022c: sabhāryo māṃ vahasveti tac ca tvaṃ kṛtavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.023a: aviśaṅko narapate prīto 'haṃ cāpi tena te
GE07mbh_13_u:055.023c: dhanotsarge 'pi ca kṛte na tvāṃ krodhaḥ pradharṣayat
GE07mbh_13_u:055.024a: tataḥ prītena te rājan punar etat kṛtaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:055.024c: sabhāryasya vanaṃ bhūyas tad viddhi manujādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:055.025a: prītyarthaṃ tava caitan me svargasaṃdarśanaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:055.025c: yat te vane 'smin nṛpate dṛṣṭaṃ divyaṃ nidarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:055.027c: tatra yāsīt spṛhā rājaṃs tac cāpi viditaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:055.028a: brāhmaṇyaṃ kāṅkṣase hi tvaṃ tapaś ca pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:055.029a: evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ tāta durlabham
GE07mbh_13_u:055.029c: brāhmaṇye sati carṣitvam ṛṣitve ca tapasvitā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.030a: bhaviṣyaty eṣa te kāmaḥ kuśikāt kauśiko dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:055.031a: vaṃśas te pārthivaśreṣṭha bhṛgūṇām eva tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:055.031c: pautras te bhavitā vipra tapasvī pāvakadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:055.032b-0328_02: sa cāpi bhṛguśārdūlas taṃ vedaṃ dhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:055.032c: trayāṇāṃ caiva lokānāṃ satyam etad bravīmi te

GE07mbh_13_u:055.035c: katham eṣyati vipratvaṃ kulaṃ me bhṛgunandana

GE07mbh_13_u:056.002a: bhṛgūṇāṃ kṣatriyā yājyā nityam eva janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:056.002c: te ca bhedaṃ gamiṣyanti daivayuktena hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:056.003a: kṣatriyāś ca bhṛgūn sarvān vadhiṣyanti narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:056.006a: kaṃ cit kālaṃ tu taṃ vahniṃ sa eva śamayiṣyati

GE07mbh_13_u:056.009c: sa cāpi bhṛguśārdūlas taṃ vedaṃ dhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:056.010a: kulāt tu tava dharmātman kanyāṃ so 'dhigamiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:056.010b-0329_01: kṣatrahantā bhaved dhiṃsram iti devaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:056.010b-0329_02: nārāyaṇam upāsyāsya varāt taṃ putram icchati
