GE07mbh_13_u:056.012c: viśvāmitraṃ tava kule gādheḥ putraṃ sudhārmikam
GE07mbh_13_u:056.013a: striyau tu kāraṇaṃ tatra parivarte bhaviṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:056.014c: bhavitā tvaṃ ca saṃbandhī bhṛgūṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:056.015a: kuśikas tu muner vākyaṃ cyavanasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:056.015c: śrutvā hṛṣṭo 'bhavad rājā vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:056.015e: evam astv iti dharmātmā tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:056.016a: cyavanas tu mahātejāḥ punar eva narādhipam
GE07mbh_13_u:056.016c: varārthaṃ codayām āsa tam uvāca sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:056.017a: bāḍham evaṃ grahīṣyāmi kāmaṃ tvatto mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:056.017c: brahmabhūtaṃ kulaṃ me 'stu dharme cāsya mano bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:056.018a: evam uktas tathety evaṃ pratyuktvā cyavano muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:056.019a: etat te kathitaṃ sarvam aśeṣeṇa mayā nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:056.020a: yathoktaṃ muninā cāpi tathā tad abhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:056.020c: janma rāmasya ca muner viśvāmitrasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:057.002a: prāpya rājyāni śataśo mahīṃ jitvāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:057.003a: kā nu tāsāṃ varastrīṇām avasthādya bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:057.003c: yā hīnāḥ patibhiḥ putrair mātulair bhrātṛbhis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:057.004a: vayaṃ hi tān gurūn hatvā jñātīṃś ca suhṛdo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:057.006a: yudhiṣṭhirasya tad vākyaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.007a: rahasyam adbhutaṃ caiva śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yat tvayi
GE07mbh_13_u:057.007c: yā gatiḥ prāpyate yena pretyabhāveṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:057.008a: tapasā prāpyate svargas tapasā prāpyate yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.008c: āyuḥprakarṣo bhogāś ca labhyante tapasā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:057.009a: jñānaṃ vijñānam ārogyaṃ rūpaṃ saṃpat tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:057.010a: dhanaṃ prāpnoti tapasā maunaṃ jñānaṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:057.011a: ahiṃsāyāḥ phalaṃ rūpaṃ dīkṣāyā janma vai kule
GE07mbh_13_u:057.013c: striyas triṣavaṇasnānād vāyuṃ pītvā kratuṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:057.014a: nityasnāyī bhaved dakṣaḥ saṃdhye tu dve japan dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.018a: udavāsaṃ vased yas tu sa narādhipatir bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:057.024a: upavāsaṃ ca dīkṣāṃ ca abhiṣekaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:057.025a: dāsīdāsam alaṃkārān kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:057.026a: kratubhiś copavāsaiś ca tridivaṃ yāti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:057.026c: labhate ca ciraṃ sthānaṃ balipuṣpaprado naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.027a: suvarṇaśṛṅgais tu vibhūṣitānāṃ; gavāṃ sahasrasya naraḥ pradātā
GE07mbh_13_u:057.027c: prāpnoti puṇyaṃ divi devalokam; ity evam āhur munidevasaṃghāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.028a: prayacchate yaḥ kapilāṃ sacailāṃ; kāṃsyopadohāṃ kanakāgraśṛṅgīm
GE07mbh_13_u:057.028c: tais tair guṇaiḥ kāmadughāsya bhūtvā; naraṃ pradātāram upaiti sā gauḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.029a: yāvanti lomāni bhavanti dhenvās; tāvat phalaṃ prāpnute gopradātā
GE07mbh_13_u:057.029c: putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca kulaṃ ca sarvam; āsaptamaṃ tārayate paratra
GE07mbh_13_u:057.030c: dhenuṃ tilānāṃ dadato dvijāya; lokā vasūnāṃ sulabhā bhavanti
GE07mbh_13_u:057.031a: svakarmabhir mānavaṃ saṃnibaddhaṃ; tīvrāndhakāre narake patantam
GE07mbh_13_u:057.031c: mahārṇave naur iva vāyuyuktā; dānaṃ gavāṃ tārayate paratra
GE07mbh_13_u:057.032a: yo brahmadeyāṃ tu dadāti kanyāṃ; bhūmipradānaṃ ca karoti vipre
GE07mbh_13_u:057.032c: dadāti cānnaṃ vidhivac ca yaś ca; sa lokam āpnoti puraṃdarasya
GE07mbh_13_u:057.033a: naiveśikaṃ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ; dadāti vai yas tu naro dvijāya
GE07mbh_13_u:057.034a: dhuryapradānena gavāṃ tathāśvair; lokān avāpnoti naro vasūnām
GE07mbh_13_u:057.034c: svargāya cāhur hi hiraṇyadānaṃ; tato viśiṣṭaṃ kanakapradānam
GE07mbh_13_u:057.035c: vastrapradānena phalaṃ surūpaṃ; gandhapradāne surabhir naraḥ syāt
GE07mbh_13_u:057.036a: puṣpopagaṃ vātha phalopagaṃ vā; yaḥ pādapaṃ sparśayate dvijāya
GE07mbh_13_u:057.036c: sa strīsamṛddhaṃ bahuratnapūrṇaṃ; labhaty ayatnopagataṃ gṛhaṃ vai
GE07mbh_13_u:057.037c: pratiśrayācchādanasaṃpradātā; prāpnoti tān eva na saṃśayo 'tra
GE07mbh_13_u:057.038a: sragdhūpagandhāny anulepanāni; snānāni mālyāni ca mānavo yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.038c: dadyād dvijebhyaḥ sa bhaved arogas; tathābhirūpaś ca narendraloke
GE07mbh_13_u:057.039a: bījair aśūnyaṃ śayanair upetaṃ; dadyād gṛhaṃ yaḥ puruṣo dvijāya
GE07mbh_13_u:057.039c: puṇyābhirāmaṃ bahuratnapūrṇaṃ; labhaty adhiṣṭhānavaraṃ sa rājan
GE07mbh_13_u:057.040a: sugandhacitrāstaraṇopapannaṃ; dadyān naro yaḥ śayanaṃ dvijāya
GE07mbh_13_u:057.040c: rūpānvitāṃ pakṣavatīṃ manojñāṃ; bhāryām ayatnopagatāṃ labhet saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.041c: nādhikaṃ vidyate tasmād ity āhuḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.041d-0331_01: pustakaṃ ca tathā gāvaḥ kanyā dānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:057.041d-0331_02: ye na dāsyanti puruṣās teṣāṃ saukhyaṃ pareṇa kim
GE07mbh_13_u:057.042a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prītātmā kurunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.043c: pitāmahasya yad vākyaṃ tad vo rocatv iti prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:057.044a: tatas tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve draupadī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:057.044c: yudhiṣṭhirasya tad vākyaṃ bāḍham ity abhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_13_u:058.001c: tebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ mataṃ te kurupuṃgava
GE07mbh_13_u:058.002a: kautūhalaṃ hi paramaṃ tatra me vartate prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:058.002c: dātāraṃ dattam anveti yad dānaṃ tat pracakṣva me
GE07mbh_13_u:058.004a: dattaṃ manyeta yad dattvā tad dānaṃ śreṣṭham ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:058.004c: dattaṃ dātāram anveti yad dānaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:058.005c: etāni vai pavitrāṇi tārayanty api duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:058.006c: dānāni hi naraṃ pāpān mokṣayanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.007a: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:058.007c: tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:058.008a: priyāṇi labhate loke priyadaḥ priyakṛt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:058.008c: priyo bhavati bhūtānām iha caiva paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:058.009c: yo nārcati yathāśakti sa nṛśaṃso yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:058.010a: amitram api ced dīnaṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam āgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:058.011c: apahanyāt kṣudhaṃ yas tu na tena puruṣaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.012a: hriyā tu niyatān sādhūn putradāraiś ca karśitān
GE07mbh_13_u:058.013a: āśiṣaṃ ye na deveṣu na martyeṣu ca kurvate
GE07mbh_13_u:058.016c: kāryam ity eva manvānā dhārmikāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.018c: yat kariṣyasi kalyāṇaṃ tat tvā lokeṣu dhāsyati
GE07mbh_13_u:058.019c: tathā bhavati dattaṃ vai dvijebhyo 'tha kṛtātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:058.020a: eṣa te vitato yajñaḥ śraddhāpūtaḥ sadakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.021c: nivapan pūjayaṃś caiva teṣv ānṛṇyaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:058.022a: ya eva no na kupyanti na lubhyanti tṛṇeṣv api
GE07mbh_13_u:058.022c: ta eva naḥ pūjyatamā ye cānye priyavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.023a: ye no na bahu manyante na pravartanti cāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:058.023c: putravat paripālyās te namas tebhyas tathābhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:058.024c: kṣatreṇāpi hi saṃsṛṣṭaṃ tejaḥ śāmyati vai dvije
GE07mbh_13_u:058.025a: asti me balavān asmi rājāsmīti yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:058.025c: brāhmaṇān mā sma paryaśnīr vāsobhir aśanena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:058.026a: yac chobhārthaṃ balārthaṃ vā vittam asti tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:058.026c: tena te brāhmaṇāḥ pūjyāḥ svadharmam anutiṣṭhatā
GE07mbh_13_u:058.028a: ko hy anyaḥ suprasādānāṃ suhṛdām alpatoṣiṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:058.028c: vṛttim arhaty upakṣeptuṃ tvad anyaḥ kurusattama
GE07mbh_13_u:058.029a: yathā patyāśrayo dharmaḥ strīṇāṃ loke sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.029c: sa devaḥ sā gatir nānyā tathāsmākaṃ dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.030a: yadi no brāhmaṇās tāta saṃtyajeyur apūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.030c: paśyanto dāruṇaṃ karma satataṃ kṣatriye sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:058.031c: ko 'smākaṃ jīvitenārthas tad dhi no brāhmaṇāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:058.032a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.032c: rājanyo brāhmaṇaṃ rājan purā paricacāra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:058.032e: vaiśyo rājanyam ity eva śūdro vaiśyam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.034c: āśīviṣān iva kruddhāṃs tān upācarata dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:058.035a: apareṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca parebhyaś caiva ye pare
GE07mbh_13_u:058.035c: kṣatriyāṇāṃ pratapatāṃ tejasā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:058.035e: brāhmaṇeṣv eva śāmyanti tejāṃsi ca tapāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:058.036a: na me pitā priyataro na tvaṃ tāta tathā priyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.036c: na me pituḥ pitā rājan na cātmā na ca jīvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:058.037a: tvattaś ca me priyataraḥ pṛthivyāṃ nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:058.038a: bravīmi satyam etac ca yathāhaṃ pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:058.038c: tena satyena gaccheyaṃ lokān yatra sa śaṃtanuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:058.039a: paśyeyaṃ ca satāṃ lokāñ chucīn brahmapuraskṛtān
GE07mbh_13_u:058.039c: tatra me tāta gantavyam ahnāya ca cirāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:058.040c: yan me kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu na tapye tena pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:059.001a: yau tu syātāṃ caraṇenopapannau; yau vidyayā sadṛśau janmanā ca
GE07mbh_13_u:059.001c: tābhyāṃ dānaṃ katarasmai viśiṣṭam; ayācamānāya ca yācate ca
GE07mbh_13_u:059.002a: śreyo vai yācataḥ pārtha dattam āhur ayācate
GE07mbh_13_u:059.003c: brāhmaṇo dhṛtimān vidvān devān prīṇāti tuṣṭimān
GE07mbh_13_u:059.004a: yācñām āhur anīśasya abhihāraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:059.004c: udvejayati yācan hi sadā bhūtāni dasyuvat
GE07mbh_13_u:059.005a: mriyate yācamāno vai tam anu mriyate dadat
GE07mbh_13_u:059.005c: dadat saṃjīvayaty enam ātmānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:059.006a: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmo yācate yat pradīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:059.007a: yadi vai tādṛśā rāṣṭre vaseyus te dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:059.007c: bhasmacchannān ivāgnīṃs tān budhyethās tvaṃ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:059.008a: tapasā dīpyamānās te daheyuḥ pṛthivīm api
GE07mbh_13_u:059.010a: yad agnihotre suhute sāyaṃprātar bhavet phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:059.013c: kāryam ity eva manvānā dharmajñāḥ sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:059.014a: api te brāhmaṇā bhuktvā gatāḥ soddharaṇān gṛhān
GE07mbh_13_u:059.014c: yeṣāṃ dārāḥ pratīkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:059.015c: brāhmaṇās tāta bhuñjānās tretāgnīn prīṇayantu te
GE07mbh_13_u:059.016a: mādhyaṃdinaṃ te savanaṃ dadatas tāta vartatām
GE07mbh_13_u:059.016c: gā hiraṇyāni vāsāṃsi tenendraḥ prīyatāṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:059.017a: tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ tat te vaiśvadevaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:059.017c: yad devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca viprebhyaś ca prayacchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:059.018c: damas tyāgo dhṛtiḥ satyaṃ bhavatv avabhṛthāya te
GE07mbh_13_u:059.019a: eṣa te vitato yajñaḥ śraddhāpūtaḥ sadakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:059.019d-0333_01: yat kiṃ cit pāṇḍaraṃ puṣpaṃ yat kiṃ cid anulepanam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.001a: dānaṃ yajñakriyā ceha kiṃ svit pretya mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.001c: kasya jyāyaḥ phalaṃ proktaṃ kīdṛśebhyaḥ kathaṃ kadā
GE07mbh_13_u:060.003a: antarvedyāṃ ca yad dattaṃ śraddhayā cānṛśaṃsyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.003c: kiṃ svin niḥśreyasaṃ tāta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:060.004a: raudraṃ karma kṣatriyasya satataṃ tāta vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:060.004c: tasya vaitānikaṃ karma dānaṃ caiveha pāvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.005a: na tu pāpakṛtāṃ rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.006a: atha cet pratigṛhṇīyur dadyād aharahar nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.006c: śraddhām āsthāya paramāṃ pāvanaṃ hy etad uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.007a: brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayed dravyais tato yajñe yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.008a: yat te tena kariṣyanti kṛtaṃ tena bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:060.009a: iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ ca manyethā ātmānaṃ dānakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:060.009c: pūjayethā yāyajūkāṃs tavāpy aṃśo bhaved yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:060.009d-0336_02: yajvabhyaś cātha vidvadbhyo dattvā lokaṃ pradāpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:060.010c: prajāvāṃs tena bhavati yathā janayitā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:060.011a: yāvato vai sādhudharmān santaḥ saṃvartayanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:060.011c: sarve te cāpi bhartavyā narā ye bahubhāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.013c: aśvavanti ca yānāni veśmāni śayanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:060.014a: ete deyā vyuṣṭimanto laghūpāyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:060.015a: upacchannaṃ prakāśaṃ vā vṛttyā tān pratipādaya
GE07mbh_13_u:060.016a: evaṃ pāpair vimuktas tvaṃ pūtaḥ svargam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:060.016c: sraṃsayitvā punaḥ kośaṃ yad rāṣṭraṃ pālayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:060.017a: tataś ca brahmabhūyastvam avāpsyasi dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:060.017c: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca vṛttiṃ saṃrakṣa bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018a: putravac cāpi bhṛtyān svān prajāś ca paripālaya
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018c: yogakṣemaś ca te nityaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv astu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_03: śriyā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃvāso darpayet saṃpramohayet
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_05: dharmapraṇāśe bhūtānām abhāvaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_06: yo rakṣibhyaḥ saṃpradāya rājā rāṣṭraṃ vilumpati
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_07: yakṣye rāṣṭrād dhanaṃ tasmād ānayadhvam iti bruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_08: yac cādāya tad ājñaptaṃ bhītaṃ dattaṃ sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_09: yajed rājā na taṃ yajñaṃ praśaṃsanty asya sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_15: na khātapūrvaṃ kurvīta na rudantīdhanaṃ haret
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_16: hṛtaṃ kṛpaṇavittaṃ hi rāṣṭraṃ hanti nṛpaśriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_17: dadyāc ca mahato bhogān kṣudbhayaṃ praṇudet satām
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_19: nāśnanti vidhivat tāni kiṃ nu pāpataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_20: yadi te tādṛśo rāṣṭre vidvān sīdet kṣudhā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_21: bhrūṇahatyāṃ ca gacchethāḥ kṛtvā pāpam ivottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_22: dhik tasya jīvitaṃ rājño rāṣṭre yasyāvasīdati
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_23: dvijo 'nyo vā manuṣyo 'pi śibir āha vaco yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_24: yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ snātakaḥ sīdati kṣudhā
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_25: avṛddhim eti tad rāṣṭraṃ vindate saha rājakam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_26: krośantyo yasya vai rāṣṭrād dhriyante tarasā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.018d-0337_27: krośatāṃ patiputrāṇāṃ mṛto 'sau na sa jīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:060.019c: taṃ sma rājakaliṃ hanyuḥ prajāḥ saṃbhūya nirghṛṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:060.020a: ahaṃ vo rakṣitety uktvā yo na rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.020c: sa saṃhatya nihantavyaḥ śveva sonmāda āturaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.021a: pāpaṃ kurvanti yat kiṃ cit prajā rājñā hy arakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.021c: caturthaṃ tasya pāpasya rājā bhārata vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:060.022a: apy āhuḥ sarvam eveti bhūyo 'rdham iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.023a: śubhaṃ vā yat prakurvanti prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:060.023c: caturthaṃ tasya puṇyasya rājā cāpnoti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:060.024c: parjanyam iva bhūtāni mahādrumam iva dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.001a: idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyam itīyaṃ śruticodanā
GE07mbh_13_u:061.001c: bahudeyāś ca rājānaḥ kiṃ svid deyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.002c: acalā hy akṣayā bhūmir dogdhrī kāmān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:061.003a: dogdhrī vāsāṃsi ratnāni paśūn vrīhiyavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:061.004a: yāvad bhūmer āyur iha tāvad bhūmida edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:061.004c: na bhūmidānād astīha paraṃ kiṃ cid yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:061.005a: apy alpaṃ pradaduḥ pūrve pṛthivyā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.005c: bhūmim ete daduḥ sarve ye bhūmiṃ bhuñjate janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.006c: bhūmir bhūtir mahādevī dātāraṃ kurute priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.007a: ya etāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād akṣayāṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.007c: punar naratvaṃ saṃprāpya bhavet sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.008a: yathā dānaṃ tathā bhoga iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.008c: saṃgrāme vā tanuṃ jahyād dadyād vā pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_13_u:061.009a: ity etāṃ kṣatrabandhūnāṃ vadanti param āśiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.009c: punāti dattā pṛthivī dātāram iti śuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:061.010c: saiva pāpaṃ pāvayati saiva pāpāt pramocayet
GE07mbh_13_u:061.011c: pṛthivīṃ nānyad icchanti pāvanaṃ jananī yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:061.012c: dānaṃ vāpy atha vā jñānaṃ nāmno 'syāḥ paramaṃ priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.012d-0338_01: ya etāṃ viduṣe dadyāt pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.012d-0338_02: pṛthivyām etad iṣṭaṃ sa rājyād rājyam iti vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:061.012d-0338_03: punaś ca jananaṃ prāpya rājaiva syān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.012e: tasmāt prāpyaiva pṛthivīṃ dadyād viprāya pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.013c: na vā pātreṇa vā gūhed antardhānena vā caret
GE07mbh_13_u:061.013e: ye cānye bhūmim iccheyuḥ kuryur evam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.014a: yaḥ sādhor bhūmim ādatte na bhūmiṃ vindate tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.014c: bhūmiṃ tu dattvā sādhubhyo vindate bhūmim eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:061.014e: pretyeha ca sa dharmātmā saṃprāpnoti mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.015a: yasya viprānuśāsanti sādhor bhūmiṃ sadaiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:061.015c: na tasya śatravo rājan praśāsanti vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_13_u:061.016a: yat kiṃ cit puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ kurute vṛttikarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.018a: alpāntaram idaṃ śaśvat purāṇā menire janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.018c: yo yajed aśvamedhena dadyād vā sādhave mahīm
GE07mbh_13_u:061.019a: api cet sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā śaṅkerann api paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.020c: sarvam etan mahāprājña dadāti vasudhāṃ dadat
GE07mbh_13_u:061.021a: tapo yajñaḥ śrutaṃ śīlam alobhaḥ satyasaṃdhatā
GE07mbh_13_u:061.022a: bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.023a: yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa svaputraṃ bharate sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:061.024a: mṛtyor vai kiṃkaro daṇḍas tāpo vahneḥ sudāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.024c: ghorāś ca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.025a: pitṝṃś ca pitṛlokasthān devaloke ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.026c: bhūmiṃ vṛttikarīṃ dattvā satrī bhavati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.027a: yathā dhāvati gaur vatsaṃ kṣīram abhyutsṛjanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:061.027c: evam eva mahābhāga bhūmir bhavati bhūmidam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.028a: halakṛṣṭāṃ mahīṃ dattvā sabījāṃ saphalām api
GE07mbh_13_u:061.028c: udīrṇaṃ vāpi śaraṇaṃ tathā bhavati kāmadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.029c: naraḥ pratigrāhya mahīṃ na yāti yamasādanam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.030a: yathā candramaso vṛddhir ahany ahani jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:061.030c: tathā bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye vivardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:061.031c: yāḥ śrutvā jāmadagnyena dattā bhūḥ kāśyapāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:061.032a: mām evādatta māṃ datta māṃ dattvā mām avāpsyatha
GE07mbh_13_u:061.032c: asmiṃl loke pare caiva tataś cājanane punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.033a: ya imāṃ vyāhṛtiṃ veda brāhmaṇo brahmasaṃśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.034c: prāyaścittam ahaṃ kṛtvā punāty ubhayato daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:061.035a: punāti ya idaṃ veda veda cāhaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:061.035c: prakṛtiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhūmir vai śāśvatī matā
GE07mbh_13_u:061.036c: yathā śrutvā mahīṃ dadyān nādadyāt sādhutaś ca tām
GE07mbh_13_u:061.037a: so 'yaṃ kṛtsno brāhmaṇārtho rājārthaś cāpy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.038a: atha yeṣām adharmajño rājā bhavati nāstikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.038c: na te sukhaṃ prabudhyante na sukhaṃ prasvapanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:061.039a: sadā bhavanti codvignās tasya duścaritair narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.039c: yogakṣemā hi bahavo rāṣṭraṃ nāsyāviśanti tat
GE07mbh_13_u:061.040a: atha yeṣāṃ punaḥ prājño rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.040c: sukhaṃ te pratibudhyante susukhaṃ prasvapanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:061.041a: tasya rājñaḥ śubhair āryaiḥ karmabhir nirvṛtāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.042a: sa kulīnaḥ sa puruṣaḥ sa bandhuḥ sa ca puṇyakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:061.042c: sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_13_u:061.043a: ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā bhuvi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.043c: dadanti vasudhāṃ sphītāṃ ye vedaviduṣi dvije
GE07mbh_13_u:061.045a: ādityo varuṇo viṣṇur brahmā somo hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.046a: bhūmau jāyanti puruṣā bhūmau niṣṭhāṃ vrajanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:061.047a: eṣā mātā pitā caiva jagataḥ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:061.047c: nānayā sadṛśaṃ bhūtaṃ kiṃ cid asti janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:061.047d-0341_01: sauvarṇā yatra prāsādā vasor dhārāś ca kāmadāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.048c: bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:061.050a: bhagavan kena dānena svargataḥ sukham edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:061.050c: yad akṣayaṃ mahārghaṃ ca tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:061.051a: ity uktaḥ sa surendreṇa tato devapurohitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.052b-0342_01: vidyādānaṃ ca kanyānāṃ dānaṃ pāpaharaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:061.053a: na bhūmidānād devendra paraṃ kiṃ cid iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:061.053c: viśiṣṭam iti manyāmi yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.053d-0343_02: kulastrīṇāṃ paribhave mṛtās te bhūmidaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:061.054a: ye śūrā nihatā yuddhe svaryātā dānagṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.055a: bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.056a: pañca pūrvādipuruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ye vasudhāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.058c: rājādhirājo bhavati tad dhi dānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.060c: dadāti yaḥ sahasrākṣa sa svargaṃ yāti mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.062c: na hi bhūmipradānena dānam anyad viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:061.063c: taṃ janāḥ kathayantīha yāvad dharati gaur iyam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.064a: puṇyām ṛddharasāṃ bhūmiṃ yo dadāti puraṃdara
GE07mbh_13_u:061.065c: bhūr deyā vidhivac chakra pātre sukham abhīpsatā
GE07mbh_13_u:061.065d-0344_01: svanirjitāṃ svayaṃkrītāṃ bhṛtāṃ ca vārpayen nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:061.065d-0345_01: sunirmitāṃ suvikrītāṃ subhṛtāṃ vāpi yan nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.066a: api kṛtvā naraḥ pāpaṃ bhūmiṃ dattvā dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:061.066c: samutsṛjati tat pāpaṃ jīrṇāṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.067a: sāgarān saritaḥ śailān kānanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.067c: sarvam etan naraḥ śakra dadāti vasudhāṃ dadat
GE07mbh_13_u:061.068a: taḍāgāny udapānāni srotāṃsi ca sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:061.068c: snehān sarvarasāṃś caiva dadāti vasudhāṃ dadat
GE07mbh_13_u:061.070c: na tat phalam avāpnoti bhūmidānād yad aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:061.071a: dātā daśānugṛhṇāti daśa hanti tathā kṣipan
GE07mbh_13_u:061.072a: na dadāti pratiśrutya dattvā vā harate tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.072c: sa baddho vāruṇaiḥ pāśais tapyate mṛtyuśāsanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:061.073c: ye bharanti dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ nopasarpanti te yamam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.076c: brāhmaṇānāṃ hṛte kṣetre hanyāt tripuruṣaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.077a: bhūmipālaṃ cyutaṃ rāṣṭrād yas tu saṃsthāpayet punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.079c: akṣayāṃl labhate lokān bhūmisatraṃ hi tasya tat
GE07mbh_13_u:061.080a: vidhūya kaluṣaṃ sarvaṃ virajāḥ saṃmataḥ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:061.080c: loke mahīyate sadbhir yo dadāti vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_13_u:061.081c: tathā bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye visarpati
GE07mbh_13_u:061.084c: yo dadāti mahīṃ samyag vidhineha dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:061.089a: nāsti bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.089c: nāsti satyasamo dharmo nāsti dānasamo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.090a: etad āṅgirasāc chrutvā vāsavo vasudhām imām
GE07mbh_13_u:061.091a: ya imaṃ śrāvayec chrāddhe bhūmidānasya saṃstavam
GE07mbh_13_u:061.091c: na tasya rakṣasāṃ bhāgo nāsurāṇāṃ bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:061.092a: akṣayaṃ ca bhaved dattaṃ pitṛbhyas tan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:061.092c: tasmāc chrāddheṣv idaṃ vipro bhuñjataḥ śrāvayed dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:061.093a: ity etat sarvadānānāṃ śreṣṭham uktaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:061.093c: mayā bharataśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:062.002a: kena tuṣyanti te sadyas tuṣṭāḥ kiṃ pradiśanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:062.002c: śaṃsa me tan mahābāho phalaṃ puṇyakṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:062.003a: dattaṃ kiṃ phalavad rājann iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:062.003c: bhavataḥ śrotum icchāmi tan me vistarato vada
GE07mbh_13_u:062.004a: imam arthaṃ purā pṛṣṭo nārado devadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.004c: yad uktavān asau tan me gadataḥ śṛṇu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:062.005a: annam eva praśaṃsanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:062.005c: lokatantraṃ hi yajñāś ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.006a: annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:062.006c: tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātum icchanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.007a: annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke prāṇāś cānne pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.007c: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagad idaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:062.008a: annād gṛhasthā loke 'smin bhikṣavas tata eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:062.008c: annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.009c: dātavyaṃ bhikṣave cānnam ātmano bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:062.011a: śrāntam adhvani vartantaṃ vṛddham arham upasthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.011c: arcayed bhūtim anvicchan gṛhastho gṛham āgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.012c: annadaḥ prāpnute rājan divi ceha ca yat sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:062.013a: nāvamanyed abhigataṃ na praṇudyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:062.013c: api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:062.014a: yo dadyād aparikliṣṭam annam adhvani vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:062.015a: pitṝn devān ṛṣīn viprān atithīṃś ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:062.015c: yo naraḥ prīṇayaty annais tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:062.016a: kṛtvāpi pāpakaṃ karma yo dadyād annam arthine
GE07mbh_13_u:062.016c: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:062.017a: brāhmaṇeṣv akṣayaṃ dānam annaṃ śūdre mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.017c: annadānaṃ ca śūdre ca brāhmaṇe ca viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:062.018a: na pṛcched gotracaraṇaṃ svādhyāyaṃ deśam eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:062.020a: āśaṃsante hi pitaraḥ suvṛṣṭim iva karṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.020c: asmākam api putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati
GE07mbh_13_u:062.021a: brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ svayaṃ dehīti yācate
GE07mbh_13_u:062.021c: akāmo vā sakāmo vā dattvā puṇyam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:062.022c: viprā yam abhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:062.023a: satkṛtāś ca nivartante tad atīva pravardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:062.023c: mahābhoge kule janma pretya prāpnoti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:062.024a: dattvā tv annaṃ naro loke tathā sthānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.025a: annaṃ prāṇā narāṇāṃ hi sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.025c: annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavān api
GE07mbh_13_u:062.026a: prāṇavāṃś cāpi bhavati rūpavāṃś ca tathā nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:062.026c: annadaḥ prāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.027c: pradātā sukham āpnoti devaiś cāpy abhipūjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:062.028a: brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ kṣetraṃ carati pādavat
GE07mbh_13_u:062.028c: upyate tatra yad bījaṃ tad dhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:062.030a: annād dhi prasavaṃ viddhi ratim annād dhi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:062.031a: annaṃ hy amṛtam ity āha purākalpe prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.031c: annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.033a: āvāhāś ca vivāhāś ca yajñāś cānnam ṛte tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:062.033c: na vartante naraśreṣṭha brahma cātra pralīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:062.034a: annataḥ sarvam etad dhi yat kiṃ cit sthāṇu jaṅgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:062.034c: triṣu lokeṣu dharmārtham annaṃ deyam ato budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.035a: annadasya manuṣyasya balam ojo yaśaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:062.035c: kīrtiś ca vardhate śaśvat triṣu lokeṣu pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:062.036a: megheṣv ambhaḥ saṃnidhatte prāṇānāṃ pavanaḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.036c: tac ca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:062.037a: ādatte ca rasaṃ bhaumam ādityaḥ svagabhastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.037c: vāyur ādityatas tāṃś ca rasān devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.038a: tad yadā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau
GE07mbh_13_u:062.038c: tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:062.039a: tataḥ sasyāni rohanti yena vartayate jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:062.040c: agnīṣomau hi tac chukraṃ prajanaḥ puṣyataś ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:062.041a: evam annaṃ ca sūryaś ca pavanaḥ śukram eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:062.041c: eka eva smṛto rāśir yato bhūtāni jajñire
GE07mbh_13_u:062.042a: prāṇān dadāti bhūtānāṃ tejaś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:062.042c: gṛham abhyāgatāyāśu yo dadyād annam arthine
GE07mbh_13_u:062.043a: nāradenaivam ukto 'ham adām annaṃ sadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:062.043c: anasūyus tvam apy annaṃ tasmād dehi gatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.044a: dattvānnaṃ vidhivad rājan viprebhyas tvam api prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:062.045a: annadānāṃ hi ye lokās tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:062.048c: vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpā dīrghikāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.049a: ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny atha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:062.050e: tān annadāḥ prapadyante tasmād annaprado bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:062.051c: tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātavyaṃ mānavair bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:063.001a: śrutaṃ me bhavato vākyam annadānasya yo vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:063.002c: devakyāś caiva saṃvādaṃ devarṣer nāradasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:063.004c: ācaṣṭa vidhivat sarvaṃ yat tac chṛṇu viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:063.005c: saṃtarpya brāhmaṇān sādhūṃl lokān āpnoty anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:063.006a: rohiṇyāṃ prathitair māṃsair māṣair annena sarpiṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:063.007a: dogdhrīṃ dattvā savatsāṃ tu nakṣatre somadaivate
GE07mbh_13_u:063.008c: naras tarati durgāṇi kṣuradhārāṃś ca parvatān
GE07mbh_13_u:063.010a: puṣye tu kanakaṃ dattvā kṛtaṃ cākṛtam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:063.011a: āśleṣāyāṃ tu yo rūpyam ṛṣabhaṃ vā prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:063.012c: pradāya putrapaśumān iha pretya ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:063.015a: yad yat pradīyate dānam uttarāviṣaye naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:063.017a: citrāyām ṛṣabhaṃ dattvā puṇyān gandhāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:063.017c: caraty apsarasāṃ loke ramate nandane tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:063.018a: svātāv atha dhanaṃ dattvā yad iṣṭatamam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:063.018c: prāpnoti lokān sa śubhān iha caiva mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:063.019a: viśākhāyām anaḍvāhaṃ dhenuṃ dattvā ca dugdhadām
GE07mbh_13_u:063.020a: pitṝn devāṃś ca prīṇāti pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:063.020c: na ca durgāṇy avāpnoti svargalokaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:063.021a: dattvā yathoktaṃ viprebhyo vṛttim iṣṭāṃ sa vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:063.022c: dattvā yugaśataṃ cāpi naraḥ svarge mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:063.023a: kālaśākaṃ tu viprebhyo dattvā martyaḥ samūlakam
GE07mbh_13_u:063.023c: jyeṣṭhāyām ṛddhim iṣṭāṃ vai gatim iṣṭāṃ ca vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:063.024c: pitṝn prīṇayate cāpi gatim iṣṭāṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:063.027a: dugdhaṃ tv abhijite yoge dattvā madhughṛtāplutam
GE07mbh_13_u:063.028a: śravaṇe kambalaṃ dattvā vastrāntaritam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:063.030c: prāpnoty apsarasāṃ lokān pretya gandhāṃś ca śāśvatān
GE07mbh_13_u:063.031c: sarvabhakṣaphalopetaḥ sa vai pretya sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:063.032a: aurabhram uttarāyoge yas tu māṃsaṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:063.032c: sa pitṝn prīṇayati vai pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:063.033c: sā pretya kāmān ādāya dātāram upatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:063.035c: gāḥ suprabhūtāḥ prāpnoti naraḥ pretya yaśas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:064.001a: sarvān kāmān prayacchanti ye prayacchanti kāñcanam
GE07mbh_13_u:064.002a: pavitraṃ śucy athāyuṣyaṃ pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:064.003c: tasmād vāpīś ca kūpāṃś ca taḍāgāni ca khānayet
GE07mbh_13_u:064.005a: sarvaṃ tārayate vaṃśaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye
GE07mbh_13_u:064.005c: gāvaḥ pibanti viprāś ca sādhavaś ca narāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:064.006c: sa durgaṃ viṣamaṃ kṛcchraṃ na kadā cid avāpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:064.007a: bṛhaspater bhagavataḥ pūṣṇaś caiva bhagasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:064.007c: aśvinoś caiva vahneś ca prītir bhavati sarpiṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:064.008a: paramaṃ bheṣajaṃ hy etad yajñānām etad uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:064.008c: rasānām uttamaṃ caitat phalānāṃ caitad uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:064.009c: ghṛtaṃ dadyād dvijātibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ śucir ātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:064.010a: ghṛtaṃ māse āśvayuji viprebhyo yaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:064.010c: tasmai prayacchato rūpaṃ prītau devāv ihāśvinau
GE07mbh_13_u:064.011a: pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ dvijebhyo yaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:064.011c: gṛhaṃ tasya na rakṣāṃsi dharṣayanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:064.012a: pipāsayā na mriyate sopacchandaś ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:064.012c: na prāpnuyāc ca vyasanaṃ karakān yaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:064.014c: pratāpārthaṃ ca rājendra vṛttavadbhyaḥ sadā naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:064.015a: sidhyanty arthāḥ sadā tasya kāryāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:064.015c: upary upari śatrūṇāṃ vapuṣā dīpyate ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:064.016a: bhagavāṃś cāsya suprīto vahnir bhavati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:064.016c: na taṃ tyajante paśavaḥ saṃgrāme ca jayaty api
GE07mbh_13_u:064.017a: putrāñ chriyaṃ ca labhate yaś chatraṃ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:064.018a: nidāghakāle varṣe vā yaś chatraṃ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:064.018c: nāsya kaś cin manodāhaḥ kadā cid api jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:064.018e: kṛcchrāt sa viṣamāc caiva vipra mokṣam avāpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:064.019c: evam āha mahābhāgaḥ śāṇḍilyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.001c: yat phalaṃ tasya bhavati tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:065.002c: mardate kaṇṭakān sarvān viṣamān nistaraty api
GE07mbh_13_u:065.002e: sa śatrūṇām upari ca saṃtiṣṭhati yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:065.003a: yānaṃ cāśvatarīyuktaṃ tasya śubhraṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:065.003e: śakaṭaṃ damyasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ bhavati caiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:065.004a: yat phalaṃ tiladāne ca bhūmidāne ca kīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:065.004c: gopradāne 'nnadāne ca bhūyas tad brūhi kaurava
GE07mbh_13_u:065.005a: śṛṇuṣva mama kaunteya tiladānasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:065.006a: pitṝṇāṃ prathamaṃ bhojyaṃ tilāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:065.007a: māghamāse tilān yas tu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:065.008a: sarvakāmaiḥ sa yajate yas tilair yajate pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:065.008c: na cākāmena dātavyaṃ tilaśrāddhaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:065.009c: tato divyaṃ gatā bhāvaṃ pradāneṣu tilāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:065.011a: āpastambaś ca medhāvī śaṅkhaś ca likhitas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:065.011c: maharṣir gautamaś cāpi tiladānair divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.012c: samā gavyena haviṣā pravṛttiṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.013a: sarveṣām eva dānānāṃ tiladānaṃ paraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:065.014a: utpanne ca purā havye kuśikarṣiḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:065.014c: tilair agnitrayaṃ hutvā prāptavān gatim uttamām
GE07mbh_13_u:065.015c: vidhānaṃ yena vidhinā tilānām iha śasyate
GE07mbh_13_u:065.016a: ata ūrdhvaṃ nibodhedaṃ devānāṃ yaṣṭum icchatām
GE07mbh_13_u:065.017c: śubhaṃ deśam ayācanta yajema iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:065.018a: bhagavaṃs tvaṃ prabhur bhūmeḥ sarvasya tridivasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:065.019a: tvaṃ hi sarvasya jagataḥ sthāvarasya carasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:065.019c: prabhur bhavasi tasmāt tvaṃ samanujñātum arhasi brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:065.021a: bhagavan kṛtakāmāḥ smo yakṣyāmas tv āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.021c: imaṃ tu deśaṃ munayaḥ paryupāsanta nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:065.022a: tato 'gastyaś ca kaṇvaś ca bhṛgur atrir vṛṣākapiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.023a: tato devā mahātmāna ījire yajñam acyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:065.024c: ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ kratos tasya bhūmidānaṃ pracakrire
GE07mbh_13_u:065.025a: prādeśamātraṃ bhūmes tu yo dadyād anupaskṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:065.025c: na sīdati sa kṛcchreṣu na ca durgāṇy avāpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:065.027a: mudito vasate prājñaḥ śakreṇa saha pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:065.028c: gṛhe yasya vaset tuṣṭaḥ pradhānaṃ lokam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:065.030a: kṣetrabhūmiṃ dadal loke putra śriyam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:065.031a: na coṣarāṃ na nirdagdhāṃ mahīṃ dadyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:065.031c: na śmaśānaparītāṃ ca na ca pāpaniṣevitām
GE07mbh_13_u:065.032a: pārakye bhūmideśe tu pitṝṇāṃ nirvapet tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.033a: tasmāt krītvā mahīṃ dadyāt svalpām api vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.033c: piṇḍaḥ pitṛbhyo datto vai tasyāṃ bhavati śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.034c: sarvāṇy asvāmikāny āhur na hi tatra parigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.035a: ity etad bhūmidānasya phalam uktaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:065.035c: ataḥ paraṃ tu godānaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:065.036a: gāvo 'dhikās tapasvibhyo yasmāt sarvebhya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:065.036c: tasmān maheśvaro devas tapas tābhiḥ samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.037a: brahmaloke vasanty etāḥ somena saha bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:065.037c: āsāṃ brahmarṣayaḥ siddhāḥ prārthayanti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:065.037d-0352_01: tāṃ prāpnuvanti gāṃ dattvā vimuktāḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.038a: payasā haviṣā dadhnā śakṛtāpy atha carmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:065.038c: asthibhiś copakurvanti śṛṅgair vālaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:065.039a: nāsāṃ śītātapau syātāṃ sadaitāḥ karma kurvate
GE07mbh_13_u:065.039c: na varṣaṃ viṣamaṃ vāpi duḥkham āsāṃ bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:065.040a: brāhmaṇaiḥ sahitā yānti tasmāt parataraṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:065.042c: tā imā vipramukhyebhyo yo dadāti mahīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:065.043a: gavāṃ sahasradaḥ pretya narakaṃ na prapaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:065.044a: amṛtaṃ vai gavāṃ kṣīram ity āha tridaśādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.044c: tasmād dadāti yo dhenum amṛtaṃ sa prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:065.045a: agnīnām avyayaṃ hy etad dhaumyaṃ vedavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.045c: tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ sa haumyaṃ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:065.046a: svargo vai mūrtimān eṣa vṛṣabhaṃ yo gavāṃ patim
GE07mbh_13_u:065.046c: vipre guṇayute dadyāt sa vai svarge mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:065.047a: prāṇā vai prāṇinām ete procyante bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:065.047c: tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ prāṇān vai sa prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:065.048a: gāvaḥ śaraṇyā bhūtānām iti vedavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.048c: tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ śaraṇaṃ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:065.049a: na vadhārthaṃ pradātavyā na kīnāśe na nāstike
GE07mbh_13_u:065.049c: gojīvine na dātavyā tathā gauḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:065.050a: dadāti tādṛśānāṃ vai naro gāḥ pāpakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:065.050c: akṣayaṃ narakaṃ yātīty evam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.051a: na kṛśāṃ pāpavatsāṃ vā vandhyāṃ rogānvitāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:065.051c: na vyaṅgāṃ na pariśrāntāṃ dadyād gāṃ brāhmaṇāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:065.053a: ity etad gopradānaṃ ca tiladānaṃ ca kīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:065.053c: tathā bhūmipradānaṃ ca śṛṇuṣvānne ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:065.054c: annasya hi pradānena rantidevo divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.056a: na hiraṇyair na vāsobhir nāśvadānena bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:065.057a: annaṃ vai paramaṃ dravyam annaṃ śrīś ca parā matā
GE07mbh_13_u:065.057c: annāt prāṇaḥ prabhavati tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:065.058a: sadbhyo dadāti yaś cānnaṃ sadaikāgramanā naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.058c: na sa durgāṇy avāpnotīty evam āha parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.059c: yadanno hi naro rājaṃs tadannās tasya devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:065.060a: kaumudyāṃ śuklapakṣe tu yo 'nnadānaṃ karoty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:065.060c: sa saṃtarati durgāṇi pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:065.061c: sa vai brahmavidāṃ lokān prāpnuyād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:065.062a: sukṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaś cānnadaḥ puruṣas taret
GE07mbh_13_u:065.063a: ity etad annadānasya tiladānasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:065.063c: bhūmidānasya ca phalaṃ godānasya ca kīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:066.001a: śrutaṃ dānaphalaṃ tāta yat tvayā parikīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:066.001c: annaṃ tu te viśeṣeṇa praśastam iha bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:066.002c: ity etac chrotum icchāmi vistareṇa pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:066.004a: yad annaṃ yac ca pānīyaṃ saṃpradāyāśnute naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.004c: na tasmāt paramaṃ dānaṃ kiṃ cid astīti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.005a: annāt prāṇabhṛtas tāta pravartante hi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.005c: tasmād annaṃ paraṃ loke sarvadāneṣu kathyate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.006a: annād balaṃ ca tejaś ca prāṇināṃ vardhate sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:066.006c: annadānam atas tasmāc chreṣṭham āha prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.007a: sāvitryā hy api kaunteya śrutaṃ te vacanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:066.007c: yataś caitad yathā caitad devasatre mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.008a: anne datte nareṇeha prāṇā dattā bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:066.008c: prāṇadānād dhi paramaṃ na dānam iha vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.009a: śrutaṃ hi te mahābāho lomaśasyāpi tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.009c: prāṇān dattvā kapotāya yat prāptaṃ śibinā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:066.010a: tāṃ gatiṃ labhate dattvā dvijasyānnaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.010c: gatiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ gacchanti prāṇadā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:066.011c: nīrajātena hi vinā na kiṃ cit saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.012c: amṛtaṃ ca sudhā caiva svāhā caiva vaṣaṭ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:066.013c: yataḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ prāṇāḥ saṃbhavanti viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.014a: devānām amṛtaṃ cānnaṃ nāgānāṃ ca sudhā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:066.014c: pitṝṇāṃ ca svadhā proktā paśūnāṃ cāpi vīrudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.015a: annam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.015c: tac ca sarvaṃ naravyāghra pānīyāt saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.016a: tasmāt pānīyadānād vai na paraṃ vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:066.016c: tac ca dadyān naro nityaṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.017a: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ jaladānaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.017c: śatrūṃś cāpy adhi kaunteya sadā tiṣṭhati toyadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:066.018c: pretya cānantyam āpnoti pāpebhyaś ca pramucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:066.019c: akṣayān samavāpnoti lokān ity abravīn manuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.001a: tilānāṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānam atha dīpasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:067.001c: annānāṃ vāsasāṃ caiva bhūya eva bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:067.002c: brāhmaṇasya ca saṃvādaṃ yamasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:067.003a: madhyadeśe mahān grāmo brāhmaṇānāṃ babhūva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:067.004c: vidvāṃsas tatra bhūyiṣṭhā brāhmaṇāś cāvasaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:067.005a: atha prāha yamaḥ kaṃ cit puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇavāsasam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.006a: gaccha tvaṃ brāhmaṇagrāmaṃ tato gatvā tam ānaya
GE07mbh_13_u:067.006c: agastyaṃ gotrataś cāpi nāmataś cāpi śarmiṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.007c: mā cānyam ānayethās tvaṃ sagotraṃ tasya pārśvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.008e: tam ānaya yathoddiṣṭaṃ pūjā kāryā hi tasya me
GE07mbh_13_u:067.009a: sa gatvā pratikūlaṃ tac cakāra yamaśāsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.009c: tam ākramyānayām āsa pratiṣiddho yamena yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.010a: tasmai yamaḥ samutthāya pūjāṃ kṛtvā ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:067.010c: provāca nīyatām eṣa so 'nya ānīyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:067.011a: evam ukte tu vacane dharmarājena sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.011e: yo me kālo bhavec cheṣas taṃ vaseyam ihācyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:067.012a: nāhaṃ kālasya vihitaṃ prāpnomīha kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:067.012c: yo hi dharmaṃ carati vai taṃ tu jānāmi kevalam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.013a: gaccha vipra tvam adyaiva ālayaṃ svaṃ mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:067.013c: brūhi vā tvaṃ yathā svairaṃ karavāṇi kim ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:067.014a: yat tatra kṛtvā sumahat puṇyaṃ syāt tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:067.014c: sarvasya hi pramāṇaṃ tvaṃ trailokyasyāpi sattama
GE07mbh_13_u:067.015c: tilāḥ paramakaṃ dānaṃ puṇyaṃ caiveha śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.017a: tilāñ śrāddhe praśaṃsanti dānam etad dhy anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.017d-0354_01: vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu tilān dadyād dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:067.017d-0355_01: teṣāṃ māghyāṃ pradānena sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:067.018a: tilā bhakṣayitavyāś ca sadā tv ālabhanaṃ ca taiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.018c: kāryaṃ satatam icchadbhiḥ śreyaḥ sarvātmanā gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:067.019a: tathāpaḥ sarvadā deyāḥ peyāś caiva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.020c: āpo nityaṃ pradeyās te puṇyaṃ hy etad anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.021a: prapāś ca kāryāḥ pānārthaṃ nityaṃ te dvijasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:067.021c: bhukte 'py atha pradeyaṃ te pānīyaṃ vai viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.022a: ity ukte sa tadā tena yamadūtena vai gṛhān
GE07mbh_13_u:067.022c: nītaś cakāra ca tathā sarvaṃ tad yamaśāsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.023a: nītvā taṃ yamadūto 'pi gṛhītvā śarmiṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:067.023c: yayau sa dharmarājāya nyavedayata cāpi tam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.024c: kṛtvā ca saṃvidaṃ tena visasarja yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:067.025a: tasyāpi ca yamaḥ sarvam upadeśaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:067.025c: pratyetya ca sa tat sarvaṃ cakāroktaṃ yamena tat
GE07mbh_13_u:067.026c: tasmād dīpaprado nityaṃ saṃtārayati vai pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:067.027c: devānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca cakṣuṣy āste matāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:067.028a: ratnadānaṃ ca sumahat puṇyam uktaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:067.028c: tāni vikrīya yajate brāhmaṇo hy abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.029a: yad vai dadāti viprebhyo brāhmaṇaḥ pratigṛhya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:067.029c: ubhayoḥ syāt tad akṣayyaṃ dātur ādātur eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:067.030a: yo dadāti sthitaḥ sthityāṃ tādṛśāya pratigraham
GE07mbh_13_u:067.030c: ubhayor akṣayaṃ dharmaṃ taṃ manuḥ prāha dharmavit
GE07mbh_13_u:067.031c: suvastraś ca suveṣaś ca bhavatīty anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:067.032a: gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ ca tathā tilāś caivānuvarṇitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:067.033a: vivāhāṃś caiva kurvīta putrān utpādayeta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:068.001a: bhūya eva kuruśreṣṭha dānānāṃ vidhim uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:068.002a: pṛthivīṃ kṣatriyo dadyād brāhmaṇas tāṃ svakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:068.002c: vidhivat pratigṛhṇīyān na tv anyo dātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:068.003a: sarvavarṇais tu yac chakyaṃ pradātuṃ phalakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.003c: vede vā yat samāmnātaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:068.005a: yo brūyāc cāpi śiṣyāya dharmyāṃ brāhmīṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_13_u:068.006a: tathaiva gāḥ praśaṃsanti na ca deyaṃ tataḥ param
GE07mbh_13_u:068.006c: saṃnikṛṣṭaphalās tā hi laghvarthāś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:068.007a: vṛddhim ākāṅkṣatā nityaṃ gāvaḥ kāryāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.007b-0357_01: saṃtāḍyā na tu pādena gavāṃ madhye ca na vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:068.007c: maṅgalāyatanaṃ devyas tasmāt pūjyāḥ sadaiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:068.008c: pūrvam evākṣaraṃ nānyad abhidheyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:068.009a: pracāre vā nipāne vā budho nodvejayeta gāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.009c: tṛṣitā hy abhivīkṣantyo naraṃ hanyuḥ sabāndhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:068.010c: pūyante śakṛtā yāsāṃ pūtaṃ kim adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.011a: grāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.011c: akṛtvā svayam āhāraṃ vrataṃ tat sārvakāmikam
GE07mbh_13_u:068.012a: sa hi putrān yaśorthaṃ ca śriyaṃ cāpy adhigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:068.012c: nāśayaty aśubhaṃ caiva duḥsvapnaṃ ca vyapohati
GE07mbh_13_u:068.013a: deyāḥ kiṃlakṣaṇā gāvaḥ kāś cāpi parivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:068.013c: kīdṛśāya pradātavyā na deyāḥ kīdṛśāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:068.014c: havyakavyavyapetāya na deyā gauḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:068.015c: dattvā daśagavāṃ dātā lokān āpnoty anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:068.016a: yaṃ caiva dharmaṃ kurute tasya puṇyaphalaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:068.016b-0358_01: juhoti yad bhojayati yad dadāti gavāṃ rasaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.017a: yaś cainam utpādayati yaś cainaṃ trāyate bhayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:068.017c: yaś cāsya kurute vṛttiṃ sarve te pitaras trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.018a: kalmaṣaṃ guruśuśrūṣā hanti māno mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.018c: aputratāṃ trayaḥ putrā avṛttiṃ daśa dhenavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.019c: śiṣṭasya dāntasya yatasya caiva; bhūteṣu nityaṃ priyavādinaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:068.020a: yaḥ kṣudbhayād vai na vikarma kuryān; mṛdur dāntaś cātitheyaś ca nityam
GE07mbh_13_u:068.020c: vṛttiṃ viprāyātisṛjeta tasmai; yas tulyaśīlaś ca saputradāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.021a: śubhe pātre ye guṇā gopradāne; tāvān doṣo brāhmaṇasvāpahāre
GE07mbh_13_u:068.021c: sarvāvasthaṃ brāhmaṇasvāpahāro; dārāś caiṣāṃ dūrato varjanīyāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:068.021d-0360_02: brāhmasvam ucyate kiṃ vā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:068.021d-0361_02: paritrāyanti śaktās tu namas tebhyo mṛtās tu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:068.021d-0361_03: na pālayanti nihatā ye tān vaivasvato yamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:068.021d-0361_04: daṇḍayan bhartsayan nityaṃ nirayebhyo na muñcati
GE07mbh_13_u:068.021d-0361_05: tathā gavāṃ paritrāṇe pīḍane ca śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:069.001c: nṛgeṇa sumahat kṛcchraṃ yad avāptaṃ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:069.002a: niviśantyāṃ purā pārtha dvāravatyām iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.003a: prayatnaṃ tatra kurvāṇās tasmāt kūpāj jalārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.003c: śrameṇa mahatā yuktās tasmiṃs toye susaṃvṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:069.004c: tasya coddharaṇe yatnam akurvaṃs te sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.005a: pragrahaiś carmapaṭṭaiś ca taṃ baddhvā parvatopamam
GE07mbh_13_u:069.006c: tasya nāsti samuddhartety atha kṛṣṇe nyavedayan
GE07mbh_13_u:069.007a: sa vāsudevena samuddhṛtaś ca; pṛṣṭaś ca kāmān nijagāda rājā
GE07mbh_13_u:069.007c: nṛgas tadātmānam atho nyavedayat; purātanaṃ yajñasahasrayājinam
GE07mbh_13_u:069.008a: tathā bruvāṇaṃ tu tam āha mādhavaḥ; śubhaṃ tvayā karma kṛtaṃ na pāpakam
GE07mbh_13_u:069.008c: kathaṃ bhavān durgatim īdṛśīṃ gato; narendra tad brūhi kim etad īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:069.009a: śataṃ sahasrāṇi śataṃ gavāṃ punaḥ; punaḥ śatāny aṣṭa śatāyutāni
GE07mbh_13_u:069.009c: tvayā purā dattam itīha śuśruma; nṛpa dvijebhyaḥ kva nu tad gataṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:069.010c: proṣitasya paribhraṣṭā gaur ekā mama godhane
GE07mbh_13_u:069.011a: gavāṃ sahasre saṃkhyātā tadā sā paśupair mama
GE07mbh_13_u:069.011c: sā brāhmaṇāya me dattā pretyārtham abhikāṅkṣatā
GE07mbh_13_u:069.012a: apaśyat parimārgaṃś ca tāṃ yāṃ paragṛhe dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.012c: mameyam iti covāca brāhmaṇo yasya sābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:069.013c: bhavān dātā bhavān hartety atha tau māṃ tadocatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.014c: yāce pratigrahītāraṃ sa tu mām abravīd idam
GE07mbh_13_u:069.016a: kṛśaṃ ca bharate yā gaur mama putram apastanam
GE07mbh_13_u:069.016c: na sā śakyā mayā hātum ity uktvā sa jagāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:069.017a: tatas tam aparaṃ vipraṃ yāce vinimayena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:069.017c: gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ vai tatkṛte gṛhyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:069.018a: na rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇāmi śakto 'haṃ svasya mārgaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:069.018c: saiva gaur dīyatāṃ śīghraṃ mameti madhusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:069.019a: rukmam aśvāṃś ca dadato rajataṃ syandanāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:069.019c: na jagrāha yayau cāpi tadā sa brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.020a: etasminn eva kāle tu coditaḥ kāladharmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:069.021a: yamas tu pūjayitvā māṃ tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:069.021c: nāntaḥ saṃkhyāyate rājaṃs tava puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.022a: asti caiva kṛtaṃ pāpam ajñānāt tad api tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:069.022c: carasva pāpaṃ paścād vā pūrvaṃ vā tvaṃ yathecchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:069.023a: rakṣitāsmīti coktaṃ te pratijñā cānṛtā tava
GE07mbh_13_u:069.024a: pūrvaṃ kṛcchraṃ cariṣye 'haṃ paścāc chubham iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:069.026c: prāpsyase śāśvatāṃl lokāñ jitān svenaiva karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:069.027a: kūpe ''tmānam adhaḥśīrṣam apaśyaṃ patitaṃ ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:069.027c: tiryagyonim anuprāptaṃ na tu mām ajahāt smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:069.028a: tvayā tu tārito 'smy adya kim anyatra tapobalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:069.028c: anujānīhi māṃ kṛṣṇa gaccheyaṃ divam adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:069.029c: vimānaṃ divyam āsthāya yayau divam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_13_u:069.030a: tatas tasmin divaṃ prāpte nṛge bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:069.031c: brāhmaṇasvaṃ hṛtaṃ hanti nṛgaṃ brāhmaṇagaur iva
GE07mbh_13_u:069.032a: satāṃ samāgamaḥ sadbhir nāphalaḥ pārtha vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:069.033a: pradānaṃ phalavat tatra drohas tatra tathāphalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.001c: vistareṇa mahābāho na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.003a: ṛṣir uddālakir dīkṣām upagamya tataḥ sutam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.003e: samāpte niyame tasmin maharṣiḥ putram abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:070.004c: idhmā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ kalaśaś cābhito jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.004e: vismṛtaṃ me tad ādāya nadītīrād ihāvraja
GE07mbh_13_u:070.005c: na paśyāmi tad ity evaṃ pitaraṃ so 'bravīn muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.006c: yamaṃ paśyeti taṃ putram aśapat sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.008c: kiṃ mayā kṛtam ity uktvā nipapāta mahītale
GE07mbh_13_u:070.009c: vyatītaṃ tad ahaḥśeṣaṃ sā cogrā tatra śarvarī
GE07mbh_13_u:070.011a: sa paryapṛcchat taṃ putraṃ ślāghyaṃ pratyāgataṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.012a: api putra jitā lokāḥ śubhās te svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:070.012c: diṣṭyā cāsi punaḥ prāpto na hi te mānuṣaṃ vapuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.013c: anvarthaṃ taṃ pitur madhye maharṣīṇāṃ nyavedayat
GE07mbh_13_u:070.014a: kurvan bhavacchāsanam āśu yāto; hy ahaṃ viśālāṃ ruciraprabhāvām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.014c: vaivasvatīṃ prāpya sabhām apaśyaṃ; sahasraśo yojanahaimabhaumām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.015a: dṛṣṭvaiva mām abhimukham āpatantaṃ; gṛhaṃ nivedyāsanam ādideśa
GE07mbh_13_u:070.015c: vaivasvato 'rghyādibhir arhaṇaiś ca; bhavatkṛte pūjayām āsa māṃ saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.016a: tatas tv ahaṃ taṃ śanakair avocaṃ; vṛtaṃ sadasyair abhipūjyamānam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.016c: prāpto 'smi te viṣayaṃ dharmarāja; lokān arhe yān sma tān me vidhatsva
GE07mbh_13_u:070.017a: yamo 'bravīn māṃ na mṛto 'si saumya; yamaṃ paśyety āha tu tvāṃ tapasvī
GE07mbh_13_u:070.017c: pitā pradīptāgnisamānatejā; na tac chakyam anṛtaṃ vipra kartum
GE07mbh_13_u:070.018a: dṛṣṭas te 'haṃ pratigacchasva tāta; śocaty asau tava dehasya kartā
GE07mbh_13_u:070.018c: dadāmi kiṃ cāpi manaḥpraṇītaṃ; priyātithe tava kāmān vṛṇīṣva
GE07mbh_13_u:070.019a: tenaivam uktas tam ahaṃ pratyavocaṃ; prāpto 'smi te viṣayaṃ durnivartyam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.019c: icchāmy ahaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ samṛddhāṃl; lokān draṣṭuṃ yadi te 'haṃ varārhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.020a: yānaṃ samāropya tu māṃ sa devo; vāhair yuktaṃ suprabhaṃ bhānumantam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.020c: saṃdarśayām āsa tadā sma lokān; sarvāṃs tadā puṇyakṛtāṃ dvijendra
GE07mbh_13_u:070.025a: nadyo vīthyaḥ sabhā vāpī dīrghikāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.025c: ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny eva sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.026a: kṣīrasravā vai sarito girīṃś ca; sarpis tathā vimalaṃ cāpi toyam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.026b-0363_01: kṣīrasravā vai sarito girīṃś ca sarpiṣāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:070.026b-0363_02: vimalaṃ caiva toyaṃ ca sarvaṃ svādu tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:070.026c: vaivasvatasyānumatāṃś ca deśān; adṛṣṭapūrvān subahūn apaśyam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.027a: sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad ahaṃ dharmarājam; avocaṃ vai prabhaviṣṇuṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.027c: kṣīrasyaitāḥ sarpiṣaś caiva nadyaḥ; śaśvat srotāḥ kasya bhojyāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.028a: yamo 'bravīd viddhi bhojyās tvam etā; ye dātāraḥ sādhavo gorasānām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.028c: anye lokāḥ śāśvatā vītaśokāḥ; samākīrṇā gopradāne ratānām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.029a: na tv evāsāṃ dānamātraṃ praśastaṃ; pātraṃ kālo goviśeṣo vidhiś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:070.029c: jñātvā deyā vipra gavāntaraṃ hi; duḥkhaṃ jñātuṃ pāvakādityabhūtam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.030a: svādhyāyāḍhyo yo 'timātraṃ tapasvī; vaitānastho brāhmaṇaḥ pātram āsām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.030c: kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇābhyāgatāś ca; dvārair etair goviśeṣāḥ praśastāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.031a: tisro rātrīr adbhir upoṣya bhūmau; tṛptā gāvas tarpitebhyaḥ pradeyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.031c: vatsaiḥ prītāḥ suprajāḥ sopacārās; tryahaṃ dattvā gorasair vartitavyam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.032a: dattvā dhenuṃ suvratāṃ kāṃsyadohāṃ; kalyāṇavatsām apalāyinīṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:070.032c: yāvanti lomāni bhavanti tasyās; tāvad varṣāṇy aśnute svargalokam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.033a: tathānaḍvāhaṃ brāhmaṇāya pradāya; dāntaṃ dhuryaṃ balavantaṃ yuvānam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.033c: kulānujīvaṃ vīryavantaṃ bṛhantaṃ; bhuṅkte lokān saṃmitān dhenudasya
GE07mbh_13_u:070.034a: goṣu kṣāntaṃ gośaraṇyaṃ kṛtajñaṃ; vṛttiglānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pātram āhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.034c: vṛttiglāne saṃbhrame vā mahārthe; kṛṣyarthe vā homahetoḥ prasūtyām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.035a: gurvarthe vā bālapuṣṭyābhiṣaṅgād; gāvo dātuṃ deśakālo 'viśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.035c: antarjātāḥ sukrayajñānalabdhāḥ; prāṇakrītā nirjitāś caudakāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:070.036a: śrutvā vaivasvatavacas tam ahaṃ punar abruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:070.037a: tato yamo 'bravīd dhīmān gopradāne parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:070.037c: gopradānānukalpaṃ tu gām ṛte santi gopradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.038a: alābhe yo gavāṃ dadyād ghṛtadhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.039a: ghṛtālābhe ca yo dadyāt tiladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.039c: sa durgāt tārito dhenvā kṣīranadyāṃ pramodate
GE07mbh_13_u:070.040a: tilālābhe ca yo dadyāj jaladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.040c: sa kāmapravahāṃ śītāṃ nadīm etām upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:070.041c: dṛṣṭvā ca paramaṃ harṣam avāpam aham acyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:070.042a: nivedaye cāpi priyaṃ bhavatsu; kratur mahān alpadhanapracāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.042c: prāpto mayā tāta sa matprasūtaḥ; prapatsyate vedavidhipravṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.043a: śāpo hy ayaṃ bhavato 'nugrahāya; prāpto mayā yatra dṛṣṭo yamo me
GE07mbh_13_u:070.043c: dānavyuṣṭiṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā mahārthāṃ; niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ dānadharmāṃś cariṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:070.044a: idaṃ ca mām abravīd dharmarājaḥ; punaḥ punaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭo dvijarṣe
GE07mbh_13_u:070.044c: dānena tāta prayato 'bhūḥ sadaiva; viśeṣato gopradānaṃ ca kuryāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.045a: śuddho hy artho nāvamanyaḥ svadharmāt; pātre deyaṃ deśakālopapanne
GE07mbh_13_u:070.045c: tasmād gāvas te nityam eva pradeyā; mā bhūc ca te saṃśayaḥ kaś cid atra
GE07mbh_13_u:070.046a: etāḥ purā adadan nityam eva; śāntātmāno dānapathe niviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.046c: tapāṃsy ugrāṇy apratiśaṅkamānās; te vai dānaṃ pradaduś cāpi śaktyā
GE07mbh_13_u:070.047a: kāle śaktyā matsaraṃ varjayitvā; śuddhātmānaḥ śraddhinaḥ puṇyaśīlāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.047c: dattvā taptvā lokam amuṃ prapannā; dedīpyante puṇyaśīlāś ca nāke
GE07mbh_13_u:070.048a: etad dānaṃ nyāyalabdhaṃ dvijebhyaḥ; pātre dattaṃ prāpaṇīyaṃ parīkṣya
GE07mbh_13_u:070.048c: kāmyāṣṭamyāṃ vartitavyaṃ daśāhaṃ; rasair gavāṃ śakṛtā prasnavair vā
GE07mbh_13_u:070.049a: vedavratī syād vṛṣabhapradātā; vedāvāptir goyugasya pradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:070.050a: gām apy ekāṃ kapilāṃ saṃpradāya; nyāyopetāṃ kalmaṣād vipramucyet
GE07mbh_13_u:070.050c: gavāṃ rasāt paramaṃ nāsti kiṃ cid; gavāṃ dānaṃ sumahat tad vadanti
GE07mbh_13_u:070.051a: gāvo lokān dhārayanti kṣarantyo; gāvaś cānnaṃ saṃjanayanti loke
GE07mbh_13_u:070.051c: yas taj jānan na gavāṃ hārdam eti; sa vai gantā nirayaṃ pāpacetāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.052a: yat te dātuṃ gosahasraṃ śataṃ vā; śatārdhaṃ vā daśa vā sādhuvatsāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.052c: apy ekāṃ vā sādhave brāhmaṇāya; sāsyāmuṣmin puṇyatīrthā nadī vai
GE07mbh_13_u:070.053a: prāptyā puṣṭyā lokasaṃrakṣaṇena; gāvas tulyāḥ sūryapādaiḥ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_13_u:070.053c: śabdaś caikaḥ saṃtatiś copabhogas; tasmād godaḥ sūrya ivābhibhāti
GE07mbh_13_u:070.054a: guruṃ śiṣyo varayed gopradāne; sa vai vaktā niyataṃ svargadātā
GE07mbh_13_u:070.054c: vidhijñānāṃ sumahān eṣa dharmo; vidhiṃ hy ādyaṃ vidhayaḥ saṃśrayanti
GE07mbh_13_u:070.055a: etad dānaṃ nyāyalabdhaṃ dvijebhyaḥ; pātre dattvā prāpayethāḥ parīkṣya
GE07mbh_13_u:070.055c: tvayy āśaṃsanty amarā mānavāś ca; vayaṃ cāpi prasṛte puṇyaśīlāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:070.056a: ity ukto 'haṃ dharmarājñā maharṣe; dharmātmānaṃ śirasābhipraṇamya
GE07mbh_13_u:071.001a: uktaṃ vai gopradānaṃ te nāciketam ṛṣiṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:071.001c: māhātmyam api caivoktam uddeśena gavāṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:071.002a: nṛgeṇa ca yathā duḥkham anubhūtaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:071.003c: mokṣahetur abhūt kṛṣṇas tad apy avadhṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:071.004a: kiṃ tv asti mama saṃdeho gavāṃ lokaṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:071.004c: tattvataḥ śrotum icchāmi godā yatra viśanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:071.007a: kīdṛśā bhagavaṃl lokā gavāṃ tad brūhi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:071.007c: yān āvasanti dātāra etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:071.008a: kīdṛśāḥ kiṃphalāḥ kaḥ svit paramas tatra vai guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:071.008c: kathaṃ ca puruṣās tatra gacchanti vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:071.009a: kiyat kālaṃ pradānasya dātā ca phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:071.009c: kathaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dānaṃ syād alpam api vā katham
GE07mbh_13_u:071.010a: bahvīnāṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānam alpānāṃ vāpi kīdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:071.010c: adattvā gopradāḥ santi kena vā tac ca śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_13_u:071.011a: kathaṃ ca bahudātā syād alpadātrā samaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:071.011c: alpapradātā bahudaḥ kathaṃ ca syād iheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:071.012c: etat tathyena bhagavan mama śaṃsitum arhasi brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.001c: nāsya praṣṭāsti loke 'smiṃs tvatto 'nyo hi śatakrato
GE07mbh_13_u:072.002a: santi nānāvidhā lokā yāṃs tvaṃ śakra na paśyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:072.002c: paśyāmi yān ahaṃ lokān ekapatnyaś ca yāḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.003a: karmabhiś cāpi suśubhaiḥ suvratā ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:072.003c: saśarīrā hi tān yānti brāhmaṇāḥ śubhavṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.004c: svapnabhūtāṃś ca tāṃl lokān paśyantīhāpi suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.005a: te tu lokāḥ sahasrākṣa śṛṇu yādṛgguṇānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.005c: na tatra kramate kālo na jarā na ca pāpakam
GE07mbh_13_u:072.005e: tathānyan nāśubhaṃ kiṃ cin na vyādhis tatra na klamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.006a: yad yac ca gāvo manasā tasmin vāñchanti vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:072.006c: tat sarvaṃ prāpayanti sma mama pratyakṣadarśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:072.006e: kāmagāḥ kāmacāriṇyaḥ kāmāt kāmāṃś ca bhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:072.007a: vāpyaḥ sarāṃsi sarito vividhāni vanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.007c: gṛhāṇi parvatāś caiva yāvad dravyaṃ ca kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:072.008c: īdṛśān viddhi tāṃl lokān nāsti lokas tato 'dhikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.010a: yaḥ sarvamāṃsāni na bhakṣayīta; pumān sadā yāvad antāya yuktaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.010c: mātāpitror arcitā satyayuktaḥ; śuśrūṣitā brāhmaṇānām anindyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.011a: akrodhano goṣu tathā dvijeṣu; dharme rato guruśuśrūṣakaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.011c: yāvajjīvaṃ satyavṛtte rataś ca; dāne rato yaḥ kṣamī cāparādhe
GE07mbh_13_u:072.012a: mṛdur dānto devaparāyaṇaś ca; sarvātithiś cāpi tathā dayāvān
GE07mbh_13_u:072.012c: īdṛgguṇo mānavaḥ saṃprayāti; lokaṃ gavāṃ śāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.013a: na pāradārī paśyati lokam enaṃ; na vai gurughno na mṛṣāpralāpī
GE07mbh_13_u:072.013c: sadāpavādī brāhmaṇaḥ śāntavedo; doṣair anyair yaś ca yukto durātmā
GE07mbh_13_u:072.014a: na mitradhruṅ naikṛtikaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ; śaṭho 'nṛjur dharmavidveṣakaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.014c: na brahmahā manasāpi prapaśyed; gavāṃ lokaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.015a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ naipuṇena sureśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:072.016a: dāyādyalabdhair arthair yo gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.017a: yo vai dyūte dhanaṃ jitvā gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.017c: sa divyam ayutaṃ śakra varṣāṇāṃ phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:072.018a: dāyādyā yasya vai gāvo nyāyapūrvair upārjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.018c: pradattās tāḥ pradātṝṇāṃ saṃbhavanty akṣayā dhruvāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.019a: pratigṛhya ca yo dadyād gāḥ suśuddhena cetasā
GE07mbh_13_u:072.020a: janmaprabhṛti satyaṃ ca yo brūyān niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.020c: gurudvijasahaḥ kṣāntas tasya gobhiḥ samā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.021a: na jātu brāhmaṇo vācyo yad avācyaṃ śacīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:072.021c: manasā goṣu na druhyed govṛttir gonukampakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.022a: satye dharme ca niratas tasya śakra phalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:072.022c: gosahasreṇa samitā tasya dhenur bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:072.023a: kṣatriyasya guṇair ebhir anvitasya phalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:072.024a: vaiśyasyaite yadi guṇās tasya pañcāśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:072.025a: etac caivaṃ yo 'nutiṣṭheta yuktaḥ; satyena yukto guruśuśrūṣayā ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.025c: dāntaḥ kṣānto devatārcī praśāntaḥ; śucir buddho dharmaśīlo 'nahaṃvāk
GE07mbh_13_u:072.026a: mahat phalaṃ prāpnute sa dvijāya; dattvā dogdhrīṃ vidhinānena dhenum
GE07mbh_13_u:072.026c: nityaṃ dadyād ekabhaktaḥ sadā ca; satye sthito guruśuśrūṣitā ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.027a: vedādhyāyī goṣu yo bhaktimāṃś ca; nityaṃ dṛṣṭvā yo 'bhinandeta gāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.027c: ā jātito yaś ca gavāṃ nameta; idaṃ phalaṃ śakra nibodha tasya
GE07mbh_13_u:072.028a: yat syād iṣṭvā rājasūye phalaṃ tu; yat syād iṣṭvā bahunā kāñcanena
GE07mbh_13_u:072.028c: etat tulyaṃ phalam asyāhur agryaṃ; sarve santas tv ṛṣayo ye ca siddhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.029a: yo 'graṃ bhaktān kiṃ cid aprāśya dadyād; gobhyo nityaṃ govratī satyavādī
GE07mbh_13_u:072.029c: śānto buddho gosahasrasya puṇyaṃ; saṃvatsareṇāpnuyāt puṇyaśīlaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.030a: ya ekaṃ bhaktam aśnīyād dadyād ekaṃ gavāṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:072.031a: ekenaiva ca bhaktena yaḥ krītvā gāṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.031e: tāvac chatānāṃ sa gavāṃ phalam āpnoti śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:072.032c: pañcavārṣikam etat tu kṣatriyasya phalaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:072.032e: tato 'rdhena tu vaiśyasya śūdro vaiśyārdhataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.033a: yaś cātmavikrayaṃ kṛtvā gāḥ krītvā saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.033c: yāvatīḥ sparśayed gā vai tāvat tu phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:072.033e: lomni lomni mahābhāga lokāś cāsyākṣayāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.034a: saṃgrāmeṣv arjayitvā tu yo vai gāḥ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.035a: alābhe yo gavāṃ dadyāt tiladhenuṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.035c: durgāt sa tārito dhenvā kṣīranadyāṃ pramodate
GE07mbh_13_u:072.036a: na tv evāsāṃ dānamātraṃ praśastaṃ; pātraṃ kālo goviśeṣo vidhiś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.036c: kālajñānaṃ vipra gavāntaraṃ hi; duḥkhaṃ jñātuṃ pāvakādityabhūtam
GE07mbh_13_u:072.037a: svādhyāyāḍhyaṃ śuddhayoniṃ praśāntaṃ; vaitānasthaṃ pāpabhīruṃ kṛtajñam
GE07mbh_13_u:072.037c: goṣu kṣāntaṃ nātitīkṣṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ; vṛttiglānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pātram āhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.038a: vṛttiglāne sīdati cātimātraṃ; kṛṣyarthaṃ vā homahetoḥ prasūtyām
GE07mbh_13_u:072.038c: gurvarthaṃ vā bālasaṃvṛddhaye vā; dhenuṃ dadyād deśakāle viśiṣṭe
GE07mbh_13_u:072.039a: antarjātāḥ sukrayajñānalabdhāḥ; prāṇakrītā nirjitāś caukajāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.039c: kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇābhyāgatāś ca; dvārair etair goviśeṣāḥ praśastāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.040c: yathā hi gaṅgā saritāṃ variṣṭhā; tathārjunīnāṃ kapilā variṣṭhā
GE07mbh_13_u:072.041a: tisro rātrīs tv adbhir upoṣya bhūmau; tṛptā gāvas tarpitebhyaḥ pradeyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.041c: vatsaiḥ puṣṭaiḥ kṣīrapaiḥ supracārās; tryahaṃ dattvā gorasair vartitavyam
GE07mbh_13_u:072.042a: dattvā dhenuṃ suvratāṃ sādhuvatsāṃ; kalyāṇavṛttām apalāyinīṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:072.042c: yāvanti lomāni bhavanti tasyās; tāvanti varṣāṇi vasaty amutra
GE07mbh_13_u:072.043a: tathānaḍvāhaṃ brāhmaṇāyātha dhuryaṃ; dattvā yuvānaṃ balinaṃ vinītam
GE07mbh_13_u:072.043c: halasya voḍhāram anantavīryaṃ; prāpnoti lokān daśadhenudasya
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044a: kāntāre brāhmaṇān gāś ca yaḥ paritrāti kauśika
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044c: kṣemeṇa ca vimucyeta tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0366_01: kāntāraṃ yaḥ prapannas tu gāṃ dvijāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0366_02: kṣemeṇa pratimucyeta tam adhvānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0366_03: yānapātraṃ samārohan yaś ca gāṃ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0366_04: tīrtvā samudraṃ kṣemeṇa pratyāyāti gṛhaṃ gṛhī
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_01: mṛtyukāle sahasrākṣa yaś ca gāṃ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_02: mṛtyuṃ sukhaṃ sa labhate lokāṃś cāpnoty anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_03: kṣatriyo yaś ca vai kaś cid yātrākāle prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_04: gobhiś ca samanudhyāto jitvā śatrūn mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_05: yaḥ kaś cit karma yat kiṃ cit kartum ārabhate nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_06: gāvo dattvā sa tat sarvaṃ sukhopāyena vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_07: yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ samuddiśya gāṃ dvijāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.044d-0367_08: tasya saṃpatsyate kāmaḥ paratra ca śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:072.045c: lokān bahuvidhān divyān yad vāsya hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:072.046a: tat sarvaṃ samavāpnoti karmaṇā tena mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:072.046c: gobhiś ca samanujñātaḥ sarvatra sa mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:072.047a: yas tv etenaiva vidhinā gāṃ vaneṣv anugacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:072.048c: mama loke suraiḥ sārdhaṃ loke yatrāpi cecchati
GE07mbh_13_u:073.001a: jānan yo gām apahared vikrīyād vārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:073.001c: etad vijñātum icchāmi kā nu tasya gatir bhavet brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:073.002a: bhakṣārthaṃ vikrayārthaṃ vā ye 'pahāraṃ hi kurvate
GE07mbh_13_u:073.002c: dānārthaṃ vā brāhmaṇāya tatredaṃ śrūyatāṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:073.003a: vikrayārthaṃ hi yo hiṃsyād bhakṣayed vā niraṅkuśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:073.004a: ghātakaḥ khādako vāpi tathā yaś cānumanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:073.004c: yāvanti tasyā lomāni tāvad varṣāṇi majjati
GE07mbh_13_u:073.005c: vikraye cāpahāre ca te doṣā vai smṛtāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:073.006a: apahṛtya tu yo gāṃ vai brāhmaṇāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:073.006c: yāvad dāne phalaṃ tasyās tāvan nirayam ṛcchati
GE07mbh_13_u:073.007c: suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ hy uktaṃ dakṣiṇārtham asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:073.008a: gopradānaṃ tārayate sapta pūrvāṃs tathā parān
GE07mbh_13_u:073.008c: suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tāvad dviguṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:073.009a: suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā parā
GE07mbh_13_u:073.009c: suvarṇaṃ pāvanaṃ śakra pāvanānāṃ paraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:073.010c: eṣā me dakṣiṇā proktā samāsena mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:073.013c: durdharaṃ dhārayām āsū rājānaś caiva dhārmikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:073.014a: ya idaṃ brāhmaṇo nityaṃ vaded brāhmaṇasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_13_u:073.015a: tasya lokāḥ kilākṣayyā daivataiḥ saha nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:073.015c: iti brahmā sa bhagavān uvāca parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.001c: pravakṣyāmi tu saṃdehaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:074.002a: vratānāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ proktaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vā mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:074.002c: niyamānāṃ phalaṃ kiṃ ca svadhītasya ca kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.003a: damasyeha phalaṃ kiṃ ca vedānāṃ dhāraṇe ca kim
GE07mbh_13_u:074.003c: adhyāpane phalaṃ kiṃ ca sarvam icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:074.004a: apratigrāhake kiṃ ca phalaṃ loke pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:074.004c: tasya kiṃ ca phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ yaḥ saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:074.005a: svakarmaniratānāṃ ca śūrāṇāṃ cāpi kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.005c: satye ca kiṃ phalaṃ proktaṃ brahmacarye ca kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.007c: vettum icchāmi dharmajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:074.008a: yo vrataṃ vai yathoddiṣṭaṃ tathā saṃpratipadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:074.008c: akhaṇḍaṃ samyag ārabdhaṃ tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.009a: niyamānāṃ phalaṃ rājan pratyakṣam iha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:074.009c: niyamānāṃ kratūnāṃ ca tvayāvāptam idaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.010a: svadhītasyāpi ca phalaṃ dṛśyate 'mutra ceha ca
GE07mbh_13_u:074.011a: damasya tu phalaṃ rājañ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa me
GE07mbh_13_u:074.011c: dāntāḥ sarvatra sukhino dāntāḥ sarvatra nirvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.012c: prārthayanti ca yad dāntā labhante tan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.013a: yujyante sarvakāmair hi dāntāḥ sarvatra pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_13_u:074.013c: svarge tathā pramodante tapasā vikrameṇa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:074.014a: dānair yajñaiś ca vividhair yathā dāntāḥ kṣamānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.014b-0368_01: dānād damo viśiṣṭo hi dānaṃ kiṃ cid dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:074.014c: dātā kupyati no dāntas tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.015a: yas tu dadyād akupyan hi tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.015c: krodho hanti hi yad dānaṃ tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.017c: kāmayānā mahat sthānaṃ tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.019a: adhītyāpi hi yo vedān nyāyavidbhyaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:074.020c: yuddhe yaś ca paritrātā so 'pi svarge mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:074.022a: śūrā bahuvidhāḥ proktās teṣām arthāṃś ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:074.022c: śūrānvayānāṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ śūrasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:074.022d-0370_01: śūrāṇāṃ cāpi nirdiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ ca niyataṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:074.024c: ārjave ca tathā śūrāḥ śame vartanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:074.025a: tais tais tu niyamaiḥ śūrā bahavaḥ santi cāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:074.028c: satyaṃ ca bruvato nityaṃ samaṃ vā syān na vā samam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.029a: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.030c: satyena māruto vāti sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.031a: satyena devān prīṇāti pitṝn vai brāhmaṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:074.031c: satyam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na laṅghayet
GE07mbh_13_u:074.034a: brahmacaryasya tu guṇāñ śṛṇu me vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:074.034c: ā janmamaraṇād yas tu brahmacārī bhaved iha
GE07mbh_13_u:074.034e: na tasya kiṃ cid aprāpyam iti viddhi janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:074.035a: bahvyaḥ koṭyas tv ṛṣīṇāṃ tu brahmaloke vasanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:074.036c: brāhmaṇena viśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇo hy agnir ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:074.037a: pratyakṣaṃ ca tavāpy etad brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:074.037e: tad brahmacaryasya phalam ṛṣīṇām iha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:074.038a: mātāpitroḥ pūjane yo dharmas tam api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:074.038c: śuśrūṣate yaḥ pitaraṃ na cāsūyet kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:074.038e: mātaraṃ vānahaṃvādī gurum ācāryam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:074.039a: tasya rājan phalaṃ viddhi svarloke sthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:074.039c: na ca paśyeta narakaṃ guruśuśrūṣur ātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:075.001a: vidhiṃ gavāṃ param ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.001c: yena tāñ śāśvatāṃl lokān akhilān aśnuvīmahi
GE07mbh_13_u:075.002a: na godānāt paraṃ kiṃ cid vidyate vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:075.002c: gaur hi nyāyāgatā dattā sadyas tārayate kulam
GE07mbh_13_u:075.003a: satām arthe samyag utpādito yaḥ; sa vai kḷptaḥ samyag iṣṭaḥ prajābhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.003c: tasmāt pūrvaṃ hy ādikāle pravṛttaṃ; gavāṃ dāne śṛṇu rājan vidhiṃ me
GE07mbh_13_u:075.005a: dvijātim abhisatkṛtya śvaḥ kālam abhivedya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:075.006a: āhvānaṃ ca prayuñjīta samaṅge bahuleti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:075.006c: praviśya ca gavāṃ madhyam imāṃ śrutim udāharet
GE07mbh_13_u:075.007a: gaur me mātā govṛṣabhaḥ pitā me; divaṃ śarma jagatī me pratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_13_u:075.007c: prapadyaivaṃ śarvarīm uṣya goṣu; munir vāṇīm utsṛjed gopradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:075.008a: sa tām ekāṃ niśāṃ gobhiḥ samasakhyaḥ samavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.010a: ūrjasvinya ūrjamedhāś ca yajño; garbho 'mṛtasya jagataś ca pratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_13_u:075.010c: kṣitau rādhaḥprabhavaḥ śaśvad eva; prājāpatyāḥ sarvam ity arthavādaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.011a: gāvo mamainaḥ praṇudantu sauryās; tathā saumyāḥ svargayānāya santu
GE07mbh_13_u:075.011c: āmnātā me dadatīr āśrayaṃ tu; tathānuktāḥ santu sarvāśiṣo me
GE07mbh_13_u:075.012a: śeṣotsarge karmabhir dehamokṣe; sarasvatyaḥ śreyasi saṃpravṛttāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.012c: yūyaṃ nityaṃ puṇyakarmopavāhyā; diśadhvaṃ me gatim iṣṭāṃ prapannāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.013a: yā vai yūyaṃ so 'ham adyaikabhāvo; yuṣmān dattvā cāham ātmapradātā
GE07mbh_13_u:075.014a: evaṃ tasyāgre pūrvam ardhaṃ vadeta; gavāṃ dātā vidhivat pūrvadṛṣṭam
GE07mbh_13_u:075.014c: pratibrūyāc cheṣam ardhaṃ dvijātiḥ; pratigṛhṇan vai gopradāne vidhijñaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.015c: ūdhasyā bharitavyā ca vaiṣṇavīti ca codayet
GE07mbh_13_u:075.016a: nāma saṃkīrtayet tasyā yathāsaṃkhyottaraṃ sa vai
GE07mbh_13_u:075.016c: phalaṃ ṣaḍviṃśad aṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.017a: evam etān guṇān vṛddhān gavādīnāṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_13_u:075.018a: godaḥ śīlī nirbhayaś cārghadātā; na syād duḥkhī vasudātā ca kāmī
GE07mbh_13_u:075.018c: ūdhasyoḍhā bhārata yaś ca vidvān; vyākhyātās te vaiṣṇavāś candralokāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.019a: gā vai dattvā govratī syāt trirātraṃ; niśāṃ caikāṃ saṃvaseteha tābhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.019c: kāmyāṣṭamyāṃ vartitavyaṃ trirātraṃ; rasair vā goḥ śakṛtā prasnavair vā
GE07mbh_13_u:075.020a: vedavratī syād vṛṣabhapradātā; vedāvāptir goyugasya pradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:075.020c: tathā gavāṃ vidhim āsādya yajvā; lokān agryān vindate nāvidhijñaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.021a: kāmān sarvān pārthivān ekasaṃsthān; yo vai dadyāt kāmadughāṃ ca dhenum
GE07mbh_13_u:075.021c: samyak tāḥ syur havyakavyaughavatyas; tāsām ukṣṇāṃ jyāyasāṃ saṃpradānam
GE07mbh_13_u:075.022c: guhyo hy ayaṃ sarvalokasya dharmo; nemaṃ dharmaṃ yatra tatra prajalpet
GE07mbh_13_u:075.023a: santi loke śraddadhānā manuṣyāḥ; santi kṣudrā rākṣasā mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:075.023c: yeṣāṃ dānaṃ dīyamānaṃ hy aniṣṭaṃ; nāstikyaṃ cāpy āśrayante hy apuṇyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.024a: bārhaspatyaṃ vākyam etan niśamya; ye rājāno gopradānāni kṛtvā
GE07mbh_13_u:075.024c: lokān prāptāḥ puṇyaśīlāḥ suvṛttās; tān me rājan kīrtyamānān nibodha
GE07mbh_13_u:075.025a: uśīnaro viṣvagaśvo nṛgaś ca; bhagīratho viśruto yauvanāśvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.025c: māndhātā vai mucukundaś ca rājā; bhūridyumno naiṣadhaḥ somakaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:075.026a: purūravā bharataś cakravartī; yasyānvaye bhāratāḥ sarva eva
GE07mbh_13_u:075.026c: tathā vīro dāśarathiś ca rāmo; ye cāpy anye viśrutāḥ kīrtimantaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.027a: tathā rājā pṛthukarmā dilīpo; divaṃ prāpto gopradāne vidhijñaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.027c: yajñair dānais tapasā rājadharmair; māndhātābhūd gopradānaiś ca yuktaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.028a: tasmāt pārtha tvam apīmāṃ mayoktāṃ; bārhaspatīṃ bhāratīṃ dhārayasva
GE07mbh_13_u:075.028c: dvijāgryebhyaḥ saṃprayaccha pratīto; gāḥ puṇyā vai prāpya rājyaṃ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:075.029a: tathā sarvaṃ kṛtavān dharmarājo; bhīṣmeṇokto vidhivad gopradāne
GE07mbh_13_u:075.029c: sa māndhātur devadevopadiṣṭaṃ; samyag dharmaṃ dhārayām āsa rājā
GE07mbh_13_u:075.030a: iti nṛpa satataṃ gavāṃ pradāne; yavaśakalān saha gomayaiḥ pibānaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:075.030c: kṣititalaśayanaḥ śikhī yatātmā; vṛṣa iva rājavṛṣas tadā babhūva
GE07mbh_13_u:075.031a: sa nṛpatir abhavat sadaiva tābhyaḥ; prayatamanā hy abhisaṃstuvaṃś ca gā vai
GE07mbh_13_u:075.031c: nṛpadhuri ca na gām ayuṅkta bhūyas; turagavarair agamac ca yatra tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:076.002a: gopradāne guṇān samyak punaḥ prabrūhi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:076.002c: na hi tṛpyāmy ahaṃ vīra śṛṇvāno 'mṛtam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:076.003a: ity ukto dharmarājena tadā śāṃtanavo nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:076.003c: samyag āha guṇāṃs tasmai gopradānasya kevalān
GE07mbh_13_u:076.005a: asuryā nāma te lokā gāṃ dattvā tatra gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:076.006c: dattvā tamaḥ praviśati dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:076.007a: duṣṭā ruṣṭā vyādhitā durbalā vā; na dātavyā yāś ca mūlyair adattaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.007c: kleśair vipraṃ yo 'phalaiḥ saṃyunakti; tasyāvīryāś cāphalāś caiva lokāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.008c: yathā hi gaṅgā saritāṃ variṣṭhā; tathārjunīnāṃ kapilā variṣṭhā
GE07mbh_13_u:076.009c: viśeṣam icchāmi mahānubhāva; śrotuṃ samartho hi bhavān pravaktum
GE07mbh_13_u:076.010a: vṛddhānāṃ bruvatāṃ tāta śrutaṃ me yat prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_13_u:076.010c: vakṣyāmi tad aśeṣeṇa rohiṇyo nirmitā yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:076.011a: prajāḥ sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:076.012a: yathā hy amṛtam āśritya vartayanti divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.012c: tathā vṛttiṃ samāśritya vartayanti prajā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:076.013a: acarebhyaś ca bhūtebhyaś carāḥ śreṣṭhās tato narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.013c: brāhmaṇāś ca tataḥ śreṣṭhās teṣu yajñāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.014a: yajñair āpyāyate somaḥ sa ca goṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.014c: sarve devāḥ pramodante pūrvavṛttās tataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.014d-0371_01: tataḥ prajāsu sṛṣṭāsu dakṣādyaiḥ kṣudhitāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.015a: etāny eva tu bhūtāni prākrośan vṛttikāṅkṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:076.017a: sa gatas tasya tṛptiṃ tu gandhaṃ surabhim udgiran
GE07mbh_13_u:076.020c: śirasy avāpa tat kruddhaḥ sa tadodaikṣata prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.021a: tat tejas tu tato raudraṃ kapilā gā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:076.022a: yās tu tasmād apakramya somam evābhisaṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.024a: yathā hy amṛtam ādāya somo viṣyandate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.025a: na duṣyaty anilo nāgnir na suvarṇaṃ na codadhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.026a: imāṃl lokān bhariṣyanti haviṣā prasnavena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:076.027a: vṛṣabhaṃ ca dadau tasmai saha tābhiḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.027c: prasādayām āsa manas tena rudrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:076.028a: prītaś cāpi mahādevaś cakāra vṛṣabhaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:076.028c: dhvajaṃ ca vāhanaṃ caiva tasmāt sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.029a: tato devair mahādevas tadā paśupatiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.029c: īśvaraḥ sa gavāṃ madhye vṛṣāṅka iti cocyate
GE07mbh_13_u:076.030c: pradāne prathamaḥ kalpaḥ sarvāsām eva kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.031c: saumyāḥ puṇyāḥ kāmadāḥ prāṇadāś ca; gā vai dattvā sarvakāmapradaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_13_u:076.032a: imaṃ gavāṃ prabhavavidhānam uttamaṃ; paṭhan sadā śucir atimaṅgalapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.032c: vimucyate kalikaluṣeṇa mānavaḥ; priyaṃ sutān paśudhanam āpnuyāt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:076.033a: havyaṃ kavyaṃ tarpaṇaṃ śāntikarma; yānaṃ vāso vṛddhabālasya puṣṭim
GE07mbh_13_u:076.033c: etān sarvān gopradāne guṇān vai; dātā rājann āpnuyād vai sadaiva
GE07mbh_13_u:076.034a: pitāmahasyātha niśamya vākyaṃ; rājā saha bhrātṛbhir ājamīḍhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.034c: sauvarṇakāṃsyopaduhās tato gāḥ; pārtho dadau brāhmaṇasattamebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:076.035a: tathaiva tebhyo 'bhidadau dvijebhyo; gavāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni caiva
GE07mbh_13_u:076.035c: yajñān samuddiśya ca dakṣiṇārthe; lokān vijetuṃ paramāṃ ca kīrtim
GE07mbh_13_u:077.001a: etasminn eva kāle tu vasiṣṭham ṛṣisattamam
GE07mbh_13_u:077.003a: trailokye bhagavan kiṃ svit pavitraṃ kathyate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:077.003c: yat kīrtayan sadā martyaḥ prāpnuyāt puṇyam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:077.004a: tasmai provāca vacanaṃ praṇatāya hitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:077.004c: gavām upaniṣad vidvān namaskṛtya gavāṃ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:077.005c: gāvaḥ pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ gāvaḥ svastyayanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:077.006a: gāvo bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca gāvaḥ puṣṭiḥ sanātanī
GE07mbh_13_u:077.006c: gāvo lakṣmyās tathā mūlaṃ goṣu dattaṃ na naśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:077.006e: annaṃ hi satataṃ gāvo devānāṃ paramaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:077.007c: gāvo yajñasya hi phalaṃ goṣu yajñāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:077.007d-0375_01: gāvo bhaviṣyaṃ bhūtaṃ ca goṣu yajñāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:077.008a: sāyaṃ prātaś ca satataṃ homakāle mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:077.008c: gāvo dadati vai homyam ṛṣibhyaḥ puruṣarṣabha

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009A_0172: avaśiṣṭāś ca yā gāvas tā babhūvur vanecarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009A_0173: phenapākhyānam etat te gavāṃ māhātmyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009A_0175: nārāyaṇo 'pi bhagavān dṛṣṭvā goṣu paraṃ yaśaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0001: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ yac chreṣṭhaṃ lokeṣu pūjitam bhīṣmaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0012: mahārthaṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ svid dānaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0013: kena durgāṇi tarati kena lokān avāpnute

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0015: ke vā yajñasya voḍhāraḥ keṣu yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0017: yajñānām uttamaṃ kiṃ ca tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0019: vyāso vratanidhiḥ prāha gavām idam anuttamam

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0024: gāvas tāḥ prāpya tiṣṭhanti goloke puṇyadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0025: mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ viśvasya jagataś ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0026: rudrāṇām atha sādhyānāṃ gāva eva tu mātaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0027: rudrāṇāṃ mātaro hy etā ādityānāṃ svasā smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0031: ya evaṃ veda tā gāvo mātaro devapūjitāḥ
