GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0041: sarve devāviśan gāvaḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0043: dadhinā juhuyād agniṃ dadhinā svasti vācayet

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0045: ghṛtena juhuyād agniṃ ghṛtena svasti vācayet
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0046: ghṛtam ālabhya prāśnīyād gavāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ samaśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0047: gāvaḥ saṃjīvanā yās tu gāvo dānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0048: tāḥ puṇyagopāḥ suphalā bhajamānaṃ bhajantu mām
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0049: yena devāḥ pavitreṇa svargalokam ito gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0050: tat pavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ mama mūrdhni pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0053: na tatra devā vartante nāgnihotrāṇi juhvati
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0054: na yajñair ijyate cātra yatra gaur vai na duhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0055: kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ yāsāṃ rasānām uttamo rasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0057: iḍām āhūya dhenuṃ ca savatsāṃ yajñamātaram
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0059: yā medhyā prathamaṃ karma iyaṃ dhenuḥ sarasvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0061: yatra sarvam idaṃ protaṃ yat kiṃ cij jaṃgamaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0062: sā gaur vai prathamā puṇyā sarvabhūtahite ratā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0064: gāvo mām abhirakṣantu iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0065: eṣa yajñaḥ sahopāṅga eṣa yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0067: etat tāta mayā proktaṃ gavām iha paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0069: śrutvā labheta tāṃl lokān ye mayā parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0071: dhenum ekāṃ sadā dadyād ahany ahani pāvanīm
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0072: tat tathā prāpnuyād vipraḥ paṭhan vai gomatīṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0073: atha dhenur na vidyeta tiladhenum anuttamām
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0075: āhnikaṃ gomatīṃ nityaṃ yaḥ paṭheta sadā naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0077: ghṛtaṃ vā nityam ālabhya prāśya vā gomatīṃ japet

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0079: manasā gomatīṃ japyed gomatyā nityam āhnikam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0080: na tv eva divasaṃ kuryād vyarthaṃ gomatipāṭhakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0081: gomatīṃ japamānā hi devā devatvam āpnuvan
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0082: ṛṣitvam ṛṣayaś cāpi gomatyā sarvam āpnuvan

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0084: gomatīṃ sevate yas tu labhate priyasaṃgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0085: etat pavitraṃ kārtsnyena etad vratam anuttamam

GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0093: kṣatriyāś caiva śūdrāś ca mantrahīnāś ca ye dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0095: kapilās tūttamā loke goṣu caivottamā matāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0096: tāsāṃ dātā labhet svargaṃ vidhinā yaś ca sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0097: spṛśeta kapilāṃ yas tu daṇḍena caraṇena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0100: mantrahīnaṃ tu yo yuñjyāt kṛmiyonau prasūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0102: padāni yāvad gaccheta tāval lokān kṛmir bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0103: yāvac ca bindavas tasyāḥ śoṇitasya kṣitiṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0109: atha nyāyena ye viprāḥ kapilām upayuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0110: tasmiṃl loke pramodante lokāś caiṣām anāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0111: vidhinā ye na kurvanti śūdrāṃs tān upadhāraya śukaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0114: śṛṇu putra yathā goṣu variṣṭhāḥ kapilāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0115: kapilatvaṃ ca saṃprāptāḥ pūjyāś ca satataṃ nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0116: agniḥ purāpacakrāma devebhya iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0117: devebhyo māṃ chādayata śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0118: ūcus tāḥ sahitās tatra svāgataṃ tava pāvaka
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0119: iha guptas tvam asmābhir na devair upalapsyase
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0121: goṣu guptaṃ ca vijñāya tāḥ kṣipram upatasthire
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0122: yuṣmāsu nivasaty agnir iti gāḥ samacūcudan
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0123: prakāśyatāṃ hutavaho lokān na cchettum arhatha
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0124: evam astv ity anujñāya pāvakaṃ samadarśayan
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0125: adhigamya pāvakaṃ tuṣṭās te devāḥ sadya eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0126: agniṃ pracodayām āsuḥ kriyatāṃ goṣv anugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0127: gavāṃ tu yāsāṃ gātreṣu pāvakaḥ samavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0129: mahāphalatvaṃ loke ca dadau tāsāṃ hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0130: tasmād dhi sarvavarṇānāṃ kapilāṃ gāṃ pradāpaya
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0136: kena varṇavibhāgena vijñeyā kapilā bhavet vyāsaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0137: kati vā lakṣaṇāny asyā dṛṣṭāni munibhiḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0138: śṛṇu tāta yathā goṣu vijñeyā kapilā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0139: netrayoḥ śṛṅgayoś caiva khureṣu vṛṣaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0140: karṇato ghrāṇataś cāpi ṣaḍvidhāḥ kapilāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0141: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ tu yady ekam api dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0142: kapilāṃ tāṃ vijānīyād evam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0144: grīvāyāṃ vaiṣṇavī jñeyā pūṣṇo ghrāṇād ajāyata
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0146: gāyatryāś ca vṛṣaṇayor utpattiḥ ṣaḍguṇā smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0147: evaṃ gāvaś ca viprāś ca gāyatrī satyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0148: vasantaś ca suparṇaś ca ekataḥ samajāyata
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0149: netrayoḥ kapilāṃ yas tu vāhayeta duheta vā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0152: yadā labheta mānuṣyaṃ jātyandho jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0153: śṛṅgayoḥ kapilāṃ yas tu vāhayeta duheta vā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0154: tiryagyoniṃ sa labhate jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0155: khureṣu kapilāṃ yas tu vāhayeta duheta vā
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0158: nirāśrayaḥ sadā caiva jāyate yadi cet kṛmiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0159: varṇena kapilāṃ yas tu jānann apy upajīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0160: sahasraśaḥ kṛmir bhūtvā mānuṣyaṃ prāpnuyād atha
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0161: caṇḍālaḥ pāpakarmā vā jāyate sa narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0162: ghrāṇena kapilāṃ yas tu pramādād upajīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0164: vyādhigrasto jaḍo rogī bhaven mānuṣyam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:080.045d-009B_0169: ye tu pāpā hy asūyante kapilāṃ vāhayanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:081.001a: mayā gavāṃ purīṣaṃ vai śriyā juṣṭam iti śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:081.001c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ saṃśayo 'tra hi me mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:081.003a: śrīḥ kṛtveha vapuḥ kāntaṃ gomadhyaṃ praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:081.003c: gāvo 'tha vismitās tasyā dṛṣṭvā rūpasya saṃpadam
GE07mbh_13_u:081.004a: kāsi devi kuto vā tvaṃ rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:081.004c: vismitāḥ sma mahābhāge tava rūpasya saṃpadā
GE07mbh_13_u:081.005a: icchāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ jñātuṃ kā tvaṃ kva ca gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:081.005c: tattvena ca suvarṇābhe sarvam etad bravīhi naḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.006a: lokakāntāsmi bhadraṃ vaḥ śrīr nāmneha pariśrutā
GE07mbh_13_u:081.006c: mayā daityāḥ parityaktā vinaṣṭāḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.006d-0383_01: mayābhipannā devāś ca modante śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.007a: indro vivasvān somaś ca viṣṇur āpo 'gnir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:081.008a: yāṃś ca dviṣāmy ahaṃ gāvas te vinaśyanti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.009c: icchāmi cāpi yuṣmāsu vastuṃ sarvāsu nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:081.010a: adhruvāṃ cañcalāṃ ca tvāṃ sāmānyāṃ bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:081.010c: na tvām icchāmi bhadraṃ te gamyatāṃ yatra rocate
GE07mbh_13_u:081.011a: vapuṣmantyo vayaṃ sarvāḥ kim asmākaṃ tvayādya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:081.011c: yatreṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ tatra kṛtakāryā vayaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:081.012a: kim etad vaḥ kṣamaṃ gāvo yan māṃ nehābhyanandatha
GE07mbh_13_u:081.012c: na māṃ saṃprati gṛhṇītha kasmād vai durlabhāṃ satīm
GE07mbh_13_u:081.013a: satyaś ca lokavādo 'yaṃ loke carati suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.014a: mahad ugraṃ tapaḥ kṛtvā māṃ niṣevanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.015a: kṣamam etad dhi vo gāvaḥ pratigṛhṇīta mām iha
GE07mbh_13_u:081.015c: nāvamanyā hy ahaṃ saumyās trailokye sacarācare
GE07mbh_13_u:081.017a: bahunātra kim uktena gamyatāṃ yatra vāñchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:081.017c: vapuṣmatyo vayaṃ sarvāḥ kim asmākaṃ tvayānaghe
GE07mbh_13_u:081.019e: mānanāṃ tv aham icchāmi bhavatyaḥ satataṃ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.020a: apy ekāṅge tu vo vastum icchāmi ca sukutsite
GE07mbh_13_u:081.020c: na vo 'sti kutsitaṃ kiṃ cid aṅgeṣv ālakṣyate 'naghāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.021c: vaseyaṃ yatra cāṅge 'haṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhatha
GE07mbh_13_u:081.022a: evam uktās tu tā gāvaḥ śubhāḥ karuṇavatsalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.022c: saṃmantrya sahitāḥ sarvāḥ śriyam ūcur narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:081.023c: śakṛnmūtre nivasa naḥ puṇyam etad dhi naḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:081.024c: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ pūjitāsmi sukhapradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:081.025a: evaṃ kṛtvā tu samayaṃ śrīr gobhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:081.026c: māhātmyaṃ ca gavāṃ bhūyaḥ śrūyatāṃ gadato mama
GE07mbh_13_u:082.001a: ye ca gāḥ saṃprayacchanti hutaśiṣṭāśinaś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:082.001c: teṣāṃ satrāṇi yajñāś ca nityam eva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:082.002c: tena yajñasya yajñatvam atomūlaṃ ca lakṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:082.003a: dānānām api sarveṣāṃ gavāṃ dānaṃ praśasyate
GE07mbh_13_u:082.003c: gāvaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ pavitrāś ca pāvanaṃ hy etad uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:082.004a: puṣṭyartham etāḥ seveta śāntyartham api caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:082.005a: gāvas tejaḥ paraṃ proktam iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:082.005c: na gobhyaḥ paramaṃ kiṃ cit pavitraṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:082.008e: paryupāsanta kauravya kadā cid vai pitāmaham
GE07mbh_13_u:082.010a: tatra divyāni puṣpāṇi prāvahat pavanas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:082.010c: ājahrur ṛtavaś cāpi sugandhīni pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_13_u:082.011e: indraḥ papraccha deveśam abhivādya praṇamya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:082.012c: upariṣṭād gavāṃ loka etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_13_u:082.013a: kiṃ tapo brahmacaryaṃ vā gobhiḥ kṛtam iheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:082.013c: devānām upariṣṭād yad vasanty arajasaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:082.014a: tataḥ provāca taṃ brahmā śakraṃ balanisūdanam
GE07mbh_13_u:082.015a: tena tvam āsāṃ māhātmyaṃ na vettha śṛṇu tat prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:082.015c: gavāṃ prabhāvaṃ paramaṃ māhātmyaṃ ca surarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:082.016a: yajñāṅgaṃ kathitā gāvo yajña eva ca vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:082.016c: etābhiś cāpy ṛte yajño na pravartet kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:082.017a: dhārayanti prajāś caiva payasā haviṣā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:082.018a: janayanti ca dhānyāni bījāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:082.018c: tato yajñāḥ pravartante havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:082.019a: payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ caiva puṇyāś caitāḥ surādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:082.020a: munīṃś ca dhārayantīha prajāś caivāpi karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:082.020e: upariṣṭāt tato 'smākaṃ vasanty etāḥ sadaiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:082.021a: etat te kāraṇaṃ śakra nivāsakṛtam adya vai

GE07mbh_13_u:082.023c: tac ca me śṛṇu kārtsnyena vadato balasūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:082.024c: trīṃl lokān anuśāsatsu viṣṇau garbhatvam āgate
GE07mbh_13_u:082.026a: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahādevīṃ tapyamānāṃ mahat tapaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:082.029c: tatra gatvā mayā sārdhaṃ paryupāsanta tāṃ śubhām

GE07mbh_13_u:082.032c: eṣa eva varo me 'dya yat prīto 'si mamānagha brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:082.033a: tām evaṃ bruvatīṃ devīṃ surabhīṃ tridaśeśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:082.033c: pratyabruvaṃ yad devendra tan nibodha śacīpate

GE07mbh_13_u:082.036a: mānuṣeṣu ca kurvāṇāḥ prajāḥ karma sutās tava
GE07mbh_13_u:082.036c: nivatsyanti mahābhāge sarvā duhitaraś ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:082.037a: manasā cintitā bhogās tvayā vai divyamānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:082.037c: yac ca svargasukhaṃ devi tat te saṃpatsyate śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:082.038c: na tatra kramate mṛtyur na jarā na ca pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:082.038e: na dainyaṃ nāśubhaṃ kiṃ cid vidyate tatra vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:082.039a: tatra divyāny araṇyāni divyāni bhavanāni ca

GE07mbh_13_u:082.039d-0384_01: brahmacaryeṇa tapasā satyena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:082.040a: vrataiś ca vividhaiḥ puṇyais tathā tīrthānusevanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:082.040c: tapasā mahatā caiva sukṛtena ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:082.041a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā śakrānupṛcchate
GE07mbh_13_u:082.041c: na te paribhavaḥ kāryo gavām arinisūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:082.042a: etac chrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ pūjayām āsa nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:082.042c: gāś cakre bahumānaṃ ca tāsu nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:082.043a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ pāvanaṃ ca mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:082.043c: pavitraṃ paramaṃ cāpi gavāṃ māhātmyam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:082.044a: ya idaṃ kathayen nityaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:082.045a: goṣu bhaktaś ca labhate yad yad icchati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:082.045c: striyo 'pi bhaktā yā goṣu tāś ca kāmān avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:082.046a: putrārthī labhate putraṃ kanyā patim avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:082.046c: dhanārthī labhate vittaṃ dharmārthī dharmam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:082.047a: vidyārthī prāpnuyād vidyāṃ sukhārthī prāpnuyāt sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:082.047c: na kiṃ cid durlabhaṃ caiva gavāṃ bhaktasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:083.000-0385_01: namaḥ sarvasahābhyaś cety abhidhāya dine dine
GE07mbh_13_u:083.000-0385_02: namaskaroti gobhyo yaḥ sa sukhaṃ yāti tatpatham vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:083.000-0386_01: evaṃ śrutvā paraṃ puṇyaṃ gavāṃ dānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.002a: rājyaṃ hi satataṃ duḥkham āśramāś ca sudurvidāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.002e: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ca narendrāṇāṃ vidyate na śubhā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.003c: pūrvaṃ ca kathitā dharmās tvayā me kurunandana

GE07mbh_13_u:083.006a: tatra śrutis tu paramā suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇeti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:083.006c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ pitāmaha yathātatham
GE07mbh_13_u:083.007a: kiṃ suvarṇaṃ kathaṃ jātaṃ kasmin kāle kim ātmakam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.007c: kiṃ dānaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ caiva kasmāc ca param ucyate

GE07mbh_13_u:083.009a: kasmāc ca pāvanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhūmer gobhyaś ca kāñcanam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.009c: paramaṃ dakṣiṇārthe ca tad bravīhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.011a: pitā mama mahātejāḥ śaṃtanur nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.011c: tasya ditsur ahaṃ śrāddhaṃ gaṅgādvāram upāgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.012c: mātā me jāhnavī caiva sāhāyyam akarot tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:083.014c: dātuṃ nirvapaṇaṃ samyag yathāvad aham ārabham
GE07mbh_13_u:083.016a: tam utthitam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.017a: tato me punar evāsīt saṃjñā saṃcintya śāstrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.017c: nāyaṃ vedeṣu vihito vidhir hasta iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:083.017e: piṇḍo deyo nareṇeha tato matir abhūn mama
GE07mbh_13_u:083.018a: sākṣān neha manuṣyasya pitaro 'ntarhitāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:083.018c: gṛhṇanti vihitaṃ tv evaṃ piṇḍo deyaḥ kuśeṣv iti
GE07mbh_13_u:083.019c: śāstrapramāṇāt sūkṣmaṃ tu vidhiṃ pārthiva saṃsmaran
GE07mbh_13_u:083.020a: tato darbheṣu tat sarvam adadaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.021a: tataḥ so 'ntarhito bāhuḥ pitur mama narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:083.021c: tato māṃ darśayām āsuḥ svapnānte pitaras tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:083.022a: prīyamāṇās tu mām ūcuḥ prītāḥ sma bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.022c: vijñānena tavānena yan na muhyasi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.023a: tvayā hi kurvatā śāstraṃ pramāṇam iha pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:083.023c: ātmā dharmaḥ śrutaṃ vedāḥ pitaraś ca maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.024c: pramāṇam upanītā vai sthitiś ca na vicālitā
GE07mbh_13_u:083.025a: tad idaṃ samyag ārabdhaṃ tvayādya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.025c: kiṃ tu bhūmer gavāṃ cārthe suvarṇaṃ dīyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:083.026a: evaṃ vayaṃ ca dharmaś ca sarve cāsmatpitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.026c: pāvitā vai bhaviṣyanti pāvanaṃ paramaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:083.027a: daśa pūrvān daśa parāṃs tathā saṃtārayanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:083.027c: suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti evaṃ me pitaro 'bruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:083.028a: tato 'haṃ vismito rājan pratibuddho viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:083.029a: itihāsam imaṃ cāpi śṛṇu rājan purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.029c: jāmadagnyaṃ prati vibho dhanyam āyuṣyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:083.031a: tato jitvā mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.033a: vipāpmāpi sa tejasvī tena kratuphalena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035a: pāvanaṃ yat paraṃ nṝṇām ugre karmaṇi vartatām
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0388_01: pratyuvāca tatas teṣāṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_02: bhūyaś ca viprarṣigaṇāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ pāvanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_03: te yad brūyur mahāprājñās tac caiva samudācara
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_04: tato vasiṣṭhaṃ devarṣim agastyam atha kaśyapam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_06: jātā matir me viprendrāḥ kathaṃ pūyeyam ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_07: kena vā karmayogena pradāneneha kena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_08: yadi vo 'nugrahakṛtā buddhir māṃ prati sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_09: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ prabrūta pāvanaṃ kiṃ me bhaved iti tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_10: gāś ca vittaṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca dattveha bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_11: pāpakṛn mucyate martya iti bhārgava śuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_12: anyad dānaṃ tu viprarṣe śrūyatāṃ pāvanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_14: dagdhvā lokān purā vīryāt saṃbhūtam iha śuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_15: suvarṇam iti vikhyātaṃ tad dadat siddhim eṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_18: yat phalaṃ cāsya vihitaṃ dāne param ihocyate
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_19: suvarṇaṃ yena yasmāc ca yathā ca guṇavattaram
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_20: tan nibodha mahābāho sarvaṃ nigadato mama
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_22: ajo 'gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo 'śva iti darśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_23: kuñjarāś ca smṛtā nāgā mahiṣāś cāsurā iti
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_24: kukkuṭāś ca varāhāś ca rākṣasā bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_25: iḍā gāvaḥ payaḥ somo bhūmir ity eva ca śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_27: suvarṇam ebhyo viprarṣe ratnaṃ paramam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_29: manuṣyāś ca piśācāś ca prayatā dhārayanti tat
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_33: bhūmer gobhyo 'tha ratnebhyas tad viddhi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_34: pṛthivīṃ gāś ca dattveha yac cānyad api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_37: prayaccha dvijamukhyebhyaḥ pāvanaṃ hy etad uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.035f-0389_39: suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti sarvadās te bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:083.036a: devatās te prayacchanti suvarṇaṃ ye dadaty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:083.036c: agnir hi devatāḥ sarvāḥ suvarṇaṃ ca tad ātmakam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.037a: tasmāt suvarṇaṃ dadatā dattāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.037c: bhavanti puruṣavyāghra na hy ataḥ paramaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.038a: bhūya eva ca māhātmyaṃ suvarṇasya nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:083.039a: mayā śrutam idaṃ pūrvaṃ purāṇe bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:083.042a: te mahādevam āsīnaṃ devīṃ ca varadām umām
GE07mbh_13_u:083.042c: prasādya śirasā sarve rudram ūcur bhṛgūdvaha

GE07mbh_13_u:083.043e: amoghatejās tvaṃ deva devī ceyam umā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:083.044a: apatyaṃ yuvayor deva balavad bhavitā prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:083.044c: tan nūnaṃ triṣu lokeṣu na kiṃ cic cheṣayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:083.045a: tad ebhyaḥ praṇatebhyas tvaṃ devebhyaḥ pṛthulocana
GE07mbh_13_u:083.045e-0390_03: tad apatyaṃ hi yuvayor devān abhibhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.045e-0390_04: na hi te pṛthivī devī na ca dyaur na divaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:083.045e-0390_05: vīryaṃ dhārayituṃ śaktāḥ samastā iti no matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.045e-0390_06: tejaḥprabhāvān nirdagdhaṃ na syāt sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:083.045e-0390_07: tasmāt prasādaṃ bhagavan kartum arhasi naḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:083.045e-0390_08: na devyāḥ saṃbhavet putro bhavataḥ surasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:083.046c: evam astv iti devāṃs tān viprarṣe pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:083.047a: ity uktvā cordhvam anayat tad reto vṛṣavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.048a: rudrāṇī tu tataḥ kruddhā prajocchede tathā kṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:083.048c: devān athābravīt tatra strībhāvāt paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.049a: yasmād apatyakāmo vai bhartā me vinivartitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.049c: tasmāt sarve surā yūyam anapatyā bhaviṣyatha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.050a: prajocchedo mama kṛto yasmād yuṣmābhir adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:083.050c: tasmāt prajā vaḥ khagamāḥ sarveṣāṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:083.051a: pāvakas tu na tatrāsīc chāpakāle bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.051c: devā devyās tathā śāpād anapatyās tadābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:083.052a: rudras tu tejo 'pratimaṃ dhārayām āsa tat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:083.052c: praskannaṃ tu tatas tasmāt kiṃ cit tatrāpatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:083.053a: tat papāta tadā cāgnau vavṛdhe cādbhutopamam
GE07mbh_13_u:083.054a: etasminn eva kāle tu devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.054c: asuras tārako nāma tena saṃtāpitā bhṛśam

GE07mbh_13_u:083.056a: sthānāni devatānāṃ hi vimānāni purāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:083.056c: ṛṣīṇām āśramāś caiva babhūvur asurair hṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:083.057a: te dīnamanasaḥ sarve devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:083.057c: prajagmuḥ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇam ajaraṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:083.057d-0391_01: vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ stotum ārebhire prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:084.001a: asuras tārako nāma tvayā dattavaraḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:084.001c: surān ṛṣīṃś ca kliśnāti vadhas tasya vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:084.002a: tasmād bhayaṃ samutpannam asmākaṃ vai pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.002c: paritrāyasva no deva na hy anyā gatir asti naḥ brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:084.004a: vedā dharmāś ca notsādaṃ gaccheyuḥ surasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.004c: vihitaṃ pūrvam evātra mayā vai vyetu vo jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.005c: devair na śakyate hantuṃ sa kathaṃ praśamaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:084.006a: sa hi naiva sma devānāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām
GE07mbh_13_u:084.006c: vadhyaḥ syām iti jagrāha varaṃ tvattaḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.007a: devāś ca śaptā rudrāṇyā prajocchede purā kṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:084.007c: na bhaviṣyati vo 'patyam iti sarvajagatpate brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:084.009c: mānuṣān atha gandharvān nāgān atha ca pakṣiṇaḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:084.011a: sanātano hi saṃkalpaḥ kāma ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:084.011c: rudrasya tejaḥ praskannam agnau nipatitaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_13_u:084.012a: tat tejo 'gnir mahad bhūtaṃ dvitīyam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:084.013a: sa tu nāvāpa taṃ śāpaṃ naṣṭaḥ sa hutabhuk tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.013c: tasmād vo bhayahṛd devāḥ samutpatsyati pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.014a: anviṣyatāṃ vai jvalanas tathā cādya niyujyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:084.015a: na hi tejasvināṃ śāpās tejaḥsu prabhavanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:084.015c: balāny atibalaṃ prāpya nabalāni bhavanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:084.016a: hanyād avadhyān varadān api caiva tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.017c: hṛcchayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jyeṣṭho rudrād api prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.018a: anviṣyatāṃ sa tu kṣipraṃ tejorāśir hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.018c: sa vo manogataṃ kāmaṃ devaḥ saṃpādayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:084.019a: etad vākyam upaśrutya tato devā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.020a: tatas trailokyam ṛṣayo vyacinvanta suraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.021c: lokān anvacaran siddhāḥ sarva eva bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.023a: rasātalatale devā vasaty agnir iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:084.024a: sa saṃsupto jale devā bhagavān havyavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.024c: apaḥ saṃsṛjya tejobhis tena saṃtāpitā vayam
GE07mbh_13_u:084.025a: tasya darśanam iṣṭaṃ vo yadi devā vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.025c: tatrainam abhigacchadhvaṃ kāryaṃ vo yadi vahninā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.026a: gamyatāṃ sādhayiṣyāmo vayaṃ hy agnibhayāt surāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.026c: etāvad uktvā maṇḍūkas tvarito jalam āviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:084.027c: śaśāpa sa tam āsādya na rasān vetsyasīti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:084.028a: taṃ sa saṃyujya śāpena maṇḍūkaṃ pāvako yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:084.028c: anyatra vāsāya vibhur na ca devān adarśayat
GE07mbh_13_u:084.029a: devās tv anugrahaṃ cakrur maṇḍūkānāṃ bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.029c: yat tac chṛṇu mahābāho gadato mama sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.031c: gatāsūn api vaḥ śuṣkān bhūmiḥ saṃdhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:084.032a: ity uktvā tāṃs tato devāḥ punar eva mahīm imām
GE07mbh_13_u:084.033a: atha tān dviradaḥ kaś cit surendradviradopamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.033c: aśvatthastho 'gnir ity evaṃ prāha devān bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.035d-0392_02: ūṣmāyāṃ cittalair vaṃśais tāṃs tyaktvā prāviśac chamīm
GE07mbh_13_u:084.036a: anugrahaṃ tu nāgānāṃ yaṃ cakruḥ śṛṇu taṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:084.037e: ity uktvā punar evāgnim anusasrur divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.038c: śukena khyāpito vipra taṃ devāḥ samupādravan
GE07mbh_13_u:084.039a: śaśāpa śukam agnis tu vāgvihīno bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:084.039c: jihvāṃ cāvartayām āsa tasyāpi hutabhuk tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.040a: dṛṣṭvā tu jvalanaṃ devāḥ śukam ūcur dayānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.040c: bhavitā na tvam atyantaṃ śakune naṣṭavāg iti
GE07mbh_13_u:084.041b-0393_01: kriyamāṇā ca te vāṇī bhaviṣyati narair bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:084.042a: ity uktvā taṃ śamīgarbhe vahnim ālakṣya devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.042c: tad evāyatanaṃ cakruḥ puṇyaṃ sarvakriyāsv api
GE07mbh_13_u:084.044a: āpo rasātale yās tu saṃsṛṣṭāś citrabhānunā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.045a: tato 'gnir devatā dṛṣṭvā babhūva vyathitas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.045c: kim āgamanam ity evaṃ tān apṛcchata pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.046a: tam ūcur vibudhāḥ sarve te caiva paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.046c: tvāṃ niyokṣyāmahe kārye tad bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:084.046e: kṛte ca tasmin bhavitā tavāpi sumahān guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.047a: brūta yad bhavatāṃ kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kartāsmi tat surāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.047c: bhavatāṃ hi niyojyo 'haṃ mā vo 'trāstu vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.048c: asmān prabādhate vīryād vadhas tasya vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:084.050a: apatyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ pravīraṃ janaya prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:084.050c: yad bhayaṃ no 'surāt tasmān nāśayed dhavyavāhana
GE07mbh_13_u:084.051a: śaptānāṃ no mahādevyā nānyad asti parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:084.051c: anyatra bhavato vīryaṃ tasmāt trāyasva nas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.052a: ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā bhagavān havyakavyabhuk
GE07mbh_13_u:084.053a: tayā cāpy abhavan miśro garbhaś cāsyābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.053c: vavṛdhe sa tadā garbhaḥ kakṣe kṛṣṇagatir yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.054c: saṃtāpam agamat tīvraṃ sā soḍhuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.055c: gaṅgāyām asuraḥ kaś cid bhairavaṃ nādam utsṛjat
GE07mbh_13_u:084.057a: sā tu tejaḥparītāṅgī kampamānā ca jāhnavī
GE07mbh_13_u:084.057e: na te śaktāsmi bhagavaṃs tejaso 'sya vidhāraṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:084.058c: vihvalā cāsmi bhagavaṃs tejo naṣṭaṃ ca me 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.059a: dhāraṇe nāsya śaktāhaṃ garbhasya tapatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:084.059c: utsrakṣye 'ham imaṃ duḥkhān na tu kāmāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:084.060a: na cetaso 'sti saṃsparśo mama deva vibhāvaso
GE07mbh_13_u:084.061a: yad atra guṇasaṃpannam itaraṃ vā hutāśana
GE07mbh_13_u:084.061c: tvayy eva tad ahaṃ manye dharmādharmau ca kevalau
GE07mbh_13_u:084.062a: tām uvāca tato vahnir dhāryatāṃ dhāryatām ayam
GE07mbh_13_u:084.063a: śaktā hy asi mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ voḍhuṃ dhārayituṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.063c: na hi te kiṃ cid aprāpyaṃ madretodhāraṇād ṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:084.064a: sā vahninā vāryamāṇā devaiś cāpi saridvarā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.064c: samutsasarja taṃ garbhaṃ merau girivare tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.065c: nāśakat taṃ tadā garbhaṃ saṃdhārayitum ojasā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.066c: darśayām āsa cāgnis tāṃ tadā gaṅgāṃ bhṛgūdvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:084.066e: papraccha saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ kaccid garbhaḥ sukhodayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.067a: kīdṛgvarṇo 'pi vā devi kīdṛgrūpaś ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:084.067c: tejasā kena vā yuktaḥ sarvam etad bravīhi me gaṅgovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:084.068a: jātarūpaḥ sa garbho vai tejasā tvam ivānala
GE07mbh_13_u:084.069c: gandho 'sya sa kadambānāṃ tulyo vai tapatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:084.070c: yad dravyaṃ parisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.071a: paryadhāvata śailāṃś ca nadīḥ prasravaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:084.072a: evaṃrūpaḥ sa bhagavān putras te havyavāhana
GE07mbh_13_u:084.072e: evam uktvā tu sā devī tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_13_u:084.073a: pāvakaś cāpi tejasvī kṛtvā kāryaṃ divaukasām
GE07mbh_13_u:084.074c: hiraṇyaretā iti vai ṛṣibhir vibudhais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:084.074e: pṛthivī ca tadā devī khyātā vasumatīti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:084.075a: sa tu garbho mahātejā gāṅgeyaḥ pāvakodbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.076c: jātasnehāś ca taṃ bālaṃ pupuṣuḥ stanyavisravaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.078c: tatra jāmbūnadaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ devānām api bhūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:084.079c: yat suvarṇaṃ sa bhagavān agnir īśaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:084.081c: pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.001a: api cedaṃ purā rāma śrutaṃ me brahmadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.002a: devasya mahatas tāta vāruṇīṃ bibhratas tanum
GE07mbh_13_u:085.002c: aiśvarye vāruṇe rāma rudrasyeśasya vai prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:085.003c: yajñāṅgāni ca sarvāṇi vaṣaṭkāraś ca mūrtimān
GE07mbh_13_u:085.004a: mūrtimanti ca sāmāni yajūṃṣi ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.004d-0394_01: ṛgvedaś cāgamat tatra sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006a: vedāś ca sopaniṣado vidyā sāvitry athāpi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006c: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dadhāra bhagavāñ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006e: juhvac cātmany athātmānaṃ svayam eva tadā prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006f-0395_01: yajñaṃ ca śobhayām āsa bahurūpaṃ pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006f-0395_02: dyaur nabhaḥ pṛthivī khaṃ ca tathā caivaiṣa bhūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006f-0395_04: eṣa brahmā śivo rudro varuṇo 'gniḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006f-0395_06: tasya yajñaḥ paśupates tapaḥ kratava eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006f-0395_07: dīkṣā dīptavratā devī diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.006f-0396_01: dṛṣṭvā devī tu tat skannaṃ retaḥ śūlāstradhāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.007a: devapatnyaś ca kanyāś ca devānāṃ caiva mātaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.008c: svayaṃbhuvas tu tā dṛṣṭvā retaḥ samapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:085.009a: tasya śukrasya niṣpandāt pāṃsūn saṃgṛhya bhūmitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.009c: prāsyat pūṣā karābhyāṃ vai tasminn eva hutāśane
GE07mbh_13_u:085.010c: brahmaṇo juhvatas tatra prādurbhāvo babhūva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:085.011a: skannamātraṃ ca tac chukraṃ sruveṇa pratigṛhya saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.012a: tataḥ saṃjanayām āsa bhūtagrāmaṃ sa vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:085.012c: tatas tu tejasas tasmāj jajñe lokeṣu taijasam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.013a: tamasas tāmasā bhāvā vyāpi sattvaṃ tathobhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.013c: saguṇas tejaso nityaṃ tamasy ākāśam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:085.014a: sarvabhūteṣv atha tathā sattvaṃ tejas tathā tamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.014c: śukre hute 'gnau tasmiṃs tu prādurāsaṃs trayaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:085.015a: puruṣā vapuṣā yuktā yuktāḥ prasavajair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.015c: bhṛg ity eva bhṛguḥ pūrvam aṅgārebhyo 'ṅgirābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:085.016c: saha jvālābhir utpanno bhṛgus tasmād bhṛguḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.017a: marīcibhyo marīcis tu mārīcaḥ kaśyapo hy abhūt
GE07mbh_13_u:085.017e: atraivātreti ca vibho jātam atriṃ vadanty api
GE07mbh_13_u:085.019a: śeṣāḥ prajānāṃ patayaḥ srotobhyas tasya jajñire
GE07mbh_13_u:085.020a: etasmāt kāraṇād āhur agniṃ sarvās tu devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.021a: yāni dārūṇi te māsā niryāsāḥ pakṣasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.021c: ahorātrā muhūrtās tu pittaṃ jyotiś ca vāruṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.022a: raudraṃ lohitam ity āhur lohitāt kanakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.022c: tan maitram iti vijñeyaṃ dhūmāc ca vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.023a: arciṣo yāś ca te rudrās tathādityā mahāprabhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.023c: uddiṣṭās te tathāṅgārā ye dhiṣṇyeṣu divi sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.024a: ādināthaś ca lokasya tat paraṃ brahma tad dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.024c: sarvakāmadam ity āhus tatra havyam udāvahat
GE07mbh_13_u:085.025c: mama satram idaṃ divyam ahaṃ gṛhapatis tv iha
GE07mbh_13_u:085.026a: trīṇi pūrvāṇy apatyāni mama tāni na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.026c: iti jānīta khagamā mama yajñaphalaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:085.027c: mamaiva tāny apatyāni varuṇo hy avaśātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.028c: mamaiva tāny apatyāni mama śukraṃ hutaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:085.029a: ahaṃ vaktā ca mantrasya hotā śukrasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:085.029c: yasya bījaṃ phalaṃ tasya śukraṃ cet kāraṇaṃ matam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.031a: vayaṃ ca bhagavan sarve jagac ca sacarācaram
GE07mbh_13_u:085.031c: tavaiva prasavāḥ sarve tasmād agnir vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.031e: varuṇaś ceśvaro devo labhatāṃ kāmam īpsitam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.032a: nisargād varuṇaś cāpi brahmaṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.032c: jagrāha vai bhṛguṃ pūrvam apatyaṃ sūryavarcasam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.033c: pitāmahas tv apatyaṃ vai kaviṃ jagrāha tattvavit
GE07mbh_13_u:085.034a: tadā sa vāruṇaḥ khyāto bhṛguḥ prasavakarmakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:085.034c: āgneyas tv aṅgirāḥ śrīmān kavir brāhmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.035a: ete vipravarāḥ sarve prajānāṃ patayas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.035c: sarvaṃ saṃtānam eteṣām idam ity upadhāraya
GE07mbh_13_u:085.036a: bhṛgos tu putrās tatrāsan sapta tulyā bhṛgor guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.036c: cyavano vajraśīrṣaś ca śucir aurvas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:085.037a: śukro vareṇyaś ca vibhuḥ savanaś ceti sapta te
GE07mbh_13_u:085.037c: bhārgavā vāruṇāḥ sarve yeṣāṃ vaṃśe bhavān api
GE07mbh_13_u:085.038a: aṣṭau cāṅgirasaḥ putrā vāruṇās te 'py udāhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.038c: bṛhaspatir utathyaś ca vayasyaḥ śāntir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:085.039a: ghoro virūpaḥ saṃvartaḥ sudhanvā cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.040a: brāhmaṇasya kaveḥ putrā vāruṇās te 'py udāhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.040c: aṣṭau prasavajair yuktā guṇair brahmavidaḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.041a: kaviḥ kāvyaś ca viṣṇuś ca buddhimān uśanās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:085.041c: bhṛguś ca virajāś caiva kāśī cograś ca dharmavit
GE07mbh_13_u:085.042a: aṣṭau kavisutā hy ete sarvam ebhir jagat tatam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.042c: prajāpataya ete hi prajānāṃ yair imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.043a: evam aṅgirasaś caiva kaveś ca prasavānvayaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.043c: bhṛgoś ca bhṛguśārdūla vaṃśajaiḥ satataṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:085.044a: varuṇaś cādito vipra jagrāha prabhur īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.044c: kaviṃ tāta bhṛguṃ caiva tasmāt tau vāruṇau smṛtau
GE07mbh_13_u:085.045c: tasmād aṅgiraso jñeyāḥ sarva eva tadanvayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.049c: āpnuvanti tapaś caiva brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:085.049d-0397_01: anantaṃ brahma satyaṃ ca tapaś ca paramaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:085.050a: sarve hi vayam ete ca tavaiva prasavaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:085.050c: devānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tvaṃ hi kartā pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:085.051a: marīcim āditaḥ kṛtvā sarve caivātha bhārgavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.052a: te tv anenaiva rūpeṇa prajaniṣyanti vai prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.052d-0398_01: ity uktaḥ sa tadā tais tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.052d-0398_02: tathety evābravīt prītas te 'pi jagmur yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.053a: evam etat purā vṛttaṃ tasya yajñe mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.054a: agnir brahmā paśupatiḥ śarvo rudraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.054c: agner apatyam etad vai suvarṇam iti dhāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:085.056a: kuśastambe juhoty agniṃ suvarṇaṃ tatra saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.056b-0399_01: valmīkasya vapāyāṃ ca karṇe vājasya dakṣiṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:085.056c: hute prītikarīm ṛddhiṃ bhagavāṃs tatra manyate
GE07mbh_13_u:085.057a: tasmād agniparāḥ sarvā devatā iti śuśruma
GE07mbh_13_u:085.057c: brahmaṇo hi prasūto 'gnir agner api ca kāñcanam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.058a: tasmād ye vai prayacchanti suvarṇaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.058b-0400_01: suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti narāḥ śuddhena cetasā
GE07mbh_13_u:085.058c: devatās te prayacchanti samastā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.059a: tasya cātamaso lokā gacchataḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:085.060c: dadāti kāñcanaṃ yo vai duḥsvapnaṃ pratihanti saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.061a: dadāty uditamātre yas tasya pāpmā vidhūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:085.061c: madhyāhne dadato rukmaṃ hanti pāpam anāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.062a: dadāti paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ yaḥ suvarṇaṃ dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:085.063a: sendreṣu caiva lokeṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ prāpnute śubhām
GE07mbh_13_u:085.063c: iha loke yaśaḥ prāpya śāntapāpmā pramodate
GE07mbh_13_u:085.065a: na ca kṣarati tebhyaḥ sa śaśvac caivāpnute mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:085.065c: suvarṇam akṣayaṃ dattvā lokān āpnoti puṣkalān
GE07mbh_13_u:085.066c: dadyād vai vratam uddiśya sarvān kāmān samaśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:085.067a: agnir ity eva tat prāhuḥ pradānaṃ vai sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_13_u:085.067d-0401_02: kārttikeyasya ca vibho tad viddhi bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_13_u:085.067d-0401_03: kārttikeyas tu saṃvṛddhaḥ kālena mahatā tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:085.067d-0401_05: jaghāna tārakaṃ cāpi daityam anyāṃs tathāsurān
GE07mbh_13_u:085.067d-0401_07: suvarṇadāne ca mayā kathitās te guṇā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:085.067d-0401_08: tasmāt suvarṇaṃ viprebhyaḥ prayaccha dadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:085.068a: ity uktaḥ sa vasiṣṭhena jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:085.068c: dadau suvarṇaṃ viprebhyo vyamucyata ca kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_13_u:085.069a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ suvarṇasya mahīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:085.069c: pradānasya phalaṃ caiva janma cāgnyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:085.070a: tasmāt tvam api viprebhyaḥ prayaccha kanakaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_13_u:085.070d-0402_02: janma te kathitaṃ puṇyaṃ pradānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:085.070d-0402_03: iti rāmam uvācedaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.002a: yat tu kāraṇam utpatteḥ suvarṇasyeha kīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:086.002c: sa kathaṃ tārakaḥ prāpto nidhanaṃ tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:086.003a: uktaḥ sa devatānāṃ hi avadhya iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:086.003c: na ca tasyeha te mṛtyur vistareṇa prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.004a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tvattaḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_13_u:086.004c: kārtsnyena tārakavadhaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:086.006a: na devatānāṃ kā cid dhi samarthā jātavedasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.006c: ekāpi śaktā taṃ garbhaṃ saṃdhārayitum ojasā
GE07mbh_13_u:086.007a: ṣaṇṇāṃ tāsāṃ tataḥ prītaḥ pāvako garbhadhāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:086.008a: tās tu ṣaṭ kṛttikā garbhaṃ pupuṣur jātavedasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.008c: ṣaṭsu vartmasu tejo 'gneḥ sakalaṃ nihitaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:086.009c: tejasābhiparītāṅgyo na kva cic charma lebhire
GE07mbh_13_u:086.010c: samaṃ garbhaṃ suṣuvire kṛttikās tā nararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:086.011a: tatas taṃ ṣaḍadhiṣṭhānaṃ garbham ekatvam āgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:086.013a: dadṛśuḥ kṛttikās taṃ tu bālaṃ vahnisamadyutim
GE07mbh_13_u:086.015a: tato devās trayastriṃśad diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.015c: rudro dhātā ca viṣṇuś ca yajñaḥ pūṣāryamā bhagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.016a: aṃśo mitraś ca sādhyāś ca vasavo vāsavo 'śvinau
GE07mbh_13_u:086.016c: āpo vāyur nabhaś candro nakṣatrāṇi grahā raviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.017a: pṛthag bhūtāni cānyāni yāni devārpaṇāni vai
GE07mbh_13_u:086.017c: ājagmus tatra taṃ draṣṭuṃ kumāraṃ jvalanātmajam
GE07mbh_13_u:086.017e: ṛṣayas tuṣṭuvuś caiva gandharvāś ca jagus tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:086.019c: lebhire paramaṃ harṣaṃ menire cāsuraṃ hatam
GE07mbh_13_u:086.020a: tato devāḥ priyāṇy asya sarva eva samācaran
GE07mbh_13_u:086.020c: krīḍataḥ krīḍanīyāni daduḥ pakṣigaṇāṃś ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:086.021c: rākṣasāś ca dadus tasmai varāhamahiṣāv ubhau
GE07mbh_13_u:086.022c: candramāḥ pradadau meṣam ādityo rucirāṃ prabhām
GE07mbh_13_u:086.023a: gavāṃ mātā ca gā devī dadau śatasahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.023c: chāgam agnir guṇopetam ilā puṣpaphalaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_13_u:086.024c: varuṇo vāruṇān divyān bhujaṃgān pradadau śubhān
GE07mbh_13_u:086.024e: siṃhān surendro vyāghrāṃś ca dvīpino 'nyāṃś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.025a: śvāpadāṃś ca bahūn ghorāṃś chatrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:086.025d-0403_01: tasmai pradadur agryāṇi vāhanāni dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:086.026a: vardhamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā prārthayām āsa tārakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.026c: upāyair bahubhir hantuṃ nāśakac cāpi taṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_13_u:086.029c: surendraḥ sthāpito rājye devānāṃ punar īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.030a: sa senāpatir evātha babhau skandaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:086.030c: īśo goptā ca devānāṃ priyakṛc chaṃkarasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:086.031a: hiraṇyamūrtir bhagavān eṣa eva ca pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:086.032a: tasmāt suvarṇaṃ maṅgalyaṃ ratnam akṣayyam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:086.032c: sahajaṃ kārttikeyasya vahnes tejaḥ paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_13_u:086.034a: rāmaḥ suvarṇaṃ dattvā hi vimuktaḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:087.001c: tathaiva me śrāddhavidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ prabrūhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:087.004c: piśācakiṃnarāṇāṃ ca pūjyā vai pitaraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:087.005a: pitṝn pūjyāditaḥ paścād devān saṃtarpayanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:087.007a: sarveṣv ahaḥsu prīyante kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaiḥ pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:087.007b-0404_03: piṇḍānāṃ māsikaṃ śrāddham anvāhāryaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:087.007c: pravakṣyāmi tu te sarvāṃs tithyāṃ tithyāṃ guṇāguṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:087.008a: yeṣv ahaḥsu kṛtaiḥ śrāddhair yat phalaṃ prāpyate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:087.008c: tat sarvaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi yathāvat tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:087.009a: pitṝn arcya pratipadi prāpnuyāt svagṛhe striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:087.010a: striyo dvitīyāṃ jāyante tṛtīyāyāṃ tu vandinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:087.011a: pañcamyāṃ bahavaḥ putrā jāyante kurvatāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:087.011c: kurvāṇās tu narāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhavanti dyutibhāginaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:087.012a: kṛṣibhāgī bhavec chrāddhaṃ kurvāṇaḥ saptamīṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:087.012c: aṣṭamyāṃ tu prakurvāṇo vāṇijye lābham āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:087.013a: navamyāṃ kurvataḥ śrāddhaṃ bhavaty ekaśaphaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_13_u:087.013c: vivardhante tu daśamīṃ gāvaḥ śrāddhāni kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:087.014a: kupyabhāgī bhaven martyaḥ kurvann ekādaśīṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:087.015c: rajataṃ bahu citraṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca manoramam
GE07mbh_13_u:087.016a: jñātīnāṃ tu bhavec chreṣṭhaḥ kurvañ śrāddhaṃ trayodaśīm
GE07mbh_13_u:087.016c: avaśyaṃ tu yuvāno 'sya pramīyante narā gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:087.017a: yuddhabhāgī bhaven martyaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurvaṃś caturdaśīm
GE07mbh_13_u:087.017c: amāvāsyāṃ tu nivapan sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:087.018c: śrāddhakarmaṇi tithyaḥ syuḥ praśastā na tathetarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:088.001a: kiṃ svid dattaṃ pitṛbhyo vai bhavaty akṣayam īśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:088.001c: kiṃ haviś cirarātrāya kim ānantyāya kalpate
GE07mbh_13_u:088.002a: havīṃṣi śrāddhakalpe tu yāni śrāddhavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:088.002c: tāni me śṛṇu kāmyāni phalaṃ caiṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:088.003a: tilair vrīhiyavair māṣair adbhir mūlaphalais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:088.003c: dattena māsaṃ prīyante śrāddhena pitaro nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:088.004c: sarveṣv eva tu bhojyeṣu tilāḥ prādhānyataḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:088.005a: dvau māsau tu bhavet tṛptir matsyaiḥ pitṛgaṇasya ha
GE07mbh_13_u:088.005c: trīn māsān āvikenāhuś cāturmāsyaṃ śaśena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:088.006a: ājena māsān prīyante pañcaiva pitaro nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:088.006c: vārāheṇa tu ṣaṇmāsān sapta vai śākunena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:088.007a: māsān aṣṭau pārṣatena rauraveṇa navaiva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:088.007c: gavayasya tu māṃsena tṛptiḥ syād daśamāsikī
GE07mbh_13_u:088.008a: māsān ekādaśa prītiḥ pitṝṇāṃ māhiṣeṇa tu
GE07mbh_13_u:088.008c: gavyena datte śrāddhe tu saṃvatsaram ihocyate
GE07mbh_13_u:088.009a: yathā gavyaṃ tathā yuktaṃ pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:088.010c: kālaśākaṃ ca lauhaṃ cāpy ānantyaṃ chāga ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:088.011a: gāthāś cāpy atra gāyanti pitṛgītā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:088.012a: api naḥ sa kule jāyād yo no dadyāt trayodaśīm
GE07mbh_13_u:088.013a: ājena vāpi lauhena maghāsv eva yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:088.014a: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yady eko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:088.014b-0406_01: yajed vā aśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_13_u:088.015a: āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ māṃsam annaṃ vāpi pitṛkṣaye
GE07mbh_13_u:088.015c: yat kiṃ cin madhusaṃmiśraṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate
GE07mbh_13_u:089.001a: yamas tu yāni śrāddhāni provāca śaśabindave
GE07mbh_13_u:089.001c: tāni me śṛṇu kāmyāni nakṣatreṣu pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_13_u:089.002a: śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kṛttikāyoge kurvīta satataṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:089.003c: krūrakarmā dadac chrāddham ārdrāyāṃ mānavo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:089.004a: kṛṣibhāgī bhaven martyaḥ kurvañ śrāddhaṃ punarvasau
GE07mbh_13_u:089.005a: āśleṣāyāṃ dadac chrāddhaṃ vīrān putrān prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:089.005c: jñātīnāṃ tu bhavec chreṣṭho maghāsu śrāddham āvapan
GE07mbh_13_u:089.006a: phalgunīṣu dadac chrāddhaṃ subhagaḥ śrāddhado bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:089.007a: citrāyāṃ tu dadac chrāddhaṃ labhed rūpavataḥ sutān
GE07mbh_13_u:089.007b-0407_01: phalgunīṣu dadac chrāddhaṃ labhed rūpavataḥ sutān
GE07mbh_13_u:089.007b-0407_03: haste caiva dadac chrāddhaṃ sukham atyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:089.007b-0407_04: citrāsu ca dadac chrāddhaṃ nānāphalam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:089.008a: bahuputro viśākhāsu pitryam īhan bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:089.010a: mūle tv ārogyam arccheta yaśo 'ṣāḍhāsv anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:089.010c: uttarāsu tv aṣāḍhāsu vītaśokaś caren mahīm
GE07mbh_13_u:089.011a: śrāddhaṃ tv abhijitā kurvan vidyāṃ śreṣṭhām avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:089.011c: śravaṇe tu dadac chrāddhaṃ pretya gacchet parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:089.013c: uttarāsv atha kurvāṇo vindate gāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:089.014c: aśvāṃś cāśvayuje vetti bharaṇīṣv āyur uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:090.001c: dvijebhyaḥ kuruśārdūla tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:090.002c: daive karmaṇi pitrye tu nyāyyam āhuḥ parīkṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:090.003c: upetya tasmād devebhyaḥ sarvebhyo dāpayen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.004a: śrāddhe tv atha mahārāja parīkṣed brāhmaṇān budhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.005c: apāṅkteyās tu ye rājan kīrtayiṣyāmi tāñ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:090.008a: pitrā vivadamānaś ca yasya copapatir gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:090.008c: abhiśastas tathā stenaḥ śilpaṃ yaś copajīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:090.009a: parvakāraś ca sūcī ca mitradhruk pāradārikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010a: śvabhir yaś ca parikrāmed yaḥ śunā daṣṭa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010c: parivittiś ca yaś ca syād duścarmā gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010e: kuśīlavo devalako nakṣatrair yaś ca jīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_02: rakṣāṃsi gacchate havyam ity āhur brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_03: śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tv adhīyīta vṛṣalītalpagaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_04: purīṣe tasya taṃ māsaṃ pitaras tasya śerate
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_06: naṣṭaṃ devalake dattam apratiṣṭhaṃ ca vārdhuṣe
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_07: yat tu vāṇijake dattaṃ neha nāmutra tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_08: bhasmanīva hutaṃ havyaṃ tathā paunarbhave dvije
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_10: havyaṃ kavyaṃ prayacchanti teṣāṃ tat pretya naśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_11: jñānapūrvaṃ tu ye tebhyaḥ prayacchanty alpabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.010f-0409_12: purīṣaṃ bhuñjate tasya pitaraḥ pretya niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.011c: śūdrāṇām upadeśaṃ ca ye kurvanty alpacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.012a: ṣaṣṭiṃ kāṇaḥ śataṃ ṣaṇḍhaḥ śvitrī yāvat prapaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:090.013a: yad veṣṭitaśirā bhuṅkte yad bhuṅkte dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.013c: sopānatkaś ca yad bhuṅkte sarvaṃ vidyāt tad āsuram
GE07mbh_13_u:090.014a: asūyatā ca yad dattaṃ yac ca śraddhāvivarjitam
GE07mbh_13_u:090.014c: sarvaṃ tad asurendrāya brahmā bhāgam akalpayat
GE07mbh_13_u:090.015a: śvānaś ca paṅktidūṣāś ca nāvekṣeran kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:090.016a: tilādāne ca kravyādā ye ca krodhavaśā gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.016b-0410_01: tilair virahitaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ krodhavaśena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:090.016c: yātudhānāḥ piśācāś ca vipralumpanti tad dhaviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.017a: yāvad dhy apaṅktyaḥ paṅktyāṃ vai bhuñjānān anupaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:090.017c: tāvat phalād bhraṃśayati dātāraṃ tasya bāliśam
GE07mbh_13_u:090.018c: ye tv atas tān pravakṣyāmi parīkṣasveha tān dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:090.019c: pāṅkteyān yāṃs tu vakṣyāmi jñeyās te paṅktipāvanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.021a: mātāpitror yaś ca vaśyaḥ śrotriyo daśapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.024c: sarvabhūtahitā ye ca śrāddheṣv etān nimantrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:090.024e: eteṣu dattam akṣayyam ete vai paṅktipāvanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.026c: ye ca bhāṣyavidaḥ ke cid ye ca vyākaraṇe ratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.027a: adhīyate purāṇaṃ ye dharmaśāstrāṇy athāpi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:090.027c: adhītya ca yathānyāyaṃ vidhivat tasya kāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.029a: yāvad ete prapaśyanti paṅktyās tāvat punanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:090.029c: tato hi pāvanāt paṅktyāḥ paṅktipāvana ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:090.030a: krośād ardhatṛtīyāt tu pāvayed eka eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:090.031a: anṛtvig anupādhyāyaḥ sa ced agrāsanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:090.032a: atha ced vedavit sarvaiḥ paṅktidoṣair vivarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.032c: na ca syāt patito rājan paṅktipāvana eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.034a: yasya mitrapradhānāni śrāddhāni ca havīṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:090.034c: na prīṇāti pitṝn devān svargaṃ ca na sa gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:090.035a: yaś ca śrāddhe kurute saṃgatāni; na devayānena pathā sa yāti
GE07mbh_13_u:090.035c: sa vai muktaḥ pippalaṃ bandhanād vā; svargāl lokāc cyavate śrāddhamitraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.036a: tasmān mitraṃ śrāddhakṛn nādriyeta; dadyān mitrebhyaḥ saṃgrahārthaṃ dhanāni
GE07mbh_13_u:090.036c: yaṃ manyate naiva śatruṃ na mitraṃ; taṃ madhyasthaṃ bhojayed dhavyakavye
GE07mbh_13_u:090.037a: yathoṣare bījam uptaṃ na rohen; na cāsyoptā prāpnuyād bījabhāgam
GE07mbh_13_u:090.037c: evaṃ śrāddhaṃ bhuktam anarhamāṇair; na ceha nāmutra phalaṃ dadāti
GE07mbh_13_u:090.038a: brāhmaṇo hy anadhīyānas tṛṇāgnir iva śāmyati
GE07mbh_13_u:090.038c: tasmai śrāddhaṃ na dātavyaṃ na hi bhasmani hūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:090.039a: saṃbhojanī nāma piśācadakṣiṇā; sā naiva devān na pitṝn upaiti
GE07mbh_13_u:090.039c: ihaiva sā bhrāmyati kṣīṇapuṇyā; śālāntare gaur iva naṣṭavatsā
GE07mbh_13_u:090.040a: yathāgnau śānte ghṛtam ājuhoti; tan naiva devān na pitṝn upaiti
GE07mbh_13_u:090.040c: tathā dattaṃ nartane gāyane ca; yāṃ cānṛce dakṣiṇām āvṛṇoti
GE07mbh_13_u:090.041a: ubhau hinasti na bhunakti caiṣā; yā cānṛce dakṣiṇā dīyate vai
GE07mbh_13_u:090.041c: āghātanī garhitaiṣā patantī; teṣāṃ pretān pātayed devayānāt
GE07mbh_13_u:090.042a: ṛṣīṇāṃ samayaṃ nityaṃ ye caranti yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:090.042c: niścitāḥ sarvadharmajñās tān devā brāhmaṇān viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.043c: taponiṣṭhāś ca boddhavyāḥ karmaniṣṭhāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:090.044c: tatra ye brāhmaṇāḥ ke cin na nindati hi te varāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:090.045a: ye tu nindanti jalpeṣu na tāñ śrāddheṣu bhojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:090.045c: brāhmaṇā ninditā rājan hanyus tripuruṣaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_13_u:090.046e: priyān vā yadi vā dveṣyāṃs teṣu tac chrāddham āvapet
GE07mbh_13_u:090.047a: yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ bhojayed anṛcāṃ naraḥ
