GE07mbh_13_u:095.006c: alasaḥ kṣutparo mūrkhas tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.007a: naitasyeha yathāsmākaṃ bhaktam indhanam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.007c: saṃcintya vārṣikaṃ kiṃ cit tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.008c: dehi dehīti bhikṣanti tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.010c: ekaikaṃ vai trivārṣīyaṃ tena pīvāñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.011a: atha dṛṣṭvā parivrāṭ sa tān maharṣīñ śunaḥsakhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.013c: ādadānāḥ samuddhṛtya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.014a: kadā cid vicarantas te vṛkṣair aviralair vṛtām
GE07mbh_13_u:095.019a: tatas te yātudhānīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtadarśanām
GE07mbh_13_u:095.020a: ekā tiṣṭhasi kā nu tvaṃ kasyārthe kiṃ prayojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:095.020c: padminītīram āśritya brūhi tvaṃ kiṃ cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_13_u:095.021a: yāsmi sāsmy anuyogo me na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:095.021c: ārakṣiṇīṃ māṃ padminyā vitta sarve tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.022a: sarva eva kṣudhārtāḥ sma na cānyat kiṃ cid asti naḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.022c: bhavatyāḥ saṃmate sarve gṛhṇīmahi bisāny uta
GE07mbh_13_u:095.023c: ekaiko nāma me proktvā tato gṛhṇīta māciram
GE07mbh_13_u:095.025a: arātrir atreḥ sā rātrir yāṃ nādhīte trir adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:095.025c: arātrir atrir ity eva nāma me viddhi śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:095.026a: yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:095.027a: vasiṣṭho 'smi variṣṭho 'smi vase vāsaṃ gṛheṣv api
GE07mbh_13_u:095.027c: variṣṭhatvāc ca vāsāc ca vasiṣṭha iti viddhi mām
GE07mbh_13_u:095.029a: kulaṃ kulaṃ ca kupapaḥ kupayaḥ kaśyapo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.029c: kāśyaḥ kāśanikāśatvād etan me nāma dhāraya
GE07mbh_13_u:095.030a: yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:095.031a: bhare sutān bhare śiṣyān bhare devān bhare dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:095.033a: godamo damago 'dhūmo damo durdarśanaś ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:095.033b-0431_01: gobhis tamo mama dhvastaṃ jātamātrasya dehataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.033c: viddhi māṃ gautamaṃ kṛtye yātudhāni nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:095.034a: yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:095.035a: viśvedevāś ca me mitraṃ mitram asmi gavāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.035c: viśvāmitram iti khyātaṃ yātudhāni nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:095.037c: jamadagnir iti khyātam ato māṃ viddhi śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:095.038a: yathodāhṛtam etat te mayi nāma mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:095.039a: dharāṃ dharitrīṃ vasudhāṃ bhartus tiṣṭhāmy anantaram
GE07mbh_13_u:095.039c: mano 'nurundhatī bhartur iti māṃ viddhy arundhatīm
GE07mbh_13_u:095.040c: naitad dhārayituṃ śakyaṃ gacchāvatara padminīm gaṇḍovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.043a: sakhā sakhe yaḥ sakhyeyaḥ paśūnāṃ ca sakhā sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.043c: gauṇaṃ paśusakhety evaṃ viddhi mām agnisaṃbhave
GE07mbh_13_u:095.045a: ebhir uktaṃ yathā nāma nāhaṃ vaktum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:095.046a: nāma te 'vyaktam uktaṃ vai vākyaṃ saṃdigdhayā girā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.046c: tasmāt sakṛd idānīṃ tvaṃ brūhi yan nāma te dvija
GE07mbh_13_u:095.047a: sakṛd uktaṃ mayā nāma na gṛhītaṃ yadā tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.048a: sā brahmadaṇḍakalpena tena mūrdhni hatā tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.048c: kṛtyā papāta medinyāṃ bhasmasāc ca jagāma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:095.049a: śunaḥsakhaś ca hatvā tāṃ yātudhānīṃ mahābalām
GE07mbh_13_u:095.050a: tatas te munayaḥ sarve puṣkarāṇi bisāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.051a: śrameṇa mahatā yuktās te bisāni kalāpaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.051c: tīre nikṣipya padminyās tarpaṇaṃ cakrur ambhasā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.052a: athotthāya jalāt tasmāt sarve te vai samāgaman
GE07mbh_13_u:095.052c: nāpaśyaṃś cāpi te tāni bisāni puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:095.054a: te śaṅkamānās tv anyonyaṃ papracchur dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.054c: ta ūcuḥ śapathaṃ sarve kurma ity arikarśana
GE07mbh_13_u:095.055a: ta uktvā bāḍham ity eva sarva eva śunaḥsakham
GE07mbh_13_u:095.056a: sa gāṃ spṛśatu pādena sūryaṃ ca pratimehatu
GE07mbh_13_u:095.058c: arthān kāṅkṣatu kīnāśād bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.059a: sarvatra sarvaṃ paṇatu nyāsalopaṃ karotu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.060c: yātu striyaṃ divā caiva bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.061a: nṛśaṃsas tyaktadharmāstu strīṣu jñātiṣu goṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.061c: brāhmaṇaṃ cāpi jayatāṃ bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.062a: upādhyāyam adhaḥ kṛtvā ṛco 'dhyetu yajūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.062c: juhotu ca sa kakṣāgnau bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.063a: purīṣam utsṛjatv apsu hantu gāṃ cāpi dohinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:095.063c: anṛtau maithunaṃ yātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.064a: dveṣyo bhāryopajīvī syād dūrabandhuś ca vairavān
GE07mbh_13_u:095.065a: adhītya vedāṃs tyajatu trīn agnīn apavidhyatu
GE07mbh_13_u:095.065c: vikrīṇātu tathā somaṃ bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.066c: tasya sālokyatāṃ yātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.066d-0433_02: yātu pāpīyasāṃ lokaṃ bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.067a: jīvato vai gurūn bhṛtyān bharantv asya pare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.067c: agatir bahuputraḥ syād bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.068c: karṣako matsarī cāstu bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.069a: varṣān karotu bhṛtako rājñaś cāstu purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.069c: ayājyasya bhaved ṛtvig bisastainyaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.070a: nityaṃ parivadec chvaśrūṃ bhartur bhavatu durmanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.070b-0434_01: śvaśrvā vivādaṃ vadatu bhartṛhīnā ca jīvatu
GE07mbh_13_u:095.070c: ekā svādu samaśnātu bisastainyaṃ karoti yā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.071c: abhāgyāvīrasūr astu bisastainyaṃ karoti yā gaṇḍovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:095.072a: anṛtaṃ bhāṣatu sadā sādhubhiś ca virudhyatu
GE07mbh_13_u:095.072c: dadātu kanyāṃ śulkena bisastainyaṃ karoti yā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.073a: sādhayitvā svayaṃ prāśed dāsye jīvatu caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:095.075a: adhvaryave duhitaraṃ dadātu; cchandoge vā caritabrahmacarye
GE07mbh_13_u:095.075c: ātharvaṇaṃ vedam adhītya vipraḥ; snāyīta yo vai harate bisāni
GE07mbh_13_u:095.076a: iṣṭam etad dvijātīnāṃ yo 'yaṃ te śapathaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.076c: tvayā kṛtaṃ bisastainyaṃ sarveṣāṃ naḥ śunaḥsakha
GE07mbh_13_u:095.077a: nyastam ādyam apaśyadbhir yad uktaṃ kṛtakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.077c: satyam etan na mithyaitad bisastainyaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.078e: rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavatām aham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.079a: yātudhānī hy atikruddhā kṛtyaiṣā vo vadhaiṣiṇī
GE07mbh_13_u:095.080a: duṣṭā hiṃsyād iyaṃ pāpā yuṣmān praty agnisaṃbhavā
GE07mbh_13_u:095.080c: tasmād asmy āgato viprā vāsavaṃ māṃ nibodhata
GE07mbh_13_u:095.081a: alobhād akṣayā lokāḥ prāptā vaḥ sārvakāmikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.081c: uttiṣṭhadhvam itaḥ kṣipraṃ tān avāpnuta vai dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.082a: tato maharṣayaḥ prītās tathety uktvā puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_13_u:095.083a: evam ete mahātmāno bhogair bahuvidhair api
GE07mbh_13_u:095.083e: naiva lobhaṃ tadā cakrus tataḥ svargam avāpnuvan
GE07mbh_13_u:095.084a: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu naro lobhaṃ vivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:095.084c: eṣa dharmaḥ paro rājann alobha iti viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:095.085c: sukhabhāgī ca bhavati na ca durgāṇy avāpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:095.086a: prīyante pitaraś cāsya ṛṣayo devatās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:096.001c: yad vṛttaṃ tīrthayātrāyāṃ śapathaṃ prati tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:096.003a: ṛṣayaḥ sametāḥ paścime vai prabhāse; samāgatā mantram amantrayanta
GE07mbh_13_u:096.003c: carāma sarve pṛthivīṃ puṇyatīrthāṃ; tan naḥ kāryaṃ hanta gacchāma sarve
GE07mbh_13_u:096.004a: śukro 'ṅgirāś caiva kaviś ca vidvāṃs; tathāgastyo nāradaparvatau ca
GE07mbh_13_u:096.004c: bhṛgur vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo gautamaś ca; viśvāmitro jamadagniś ca rājan
GE07mbh_13_u:096.005a: ṛṣis tathā gālavo 'thāṣṭakaś ca; bharadvājo 'rundhatī vālakhilyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.005c: śibir dilīpo nahuṣo 'mbarīṣo; rājā yayātir dhundhumāro 'tha pūruḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.006a: jagmuḥ puraskṛtya mahānubhāvaṃ; śatakratuṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_13_u:096.006c: tīrthāni sarvāṇi parikramanto; māghyāṃ yayuḥ kauśikīṃ puṇyatīrthām
GE07mbh_13_u:096.007a: sarveṣu tīrtheṣv atha dhūtapāpā; jagmus tato brahmasaraḥ supuṇyam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.007c: devasya tīrthe jalam agnikalpā; vigāhya te bhuktabisaprasūnāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.008a: ke cid bisāny akhanaṃs tatra rājann; anye mṛṇālāny akhanaṃs tatra viprāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.008c: athāpaśyan puṣkaraṃ te hriyantaṃ; hradād agastyena samuddhṛtaṃ vai
GE07mbh_13_u:096.009a: tān āha sarvān ṛṣimukhyān agastyaḥ; kenādattaṃ puṣkaraṃ me sujātam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.009c: yuṣmāñ śaṅke dīyatāṃ puṣkaraṃ me; na vai bhavanto hartum arhanti padmam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.010a: śṛṇomi kālo hiṃsate dharmavīryaṃ; seyaṃ prāptā vardhate dharmapīḍā
GE07mbh_13_u:096.010c: purādharmo vardhate neha yāvat; tāvad gacchāmi paralokaṃ cirāya
GE07mbh_13_u:096.011a: purā vedān brāhmaṇā grāmamadhye; ghuṣṭasvarā vṛṣalāñ śrāvayanti
GE07mbh_13_u:096.011c: purā rājā vyavahārān adharmyān; paśyaty ahaṃ paralokaṃ vrajāmi
GE07mbh_13_u:096.012a: purāvarān pratyavarān garīyaso; yāvan narā nāvamaṃsyanti sarve
GE07mbh_13_u:096.012c: tamottaraṃ yāvad idaṃ na vartate; tāvad vrajāmi paralokaṃ cirāya
GE07mbh_13_u:096.013a: purā prapaśyāmi pareṇa martyān; balīyasā durbalān bhujyamānān
GE07mbh_13_u:096.013c: tasmād yāsyāmi paralokaṃ cirāya; na hy utsahe draṣṭum īdṛṅ nṛloke
GE07mbh_13_u:096.014a: tam āhur ārtā ṛṣayo maharṣiṃ; na te vayaṃ puṣkaraṃ corayāmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.014c: mithyābhiṣaṅgo bhavatā na kāryaḥ; śapāma tīkṣṇāñ śapathān maharṣe
GE07mbh_13_u:096.015a: te niścitās tatra maharṣayas tu; saṃmanyanto dharmam evaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_13_u:096.015c: tato 'śapañ śapathān paryayeṇa; sahaiva te pārthiva putrapautraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.016c: khādec ca pṛṣṭhamāṃsāni yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.017c: pure ca bhikṣur bhavatu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.018a: sarvatra sarvaṃ paṇatu nyāse lobhaṃ karotu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:096.018c: kūṭasākṣitvam abhyetu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.019a: jīvatv ahaṃkṛto buddhyā vipaṇatv adhamena saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.019c: karṣako matsarī cāstu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.020c: brahmahānikṛtiś cāstu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.021c: ekaḥ saṃpannam aśnātu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.022c: śvaśurāt tasya vṛttiḥ syād yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.023c: tasya lokān sa vrajatu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.024c: preṣyo bhavatu rājñaś ca yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.025a: anadhyāyeṣv adhīyīta mitraṃ śrāddhe ca bhojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:096.025c: śrāddhe śūdrasya cāśnīyād yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.026a: anāhitāgnir mriyatāṃ yajñe vighnaṃ karotu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:096.026c: tapasvibhir virudhyeta yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.027a: anṛtau jaṭī vratinyāṃ vai bhāryāyāṃ saṃprajāyatu
GE07mbh_13_u:096.027c: nirākarotu vedāṃś ca yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.028c: vidyāṃ prayacchatu bhṛto yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.029a: nṛśaṃsas tyaktadharmo 'stu strīṣu jñātiṣu goṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:096.029c: brāhmaṇaṃ cāpi jahatu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.030a: gūḍho 'jñānī bahiḥ śāstraṃ paṭhatāṃ visvaraṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.031a: anṛtaṃ bhāṣatu sadā sadbhiś caiva virudhyatu
GE07mbh_13_u:096.031c: śulkena kanyāṃ dadatu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.032a: padā sa gāṃ tāḍayatu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu
GE07mbh_13_u:096.032c: śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajatu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.033c: ṛtvig astu hy ayājyasya yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.034c: śunaḥ karṣatu vṛttyarthe yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.035c: tat tasyāstu sadā pāpaṃ yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.036a: sa rājāstv akṛtaprajñaḥ kāmavṛttiś ca pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:096.036c: adharmeṇānuśāstūrvīṃ yas te harati puṣkaram śukaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.036d-0435_01: śūdrayonau dvijātis tu reto muñcatu kāmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.036d-0435_02: saṃnyāsī maithunaṃ gacched yas te harati puṣkaram yamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.036d-0435_04: devasatrādhikāryas tu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.037a: pāpiṣṭhebhyas tv anarghārhaḥ sa naro 'stu svapāpakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:096.037c: dattvā dānaṃ kīrtayatu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.038c: ekā svādu samaśnātu yā te harati puṣkaram śunakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.038d-0436_01: vāsudevaṃ parityajya so 'nyaṃ devam upāsatu bharadvājaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.038d-0437_01: sadā vasatu saṃnyāsī grāme vā nagare 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:096.038d-0437_02: bandhubhiḥ saha vāso 'stu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.039c: dharmajñas tyaktadharmo 'stu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.040a: agnihotram anādṛtya sukhaṃ svapatu sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.040c: parivrāṭ kāmavṛtto 'stu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.041c: duhyeta paravatsena yā te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.042a: tatas tu taiḥ śapathaiḥ śapyamānair; nānāvidhair bahubhiḥ kauravendra
GE07mbh_13_u:096.042c: sahasrākṣo devarāṭ saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ; samīkṣya taṃ kopanaṃ vipramukhyam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.043a: athābravīn maghavā pratyayaṃ svaṃ; samābhāṣya tam ṛṣiṃ jātaroṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.043c: brahmarṣidevarṣinṛparṣimadhye; yat tan nibodheha mamādya rājan
GE07mbh_13_u:096.044a: adhvaryave duhitaraṃ dadātu; cchandoge vā caritabrahmacarye
GE07mbh_13_u:096.044c: ātharvaṇaṃ vedam adhītya vipraḥ; snāyīta yaḥ puṣkaram ādadāti
GE07mbh_13_u:096.045c: brahmaṇaḥ sadanaṃ yātu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.045d-0438_02: parāṇāṃ paramaṃ yātu yas te harati puṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:096.046c: dīyatāṃ puṣkaraṃ mahyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.047a: na mayā bhagavaṃl lobhād dhṛtaṃ puṣkaram adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:096.047c: dharmaṃ tu śrotukāmena hṛtaṃ na kroddhum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:096.048c: ārṣo vai śāśvato nityam avyayo 'yaṃ mayā śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.049a: tad idaṃ gṛhyatāṃ vidvan puṣkaraṃ munisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:096.049c: atikramaṃ me bhagavan kṣantum arhasy anindita
GE07mbh_13_u:096.049d-0439_02: vindhyo nivārito yena vātāpiś ca niṣūditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.049d-0439_03: nahuṣaḥ sarpatāṃ nīto bhavatā yad dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:096.049d-0439_04: jijñāsamānena mayā kṛtaṃ tat kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:096.050a: ity uktaḥ sa mahendreṇa tapasvī kopano bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.050c: jagrāha puṣkaraṃ dhīmān prasannaś cābhavan muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.051a: prayayus te tato bhūyas tīrthāni vanagocarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.051c: puṇyatīrtheṣu ca tathā gātrāṇy āplāvayanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:096.052a: ākhyānaṃ ya idaṃ yuktaḥ paṭhet parvaṇi parvaṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:096.052c: na mūrkhaṃ janayet putraṃ na bhavec ca nirākṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:096.053a: na tam āpat spṛśet kā cin na jvaro na rujaś ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:096.053c: virajāḥ śreyasā yuktaḥ pretya svargam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:096.054a: yaś ca śāstram anudhyāyed ṛṣibhiḥ paripālitam
GE07mbh_13_u:096.054c: sa gacched brahmaṇo lokam avyayaṃ ca narottama
GE07mbh_13_u:097.001e: kathaṃ caitat samutpannaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pradīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:097.002a: na kevalaṃ śrāddhadharme puṇyakeṣv api dīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:097.002b-0441_01: bahuṣv api nimitteṣu puṇyam āśritya dīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:097.002c: etad vistarato rājañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:097.003c: yathaitat prathitaṃ loke yena caitat pravartitam
GE07mbh_13_u:097.004a: yathā cākṣayyatāṃ prāptaṃ puṇyatāṃ ca yathā gatam
GE07mbh_13_u:097.005c: jamadagneś ca saṃvādaṃ sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:097.006a: purā sa bhagavān sākṣād dhanuṣākrīḍata prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:097.006c: saṃdhāya saṃdhāya śarāṃś cikṣepa kila bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:097.007a: tān kṣiptān reṇukā sarvāṃs tasyeṣūn dīptatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:097.007c: ānāyya sā tadā tasmai prādād asakṛd acyuta
GE07mbh_13_u:097.008a: atha tena sa śabdena jyātalasya śarasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:097.008c: prahṛṣṭaḥ saṃpracikṣepa sā ca pratyājahāra tān
GE07mbh_13_u:097.009c: sa sāyakān dvijo viddhvā reṇukām idam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:097.010c: yāvad etān punaḥ subhru kṣipāmīti janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:097.011a: sā gacchaty antarā chāyāṃ vṛkṣam āśritya bhāminī
GE07mbh_13_u:097.011c: tasthau tasyā hi saṃtaptaṃ śiraḥ pādau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:097.012a: sthitā sā tu muhūrtaṃ vai bhartuḥ śāpabhayāc chubhā
GE07mbh_13_u:097.012e: pratyājagāma ca śarāṃs tān ādāya yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:097.013a: sā prasvinnā sucārvaṅgī padbhyāṃ duḥkhaṃ niyacchatī
GE07mbh_13_u:097.014a: sa tām ṛṣis tataḥ kruddho vākyam āha śubhānanām
GE07mbh_13_u:097.014c: reṇuke kiṃ cireṇa tvam āgateti punaḥ punaḥ reṇukovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:097.015a: śiras tāvat pradīptaṃ me pādau caiva tapodhana
GE07mbh_13_u:097.016a: etasmāt kāraṇād brahmaṃś ciram etat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:097.016c: etaj jñātvā mama vibho mā krudhas tvaṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_13_u:097.018a: sa visphārya dhanur divyaṃ gṛhītvā ca bahūñ śarān
GE07mbh_13_u:097.018c: atiṣṭhat sūryam abhito yato yāti tatomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:097.020a: ādatte raśmibhiḥ sūryo divi vidvaṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:097.020c: rasaṃ sa taṃ vai varṣāsu pravarṣati divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:097.021c: annaṃ prāṇā iti yathā vedeṣu paripaṭhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:097.025c: annataḥ saṃpravartante yathā tvaṃ vettha bhārgava
GE07mbh_13_u:097.026c: sarvam annāt prabhavati viditaṃ kīrtayāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:097.027a: sarvaṃ hi vettha vipra tvaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:097.027c: prasādaye tvā viprarṣe kiṃ te sūryo nipātyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.003a: tataḥ sūryo madhurayā vācā tam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:098.004a: calaṃ nimittaṃ viprarṣe sadā sūryasya gacchataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.004c: kathaṃ calaṃ vetsyasi tvaṃ sadā yāntaṃ divākaram
GE07mbh_13_u:098.005a: sthiraṃ vāpi calaṃ vāpi jāne tvāṃ jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.005c: avaśyaṃ vinayādhānaṃ kāryam adya mayā tava
GE07mbh_13_u:098.006c: tatra vetsyāmi sūrya tvāṃ na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.007a: asaṃśayaṃ māṃ viprarṣe vetsyase dhanvināṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:098.007c: apakāriṇaṃ tu māṃ viddhi bhagavañ śaraṇāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.008a: tataḥ prahasya bhagavāñ jamadagnir uvāca tam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.008c: na bhīḥ sūrya tvayā kāryā praṇipātagato hy asi
GE07mbh_13_u:098.009a: brāhmaṇeṣv ārjavaṃ yac ca sthairyaṃ ca dharaṇītale
GE07mbh_13_u:098.009c: saumyatāṃ caiva somasya gāmbhīryaṃ varuṇasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.010a: dīptim agneḥ prabhāṃ meroḥ pratāpaṃ tapanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.010c: etāny atikramed yo vai sa hanyāc charaṇāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.011a: bhavet sa gurutalpī ca brahmahā ca tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.011c: surāpānaṃ ca kuryāt sa yo hanyāc charaṇāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.012a: etasya tv apanītasya samādhiṃ tāta cintaya
GE07mbh_13_u:098.013a: etāvad uktvā sa tadā tūṣṇīm āsīd bhṛgūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.013c: atha sūryo dadau tasmai chatropānaham āśu vai
GE07mbh_13_u:098.015c: puṇyadāneṣu sarveṣu param akṣayyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.016c: puṇyam etad abhikhyātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:098.017c: dharmas te sumahān bhāvī na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.018a: chatraṃ hi bharataśreṣṭha yaḥ pradadyād dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:098.018c: śubhraṃ śataśalākaṃ vai sa pretya sukham edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.019c: apsarobhiś ca satataṃ devaiś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:098.020b-0442_01: upānahau ca yo dadyāc ślakṣṇau snehasamanvitau
GE07mbh_13_u:098.021c: goloke sa mudā yukto vasati pretya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022a: etat te bharataśreṣṭha mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0003: ke ca śuśrūṣayā lokā vihitā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0007: vṛddhaḥ parāśaraḥ prāha dharmaṃ śubhram anāmayam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0010: śiṣyān adhyāpayām āsa śāstram arthavad arthavit
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0015: arayaḥ ṣaḍ vijetavyā nityaṃ svaṃ deham āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0016: kāmakrodhau ca lobhaś ca mānamohau madas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0019: karmaṇā manasā vācā cakṣuṣā ca caturvidham
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0020: āsthāya niyamaṃ dhīmāñ śānto dānto jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0022: varṇatrayān madhu yathā bhramaro dharmam ācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0023: yadi śūdras tapaḥ kuryād vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0024: iha cāsya parikleśaḥ pretya cāsyāśubhā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0025: adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca tapaḥ śūdre pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0026: amārgeṇa tapas taptvā mleccheṣu phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0027: anyathā vartamāno hi na śūdro dharmam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0030: tathā te hi śakāś cīnāḥ kāmbhojāḥ pāradās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0032: dārvāś ca daradāś caiva ujjihānās tathetarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0033: veṇāś ca kaṅkaṇāś caiva siṃhalā madrakās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0034: kiṣkindhakāḥ pulindāś ca kahvāś cāndhrāḥ sanīragāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0035: gandhikā dramiḍāś caiva barbarāś cūcukās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0036: kirātāḥ pārvateyāś ca kolāś colāḥ sakhāṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0037: ārukāś caiva dohāś ca yāś cānyā mlecchajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0041: na naśyati kṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0044: evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0047: vaṇik kṛṣiś ca vaiśyānāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ paricārikā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0049: tato mlecchā bhavanty ete nirghṛṇā dharmavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0050: punaś ca nirayas teṣāṃ tiryagyoniś ca śāśvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0051: ye tu satpatham āsthāya varṇāśramakṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0062: tatrāpi śūdro bhikṣūṇām idaṃ śeṣaṃ ca kalpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0067: sajalaṃ bhājanaṃ sthāpya mṛttikāṃ ca parīkṣitām
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0068: parīkṣya bhūmiṃ mūtrārthī tata āsīta vāgyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0069: udaṅmukho divā kuryād rātrau ced dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0071: asamāpte tathā śauce na vācaṃ kiṃ cid īrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0075: śaucaṃ kuryāc chanair vīro buddhipūrvam asaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0077: vipruṣaś ca yathā na syur yathā corū na saṃspṛśet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0078: apāne mṛttikās tisraḥ pradeyās tv anupūrvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0079: hastābhyāṃ ca tathā vipro hastaṃ hastena saṃspṛśet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0080: apāne nava deyāḥ syur iti vṛddhānuśāsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0081: mṛttikā dīyamānā hi śodhayed deśam añjasā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0082: tasmāt pāṇitale deyā mṛttikās tu punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0083: buddhipūrvaṃ prayatnena yathā naiva spṛśet sphijau
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0084: yathā ghāto hi na bhaved kledajaḥ paridhānake
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0085: tathā gudaṃ pramārjeta śaucārthaṃ tu punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0086: pratipādaṃ tatas tyaktvā śaucam utthāya kārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0087: savye dvādaśa deyāḥ syus tisras tisraḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0088: deyāḥ kūrparake haste pṛṣṭhabandhe punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0090: ubhayor hastayor ekaṃ sapta sapta pradāpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0091: tato 'nyāṃ mṛttikāṃ gṛhya kāryaṃ śaucaṃ punas tayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0092: hastayor evam etad dhi mahāśaucaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0093: tato 'nyathā na kurvīta vidhir eṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0095: ato 'nyathā tu yaḥ kuryāt prāyaścittīyate tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0099: yathā yathā viśudhyeta tat tathā tad upakrame
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0100: sakardamaṃ tu varṣāsu gṛham āviśya saṃkaṭam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0101: hastayor mṛttikās tisraḥ pādayoḥ ṣaṭ pradāpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0102: kāmaṃ dattvā gude dadyāt tisraḥ padbhyāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0106: kṣārauṣarābhyāṃ vastrasya kuryāc chaucaṃ mṛdā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0110: deyāś catasras tisro vā dvir vāpy ekā tathāpadi
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0111: kālam āsādya deśaṃ ca śaucasya gurulāghavam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0112: vidhinānena śaucaṃ tu nityaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0115: adhastād upariṣṭāc ca tataḥ pāṇim upaspṛśet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0116: manogatās tu niḥśabdā niḥśabdaṃ trir apaḥ pibet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0117: dvir mukhaṃ parimṛjyāc ca khāni copaspṛśed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0118: ṛgvedaṃ tena prīṇāti prathamaṃ yaḥ pibed apaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0119: dvitīyaṃ tu yajurvedaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sāma eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0120: mṛjyate prathamaṃ tena atharvā prītim āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0122: yac cakṣuṣi samādhatte tenādityaṃ tu prīṇayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0123: prīṇāti vāyuṃ ghrāṇaṃ ca diśaś cāpy atha śrotrayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0124: brahmāṇaṃ tena prīṇāti yan mūrdhani samāpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0126: prīṇāti viṣṇuṃ padbhyāṃ tu salilaṃ vai samādadhat
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0128: sarvatra vidhir ity eṣa bhojanādiṣu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0130: vidhir eṣa samuddiṣṭaḥ śauce cābhyukṣaṇaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0131: śūdrasyaiṣa vidhir dṛṣṭo gṛhān niṣkramataḥ sataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0134: kṣatrā ārambhayajñās tu vīryayajñā viśaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0139: ātithyena tathā vaiśyaḥ śūdro dāsyena śobhate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0140: yatātmanā tu śūdreṇa śuśrūṣā nityam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0148: tathā stheyam aśaktena sa dharma iti niścitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0149: ato 'nyathā tu kurvāṇaḥ śreyo nāpnoti mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0150: tasmād bhikṣuṣu śūdreṇa kāryam ātmahitaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0151: iha yat kurute śreyas tat pretya samupāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0152: tac cānasūyatā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ yad dhi manyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0157: ayaṃ me paramo dharmas tv anenemaṃ suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0159: vibhayo deham utsṛjya yāsyāmi paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0160: nātaḥ paraṃ mamāpy anya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0165: sarvakāryeṣu kṛtyāni kṛtāny eva tu darśayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0166: yathā priyo bhaved bhikṣus tathā kāryaṃ prasādhayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0167: yad akalpaṃ bhaved bhikṣor na tat kāryaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0169: tat kāryam avicāreṇa nityam eva śubhārthinā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0170: manasā karmaṇā vācā nityam eva prasādayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0181: yo bhavet pūrvasaṃsiddhas tulyadharmā bhavet sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0182: tasmai praṇāmaḥ kartavyo netareṣu kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0183: anuktvā teṣu cotthāya nityam eva yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0184: saṃmārjanam atho kṛtvā kṛtvā cāpy upalepanam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0185: tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ dadyāt puṣpāṇy ādāya dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0189: tathātmā praṇidhātavyo yathā te prītim āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0194: teṣāṃ prasādāt tapasā prāpsyāmīṣṭāṃ śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0195: evam etad viniścitya yadi seveta bhikṣukān
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0196: vidhinā svopadiṣṭena prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0199: yādṛśena tu toyena śuddhiṃ prakurute naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0200: tādṛg bhavati tad dhautam udakasya svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0201: śūdro 'py etena mārgeṇa yādṛśaṃ sevate janam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0202: tādṛg bhavati saṃsargād acireṇa na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0205: adhvanā karśitānāṃ ca vyādhitānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0206: śuśrūṣāṃ niyataṃ kuryāt teṣām āpadi yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0209: prāyaścittaṃ yathā na syāt tathā sarvaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0216: yaś ca prītamanā dadyād ādadyād bheṣajaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0217: aśraddhayā hi dattāni tāny abhojyāni bhikṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0219: tasyopabhogād dharmaḥ syād vyādhibhiś ca nivartyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0221: na tv eva dharmam utsṛjya kuryāt teṣāṃ pratikriyām
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0222: svabhāvato hi dvaṃdvāni viprayānty upayānti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0223: svabhāvataḥ sarvabhāvā bhavanti na bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0225: vidyād evaṃ hi yo dhīmāṃs tattvavit tattvadarśanaḥ parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0226: na sa lipyeta pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0229: nāparādhyeta bhikṣos tu na cainam avadhīrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0230: uttaraṃ ca na saṃdadyāt kruddhaṃ caiva prasādayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0232: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vai tatra na kruddham abhisaṃvadet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0236: sthāvareṣu dayāṃ kuryāj jaṃgameṣu ca prāṇiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0240: hiṃsāṃ vā yadi vāhiṃsāṃ na kuryād ātmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0241: yatretaro bhaven nityaṃ doṣaṃ tatra na kārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0242: evaṃ sa mucyate doṣāt parān āśritya vartayan
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0244: jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva udbhijjāḥ svedajāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0247: hiṃsā yathānyā vihitā tathā doṣaṃ prayojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0249: na hi lobhaḥ prabhavati hiṃsā vāpi tadātmikā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0251: yady etad evaṃ manyeta śūdro hy api ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0252: kṛtaṃ kṛtavatāṃ gacchet kiṃ punar yo niṣevate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0253: na śūdraḥ patate kaś cin na ca saṃskāram arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0258: tena tasya bhavec chāntis tato bhūyo 'py upāvrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0259: savarṇāyā bhaved etad dhīnāyās tv ardham arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0260: varṣatrayaṃ tu vaiśyāyāḥ kṣatriyāyās tu ṣaṭ samāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0261: brāhmaṇyā tu sametasya samā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0262: kaṭāgninā vā dagdhavyas tasminn eva kṣaṇe bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0264: anasthibandham ekaṃ tu yadi prāṇair viyojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0266: triḥ snānam udake kṛtvā tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0268: anena vidhinā vāpi sthāvareṣu na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0269: kāyena padbhyāṃ hastābhyām aparādhāt tu mucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0270: aduṣṭaṃ kṣapayed yas tu sarvavarṇeṣu vācayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0271: tasyāpy aṣṭaguṇaṃ vidyāt prāyaścittaṃ tad eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0273: kṛtvā tu mānasaṃ pāpaṃ tathaivaikaguṇaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0274: tasmād etāni sarvāṇi viditvā na samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0279: kālam eva pratīkṣeta nirveśaṃ bhṛtako yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0280: evaṃ pravartamānas tu vinītaḥ prayatātmavān parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0283: traivārṣikaṃ dvivārṣikaṃ vā vārṣikaṃ vā samutthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0284: ṣāṇmāsikaṃ māsikaṃ vā saptarātrikam eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0285: sarvāṃs tadarthān vā vidyāt teṣāṃ cihnāni lakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0286: puruṣaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ yas tu tiṣṭhantaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0290: jyotsnāyām ātmanaś chāyāṃ sacchidrāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0292: viśiraskāṃ yadā chāyāṃ paśyet puruṣa ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0294: karṇau pidhāya hastābhyāṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇute yadi
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0296: śavagandham upāghrāti anyad vā surabhiṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0299: luptasaṃjñaṃ hi karaṇaṃ sadyo mṛtyuṃ samādiśet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0300: evam eṣām ariṣṭānāṃ paśyed anyatamaṃ yadi
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0301: na taṃ kālaṃ parīkṣeta yathāriṣṭaṃ prakalpitam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0302: abhyāśena tu kālasya gaccheta pulinaṃ śuci
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0303: tatra prāṇān pramuñceta tam īśānam anusmaran
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0304: tato 'nyaṃ deham āsādya gāndharvaṃ sthānam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0311: patitaś ca kṣaye kāle kṣaṇena vimaladyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0313: avāpya tatra vai janma sa pūto devakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0321: agnihotram upāsan vai juhvac caiva yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0334: pārthivīṃ śriyam āpannaḥ śrīmān dharmapatir yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0338: adhītya vedam akhilaṃ dhanurvedaṃ ca mukhyaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0345: kālasya vaśam āpannaḥ prāṇāṃs tyajati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0349: taiḥ stūyate bandibhis tu nānāvādyaiḥ prabodhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0352: yānam āruhya vicared yathā śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0353: sa tatra vasate ṣaṣṭiṃ padmānīha mudānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0355: atha puṇyakṣayāt tasmāt sthāpyate bhuvi bhārata parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0367: yajate vividhair yajñair japayajñais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0375: tatra somaprabhair devair agniṣv āttaiś ca bhāsvaraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0376: tathā barhiṣadaiś caiva devair āṅgirasair api
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0377: viśvebhiś caiva devaiś ca tathā brahmarṣibhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0379: sādhyaiḥ siddhaiś ca satataṃ satkṛtas tatra modate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0384: sa tatra ramate prītaḥ saha devaiḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0390: sa tatra vartate śrīmān dviśataṃ dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0391: atha kālakṣayāt tasmāt sthānād āvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0392: jātidharmāṃs tathā sarvān sargād āvartanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0393: aśāśvatam idaṃ sarvam iti cintyopalabhya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0395: āsthāsyaty abhayaṃ nityaṃ yatrāvṛttir na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0396: yatra gatvā na mriyate janma cāpi na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0397: garbhakleśā mayā prāptā jāyatā ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0398: kāyakleśāś ca vividhā dvaṃdvāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0400: tatratatropabhuktāni na kva cic chāśvatī sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0401: evaṃ sa niścayaṃ kṛtvā nirmucya grahabandhanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0405: yogaśāstraṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca viditvā so 'rthatattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0410: ekarātraṃ dvirātraṃ vā na kva cit sajjate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0413: dharmalabdhaṃ samaśnāti na kāmāt kiṃ cid aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0414: yugamātradṛg adhvānaṃ krośād ūrdhvaṃ na gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0420: ūrdhvaṃ nādho na tiryak ca na kiṃ cid abhikāmayet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0421: evaṃ hi ramamāṇas tu yatidharmaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0422: kālasya parimāṇāt tu yathā pakvaphalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0423: sa visṛjya svakaṃ dehaṃ praviśed brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0425: nirakṣaram abījaṃ ca nirindriyam ajaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0426: ajayyam akṣayaṃ yat tad abhedyaṃ sūkṣmam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0427: nirguṇaṃ ca prakṛtiman nirvikāraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0430: evaṃ sa bhikṣur nirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyād dagdhakilbiṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0431: ihastho deham utsṛjya nīḍaṃ śakunivad yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0433: brahmaṇaḥ sthānam acalaṃ sthānāt sthānam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0434: yathā khanan khanitreṇa jāṅgale vāri vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0436: saiṣā gatir anādyantā sarvair apy upadhāritā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0437: tasmāc chūdrair anirvedāc chraddadhānais tu nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0439: yat karoti tad aśnāti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0440: nākṛtaṃ bhujyate karma na kṛtaṃ naśyate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0444: śubhāny eva samādadyād ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0445: bhūtiś ca nānyataḥ śakyā śūdrāṇām iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0446: ṛte yatīnāṃ śuśrūṣām iti santo vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0448: śakyate hy āgamād eva gatiṃ prāptum anāmayām
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0449: parā caiṣāṃ gatir dṛṣṭā yām anveṣanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0451: imaṃ hi dharmam āsthāya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0452: striyo vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś ca prāpnuyuḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0453: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇo vidvān kṣatriyo vā bahuśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0454: na cāpy akṣīṇapāpasya jñānaṃ bhavati dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0456: upalabhya tu vijñānaṃ jñānaṃ vāpy anasūyakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0457: tathaiva varted guruṣu bhūyāṃsaṃ vā samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0459: vyartham asya śrutaṃ bhavati jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0460: gatiṃ cāpy aśubhāṃ gacchen nirayāya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0461: prakṣīyate tasya puṇyaṃ jñānam asya virudhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0464: evam eva hi notsekaḥ kartavyo jñānasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0465: phalaṃ jñānasya hi śamaḥ praśamāya yatet sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0468: dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0469: indriyārthāṃś ca manasā mano buddhau samādadhet
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0475: saṃsthitaṃ hṛdaye paśyed īśaṃ śāśvatam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0476: na cāyuktena śakyeta draṣṭuṃ dehe maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0477: yuktas tu paśyate buddhyā saṃniveśya mano hṛdi
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0478: atha tv evaṃ na śaknoti kartuṃ hṛdayadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0481: pañcabhūtaviśeṣāś ca manaś caiva tu ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0482: tanmātrāṇy api pañcaiva mano 'haṃkāra eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0484: etāḥ prakṛtayaś cāṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0486: evaṃ varṣaṃ samuttīrya tīrṇo bhavati nānyathā
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0488: ahany ahani śāntātmā pāvanāya hitāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010_0496: nīlaḥ khago merum ivāśrayan vai bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0002: loke 'smiṃs tān ṛṣīn sarvāñ śrotum icchāmi sattama
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0004: asminn arthe mahāprājñās taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0008: mātaliḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā devam indram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0010: yeṣāṃ loke namaskuryāt tān bravītu bhavān mama
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0011: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devarājaḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0012: yantāraṃ paripṛcchantaṃ tam indraḥ pratyuvāca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0013: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yeṣāṃ cintayatāṃ matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0014: nādharme vartate nityaṃ tān namasyāmi mātale
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0019: dhanaṃ vidyās tathaiśvaryaṃ yeṣāṃ na calayen matim
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0020: calitāṃ ye nigṛhṇanti tān nityaṃ pūjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0023: mahatas tapasā prāptau dhanasya vipulasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0024: tyāgas tasya na vai kāryo yo ''tmānaṃ nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0026: dharmārthau yasya niyatau tān namasyāmi mātale
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0029: ye bhuktvā mānuṣān bhogān pūrve vayasi mātale
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0030: tapasā svargam āyānti śaśvat tān pūjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-010A_0034: paraiḥ kīrtitaśaucānāṃ mātale tān namāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:098.022d-0443_01: mayā bhārataśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:099.001c: tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tvatto 'dya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:099.002c: upetā sarvabījaiś ca śreṣṭhā bhūmir ihocyate
GE07mbh_13_u:099.004a: taḍāgānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānāṃ cāpi ye guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:099.004c: triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjito yas taḍāgavān
GE07mbh_13_u:099.006c: taḍāgaṃ sukṛtaṃ deśe kṣetram eva mahāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:099.007c: taḍāgāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyam uttamām
GE07mbh_13_u:099.009a: tasmāt tāṃs te pravakṣyāmi taḍāge ye guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:099.009c: yā ca tatra phalāvāptir ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:099.010a: varṣamātre taḍāge tu salilaṃ yasya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:099.011a: śaratkāle tu salilaṃ taḍāge yasya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:099.011c: gosahasrasya sa pretya labhate phalam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:099.012c: sa vai bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:099.013a: yasya vai śaiśire kāle taḍāge salilaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:099.014a: taḍāgaṃ sukṛtaṃ yasya vasante tu mahāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:099.015c: vājapeyasamaṃ tasya phalaṃ vai munayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:099.016a: sa kulaṃ tārayet sarvaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye
GE07mbh_13_u:099.016c: gāvaḥ pibanti pānīyaṃ sādhavaś ca narāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:099.017a: taḍāge yasya gāvas tu pibanti tṛṣitā jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:099.018a: yat pibanti jalaṃ tatra snāyante viśramanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:099.019a: durlabhaṃ salilaṃ tāta viśeṣeṇa paratra vai
GE07mbh_13_u:099.020a: tilān dadata pānīyaṃ dīpān dadata jāgrata
GE07mbh_13_u:099.020c: jñātibhiḥ saha modadhvam etat preteṣu durlabham
GE07mbh_13_u:099.021c: pānīyaṃ naraśārdūla tasmād dātavyam eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:099.022a: evam etat taḍāgeṣu kīrtitaṃ phalam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:099.022b-0445_01: ekāham api kaunteya bhūmistham udakaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_13_u:099.022b-0445_02: kulaṃ tārayate janma sapta sapta ca sapta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:099.022c: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi vṛkṣāṇām api ropaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:099.023a: sthāvarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jātayaḥ ṣaṭ prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:099.024a: etā jātyas tu vṛkṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rope guṇās tv ime
GE07mbh_13_u:099.024b-0447_01: sasyāni ropaṇād eṣāṃ tṛptir bhavati śāśvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:099.024c: kīrtiś ca mānuṣe loke pretya caiva phalaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:099.025a: labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiś ca mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:099.026c: tārayed vṛkṣaropī ca tasmād vṛkṣān praropayet
GE07mbh_13_u:099.026d-0449_01: ropayitvā tu yo vṛkṣān kāle śuśrūṣate nagān
GE07mbh_13_u:099.027a: tasya putrā bhavanty ete pādapā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:099.028a: puṣpaiḥ suragaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiś cāpi tathā pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:099.028d-0450_01: pūjayanti kṣitiruhāś chāyayā hy atithīn sadā

GE07mbh_13_u:100.001c: ṛddhim āpnoti kiṃ kṛtvā manuṣya iha pārthiva

GE07mbh_13_u:100.004a: gārhasthyaṃ dharmam āśritya mayā vā madvidhena vā

GE07mbh_13_u:100.005a: ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā manuṣyāś caiva mādhava

GE07mbh_13_u:100.006a: sadā yajñena devāṃś ca ātithyena ca mānavān

GE07mbh_13_u:100.007a: nityam agniṃ paricared abhuktvā balikarma ca

GE07mbh_13_u:100.009a: siddhānnād vaiśvadevaṃ vai kuryād agnau yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:100.010a: prajānāṃ pataye caiva pṛthag ghomo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:100.011c: somāya cāpy udīcyāṃ vai vāstumadhye dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:100.012a: dhanvantareḥ prāg udīcyāṃ prācyāṃ śakrāya mādhava

GE07mbh_13_u:100.012e: marudbhyo devatābhyaś ca balim antargṛhe haret
GE07mbh_13_u:100.013c: niśācarebhyo bhūtebhyo baliṃ naktaṃ tathā haret
GE07mbh_13_u:100.014a: evaṃ kṛtvā baliṃ samyag dadyād bhikṣāṃ dvijātaye
GE07mbh_13_u:100.015a: yadā śrāddhaṃ pitṛbhyaś ca dātum iccheta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:100.016a: pitṝn saṃtarpayitvā tu baliṃ kuryād vidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:100.018a: anityaṃ hi sthito yasmāt tasmād atithir ucyate
