GE07mbh_13_u:100.019c: idam asti gṛhe mahyam iti nityaṃ nivedayet
GE07mbh_13_u:100.020a: te yad vadeyus tat kuryād iti dharmo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:100.020c: gṛhasthaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇa śiṣṭāśī ca sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:100.021a: rājartvijaṃ snātakaṃ ca guruṃ śvaśuram eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:100.022a: śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca vayobhyaś cāvaped bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:100.023a: etāṃs tu dharmān gārhasthān yaḥ kuryād anasūyakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:100.023c: sa iharddhiṃ parāṃ prāpya pretya nāke mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:100.024a: iti bhūmer vacaḥ śrutvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:100.024c: tathā cakāra satataṃ tvam apy evaṃ samācara
GE07mbh_13_u:100.025c: ihaloke yaśaḥ prāpya pretya svargam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:101.001c: katham etat samutpannaṃ phalaṃ cātra bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:101.002c: manoḥ prajāpater vādaṃ suvarṇasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:101.003a: tapasvī kaś cid abhavat suvarṇo nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.003c: varṇato hemavarṇaḥ sa suvarṇa iti paprathe
GE07mbh_13_u:101.005a: sa kadā cin manuṃ vipro dadarśopasasarpa ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.005c: kuśalapraśnam anyonyaṃ tau ca tatra pracakratuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.007a: tatra tau kathayām āstāṃ kathā nānāvidhāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.008a: suvarṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ manuṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:101.008c: hitārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ praśnaṃ me vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:101.009c: kim etat katham utpannaṃ phalayogaṃ ca śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_13_u:101.010c: śukrasya ca baleś caiva saṃvādaṃ vai samāgame
GE07mbh_13_u:101.013a: katheyam abhavat tatra yā tvayā parikīrtitā
GE07mbh_13_u:101.014a: tataḥ papraccha daityendraḥ kavīndraṃ praśnam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:101.014e: pradānasya dvijaśreṣṭha tad bhavān vaktum arhati śukra uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.015a: tapaḥ pūrvaṃ samutpannaṃ dharmas tasmād anantaram
GE07mbh_13_u:101.015c: etasminn antare caiva vīrudoṣadhya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.016c: amṛtaṃ ca viṣaṃ caiva yāś cānyās tulyajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.017a: amṛtaṃ manasaḥ prītiṃ sadyaḥ puṣṭiṃ dadāti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.017c: mano glapayate tīvraṃ viṣaṃ gandhena sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.018a: amṛtaṃ maṅgalaṃ viddhi mahad viṣam amaṅgalam
GE07mbh_13_u:101.018c: oṣadhyo hy amṛtaṃ sarvaṃ viṣaṃ tejo 'gnisaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:101.019a: mano hlādayate yasmāc chriyaṃ cāpi dadhāti ha
GE07mbh_13_u:101.019b-0453_01: amṛtaṃ mano hlādayati śriyaṃ caiva dadāti ha
GE07mbh_13_u:101.020a: devatābhyaḥ sumanaso yo dadāti naraḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.020c: tasmāt sumanasaḥ proktā yasmāt tuṣyanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.020d-0454_01: tasya tuṣyanti vai devās tuṣṭāḥ puṣṭiṃ dadaty api
GE07mbh_13_u:101.020d-0455_01: tasmai sumanaso devās tasmāt sumanasaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.021a: yaṃ yam uddiśya dīyeran devaṃ sumanasaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:101.021c: maṅgalārthaṃ sa tenāsya prīto bhavati daityapa
GE07mbh_13_u:101.022a: jñeyās tūgrāś ca saumyāś ca tejasvinyaś ca tāḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_13_u:101.022c: oṣadhyo bahuvīryāś ca bahurūpās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.023a: yajñiyānāṃ ca vṛkṣāṇām ayajñiyān nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:101.023c: āsurāṇi ca mālyāni daivatebhyo hitāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.024a: rākṣasānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ ca tathā priyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.024c: pitṝṇāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca kāntā yās tv anupūrvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.025a: vanyā grāmyāś ceha tathā kṛṣṭoptāḥ parvatāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.026a: dvividho hi smṛto gandha iṣṭo 'niṣṭaś ca puṣpajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.027c: teṣāṃ puṣpāṇi devānām iṣṭāni satataṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:101.027d-0456_01: padmaṃ ca tulasījātir api sarveṣu pūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.028a: jalajāni ca mālyāni padmādīni ca yāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.034c: nāgāḥ samupabhogena tribhir etais tu mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.035a: sadyaḥ prīṇāti devān vai te prītā bhāvayanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:101.036a: devāḥ prīṇanti satataṃ mānitā mānayanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.037c: dhūpāṃś ca vividhān sādhūn asādhūṃś ca nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:101.038a: niryāsaḥ saralaś caiva kṛtrimaś caiva te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.038c: iṣṭāniṣṭo bhaved gandhas tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:101.039a: niryāsāḥ sallakīvarjyā devānāṃ dayitās tu te
GE07mbh_13_u:101.039c: gugguluḥ pravaras teṣāṃ sarveṣām iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.040c: daityānāṃ sallakījaś ca kāṅkṣito yaś ca tadvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.042c: ye 'nye vaihārikās te tu mānuṣāṇām iti smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.043c: dhūpeṣv api parijñeyās ta eva prītivardhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.044c: yathā yena yadā caiva pradeyā yādṛśāś ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:101.045a: jyotis tejaḥ prakāśaś cāpy ūrdhvagaṃ cāpi varṇyate
GE07mbh_13_u:101.045c: pradānaṃ tejasāṃ tasmāt tejo vardhayate nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:101.046a: andhaṃ tamas tamisraṃ ca dakṣiṇāyanam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.047a: yasmād ūrdhvagam etat tu tamasaś caiva bheṣajam
GE07mbh_13_u:101.047c: tasmād ūrdhvagater dātā bhaved iti viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.048c: tāmasā rākṣasāś ceti tasmād dīpaḥ pradīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:101.049c: tān dattvā nopahiṃseta na haren nopanāśayet
GE07mbh_13_u:101.051a: haviṣā prathamaḥ kalpo dvitīyas tv auṣadhīrasaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.052b-0457_01: devālaye sabhāyāṃ ca girau caitye catuṣpathe
GE07mbh_13_u:101.052c: dīpadātā bhaven nityaṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.053c: jyotiṣāṃ caiva sālokyaṃ dīpadātā naraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:101.056c: śirasā praṇataś cāpi hared balim atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.057a: gṛhyā hi devatā nityam āśaṃsanti gṛhāt sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:101.058a: ito dattena jīvanti devatāḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:101.058c: te prītāḥ prīṇayanty etān āyuṣā yaśasā dhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.059a: balayaḥ saha puṣpais tu devānām upahārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:101.063a: jvalaty aharaho veśma yāś cāsya gṛhadevatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.064a: ity etad asurendrāya kāvyaḥ provāca bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:101.064c: suvarṇāya manuḥ prāha suvarṇo nāradāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:101.065a: nārado 'pi mayi prāha guṇān etān mahādyute
GE07mbh_13_u:101.065c: tvam apy etad viditveha sarvam ācara putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:102.001c: phalaṃ balividhāne ca tad bhūyo vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:102.001d-0458_01: phalaṃ pradānena ca tad bhūyo vaktuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:102.002c: balayaś ca kimarthaṃ vai kṣipyante gṛhamedhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.003c: nahuṣaṃ prati saṃvādam agastyasya bhṛgos tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:102.005a: tatrāpi prayato rājan nahuṣas tridive vasan
GE07mbh_13_u:102.005c: mānuṣīś caiva divyāś ca kurvāṇo vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.006a: mānuṣyas tatra sarvāḥ sma kriyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.006c: pravṛttās tridive rājan divyāś caiva sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.008a: sarvaṃ tasya gṛhe rājñaḥ prāvartata mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.009a: daivatāny arcayaṃś cāpi vidhivat sa sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.010c: sarvāś caiva kriyās tasya paryahīyanta bhūpate
GE07mbh_13_u:102.016a: katham eṣa mayā śakyaḥ śaptuṃ yasya mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:102.016c: varadena varo datto bhavato viditaś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.017a: yo me dṛṣṭipathaṃ gacchet sa me vaśyo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_13_u:102.017c: ity anena varo devād yācito gacchatā divam
GE07mbh_13_u:102.018a: evaṃ na dagdhaḥ sa mayā bhavatā ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.018c: anyenāpy ṛṣimukhyena na śapto na ca pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.019a: amṛtaṃ caiva pānāya dattam asmai purā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:102.021a: atra yat prāptakālaṃ nas tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:102.021c: bhavāṃś cāpi yathā brūyāt kurvīmahi tathā vayam
GE07mbh_13_u:102.023a: adya hi tvā sudurbuddhī rathe yokṣyati devarāṭ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.025a: adya cāsau kudevendras tvāṃ padā dharṣayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:102.026c: ahir bhavasveti ruṣā śapsye pāpaṃ dvijadruham
GE07mbh_13_u:102.028c: yathā ca rocate tubhyaṃ tathā kartāsmy ahaṃ mune
GE07mbh_13_u:102.029a: evam uktas tu bhṛguṇā maitrāvaruṇir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:102.029d-0459_01: tathā cakāra tat sarvaṃ papāta nahuṣo yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:103.001a: kathaṃ sa vai vipannaś ca kathaṃ vai pātito bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:103.001c: kathaṃ cānindratāṃ prāptas tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:103.002a: evaṃ tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ kriyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.002c: sarvā evābhyavartanta yā divyā yāś ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.003c: balikarma ca yac cānyad utsekāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.004a: devaloke nṛloke ca sadācārā budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.004c: te ced bhavanti rājendra ṛdhyante gṛhamedhinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.004e: dhūpapradānair dīpaiś ca namaskārais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:103.005c: balayaś ca gṛhoddeśe ataḥ prīyanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.006a: yathā ca gṛhiṇas toṣo bhaved vai balikarmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:103.006c: tathā śataguṇā prītir devatānāṃ sma jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:103.007a: evaṃ dhūpapradānaṃ ca dīpadānaṃ ca sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.008a: snānenādbhiś ca yat karma kriyate vai vipaścitā
GE07mbh_13_u:103.008d-0460_01: pitaraś ca mahābhāgā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.008e: gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ sarvāḥ prīyante vidhinārcitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.009a: ity etāṃ buddhim āsthāya nahuṣaḥ sa nareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.009c: surendratvaṃ mahat prāpya kṛtavān etad adbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:103.010a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya bhāgyakṣaya upasthite
GE07mbh_13_u:103.010c: sarvam etad avajñāya na cakāraitad īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:103.013c: nimīlayasva nayane jaṭā yāvad viśāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:103.014c: bhṛguḥ sa sumahātejāḥ pātanāya nṛpasya ha
GE07mbh_13_u:103.015a: tataḥ sa devarāṭ prāptas tam ṛṣiṃ vāhanāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:103.015c: tato 'gastyaḥ surapatiṃ vākyam āha viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:103.016a: yojayasvendra māṃ kṣipraṃ kaṃ ca deśaṃ vahāmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:103.016c: yatra vakṣyasi tatra tvāṃ nayiṣyāmi surādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:103.017a: ity ukto nahuṣas tena yojayām āsa taṃ munim
GE07mbh_13_u:103.017c: bhṛgus tasya jaṭāsaṃstho babhūva hṛṣito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:103.018a: na cāpi darśanaṃ tasya cakāra sa bhṛgus tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:103.019a: na cukopa sa cāgastyo yukto 'pi nahuṣeṇa vai
GE07mbh_13_u:103.019c: taṃ tu rājā pratodena codayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:103.019d-0462_01: śrutismṛtī pramāṇaṃ vā neti vāde sa devarāṭ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.020a: na cukopa sa dharmātmā tataḥ pādena devarāṭ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.021a: tasmiñ śirasy abhihate sa jaṭāntargato bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.022c: tasmād āśu mahīṃ gaccha sarpo bhūtvā sudurmate
GE07mbh_13_u:103.023a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā tena sarpo bhūtvā papāta ha
GE07mbh_13_u:103.024a: bhṛguṃ hi yadi so 'drākṣīn nahuṣaḥ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:103.024c: na sa śakto 'bhaviṣyad vai pātane tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:103.025a: sa tu tais taiḥ pradānaiś ca tapobhir niyamais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:103.025e: prasādayām āsa bhṛguṃ śāpānto me bhaved iti
GE07mbh_13_u:103.026c: śāpāntārthaṃ mahārāja sa ca prādāt kṛpānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.027c: sa tvāṃ mokṣayitā śāpād ity uktvāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_13_u:103.029a: nahuṣo 'pi tvayā rājaṃs tasmāc chāpāt samuddhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.030a: tadā tu pātayitvā taṃ nahuṣaṃ bhūtale bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.031a: tataḥ śakraṃ samānāyya devān āha pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.031c: varadānān mama surā nahuṣo rājyam āptavān
GE07mbh_13_u:103.031e: sa cāgastyena kruddhena bhraṃśito bhūtalaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.032a: na ca śakyaṃ vinā rājñā surā vartayituṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:103.033a: evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇaṃ tu devāḥ pārtha pitāmaham
GE07mbh_13_u:103.033c: evam astv iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ pratyūcus te pitāmaham
GE07mbh_13_u:103.035c: sa ca tair eva saṃsiddho nahuṣaḥ karmabhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.036a: tasmād dīpāḥ pradātavyāḥ sāyaṃ vai gṛhamedhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.037c: rūpavān dhanavāṃś cāpi naro bhavati dīpadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.037d-0463_01: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād vāpi paṭhate yo dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:103.037d-0463_02: brahmalokam avāpnoti sa ca naivātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.001c: nṛśaṃsakāriṇo mūḍhāḥ kva te gacchanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.002c: caṇḍālasya ca saṃvādaṃ kṣatrabandhoś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:104.002d-0464_01: pātakānāṃ paraṃ hy etad brahmasvaharaṇaṃ balāt
GE07mbh_13_u:104.002d-0464_02: sānvayās te vinaśyanti caṇḍālāḥ pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_13_u:104.004c: kasmād gorajasā dhvastam apāṃ kuṇḍe niṣiñcasi
GE07mbh_13_u:104.005a: brāhmaṇasya gavāṃ rājan hriyatīnāṃ rajaḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:104.005c: somam uddhvaṃsayām āsa taṃ somaṃ ye 'piban dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.005d-0465_01: bhṛtyānām api rājñāṃ tu rajasā dhvaṃsitaṃ makhe
GE07mbh_13_u:104.005d-0465_02: tatpānāc ca dvijāḥ sarve kṣipraṃ narakam āviśan
GE07mbh_13_u:104.006a: dīkṣitaś ca sa rājāpi kṣipraṃ narakam āviśat
GE07mbh_13_u:104.006c: saha tair yājakaiḥ sarvair brahmasvam upajīvya tat
GE07mbh_13_u:104.007a: ye 'pi tatrāpiban kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ dadhi ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.008a: jaghnus tāḥ payasā putrāṃs tathā pautrān vidhunvatīḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.009c: tāsāṃ me rajasā dhvastaṃ bhaikṣam āsīn narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:104.010a: caṇḍālo 'haṃ tato rājan bhuktvā tad abhavaṃ mṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.010c: brahmasvahārī ca nṛpaḥ so 'pratiṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:104.011a: tasmād dharen na viprasvaṃ kadā cid api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:104.011b-0466_01: na paśyen nānumodec ca na hartuṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:104.011c: brahmasvarajasā dhvastaṃ bhuktvā māṃ paśya yādṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:104.012b-0467_01: etad dhi dhanam utkṛṣṭaṃ dvijānām aviśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.013a: ye cainaṃ krīṇate rājan ye ca vikrīṇate janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.013c: te tu vaivasvataṃ prāpya rauravaṃ yānti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.014a: somaṃ tu rajasā dhvastaṃ vikrīyād buddhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:104.014f-0468_02: maleṣu ca kṛmir bhūtvā śvaviṣṭhām upajīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:104.016a: śvānaṃ vai pāpinaṃ paśya vivarṇaṃ hariṇaṃ kṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:104.018a: abhavaṃ tatra jānāno hy etān doṣān madāt tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:104.018d-0469_01: so 'haṃ vai viditaḥ sarvair dūrago malino vane
GE07mbh_13_u:104.019a: so 'haṃ tena ca vṛttena bhojanena ca tena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:104.019c: imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaḥ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_13_u:104.020a: ādīptam iva cailāntaṃ bhramarair iva cārditam
GE07mbh_13_u:104.021a: svādhyāyais tu mahat pāpaṃ taranti gṛhamedhinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.021c: dānaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiś cāpi yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:104.023a: ahaṃ tu pāpayonyāṃ vai prasūtaḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:104.023c: niścayaṃ nādhigacchāmi kathaṃ mucyeyam ity uta
GE07mbh_13_u:104.024a: jātismaratvaṃ tu mama kena cit pūrvakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:104.024c: śubhena yena mokṣaṃ vai prāptum icchāmy ahaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:104.025a: tvam imaṃ me prapannāya saṃśayaṃ brūhi pṛcchate
GE07mbh_13_u:104.025c: caṇḍālatvāt katham ahaṃ mucyeyam iti sattama
GE07mbh_13_u:104.026c: brāhmaṇārthe tyajan prāṇān gatim iṣṭām avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:104.027c: hutvā prāṇān pramokṣas te nānyathā mokṣam arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:104.028a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā rājan brahmasvārthe paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_13_u:104.028c: hutvā raṇamukhe prāṇān gatim iṣṭām avāpa ha
GE07mbh_13_u:104.029a: tasmād rakṣyaṃ tvayā putra brahmasvaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:105.001a: eko lokaḥ sukṛtināṃ sarve tv āho pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:105.001c: uta tatrāpi nānātvaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:105.002a: karmabhiḥ pārtha nānātvaṃ lokānāṃ yānti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.002c: puṇyān puṇyakṛto yānti pāpān pāpakṛto janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.003c: gautamasya munes tāta saṃvādaṃ vāsavasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:105.004a: brāhmaṇo gautamaḥ kaś cin mṛdur dānto jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.005a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvayām āsa sānukrośo dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.005c: sa tu dīrgheṇa kālena babhūvātibalo mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:105.006a: taṃ prabhinnaṃ mahānāgaṃ prasrutaṃ sarvato madam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.007a: hriyamāṇaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā gautamaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.008a: mā me hārṣīr hastinaṃ putram enaṃ; duḥkhāt puṣṭaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrākṛtajña
GE07mbh_13_u:105.008c: mitraṃ satāṃ saptapadaṃ vadanti; mitradroho naiva rājan spṛśet tvām
GE07mbh_13_u:105.010a: śiṣṭaṃ dāntaṃ kṛtajñaṃ ca priyaṃ ca satataṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:105.010c: na me vikrośato rājan hartum arhasi kuñjaram
GE07mbh_13_u:105.011a: gavāṃ sahasraṃ bhavate dadāmi; dāsīśataṃ niṣkaśatāni
GE07mbh_13_u:105.011c: anyac ca vittaṃ vividhaṃ maharṣe; kiṃ brāhmaṇasyeha gajena kṛtyam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.012a: tvām eva gāvo 'bhi bhavantu rājan; dāsyaḥ saniṣkā vividhaṃ ca ratnam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.012c: anyac ca vittaṃ vividhaṃ narendra; kiṃ brāhmaṇasyeha dhanena kṛtyam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.013a: brāhmaṇānāṃ hastibhir nāsti kṛtyaṃ; rājanyānāṃ nāgakulāni vipra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.013c: svaṃ vāhanaṃ nayato nāsty adharmo; nāgaśreṣṭhād gautamāsmān nivarta
GE07mbh_13_u:105.014a: yatra preto nandati puṇyakarmā; yatra pretaḥ śocati
GE07mbh_13_u:105.014c: vaivasvatasya sadane mahātmanas; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.015a: ye niṣkriyā nāstikāḥ śraddadhānāḥ; pāpātmāna indriyārthe niviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.015c: yamasya te yātanāṃ prāpnuvanti; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.016a: vaivasvatī saṃyamanī janānāṃ; yatrānṛtaṃ nocyate yatra satyam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.016c: yatrābalā balinaṃ yātayanti; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.017a: jyeṣṭhāṃ svasāraṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca; guruṃ yathā caranti
GE07mbh_13_u:105.017c: tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.018c: gandharvayakṣair apsarobhiś ca juṣṭā; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.019a: atithivratāḥ suvratā ye janā vai; pratiśrayaṃ dadati brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.019c: śiṣṭāśinaḥ saṃvibhajyāśritāṃś ca; mandākinīṃ te 'pi vibhūṣayanti
GE07mbh_13_u:105.020a: meror agre yad vanaṃ bhāti ramyaṃ; supuṣpitaṃ kiṃnaragītajuṣṭam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.020c: sudarśanā yatra jambūr viśālā; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.021a: ye brāhmaṇā mṛdavaḥ satyaśīlā; bahuśrutāḥ sarvabhūtābhirāmāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.021c: ye 'dhīyante setihāsaṃ purāṇaṃ; madhvāhutyā juhvati ca dvijebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.022a: tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.022c: yad vidyate viditaṃ sthānam asti; tad brūhi tvaṃ tvarito hy eṣa yāmi
GE07mbh_13_u:105.023a: supuṣpitaṃ kiṃnararājajuṣṭaṃ; priyaṃ vanaṃ nandanaṃ nāradasya
GE07mbh_13_u:105.023c: gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ ca sadma; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.024a: ye nṛttagītakuśalā janāḥ sadā; hy ayācamānāḥ sahitāś
GE07mbh_13_u:105.024c: tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.025a: yatrottarāḥ kuravo bhānti ramyā; devaiḥ sārdhaṃ modamānā narendra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.025c: yatrāgniyaunāś ca vasanti viprā; hy ayonayaḥ parvatayonayaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:105.026a: yatra śakro varṣati sarvakāmān; yatra striyaḥ kāmacārāś caranti
GE07mbh_13_u:105.026c: yatra cerṣyā nāsti nārīnarāṇāṃ; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.027c: na hiṃsanti sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca; bhūtānāṃ ye sarvabhūtātmabhūtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.028c: tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.029a: tataḥ paraṃ bhānti lokāḥ sanātanāḥ; supuṇyagandhā nirmalā vītaśokāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.029c: somasya rājñaḥ sadane mahātmanas; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.030a: ye dānaśīlā na pratigṛhṇate sadā; na cāpy arthān ādadate parebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.030c: yeṣām adeyam arhate nāsti kiṃ cit; sarvātithyāḥ suprasādā janāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:105.031a: ye kṣantāro nābhijalpanti cānyāñ; śaktā bhūtvā satataṃ puṇyaśīlāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.031c: tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.032a: tataḥ paraṃ bhānti lokāḥ sanātanā; virajaso vitamaskā viśokāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.032c: ādityasya sumahāntaḥ suvṛttās; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.033a: svādhyāyaśīlā guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratās; tapasvinaḥ suvratāḥ satyasaṃdhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.034a: tathāvidhānām eṣa loko maharṣe; viśuddhānāṃ bhāvitavāṅmatīnām
GE07mbh_13_u:105.034c: satye sthitānāṃ vedavidāṃ mahātmanāṃ; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.035a: tataḥ pare bhānti lokāḥ sanātanāḥ; supuṇyagandhā virajā viśokāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.035c: varuṇasya rājñaḥ sadane mahātmanas; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.036a: cāturmāsyair ye yajante janāḥ sadā; tatheṣṭīnāṃ daśaśataṃ prāpnuvanti
GE07mbh_13_u:105.036c: ye cāgnihotraṃ juhvati śraddadhānā; yathānyāyaṃ trīṇi varṣāṇi viprāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.037a: svadāriṇāṃ dharmadhure mahātmanāṃ; yathocite vartmani susthitānām
GE07mbh_13_u:105.037c: dharmātmanām udvahatāṃ gatiṃ tāṃ; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.038a: indrasya lokā virajā viśokā; duranvayāḥ kāṅkṣitā mānavānām
GE07mbh_13_u:105.038c: tasyāhaṃ te bhavane bhūritejaso; rājann imaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.039a: śatavarṣajīvī yaś ca śūro manuṣyo; vedādhyāyī yaś ca yajvāpramattaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.039c: ete sarve śakralokaṃ vrajanti; paraṃ gantā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.040a: prājāpatyāḥ santi lokā mahānto; nākasya pṛṣṭhe puṣkalā vītaśokāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.040c: manīṣitāḥ sarvalokodbhavānāṃ; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.041c: ye cāśvamedhāvabhṛthāplutāṅgās; teṣāṃ lokā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra
GE07mbh_13_u:105.042a: tataḥ paraṃ bhānti lokāḥ sanātanāḥ; supuṇyagandhā virajā vītaśokāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.042c: tasminn ahaṃ durlabhe tvāpradhṛṣye; gavāṃ loke hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.043a: yo gosahasrī śatadaḥ samāṃ samāṃ; yo gośatī daśa dadyāc ca śaktyā
GE07mbh_13_u:105.043c: tathā daśabhyo yaś ca dadyād ihaikāṃ; pañcabhyo vā dānaśīlas tathaikām
GE07mbh_13_u:105.044a: ye jīryante brahmacaryeṇa viprā; brāhmīṃ vācaṃ parirakṣanti caiva
GE07mbh_13_u:105.044c: manasvinas tīrthayātrāparāyaṇās; te tatra modanti gavāṃ vimāne
GE07mbh_13_u:105.045a: prabhāsaṃ mānasaṃ puṇyaṃ puṣkarāṇi mahat saraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.045c: puṇyaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ tīrthaṃ bāhudāṃ karatoyinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:105.048c: prayānti puṇyagandhāḍhyā dhṛtarāṣṭro na tatra vai
GE07mbh_13_u:105.049a: yatra śītabhayaṃ nāsti na coṣṇabhayam aṇv api
GE07mbh_13_u:105.049c: na kṣutpipāse na glānir na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:105.050a: na dveṣyo na priyaḥ kaś cin na bandhur na ripus tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:105.050c: na jarāmaraṇe vāpi na puṇyaṃ na ca pātakam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.053c: na tatra dhṛtarāṣṭras te śakyo draṣṭuṃ mahāmune
GE07mbh_13_u:105.054a: rathantaraṃ yatra bṛhac ca gīyate; yatra vedī puṇḍarīkaiḥ stṛṇoti
GE07mbh_13_u:105.054c: yatropayāti haribhiḥ somapīthī; tatra tvāhaṃ hastinaṃ yātayiṣye
GE07mbh_13_u:105.055a: budhyāmi tvāṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ śatakratuṃ; vyatikramantaṃ bhuvanāni viśvā
GE07mbh_13_u:105.055c: kaccin na vācā vṛjinaṃ kadā cid; akārṣaṃ te manaso 'bhiṣaṅgāt
GE07mbh_13_u:105.056a: yasmād imaṃ lokapathaṃ prajānām; anvāgamaṃ padavāde
GE07mbh_13_u:105.056c: tasmād bhavān praṇataṃ mānuśāstu; bravīṣi yat tat karavāṇi sarvam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.057a: śvetaṃ kareṇuṃ mama putranāgaṃ; yaṃ me 'hārṣīr daśavarṣāṇi bālam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.057c: yo me vane vasato 'bhūd dvitīyas; tam eva me dehi surendra nāgam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.058a: ayaṃ sutas te dvijamukhya nāgaś; cāghrāyate tvām
GE07mbh_13_u:105.058c: pādau ca te nāsikayopajighrate; śreyo mama dhyāhi namaś ca te 'stu
GE07mbh_13_u:105.059a: śivaṃ sadaiveha surendra tubhyaṃ; dhyāyāmi pūjāṃ ca sadā prayuñje
GE07mbh_13_u:105.059c: mamāpi tvaṃ śakra śivaṃ dadasva; tvayā dattaṃ pratigṛhṇāmi nāgam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.060a: yeṣāṃ vedā nihitā vai guhāyāṃ; manīṣiṇāṃ sattvavatāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:105.060c: teṣāṃ tvayaikena mahātmanāsmi; buddhas tasmāt prītimāṃs te 'ham adya
GE07mbh_13_u:105.061a: hantaihi brāhmaṇa kṣipraṃ saha putreṇa hastinā
GE07mbh_13_u:105.061c: prāpnuhi tvaṃ śubhāṃl lokān ahnāya ca cirāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:105.062a: sa gautamaṃ puraskṛtya saha putreṇa hastinā
GE07mbh_13_u:105.062c: divam ācakrame vajrī sadbhiḥ saha durāsadam
GE07mbh_13_u:105.062d-0470_01: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaḥ paṭhed vā jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:105.062d-0470_02: sa yāti brahmaṇo lokaṃ brāhmaṇo gautamo yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:106.001c: svadāratuṣṭiś coktā te phalaṃ dānasya caiva yat
GE07mbh_13_u:106.002c: tapaso yat paraṃ te 'dya tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:106.003a: tapaḥ pracakṣate yāvat tāval lokā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:106.003c: mataṃ mama tu kaunteya tapo nānaśanāt param
GE07mbh_13_u:106.005a: atītya suralokaṃ ca gavāṃ lokaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:106.005c: ṛṣilokaṃ ca so 'gacchad bhagīratha iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.006a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vacaḥ prāha brahmā rājan bhagīratham
GE07mbh_13_u:106.006c: kathaṃ bhagīrathāgās tvam imaṃ deśaṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_13_u:106.007a: na hi devā na gandharvā na manuṣyā bhagīratha
GE07mbh_13_u:106.007c: āyānty ataptatapasaḥ kathaṃ vai tvam ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.008a: niḥśaṅkam annam adadaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ; śataṃ sahasrāṇi dānam
GE07mbh_13_u:106.008c: brāhmaṃ vrataṃ nityam āsthāya viddhi; na tv evāhaṃ tasya phalād ihāgām
GE07mbh_13_u:106.009a: daśaikarātrān daśa pañcarātrān; ekādaśaikādaśakān kratūṃś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:106.009c: jyotiṣṭomānāṃ ca śataṃ yad iṣṭaṃ; phalena tenāpi ca nāgato 'ham
GE07mbh_13_u:106.010a: yac cāvasaṃ jāhnavītīranityaḥ; śataṃ samās tapyamānas tapo 'ham
GE07mbh_13_u:106.010c: adāṃ ca tatrāśvatarīsahasraṃ; nārīpuraṃ na ca tenāham āgām
GE07mbh_13_u:106.011c: puṣkareṣu dvijātibhyaḥ prādāṃ gāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.012c: ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāṇi vibhūṣitānāṃ; jāmbūnadair ābharaṇair na tena
GE07mbh_13_u:106.013a: daśārbudāny adadaṃ gosavejyāsv; ekaikaśo daśa gā lokanātha
GE07mbh_13_u:106.013c: samānavatsāḥ payasā samanvitāḥ; suvarṇakāṃsyopaduhā na tena
GE07mbh_13_u:106.014c: gṛṣṭīnāṃ kṣīradātrīṇāṃ rohiṇīnāṃ na tena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:106.015a: dogdhrīṇāṃ vai gavāṃ caiva prayutāni daśaiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:106.015c: prādāṃ daśaguṇaṃ brahman na ca tenāham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.016c: karkāṇāṃ hemamālānāṃ na ca tenāham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.017a: koṭīś ca kāñcanasyāṣṭau prādāṃ brahman daśa tv aham
GE07mbh_13_u:106.017c: ekaikasmin kratau tena phalenāhaṃ na cāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.018c: prādāṃ hemasrajāṃ brahman koṭīr daśa ca sapta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:106.019c: patnīmataḥ sahasrāṇi prāyacchaṃ daśa sapta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:106.021a: dakṣiṇāvayavāḥ ke cid vedair ye saṃprakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.021c: vājapeyeṣu daśasu prādāṃ tenāpi nāpy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:106.023a: vijitya nṛpatīn sarvān makhair iṣṭvā pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:106.023c: aṣṭabhyo rājasūyebhyo na ca tenāham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.024a: srotaś ca yāvad gaṅgāyāś channam āsīj jagatpate
GE07mbh_13_u:106.024c: dakṣiṇābhiḥ pravṛttābhir mama nāgāṃ ca tatkṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:106.026c: mūrdhnā dhārāṃ mahādevaḥ śirasā yām adhārayat
GE07mbh_13_u:106.026e: na tenāpy aham āgacchaṃ phaleneha pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:106.027a: śamyākṣepair ayajaṃ yac ca devān; sadyaskānām ayutaiś cāpi yat tat
GE07mbh_13_u:106.027c: trayodaśadvādaśāhāṃś ca deva; sapauṇḍarīkān na ca teṣāṃ phalena
GE07mbh_13_u:106.028a: aṣṭau sahasrāṇi kakudminām ahaṃ; śuklarṣabhāṇām adadaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.028c: ekaikaṃ vai kāñcanaṃ śṛṅgam ebhyaḥ; patnīś caiṣām adadaṃ niṣkakaṇṭhīḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.030a: śataṃ śatānāṃ gṛṣṭīnām adadaṃ cāpy atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.030c: iṣṭvānekair mahāyajñair brāhmaṇebhyo na tena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:106.031a: ekādaśāhair ayajaṃ sadakṣiṇair; dvirdvādaśāhair aśvamedhaiś ca deva
GE07mbh_13_u:106.031c: ārkāyaṇaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiś ca brahmaṃs; teṣāṃ phaleneha na cāgato 'smi
GE07mbh_13_u:106.032a: niṣkaikakaṇṭham adadaṃ yojanāyataṃ; tad vistīrṇaṃ kāñcanapādapānām
GE07mbh_13_u:106.032c: vanaṃ cūtānāṃ ratnavibhūṣitānāṃ; na caiva teṣām āgato 'haṃ phalena
GE07mbh_13_u:106.033a: turāyaṇaṃ hi vratam apradhṛṣyam; akrodhano 'karavaṃ triṃśato 'bdān
GE07mbh_13_u:106.033c: śataṃ gavām aṣṭa śatāni caiva; dine dine hy adadaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.034a: payasvinīnām atha rohiṇīnāṃ; tathaiva cāpy anaḍuhāṃ lokanātha
GE07mbh_13_u:106.034c: prādāṃ nityaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sureśa; nehāgatas tena phalena cāham
GE07mbh_13_u:106.035a: triṃśad agnim ahaṃ brahmann ayajaṃ yac ca nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:106.035c: aṣṭābhiḥ sarvamedhaiś ca naramedhaiś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.036c: na caiva teṣāṃ deveśa phalenāham ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.037a: sarayvāṃ bāhudāyāṃ ca gaṅgāyām atha naimiṣe
GE07mbh_13_u:106.037c: gavāṃ śatānām ayutam adadaṃ na ca tena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:106.038a: indreṇa guhyaṃ nihitaṃ vai guhāyāṃ; yad bhārgavas tapasehābhyavindat
GE07mbh_13_u:106.038c: jājvalyamānam uśanastejaseha; tat sādhayām āsa mahaṃ vareṇyam
GE07mbh_13_u:106.038d-0472_01: brāhmaṇārthāya karmāṇi raṇaṃ caiva karomi yat
GE07mbh_13_u:106.039a: tato me brāhmaṇās tuṣṭās tasmin karmaṇi sādhite
GE07mbh_13_u:106.039c: sahasram ṛṣayaś cāsan ye vai tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:106.039e: uktas tair asmi gaccha tvaṃ brahmalokam iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:106.040c: imaṃ lokam anuprāpto mā bhūt te 'tra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:106.041a: kāmaṃ yathāvad vihitaṃ vidhātrā; pṛṣṭena vācyaṃ tu mayā yathāvat
GE07mbh_13_u:106.041c: tapo hi nānyac cānaśanān mataṃ me; namo 'stu te devavara prasīda
GE07mbh_13_u:106.042a: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ brahmā rājānaṃ sma bhagīratham
GE07mbh_13_u:106.042d-0474_01: tasmād anaśanair yukto viprān pūjaya nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:106.042d-0474_02: viprāṇāṃ vacanāt sarvaṃ paratreha ca sidhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:106.042d-0474_03: vāsobhir annair gobhiś ca śubhair naiveśikair api
GE07mbh_13_u:106.042d-0474_04: śubhaiḥ surakṣaṇaiś cāpi toṣyā eva dvijās tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:106.042d-0474_05: etad eva paraṃ guhyam alobhena samācara
GE07mbh_13_u:107.001a: śatāyur uktaḥ puruṣaḥ śatavīryaś ca vaidike
GE07mbh_13_u:107.001c: kasmān mriyante puruṣā bālā api pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:107.002a: āyuṣmān kena bhavati svalpāyur vāpi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.002c: kena vā labhate kīrtiṃ kena vā labhate śriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.003c: janmanā yadi vācārāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:107.004a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi yan māṃ tvam anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:107.004c: alpāyur yena bhavati dīrghāyur vāpi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.005a: yena vā labhate kīrtiṃ yena vā labhate śriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.005c: yathā ca vartan puruṣaḥ śreyasā saṃprayujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.006a: ācārāl labhate hy āyur ācārāl labhate śriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.006b-0475_01: ācārād dhanam akṣayyam ācāro hanti kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.006c: ācārāt kīrtim āpnoti puruṣaḥ pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.007a: durācāro hi puruṣo nehāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.007c: trasanti yasmād bhūtāni tathā paribhavanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.008a: tasmāt kuryād ihācāraṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.009c: sādhūnāṃ ca yathā vṛttam etad ācāralakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.010a: apy adṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vāpi puruṣaṃ dharmacāriṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.010c: bhūtikarmāṇi kurvāṇaṃ taṃ janāḥ kurvate priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.014c: anasūyur ajihmaś ca śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:107.015a: loṣṭamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī ca yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.015b-0476_01: sa vināśaṃ vrajaty āśu sūdako 'śucir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.017c: nekṣetādityam udyantaṃ nāstaṃ yāntaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.017d-0478_01: nopasṛṣṭaṃ na vāristhaṃ na madhyaṃ nabhaso gatam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.018b-0479_01: sa darbhapāṇis tat kurvan vāgyatas tanmanāḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.018c: tasmāt tiṣṭhet sadā pūrvāṃ paścimāṃ caiva vāgyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.019a: ye ca pūrvām upāsante dvijāḥ saṃdhyāṃ na paścimām
GE07mbh_13_u:107.019c: sarvāṃs tān dhārmiko rājā śūdrakarmāṇi kārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.020a: paradārā na gantavyāḥ sarvavarṇeṣu karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:107.020c: na hīdṛśam anāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.020f-0480_01: yāvaṃto romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇāṃ gātreṣu nirmitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.020f-0481_01: tādṛśaṃ vidyate kiṃ cid anāyuṣyaṃ nṛṇām iha
GE07mbh_13_u:107.021c: pūrvāhṇa eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.022c: udakyayā ca saṃbhāṣāṃ na kurvīta kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.023a: notsṛjeta purīṣaṃ ca kṣetre grāmasya cāntike
GE07mbh_13_u:107.023c: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe tu nāpsu kuryāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.023d-0483_01: annaṃ bubhukṣamāṇas tu trir mukhena spṛśed apaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.023d-0483_02: bhuktvā cānnaṃ tathaiva trir dviḥ punaḥ parimārjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.023d-0484_03: dvir ācāmed yathānyāyaṃ hṛdgataṃ tu pibann apaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.024c: praskandayec ca manasā bhuktvā cāgnim upaspṛśet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.024d-0485_01: tatrācāntaḥ spṛśed agniṃ tathā mṛdugatir vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.025c: dhanyaṃ paścānmukho bhuṅkte ṛtaṃ bhuṅkte udaṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.025d-0486_01: agnim ālabhya toyena sarvān prāṇān upaspṛśet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.025d-0486_02: gātrāṇi caiva sarvāṇi nābhiṃ pāṇitalena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:107.027a: śāntihomāṃś ca kurvīta sāvitrāṇi ca kārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.027c: niṣaṇṇaś cāpi khādeta na tu gacchan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.028a: mūtraṃ na tiṣṭhatā kāryaṃ na bhasmani na govraje
GE07mbh_13_u:107.029a: ārdrapādas tu bhuñjīta nārdrapādas tu saṃviśet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.029c: ārdrapādas tu bhuñjāno varṣāṇāṃ jīvate śatam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.030a: trīṇi tejāṃsi nocchiṣṭa ālabheta kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.030c: agniṃ gāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ caiva tathāsyāyur na riṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.031a: trīṇi tejāṃsi nocchiṣṭa udīkṣeta kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.032a: ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati
GE07mbh_13_u:107.033a: abhivādayeta vṛddhāṃś ca āsanaṃ caiva dāpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.034a: na cāsītāsane bhinne bhinnaṃ kāṃsyaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.034c: naikavastreṇa bhoktavyaṃ na nagnaḥ snātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:107.034e: svaptavyaṃ naiva nagnena na cocchiṣṭo 'pi saṃviśet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.035a: ucchiṣṭo na spṛśec chīrṣaṃ sarve prāṇās tadāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.035c: keśagrahān prahārāṃś ca śirasy etān vivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.036a: na pāṇibhyām ubhābhyāṃ ca kaṇḍūyej jātu vai śiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.036c: na cābhīkṣṇaṃ śiraḥ snāyāt tathāsyāyur na riṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.037a: śiraḥsnātaś ca tailena nāṅgaṃ kiṃ cid upaspṛśet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.037c: tilapiṣṭaṃ na cāśnīyāt tathāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.038c: vāte ca pūtigandhe ca manasāpi na cintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.039c: āyur asya nikṛntāmi prajām asyādade tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.040d-0488_01: tasya vedaḥ praṇaśyeta āyuś ca parihīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.040e: tasmād yukto 'py anadhyāye nādhīyīta kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.041a: praty ādityaṃ praty anilaṃ prati gāṃ ca prati dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:107.041c: ye mehanti ca panthānaṃ te bhavanti gatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.042a: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe tu divā kuryād udaṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.043a: trīn kṛśān nāvajānīyād dīrgham āyur jijīviṣuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.043c: brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ sarpaṃ sarve hy āśīviṣās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.044a: dahaty āśīviṣaḥ kruddho yāvat paśyati cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.044c: kṣatriyo 'pi dahet kruddho yāvat spṛśati tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.045a: brāhmaṇas tu kulaṃ hanyād dhyānenāvekṣitena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.045c: tasmād etat trayaṃ yatnād upaseveta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.046a: guruṇā vairanirbandho na kartavyaḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.046c: anumānyaḥ prasādyaś ca guruḥ kruddho yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:107.047c: gurunindā dahaty āyur manuṣyāṇāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.049a: nātikalpaṃ nātisāyaṃ na ca madhyaṃdine sthite
GE07mbh_13_u:107.049c: nājñātaiḥ saha gaccheta naiko na vṛṣalaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:107.050a: panthā deyo brāhmaṇāya gobhyo rājabhya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.052c: catuṣpathān na seveta ubhe saṃdhye tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.053a: upānahau ca vastraṃ ca dhṛtam anyair na dhārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.053c: brahmacārī ca nityaṃ syāt pādaṃ pādena nākramet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.055a: vṛthā māṃsaṃ na khādeta pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.055c: ākrośaṃ parivādaṃ ca paiśunyaṃ ca vivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.056a: nāruṃtudaḥ syān na nṛśaṃsavādī; na hīnataḥ param abhyādadīta
GE07mbh_13_u:107.056c: yayāsya vācā para udvijeta; na tāṃ vaded ruśatīṃ pāpalokyām
GE07mbh_13_u:107.057a: vāksāyakā vadanān niṣpatanti; yair āhataḥ śocati rātryahāni
GE07mbh_13_u:107.057c: parasya nāmarmasu te patanti; tān paṇḍito nāvasṛjet pareṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:107.058a: rohate sāyakair viddhaṃ vanaṃ paraśunā hatam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.058c: vācā duruktaṃ bībhatsaṃ na saṃrohati vākkṣatam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.058d-0490_02: vākśalyas tu na nirhartuṃ śakyo hṛdiśayo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.060a: nāstikyaṃ vedanindāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca kutsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.061a: parasya daṇḍaṃ nodyacchet kroddho nainaṃ nipātayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.061c: anyatra putrāc chiṣyād vā śikṣārthaṃ tāḍanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.062a: na brāhmaṇān parivaden nakṣatrāṇi na nirdiśet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.062c: tithiṃ pakṣasya na brūyāt tathāsyāyur na riṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.063a: kṛtvā mūtrapurīṣe tu rathyām ākramya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.064c: adṛṣṭam adbhir nirṇiktaṃ yac ca vācā praśasyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.065a: saṃyāvaṃ kṛsaraṃ māṃsaṃ śaṣkulī pāyasaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.065c: ātmārthaṃ na prakartavyaṃ devārthaṃ tu prakalpayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.066a: nityam agniṃ paricared bhikṣāṃ dadyāc ca nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.066c: vāgyato dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca nityam eva samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.066d-0492_01: dantakāṣṭhe ca saṃdhyāyāṃ malotsarge ca maunagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.066e: na cābhyuditaśāyī syāt prāyaścittī tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.066f-0494_01: na saṃdhyāyāṃ svapen nityaṃ snāyāc chuddhaḥ sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.067c: ācāryam atha vāpy enaṃ tathāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.068c: bhakṣayec chāstradṛṣṭāni parvasv api ca varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.069a: udaṅmukhaś ca satataṃ śaucaṃ kuryāt samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.070a: akṛtvā devatāpūjāṃ nānyaṃ gacchet kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.070c: anyatra tu guruṃ vṛddhaṃ dhārmikaṃ vā vicakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.071c: na cājñātāṃ striyaṃ gacched garbhiṇīṃ vā kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.071d-0497_02: anyathā tv avakīrṇaḥ syāt prāyaścittaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.071d-0497_03: nodīkṣet paradārāṃś ca rahasy ekāsano bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.071d-0497_04: indriyāṇi sadā yacchet svapne śuddhamanā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.072a: udakśirā na svapeta tathā pratyakśirā na ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.072c: prākśirās tu svaped vidvān atha vā dakṣiṇāśirāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.073a: na bhagne nāvadīrṇe vā śayane prasvapeta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.073c: nāntardhāne na saṃyukte na ca tiryak kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.073d-0498_01: na cāpi gacchet kāryeṇa samayād vāpi nāstike
GE07mbh_13_u:107.073d-0499_01: āsanaṃ tu padākṛṣya na prasajjet tathā naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.074a: na nagnaḥ karhi cit snāyān na niśāyāṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.074d-0500_01: tiryaṅ na ca śayen nityaṃ nāntardhānena saṃyutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.074d-0500_02: na niśāyāṃ punaḥ snāyād āpady agnidvijāntike
GE07mbh_13_u:107.074d-0500_03: snāne nirmālyakaṃ varjet snātvā nāṅgāni mārjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.075a: na cānulimped asnātvā snātvā vāso na nirdhunet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.075c: ārdra eva tu vāsāṃsi nityaṃ seveta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.075e: srajaś ca nāvakarṣeta na bahir dhārayeta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.076a: raktamālyaṃ na dhāryaṃ syāc chuklaṃ dhāryaṃ tu paṇḍitaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.076c: varjayitvā tu kamalaṃ tathā kuvalayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:107.077a: raktaṃ śirasi dhāryaṃ tu tathā vāneyam ity api
GE07mbh_13_u:107.077c: kāñcanī caiva yā mālā na sā duṣyati karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:107.077e: snātasya varṇakaṃ nityam ārdraṃ dadyād viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.078a: viparyayaṃ na kurvīta vāsaso buddhimān naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.078c: tathā nānyadhṛtaṃ dhāryaṃ na cāpadaśam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.079a: anyad eva bhaved vāsaḥ śayanīye narottama
GE07mbh_13_u:107.079c: anyad rathyāsu devānām arcāyām anyad eva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:107.081a: upavāsaṃ ca kurvīta snātaḥ śucir alaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.081b-0501_01: nopavāsaṃ vṛthā kuryād dhanaṃ nāpahared iha
GE07mbh_13_u:107.083a: na saṃnikṛṣṭo medhāvī nāśucir na ca satsu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.083c: pratiṣiddhān na dharmeṣu bhakṣān bhuñjīta pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.084a: pippalaṃ ca vaṭaṃ caiva śaṇaśākaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.084c: udumbaraṃ na khādec ca bhavārthī puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.085a: ājaṃ gavyaṃ ca yan māṃsaṃ māyūraṃ caiva varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.085c: varjayec chuṣkamāṃsaṃ ca tathā paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.085d-0503_01: śuṣkam annaṃ na bhuñjīta śūdrānnaṃ ca vivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.086a: na pāṇau lavaṇaṃ vidvān prāśnīyān na ca rātriṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:107.086c: dadhisaktūn na bhuñjīta vṛthāmāṃsaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.086d-0504_01: dadhisaktu na doṣāyāṃ piben madhu ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.087a: vālena tu na bhuñjīta paraśrāddhaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.087c: sāyaṃ prātaś ca bhuñjīta nāntarāle samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.088a: vāgyato naikavastraś ca nāsaṃviṣṭaḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.088c: bhūmau sadaiva nāśnīyān nānāsīno na śabdavat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.089c: paścād bhuñjīta medhāvī na cāpy anyamanā naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.090a: samānam ekapaṅktyāṃ tu bhojyam annaṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:107.090b-0505_01: niḥśabdena tu bhuñjīta mitraṃ bhuñjīta nāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.090b-0506_01: yo 'tithīnām adattvā ca bālānāṃ jaraṭhaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:107.091c: nirasya śeṣam eteṣāṃ na pradeyaṃ tu kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:107.092c: dadhi cāpy anupānaṃ vai na kartavyaṃ bhavārthinā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.094a: pāṇiṃ mūrdhni samādhāya spṛṣṭvā cāgniṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.095a: adbhiḥ prāṇān samālabhya nābhiṃ pāṇitalena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.095c: spṛśaṃś caiva pratiṣṭheta na cāpy ārdreṇa pāṇinā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.097a: aṅguṣṭhasya ca yan madhyaṃ pradeśinyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:107.097c: tena pitryāṇi kurvīta spṛṣṭvāpo nyāyatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.098a: parāpavādaṃ na brūyān nāpriyaṃ ca kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:107.098c: na manyuḥ kaś cid utpādyaḥ puruṣeṇa bhavārthinā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.099a: patitais tu kathāṃ necched darśanaṃ cāpi varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.099c: saṃsargaṃ ca na gaccheta tathāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.100a: na divā maithunaṃ gacchen na kanyāṃ na ca bandhakīm
GE07mbh_13_u:107.100c: na cāsnātāṃ striyaṃ gacchet tathāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.101a: sve sve tīrthe samācamya kārye samupakalpite
GE07mbh_13_u:107.101c: triḥ pītvāpo dviḥ pramṛjya kṛtaśauco bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.102a: indriyāṇi sakṛt spṛśya trir abhyukṣya ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.102c: kurvīta pitryaṃ daivaṃ ca vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.103a: brāhmaṇārthe ca yac chaucaṃ tac ca me śṛṇu kaurava
GE07mbh_13_u:107.103c: pravṛttaṃ ca hitaṃ coktvā bhojanādyantayos tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.104c: niṣṭhīvya tu tathā kṣutvā spṛśyāpo hi śucir bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.104d-0507_03: spṛśet karṇaṃ sapraṇavaṃ sūryam īkṣet sadā tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.105a: vṛddho jñātis tathā mitraṃ daridro yo bhaved api
GE07mbh_13_u:107.105b-0508_01: kulīnaḥ paṇḍita iti rakṣyā niḥsvāḥ svaśaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.105c: gṛhe vāsayitavyās te dhanyam āyuṣyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.106a: gṛhe pārāvatā dhanyāḥ śukāś ca sahasārikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.106b-0509_02: śuddhaṃ jalaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca rajataṃ gṛhamaṅgalam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.106c: gṛheṣv ete na pāpāya tathā vai tailapāyikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.107a: uddīpakāś ca gṛdhrāś ca kapotā bhramarās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.107c: niviśeyur yadā tatra śāntim eva tadācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.108c: mahātmanāṃ ca guhyāni na vaktavyāni karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:107.109a: agamyāś ca na gaccheta rājapatnīḥ sakhīs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.110a: bandhūnāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tathā śāraṇikasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.110c: saṃbandhināṃ ca rājendra tathāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.111c: tad āvaset sadā prājño bhavārthī manujeśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:107.112a: saṃdhyāyāṃ na svaped rājan vidyāṃ na ca samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.112c: na bhuñjīta ca medhāvī tathāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.113a: naktaṃ na kuryāt pitryāṇi bhuktvā caiva prasādhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.113c: pānīyasya kriyā naktaṃ na kāryā bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.114a: varjanīyāś ca vai nityaṃ saktavo niśi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:107.115a: sauhityaṃ ca na kartavyaṃ rātrau naiva samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.115b-0510_01: na bhuktvā maithunaṃ gacchen na dhāven nātihāsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.115c: dvijacchedaṃ na kurvīta bhuktvā na ca samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.116c: vayaḥsthāṃ ca mahāprājña kanyām āvoḍhum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:107.117a: apatyam utpādya tataḥ pratiṣṭhāpya kulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.118c: putrā niveśyāś ca kulād bhṛtyā labhyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:107.119a: śiraḥsnāto 'tha kurvīta daivaṃ pitryam athāpi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.119c: nakṣatre na ca kurvīta yasmiñ jāto bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.119e: na proṣṭhapadayoḥ kāryaṃ tathāgneye ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:107.120a: dāruṇeṣu ca sarveṣu pratyahaṃ ca vivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.120c: jyotiṣe yāni coktāni tāni sarvāṇi varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.121c: udaṅmukho vā rājendra tathāyur vindate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.122a: parivādaṃ na ca brūyāt pareṣām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.123a: varjayed vyaṅginīṃ nārīṃ tathā kanyāṃ narottama
GE07mbh_13_u:107.123c: samārṣāṃ vyaṅgitāṃ caiva mātuḥ svakulajāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.124a: vṛddhāṃ pravrajitāṃ caiva tathaiva ca pativratām
GE07mbh_13_u:107.125a: ayoniṃ ca viyoniṃ ca na gaccheta vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.125c: piṅgalāṃ kuṣṭhinīṃ nārīṃ na tvam āvoḍhum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:107.126c: śvitriṇāṃ ca kule jātāṃ trayāṇāṃ manujeśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:107.126d-0513_01: varjayed atiduṣṭāṃ ca vyādhinīṃ vyaṅgikāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.127a: lakṣaṇair anvitā yā ca praśastā yā ca lakṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.127c: manojñā darśanīyā ca tāṃ bhavān voḍhum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:107.128c: avarā patitā caiva na grāhyā bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.129a: agnīn utpādya yatnena kriyāḥ suvihitāś ca yāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.129c: vedeṣu brāhmaṇaiḥ proktās tāś ca sarvāḥ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.130a: na cerṣyā strīṣu kartavyā dārā rakṣyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.130c: anāyuṣyā bhaved īrṣyā tasmād īrṣyāṃ vivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.131c: prātar niśāyāṃ ca tathā ye cocchiṣṭāḥ svapanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:107.132c: yatnato vai na kartavyam abhyāsaś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:107.132d-0514_01: yatno vai bhojane kāryo atyāśaṃ ca vivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.133a: saṃdhyāṃ na bhuñjen na snāyān na purīṣaṃ samutsṛjet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.133b-0515_01: ātmānaṃ śuci manyeta brāhmaṇān na ca paspaśet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.133b-0515_02: taṃ brūyād brāhmaṇaghnaṃ ca tasya cāyur vinaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:107.133b-0515_03: brāhmaṇā hi sadā pūjyā nareṇa bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.133c: prayataś ca bhavet tasyāṃ na ca kiṃ cit samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:107.134a: brāhmaṇān pūjayec cāpi tathā snātvā narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:107.134b-0516_01: samāvṛttaḥ śucīn viprān devān atha gurūn namet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.134b-0516_02: kuryād vyāhṛtihomādīn arghyārhaś ca sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.134c: devāṃś ca praṇamet snāto gurūṃś cāpy abhivādayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.135a: animantrito na gaccheta yajñaṃ gacchet tu darśakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.135c: animantrite hy anāyuṣyaṃ gamanaṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:107.136a: na caikena parivrājyaṃ na gantavyaṃ tathā niśi
GE07mbh_13_u:107.136b-0517_02: ekoddiṣṭaṃ na bhuñjīta prathamaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.137a: mātuḥ pitur gurūṇāṃ ca kāryam evānuśāsanam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.137c: hitaṃ vāpy ahitaṃ vāpi na vicāryaṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:107.138a: dhanurvede ca vede ca yatnaḥ kāryo narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:107.138e: yatnavān bhava rājendra yatnavān sukham edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.139a: apradhṛṣyaś ca śatrūṇāṃ bhṛtyānāṃ svajanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.139c: prajāpālanayuktaś ca na kṣatiṃ labhate kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:107.140a: yuktiśāstraṃ ca te jñeyaṃ śabdaśāstraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:107.141a: purāṇam itihāsāś ca tathākhyānāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:107.141c: mahātmanāṃ ca caritaṃ śrotavyaṃ nityam eva te
GE07mbh_13_u:107.141d-0519_01: mānyānāṃ mānanaṃ kuryān nindyānāṃ nindanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:107.141d-0519_03: na strīṣu sajjed draṣṭavyaṃ śaktyā dānarucir bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.141d-0519_04: na brāhmaṇān paribhavet kārpaṇyaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.142a: patnīṃ rajasvalāṃ caiva nābhigacchen na cāhvayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.142c: snātāṃ caturthe divase rātrau gacched vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.143a: pañcame divase nārī ṣaṣṭhe 'hani pumān bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.143d-0520_01: ā ṣoḍaśād ṛtur mukhyaḥ putrajanmani śabditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:107.146c: ācārād vardhate hy āyur ācāro hanty alakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:107.147a: āgamānāṃ hi sarveṣām ācāraḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:107.148a: etad yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:107.148d-0521_01: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cāpi parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_13_u:107.148d-0521_02: sa śubhān prāpnuyāl lokān sadācāraparo nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:108.001c: kaniṣṭhāś ca yathā jyeṣṭhe varteraṃs tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:108.002a: jyeṣṭhavat tāta vartasva jyeṣṭho hi satataṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:108.002c: guror garīyasī vṛttir yā cec chiṣyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:108.003a: na gurāv akṛtaprajñe śakyaṃ śiṣyeṇa vartitum
GE07mbh_13_u:108.003c: guror hi dīrghadarśitvaṃ yat tac chiṣyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:108.004a: andhaḥ syād andhavelāyāṃ jaḍaḥ syād api vā budhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.004c: parihāreṇa tad brūyād yas teṣāṃ syād vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.005d-0522_01: śriyābhitaptās tadbhedān na bhinnāḥ syuḥ samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.006a: jyeṣṭhaḥ kulaṃ vardhayati vināśayati vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.006c: hanti sarvam api jyeṣṭhaḥ kulaṃ yatrāvajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:108.007a: atha yo vinikurvīta jyeṣṭho bhrātā yavīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.007c: ajyeṣṭhaḥ syād abhāgaś ca niyamyo rājabhiś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.008a: nikṛtī hi naro lokān pāpān gacchaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:108.008c: vidulasyeva tat puṣpaṃ moghaṃ janayituḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:108.009c: akīrtiṃ janayaty eva kīrtim antardadhāti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:108.010a: sarve cāpi vikarmasthā bhāgaṃ nārhanti sodarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.010b-0523_01: jyeṣṭho 'pi durvinītas tu kaniṣṭhas tu viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.011c: svayam īhitalabdhaṃ tu nākāmo dātum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:108.012a: bhrātṝṇām avibhaktānām utthānam api cet saha
GE07mbh_13_u:108.012c: na putrabhāgaṃ viṣamaṃ pitā dadyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:108.013a: na jyeṣṭhān avamanyeta duṣkṛtaḥ sukṛto 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:108.013b-0524_01: gurūṇām aparādho hi śakyaḥ kṣantavya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:108.013c: yadi strī yady avarajaḥ śreyaḥ paśyet tathācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:108.013e: dharmaṃ hi śreya ity āhur iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.013f-0525_01: same tu jyeṣṭhatantrāḥ syuḥ kiṃ cid ūne 'pi nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.014c: daśa caiva pitṝn mātā sarvāṃ vā pṛthivīm api
GE07mbh_13_u:108.015c: mātā garīyasī yac ca tenaitāṃ manyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:108.016a: jyeṣṭho bhrātā pitṛsamo mṛte pitari bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:108.016c: sa hy eṣāṃ vṛttidātā syāt sa caitān paripālayet
GE07mbh_13_u:108.017c: tam eva copajīveran yathaiva pitaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:108.018a: śarīram etau sṛjataḥ pitā mātā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:108.018c: ācāryaśāstā yā jātiḥ sā satyā sājarāmarā
GE07mbh_13_u:108.019c: bhrātur bhāryā ca tadvat syād yasyā bālye stanaṃ pibet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.001a: sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ mlecchānāṃ ca pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:109.001c: upavāse matir iyaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca na vidmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:109.002a: brahmakṣatreṇa niyamāś cartavyā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:109.002c: upavāse kathaṃ teṣāṃ kṛtyam asti pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:109.005a: adharmān mucyate kena dharmam āpnoti vai katham
GE07mbh_13_u:109.005c: svargaṃ puṇyaṃ ca labhate kathaṃ bharatasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:109.006a: upoṣya cāpi kiṃ tena pradeyaṃ syān narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:109.006c: dharmeṇa ca sukhān arthāṃl labhed yena bravīhi tam
GE07mbh_13_u:109.008a: idaṃ khalu mahārāja śrutam āsīt purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:109.009a: prājāpatyaṃ hy aṅgirasaṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:109.009c: yathā māṃ tvaṃ tathaivāhaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃs taṃ tapodhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:109.010a: praśnam etaṃ mayā pṛṣṭo bhagavān agnisaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.012a: vaiśyaśūdrau tu yau mohād upavāsaṃ prakurvate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.012c: trirātraṃ dvistrirātraṃ vā tayoḥ puṣṭir na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.013c: trirātraṃ na tu dharmajñair vihitaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.014a: pañcamyāṃ caiva ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:109.015a: nānapatyo bhavet prājño daridro vā kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:109.015c: yajiṣṇuḥ pañcamīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ kṣaped yo bhojayed dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:109.017a: mārgaśīrṣaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena saṃkṣipet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.017c: bhojayec ca dvijān bhaktyā sa mucyed vyādhikilbiṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.019a: pauṣamāsaṃ tu kaunteya bhaktenaikena yaḥ kṣapet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.019c: subhago darśanīyaś ca yaśobhāgī ca jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.021a: bhagadaivaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.021c: strīṣu vallabhatāṃ yāti vaśyāś cāsya bhavanti tāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.022a: caitraṃ tu niyato māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.023c: naro vā yadi vā nārī jñātīnāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.024a: jyeṣṭhāmūlaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena saṃkṣapet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.024c: aiśvaryam atulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pumān strī vābhijāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.026a: śrāvaṇaṃ niyato māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.026d-0528_01: dhanavān kīrtimāṃś caiva kule mahati jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.027a: prauṣṭhapadaṃ tu yo māsam ekāhāro bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.028c: prajāvān vāhanāḍhyaś ca bahuputraś ca jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.029a: kārttikaṃ tu naro māsaṃ yaḥ kuryād ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:109.029c: śūraś ca bahubhāryaś ca kīrtimāṃś caiva jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.030c: tithīnāṃ niyamā ye tu śṛṇu tān api pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:109.031a: pakṣe pakṣe gate yas tu bhaktam aśnāti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:109.031c: gavāḍhyo bahuputraś ca dīrghāyuś ca sa jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.032a: māsi māsi trirātrāṇi kṛtvā varṣāṇi dvādaśa
GE07mbh_13_u:109.033a: ete tu niyamāḥ sarve kartavyāḥ śarado daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:109.034a: yas tu prātas tathā sāyaṃ bhuñjāno nāntarā pibet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.035a: ṣaḍbhiḥ sa varṣair nṛpate sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.038a: yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇam ekāhāro bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.040a: yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ caturthaṃ bhaktam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:109.042a: ṣaṣṭhe kāle tu kaunteya naraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ kṣapet
GE07mbh_13_u:109.044a: aṣṭamena tu bhaktena jīvan saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:109.046a: pakṣe pakṣe gate rājan yo 'śnīyād varṣam eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:109.046e: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divam āvasate ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.047a: vīṇānāṃ vallakīnāṃ ca veṇūnāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.047c: sughoṣair madhuraiḥ śabdaiḥ suptaḥ sa pratibodhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.048a: saṃvatsaram ihaikaṃ tu māsi māsi pibet payaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.048c: phalaṃ viśvajitas tāta prāpnoti sa naro nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:109.049c: saptatiṃ ca sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.050c: vidhiṃ tv anaśanasyāhuḥ pārtha dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.051a: anārto vyādhirahito gacched anaśanaṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.051c: pade pade yajñaphalaṃ sa prāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.052c: śataṃ cāpsarasaḥ kanyā ramayanty api taṃ naram
GE07mbh_13_u:109.053a: ārto vā vyādhito vāpi gacched anaśanaṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.053c: śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ modate divi sa prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:109.056d-0530_01: na caitad rocate teṣāṃ ye dhanaiḥ sukhamedhinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.058c: anaśnan deham utsṛjya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.061c: tāvanty eva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.062a: nāsti vedāt paraṃ śāstraṃ nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.062c: na dharmāt paramo lābhas tapo nānaśanāt param
GE07mbh_13_u:109.063a: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti pāvanaṃ divi ceha ca
GE07mbh_13_u:109.063c: upavāsais tathā tulyaṃ tapaḥkarma na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:109.064c: ṛṣayaś ca parāṃ siddhim upavāsair avāpnuvan
GE07mbh_13_u:109.065c: kṣāntam ekena bhaktena tena vipratvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.066a: cyavano jamadagniś ca vasiṣṭho gautamo bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.066c: sarva eva divaṃ prāptāḥ kṣamāvanto maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.067c: yaḥ pradarśayate nityaṃ na sa duḥkham avāpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:109.068a: imaṃ tu kaunteya yathākramaṃ vidhiṃ; pravartitaṃ hy aṅgirasā maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:109.068c: paṭheta yo vai śṛṇuyāc ca nityadā; na vidyate tasya narasya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:109.069a: vimucyate cāpi sa sarvasaṃkarair; na cāsya doṣair abhibhūyate manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:109.069c: viyonijānāṃ ca vijānate rutaṃ; dhruvāṃ ca kīrtiṃ labhate narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.001c: guṇāś caiṣāṃ yathātattvaṃ pretya ceha ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.002a: na te śakyā daridreṇa yajñāḥ prāptuṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.003a: pārthivai rājaputrair vā śakyāḥ prāptuṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.004a: yo daridrair api vidhiḥ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.004c: tulyo yajñaphalair etais tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.005c: vidhiṃ yajñaphalais tulyaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:110.006a: yas tu kalyaṃ tathā sāyaṃ bhuñjāno nāntarā pibet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.007a: ṣaḍbhir eva tu varṣaiḥ sa sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.009a: trīṇi varṣāṇi yaḥ prāśet satataṃ tv ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.010a: dvitīye divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.011c: kṣānto dānto jitakrodhaḥ sa gacchati parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:110.012c: dve samāpte tataḥ padme so 'psarobhir vaset saha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.013a: tṛtīye divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.015a: saptarṣīṇāṃ sadā loke so 'psarobhir vaset saha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.015c: nivartanaṃ ca tatrāsya trīṇi padmāni vai viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.016a: divase yaś caturthe tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.018a: sāgarasya ca paryante vāsavaṃ lokam āvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:110.019a: divase pañcame yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.023a: divase yas tu ṣaṣṭhe vai muniḥ prāśeta bhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.027c: padmāny aṣṭādaśa tathā patāke dve tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.029a: divase saptame yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.031a: puruṣo marutāṃ lokam indralokaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.031c: tatra tatra ca siddhārtho devakanyābhir uhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.032c: saṃkhyām atiguṇāṃ cāpi teṣu lokeṣu modate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.033a: yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ kṣānto bhuṅkte 'hany aṣṭame naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.035a: kṛṣṇāḥ kanakagauryaś ca nāryaḥ śyāmās tathāparāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.036a: yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ bhuṅkte navame navame 'hani
GE07mbh_13_u:110.040a: yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ bhuṅkte daśāhe vai gate gate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.042a: rūpavatyaś ca taṃ kanyā ramayanti sadā naram
GE07mbh_13_u:110.045a: ekādaśe tu divase yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.046c: anṛtaṃ ca na bhāṣeta mātāpitroḥ kṛte 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.048c: rudrāṇāṃ tam adhīvāsaṃ divi divyaṃ manoharam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.050c: sa tasmai darśanaṃ prāpto divase divase bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.051a: divase dvādaśe yas tu prāpte vai prāśate haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.054e: ṛṣir evaṃ mahābhāgas tv aṅgirāḥ prāha dharmavit
GE07mbh_13_u:110.055a: trayodaśe tu divase yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.055c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai devasatraphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.058a: tatra śaṅkupatākaṃ ca yugāntaṃ kalpam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.058c: ayutāyutaṃ tathā padmaṃ samudraṃ ca tathā vaset
GE07mbh_13_u:110.060a: caturdaśe tu divase yaḥ pūrṇe prāśate haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.060c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai mahāmedhaphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.062c: kāñcīnāṃ ca samutkarṣais tatra tatra vibodhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.064a: yas tu pakṣe gate bhuṅkte ekabhaktaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.064c: sadā dādaśa māsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.068a: ṣoḍaśe divase yas tu saṃprāpte prāśate haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.068c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai somayajñaphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.070c: arcyate vai vimānasthaḥ kāmabhogaiś ca sevyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.071c: āvartanāni catvāri sāgare yāty asau naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.072a: divase saptadaśame yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.072c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.073a: sthānaṃ vāruṇam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ caivādhigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.074c: bhūr bhuvaṃ cāpi devarṣiṃ viśvarūpam avekṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.076a: candrādityāv ubhau yāvad gagane carataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:110.077c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai sapta lokān sa paśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.079c: vimānam uttamaṃ divyaṃ susukhī hy adhirohati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.080a: tatra kalpasahasraṃ sa kāntābhiḥ saha modate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.081c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai sapta lokān sa paśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.084a: pūrṇe 'tha divase viṃśe yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.084c: sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu satyavādī dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.085c: sa lokān vipulān divyān ādityānām upāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:110.087a: ekaviṃśe tu divase yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.087c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.088a: lokam auśanasaṃ divyaṃ śakralokaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.088c: aśvinor marutāṃ caiva sukheṣv abhirataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.090a: dvāviṃśe divase prāpte yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.090c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.093a: trayoviṃśe tu divase prāśed yas tv ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.093c: sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu mitāhāro jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.094a: vāyor uśanasaś caiva rudralokaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.096a: caturviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.096c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.099a: pañcaviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.099c: sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu puṣkalaṃ yānam āruhet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.103a: ṣaḍviṃśe divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.103c: sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu niyato niyatāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.105a: saptānāṃ marutāṃ lokān vasūnāṃ cāpi so 'śnute
GE07mbh_13_u:110.106c: dve yugānāṃ sahasre tu divye divyena tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.107a: saptaviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.107c: sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.108a: phalaṃ prāpnoti vipulaṃ devaloke ca pūjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.108c: amṛtāśī vasaṃs tatra sa vitṛptaḥ pramodate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.111c: sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu jitātmā vijitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.113a: sukumāryaś ca nāryas taṃ ramamāṇāḥ suvarcasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.120a: vasūnāṃ marutāṃ caiva sādhyānām aśvinos tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.120c: rudrāṇāṃ ca tathā lokān brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.121a: yas tu māse gate bhuṅkte ekabhaktaṃ śamātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.121c: sadā dvādaśa māsān vai brahmalokam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:110.122c: tejasā vapuṣā lakṣmyā bhrājate raśmivān iva
GE07mbh_13_u:110.130a: māsopavāsī varṣais tu daśabhiḥ svargam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.132a: bahubhir niyamair evaṃ māsān aśnāti yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.133a: divaṃ gatvā śarīreṇa svena rājan yathāmaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.134a: eṣa te bharataśreṣṭha yajñānāṃ vidhir uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.135a: daridrair manujaiḥ pārtha prāpyaṃ yajñaphalaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.135c: upavāsam imaṃ kṛtvā gacchec ca paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:110.135d-0538_01: vaiṣṇavīṃ vātha raudrīṃ vā pañcamīṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137c: acaleṣv aprakampeṣu mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0002: mayā śrutā ṛṣīṇāṃ tu saṃnidhau keśavasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0003: punaḥ kautūhalam abhūt tām evādhyātmikīṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0004: kathāṃ kathaya rājendra tvad anyaḥ ka udāharet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0006: jñāte tu yasmiñ jñātavyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0007: paścāc chroṣyāmahe rājñāṃ śrāvyān dharmān pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0008: kautūhalam ṛṣīṇāṃ tu cchettum arhasi sāṃpratam bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0010_0: ata ūrdhvaṃ mahārāja sāṃkhyayogobhayaśāstrādhigatayāthātmyadarśanasaṃpannayor ācāryayoḥ saṃvādam anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ tad yathābhagavantaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0010_1: sanatkumāram āsīnam aṅguṣṭhaparvamātraṃ mahati vimānavare | yojanasahasramaṇḍale taruṇabhāskarapratīkāśe śayanīye mahati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0010_2: baddhāsanam anudhyāyantam amṛtam anāvartakaram amūrtam akṣayajam athopadiṣṭam upasasarpa bhagavantam ācāryaṃ bhagavān ācāryo
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0010_3: rudras taṃ provāca - svāgataṃ maheśvara brahmasuta | etad āsanam āstāṃ bhagavān || ity ukte cāsīno bhagavān anantarūpo rudras
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0010_4: taṃ provāca - bhagavān api dhyānam āvartayati | ity ukte cāha bhagavān sanatkumāras tatheti ||
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0012: tathety uktaś ca provāca bhagavāñ śaṃkaras tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0014: kiṃ vā dhyānena draṣṭavyaṃ yad bhavān anupaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0015: yac ca dhyātvā na śocanti yatayas tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0016: kathaya tvam imaṃ devaṃ dehināṃ yatisattama
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0017: yac ca tatpuruṣaṃ śuddham ity uktaṃ yogasāṃkhyayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0018: kim adhyātmādhibhūtaṃ ca tathā cāpy adhidaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0019: kālasaṃkhyā ca kā deva draṣṭavyā tasya brahmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0022: yac ca tatpuruṣaṃ śuddhaṃ prabuddham ajaraṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0024: vimokṣaṃ trividhaṃ caiva brūhi mokṣavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0025: parisaṃkhyāṃ ca sāṃkhyānāṃ dhyānaṃ yogeṣu cārthavat
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0031: śreṣṭho bhavān hi sarveṣāṃ brahmajñānām anindita
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0032: caturthas tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ tu ye gatāḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0034: vayaṃ tu vaikṛtaṃ mārgam āśritā vai kṣaraṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0035: param utsṛjya panthānam amṛtākṣaram eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0036: nyūne pathi nimagnās tu aiśvarye 'ṣṭaguṇe tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0038: na caitat sukham atyantaṃ nyūnam etad anantaram
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0039: mūrtimat param etat syāt tv idam evaṃ susattama
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0040: punaḥ punaś ca patanaṃ mūrtimaty upadiśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0041: na punar mṛtyur ity anyaṃ nirmuktānāṃ tu mūrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0042: mṛtyudoṣās tv anantā vai utpadyante kṛtātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0045: sukhaduḥkhavyapetaṃ ca yad āhur amṛtaṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0046: tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi yathāvac chrutidarśanāt sanatkumāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0047: yad uktaṃ bhavatā vākyaṃ tattvasaṃjñeti dehinām
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0048: caturviṃśatim evātra ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0050: vayaṃ tu pañcaviṃśaṃ vai tad adhiṣṭhānasaṃjñitam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0052: avyayaś caiva vai vyaktāv ubhāv api pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0053: saha caiva vinā caiva tāv anyonyaṃ pratiṣṭhitau
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0056: avyaktād eka evaiṣa mahān ātmā prasūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0057: ahaṃkāreṇa lokāṃś ca vyāpya cāhaṃkṛtena vai
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0058: vinā sarvaṃ tad avyaktād abhimanyasva śūladhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0059: bhūtasargam ahaṃkārāt tṛtīyaṃ viddhi vai kramāt
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0060: ahaṃkārāc ca bhūteṣu caturthaṃ viddhi vaikṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0064: ete sargā mayā proktāś catvāraḥ prākṛtās tv iha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0067: indriyair yugapat sarvaiḥ so 'nityaś ca samīkṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0068: maruttvaṃ sattvasargaś ca tuṣṭiḥ siddhis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0073: aindre 'py aham athāpy anyan mamātmani ca bhāsvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0074: yac ca dehamayaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0076: anyathā ye tu paśyanti te na paśyanti brahmaja
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0079: vikāramātram etat tu tattvam ācakṣate param
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0080: nistattvaś caiṣa deveśa boddhavyaṃ tu na budhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0081: yadi budhyet paraṃ buddhaṃ budhyamānaḥ surarṣabha sanatkumāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0082: prabuddho hy abhimanyeta yo 'yaṃ nāham iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0083: tattvasaṃkhyā śrutā caiṣā yeṣāṃ brahmavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0107: pralīyate jale bhūmir jalam agnau pralīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0108: līyate 'gnis tathā vāyau vāyur ākāśa eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0109: manasi pralīyate khaṃ tu mano 'haṃkāra eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0111: mahān avyakta ity āhus tad ekatvaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0113: evam asyāsakṛt krīḍām āhus tattvavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0115: yathāvad uditaṃ śāstraṃ yoge tu sumahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0119: prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tatra karma ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0120: adhyātmaṃ prāṇam ity āhuḥ kratum apy adhidaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0121: rathaṃ ca yajñavāho 'tra karmāhaṃkāra eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0122: adhyātmaṃ tu mano vidyāc candramāś cādhidaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0123: daivaṃ ca prabhavaś caiva karma vyāhṛtayas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0124: vidyāt tu śrotram adhyātmam ākāśam adhidaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0126: tvag adhyātmam atho vidyād vāyur atrādhidaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0127: saṃnipātaya vijñānaṃ sarvakarma ca tatra ha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0129: jñāpanaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ rūpaṃ karma sadā smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0131: pāyur adhyātmam ity āhur yathāvad yatisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0132: visargam adhibhūtaṃ ca mitraṃ cāpy adhidaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0135: pādāv adhyātmam ity āhus triśūlāṅka manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0140: mayā tu varṇitaṃ samyag dehinām amararṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0141: etat kīṭapataṃge ca śvapāke śuni hastini
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0143: sarvam eva hi draṣṭavyam anyathā mā vicintaya
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0144: ato 'nyathā ye paśyanti na samyak teṣu darśanam devadānavagandharvayakṣarākṣasakiṃnarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0146: yan na jānanti ko hy eṣa kuto vā bhagavān iti
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0147: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma yat tat sadasataḥ param
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0153: anādyantaṃ paraṃ brahma na devā ṛṣayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0154: eko 'yaṃ veda bhagavāṃs trātā nārāyaṇo hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0156: devā devarṣayaś caiva yaṃ vidur duḥkhabheṣajam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0157: yam āhur vijitakleśaṃ yasmiṃś ca vihitāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0158: yasmiṃl lokāḥ sphurantīme jāle śakunayo yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0159: saptarṣayo manaḥ sapta sāṃkhyās tu munidarśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0161: śrotrayoś ca diśaḥ prāhur manasi tv atha candramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0162: manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ buddhiḥ saptamī hy ātmani sthāpitāni, śarīreṣu nātmani |
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0163: tasya hi kāraṇāni bhavanti | sarvāṇy api sarvakarmasu vā viṣayeṣu vā yuñjanti yathātmani svāni karmāṇi pravṛttāni | saptasv api viṣayāṇāṃ vyāpakāni |
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0164: tāny eva svapato bhūtagrāmasyājam ātmānaṃ devalokasthānasaṃmitaṃ dehāntaragāminaṃ mumukṣuṃ vānupraviśanti sūkṣmāṇi pralīyante |
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0165: mokṣakāle tam ekaṃ na kaś cid vetti svāparam |
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0166_0: evaṃ praviṣṭeṣu bhūteṣu ko jāgartīty ucyate | nidrāprasupteṣu vātra jāgrat svapnaśīlo 'tra sadane ca devadyotano bhagavāṃś
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0166_1: cātra kṣetrajño buddhir vā | sa hi suptasyāpi svapnadarśanāni paśyati |
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0167: apratibuddheṣu lokeṣu sa eva pratibudhyate | sanatkumāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0168: sa eṣa prājñaḥ | atha taijasaḥ kāyāgniḥ | sa hi suptasyātmā vā | aviduṣo vāpratibudhyamānasyānnaṃ pacatīty ante 'vatiṣṭhate | etad ātmānam adhikṛtyānujñātam iti |
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0172: yāny āśritāni deheṣu yāni pṛcchasi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0173: vācy agnis tv atha jihvāyāṃ somaḥ prāṇe tu mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0174: rūpe cāpy atha nakṣatraṃ jihvāyāṃ cāpa eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0175: nābhyāṃ samudraś ca vibhur nakharoma tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0178: udāne vidyud abhavad vyāne parjanya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0179: stanayor eva cākāśaṃ bale cendras tathābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0180: matāv apy atha ceśānas tv apāne rudra eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0181: gandharvāpsaraso vyāne satye mitraś ca śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0182: prajñāyāṃ varuṇaś caiva cakṣuṣy āditya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0183: śarīre pṛthivī caiva pādayor viṣṇur eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0185: mūrdhni caiva diśaḥ prāhur buddhau brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0187: abuddhaś cābhavat tasmād budhyamānān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0188: ābhyām anyaḥ paro buddho vedavādeṣu śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0192: so 'tra yogī bhavaty eva ya evam anupaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0194: mukhe juhoti yo nityaṃ kṛtsnaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0196: sarvebhyaḥ paramebhyo vai daivatebhyo hy ātmayājinā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0197: gantavyaṃ param ākāṅkṣan param eva vicintayan
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0202: nābhyā ca vāruṇaṃ sthānaṃ stanābhyāṃ tu bhuvo labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0203: bāhubhyāṃ vāsavaṃ sthānaṃ śrotrābhyām āpnuyād diśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0204: ādityaṃ cakṣuṣā sthānaṃ mūrdhnā brahmaṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0205: atha mūrdhasu yaḥ prāṇān dhārayeta samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0206: buddhyā mānam avāpnoti dravyāvasthaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0208: tam āhuḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ yad yad āpnoti buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0211: vikārapuruṣas tv eṣa budhyamāna iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0213: sa eṣa prakṛtisthatvāt tasthur ity upadiśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0218: so 'haṃ so 'ham ato nityād ajñānād iti manyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0219: yadi budhyati caivāyaṃ manyeyam iti bhāsvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0220: na prabuddho na varteta pānīyaṃ matsyako yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0222: yogakṛtyaṃ tu tāvan me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0223: śūnyāgāreṣv araṇyeṣu sāgare vā guhāsu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0224: viṣṭambhayitvā trīn daṇḍān avāpto hy advayo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0228: yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathā tad brahma dhārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0233: manas tathaiva saṃgṛhya buddhyā buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0235: nirudhya sarvasaṃkalpāṃs tato vai sthiratāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0236: ekāgras tad vijānīyāt sarvaṃ guhyatamaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0238: ūrdhvam eva na tiryak ca tathaiva bhrāmyate manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0240: mano bhavati deveśa pāṣāṇam iva niścalam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0241: sa nirjane vinirghoṣe saghoṣe cāvasañ jane
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0242: yukto yo na vikampeta yogī yogavidhiḥ śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0243: tataḥ paśyati tad brahma jvalad ātmani saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0244: vidyud ambudhare yadvat tadvad ekam anāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0248: mahad bhūtam anantaṃ ca svatantraṃ vigatajvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0251: viśvataḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0253: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatayas tāta na śocanti gatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0255: aṇimā laghimā bhūmā prāptiḥ prākāmyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0257: etad aṣṭaguṇaṃ yogaṃ yogānām abhitaḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0261: etat tattvam anādyantaṃ yad bhavān anupṛcchati
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0265: tattvataḥ param astīti ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0266: ke cid āhuḥ paraṃ nāsti ye jñānaphalam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0267: jñānasthaḥ puruṣas tv eṣa vikṛtaḥ svena varṇitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0269: tam eva puruṣaṃ devaṃ ke cid eva maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0270: nityam anyatamāḥ prāhur jñānaṃ paramakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0271: jñānam eva vinirmuktāḥ sāṃkhyā gacchanti kevalam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0273: uktam etāvad etat te yogadarśanam uttamam sanatkumāraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0275: indriyebhyo manaḥ pūrvam ahaṃkāras tataḥ param
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0276: ahaṃkārāt parā buddhir buddheḥ parataraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0277: mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0280: manas tathā viśeṣāś ca daśa caivendriyāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0286: samutpāṭya yathāvyaktāj jīvā yānti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0287: ādir eṣa mahān ātmā guṇānām iti naḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0288: guṇasthatvād guṇaṃ tv enam āhur avyaktalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0294: draṣṭā bhavaty abhoktā ca sattvamūrtiś ca nirguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0296: upekṣakaḥ śucis tābhyām ubhābhyām ayutas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0297: budhyamāno na budhyeta buddham evaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0299: so 'ham eva na me 'nyo 'sti ya evam abhimanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0300: na manyate mamānyo 'sti yena ceto 'smy acetanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0302: aham eva na me 'nyo 'sti na prabuddhavaśānugaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0306: kṣetraṃ praviśya durbuddhir budhyamāno hy anātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0307: aham eva sṛjaty anyaṃ dvitīyaṃ lokasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0311: tathaiva yajñe bhūteṣu viṣayārthī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0312: indriyaiḥ saha śūlāṅka pañcapañcabhir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0313: mano veda na cātmānam ahaṃkāraṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0314: na veda vāpy ahaṃkāro buddhiṃ buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0319: saṃsaktatvāj jagat kṛtsnam avyaktasya hṛdi sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0321: punar ātmā vijayate bahavo nirguṇās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0323: yadi hy eṣo nu manyeta mamāsti parato 'paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0324: sa punaḥ punar ātmānaṃ na kuryād ākṣipeta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0328: guṇān punaś ca tān eva so ''tmanātmani nikṣipet
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0330: budhyamāno hy abuddhasya buddhas tad anubhujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0332: ṣaḍviṃśo bhagavān āste buddhaḥ śuddho nirāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0333: avyaktādi viśeṣāntam etad vaidyā vadanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0334: etair eva vihīnaṃ tu ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0335: nistattvaṃ budhyamānās tu ke cid āhur mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0336: ke cid āhur mahātmānas tattvasaṃjñitam eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0337: tattvasya śravaṇād enaṃ tattvam eva vadanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0340: avyakto bhavate vyaktau sattvaṃ sattvaṃ tathā guṇau
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0342: ya evam anubudhyante yogasāṃkhyāś ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0344: teṣām evaṃ tu vadatāṃ śāstrārthaṃ sūkṣmadarśinām
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0346: vidyā tu sarvavidyānām avabodha iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0347: yena vidyām avidyāṃ ca vindanti yatisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0348: saiṣā trayī parā vidyā caturthy ānvīkṣikī smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0349: yāṃ budhyamāno budhyeta buddhyātmani samaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:110.137d-011_0352: etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam
