GE07mbh_13_u:112.042c: brahmarakṣas tu trīn māsāṃs tato jāyati brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.043c: tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.044a: kṛmibhāvāt pramuktas tu tato jāyati gardabhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.044c: gardabhaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi sūkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.044d-0545_01: kukkuṭaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi jambukaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.044e: śvā varṣam ekaṃ bhavati tato jāyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.045a: upādhyāyasya yaḥ pāpaṃ śiṣyaḥ kuryād abuddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:112.045c: sa jīva iha saṃsārāṃs trīn āpnoti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.046a: prāk śvā bhavati rājendra tataḥ kravyāt tataḥ kharaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.046c: tataḥ pretaḥ parikliṣṭaḥ paścāj jāyati brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.047a: manasāpi guror bhāryāṃ yaḥ śiṣyo yāti pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:112.048a: śvayonau tu sa saṃbhūtas trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:112.049a: kṛmibhāvam anuprāpto varṣam ekaṃ sa jīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:112.049c: tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya brahmayonau prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.050a: yadi putrasamaṃ śiṣyaṃ gurur hanyād akāraṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:112.051a: pitaraṃ mātaraṃ vāpi yas tu putro 'vamanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.051c: so 'pi rājan mṛto jantuḥ pūrvaṃ jāyati gardabhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.051d-0546_01: gardabhatvaṃ tu saṃprāpya daśa varṣāṇi jīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:112.051d-0546_02: saṃvatsaraṃ tu kumbhīras tato jāyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.051d-0546_03: putrasya mātāpitarau yasya ruṣṭāv ubhāv api
GE07mbh_13_u:112.052a: kharo jīvati māsāṃs tu daśa śvā ca caturdaśa
GE07mbh_13_u:112.052c: biḍālaḥ sapta māsāṃs tu tato jāyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.053c: tāḍayitvā tu tāv eva jāyate kacchapo nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:112.054a: kacchapo daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi śalyakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.054c: vyālo bhūtvā tu ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.056a: vānaro daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.056c: śvā bhūtvā cātha ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.056d-0547_01: mṛto vānarayonau syāt tato bhavati sūkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.056d-0547_02: tataḥ śvā cāpi bhavati tato bhavati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.057a: nyāsāpahartā tu naro yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.058a: tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.058c: duṣkṛtasya kṣayaṃ gatvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.059a: asūyako naraś cāpi mṛto jāyati śārṅgakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.059b-0548_01: asūyakaḥ kutsitaś ca caṇḍālo duḥkham aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:112.059c: viśvāsahartā tu naro mīno jāyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.060a: bhūtvā mīno 'ṣṭa varṣāṇi mṛgo jāyati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.060c: mṛgas tu caturo māsāṃs tataś chāgaḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.061a: chāgas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya pūrṇe saṃvatsare tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.061c: kīṭaḥ saṃjāyate jantus tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.062a: dhānyān yavāṃs tilān māṣān kulatthān sarṣapāṃś caṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:112.062c: kalāyān atha mudgāṃś ca godhūmān atasīs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:112.063a: sasyasyānyasya hartā ca mohāj jantur acetanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.063d-0549_01: mūṣako jāyate paścāt sūkaro jāyate tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.064a: tataḥ pretya mahārāja punar jāyati sūkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.064c: sūkaro jātamātras tu rogeṇa mriyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:112.065a: śvā tato jāyate mūḍhaḥ karmaṇā tena pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:112.065c: śvā bhūtvā pañca varṣāṇi tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.066a: paradārābhimarśaṃ tu kṛtvā jāyati vai vṛkaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.066c: śvā sṛgālas tato gṛdhro vyālaḥ kaṅko bakas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:112.067a: bhrātur bhāryāṃ tu durbuddhir yo dharṣayati mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.068a: sakhibhāryāṃ guror bhāryāṃ rājabhāryāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:112.068c: pradharṣayitvā kāmād yo mṛto jāyati sūkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.068d-0550_01: śvā biḍālaḥ kukkuṭaś ca jāyetāpi pipīlikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.069a: sūkaraḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi śvāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.069b-0551_01: vilāḷaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi kukkuṭaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.069c: pipīlakas tu ṣaṇ māsān kīṭaḥ syān māsam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:112.070a: tatra jīvati māsāṃs tu kṛmiyonau trayodaśa
GE07mbh_13_u:112.071a: upasthite vivāhe tu dāne yajñe 'pi vābhibho
GE07mbh_13_u:112.071c: mohāt karoti yo vighnaṃ sa mṛto jāyate kṛmiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.071d-0552_02: śvā bhūtvā sapta janmāni tato jāyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.071d-0553_01: varṣāt pañcadaśāt pūrvaṃ kramād bhavati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.072a: kṛmir jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.072c: adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.073a: pūrvaṃ dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīye saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:112.073c: so 'pi rājan mṛto jantuḥ kṛmiyonau prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.075c: anirvāpya samaśnan vai tato jāyati vāyasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.076a: vāyaso daśa varṣāṇi tato jāyati kukkuṭaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.076c: jāyate lavakaś cāpi māsaṃ tasmāt tu mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.078a: krauñco jīvati māsāṃs tu daśa dvau sapta pañca ca
GE07mbh_13_u:112.080a: kṛtaghnas tu mṛto rājan yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.080c: yamasya viṣaye kruddhair vadhaṃ prāpnoti dāruṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:112.081a: paṭṭisaṃ mudgaraṃ śūlam agnikumbhaṃ ca dāruṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:112.082a: etāś cānyāś ca bahvīḥ sa yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.082b-0555_01: anyāś ca yātanāḥ prāpya kṛmiyonau prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.082b-0556_01: tato hataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ sa tatrograir bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:112.082c: yātanāḥ prāpya tatrogrās tato vadhyati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.083c: kṛmir bhavati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.083e: tato garbhaṃ samāsādya tatraiva mriyate śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.084c: saṃsārāṃś ca bahūn gatvā tatas tiryak prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.086c: arthārthī yadi vā vairī sa mṛto jāyate kharaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.087a: kharo jīvati varṣe dve tataḥ śastreṇa vadhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.088a: mṛgo vadhyati śastreṇa gate saṃvatsare tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.088b-0557_01: mṛgo bhūtvā tataḥ śastrair vadhyate bhṛśadāruṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:112.088c: hato mṛgas tato mīnaḥ so 'pi jālena badhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.089c: śvāpado daśa varṣāṇi dvīpī varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE07mbh_13_u:112.090c: adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.091a: striyaṃ hatvā tu durbuddhir yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.091c: bahūn kleśān samāsādya saṃsārāṃś caiva viṃśatim
GE07mbh_13_u:112.093a: bhojanaṃ corayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.094a: vādyaṃ hṛtvā tu puruṣo maśakaḥ saṃprajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.094e: sa jāyate babhrusamo dāruṇo mūṣako naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.094f-0558_01: daśan vai mānuṣān nityaṃ pāpātmā sa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.094f-0558_02: ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhiḥ kākamadguḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.094f-0558_03: matsyamāṃsam atho hṛtvā kāko jāyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.095c: dadhi hṛtvā bakaś cāpi plavo matsyān asaṃskṛtān
GE07mbh_13_u:112.096c: yas tu corayate tailaṃ tailapāyī prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.096e: corayitvā tu durbuddhir madhu daṃśaḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.097a: ayo hṛtvā tu durbuddhir vāyaso jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.098a: hṛtvā paiṣṭam apūpaṃ ca kumbholūkaḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.098c: phalaṃ vā mūlakaṃ hṛtvā apūpaṃ vā pipīlikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.099a: kāṃsyaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhir hārīto jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.100a: hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.100b-0562_02: kauśikaṃ tu tato hṛtvā naro jāyati vartakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.100b-0562_03: aṃśukaṃ corayitvā tu śuko jāyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.100b-0562_04: corayitvā dukūlaṃ tu mṛto haṃsaḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.100c: krauñcaḥ kārpāsikaṃ hṛtvā mṛto jāyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.100d-0563_01: sarpaḥ kārpāsakaṃ hṛtvā kṣaumaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:112.100d-0564_01: chāgaś cāpy āvikaṃ hṛtvā kūrmaś carmāpahārakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.101a: corayitvā naraḥ paṭṭaṃ tv āvikaṃ vāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.101c: kṣaumaṃ ca vastram ādāya śaśo jantuḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.102a: varṇān hṛtvā tu puruṣo mṛto jāyati barhiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.103a: varṇakādīṃs tathā gandhāṃś corayitvā tu mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.103d-0565_01: tatra jīvati varṣāṇi tato daśa ca pañca ca
GE07mbh_13_u:112.103d-0565_02: adharmasya kṣayaṃ gatvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.104a: viśvāsena tu nikṣiptaṃ yo nihnavati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.104c: sa gatāsur naras tādṛṅ matsyayonau prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:112.106a: pāpāni tu naraḥ kṛtvā tiryag jāyati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:112.106c: na cātmanaḥ pramāṇaṃ te dharmaṃ jānanti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:112.107a: ye pāpāni narāḥ kṛtvā nirasyanti vrataiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:112.108a: asaṃvāsāḥ prajāyante mlecchāś cāpi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.109a: varjayanti ca pāpāni janmaprabhṛti ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.109b-0566_01: janmaprabhṛti pāpāni varjayanti ca ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.109c: arogā rūpavantas te dhaninaś ca bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:112.110a: striyo 'py etena kalpena kṛtvā pāpam avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.110c: eteṣām eva jantūnāṃ patnītvam upayānti tāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:112.111c: etad vai leśamātreṇa kathitaṃ te mayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:112.112a: etan mayā mahārāja brahmaṇo vadataḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:112.112c: surarṣīṇāṃ śrutaṃ madhye pṛṣṭaś cāpi yathātatham
GE07mbh_13_u:112.113c: etac chrutvā mahārāja dharme kuru manaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:113.001a: adharmasya gatir brahman kathitā me tvayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:113.001c: dharmasya tu gatiṃ śrotum icchāmi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:113.001e: kṛtvā karmāṇi pāpāni kathaṃ yānti śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:113.001f-0567_01: karmaṇā ca kṛteneha kena yānti śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:113.003a: mohād adharmaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā punaḥ samanutapyate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.003d-0568_01: yathā yathā manas tasya duṣkṛtaṃ karma garhate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.003d-0568_02: tathā tathā śarīraṃ tu tenādharmeṇa mucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.004a: yathā yathā naraḥ samyag adharmam anubhāṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.006a: pradānāni tu vakṣyāmi yāni dattvā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:113.006c: naraḥ kṛtvāpy akāryāṇi tadā dharmeṇa yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.007a: sarveṣām eva dānānām annaṃ śreṣṭham udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:113.007c: pūrvam annaṃ pradātavyam ṛjunā dharmam icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:113.008a: prāṇā hy annaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāj jantuś ca jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.008c: anne pratiṣṭhitā lokās tasmād annaṃ prakāśate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.009c: annasya hi pradānena svargam āpnoti kauśikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:113.010a: nyāyalabdhaṃ pradātavyaṃ dvijebhyo hy annam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:113.011a: yasya hy annam upāśnanti brāhmaṇānāṃ śatā daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:113.011c: hṛṣṭena manasā dattaṃ na sa tiryaggatir bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:113.013b-0569_03: pārāyaṇaiś ca vedānāṃ mucyate pātakair dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:113.013b-0569_05: vedārthaṃ jñāpayitvā tu śuddhān viprān yathārthataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:113.013b-0569_07: sarvātithyaṃ paraṃ hy eṣāṃ tasmād annaṃ paraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:113.014a: ahiṃsan brāhmaṇaṃ nityaṃ nyāyena paripālya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:113.014c: kṣatriyas tarasā prāptam annaṃ yo vai prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:113.017c: annaṃ dattvā dvijātibhyaḥ śūdraḥ pāpāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.018c: yaḥ prayacchati viprebhyo na sa durgāṇi sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.020a: annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke dattvorjasvī bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:113.020b-0570_02: āpady eva svadāsānāṃ bhoktavyaṃ svayam udyatam
GE07mbh_13_u:113.021a: dānakṛdbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:113.021c: te sma prāṇasya dātāras tebhyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:113.022c: kāryaṃ pātragataṃ nityam annaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:113.023a: annasya hi pradānena naro durgaṃ na sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.024a: yated brāhmaṇapūrvaṃ hi bhoktum annaṃ gṛhī sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:113.026a: na yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ saṃsārāṃś ca na sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:113.028a: etat te sarvam ākhyātam annadānaphalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:113.028c: mūlam etad dhi dharmāṇāṃ pradānasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:114.001c: tapo 'tha guruśuśrūṣā kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣaṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:114.002a: sarvāṇy etāni dharmasya pṛthag dvārāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:114.003a: hanta niḥśreyasaṃ jantor ahaṃ vakṣyāmy anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:114.003c: ahiṃsāpāśrayaṃ dharmaṃ yaḥ sādhayati vai naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:114.004a: trīn doṣān sarvabhūteṣu nidhāya puruṣaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:114.004c: kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhim avāpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:114.005c: ātmanaḥ sukham anvicchan na sa pretya sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:114.006a: ātmopamaś ca bhūteṣu yo vai bhavati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:114.006c: nyastadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya sukham edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:114.008a: na tat parasya saṃdadyāt pratikūlaṃ yad ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:114.008c: eṣa saṃkṣepato dharmaḥ kāmād anyaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:114.009a: pratyākhyāne ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye
GE07mbh_13_u:114.010a: yathā paraḥ prakramate 'pareṣu; tathāparaḥ prakramate parasmin
GE07mbh_13_u:114.010c: eṣaiva te 'stūpamā jīvaloke; yathā dharmo naipuṇenopadiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:114.011a: ity uktvā taṃ suragurur dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_13_u:114.011c: divam ācakrame dhīmān paśyatām eva nas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:115.001c: punar eva mahātejāḥ papraccha vadatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:115.003c: vācā ca manasā caiva kathaṃ duḥkhāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:115.005a: yathā sarvaś catuṣpādas tribhiḥ pādair na tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:115.006e: evaṃ lokeṣv ahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭā dharmataḥ parā
GE07mbh_13_u:115.007a: karmaṇā lipyate jantur vācā ca manasaiva ca

GE07mbh_13_u:124.022d-013_0018: vāsudevaṃ tathā viṣṇum ātmānaṃ ca tathā viduḥ

GE07mbh_13_u:124.022d-013_0027: antakāle japann eti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam

GE07mbh_13_u:125.001a: sāmnā vāpi pradāne vā jyāyaḥ kiṃ bhavato matam

GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0088: tato vidyutprabho nāma ṛṣir āha mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0090: sa ca dharmarahasyāni śrutvā śakram athābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0093: kilbiṣaṃ subahu prāptāḥ kiṃ svid eṣāṃ pratikriyā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0094: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ śakraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0095: pitaraś ca mahābhāgāḥ pūjayanti sma taṃ munim
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0096: kurukṣetraṃ gayāṃ gaṅgāṃ prabhāsaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0097: etāni manasā dhyātvā avagāhet tato jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0098: tathā mucyati pāpena rāhuṇā candramā yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0099: tryahaṃ snātaḥ sa bhavati nirāhāraś ca vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0100: spṛśate yo gavāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ vāladhiṃ ca namasyati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0102: ayaṃ sūkṣmataro dharmas taṃ nibodha śatakrato
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0106: śrutaṃ me bhāṣamāṇasya sthāṇoḥ sthāne bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0107: rudreṇa saha deveśa tan nibodha śacīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0112: grīṣmakāle 'tha vā śīte evaṃ pāpam apohati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0113: tataḥ pāpāt pramuktasya dyutir bhavati śāśvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0114: tejasā sūryavad dīpto bhrājate somavat punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0117: dharmaguhyaṃ tu bhagavān mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvaham bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0118: sarahasyāś ca ye doṣās tān yathāvad udīraya
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0119: pratimehanti ye sūryam anilaṃ dviṣate ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0120: havyavāhe pradīpte ca samidhaṃ ye na juhvati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0121: bālavatsāṃ ca ye dhenuṃ duhanti kṣīrakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0122: teṣāṃ doṣān pravakṣyāmi tān nibodha śacīpate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0123: bhānumān anilaś caiva havyavāhaś ca vāsava
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0124: lokānāṃ mātaraś caiva gāvaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0125: lokāṃs tārayituṃ śaktā martyeṣv eteṣu devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0128: striyaḥ sarvāś ca durvṛttāḥ pratimehanti yā ravim
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0130: havyavāhasya dīptasya samidhaṃ ye na juhvati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0131: agnikāryeṣu vai teṣāṃ havyaṃ nāśnāti pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0132: kṣīraṃ tu bālavatsānāṃ ye pibantīha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0133: na teṣāṃ kṣīrapāḥ ke cij jāyante kulavardhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0135: evam etat purā dṛṣṭaṃ kulavṛddhair dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0136: tasmād varjyāni varjyāni kāryaṃ kāryaṃ ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0137: bhūtikāmena martyena satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0139: ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitṝṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0141: akṣayaṃ ca kathaṃ dānaṃ bhavec caivordhvadehikam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0142: ānṛṇyaṃ vā kathaṃ martyā gaccheyuḥ kena karmaṇā pitaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0143: etad icchāmahe śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0147: varṣāsu dīpakaiś caiva pitṝṇām anṛṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0148: akṣayaṃ nirvyalīkaṃ ca dānam etan mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0150: śraddadhānāś ca ye martyā āhariṣyanti saṃtatim
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0153: vṛddhagārgyo mahātejās tān evaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0155: varṣāsu dīpadānena tathaiva ca tilodakaiḥ pitaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0158: yas tu śṛṅgagataṃ paṅkaṃ kūlād uddhṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0161: tamorūpaṃ na tasyāsti dīpakaṃ yaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0162: amāvāsyāṃ tu ye martyāḥ prayacchanti tilodakam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0164: kṛtaṃ bhavati taiḥ śrāddhaṃ sarahasyaṃ yathārthavat
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0166: kulavaṃśasya vṛddhis tu piṇḍadasya phalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0167: śraddadhānas tu yaḥ kuryāt pitṝṇām anṛṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0169: vidhiḥ pātraṃ phalaṃ caiva yathāvad anukīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0170: kena te ca bhavet prītiḥ kathaṃ tuṣṭiṃ tu gacchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0171: iti pṛṣṭaḥ surendreṇa provāca harir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0173: brāhmaṇaiḥ pūjitair nityaṃ pūjito 'haṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0175: teṣāṃ tuṣyāmi martyānāṃ yaś cakre ca baliṃ haret
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0176: vāmanaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā varāhaṃ ca jalotthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0177: uddhṛtāṃ dharaṇīṃ caiva mūrdhnā dhārayate tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0178: na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cit kalmaṣaṃ copapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0179: aśvatthaṃ rocanāṃ gāṃ ca pūjayed yo naraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0181: tena rūpeṇa teṣāṃ ca pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0182: pūjā mamaiṣā nāsty anyā yāval lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0183: anyathā hi vṛthā martyāḥ pūjayanty alpabuddhayaḥ indraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0184: nāhaṃ tat pratigṛhṇāmi na sā tuṣṭikarī mama
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0185: cakraṃ pādau varāhaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ cāpi vāmanam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0186: uddhṛtāṃ dharaṇīṃ caiva kimarthaṃ tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0187: bhavān sṛjati bhūtāni bhavān saṃharati prajāḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0189: saṃprahasya tato viṣṇur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0190: cakreṇa nihatā daityāḥ padbhyāṃ krāntā vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0191: vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthāya uddhṛtā ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0192: vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya jito rājā mayā baliḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0194: tan māṃ ye pūjayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0195: api vā brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmacāriṇam āgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0199: etad vaḥ kathitaṃ guhyam akhilena tapodhanāḥ baladevaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0200: saṃśayaṃ pṛcchamānānāṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0203: kalya utthāya yo martyaḥ spṛśed gāṃ vai ghṛtaṃ dadhi
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0204: sarṣapaṃ ca priyaṅguṃ ca kalmaṣāt pratimucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0205: bhūtāni caiva sarvāṇi agrataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0208: upavāsaṃ tu gṛhṇīyād yad vā saṃkalpayed vratam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0209: devatās tasya tuṣyanti kāmikaṃ cāpi sidhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0210: anyathā hi vṛthā martyāḥ kurvate svalpabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0212: balir bhikṣā tathārghyaṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca tilodakam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0214: guhyam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ yathā tuṣyanti devatāḥ dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0217: mitradruhy anadhīyāne yaś ca syād vṛṣalīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0218: eteṣu daivaṃ pitryaṃ vā na deyaṃ syāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0219: piṇḍadās tasya hīyante na ca prīṇāti vai pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0221: pitaras tasya devāś ca agnayaś ca tathaiva hi
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0223: strīghnair goghnaiḥ kṛtaghnaiś ca brahmaghnair gurutalpagaiḥ agniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0225: pādam udyamya yo martyaḥ spṛśed gāś ca sudurmatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0227: tasya doṣān pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0228: divaṃ spṛśaty aśabdo 'sya trasyanti pitaraś ca vai
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0229: vaimanasyaṃ ca devānāṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati puṣkalam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0230: pāvakaś ca mahātejā havyaṃ na pratigṛhṇati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0231: ājanmanāṃ śataṃ caiva narake pacyate tu saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0232: niṣkṛtiṃ ca na tasyāpi anumanyanti karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0233: tasmād gāvo na pādena spraṣṭavyā vai kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0235: śraddadhānena martyena ātmano hitam icchatā viśvāmitraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0236: ete doṣā mayā proktās triṣu yaḥ pādam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0240: yadā bhādrapade māsi bhavate bahule maghā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0242: kṛtaṃ tena mahac chrāddhaṃ varṣāṇīha trayodaśa gāvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0244: kṣeme ca saṃkhyeva hi bhūyasī ca
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0247: bhūyaś ca yā viṣṇupade sthitā yā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0257: na tasya pāpaṃ na bhayaṃ na śokaḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0266: etac chrutvā vacas teṣāṃ brahmā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0267: aho praśno mahābhāgā gūḍhārthaḥ paramaḥ śubhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0268: sūkṣmaḥ śreyāṃś ca martyānāṃ bhavadbhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0270: yathā yajñaphalaṃ martyo labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0271: pauṣamāsasya śukle vai yadā yujyeta rohiṇī
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0275: etad vaḥ paramaṃ guhyaṃ kathitaṃ dvijasattamāḥ vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0278: somasyottiṣṭhamānasya taj jalaṃ cākṣatāṃś ca tān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0279: sthito hy abhimukho martyaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ baliṃ haret
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0280: agnikāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tena hutāś cāsyāgnayas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0281: vanaspatiṃ ca yo hanyād amāvāsyām abuddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0282: api hy ekena patreṇa lipyate brahmahatyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0283: dantakāṣṭhaṃ tu yaḥ khāded amāvāsyām abuddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0284: hiṃsitaś candramās tena pitaraś codvijanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0285: havyaṃ na tasya devāś ca pratigṛhṇanti parvasu śrīḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0286: kupyante pitaraś cāsya kule vaṃśo 'sya hīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0289: devatāḥ pitaraś caiva utsave parvaṇīṣu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0291: yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ dadyād dīpaṃ karañjake gārgyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0293: ātithyaṃ satataṃ kuryād dīpaṃ dadyāt pratiśraye
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0294: varjayāno divāsvapnaṃ na ca māṃsāni bhakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0295: gobrāhmaṇaṃ na hiṃsyāc ca puṣkarāṇi ca kīrtayet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0297: api kratuśatair iṣṭvā kṣayaṃ gacchati tad dhaviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0298: na tu kṣīyanti te dharmāḥ śraddadhānaiḥ prayojitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0299: idaṃ ca paramaṃ guhyaṃ sarahasyaṃ nibodhata
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0300: śrāddhakalpe ca daive ca tairthike parvaṇīṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0301: rajasvalā ca yā nārī śvitrikāputrikā ca yā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0302: etābhiś cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ havir nāśnanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0303: pitaraś ca na tuṣyanti varṣāṇy asya trayodaśa
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0304: śuklavāsāḥ śucir bhūtvā brāhmaṇān svasti vācayet dhaumyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0305: kīrtayed bhārataṃ caiva tathā syād akṣayaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0306: bhinnabhāṇḍaṃ ca khaṭvāṃ ca kukkuṭaṃ śunakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0307: apraśastāni sarvāṇi yaś ca vṛkṣo gṛheruhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0308: bhinnabhāṇḍe kaliṃ prāhuḥ khaṭvāyāṃ tu dhanakṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0309: kukkuṭe śunake caiva havir nāśnanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0310: vṛkṣamūle dhruvaṃ sattvaṃ tasmād vṛkṣaṃ na ropayet jamadagniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0312: avākśirā vā lambeta satraṃ vā sphītam āharet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0313: na cāsya hṛdayaṃ śuddhaṃ narakaṃ sa dhruvaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0314: tulyaṃ yajñaś ca satyaṃ ca hṛdayasya ca śuddhatā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0315: śuddhena manasā dattvā saktuprasthaṃ dvijātaye vāyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0317: kiṃ cid dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0318: sarahasyāś ca ye doṣās tāñ śṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0322: caturo vārṣikān māsān yo dadāti tilodakam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0326: agnes tu vṛṣalo netā havir mūḍhāś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0327: manyate dharma eveti sa cādharmeṇa lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0328: agnayas tasya kupyanti śūdrayoniṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0329: pitaraś ca na tuṣyanti saha devair viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0330: prāyaścittaṃ tu yat tatra bruvatas tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0331: yat kṛtvā tu naraḥ samyak sukhī bhavati vijvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0332: gavāṃ mūtrapurīṣeṇa payasā ca ghṛtena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0336: eṣa hy adharmo dharmaś ca rahasyaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ lomaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0339: nirāśāḥ pitaras teṣāṃ śrāddhakāle bhavanti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0340: paradāraratir yaḥ syād yaś ca vandhyām upāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0341: brahmasvaṃ harate yaś ca samadoṣā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0342: asaṃbhāṣyā bhavanty ete pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0343: devatāḥ pitaraś caiṣāṃ nābhinandanti tad dhaviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0344: tasmāt parasya vai dārāṃs tyajed vandhyāṃ ca yoṣitam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0345: brahmasvaṃ hi na hartavyam ātmano hitam icchatā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0348: dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca māsi māsi ghṛtākṣatam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0350: somaś ca vardhate tena samudraś ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0352: dānenaitena tejasvī vīryavāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0353: prītaś ca bhagavān soma iṣṭān kāmān prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0356: kalyam utthāya yo martyaḥ snātaḥ śuklena vāsasā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0358: tilodakaṃ ca yo dadyāt pitṝṇāṃ madhunā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0359: dīpakaṃ kṛsaraṃ caiva śrūyatāṃ tasya tat phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0361: gopradānaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād bhūmidānaṃ ca śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0362: agniṣṭomaṃ ca yo yajñaṃ yajeta bahudakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0365: dīpe ca kṛsare caiva tuṣyante 'sya pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0367: evam etan mayoddiṣṭam ṛṣidṛṣṭaṃ purātanam bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014_0368: tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ sarve pitaraś ca sadevatāḥ
