GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0077: sapta triṣavaṇaṃ snātvā pūto bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0078: siddhim āpnoti vipulām āpadaṃ caiva nāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0079: yas tu śūdraiḥ sahāśnīyād brāhmaṇo 'py ekabhojane
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0081: yas tu vaiśyaiḥ sahāśnīyād brāhmaṇo 'py ekabhojane
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0082: sa vai trirātraṃ dīkṣitvā mucyate tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0084: āplutaḥ saha vāsobhis tena mucyeta pāpmanā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0085: śūdrasya tu kulaṃ hanti vaiśyasya paśubāndhavān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0087: prāyaścittaṃ ca śāntiṃ ca juhuyāt tena mucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014A_0090: rocanā virajā rātrir maṅgalālambhanāni ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0001: dānena vartatety āha tapasā caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0002: tad etan me manoduḥkhaṃ vyapoha tvaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0003: kiṃ svit pṛthivyāṃ hy etan me bhavāñ śaṃsitum arhati bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0005: lokā hy asaṃśayaṃ prāptā dānapuṇyaratair nṛpaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0006: satkṛtaś ca tathātreyaḥ śiṣyebhyo brahma nirguṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0007: upadiśya sadā rājan gato lokān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0008: śibir auśīnaraḥ prāṇān priyasya tanayasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0013: arghyaṃ pradāya vidhival lebhe lokān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0014: divyaṃ śataśalākaṃ ca yajñārthaṃ kāñcanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0018: sāvitraḥ kuṇḍalaṃ divyaṃ yānaṃ ca janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0019: brāhmaṇāya ca gā dattvā gato lokān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0020: vṛṣādarbhiś ca rājarṣī ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0021: ramyāṃś cāvasathān dattvā dvijebhyo divam āgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0022: nimī rāṣṭraṃ ca vaidarbhiḥ kanyāṃ dattvā mahātmane
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0024: jāmadagnyaś ca viprāya bhūmiṃ dattvā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0027: vasiṣṭho jīvayām āsa yena yāto 'kṣayāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0028: rāmo dāśarathiś caiva hutvā yajñeṣu vai vasu
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0029: sa gato hy akṣayān lokān yasya loke mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0033: kanyām aṅgirase dattvā divam āśu jagāma saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0034: brahmadattaś ca pāñcālyo rājā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0035: nidhiṃ śaṅkham anujñāpya jagāma paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0037: madayantīṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ dattvā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0038: manoḥ putraś ca sudyumno likhitāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0039: daṇḍam uddhṛtya dharmeṇa gato lokān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0042: sarvakāmaiś ca saṃpūrṇaṃ dattvā veśma hiraṇmayam
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0045: śāṇḍilyāya purā dattvā samanyur divam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0046: nāmnā ca dyutimān nāma śālvarājo mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0047: dattvā rājyam ṛcīkāya gato lokān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0048: madirāśvaś ca rājarṣir dattvā kanyāṃ sumadhyamām
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0050: lomapādaś ca rājarṣiḥ śāntāṃ dattvā sutāṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0052: kautsāya dattvā kanyāṃ tu haṃsīṃ nāma yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0053: gato 'kṣayān ato lokān rājarṣiś ca bhagīrathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0054: dattvā śatasahasraṃ tu gavāṃ rājā bhagīrathaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0056: ete cānye ca bahavo dānena tapasā ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0057: yudhiṣṭhira gatāḥ svargaṃ nivartante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0058: teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhitā kīrtir yāvat sthāsyati medinī
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0059: gṛhasthair dānatapasā yair lokā vai vinirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0060: śiṣṭānāṃ caritaṃ hy etat kīrtitaṃ me yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0062: dattvā tu satataṃ te 'stu kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdhara
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0064: yatra te nṛpaśārdūla saṃdeho vai bhaviṣyati yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0065: śvaḥ prabhāte hi vakṣyāmi saṃdhyā hi samupasthitā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0067: dānadharmeṇa mahatā ye prāptās tridivaṃ nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0068: imāṃs tu śrotum icchāmi dharmān dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0069: dānaṃ katividhaṃ deyaṃ kiṃ tasya ca phalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0070: kathaṃ kebhyaś ca dharmyaṃ ca dānaṃ dātavyam iṣyate bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0071: kaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ katividhaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0072: śṛṇu tattvena kaunteya dānaṃ prati mamānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0074: dharmād arthād bhayāt kāmāt kāruṇyād iti bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0075: dānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ jñeyaṃ kāraṇair yair nibodha tat
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0076: iha kīrtim avāpnoti pretya cānuttamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0078: dadāti vā dāsyati vā mahyaṃ dattam anena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0079: ity arthibhyo niśamyaivaṃ sarvaṃ dātavyam arthine
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0080: nāsyāhaṃ na madīyo 'yaṃ pāpaṃ kuryād vimānitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0081: iti dadyād bhayād eva dṛḍhaṃ mūḍhāya paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0082: priyo me 'yaṃ priyo 'syāham iti saṃprekṣya buddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0084: dīnaś ca yācate cāyam alpenāpi hi tuṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:125.038d-014B_0085: iti dadyād daridrāya kāruṇyād iti sarvathā
GE07mbh_13_u:126.001c: āgamair bahubhiḥ sphīto bhavān naḥ prathitaḥ kule
GE07mbh_13_u:126.003c: śāstā ca na hi naḥ kaś cit tvām ṛte bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:126.004c: vaktum arhasi naḥ praśnaṃ yat tvāṃ pṛcchāmi pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:126.006a: asya caiva samakṣaṃ tvaṃ pārthivānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.006c: bhrātṝṇāṃ ca priyārthaṃ me snehād bhāṣitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:126.007a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād āgatasaṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.008c: asya viṣṇoḥ purā rājan prabhāvo 'yaṃ mayā śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.009a: yaś ca govṛṣabhāṅkasya prabhāvas taṃ ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:126.009c: rudrāṇyāḥ saṃśayo yaś ca daṃpatyos taṃ ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:126.011a: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva dhaumyaś ca japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.011c: devalaḥ kāśyapaś caiva hastikāśyapa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:126.015a: kathāś cakrus tatas te tu madhurā dharmasaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.015c: rājarṣīṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca ye vasanti tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.017a: so 'gnir dadāha taṃ śailaṃ sadrumaṃ salatākṣupam
GE07mbh_13_u:126.019a: sa tu vahnir mahājvālo dagdhvā sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.019c: viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgamya pādau śiṣyavad aspṛśat
GE07mbh_13_u:126.020a: tato viṣṇur vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdagdham arikarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.020c: saumyair dṛṣṭinipātais tat punaḥ prakṛtim ānayat
GE07mbh_13_u:126.022a: tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā munigaṇas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:126.023a: tato nārāyaṇo dṛṣṭvā tān ṛṣīn vismayānvitān
GE07mbh_13_u:126.023c: praśritaṃ madhuraṃ snigdhaṃ papraccha vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.025a: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ yāthātathyam aninditāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.026a: bhavān visṛjate lokān bhavān saṃharate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.026c: bhavāñ śītaṃ bhavān uṣṇaṃ bhavān eva pravarṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:126.027a: pṛthivyāṃ yāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:126.027c: teṣāṃ pitā tvaṃ mātā ca prabhuḥ prabhava eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:126.028c: tvam evārhasi kalyāṇa vaktuṃ vahner vinirgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:126.029c: yac chrutaṃ yac ca dṛṣṭaṃ nas tat pravakṣyāmahe hare
GE07mbh_13_u:126.030a: etat tad vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mama vaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:126.032c: mama vahniḥ samudbhūto na vai vyathitum arhatha
GE07mbh_13_u:126.033a: vrataṃ cartum ihāyātas tv ahaṃ girim imaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:126.033c: putraṃ cātmasamaṃ vīrye tapasā sraṣṭum āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.034a: tato mamātmā yo dehe so 'gnir bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.037a: etad asya rahasyaṃ vaḥ padmanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.037c: mayā premṇā samākhyātaṃ na bhīḥ kāryā tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.039a: yac chrutaṃ yac ca vo dṛṣṭaṃ divi vā yadi vā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:126.039c: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ kiṃ cit tad bhavanto bruvantu me
GE07mbh_13_u:126.041a: yady apy aham adṛṣṭaṃ vā divyam adbhutadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:126.041c: divi vā bhuvi vā kiṃ cit paśyāmy amaladarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.042a: prakṛtiḥ sā mama parā na kva cit pratihanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:126.042c: na cātmagatam aiśvaryam āścaryaṃ pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_13_u:126.043a: śraddheyaḥ kathito hy arthaḥ sajjanaśravaṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.043c: ciraṃ tiṣṭhati medinyāṃ śaile lekhyam ivārpitam
GE07mbh_13_u:126.048a: yad āścaryam acintyaṃ ca girau himavati prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:126.050a: evam uktaḥ sa munibhir nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:126.050c: kathayām āsa devarṣiḥ pūrvavṛttāṃ kathāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_13_u:127.008c: nṛtyadbhir bhūtasaṃghaiś ca barhiṇaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.010a: sa giris tapasā tasya bhūteśasya vyarocata
GE07mbh_13_u:127.014a: yakṣā nāgāḥ piśācāś ca lokapālā hutāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.014c: bhāvāś ca sarve nyagbhūtās tatraivāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.015c: oṣadhyo jvalamānāś ca dyotayanti sma tad vanam
GE07mbh_13_u:127.016a: vihagāś ca mudā yuktāḥ prānṛtyan vyanadaṃś ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:127.020a: dṛṣṭvā tam ṛṣayaḥ sarve śirobhir avanīṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.026c: haranetre śubhe devī sahasā sā samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_13_u:127.029c: jvālā ca mahatī dīptā lalāṭāt tasya niḥsṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:127.033c: śaraṇaṃ cāpy avindadbhis tat sadaḥ saṃkulaṃ babhau
GE07mbh_13_u:127.035a: kṣaṇena tena dagdhaḥ sa himavān abhavan nagaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.036a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mathitaṃ śailaṃ śailarājasutā tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.037c: pitur dainyam anicchantīṃ prītyāpaśyat tato girim
GE07mbh_13_u:127.039a: prakṛtisthaṃ giriṃ dṛṣṭvā prītā devī maheśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:127.040c: saṃśayo me mahāñ jātas taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:127.041a: kimarthaṃ te lalāṭe vai tṛtīyaṃ netram utthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:127.042a: kimarthaṃ ca punar deva prakṛtisthaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.043a: netre me saṃvṛte devi tvayā bālyād anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:127.044c: tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ dīptaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ te rakṣatā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.045a: tasya cākṣṇo mahat tejo yenāyaṃ mathito giriḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.045c: tvatpriyārthaṃ ca me devi prakṛtisthaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtaḥ umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:127.046a: bhagavan kena te vaktraṃ candravat priyadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:127.046c: pūrvaṃ tathaiva śrīkāntam uttaraṃ paścimaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:127.047a: dakṣiṇaṃ ca mukhaṃ raudraṃ kenordhvaṃ kapilā jaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.047c: kena kaṇṭhaś ca te nīlo barhibarhanibhaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.048a: haste caitat pinākaṃ te satataṃ kena tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:127.048c: jaṭilo brahmacārī ca kimartham asi nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:127.049a: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ vada bhūtapate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:127.050a: evam uktaḥ sa bhagavāñ śailaputryā pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:127.050c: tasyā vṛttyā ca buddhyā ca prītimān abhavat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:127.051a: tatas tām abravīd devaḥ subhage śrūyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:128.001a: tilottamā nāma purā brahmaṇā yoṣid uttamā
GE07mbh_13_u:128.001c: tilaṃ tilaṃ samuddhṛtya ratnānāṃ nirmitā śubhā
GE07mbh_13_u:128.003a: yato yataḥ sā sudatī mām upādhāvad antike
GE07mbh_13_u:128.003c: tatas tato mukhaṃ cāru mama devi vinirgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:128.004a: tāṃ didṛkṣur ahaṃ yogāc caturmūrtitvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.004c: caturmukhaś ca saṃvṛtto darśayan yogam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.005c: uttareṇa tvayā sārdhaṃ ramāmy aham anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:128.008a: indreṇa ca purā vajraṃ kṣiptaṃ śrīkāṅkṣiṇā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:128.008c: dagdhvā kaṇṭhaṃ tu tad yātaṃ tena śrīkaṇṭhatā mama umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:128.009a: vāhaneṣu prabhūteṣu śrīmatsv anyeṣu satsu te
GE07mbh_13_u:128.010c: sā sṛṣṭā bahudhā jātā kṣaramāṇā payo 'mṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:128.011c: tato dagdhā mayā gāvo nānāvarṇatvam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.012c: vṛṣaṃ cemaṃ dhvajārthaṃ me dadau vāhanam eva ca umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:128.013c: tāṃś ca saṃtyajya bhagavañ śmaśāne ramase katham
GE07mbh_13_u:128.016a: medhyānveṣī mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vicarāmi niśāsv aham
GE07mbh_13_u:128.016c: na ca medhyataraṃ kiṃ cic chmaśānād iha vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:128.017a: tena me sarvavāsānāṃ śmaśāne ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.018a: tatra caiva ramante me bhūtasaṃghāḥ śubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:128.018c: na ca bhūtagaṇair devi vināhaṃ vastum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:128.019a: eṣa vāso hi me medhyaḥ svargīyaś ca mato hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:128.019c: puṇyaḥ paramakaś caiva medhyakāmair upāsyate umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:128.020c: pinākapāṇe varada saṃśayo me mahān ayam
GE07mbh_13_u:128.021a: ayaṃ munigaṇaḥ sarvas tapas tapa iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:128.022c: etaṃ mameha saṃdehaṃ vaktum arhasy ariṃdama
GE07mbh_13_u:128.023a: dharmaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ kathaṃ vācarituṃ naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.023c: śakyo dharmam avindadbhir dharmajña vada me prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:128.024a: tato munigaṇaḥ sarvas tāṃ devīṃ pratyapūjayat
GE07mbh_13_u:128.025c: śamo dānaṃ yathāśakti gārhasthyo dharma uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.028a: bhagavan saṃśayaṃ pṛṣṭas taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:128.028c: cāturvarṇyasya yo dharmaḥ sve sve varṇe guṇāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.029a: brāhmaṇe kīdṛśo dharmaḥ kṣatriye kīdṛśo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:128.029c: vaiśye kiṃlakṣaṇo dharmaḥ śūdre kiṃlakṣaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:128.031a: upavāsaḥ sadā dharmo brāhmaṇasya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.031c: sa hi dharmārtham utpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate
GE07mbh_13_u:128.032a: tasya dharmakriyā devi vratacaryā ca nyāyataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.034a: bhagavan saṃśayo me 'tra taṃ me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:128.037a: guruṇā tv abhyanujñātaḥ samāvarteta vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.040c: iṣṭīś ca paśubandhāṃś ca vidhipūrvaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:128.041a: yajñaś ca paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā ca dehiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:128.042a: bhukte parijane paścād bhojanaṃ dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:128.046a: yas tu kṣatragato devi tvayā dharma udīritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.046c: tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi taṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:128.048a: prajāḥ pālayate yo hi dharmeṇa manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.049a: tatra rājñaḥ paro dharmo damaḥ svādhyāya eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:128.050c: bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
GE07mbh_13_u:128.051a: samyag daṇḍe sthitir dharmo dharmo vedakratukriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:128.053a: vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:128.055a: tilān gandhān rasāṃś caiva na vikrīṇīta vai kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:128.056c: śūdradharmaḥ paro nityaṃ śuśrūṣā ca dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:128.057c: śuśrūṣann atithiṃ prāptaṃ tapaḥ saṃcinute mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:128.059a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ cāturvarṇyasya śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:128.059c: ekaikasyeha subhage kim anyac chrotum icchasi umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:129.001c: sarvavyāpī tu yo dharmo bhagavaṃs taṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:129.003c: brāhmaṇeṣu hi yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ paramo mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.004a: ime tu lokadharmārthaṃ trayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:129.004c: pṛthivyāḥ sarjane nityaṃ sṛṣṭās tān api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:129.005c: śiṣṭācīrṇaḥ paraḥ proktas trayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.006c: trikarmā triparikrānto maitra eṣa smṛto dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.007a: ṣaḍ imāni tu karmāṇi provāca bhuvaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.007c: vṛttyarthaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vai śṛṇu tāni samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:129.008c: adhyāpanam adhītaṃ ca ṣaṭkarmā dharmabhāg dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.010a: ayaṃ tu paramo dharmaḥ pravṛttaḥ satsu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.013a: pādyam arghyaṃ yathānyāyam āsanaṃ śayanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:129.013c: dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ cāpi yo dadāti sa dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.014c: satkṛtyānuvrajed yaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.017a: dātavyam asakṛc chaktyā yaṣṭavyam asakṛt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:129.020a: nivṛttilakṣaṇas tv anyo dharmo mokṣa iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.020c: tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu me devi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.022a: na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅgo na vāsasi na cāsane
GE07mbh_13_u:129.022c: na tridaṇḍe na śayane nāgnau na śaraṇālaye
GE07mbh_13_u:129.023c: yukto yogaṃ prati sadā pratisaṃkhyānam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:129.026c: parivrajati yo yuktas tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.027c: yukto hy aṭati nirmukto na caikapulineśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.028a: eṣa mokṣavidāṃ dharmo vedoktaḥ satpathaḥ satām
GE07mbh_13_u:129.028c: yo mārgam anuyātīmaṃ padaṃ tasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:129.029c: haṃsaḥ paramahaṃsaś ca yo yaḥ paścāt sa uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.030a: ataḥ parataraṃ nāsti nādharaṃ na tiro 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.030c: aduḥkham asukhaṃ saumyam ajarāmaram avyayam umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:129.032a: ṛṣidharmaṃ tu dharmajña śrotum icchāmy anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:129.033c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā me manaḥ prītaṃ maheśvara sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:129.034a: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva munidharmakṛtaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:129.035c: yaṃ kṛtvā munayo yānti siddhiṃ svatapasā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:129.036a: phenapānām ṛṣīṇāṃ yo dharmo dharmavidāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:129.036c: taṃ me śṛṇu mahābhāge dharmajñe dharmam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.037a: uñchanti satataṃ tasmin brāhmaṃ phenotkaraṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:129.037c: amṛtaṃ brahmaṇā pītaṃ madhuraṃ prasṛtaṃ divi
GE07mbh_13_u:129.039c: uñcham uñchanti dharmajñāḥ śākunīṃ vṛttim āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.043c: santaś cakracarāḥ puṇyāḥ somalokacarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:129.045a: somapānāṃ ca devānām ūṣmapāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:129.046c: yajñānāṃ cāpi pañcānāṃ yajanaṃ dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:129.047c: ṛṣidharmaḥ sadā cīrṇo yo 'nyas tam api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:129.048c: kāmakrodhau tataḥ paścāj jetavyāv iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.051a: nivṛttir upabhogasya gorasānāṃ ca vai ratiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.052c: ṛṣīṇāṃ niyamā hy ete yair jayanty ajitāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:129.055a: na stambhī na ca mānī yo na pramatto na vismitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:129.055c: mitrāmitrasamo maitro yaḥ sa dharmavid uttamaḥ umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:130.003a: teṣām api vidhiṃ puṇyaṃ śrotum icchāmi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:130.004a: vānaprastheṣu yo dharmas taṃ me śṛṇu samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:130.005c: vānaprasthair idaṃ karma kartavyaṃ śṛṇu yādṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:130.009a: yuktair yogavahaiḥ sadbhir grīṣme pañcatapais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:130.015c: paurṇamāsyāṃ tu yo yajño nityayajñas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:130.016c: vimuktāḥ sarvapāpaiś ca caranti munayo vane
GE07mbh_13_u:130.017c: santaḥ satpathanityā ye te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:130.019a: eṣa dharmo mayā devi vānaprasthāśritaḥ śubhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.020c: yo dharmo munisaṃghasya siddhivādeṣu taṃ vada
GE07mbh_13_u:130.021c: svairiṇo dārasaṃyuktās teṣāṃ dharmaḥ kathaṃ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.022c: teṣāṃ mauṇḍyaṃ kaṣāyaś ca vāsarātriś ca kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:130.023a: trikālam abhiṣekaś ca hotraṃ tv ṛṣikṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:130.024a: ye ca te pūrvakathitā dharmā vananivāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:130.024c: yadi sevanti dharmāṃs tān āpnuvanti tapaḥphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:130.028c: sarvabhūtātmabhūtaś ca sa vai dharmeṇa yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.029c: ubhe ete same syātām ārjavaṃ vā viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.030a: ārjavaṃ dharma ity āhur adharmo jihma ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.031c: tasmād ārjavanityaḥ syād ya icched dharmam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.032c: dharme ratamanā nityaṃ naro dharmeṇa yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.034c: dīptimantaḥ kayā caiva caryayātha bhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:130.035a: rājāno rājaputrāś ca nirdhanā vā mahādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.036c: kena vā karmaṇā deva bhavanti vanagocarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.037a: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva tapaścaryāgataṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:130.038c: saṃsiddhāḥ pretya gandharvaiḥ saha modanty anāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.039c: dīkṣāṃ carati dharmātmā sa nāgaiḥ saha modate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.040a: śaṣpaṃ mṛgamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ yo mṛgaiḥ saha sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.040c: dīkṣito vai mudā yuktaḥ sa gacchaty amarāvatīm
GE07mbh_13_u:130.041a: śaivālaṃ śīrṇaparṇaṃ vā tad vrato yo niṣevate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.041c: śītayogavaho nityaṃ sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:130.043c: cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi rājā bhavati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.044c: maruṃ saṃsādhya yatnena rājā bhavati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.045c: praviśya ca mudā yukto dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm
GE07mbh_13_u:130.046a: sthaṇḍilasya phalāny āhur yānāni śayanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:130.047c: dehaṃ vānaśane tyaktvā sa svargaṃ samupāśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:130.048c: tyaktvā mahārṇave dehaṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:130.049c: aśmanā caraṇau bhittvā guhyakeṣu sa modate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.050c: cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatām
GE07mbh_13_u:130.050e: svargalokam avāpnoti devaiś ca saha modate
GE07mbh_13_u:130.052a: yas tu devi yathānyāyaṃ dīkṣito niyato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.053a: cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatām
GE07mbh_13_u:130.054c: vīrasthāyī ca satataṃ sa vīragatim āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:130.055e: sukhaṃ vasati dharmātmā divi devagaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:130.056c: sattvasthaḥ sarvam utsṛjya dīkṣito niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.056e: vīrādhvānaṃ prapadyed yas tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.057a: kāmagena vimānena sa vai carati cchandataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:130.057c: śakralokagataḥ śrīmān modate ca nirāmayaḥ umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:131.001c: dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa saṃśayo me mahān ayam
GE07mbh_13_u:131.003a: vaiśyo vā kṣatriyaḥ kena dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:131.003c: pratilomaḥ kathaṃ deva śakyo dharmo niṣevitum
GE07mbh_13_u:131.004a: kena vā karmaṇā vipraḥ śūdrayonau prajāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:131.004c: kṣatriyaḥ śūdratām eti kena vā karmaṇā vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:131.005a: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:131.005c: trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.006a: brāhmaṇyaṃ devi duṣprāpaṃ nisargād brāhmaṇaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:131.006c: kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā nisargād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.007a: karmaṇā duṣkṛteneha sthānād bhraśyati vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.007c: jyeṣṭhaṃ varṇam anuprāpya tasmād rakṣeta vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.008c: kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā brahmabhūyāya gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:131.009a: yas tu vipratvam utsṛjya kṣātraṃ dharmaṃ niṣevate
GE07mbh_13_u:131.010c: brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya karoty alpamatiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:131.011a: sa dvijo vaiśyatām eti vaiśyo vā śūdratām iyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:131.011c: svadharmāt pracyuto vipras tataḥ śūdratvam āpnute
GE07mbh_13_u:131.013a: kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge vaiśyo vā dharmacāriṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:131.014c: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdratvaṃ yāti tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.015a: yas tu śuddhaḥ svadharmeṇa jñānavijñānavāñ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.017c: ghuṣṭānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ śūdrānnaṃ naiva karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:131.019c: āhitāgnis tathā yajvā sa śūdragatibhāg bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:131.020c: brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām eti nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:131.021c: tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro yasyānnam upajīvati
GE07mbh_13_u:131.022c: abhojyānnāni cāśnāti sa dvijatvāt pateta vai
GE07mbh_13_u:131.026a: ebhis tu karmabhir devi śubhair ācaritais tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:131.026c: śūdro brāhmaṇatāṃ gacched vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:131.027c: śuśrūṣāṃ paricaryāṃ ca jyeṣṭhe varṇe prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.027e: kuryād avimanāḥ śūdraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.032c: agnihotram upāsaṃś ca juhvānaś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:131.033e: sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule śucau mahati jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:131.034a: sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto janmaprabhṛti saṃskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.036c: satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ sukhadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.038c: ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīṃ seveta nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:131.040c: śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:131.041a: svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃ cid upalakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:131.042a: svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:131.042c: trikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:131.044c: vipro bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:131.046c: brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyam utsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.047c: śūdro 'pi dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:131.048a: svabhāvakarma ca śubhaṃ yatra śūdre 'pi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:131.048c: viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātir vai vijñeya iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.049a: na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutaṃ na ca saṃnatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.049c: kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:131.050a: sarvo 'yaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:131.050c: vṛtte sthitaś ca suśroṇi brāhmaṇatvaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:131.051a: brāhmaḥ svabhāvaḥ kalyāṇi samaḥ sarvatra me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.051c: nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.052c: svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.053a: brāhmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavat
GE07mbh_13_u:131.053c: yat tatra bījaṃ vapati sā kṛṣiḥ pāralaukikī
GE07mbh_13_u:131.056a: evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.058a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:131.058c: brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnute umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:132.001c: dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:132.002a: karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhaṃ hi naraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:132.002c: badhyate bandhanaiḥ pāśair mucyate 'py atha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.003a: kena śīlena vā deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vā
GE07mbh_13_u:132.003c: samācārair guṇair vākyaiḥ svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.007a: karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:132.007c: ye na sajjanti kasmiṃś cid badhyante te na karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.011a: mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:132.012a: stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:132.015a: eṣa devakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.015c: akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.016c: vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.016e: svargavāsam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:132.017a: vācātha badhyate yena mucyate 'py atha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.017c: tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha
GE07mbh_13_u:132.018c: ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.019a: vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:132.019c: anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.021a: kaṭukāṃ ye na bhāṣante paruṣāṃ niṣṭhurāṃ giram
GE07mbh_13_u:132.022a: piśunāṃ ye na bhāṣante mitrabhedakarīṃ giram
GE07mbh_13_u:132.022c: ṛtāṃ maitrīṃ prabhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.023a: varjayanti sadā sūcyaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.025a: na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāraṇīm
GE07mbh_13_u:132.025c: sāntvaṃ vadanti kruddhāpi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.026a: eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.026c: śubhaḥ satyaguṇo nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:132.027a: manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:132.027c: tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:132.028c: svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:132.029c: badhyate mānavo yena śṛṇu cānyac chubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:132.030a: araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ vīkṣya ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.030c: manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.031a: grāme gṛhe vā yad dravyaṃ pārakyaṃ vijane sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:132.031c: nābhinandanti vai nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.032c: manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.033a: śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.033c: bhajanti maitrāḥ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.034c: svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.035a: avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaparāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:132.037c: vipākajñāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.039c: svargamārgopagā bhūyaḥ kim anyac chrotum icchasi umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:132.040a: mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaś cin martyān prati maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:132.040c: tasmāt taṃ naipuṇenādya mamākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:132.041a: kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:132.041c: tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:132.042a: kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.042c: vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy anindita
GE07mbh_13_u:132.043c: akulīnās tathā cānye kulīnāś ca tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:132.044a: durdarśāḥ ke cid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā iva
GE07mbh_13_u:132.044c: priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.045a: duṣprajñāḥ ke cid ābhānti ke cid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.046a: alpābādhās tathā ke cin mahābādhās tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:132.046c: dṛśyante puruṣā deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:132.047c: martyaloke narāḥ sarve yena svaṃ bhuñjate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:132.048c: nityam udyatadaṇḍaś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.051a: nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.051c: yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sa kṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.052a: atha cen nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhi cit
GE07mbh_13_u:132.052c: mānuṣyaṃ labhate cāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:132.053a: pāpena karmaṇā devi baddho hiṃsāratir naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.054c: nikṣiptadaṇḍo nirdaṇḍo na hinasti kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:132.055a: na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodate
GE07mbh_13_u:132.056c: upapannān sukhān bhogān upāśnāti mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:132.057a: atha cen mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:132.057c: tatra dīrghāyur utpannaḥ sa naraḥ sukham edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:133.001a: kiṃśīlāḥ kiṃsamācārāḥ puruṣāḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.003a: pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kūpān prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:133.003c: naityakāni ca sarvāṇi kim icchakam atīva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:133.004a: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ dhanaṃ ratnaṃ gṛhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:133.004c: sasyajātāni sarvāṇi gāḥ kṣetrāṇy atha yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.006a: tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān
GE07mbh_13_u:133.008a: tatra kāmaguṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samupeto mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.009c: brahmaṇā vai purā proktāḥ sarvasya priyadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.012a: na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanam
GE07mbh_13_u:133.012c: na gāvo nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:133.013a: apravṛttās tu ye lubdhā nāstikā dānavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.013c: evaṃbhūtā narā devi nirayaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.014a: te cen manuṣyatāṃ yānti yadā kālasya paryayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:133.016c: anena karmaṇā devi bhavanty adhanino narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.017a: apare stambhino nityaṃ māninaḥ pāpato ratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.017c: āsanārhasya ye pīṭhaṃ na prayacchanty acetasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.018a: mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ na yacchanty alpabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.018c: pādyārhasya ca ye pādyaṃ na dadaty alpabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.019a: arghārhān na ca satkārair arcayanti yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:133.019c: arghyam ācamanīyaṃ vā na yacchanty alpabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.020a: guruṃ cābhigataṃ premṇā guruvan na bubhūṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:133.022a: te vai yadi narās tasmān nirayād uttaranti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:133.022c: varṣapūgais tato janma labhante kutsite kule
GE07mbh_13_u:133.024a: na stambhī na ca mānī yo devatādvijapūjakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.027a: mārgārhāya dadan mārgaṃ guruṃ guruvad arcayan
GE07mbh_13_u:133.030c: svakarmaphalam āpnoti svayam eva naraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:133.031c: eṣa dharmo mayā prokto vidhātrā svayam īritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.032c: hastābhyāṃ yadi vā padbhyāṃ rajjvā daṇḍena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.033a: loṣṭaiḥ stambhair upāyair vā jantūn bādhati śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:133.035a: sa cen mānuṣatāṃ gacched yadi kālasya paryayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:133.039a: na rajjvā na ca daṇḍena na loṣṭair nāyudhena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:133.040c: tatrāsau bhavane divye mudā vasati devavat
GE07mbh_13_u:133.041c: alpābādho nirītīkaḥ sa jātaḥ sukham edhate
GE07mbh_13_u:133.042c: eṣa devi satāṃ mārgo bādhā yatra na vidyate umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:133.044e: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ chinddhi sarvadharmavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:133.045a: jātyandhāś cāpare deva rogārtāś cāpare tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:133.045c: narāḥ klībāś ca dṛśyante kāraṇaṃ brūhi tatra vai
GE07mbh_13_u:133.047a: varjayanty aśubhaṃ karma sevamānāḥ śubhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:133.047c: labhante svargatiṃ nityam iha loke sukhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:133.048a: sa cen mānuṣatāṃ yāti medhāvī tatra jāyate
GE07mbh_13_u:133.049a: paradāreṣu ye mūḍhāś cakṣur duṣṭaṃ prayuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:133.049c: tena duṣṭasvabhāvena jātyandhās te bhavanti ha
GE07mbh_13_u:133.050a: manasā tu praduṣṭena nagnāṃ paśyanti ye striyam
GE07mbh_13_u:133.051a: ye tu mūḍhā durācārā viyonau maithune ratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.052a: paśūṃś ca ye bandhayanti ye caiva gurutalpagāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.052c: prakīrṇamaithunā ye ca klībā jāyanti te narāḥ umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:133.053a: sāvadyaṃ kiṃ nu vai karma niravadyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:133.054a: śreyāṃsaṃ mārgam ātiṣṭhan sadā yaḥ pṛcchate dvijān
GE07mbh_13_u:133.055a: yadi mānuṣatāṃ devi kadā cit sa nigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:133.056a: eṣa devi satāṃ dharmo mantavyo bhūtikārakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.056c: nṛṇāṃ hitārthāya tava mayā vai samudāhṛtaḥ umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:133.059a: yajvānaś ca tathaivānye nirhomāś ca tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:133.061a: adharmaṃ dharmam ity āhur ye ca mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:133.063a: eṣa devi mayā sarvaḥ saṃśayacchedanāya te
GE07mbh_13_u:133.063c: kuśalākuśalo nṝṇāṃ vyākhyāto dharmasāgaraḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.002c: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ varārohe pṛṣṭā vada mamepsitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.003a: sāvitrī brahmaṇaḥ sādhvī kauśikasya śacī satī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.004a: varuṇasya tato gaurī sūryasya ca suvarcalā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.004c: rohiṇī śaśinaḥ sādhvī svāhā caiva vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.005c: pṛṣṭāś copāsitāś caiva tās tvayā devi nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.007c: samānasāravīryā ca tapas tīvraṃ kṛtaṃ ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.007e: tvayā hy ukto viśeṣeṇa pramāṇatvam upaiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.008a: striyaś caiva viśeṣeṇa strījanasya gatiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.008c: gaur gāṃ gacchati suśroṇi lokeṣv eṣā sthitiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.009a: mama cārdhaṃ śarīrasya mama cārdhād viniḥsṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.010a: tava sarvaḥ suviditaḥ strīdharmaḥ śāśvataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.010c: tasmād aśeṣato brūhi strīdharmaṃ vistareṇa me umovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.011c: tvatprabhāvād iyaṃ deva vāk caiva pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.012a: imās tu nadyo deveśa sarvatīrthodakair yutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.013c: prabhavan yo 'nahaṃvādī sa vai puruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.014a: strī ca bhūteśa satataṃ striyam evānudhāvati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.015a: eṣā sarasvatī puṇyā nadīnām uttamā nadī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.016a: vipāśā ca vitastā ca candrabhāgā irāvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.016c: śatadrur devikā sindhuḥ kauśikī gomatī tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.017c: gaganād gāṃ gatā devī gaṅgā sarvasaridvarā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.018a: ity uktvā devadevasya patnī dharmabhṛtāṃ varā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.018c: smitapūrvam ivābhāṣya sarvās tāḥ saritas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.019c: strīdharmakuśalās tā vai gaṅgādyāḥ saritāṃ varāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.020c: taṃ tu saṃmantrya yuṣmābhir vaktum icchāmi śaṃkare
GE07mbh_13_u:134.021a: na caikasādhyaṃ paśyāmi vijñānaṃ bhuvi kasya cit
GE07mbh_13_u:134.021c: divi vā sāgaragamās tena vo mānayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.022a: evaṃ sarvāḥ saricchreṣṭhāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ puṇyatamāḥ śivāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.022c: tato devanadī gaṅgā niyuktā pratipūjya tām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.026a: prabhavan pṛcchate yo hi saṃmānayati vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.026c: nūnaṃ janam aduṣṭātmā paṇḍitākhyāṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.027c: pravaktṝn pṛcchate yo 'nyān sa vai nā padam arcchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.028c: anyathaiva hy ahaṃmānī durbalaṃ vadate vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.029c: tvam evārhasi no devi strīdharmam anuśāsitum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.030a: tataḥ sārādhitā devī gaṅgayā bahubhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.031a: strīdharmo māṃ prati yathā pratibhāti yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.031c: tam ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi tathaiva prathito bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.032a: strīdharmaḥ pūrva evāyaṃ vivāhe bandhubhiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.033d-0630_01: daṃpatyor eṣa vai dharmaḥ sahadharmakṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.034a: sā bhaved dharmaparamā sā bhaved dharmabhāginī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.034c: devavat satataṃ sādhvī yā bhartāraṃ prapaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.035a: śuśrūṣāṃ paricāraṃ ca devavad yā karoti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.036c: yā sādhvī niyatācārā sā bhaved dharmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.038a: paruṣāṇy api coktā yā dṛṣṭā vā krūracakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.038c: suprasannamukhī bhartur yā nārī sā pativratā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.039a: na candrasūryau na taruṃ puṃnāmno yā nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.040c: patiṃ putram ivopāste sā nārī dharmabhāginī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.041a: yā nārī prayatā dakṣā yā nārī putriṇī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.042a: śuśrūṣāṃ paricaryāṃ ca karoty avimanāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.042c: supratītā vinītā ca sā nārī dharmabhāginī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.043a: na kāmeṣu na bhogeṣu naiśvarye na sukhe tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.043c: spṛhā yasyā yathā patyau sā nārī dharmabhāginī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.047c: mātāpitṛparā nityaṃ yā nārī sā tapodhanā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.048c: bibharty annena yā nārī sā pativratabhāginī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.049a: vrataṃ carati yā nityaṃ duścaraṃ laghusattvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.050a: puṇyam etat tapaś caiva svargaś caiṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.050c: yā nārī bhartṛparamā bhaved bhartṛvratā śivā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.051a: patir hi devo nārīṇāṃ patir bandhuḥ patir gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.051c: patyā samā gatir nāsti daivataṃ vā yathā patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.052a: patiprasādaḥ svargo vā tulyo nāryā na vā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.052c: ahaṃ svargaṃ na hīccheyaṃ tvayy aprīte maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:134.053a: yady akāryam adharmaṃ vā yadi vā prāṇanāśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.053c: patir brūyād daridro vā vyādhito vā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.055a: eṣa deva mayā proktaḥ strīdharmo vacanāt tava
GE07mbh_13_u:134.055c: yā tv evaṃbhāvinī nārī sā bhaved dharmabhāginī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.056a: ity uktaḥ sa tu deveśaḥ pratipūjya gireḥ sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.056c: lokān visarjayām āsa sarvair anucaraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057a: tato yayur bhūtagaṇāḥ saritaś ca yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057c: gandharvāpsarasaś caiva praṇamya śirasā bhavam vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0001: anuśāsya śubhair vākyair bhīṣmas tv āha mahāmatim janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0002: prītyā punaḥ sa śuśrūṣur vacanaṃ yad yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0003: pitāmaho me viprarṣe bhīṣmaṃ kālavaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0004: kim apṛcchat tadā rājā sarvasāmāsikaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0006: tan me vada mahāprājña śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0008: yad apṛcchat tadā rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0012: śrūyatāṃ me hi vacanam arthitvāt prabravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0014: āgamair bahubhiḥ sphīto bhavān naḥ paramaḥ kule
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0016: bhavatā guruṇā caiva dhanyā bata vayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0017: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto durlabho jñātibāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0018: śāstā nu nāsti naḥ kaś cit tvad ṛte puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0020: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ vākyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0023: asyaiva tu samakṣaṃ naḥ pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0024: itivṛttaṃ purāṇaṃ ca śrotṝṇāṃ paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0025: yadi te 'ham anugrāhyo bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'nagha vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0026: matpriyārthaṃ tu kauravya snehād bhāṣitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0027: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād āgataviklavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0028: prapibann iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0029: śṛṇu rājan purā vṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0030: etāvad uktvā gāṅgeyaḥ praṇamya śirasā harim
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0037: devalaḥ kāśyapaś caiva hastikāśyapa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0038: jamadagniś ca rājendra dhaumyo vālmīkir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0041: keśavas tān abhigatān prītyā saṃpratigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0050: yatra devī mahādevam apṛcchat saṃśayān purā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0051: kathayām āsa śarvas tān devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0052: umāpatyoś ca saṃvādaṃ śṛṇu tāta manoramam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0053: varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmaś ca tatra tāta samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0054: ṛṣidharmaś ca nikhilo rājadharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0057: vidhānam atra saṃproktaṃ yamasya niyamasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0061: strīdharmaś ca svayaṃ devyā devadevāya bhāṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0062: evamādi śubhaṃ sarvaṃ tatra tāta samāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0064: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ dharmyaṃ ca paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0065: puṣṭiyogam idaṃ divyaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0066: itihāsam imaṃ divyaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0067: sāyaṃ prātaḥ sadā samyak śrotavyaṃ ca bubhūṣatā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0070: agninā tena mahatā niḥsṛtena mukhād vibhoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0071: paśyatām eva sarveṣāṃ dagdha eva nagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0078: tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca sarveṣām abhavad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0079: taṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ sarve munigaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0081: na kiṃ cid abruvaṃs tatra śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0085: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarve yāthātathyam aninditāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0088: bhavān sṛjati vai lokān bhavān saṃharati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0089: bhavāñ śītaṃ bhavān uṣṇaṃ bhavān satyaṃ bhavān kratuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0090: bhavān ādir bhavān anto bhavato 'nyan na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0091: sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ sarvaṃ tvam eva puruṣottama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0092: tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ tāta lokacakraṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0093: tvam evārhasi tad vaktuṃ mukhād agnivinirgamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0096: yad icchet tatra vaktavyaṃ kuto 'smākaṃ niyogataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0097: nityaṃ hitārthaṃ lokānāṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0098: tasmāl lokahitaṃ guhyaṃ śrūyatāṃ kathayāmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0099: asuraḥ sāṃprataṃ kaś cid ahito lokanāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0101: babhūva sa mayā vadhyo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0102: putreṇa me vadho dṛṣṭas tasya vai munipuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0103: tadarthaṃ putram evāhaṃ sisṛkṣur vanam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0104: ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ putram ahaṃ janayituṃ vrataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0106: athātmā mama dehasthaḥ so 'gnir bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0107: viniḥsṛtya gato draṣṭuṃ kṣaṇena ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0109: anujñātaś ca tenaiva punar āyān mamāntikam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0110: etan me vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mama vaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0112: dṛṣṭvā nāśaṃ gires tasya saumyabhāvatayā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0113: punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātreṇa girir āsīd yathāpuram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0114: etad guhyaṃ mayā tathyaṃ kathitaṃ vaḥ samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0115: bhavanto vyathitā yena vismitāś ca tapodhanāḥ bhagavān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0116: ṛṣīṇām evam uktvā tu tān punaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0117: bhavatāṃ darśanād eva prītir abhyadhikā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0121: tasmād bhavadbhir yat kiṃ cid dṛṣṭaṃ vāpy atha vā śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0122: āścaryabhūtaṃ lokeṣu tad bhavanto bruvantu me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0123: yuṣmābhiḥ kathitaṃ yat syāt tapasā bhāvitātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0126: śraddheyaṃ śravaṇīyaṃ ca vacanaṃ hi satāṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0127: tatsaṃyogaṃ hi tan me 'stu na vṛthā kartum arhatha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0128: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ tasmāt saphalaṃ tu bhaven mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0135: ayuktam asmān evaṃ tvaṃ vācā varada bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0137: evaṃ pūjayituṃ cāsmān na caivārhasi keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0138: tad vastv anyan na paśyāmo yal loke te na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0139: divi vā bhuvi vā kiṃ cit tat sarvaṃ hi tvayā tatam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0140: na vidmahe vayaṃ deva kathyamānaṃ tavāntike
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0141: evam ukto hṛṣīkeśaḥ sasmitaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0143: tasmān mānuṣavad vīryaṃ mama jānīta suvratāḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0144: bhavadbhiḥ kathyamānaṃ ca apūrvam iva tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0147: tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāradaṃ devadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0150: purāṇajñaś ca vāgmī ca kāraṇais taṃ ca menire
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0151: sarve tadarhaṇaṃ kṛtvā nāradaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0153: dṛṣṭaṃ vai yat tad āścaryaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ paramaṃ priyam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0154: tattvaṃ tvam aviśeṣeṇa hitārthaṃ sarvam āditaḥ bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0155: priyārthaṃ keśavasyāsya sa bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0156: tadā saṃcoditaḥ sarvair ṛṣibhir nāradas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0159: tato nārāyaṇasuhṛn nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0170: nṛtyadbhir bhūtasaṃghaiś ca sarvatas tv abhiśobhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0178: samājaṃ tadvane dṛṣṭaṃ mayā bhūtapateḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0180: ṣaṭpadair upagītaṃ ca prathame māsi mādhave
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0185: ye cordhvaretasaḥ siddhās tatra tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0190: oṣadhyaḥ prajvalantyaś ca dyotayantyo diśo daśa
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0191: vihagāś ca mudā yuktā nṛtyanti ca nadanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0200: ṛṣibhiś cāpsarobhiś ca sarvataś cāpi śobhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0206: ṛṣayo bhūtasaṃghāś ca praṇamya śirasā haram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0209: ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca tathā viprarṣayaś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0218: āgamya tu gireḥ putrī devadevasya cāntikam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0221: avekṣya hṛṣṭā svagaṇān smayantī pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0226: hāhākāras tv ṛṣīṇāṃ ca lokānām abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0228: tṛtīyaṃ cāsya saṃbhūtaṃ lalāṭe netram āyatam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0231: adahyata giriḥ sarvo himavān agrataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0235: babhūva ca jagat sarvaṃ tathā vismayasaṃyutam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0238: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mathitaṃ śailaṃ śailaputrī saviklavā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0239: pituḥ śamanam icchantī papāta bhuvi pādayoḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0240: tad dṛṣṭvā devadeveśo devyā duḥkham anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0241: haimavatyāḥ priyārthaṃ ca giriṃ punar avaikṣata
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0246: pitaraṃ prakṛtisthaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā haimavatī bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0252: vismayo me mahāñ jātas tasmin netrāgnisaṃplute
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0255: netrāgninā tu mahatā nirdagdho himavān asau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0256: punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātras tu prakṛtisthaḥ pitā mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0257: eṣa me saṃśayo deva hṛdi saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0258: devadeva namas tubhyaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0259: evam uktas tayā devyā prīyamāṇo 'bravīd bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0261: tvad ṛte māṃ hi vai praṣṭuṃ na śakyaṃ kena cit priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0262: prakāśaṃ yadi vā guhyaṃ tvatpriyārthaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0263: śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilam asyāṃ saṃsadi bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0264: sarveṣām eva lokānāṃ kūṭasthaṃ viddhi māṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0265: madadhīnās trayo lokā yathā viṣṇau tathā mayi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0266: sraṣṭā viṣṇur ahaṃ goptā iti tad viddhi bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0267: tasmād yadā māṃ spṛśati śubhaṃ vā yadi vetarat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0268: tathaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tat tad bhavati śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0269: etad guhyam ajānantyā tvayā bālyād anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0270: netre me pihite devi krīḍanārthaṃ dṛḍhavrate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0273: tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ lokān saṃrakṣituṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0274: asyaiva tejasākṣṇo me mathito 'yaṃ giriḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0276: tvatpriyārthaṃ kṛto devi prakṛtisthaḥ punar mayā nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0279: umā devī mahādevam apṛcchat punar eva tu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0281: caturmukho vai bhagavān abhavat kena hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0282: bhagavan kena vai vaktram aindram adbhutadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0284: dakṣiṇaṃ ca mukhaṃ raudraṃ kenordhvaṃ jaṭilāvṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0285: yathādiśaṃ mahādeva śrotum icchāmi kāraṇam maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0286: eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0287: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yat tvaṃ pṛcchasi bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0295: tilottameti vikhyātā apsarāḥ sā babhūva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0297: sā tu paryantam āgamya rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0299: iti matvā tadā cāhaṃ kurvantīṃ māṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0300: tathaiva tāṃ didṛkṣuś ca caturvaktro 'bhavaṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0301: aindraṃ mukham idaṃ pūrvaṃ tapaścaryāparaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0302: dakṣiṇaṃ me mukhaṃ divyaṃ raudraṃ saṃharati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0303: lokakāryaparaṃ nityaṃ paścimaṃ me mukhaṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0304: vedān adhīte satatam adbhutaṃ cottaraṃ mukham umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0305: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0306: bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi śūlapāṇe varaprada maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0307: kimarthaṃ nīlatā kaṇṭhe bhāti barhanibhā tava
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0308: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0313: tad dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve tadā vimanaso 'bhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0314: grastaṃ hi tan mayā devi lokānāṃ hitakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0315: tatkṛtā nīlatā cāsīt kaṇṭhe barhinibhā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0316: tadāprabhṛti caivāhaṃ nīlakaṇṭha iti smṛtaḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0317: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0319: bahūnām āyudhānāṃ tvaṃ pinākaṃ dhartum icchasi maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0320: kimarthaṃ devadeveśa tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0321: śastrāgamaṃ te vakṣyāmi śṛṇu dharmyaṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0323: sa hi divyāṃ tapaścaryāṃ kartum evopacakrame
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0324: tathā tasya tapo ghoraṃ carataḥ kālaparyayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0325: valmīkaṃ punar udbhūtaṃ tasyaiva śirasi priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0326: veṇur valmīkasaṃyogān mūrdhni tasya babhūva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0327: dharamāṇaś ca tat sarvaṃ tapaścaryām athākarot
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0328: tasmai brahmā varaṃ dātuṃ jagāma tapasārcitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0329: dattvā tasmai varaṃ devo veṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā tv acintayat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0332: viṣṇor mama ca sāmarthyaṃ jñātvā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0333: dhanuṣī dve tadā prādād viṣṇave ca mamaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0334: pinākaṃ nāma me cāpaṃ śārṅgaṃ nāma harer dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0336: tac ca somāya nirdiśya brahmalokaṃ gataḥ punaḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0337: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śastrāgamam anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0340: ayaṃ tu vṛṣabhaḥ kasmād vāhanatvam upāgamat maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0341: eṣa me saṃśayo deva taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0342: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi vāhanaṃ sa yathābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0345: ahaṃ tu tapa ātiṣṭhe tasmin kāle śubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0347: gāvo me pārśvam āviśya darpotsiktāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0348: sthānabhraṃśaṃ tu me devi cakrire bahuśas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0350: tasmād dagdhā mayā gāvo roṣāviṣṭena cetasā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0351: tasmiṃs tu vyasane ghore vartamāne paśūn prati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0356: tasmān me gopatitvaṃ ca devair gobhiś ca kalpitam umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0357: prasannaś cābhavaṃ devi tadā gopatitāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0359: āvāseṣu vicitreṣu ramyeṣu ca śubheṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0360: satsu cānyeṣu deśeṣu śmaśāne ramase katham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0364: evaṃ kalevarakṣetre durdarśe ramase katham maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0365: eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0366: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0368: nādhyagacchaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ deśaṃ śucitamaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0369: eṣa me 'bhiniveśo 'bhūt tasmin kāle prajāḥ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0374: yatas tataś caranti sma nighnantaḥ prāṇino bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0375: evaṃ loke kṣayaṃ yāte prāṇihīne pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0376: cintayaṃs tatpratīkāraṃ māṃ ca śaktaṃ hi nigrahe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0377: evaṃ jñātvā tadā brahmā tasmin karmaṇy ayojayat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0378: tac ca prāṇidayārthaṃ tu mayāpy anumataṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0379: tasmāt saṃrakṣitā devi bhūtebhyaḥ prāṇino bhayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0380: asmāc chmaśānān medhyaṃ tu nāsti kiṃ cid anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0382: bhūtasṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ cāhaṃ śmaśāne saṃnyaveśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0384: na ca bhūtagaṇenāhaṃ vinā vasitum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0385: tasmān me saṃnivāsāya śmaśāne rocate manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0386: medhyakāmair dvijair nityaṃ medhyam ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0387: ācaradbhir vrataṃ raudraṃ mokṣakāmaiś ca sevyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0388: sthānaṃ me tatra vihitaṃ vīrasthānam iti priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0391: āyuṣkāmair aśuddhair vā na gantavyam iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0392: mad anyena na śakyaṃ hi nihantuṃ bhūtajaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0393: tatrastho 'haṃ prajāḥ sarvāḥ pālayāmi dine dine
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0394: manniyogād bhūtasaṃghā na ca ghnantīha kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0395: tasmāl lokahitārthāya śmaśāne ramayāmy aham umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0396: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0398: piṅgalaṃ vikṛtaṃ bhāti rūpaṃ te subhayānakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0402: kimartham īdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0403: tad ahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvaṃ samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0404: dvividho laukiko bhāvaḥ śītam uṣṇam iti priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0405: tayor vigrathitaṃ sarvaṃ saumyāgneyam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0406: saumyatvaṃ satataṃ viṣṇau mayy āgneyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0407: anena vapuṣā nityaṃ sarvalokān bibharmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0409: āgneyam iti me rūpaṃ devi lokahite ratam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0410: yady ahaṃ viparītaḥ syām etat tyaktvā śubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0412: tasmān mayedaṃ dhriyate rūpaṃ lokahitaiṣiṇā umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0413: iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0415: kimarthaṃ candrarekhā te śirobhāge virocate maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0416: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0417: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0421: devā vibhraṃśitās te vai yeṣāṃ bhāgaḥ kratau kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0422: somas tatra mayā devi kupitena bhṛśārditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0425: tan me cintayataś cāsīt paścāttāpaḥ punaḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0426: tadāprabhṛti somaṃ hi śirasā dhārayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0427: evaṃ me pāpahānis tu bhaved iti matir mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0428: tadāprabhṛti vai somo mūrdhni saṃdṛśyate sadā nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0433: namo ghoratarād ghora namo rudra bhayaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0434: namaḥ śāntatarāc chānta namaś candrasya pālaka
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0435: namaḥ somāya devāya namas tubhyaṃ caturmukha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0440: aho devasya māhātmyaṃ mahādevasya vai kṛpā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0442: evaṃ bruvatsu muniṣu vaco devy abravīd dharam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0443: prītyarthaṃ ca munīnāṃ sā kṣaṇajñā paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0445: asya vai ṛṣisaṃghasya mama ca priyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0447: na tṛptir asti deveśa śravaṇīyaṃ hi te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0448: sadharmacāriṇī ceyaṃ bhaktā ceyam iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0449: vaktum arhasi deveśa lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0450: yāthātathyena tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0451: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yat te devi manaḥpriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0452: śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ dharmaṃ varṇāśramāśritam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0453: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ceti caturvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0455: karmāṇi ca tadarhāṇi śāstreṣu vihitāni vai
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0456: yadi cedekavarṇaṃ syāj jagat sarvaṃ vinaśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0457: sahaiva devair varṇāni catvāri vihitāny uta
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0458: mukhato brāhmaṇāḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te vāgviśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0461: śūdrāś ca pādataḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te paricārakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0462: teṣāṃ dharmāṃś ca karmāṇi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0463: viprāḥ kṛtā bhūmidevā lokānāṃ dhāraṇe kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0464: te kaiś cin nāvamantavyā brāhmaṇā hitam icchubhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0465: yadi te brāhmaṇā na syur dānayogavahāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0466: ubhayor lokayor devi sthitir na syāt samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0467: lokeṣu durlabhaṃ kiṃ tu brāhmaṇatvam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0468: abudho vā daridro vā pūjanīyaḥ sadaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0469: brāhmaṇaṃ yo 'vamanyeta nindayet krośayec ca vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0470: prahareta hared vāpi dhanaṃ teṣāṃ narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0472: sa ca mām avamanyeta māṃ krośati ca nindati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0475: svādhyāyo yajanaṃ dānaṃ tasya dharma iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0476: karmāṇy adhyāpanaṃ caiva yājanaṃ ca pratigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0477: satyaṃ śāntis tapaḥ śaucaṃ tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0480: tapa eva sadā dharmo brāhmaṇasya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0481: sa tu dharmārtham utpannaḥ pūrvaṃ dhātrā tapobalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0490: iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca vidhipūrvaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0493: yas tu kṣatragato dharmas tvayā devi pracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0494: tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0495: kṣatriyās tu tathā devi prajānāṃ pālane smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0496: yadi na kṣatriyo loke jagat syād adharottaram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0497: rakṣaṇāt kṣatriyair eva jagad bhavati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0498: tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharmataḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0502: bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0506: evaṃ te vihitāḥ pūrvair dharmāḥ karmavidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0507: tathaiva devi vaiśyāś ca lokayātrāhitāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0508: anye tān upajīvanti pratyakṣaphaladā hi te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0509: yadi na syus tathā vaiśyā na bhaveyus tathā pare
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0510: teṣām adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharma iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0511: vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0513: vāṇijyaṃ satpathe sthānam ātitheyaṃ sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0515: tilagandharasāś caiva na vikreyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0518: evaṃ te vihitā devi lokayātrā svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0520: śūdrāś ca yadi te na syuḥ karmakartā na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0521: trayaḥ pūrve śūdramūlās tasmāt karmakarāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0523: vārtā ca kārukarmāṇi śilpaṃ nāṭyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0526: evamādi tathānyac ca śūdrakarma iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0527: te 'py evaṃ vihitā loke karmayogāḥ śubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0528: evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ puṇyalokāḥ paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0529: vihitāś ca tathā dṛṣṭā yathāvad dharmacāriṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0530: eṣa varṇāśrayo dharmaḥ karma caiva tadarpaṇam umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0531: kathitaṃ śrotukāmāyāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0532: bhagavan devadeveśa namas te vṛṣabhadhvaja maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0533: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva dharmam āśramiṇāṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0535: āśramāṇāṃ tu yo dharmaḥ kriyate brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0542: evamādi śubhaṃ cānyat kuryāt tadvṛttavān gṛhī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0543: evaṃ saṃcaratas tasya puṇyalokā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0546: vanyair eva sadāhārair vartayed iti ca sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0550: brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā śaucaṃ tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0551: evaṃ sa vigate prāṇe devaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0552: yatidharmās tathā devi saṅgāṃs tyaktvā yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0555: sadā dhyānaparatvaṃ ca doṣaśuddhiḥ kṣamā dayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0557: brahmacārī ca yo devi janmaprabhṛti dīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0561: svādhyāyaḥ satataṃ devi tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0562: tasya ceṣṭā tu gurvartham āprāṇāntam iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0563: guror abhāve tatputre guruvad vṛttim ācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0564: evaṃ so 'py amalāṃl lokān brāhmaṇaḥ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0565: eṣa te kathito devi dharmaś cāśramavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0566: cāturvarṇyāśrame yukto loka ity eva vidyate umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0567: kathitaṃ te samāsena kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0569: ayaṃ tv ṛṣigaṇo deva tapas tepa iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0571: asya kiṃlakṣaṇo dharmaḥ kīdṛśaś cāgamas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0572: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me vada varaprada 13,134.057d@015_0572
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0573: evaṃ vadantyāṃ rudrāṇyām ṛṣayaḥ sādhu sādhv iti
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0576: tvatprasādād vayaṃ devi śroṣyāmaḥ paramaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0577: dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ sarve pādamūlaṃ tavāśritāḥ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0578: iti sarve tadā devīṃ vācā samabhipūjayan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0584: tathā saṃcaratāṃ teṣāṃ devi dharmavidhiṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0585: bhūtvā pūrvaṃ gṛhasthas tu putrānṛṇyam avāpya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0588: nirdvaṃdvo vā sadāro vā vanavāsāya saṃvrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0591: tatra gatvā vidhiṃ jñātvā dīkṣāṃ kuryād yathākramam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0608: evaṃ dharmāḥ purā dṛṣṭāḥ sāmānyā vanavāsinām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0609: evaṃ vai yatamānasya kāladharmo yadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0612: paribhraṣṭo yadā svargād viśiṣṭas tu bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0613: evaṃ dharmaḥ sadā devi sarveṣāṃ vanavāsinām umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0614: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0615: bhagavan devadeveśa ṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ śubham maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0616: viśeṣadharmān icchāmi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0617: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0619: vanaṃ gurum ivālambya vastavyam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0627: evaṃ kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma paścād yāti triviṣṭapam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0628: tatrāpi sumahat kālaṃ sa vihṛtya yathāsukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0631: bhagavan sarvabhūteśa teṣu ye dārasaṃyutāḥ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0632: kīdṛśaṃ caritaṃ teṣāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0634: vindhyapādeṣu ye ke cid ye ca naimiṣavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0636: sarve te vidhidṛṣṭena caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0644: poṣaṇārthaṃ ca dārāṇām agnikāryārtham eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0645: gāvaś ca karṣaṇaṃ caiva sarvam etad vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0647: te svadāraiḥ samāyānti puṇyāṃl lokān dṛḍhavratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0648: patibhiḥ saha ye dārāś caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0649: avyagrabhāvād aikātmyāt te ca gacchanti vai divam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0650: etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,134.057d@015_0650
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0651: bhagavan devadeveśa teṣāṃ karmaphalaṃ vibho maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0652: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva prasādāt te varaprada
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0659: marutāṃ lokam āsthāya tatra bhogaiś ca yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0671: evaṃ dṛḍhavratā devi vānaprasthāś ca karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0673: tebhyo bhraṣṭāḥ punar devi jāyante nṛṣu bhoginaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0675: etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,134.057d@015_0675
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0676: eṣāṃ yāyāvarāṇāṃ tu dharmam icchāmi mānada maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0677: kṛpayā parayāviṣṭas taṃ me brūhi maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0678: dharmaṃ yāyāvarāṇāṃ tu śṛṇu bhāmini tatparā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0687: etat te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi 13,134.057d@015_0688
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0688: teṣāṃ cakracarāṇāṃ tu dharmam icchāmi vai prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0689: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu śākaṭikaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0690: saṃvahanto dhuraṃ dāraiḥ śākaṭānāṃ tu sarvadā
