GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0699: tatra pramuditā bhogair vicaranti yathāsukham umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0700: etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,134.057d@015_0701
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0701: vaikhānasānāṃ vai dharmaṃ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0710: abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāś ca nirāhārās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0712: svavaśād eva te mṛtyum abhikāṅkṣanti nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0714: amaraiḥ saha te yānti devavad bhogasaṃyutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0716: etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 13,134.057d@015_0717
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0724: udyantaṃ satataṃ sūryaṃ stuvanto vividhaiḥ stavaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0727: teṣv eva nirmalaṃ satyaṃ lokārthaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0728: loko 'yaṃ dhāryate devi teṣām eva tapobalāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0729: mahātmanāṃ tu tapasā satyena ca śucismite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0730: kṣamayā ca mahābhāge bhūtānāṃ saṃsthitiṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0731: prajārtham api lokārthaṃ mahadbhiḥ kriyate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0732: tapasā prāpyate sarvaṃ tapasā prāpyate phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0733: duṣprāpam api yal loke tapasā prāpyate hi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0736: tasmād ayaṃ ṛṣigaṇas tapas tepa iti priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0737: dharmānveṣī tapaḥ kartuṃ yatate satataṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0738: amaratvaṃ vaśitvaṃ ca tapasā prārthayet sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0739: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇvantyās te śrutaṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0741: iti bruvantaṃ deveśam ṛṣayaś cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0743: uktas tvayā trivargasya dharmaḥ paramakaḥ śubhaḥ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0744: sarvavyāpī tu yo dharmo bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0749: ime hi dharmā lokārthaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0750: pṛthivyāṃ sajjanair nityaṃ kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0751: svadāraniratir dharmo nityaṃ japyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0755: trivargaṃ tu vyatikrāntas tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0756: ṣaṭ karmāṇi ca proktāni sṛṣṭāni brahmaṇā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0758: yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva dānaṃ pātre pratigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0762: ayaṃ paramako dharmaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ satsu vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0768: pādyam arghyaṃ yathānyāyam āsanaṃ śayanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0769: dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ caiva yo dadāti sa dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0770: prātar utthāya vai paścād bhojanena nimantrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0771: satkṛtyānuvrajed yaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0773: tad ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi trivargeṣu ca yad yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0777: tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi tāṃ śṛṇuṣva samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0780: arcayanti varārohe teṣām api phalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0781: pātram ity eva dātavyaṃ sarvasmai dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0782: āgamiṣyati yat pātraṃ tat pātraṃ tārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0786: cittamūlo bhaved dharmo dharmamūlaṃ bhaved yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0787: tasmāt saumyena cittena dātavyaṃ devi sarvadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0788: saumyacittas tu yo dadyāt tad dhi dānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0790: kedārāś ca taṭākāni sarāṃsi saritas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0792: alpam alpam api hy etad dīyamānaṃ vivardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0793: pīḍayāpi ca bhṛtyānāṃ dānam eva viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0794: putradārā dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ na mṛtān anugacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0795: śreyo dānaṃ ca bhogaś ca dhanaṃ prāpya yaśasvini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0797: nāsti bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti dānasamo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0798: nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0803: gṛhāśramasya te devi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0804: gṛhāśramasya yā caryā vratāni niyamāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0805: yathā ca devatāḥ pūjyāḥ satataṃ gṛhamedhinā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0806: yad yac ca parihartavyaṃ gṛhiṇā tithiparvasu maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0807: tat sarvaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyamānaṃ tvayā prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0808: gṛhāśramasya yan mūlaṃ phalaṃ dharmo 'yam uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0809: pādaiś caturbhiḥ satataṃ dharmo yatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0811: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ dharmacāriṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0812: śuśrūṣate yaḥ pitaraḥ mātaraṃ ca gṛhāśrame
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0813: bhartāraṃ caiva yā nārī agnihotraṃ ca ye dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0814: teṣu teṣu ca prīṇanti devā indrapurogamāḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0817: vidhavānāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ bhavān etad bravītu me maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0824: dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ caiva dadyāt pādyāsanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0825: pañcame 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā dvādaśe vāpy athāṣṭame
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0828: naiteṣv ahaḥsu kurvīta teṣv alakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0838: yathā mātaram āśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0839: tathā gṛhāśramaṃ prāpya sarve jīvanti cāśramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0841: vyālagrāhāś ca dambhāś ca corā rājabhaṭās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0844: ete cānye ca bahavas tarkayanti gṛhāśramam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0845: mārjārā mūṣikāḥ śvānaḥ sūkarāś ca śukās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0849: gṛhe kṣetre bile caiva śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0850: gṛhasthena kṛtaṃ karma sarvais tair upabhujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0851: upayuktaṃ ca yat teṣāṃ matimān nānuśocati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0852: dharma ity eva saṃkalpya yat tu tasya phalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0854: varṣe sa dvādaśe devi phalenaitena yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0859: ātmany evātmano bhāvaṃ samāyojyeha te vane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0861: pavitranityo yuktaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0863: yukto 'py aṭati yo 'yukto na caikapulineśayaḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0864: eṣa mokṣavidāṃ dharmo vedoktaḥ satpathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0866: śrutaṃ me bhagavan sarvaṃ tvatprasādān maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0867: saṃgṛhītaṃ mayā tac ca tava vākyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0868: idānīm asti saṃdeho mānuṣeṣv eva kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0871: sa cāpi daṇḍayan martyān bhartsayan vidhamann api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0873: rājavṛttam ahaṃ tasmāc chrotum icchāmi mānada
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0874: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi rājadharmaṃ śubhānane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0875: rājāyattaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ lokavṛttaṃ śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0876: mahatas tapaso devi phalaṃ rājyam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0878: tasmād rājñaḥ sadā martyāḥ praṇamanti yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0880: tasmāt tasyaiva caritaṃ jagatpathyaṃ śṛṇu priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0881: arājake purā tv āsīt prajānāṃ saṃkulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0882: tad dṛṣṭvā saṃkulaṃ brahmā manuṃ rājye nyaveśayat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0884: tan me śṛṇu varārohe tasya pathyaṃ jagaddhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0885: yathā pretya labhet svargaṃ yathā vīryaṃ yaśas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0886: pitryaṃ vā bhūtapūrvaṃ vā svayam utpādya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0889: anu bhṛtyān prajāḥ paścād ity eṣa vinayakramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0892: tasmāt pūrvataraṃ rājā ātmānaṃ vinaye nayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0893: yo vinītaḥ svayaṃ rājā vinayaty eva vai prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0897: indriyāṇāṃ jayo devi ata ūrdhvam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0899: pañcaiva svavaśān kṛtvā tadarthān pañca śoṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0900: ṣaḍ utsṛjya yathāyogaṃ jñānena vinayena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0907: anuraktaṃ balaṃ sāram advaidhaṃ mitram eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0908: etāḥ prakṛtayaḥ ṣaṭ ca svāmī ca nayatattvavit
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0915: svebhyaś caiva parebhyaś ca śastrād api viṣād api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0917: sarvebhya eva sthānebhyo rakṣed ātmānam ātmavān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0919: prajākāryaṃ tu tatkāryaṃ prajāsaukhyaṃ tu tatsukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0920: prajāpriyaṃ priyaṃ tasya svahitaṃ hi prajāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0921: prajārthaṃ tasya sarvasvam ātmārthaṃ na vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0923: ubhayoḥ pakṣayor vādaṃ śrutvā caiva yathātatham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0924: tam arthaṃ vimṛśed buddhyā svayam ā tattvadarśanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0927: jñātvā samyag yathāśāstraṃ tato daṇḍaṃ nayen nṛṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0931: cāraiḥ karmapravṛttyā ca tad vijñāya vicārayan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0932: aśubhaṃ nirharet sadyo joṣayec chubham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0933: garhyān vigarhayed eva pūjyān saṃpūjayet tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0934: daṇḍyāṃś ca daṇḍayed devi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0935: pañcāpekṣaṃ sadā mantraṃ kuryād buddhiyutair naraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0937: kāmarāgeṇa vai mūrkhair naiva mantramanā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0939: sarvodyogaṃ svayaṃ kuryād durgādiṣu sadā nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0943: sumukhaḥ supriyo bhūtvā samyag vṛttaṃ samādiśet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0944: adharmyaṃ paruṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vākyaṃ vaktuṃ na cārhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0945: nare nare guṇān doṣān samyag veditum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0946: sveṅgitaṃ vṛṇuyād dhairyān na kuryāt kṣudrasaṃvidam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0948: svataś ca parataś caiva parasparabhayād api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0949: amānuṣabhayebhyaś ca svāḥ prajāḥ pālayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0951: nigrāhyā eva te rājñā saṃgṛhītā yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0954: prakṛtīnāṃ yathā na syād rājyabhraṃśodbhavaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0956: arājakaṃ kṣaṇam api rāṣṭraṃ na syād dhi śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0961: durgād rāṣṭrāt samudrāc ca vaṇigbhyaḥ puruṣātyayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0967: anāthān vyādhitān vṛddhān svadeśe poṣayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0968: saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva tadviśeṣāṃs tathāparān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0970: sarveṣāṃ sa priyo bhūtvā maṇḍalaṃ satataṃ caret
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0971: śubheṣv api ca kāryeṣu na caiko 'ntaḥ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0972: svataś ca parataś caiva vyasanāni vimṛśya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0974: rakṣyatvaṃ vai prajādharmaḥ kṣatradharmas tu rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0975: kunṛpaiḥ pīḍitās tasmāt prajāḥ sarvatra pālayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0977: tadyuktāś cāpadaś caiva prāg yānād iti cintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0978: vyasanebhyo balaṃ rakṣen nayato vyayato 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0981: suyuddhe prāṇamokṣaś ca tasya dharmāya iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0985: anyāṃś cāpatprapannānāṃ na tān saṃyoktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0986: śubhāśubhaṃ yadā devi vṛttaṃ tūbhayataḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0987: ātmaiva tac chubhaṃ kuryād aśubhaṃ yojayet parān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0988: evam uddeśataḥ proktam alepatvaṃ yathā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0990: evaṃ saṃvartamānas tu daṇḍayan bhartsayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0993: svargaloke tadā rājā tridaśaiḥ saha toṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0995: evaṃ nyāyānugaṃ vṛttaṃ kathitaṃ te śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0997: dharmyaṃ pathyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ caiva tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0998: daivapakṣye sati nṛpe rājyaṃ nyāyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_0999: kriyante yatra karmāṇi śāstrayuktiṃ vimṛśya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1000: kartā dveṣaviyuktaś ca tatra nyāyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1002: tat tu śāstravinirmuktaṃ satāṃ kopakaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1003: adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca durantaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1004: yatra svacchandataḥ sarvaṃ kriyate karma rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1005: yatra bhāgyavaśād bhṛtyā labhante na viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1006: yatra daṇḍyā na daṇḍyante pūjyante vā narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1007: yatra santo vihanyante tatra bhāgyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1009: rājñi vāsurapakṣe tu tatra bhāgyānugaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1013: tiṣṭhanti narake devi pralayāntād iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1015: nāsty eva mokṣaṇaṃ devi rājñāṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1016: etat sarvaṃ samāsena rājavṛttaṃ śubhāśubham umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1017: kathitaṃ te mahābhāge bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1019: yāni dharmarahasyāni śrotum icchāmi tāny aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1022: utsargo retasas teṣu na kāryo dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1023: eteṣu bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na virohati vai priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1024: yatra vā tatra vā bījaṃ dharmārthī notsṛjet punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1026: ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1029: vedādhyayanayajñāś ca tapo dānaṃ damas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1031: ahiṃsāyā varārohe kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1032: etat te paramaṃ guhyam ākhyātaṃ paramārcitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1033: yadi dharmas tv ahiṃsāyāṃ kimartham amarottama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1035: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bhūyo hiṃsamānā narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1036: svargaṃ sudurgamaṃ yānti sadā sma ripusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1039: samāṃsaṃ tu sa dattvānnaṃ rantidevo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1040: kathaṃ svargam anuprāptaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1041: kiṃ nu dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti na śraddadhati vā śrutam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1043: etat sarvaṃ viśeṣeṇa vistareṇa vṛṣadhvaja maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1044: śrotum icchāmi bhagavaṃs tattvam etan mamocyatām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1045: bahumānyam idaṃ devi nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1047: dṛśyate cāpi loke 'smin na kaś cid avihiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1049: saṃcaraṃś caraṇābhyāṃ ca hanti jīvān anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1050: ajñānāj jñānato vāpi ye jīvāḥ śayanāsane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1051: upāviśañ śayānaś ca hanti jīvān anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1053: tāṃś ca hiṃsanti satataṃ daṃśāṃś ca maśakān api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1055: evaṃ jīvākule loke ko 'sau syād yas tv ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1057: dṛśyarūpair adṛśyaiś ca nānārūpaiś ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1058: jīvais tatam idaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ pṛthivī tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1059: anyonyaṃ te ca hiṃsanti durbalān balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1060: matsyā matsyān grasantīha khagāṃś caiva khagās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1063: samṛddhāḥ paramāṃsais tu bhakṣeran ye 'pi cāparaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1072: trirātraṃ pañcarātraṃ vā saptarātram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1074: nāśnāti yāvato jīvāṃs tāvat puṇyena yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1076: tapyamāne śarīre tu śarīraṃ cendriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1077: vaśe tiṣṭhanti suśroṇi nṛpāṇām iva kiṃkarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1078: niruṇaddhīndriyāṇy eva sa sukhī sa vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1079: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena dānena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1080: naraḥ sarvam avāpnoti manasā yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1082: āhāraṃ kurute yas tu bhūmim ākramate ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1083: sarve te hiṃsakā devi yathā dharmeṣu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1086: phalāni jīrṇaparṇāni bhasma vā yo 'pi bhakṣayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1087: ālekhyam iva niśceṣṭaṃ taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1089: tasmād yas tu nirāhāras taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1090: yas tu sarvaṃ samutsṛjya dīkṣito niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1093: dhyānena tapasā yuktas taṃ manye 'ham ahiṃsakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1094: anyathā hi na paśyāmi naro yaḥ syād ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1095: bahu cintyam idaṃ devi nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1096: yato yato mahābhāge hiṃsā syān mahatī tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1097: nivṛttau madhumāṃsābhyāṃ hiṃsā tv alpatarā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1098: nivṛttiḥ paramo dharmo nivṛttiḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1100: manaḥpūrvaṃgamā dharmā adharmāś ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1101: manasā badhyate cāpi mucyate cāpi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1102: nigṛhīte bhavet svargo visṛṣṭe narako dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1103: ghātakaḥ śastram udyamya manasā cintayed yadi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1104: āyuḥkṣayaṃ gate 'dyaiṣāṃ mṛte tu praharāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1105: iti yo ghātako hanyān na sa pāpena lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1106: vidhinā nihataḥ pūrvaṃ nimittaṃ sa tu ghātakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1107: vidhir hi balavān devi dustyajaṃ vai purākṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1113: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1114: prāpnuvanti narā mṛtyuṃ yadā yatra ca yena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1115: nātikrāntuṃ hi śakyaṃ syān nideśaḥ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1117: na hi tasya priyaḥ kaś cin na dveṣyo na ca madhyamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1118: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu kālaḥ kālaṃ nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1119: gatāyuṣo hy ākṣipati jīvaṃ sarvasya dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1120: yathā yena ca martavyaṃ tathā yujyeta mṛtyunā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1121: avaśo nīyate tatra martavyaṃ yatra yena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1122: araṇye svagṛhe vāpi rātrau vāhani vā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1123: yathā yena hi martavyaṃ nānyathā mriyate hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1124: dṛśyate na ca loke 'smin bhūto bhavyo 'pi vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1126: yo hi vañcayituṃ śakto vidhes tu niyatāṃ gatim maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1128: śrūyatāṃ kāraṇaṃ devi yathā hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1131: kīṭāḥ pataṃgā bahavaḥ sthūlāḥ sūkṣmāś ca madhyamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1132: prajvalatsu pradīpeṣu svayam eva patanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1134: yas tu kālahatas teṣāṃ sa vai kālena vadhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1135: sūnārthaṃ devi baddhānāṃ kṣīṇāyur yo nibadhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1136: avaśo ghātakasyātha hastaṃ tad ahar eti saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1140: jālaṃ samadhirohanti svayam eva vidher vaśāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1141: śalyakasya ca jihvāgraṃ svayam āruhya śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1143: kṛṣatāṃ karṣakāṇāṃ ca nāsti buddhir vihiṃsane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1145: pādāgreṇaiva caikena yāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurute naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1146: mātaṃgo 'pi na tāṃ kuryāt krūro janmaśatair api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1147: mriyante yair hi martavyaṃ na tān hanti kṛṣīvalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1148: kṛṣāmīti matis tasya nāsti cintā vihiṃsane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1149: tasmāj jīvasahasrāṇi hatvāpi na sa lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1150: vidhinā vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ paścāt prāṇī vipadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1151: evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu vidhir hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1152: gatāyuṣā na śakyaṃ hi muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1153: jīvitavye na martavyaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1155: tathā tābhiś ca martavyaṃ bhoktavyāś caiva tās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1156: rantidevasya gāvo vai vidher hi vaśam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1157: svayam āyānti gāvo vai hanyante yatra sundari
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1160: rudhiraṃ tāṃ nadīṃ prāpya toyaṃ bhavati śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1161: medhyaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca gandhavarṇarasair yutam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1164: tasya rājñaḥ sadā satre svayam āgamya sundari
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1167: samāṃsaṃ ca sadā hy annaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1169: gāvo yās tatra hanyante rājñas tasya kratūttame
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1171: tāś ca svargaṃ gatā gāvo rantidevaś ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1173: atha yas tu sahāyārtham uktaḥ syāt pārthivair naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1177: vyūḍhānīke yathā śastraṃ senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1188: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva samantād badhirīkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1199: pṛṣṭhaṃ dattvātha ye tatra nāyakasya narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1202: yac cāsti sukṛtaṃ teṣāṃ yujyate tena nāyakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1203: ahiṃsā paramo dharma iti ye 'pi narā viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1206: yas tu prāṇān parityajya praviśed udyatāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1208: sattvam āviśate tatra jñātvā yodhasya niścayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1209: āviṣṭaś caiva sattvena nirghṛṇo jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1210: prahārair nandayed devi sattvenādhiṣṭhito hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1211: prahāravyathitaś caiva na vaiklavyam upaiti saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1212: yas tu svaṃ nāyakaṃ rakṣann atighore raṇāṅgaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1215: nirdayo yas tu saṃgrāme praharaty udyatāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1216: yajate sa tu pūtātmā saṃgrāmeṇa mahākratum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1217: varma kṛṣṇājinaṃ tasya daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ dhanuḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1218: ratho vedī dhvajo yūpaḥ kuśāś ca ratharaśmayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1219: māno darpas tv ahaṃkāras trayas tretāgnayaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1220: pratodaś ca sruvas tasya upādhyāyo 'sya sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1221: srug bhāṇḍaṃ cāpi yat kiṃ cid yajñopakaraṇāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1222: āyudhāny asya tat sarvaṃ samidhaḥ sāyakāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1223: svedasrāvaś ca gātrebhyaḥ kṣaudraṃ tasya yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1225: tūṇaś caiva carur jñeyo vasor dhārā vasā smṛtā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1226: kravyādā bhūtasaṃghāś ca tasmin yajñe dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1228: bhuñjate te yathākāmaṃ yathā yajñe kim icchake
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1230: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca yad vai yajñasya dakṣiṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1231: yas tatra hanyate devi gajaskandhagato naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1234: hanyate yas tu saṃgrāme śakraloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1235: svarge hantā pūjyate tair hatas tatraiva pūjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1236: dvāv etau sukham edhete hantā yaś caiva hanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1238: nirbhayo yas tu saṃgrāme prahared udyatāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1239: rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1241: tathā sarve na saṃdeho dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vare
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1243: vedoktāś caiva ye dharmāḥ pāṣaṇḍeṣu ca kīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1244: tathaiva mānavā dharmā dharmāś cānye tathāpare
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1246: ye dharmāḥ pārvatīyeṣu ye dharmāḥ pattanādiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1248: dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1249: tasmād dharmo na hantavyaḥ pārthivena viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1252: naiva tasminn anāvṛṣṭir na rogā nāpy upadravāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1257: tasmāt pramādaṃ suśroṇi na kuryāt paṇḍito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1258: teṣu mitreṣu tyakteṣu tathā martyeṣu hastiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1260: rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1267: sahasram api yajñānāṃ yajate yadi carddhimān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1268: yajñais tasya kim āścaryaṃ prāṇatyāgaḥ suduṣkaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1271: mṛgayātrāṃ tu vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tāṃ dharmacāriṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1272: mṛgān hatvā mahīpālo yathā pāpair na lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1273: nirmānuṣām imāṃ sarve mṛgā icchanti medinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1274: bhakṣayanti ca sasyāni śāsitavyā nṛpeṇa te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1277: svargaṃ mṛgāś ca gacchanti svayaṃ nṛpatinā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1278: yathā gāvo hy agopālās tathā rāṣṭram anāyakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1284: rāṣṭraṃ dharmo dhanaṃ caiva yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1285: nṛpāṇāṃ pūrvam evāyaṃ dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vare
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1290: dhmāyamāno yathā hy agnir nirdahet sarvam indhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1291: tathā krodhāgninā viprā daheyuḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1292: na hi vipreṣu kruddheṣu rājyaṃ bhuñjanti bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1302: indrasya vṛṣaṇau bhūtvā kṣipraṃ vai śleṣam āgatau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1304: aśaktaḥ śāsituṃ rājyaṃ kiṃ punar mānuṣo bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1306: bhasmīkṛtya jagat sarvaṃ sṛjed anyaj jagat punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1307: adevān api devān sa kuryād devān adevatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1309: mahatsv apy aparādheṣu śāsanaṃ nārhati dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1310: na ca śastranipātāni na ca prāṇair viyojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1312: krodhāś ca vipulā ghorāḥ prasādāś cāpy anuttamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1313: tasmān notpādayet krodhaṃ nityaṃ pūjyā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1314: dṛśyate na sa loke 'smin bhūto vātha bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1315: kruddheṣu yo vai vipreṣu rājyaṃ bhuṅkte narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1316: na caivopahased viprān na caivopālabhec ca tān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1317: kālam āsādya kupyec ca kāle kuryād anugraham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1318: saṃprahāsaś ca bhṛtyeṣu na kartavyo narādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1319: laghutvaṃ caiva prāpnoti ājñā cāsya nivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1321: ayācyāni ca yācanti avaktavyaṃ bruvanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1322: pūrvam apy ucitair lābhaiḥ paritoṣaṃ na yānti te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1324: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste ca na viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1326: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ hanyād vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1327: pramādād dhanyate rājā lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1328: tasmāt pramādaṃ lobhaṃ ca na kuryān na ca viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1334: svarāṣṭreṣu dayāṃ kuryād akāryaṃ na pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1335: ye caivainaṃ praśaṃsanti ye ca nindanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1338: dharmaḥ pravartate tatra yatra daṇḍarucir nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1339: nādharmo vidyate tatra yatra rājā kṣamānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1341: vadhyāṃś ca ghātayed yas tu avadhyān parirakṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1342: avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo dūtaś caiva pitā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1343: vidyāṃ grāhayate yaś ca ye ca pūrvopakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1344: striyaś caiva na hantavyā yaś ca sarvātithir naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1345: dharaṇīṃ gāṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca siddhānnaṃ ca tilān ghṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1347: evaṃ carati yo nityaṃ rājā rāṣṭrahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1348: tasya rāṣṭraṃ dhanaṃ dharmo yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1349: na ca pāpair na cānarthair yujyate sa narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1350: ṣaḍbhāgam upayuñjan yaḥ prajā rājā na rakṣati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1355: tat pāpaṃ sakalaṃ rājā hatarāṣṭraḥ prapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1356: mātulaṃ bhāgineyaṃ vā mātaraṃ śvaśuraṃ gurum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1358: svasya rāṣṭrasya rakṣārthaṃ yudhyamānas tu yo hataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1359: saṃgrāme paracakreṇa śrūyatāṃ tasya yā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1361: śakralokam ito yāti saṃgrāme nihato nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1362: yāvanto lomakūpāḥ syus tasya gātreṣu sundari
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1364: yadi vai mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1365: rājā vā rājamātro vā bhūyo bhavati vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1367: vyavahāraś ca cāraś ca satataṃ satyasaṃdhatā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1369: bharaṇaṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca poṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1370: yodhānāṃ caiva satkāraḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatā maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1371: śreya eva narendrāṇām iha caiva paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1373: yūpe nibaddhā mantraiś ca yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_1377: teṣu tuṣṭeṣu jāyeta tasya yajñasya yat phalam

GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_2954: kathaṃ śaucavidhis tatra tan me śaṃsitum arhasi

GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_2962: akṣobhyaṃ yat prakīrṇaṃ ca nityasrotaś ca yaj jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_2963: prāyaśas tādṛśe majjed anyathā cāpi varjayet

GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3433: brāhmaṇeṣv api tad brahma nityaṃ devi samāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3436: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś caiva yajñārhāḥ prāyaśaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3438: suśuddhair yajamānaiś ca ṛtvigbhiś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3440: tathā kṛteṣu yajñeṣu devānāṃ toṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3442: devāḥ saṃtoṣitā yajñair lokān saṃvardhayanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3443: ubhayor lokayor bhūtir devi yajñaiḥ pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3444: tasmād yajvā divaṃ gatvā amaraiḥ saha modate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3445: nāsti yajñasamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti yajñasamo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3447: eṣā yajñakṛtā pūjā laukikīm aparāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3449: devagoṣṭhān hi saṃskṛtya cotsavaṃ yaḥ karoti vai
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3450: yāgān devopahārāṃś ca śucir bhūtvā yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3451: devān saṃtoṣayitvā sa devi dharmam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3453: bahubhiḥ stutibhiś caiva stuvantaḥ prayatā narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3454: nṛttair vādyaiś ca gāndharvair anyair dṛṣṭivilobhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3455: devasatkāram uddiśya kurvate ye narā bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3457: tathaiva toṣaṃ saṃyānti devi devās triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3462: saṃtoṣaṃ yānti vai devā bhaktaiḥ saṃpūjitās tathā umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3464: triviṣṭapasthā vai devā bhūmau mānuṣaceṣṭitam maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3465: kathaṃ jñāsyanti vividhaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3466: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yathā tair vidyate priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3468: ātmānaṃ paramaṃ devam iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3470: ātmaiva devās tad vidyur avyagramanasaḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3471: satāṃ manovyavasthānāc chubhaṃ bhavati vai nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3473: yajñāś ca dharmakāryāṇi gurupūjāś ca śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3475: evaṃ vyavasthitair nityaṃ kartavyam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3476: evaṃ kṛtvā śubhākāṅkṣī paratreha ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3477: anyathā mana āveśya kṛtaṃ na phalati priye umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3478: ṛte 'pi tu mano devi aśubhaṃ phalati dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3479: pitṛmedhaḥ kathaṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3483: lokeṣu pitaraḥ pūjyā devatānāṃ ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3484: śucayo nirmalāḥ puṇyā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3486: pitaraś ca tathā loke pitṛmedhaṃ śubhekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3487: tasya deśāḥ kurukṣetraṃ gayā gaṅgā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3488: prabhāsaṃ puṣkaraṃ ceti teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3489: tīrthāni saritaḥ puṇyā viviktāni vanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3495: pūrvāhṇe śuklapakṣe vā rātrau janmadineṣu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3496: yugmeṣv ahaḥsu ca śrāddhaṃ na ca kurvīta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3497: eṣa kālo mayā proktaḥ pitṛmedhasya pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3498: yasmin vā brāhmaṇaṃ pātraṃ paśyet kālaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3499: apāṅkteyā dvijā varjyā grāhyās te paṅktipāvanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3500: pūjayed yadi pāpiṣṭhāñ śrāddheṣu narakaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3502: tadarhāñ śrotriyān viddhi brāhmaṇān ayujaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3503: etān nimantrayed vidvān pūrvedyuḥ prātar eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3505: trīṇi śrāddhe pavitrāṇi dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3506: trīṇi cātra praśaṃsanti śaucam akrodham atvarām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3507: kutapasya ca lomāni kuśā darbhās tilā madhu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3512: hīnāṅgam aśuciṃ vāpi varjayet tatra dūrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3513: kukkuṭāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca nagnaṃ klībaṃ rajasvalām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3514: āyasaṃ trapu sīsaṃ ca śrāddhakarmaṇi varjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3517: saṃvatsaraṃ ca gavyena haviṣā pāyasena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3529: tatsamīpe 'gnibhiddhvā ca svadhāṃ ca juhuyāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3530: samīpe tv agnīṣomābhyāṃ pitṛbhyo juhuyāt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3531: tato darbheṣu piṇḍāṃs trīn nivaped dakṣiṇāmukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3533: etena vidhinā dattaṃ pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3534: tato viprān yathākāmaṃ pūjayen niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3535: sadakṣiṇaṃ sasaṃbhāraṃ yathā tuṣyanti te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3536: yatra tat kriyate karma paitṛke brāhmaṇān prati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3537: tat sarvam akhilaṃ kuryād vaiśvadevasya pūrvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3538: aśrūn na pātayet tatra na jalpen na japen mithaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3539: niyamya vācaṃ dehaṃ ca śrāddhakarma samārabhet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3540: tato nirvapaṇe vṛtte tān piṇḍāṃs tadantaram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3541: brāhmaṇo 'gnirajo gaur vā bhakṣayed apsu vā kṣipet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3542: patnīṃ vā madhyamaṃ piṇḍaṃ putrakāmo hi prāśayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3544: tṛptān utthāpya tān viprān annaśeṣaṃ nivedayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3545: taccheṣaṃ bahubhiḥ paścāt sabhṛtyo bhakṣayen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3547: pitaras tena tuṣyanti kartā ca phalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3548: ahany ahani vā kuryān māse māse 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3549: saṃvatsarasya dviḥ kuryāc catur vāpi ca śaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3550: dīrghāyuś ca bhavet svasthaḥ pitṛmedhena mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3554: śrāddhāni puṣṭikāmā ye prakurvanti ca paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3555: teṣāṃ puṣṭiṃ prajāś caiva dāsyanti pitaraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3558: bhagavan devadeveśa mṛtās te bhuvi jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3560: pitaras tv iti te tatra kathaṃ tiṣṭhanti devavat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3561: pitṝṇāṃ katamo deśaḥ piṇḍān aśnanti te katham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3562: anne datte mṛtānāṃ tu katham āpyāyanaṃ bhavet nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3563: evaṃ mayā saṃśayitaṃ bhagavañ chettum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3564: etad viruddhaṃ rudrāṇyāṃ pṛcchantyāṃ pariṣad bhṛśam maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3565: babhūva sarvā muditā śrotuṃ paramakaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3566: sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu kalyāṇi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3567: guhyānāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ khilānāṃ paramaṃ khilam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3568: yathā devagaṇā devi tathā pitṛgaṇāḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3569: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhe sarve pitṛgaṇāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3570: pretān uddiśya yā pūjā kriyate mānuṣair iha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3571: tena tuṣyanti pitaro na pretāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3573: dakṣiṇasyāṃ tathā te ca tuṣyanti vividhair makhaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3575: tayor havyakriyā devān kavyam āpyāyayet pitṝn
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3579: āpyāyitāś ca te śrāddhaiḥ punar āpyāyayanti tān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3580: aniṣṭvā ca pitṝn pūrvaṃ yaḥ kriyāṃ prakaroti cet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3581: rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca phalaṃ bhokṣyanti tasya tat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3583: karmakṣetraṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ tad anyatra na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3584: kavyena saṃtatir dṛṣṭā havye bhūtiḥ pṛthagvidhā umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3585: iti te kathitaṃ devi devaguhyaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3586: evaṃ kṛtasya dharmasya śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3587: pramāṇaṃ phalamānānāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3589: yatsāras tu naro loke tad dānaṃ cottamaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3590: sarvadānavidhiṃ prāhus tad eva bhuvi śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3591: prasthaṃ sāraṃ daridrasya śataṃ koṭidhanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3592: prasthasāras tu tat prasthaṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3593: koṭisāras tu tāṃ koṭiṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3594: ubhayaṃ tan mahat tac ca phalenaiva samaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3596: svadravyād atihīnaṃ tu tad dānam adhamaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3597: śṛṇu dattasya vai devi pañcadhā phalakalpanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3598: ānantyaṃ ca mahac caiva samaṃ hīnaṃ ca pātakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3599: teṣāṃ viśeṣān vakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3600: dustyajasya ca vai dānaṃ pātra ānantyam ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3601: dānaṃ ṣaḍguṇayuktaṃ tu mahad ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3602: yathāśraddhaṃ tu vai dānaṃ yathārhaṃ samam ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3603: guṇatas tu tathā hīnaṃ dānaṃ hīnam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3604: dānaṃ pātakam ity āhuḥ ṣaḍguṇānāṃ viparyaye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3605: devaloke mahat kālam ānantyasya phalaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3606: mahatas tu tathā dānaṃ svargaloke tu pūjyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3607: samasya tu tathā dānaṃ mānuṣaṃ bhogam āvahet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3608: dānaṃ niṣphalam ity āhur vihīnaṃ kriyayā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3609: atha vā mlecchadeśeṣu tatra tatphalatāṃ vrajet umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3611: aśubhasyāpi dānasya śubhaṃ syāc ca phalaṃ katham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3613: prītyā tu sarvadānāni dattvā phalam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3615: anyāni sarvakāryāṇi śṛṇu sadbhiḥ kṛtāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3616: ārāmaṃ devagoṣṭhāni saṃkramāḥ kūpa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3617: govāṭaṃ ca taṭākaṃ ca sabhāḥ śālāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3619: vyādhitānāṃ ca bhaiṣajyam anāthānāṃ ca bhojanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3622: etat sarvaṃ samāsena dharmakāryam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3623: tat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa svaśaktyā śraddhayā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3624: pretyabhāve labhet puṇyaṃ nāsti tatra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3625: rūpaṃ saubhāgyam ārogyaṃ balaṃ saukhyaṃ labhen naraḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3626: svarge vā mānuṣe vāpi tais tair āpyāyate hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3628: dṛśyate caritaḥ sadbhis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3631: smṛtidharmaś ca bahudhā sadbhir ācāra iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3632: deśadharmāś ca dṛśyante kuladharmās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3633: jātidharmāś ca vai dharmā gaṇadharmāś ca śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3636: kāraṇāt tatra tatraiva phalaṃ dharmasya ceṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3638: anyathā na labhet puṇyam atadarhaḥ samādiśan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3639: evaṃ dharmasya nānātvaṃ phalaṃ kurvaṃl labhen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3640: śrautaḥ smārtas tu dharmāṇāṃ prākṛto dharma ucyate umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3641: iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3644: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3645: kathaṃ te bhuñjate lokān svargaloke maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3646: kathitāḥ kīdṛśā lokā nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3647: etan me vada deveśa śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3648: śṛṇu kalyāṇi tat sarvaṃ yat tvam icchasi bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3651: bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca uttarāḥ kuravas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3653: teṣu bhogāḥ svayaṃbhūtāḥ pradṛśyante yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3658: vicitrāś ca manojñāś ca kūjitaiḥ śobhayanti tān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3660: tatra vānty anilā nityaṃ divyagandhāḥ sukhāvahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3662: evaṃ bahuvidhā devi divi bhogāḥ sukhāvahāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3663: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva sarve sukṛtakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3671: pramadāś codbhavanty eva svargaloke yathā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3672: evaṃvidhāḥ striyaś cātra puruṣāś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3674: kāmaharṣau guṇāv āstāṃ nānye krodhādayaḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3675: kṣut pipāsā na cāsty atra gātrakleśāś ca śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3677: yāvat puṇyaphalaṃ tāvad ramante tatra saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3679: tatra bhogān yathāyogaṃ bhuktvā puṇyakṣayāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3680: naśyanti jāyamānās te śarīraiḥ sahasā priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3683: eṣā svargagatiḥ proktā pṛcchantyās tava bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3684: ata ūrdhvaṃ padāny aṣṭau karmaṇyāni śṛṇu priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3689: teṣām api ca ye lokāḥ svargalokopamāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3690: svargavat tatra te bhogān bhuñjate ca ramanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3695: guṇadoṣāś ca santy atra ākāśagamanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3696: antardhānaṃ balaṃ sarvam āyuś ca cirajīvanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3699: na tathā devaloko hi tadviśiṣṭāḥ surāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3700: tatra bhogam anirdeśyam amṛtatvaṃ ca vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3702: evam anyac ca tat karma daivatebhyo viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3704: tasmān na varṇaye devi viditaṃ hi tvayā śubhe umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3705: tat sarvaṃ sukṛtenaiva prāpyate cottamaṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3706: mānuṣeṣv eva jīvatsu gatir vijñāyate na vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3707: ayaṃ śubhagatir jīvann asau tv aśubhabhāg iti maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3708: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3709: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi jīvatāṃ vidyate yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3711: manasā karmaṇā vācā pratikūlā bhavanti ye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3712: tādṛśān āsurān viddhi martyās te narakālayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3715: nāstikāś ca śaṭhā ghorāḥ pareṣām upatāpinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3720: tādṛśān āsurān viddhi sarve te narakālayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3727: nityaṃ vadanti ye mohād anṛtaṃ kaṭukaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3729: hiṃsrāś corāś ca dhūrtāś ca paradārābhimarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3734: vṛkṣāḥ kaṇṭakino rūkṣās tādṛśān viddhi cāsurān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3735: aparān devapakṣāṃs tu śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3737: tādṛśān amarān viddhi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3739: ye samāḥ sarvabhūteṣu te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3740: bhayād vā vṛttihetor vā anṛtaṃ na bruvanti ye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3741: satyaṃ vadanti satataṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3744: daridrā api ye ke cid yācitāḥ prītipūrvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3745: dadaty eva ca yat kiṃ cit te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3750: vratino dānaśīlāś ca sukhaśīlāś ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3751: ṛjavo mṛdavo nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3753: kṛtajñāḥ kṛtavidyāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3760: yad anyac ca śubhaṃ loke prajānugrahakāri ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3761: paśavaś caiva vṛkṣāś ca prajānāṃ hitakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3764: daivaṃ śubham iti prāhur āsuraṃ hy aśubhaṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3765: bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit kāladharmam upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3766: prāṇamokṣaṃ kathaṃ kṛtvā paratra hitam āpnuyuḥ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3767: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3768: dvividhaṃ maraṇaṃ loke svabhāvād yatnatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3770: etayor ubhayor devi vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3779: tatrānṛṇyaṃ ca saṃprāpya vṛddho vā vyādhito 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3781: saṃvidhāya svabandhūṃś ca karmaṇāṃ bharaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3783: anujñāpya janaṃ sarvaṃ vācā madhurayā bruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3784: ahataṃ vastram ācchādya baddhvā tat kuśarajjunā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3786: parityajya tato grāmaṃ paścāt kuryād yathepsitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3792: deśe puṇyatame śreṣṭhe nirāhāras tu saṃviśet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3793: āprāṇāntaṃ śucir bhūtvā kurvan dānaṃ svaśaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3794: hariṃ smaraṃs tyajet prāṇān eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3797: kṛtvā kāṣṭhamayaṃ cityaṃ puṇyakṣetre nadīṣu vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3802: khyāte puṇyatame tīrthe nimajjet svakṛtaṃ smaran
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3811: evaṃ rājā mṛtaḥ sadyaḥ svargaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3815: svāmyarthaṃ saṃtyajet prāṇān puṇyāṃl lokān sa gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3817: evaṃ gobrāhmaṇārthaṃ vā dīnārthaṃ vā tyajet tanum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3819: ity ete jīvitatyāge mārgās te samudāhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3820: kāmāt krodhād bhayān mohād yadi cet saṃtyajet tanum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3822: svabhāvamaraṇaṃ nāma na tu cātmecchayā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3823: tathā mṛtānāṃ yat kāryaṃ tan me śṛṇu yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3826: nirjīvaṃ vṛṇuyāt sadyo vāsasā tu kalevaram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3828: śmaśāne dakṣiṇe deśe citāgnau pradahen mṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3829: atha vā nikṣiped bhūmau śarīraṃ jīvavarjitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3830: divā ca śuklapakṣaś ca uttarāyaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3833: āpyāyanaṃ mṛtānāṃ tat paraloke bhavec chubham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3834: etat sarvaṃ mayā proktaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya ca umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3836: lokeṣu vividhā dharmās tvatprasādān mayā śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3838: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ dharmaṃ tatra muhyati me manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3839: ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid yajñaphalaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3840: vānaprasthaṃ punaḥ ke cid gārhasthyaṃ ke cid āśramam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3841: rājadharmāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cit svādhyāyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3842: brahmacaryāśramaṃ ke cit ke cid vāksaṃyamāśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3843: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ke cit sevamānā divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3845: āhave 'bhimukhāḥ ke cin nihatās tridivaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3846: ke cid uñchavrate siddhāḥ svargamārgaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3853: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ devyā mahādevaḥ pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3856: etad eva viśiṣṭaṃ te yat tvaṃ pṛcchasi māṃ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3859: yasmin yasmiṃś ca viṣaye yo yo yāti viniścayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3860: taṃ tam evābhijānāti nānyaṃ dharmaṃ śucismite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3862: etad dhi sarvadharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ guhyam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3863: nāsti mokṣāt paraṃ devi mokṣa eva parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3864: sukham ātyantikaṃ śreṣṭham anivarti ca tad viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3865: nātra devi jarāmṛtyū śoko vā duḥkham eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3866: anuttamam acintyaṃ ca tad devi paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3867: jñānānām uttamaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣajñānaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3868: ṛṣibhir devasaṃghaiś ca procyate paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3869: nityam akṣaram akṣobhyam ajaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3870: uśanti tat padaṃ prājñāḥ spṛhaṇīyaṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3871: duḥkhādi ca durantaṃ ca saṃkṣayaṃ ca virodhi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3872: mithaḥ satatakāryaṃ ca trivargaṃ sukham ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3873: tasmān mokṣaḥ pradhānas tu trivargāc ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3877: yathā jyotirgaṇā vyomni nivartante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3878: saṃsāre prāṇinaḥ sarve nivartante tathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3883: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi bhūtvā pūrvaṃ gṛhe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3884: ānṛṇyaṃ sarvataḥ prāpya tatas tān saṃtyajed gṛhān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3885: tataḥ saṃtyajya gārhasthyaṃ niścito vanam āśrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3889: dvividhaś ca punar mokṣaḥ sāṃkhyo yoga iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3892: tayor anyataraṃ jñānaṃ śṛṇuyāc chiṣyatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3894: sāṃkhyayogau na ca śrāvyau guruṇā snehapūrvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3897: na kurvītānyam ārambham anivedya svakaṃ gurum
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3900: tyajet saṃkalpajān granthīn sadā dhyānaparo bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3901: kuṇḍikāṃ carma saṃśikyaṃ chatraṃ yaṣṭim upānahau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3902: cailam ity eva naiteṣu sthāpayet svāmyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3903: guroḥ pūrvaṃ samuttiṣṭhej jaghanyaṃ tasya saṃviśet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3907: bhaikṣaṃ sarvatra gṛhṇīyāc cintayet satataṃ niśi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3908: kāraṇe cāpi saṃprāpte na kupyeta kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3910: dayā ca sarvabhūteṣu tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3913: yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3914: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3916: brāhmaṃ padam avāpnoti yat prāpya na nivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3922: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca nirvāṇam adhigacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3928: jñānaṃ te saṃpravakṣyāmi tanmūlam amṛtaṃ hi vai
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3930: divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3931: naṣṭe dhane vā dāre vā putre pitari vā mṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3932: aho duḥkham iti dhyāyañ śokasya padam āvrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3933: dravyeṣu samatīteṣu ye guṇās tān na cintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3937: mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītam anuśocati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3938: saṃtāpena ca yujyeta tac cāsya na nivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3939: utpanne tv iha mānuṣye garbhaprabhṛti mānavam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3940: vividhāny upavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3941: tayor ekataro mārgo yady enam abhisaṃnamet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3942: sukhaṃ prāpya na saṃhṛṣyed duḥkhaṃ prāpya na saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3943: doṣadarśī bhavet tatra yatra snehaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3945: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahodadhau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3948: snehas tatra na kartavyo viprayogo hi tair dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3950: pārakyam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3955: na teṣāṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ mama tair api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3956: atītam anatītaṃ tad iti paśyan na muhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3958: yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnāt tan nānucintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3959: yannimittaṃ bhavec chokas trāso vā duḥkham eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3960: āyāso vā yatomūlas tad ekāṅgam api tyajet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3962: aiśvaryaṃ svasthatā ceti na muhyet tatra paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3964: tatrāpi sumahad duḥkhaṃ sukham alpataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3965: na nityaṃ labhate duḥkhaṃ na nityaṃ labhate sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3969: ucchrayān vinipātāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3970: anityam asukhaṃ ceti vyavasyet sarvam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3971: arthānām ārjane duḥkham ārjitānāṃ ca rakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3972: nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ dhig arthaṃ duḥkhabhājanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3973: arthavantaṃ naraṃ nityaṃ pañca nighnanti śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3975: artha eva hy anarthasya mūlam ity avadhāraya
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3976: na hy anarthāḥ prabādhante naram arthavivarjitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3977: arthaprāptir mahad duḥkham ākiṃcanyaṃ paraṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3978: upadraveṣu cārthānāṃ duḥkhaṃ hi niyataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3980: labdhvā bhūyo vivardheta samidbhir iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3982: sāgarāṇāṃ punaḥ pāraṃ jetum icchaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3984: kośakāraḥ kṛmir devi badhyate hi parigrahāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3985: ya ekāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām ekacchatrāṃ praśāsti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3986: ekasminn eva rāṣṭre tu sa cāpi nivasen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3988: nagare 'pi gṛhaṃ caikaṃ bhavet tasya niveśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3989: eka eva pratiṣṭhā syād āvāsaṃ tadgṛhe 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3990: āvāse śayanaṃ caikaṃ niśi yatra pralīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3991: śayanasyārdham evāsya striyās tv ardhaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3992: tad anena prasaṅgena svalpenaiva hi yujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3993: sarvaṃ mameti saṃmūḍho janaḥ paśyati bāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3996: tato bhūyastaro bhāgo duḥkhāya patanāya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3997: nāsti tṛṣṇāsamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_3999: yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4000: yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4001: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4006: yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4007: nālam ekasya paryāptam iti paśyan na muhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4008: yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4013: saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhim avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4015: na sa pāpair na cānarthaiḥ saṃyujyeta vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4017: arakṣiteṣu teṣv āśu naro narakam eti hi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4025: naiva rohati tattvajñe rūḍho vā chidyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4028: yena saṃvatsaro dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt kāmaś ca sevitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4029: tena sarvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ punarāvartakaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4030: bhogā bhuktā manuṣyeṇa svapnā iva bhavanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4033: purastāc ca sthite mṛtyau kiṃ sukhaṃ paśyataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4037: vyāghraḥ paśum ivāraṇye mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4039: saṃsāre pacyamānas tu pāpān nodvijate janaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4041: yady asti bhagavan mahyam etad ācakṣva māciram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4042: tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4046: na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasāpi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4050: aiśvaryaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ ca vidyā lābhas tapas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4053: svādhyāyaniratā vāpi na taranti jarāntakau devadānavagandharvakiṃnaroragarākṣasān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4055: svavaśe kurute kālo na kālasyāsty agocaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4056: na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ kṣapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4058: sravanti na nivartante srotāṃsi saritām iva
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4061: ādityo hy astam abhyeti punaḥ punar udeti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4062: yasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām āyur alpataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4063: gādhodake matsya iva kiṃ nu tasya kumāratā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4064: maraṇaṃ hi śarīrasya niyataṃ dhruvam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4065: tiṣṭhann eva kṣaṇaṃ sarvaḥ kālasyaiti vaśaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4066: na mriyeran na jīryeran yadi syuḥ sarvadehinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4067: na cāniṣṭaṃ pravarteta śoko vā prāṇināṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4069: apramattasya kālasya kṣayaṃ prāpto na mucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4070: śvaḥ kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4071: ko hi tad veda yatrāsau mṛtyunā nābhivīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4073: iti bālaś cintayati antarāyaṃ na budhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4074: idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃmanaso narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4077: kā śraddhā prāṇināṃ mārge viṣame bhramatāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4078: yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4079: phalānām iva pakvānāṃ sadā hi patanād bhayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4080: martyasya kim u tair dāraiḥ putrair bhogaiḥ priyair api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4081: ekāhnā sarvam utsṛjya mṛtyor hi vaśam eyivān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4082: jāyamānāṃś ca saṃprekṣya mriyamāṇāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4083: na saṃvego 'sti cet puṃsaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4090: tenodvegena cāpy asya vimarśo jāyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4092: vairāgyeṇa parāṃ śāntiṃ labhante mānavāḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4094: etat te kathitaṃ devi vairāgyotpādanaṃ vacaḥ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4095: etat sarvaṃ hi saṃcintya mucyante hi mumukṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4097: yaj jñātvā na punar martyaḥ saṃsāreṣu pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4099: śārīraṃ tu tapo ghoraṃ sāṃkhyāḥ prāhur nirarthakam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4100: pañcaviṃśatikaṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ jñānam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4103: indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca tanmātrebhyo bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4104: tebhyo bhūtāni pañca syur iti kṣetrasamuccayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4107: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4108: taiḥ sṛjaty akhilaṃ lokaṃ prakṛtiḥ svātmajair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4109: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4111: lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ vikalpaṃ cāditaḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4112: vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi tasya vyākhyām imāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4113: nityam ekam aṇu vyāpi kriyāhīnam ahetukam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4115: avyaktaṃ prakṛtir mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ yonir avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4117: tat sūkṣmatvād anirdeśyaṃ tat sad ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4118: tanmūlaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ tanmūlā sṛṣṭir iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4119: sattvādayaḥ prakṛtijā guṇās tān prabravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4120: sukhaṃ tuṣṭiḥ prakāśaś ca trayas te sāttvikā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4121: rāgadveṣau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ stambhaś ca rajaso guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4122: aprakāśo bhayaṃ mohas tandrī ca tamaso guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4123: śraddhā praharṣo vijñānam asaṃmoho dayā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4125: kāmaḥ krodho manastāpo droho lobhas tathā tṛṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4127: viṣādaḥ saṃśayo mohas tandrī nidrā bhayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4129: evam anyonyam etāni vardhante ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4130: hīyante ca tathā nityam abhibhūtāni bhūribhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4131: tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4132: vartate sāttviko bhāva ity upekṣeta tat tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4134: vartate raja ity evaṃ tadā tad abhicintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4137: samāsāt sāttviko dharmaḥ samāsād rājasaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4140: rājasī mānuṣī sṛṣṭis tiryagyonis tu tāmasī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4141: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4144: ādiprabhṛti saṃyuktaṃ vyāptam ebhis tribhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4146: vijñānaṃ ca vivekaś ca mahato lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4147: mahān buddhir matiḥ prajñā nāmāni mahato viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4149: abhimānaḥ punas tatra mahato vaikṛtād bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4153: khaṃ vāyur agniḥ salilaṃ pṛthivī ceti pañcamī
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4155: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4156: sparśas tvak prāṇināṃ ceṣṭā pavanasya guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4157: rūpaṃ pāko 'kṣiṇī jyotiś catvāras tejaso guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4158: rasaḥ snehas tathā jihvā śaityaṃ ca jalajā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4159: gandho ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivyās te guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4161: guṇān pūrvasya pūrvasya prāpnuvanty uttarāṇi tu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4163: upalabhyāpsu ye gandhaṃ ke cid brūyur anaipuṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4165: tad gandhatvam apāṃ nāsti pṛthivyā eva tadguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4166: bhūmer gandho rase sneho jyotiś cakṣuṣi saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4170: yat kiṃ cid api kāye 'smin dhātudoṣamalāśritam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4171: tat sarvaṃ bhautikaṃ viddhi dehe naivāsty abhautikam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4172: buddhīndriyāṇi karṇas tvag akṣi jihvātha nāsikā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4173: karmendriyāṇi vāk pāṇiḥ pādo meḍhraṃ gudaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4174: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4176: vākyaṃ kriyā gatiḥ prītir utsargaś ceti pañcadhā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4177: karmendriyārthāñ jānīyāt te ca bhūtodbhavā matāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4178: indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣām īśvaraṃ mana ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4179: prārthanālakṣaṇaṃ tac ca indriyaṃ tu manaḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4180: niyuṅkte ca sadā tāni bhūtātmā manasā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4181: niyame ca visarge ca manasaḥ kāraṇaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4184: śarīrāc ca paro dehī śarīraṃ ca vyapāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4185: śarīriṇaḥ śarīrasya yo 'ntaraṃ vetti vai muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4189: yaḥ paśyet paramātmānaṃ bandhanaiḥ sa vimucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4190: naivāyaṃ cakṣuṣā grāhyo nāparair indriyair api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4192: sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4194: naiva cordhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādhastān na kutaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4195: indriyair iha buddhyā vā na dṛśyeta kadā cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4196: navadvāraṃ puraṃ gatvā haṃso 'sau nīyate vaśam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4198: tam evāhur aṇubhyo 'ṇuṃ taṃ mahadbhyo mahattaram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4200: kṣetrajñam ekataḥ kṛtvā sarvaṃ kṣetram athaikataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4201: evaṃ saṃvimṛśej jñānī saṃyataḥ satataṃ hṛdā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4202: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4207: dehe tejomayo dehī tiṣṭhatīty apare viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4208: jñānam ūṣmā ca vāyuś ca śarīre jīvasaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4209: ity eke niścitā buddhyā tatra ye buddhicintakāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4210: apare sarvalokāṃś ca vyāpya tiṣṭhantam īśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4211: bruvate ke cid atraiva tile tailavad āsthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4213: nāsty ātmeti viniścitya prāhus te nirayālayāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4215: ūhavān brāhmaṇo loke nityam avyayam akṣaram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4216: asty ātmā sarvadeheṣu hetus tatra sudurgamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4217: ṛṣibhiś cāpi devaiś ca vyaktam eṣa tu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4218: dṛṣṭvātataṃ mahātmānaṃ punas tan na nivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4219: tasmāt taddarśanād eva vindate paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4220: iti te kathito devi sāṃkhyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4222: sāṃkhyajñānena yuktānāṃ tad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4223: yogadharmaṃ punaḥ kṛtsnaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4224: sa ca yogo dvidhā bhinno brahmadevarṣisevitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4228: jñānaṃ sarvasya yogasya mūlam ity avadhāraya
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4231: ātmany avyayini prājñe jñānam etat tu yoginām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4233: varjayed aśivāṃ vācaṃ bhavet sattvam upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4234: dānam adhyayanaṃ śraddhā vratāni niyamās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4236: etais tu vardhate tejaḥ pāpaṃ cāpy avadhūyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4238: niḥśoko nirmalo dāntaḥ paścād yogaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4240: ekānte vijane deśe sarvataḥ saṃvṛte śucau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4241: kalpayed āsanaṃ tatra svāstīrṇaṃ mṛdubhiḥ kuśaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4243: avyagraḥ sukham āsīnaḥ svāṅgāni na vikampayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4245: bhruvor madhye manaḥ kṛtvā cintayitvā śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4246: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4247: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4250: tvak śrotraṃ ca tato jihvāṃ ghrāṇaṃ cakṣuś ca saṃharet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4252: sarvaṃ cāpohya saṃkalpam ātmani sthāpayen manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4254: prāṇāpānau tadā tasya yugapat tiṣṭhato vaśe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4255: prāṇe hi vaśam āpanne yogasiddhir dhruvā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4256: śarīraṃ cintayet sarvaṃ vipāṭya ca samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4258: tato mūrdhānam agniṃ ca śārīraṃ paripālayan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4259: prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4260: sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4261: mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtāni viṣayāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4262: bastimūlaṃ gudaṃ caiva pāvakaṃ ca samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4263: vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4266: udāna iti taṃ vidyur adhyātmakuśalā janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4269: dhātuṣv agnau ca vitataḥ samāno 'gniḥ samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4272: ūṣmā so 'gnir iti jñeyaḥ so 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4275: adhas tv agnir apānena prāṇena paripālyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4276: pṛṣṭhatas tu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4277: śarīramadhye nābhiḥ syān nābhyām agniḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4278: agnau prāṇāś ca saṃsaktāḥ prāṇeṣv ātmā vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4279: pakvāśayas tv adho nābher ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4280: nābhir madhye śarīrasya sarvaprāṇās tam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4281: sthitāḥ prāṇādayaḥ sarve tiryag ūrdhvam adhaścarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4283: yoginām eṣa mārgas tu pañcasv eteṣu tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4285: mūrdhany ātmānam ādhāya bhruvor madhye manas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4286: saṃnirudhya tataḥ prāṇān ātmānaṃ cintayet param
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4287: prāṇe tv apānaṃ yuñjīta prāṇāṃś cāpānakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4289: evam antaḥ prayuñjīta pañca prāṇān parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4291: aśrāntaś cintayed yogam utthāya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4292: tiṣṭhan gacchan svapan vāpi yuñjītaivam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4294: prasīdati manaḥ kṣipraṃ prasanne dṛśyate paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4295: vidhūma iva dīpto 'gnir āditya iva raśmimān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4297: dṛṣṭvā tad ātmāno jyotir aiśvaryāṣṭaguṇair yutam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4298: prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ spṛhaṇīyaṃ surair api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4299: imān yogasya doṣāṃś ca daśaiva paricakṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4300: doṣair vighno varārohe yogināṃ kavibhiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4301: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ svapnaṃ sneham atyaśanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4302: vaicityaṃ vyādhim ālasyaṃ lobhaṃ ca daśamaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4303: etais teṣāṃ bhaved vighno daśabhir devakāritaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4304: tasmād etān apāsyādau yuñjīta capalaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4305: imān api guṇān aṣṭau yogasya paricakṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4306: guṇais tair aṣṭabhir dravyam aiśvaryam adhigamyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4309: etān aṣṭau guṇān prāpya kathaṃ cid yogināṃ varāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4310: īśāḥ sarvasya lokasya devān apy atiśerate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4318: sāyujyaṃ prāpyate devair yatnena mahatā cirāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4320: arcayitvā yathāśakti svakaṃ devaṃ viśanti te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4321: sāyujyānāṃ viśiṣṭe dve māmakaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4322: māṃ prāpya na nivartante viṣṇuṃ vā śubhalocane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4323: iti te kathito devi yogadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4324: na śakyaṃ praṣṭum apy anyair yogadharmas tvayā vinā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4332: idānīṃ śrotum icchāmi sāyujyaṃ tvadgataṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4333: kathaṃ paricaranty ete bhaktās tvāṃ parameṣṭhinam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4334: ācāraḥ kīdṛśas teṣāṃ kena tuṣṭo bhaved bhavān maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4335: varṇyamānaṃ tvayā sākṣāt prīṇayaty adhikaṃ hi mām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4336: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mama sāyujyam adbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4339: sāṃkhyayogau mayā sṛṣṭau sarvaṃ cāpi carācaram
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4341: ahaṃ prasanno bhaktānāṃ dadāmy amaratām api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4342: na māṃ viduḥ suragaṇā munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4343: tvatpriyārtham ahaṃ devi madvibhūtiṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4346: vyācakhye 'haṃ tadā devi yogaṃ pāśupataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4347: gṛhītaṃ tac ca taiḥ sarvaṃ mukhāc ca mama dakṣiṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4348: śrutvā ca triṣu lokeṣu sthāpitaṃ cāpi taiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4349: idānīṃ ca tvayā pṛṣṭas tvatpriyārtham anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4350: tat sarvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tat tvam ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4351: ahaṃ paśupatir nāma madbhaktā ye ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4353: rakṣārthaṃ maṅgalārthaṃ ca pavitrārthaṃ ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4354: liṅgārthaṃ caiva bhaktānāṃ bhasma dattaṃ mayā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4362: sūkṣmaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu vimṛśantaś caranti te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4364: upāyaṃ cintayāmy āśu yena mām upayānti te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4365: sthāpitaṃ triṣu lokeṣu śivaliṅgaṃ mayā priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4367: iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca yajñāś ca sahadakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4370: śivaliṅgārcanāyāṃ tu vidhānam api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4372: iṣṭasya hayamedhasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4373: ghṛtamaṇḍena yo nityam arcayed dhi śivaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4375: kevalenāpi toyena snāpayed yaḥ śivaṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4376: sa cāpi labhate puṇyaṃ matpriyaś ca bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4377: saghṛtaṃ gugguluṃ samyag dhūpayed yaḥ śivāntike
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4378: gosavasya tu yajñasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4380: tasya rukmapradānasya yat phalaṃ tasya tad bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4381: yas tu nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpair mama liṅgaṃ samarcayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4382: sa hi dhenusahasrasya dattasya phalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4383: yas tu deśāntaraṃ gatvā śivaliṅgaṃ samarcayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4386: matprasādān manuṣyeṣu na punar jāyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4388: bhakto mām arcayen nityaṃ śivaliṅgeṣv atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4391: phalaṃ vā yadi vā śākaṃ puṣpaṃ vā yadi vā jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4394: tasmāt te satataṃ bhaktā mām evābhyarcayanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4397: maddveṣiṇaś ca ye martyā madbhaktadveṣiṇas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4398: yānti te narakaṃ kṣipram iṣṭvā kratuśatair api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4399: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yogaṃ pāśupataṃ mama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4400: madbhaktair manujair devi śrāvyam etad dine dine
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4401: śṛṇuyād yaḥ paṭhed vāpi mamaitaṃ dharmaniścayam nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4402: svargaṃ kīrtiṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labheta sa narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4403: evam uktvā mahādevaḥ śrotukāmaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4407: pṛcchāmi tvā varārohe pṛṣṭā vada mamepsitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4408: sāvitrī brahmaṇaḥ patnī kauśikasya śacī śubhā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4409: lakṣmīr viṣṇoḥ priyatamā dhṛtir bhāryā yamasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4411: varuṇasya tathā gaurī savituś ca suvarcalā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4412: rohiṇī śaśino bhāryā svāhā vahner aninditā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4414: etāś cānyāś ca devyas tu sarvās tāḥ patidevatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4416: tābhiś ca pūjitā sā tvam anuvṛttyānubhāṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4423: ayaṃ hi strīgaṇas tvāṃ tu anuyāti na muñcati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4425: tvayā coktaṃ viśeṣeṇa gurubhūtaṃ hi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4426: striya eva sadā loke strīgaṇasya gatiḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4427: śaśvad gaur goṣu gaccheta nānyatra ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4429: pramadoktaṃ tu yat kiṃ cit tat strīṣu bahu manyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4430: na tathā manyate strīṣu puruṣoktam anindite
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4431: tvayaiva vidito hy arthaḥ strīṇāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4432: tasmāt tvā paripṛcchāmi pṛṣṭā vada mamepsitam nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4433: evam uktā tadā devī mahādevena śobhanā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4434: sodvegā ca salajjā ca nāvadat tatra kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4435: punaḥ punas tadā devo devīṃ kim iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4436: bahuśaś coditā devī savrīḍā cedam abravīt umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4438: tvadantike mayā vaktuṃ strīṇāṃ dharmaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4439: manniyogād avaśyaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ hi mama priye umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4443: ayuktaṃ satsu tajjñeṣu tān atikramya bhāṣitum nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4445: iti matvā mahādevī nadīr devīḥ samāhvayat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4446: vipāśāṃ ca vitastāṃ ca candrabhāgāṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4447: śatadruṃ devikāṃ sindhuṃ gomatīṃ kauśikīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4448: yamunāṃ narmadāṃ caiva kāverīm atha nimnagām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4449: tathā devanadīṃ gaṅgāṃ prāptāṃ tripathagāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4454: ayaṃ bhagavatā praśna uktaḥ strīdharmam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4455: na caikayā mayā sādhyas tasmād vas tv ānayāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4456: yuṣmābhis tad vicāryaiva vaktum icchāmi śobhanāḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4457: tat kathaṃ devadevāya vācyaḥ strīdharma uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4458: iti pṛṣṭās tayā devyā devanadyaś cakampire
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4459: tāsāṃ śreṣṭhatamā gaṅgā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4460: dhanyāś cānugṛhītāḥ sma anena vacanena te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4461: yā tvaṃ surāsurair mānyā nadīr mānayase 'naghe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4464: vākyaṃ vadanti saṃsatsu svayam eva yatheṣṭataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4466: tvaṃ hi śaktā satī devī vaktuṃ praśnam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4467: vyāhartuṃ necchasi strītvāt saṃpūjayasi nas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4470: tvam evārhasi tad vaktuṃ strīṇāṃ dharmaṃ śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4472: kuru devi priyaṃ devi vada strīdharmam uttamam nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4473: evaṃ prasāditā devī gaṅgayā lokapūjitā umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4477: tam ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi yathāvac chrotum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4478: evaṃ bruvantyāṃ strīdharmaṃ devyāṃ devasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4485: vaktuṃ vacanam ārebhe strīṇāṃ dharmāśritaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4487: ṛtuprāptā suśuddhā yā kanyā sety abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4488: tāṃ tu kanyāṃ pitā mātā bhrātā mātula eva vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4489: pitṛvyaś ceti pañcaite dātuṃ prabhavatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4490: vivāhāś ca tathā pañca tāsāṃ dharmārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4491: kāmataś ca mitho dānaṃ bhayāc ca prasabhāt tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4492: dattā yasya bhaved bhāryā eteṣāṃ yena kena cit
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4496: yadā dattā bhavet kanyā tasmai bhāryārthine svakaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4497: tadāprabhṛti sā nārī daśarātraṃ vivarjya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4498: manasā karmaṇā vācā hy anukūlā ca sā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4499: iti bhartṛvrataṃ kuryāt patim uddiśya śobhanā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4500: tadāprabhṛti sā nārī tat tat kuryāt patipriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4501: yad yad icchati vai bhartā dharmakāmārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4504: tādṛśā sā bhaven nityaṃ yādṛśas tu bhavet patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4507: daivam eva bhavet tasyāḥ patir ity avagamyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4508: etasmin kāraṇe deva paurāṇī śrūyate śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4509: kathayāmi prasādāt te śṛṇu deva samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4510: kasya cit tv atha viprasya bhārye hi dve babhūvatuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4511: tayor ekā dharmakāmā devān uddiśya bhaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4514: aparā dharmakāmā ca patim uddiśya śobhanā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4515: bhartāraṃ daivataṃ kṛtvā cakāra kila tatpriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4517: gate kila mahādeva tatraikā yā pativratā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4520: tāṃ yamo lokapālas tu babhāṣe puṣkalaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4521: mā śocīs tvaṃ nivartasva na lokāḥ santi te śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4522: svadharmavimukhāsi tvaṃ tasmāl lokā na santi te
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4523: daivataṃ hi patir nāryāḥ sthāpitaṃ sarvadaivataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4524: avamatya śubhe taṃ tvaṃ kathaṃ lokān gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4525: mohena tvaṃ varārohe na jānīṣe svadaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4526: patimatyā striyā kāryo dharmaḥ patyarpitas tv iti
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4527: tasmāt tvaṃ hi nivartasva kuru patyāśritaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4528: tadā gantāsi lokāṃs tān yān gacchanti pativratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4529: nānyathā śakyate prāptuṃ patnīnāṃ loka uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4530: yamenaivaṃvidhaṃ coktvā nivṛtya punar eva sā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4532: evam etan mahādeva daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyaḥ umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4533: tasmāt patiparā bhūtvā patiṃ paricared iti
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4536: patyur bhāvaṃ viditvā tu paścāt saṃbodhayet patim
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4537: tataḥ paurvāhṇikaṃ kāryaṃ svayaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4538: nivedya ca tathāhāraṃ yathā saṃpadyatām iti
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4539: tathaiva kuryāt tat sarvaṃ yathā patyuḥ priyaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4540: yathā patyus tathā bhartur gurūṇāṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4543: āgataṃ tu patiṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā paricārakaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4550: dharmakārye tu saṃprāpte tadvad dharmaparā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4552: sā yatnaṃ paramaṃ kuryāt tasya sāhāyyakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4553: yugaṃdharā bhavet sādhvī patyur dharmārthayoḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4554: vihārakāle vai bhartur jñātvā bhāvaṃ hṛdi sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4557: yena yena yathā tuṣyet tathā sā toṣayet patim
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4559: yasyāṃ kāmī bhaved bhartā tasyāḥ prītikarā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4563: anāthān kṛpaṇāṃś caiva bhikṣukāṃś ca tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4565: kupitaṃ vārthahīnaṃ vā śrāntaṃ vopacaret patim
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4566: yathā sa tuṣṭaḥ svasthaś ca bhavet saṃtoṣayet patim
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4568: āhūtā ca sahāyārthaṃ tadā priyahitaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4569: apriyaṃ vā hitaṃ brūyāt tasya kāmārthakāṅkṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4571: bahir ālokanaṃ caiva mohaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca paiśunam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4573: rahasy ekāsanaṃ sādhvī na kuryād ātmajair api
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4574: yad yad dadyān nidhatsveti nyāsavat paripālayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4576: yat kiṃ cit patinā dattaṃ tal labdhvā sumukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4579: bhāryayā vratam ity eva bhartavyaḥ satataṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4581: na ca bhoge na caiśvarye na dhane na sukhe tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4582: spṛhā yasyā yathā patyau sā nārīṇāṃ pativratā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4583: patir hi daivataṃ strīṇāṃ patir bandhuḥ patir gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4584: nānyāṃ gatim ahaṃ paśye pramadānāṃ yathā patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4585: jātiṣv api ca vai strītvaṃ viśiṣṭam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4591: tapaścaryā ca dānaṃ ca patau tasyāḥ samarpitau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4592: rūpaṃ kulaṃ yaśaḥ svargaḥ sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4594: patinā ca samaṃ gacchet puṇyalokān svakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4595: vṛddho virūpo bībhatsur dhanavān nirdhano 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4596: evaṃbhūto 'pi bhartā vai strīṇāṃ bhūṣaṇam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4597: āḍhyaṃ vā rūpayuktaṃ vā virūpaṃ dhanavarjitam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4598: yā patiṃ toṣayet sādhvī sā nārīṇāṃ pativratā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4599: daridrāṃś ca virūpāṃś ca pramūḍhān kuṣṭhasaṃyutān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4601: upary upari tāṃl lokān patyaiva saha gacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4602: evaṃ pravartamānāyāḥ patiḥ pūrvaṃ mriyeta cet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4603: tadānumaraṇaṃ gacchet punar dharmaṃ careta vā umā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4604: etad evaṃ mayā proktaṃ strīṇāṃ dharmāśritaṃ hitam
