GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4605: evam etan mayā proktaṃ striyas tu bahudhā smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4607: saumyaśīlāḥ śubhācārāḥ sarvās tāḥ saṃbhavanti hi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4609: āsuryaś caiva paiśācyo rākṣasyaś ca bhavanti yāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4615: arthān vināśayanty eva na gṛhṇanti hitaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4616: svabuddhiniratā bhūtvā jīvanti ca yathā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4617: guṇavatyaḥ kva cid bhūtvā patidharmaparā iva
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4618: punar bhavanti pāpiṣṭhā viṣamaṃ vṛttam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4620: asaṃtuṣṭāś ca lubdhāś ca īrṣyākrodhayutā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4628: ghorā māṃsapriyā nityaṃ hasanti ca rudanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4629: patīn vyabhicaranty evam unmārgeṇa yathā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4631: atha vā bhartsitā deva nīcavṛttāḥ svabandhuṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4647: evaṃvidhānāṃ sarvāsāṃ na paratreha vā sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4648: etāsām eva kustrīṇāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca maheśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4649: asaṃśayaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ narake vāsa iṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4650: narakād dhi vimuktānāṃ kathaṃ cit kālaparyayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4651: iṣyate janma mānuṣyaṃ kaṣṭaṃ tatrāpi bhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4654: vidhavā durbhagā vāpi labhante duḥkham īdṛśam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4656: nayej jāraṃ ca nirayaṃ patiṃ pāpena yojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4657: etad yadi tu vijñāya punaś ced dhitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4658: kuryur bhartāram āśritya tathā dharmam avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4660: avamatya tu yāḥ pūrvaṃ patiṃ duṣṭena cetasā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4663: kāmāt krodhād bhayān mohād apahāsyā bhavanti tāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4666: ūrdhvaṃ gacchati sā tatra bhartrānumaraṇaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4667: evaṃ mṛtāyā vai lokān ahaṃ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4669: atha vā bhartari mṛte vaidhavyaṃ dharmam āśritā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4670: mṛtaṃ ca patim uddiśya kuryāc caivaṃvidhaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4671: evaṃ gacchati sā nārī patīnāṃ lokam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4673: prāpnuyāt tādṛśaṃ lokaṃ kevalaṃ yā pativratā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4674: iti te kathitaṃ deva strīṇāṃ dharmam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4676: cāpalyān mama deveśa tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4678: toṣayām āsa deveśo vācā saṃpūjayan priyām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4681: praṇamya śirasā devīṃ stutibhiś cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4682: pūjayām āsur apare devadevaṃ mudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4683: apare vismayān nocus tam artham abhicintya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4685: tatra tasmin kṣaṇe devīṃ devo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4686: śṛṇu kalyāṇi madvākyaṃ yad idaṃ tu tvayā mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4687: kṛtaṃ saṃvādam abhavat tat trilokaṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4688: puṇyaṃ pavitram ākhyānaṃ bhavitā tan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4689: ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān saṃvādaṃ tv āvayoḥ priye
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4690: śucir bhūtvā narān yuktān sa yajñaphalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4691: ye tv enaṃ śṛṇuyur nityaṃ dharmyaṃ tadgatamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4692: śravaṇād eva teṣāṃ tu mahad dharmaphalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4693: kathayec chṛṇuyād vāpi yaḥ kaś cin nityam āhnikam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4694: sa bhaven matpriyo devi taṃ smarāmi dine dine
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4695: ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ saṃvādaṃ cāvayoḥ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4696: kīrtim āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ paratreha sa vindati nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4697: śrutvā cemaṃ prayoktā tu kathaṃ sa na bhaven mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4699: devīṃ devaṃ vayaṃ tatra nāpaśyāma prabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4700: evaṃ purā mayāścaryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ haimavate vane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4702: tad adya kathitaṃ sarvaṃ tava keśava śṛṇvataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4703: etāvad uktvā devarṣir nārado virarāma ha vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4704: tad adya nikhilenaiva kathitaṃ te yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4705: dharmarājas tu tac chrutvā bhrātṛbhir mudito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-015_4706: tat sarvaṃ nikhilaṃ proktaṃ taveha janamejaya ṛṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0003: pitāmahād api varaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣo hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0009: ṛṣayo dehasaṃbhūtās tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0012: saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0016: na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0024: sarvāḥ sukhasthitāś caiva śarīre tasya devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0027: uttamena ca śaucena śīlena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0040: bhavārtham iha devānāṃ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0043: aṅganāmā manoḥ putras tv antardhāmā tataḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0049: manoś ca vaṃśaja iḍā sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0050: budhāt purūravāś cāpi tasmād āyur bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0051: nahuṣo bhavitā tasmād yayātis tasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0052: yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0053: kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro vṛjinīvān bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0055: uṣadgor bhavitā putraḥ śūraś citrarathas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0056: tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ śūro nāma bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0064: rājñaḥ sarvāṃś ca ruddhān sa mokṣayiṣyati mānadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0070: pālayiṣyati gāṃ devīṃ vijitya nayavat sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0071: taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya vāṅmālyair arhaṇair varaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0073: yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta brahmāṇaṃ vā pitāmaham
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0075: dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0076: pitāmaho vā deveśa iti vitta tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0079: yaś ca taṃ mānavo loke saṃśrayiṣyati keśavam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0080: tasya kīrtir jayaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0081: dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣāt sa bhaviṣyati dharmabhāk
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0083: dharma eva paro hi syāt tasminn abhyarcite vibhau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0086: tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vibhunā parvate gandhamādane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0088: tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0089: vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayeta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0092: arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0093: etat tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ vratam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0097: karmaṇā manasā vācā namasyaḥ sa dvijaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0099: eṣa vo 'bhihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0100: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvaśo devā dṛṣṭāḥ syur munisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0102: ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatim
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0103: tatra vas tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0104: samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0106: halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0111: cintitāni sameṣyanti śastrāṇy astrāṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0112: anantaś ca sa evokto bhagavān harir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0113: samādiṣṭaḥ sa vibudhair darśayantam iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0116: sa ca śeṣe vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0118: sa eṣa viṣṇuḥ so 'nanto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0119: yo rāmaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo yo 'cyutaḥ sa dharādharaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0122: eṣa yo 'nugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0124: atha vyomni mahāñ śabdaḥ savidyut stanayitnumān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0125: meghaiś ca gaganaṃ nīlaiḥ saṃruddham abhavad ghanaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0126: prāvṛṣīva ca parjanyo vavṛṣe nirmalaṃ payaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0127: nabhaś caivābhavad ghoraṃ diśaś ca na cakāśire
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0128: tato devagirau tasmin ramye puṇye sanātane
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0129: na śarvaṃ bhūtasaṃghaṃ vā dadṛśur munayas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0130: vyabhraṃ ca gaganaṃ sadyaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0131: tīrthayātrāṃ tato viprā jagmuś cānye yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0132: tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā te vismitābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0136: dvitīyam adbhutam idaṃ tvattejaḥkṛtam adya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0137: dṛṣṭvātivismitāḥ kṛṣṇa sā ca naḥ smṛtir āgatā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0138: etat te devadevasya māhātmyaṃ kathitaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0140: ity uktaḥ sa tadā kṛṣṇas tapovananivāsibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0141: mānayām āsa tān sarvān ṛṣīn devakinandanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0142: atharṣayaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ punas te kṛṣṇam abruvan
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0144: na hi naḥ sā ratiḥ svarge yā ca tvaddarśane vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0145: tādṛśaṃ ca mahābāho yathāha bhagavān bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0146: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rahasyam arikarśana
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0147: tvam eva hy arthatattvajñaḥ pṛṣṭo 'smān pṛcchase sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0148: tad asmābhir idaṃ guhyaṃ tvatpriyārtham udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0149: na ca te 'viditaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0150: janma caiva prasūtiś ca yac cānyat kāraṇaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0152: tataḥ sthite tvayi vibho laghutvāt pralapāmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0153: na hi kiṃ cit tad āścaryaṃ yan na vetti bhavān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0154: divi vā bhuvi vā deva sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0155: sādhayāma vayaṃ deva vṛddhiṃ puṣṭim avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0156: putras te sadṛśas tāta viśiṣṭo vā bhaviṣyati bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0160: so 'yaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān dīptyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0161: vrataṃ yathāvat tac cīrtvā dvārakāṃ punar āgamat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0162: pūrṇe ca daśame māsi putro 'sya paramādbhutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0163: rukmiṇyāṃ saṃmato jajñe śūro vaṃśadharaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0165: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca caraty antargataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0167: saṃśritaḥ pāṇḍavān premṇā bhavantaś cainam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0168: kīrtir lakṣmīr dhṛtiś caiva svargamārgas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0169: yatraiṣa saṃsthitas tatra devo viṣṇus trivikramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0170: sendrā devās trayastriṃśat sthitā nātra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0175: tava pārtha jayaḥ kṛtsnas tava kīrtis tathātulā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0177: ayaṃ nāthas tavācintyo yasya nārāyaṇo hṛdi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0178: sa bhavān bhūmipādhvaryū raṇāgnau hutavān nṛpān
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0183: cakrāgnau kṣayam āpannā dāvāgnau śalabhā iva
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0184: pratiyoddhuṃ na śakyo hi mānuṣair eṣa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0188: yat tu vai vṛṣabhāṅkena munibhyaḥ samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0189: purāṇaṃ himavatpṛṣṭhe tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0190: yāvad asyodbhavas tuṣṭis tejo vīryaṃ parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0191: prabhāvaḥ sannatir janma kṛṣṇe tat tritayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0192: na śakyam anyathā kartuṃ tad yadi syāt tathāpy aṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0193: yatra kṛṣṇo hi bhagavāṃs tatra tuṣṭir anuttamā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0195: jñānapūrvaṃ prapannāḥ smo mṛtyoḥ panthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0196: bhavāṃś cāpy ārjavaparaḥ sarvaṃ kṛtvā pratiśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0198: apy evātmavadhaṃ loke rājaṃs tvaṃ bahu manyase
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0199: na hi pratijñayā dattaṃ taṃ prahātum ariṃdama
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0201: vayaṃ ca kālena hatāḥ kālo hi parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0202: na hi kālena kālajña spṛṣṭaḥ śocitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0204: tasmāt kuntīsuta jñātīn neha śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0206: mādhavasya ca māhātmyaṃ śrutaṃ yat kathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0207: tad eva tava paryāptaṃ sajjanasya nidarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0208: vyāsasya vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0213: śṛṇuyāt kathayed vā yaḥ sa vai śreyo labhet param
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0214: bhavitāraś ca tasyātha sarve kāmā yathepsitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0215: pretya māheśvaraṃ lokaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0217: eṣa vai cākṣayo vipraiḥ smṛto rājañ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0219: te tvayā manasā dhāryāḥ kururāja divāniśam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0222: dharmeṇa hi sadā rājā prajā rakṣitum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0223: yas tasya vipulo daṇḍaḥ samyag dharmaḥ sa kīrtyate
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0224: sa eṣa kathito rājan mayā sajjanasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0226: śrutvā vā śrotukāmo vāpy arcayed vṛṣabhadhvajam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0227: viśuddhena hi bhāvena ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0229: saṃdeśo devapūjārthaṃ taṃ tathā kuru pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0230: etad atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ puṇyaṃ haimavate girau
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0235: viditau nāradād etau mama vyāsāc ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0236: bāla eva mahābāhuś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0238: karmaṇām asya kaunteya nāntaṃ saṃkhyātum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0240: dhruvaṃ śreyaḥ paraṃ tāta bhaviṣyati tavottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0247: tūṣṇīṃ babhūva kauravyo madhye teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0248: tac chrutvā vismayaṃ jagmur dhṛtarāṣṭrādayo nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0250: ṛṣayaś cāpi te sarve nāradapramukhās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0252: ity etad akhilaṃ sarvaṃ pāṇḍavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-016_0255: punar eva mahābuddhiḥ paryapṛcchan mahīpatiḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0001: ka upāyo varaprāptau sarveṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0002: jñānasya ca parasyeha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0004: nārāyaṇasya tu dhyānam arcanaṃ yajanaṃ stutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0008: japaś caturvidhaḥ prokto vaidikas tāntriko 'pi ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0009: paurāṇiko 'tha vidvadbhiḥ kathitaḥ smārta eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0011: nāsādhyaṃ jñānināṃ kiṃ cit tasmād rakṣyā dvijās tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0012: suvratā bandhuhīnaikā vane pūrvaṃ yamena tu
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0017: jātā viprakule samyak śreyaś cāpi bravīhi me
GE07mbh_13_u:134.057d-017_0022: tan nityaṃ viduṣāṃ rakṣātatparo bhava bhūpate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.001a: śrutvā dharmān aśeṣeṇa pāvanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.002a: kim ekaṃ daivataṃ loke kiṃ vāpy ekaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.002c: stuvantaḥ kaṃ kam arcantaḥ prāpnuyur mānavāḥ śubham
GE07mbh_13_u:135.003a: ko dharmaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhavataḥ paramo mataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.005a: tam eva cārcayan nityaṃ bhaktyā puruṣam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.005c: dhyāyan stuvan namasyaṃś ca yajamānas tam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.008c: yad bhaktyā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ stavair arcen naraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.009a: paramaṃ yo mahat tejaḥ paramaṃ yo mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.009c: paramaṃ yo mahad brahma paramaṃ yaḥ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.010a: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ yo maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.010c: daivataṃ devatānāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ yo 'vyayaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.011c: yasmiṃś ca pralayaṃ yānti punar eva yugakṣaye
GE07mbh_13_u:135.015a: pūtātmā paramātmā ca muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.015c: avyayaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣī kṣetrajño 'kṣara eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.017a: sarvaḥ śarvaḥ śivaḥ sthāṇur bhūtādir nidhir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.017c: saṃbhavo bhāvano bhartā prabhavaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.019c: viśvakarmā manus tvaṣṭā sthaviṣṭhaḥ sthaviro dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.021a: īśānaḥ prāṇadaḥ prāṇo jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.022a: īśvaro vikramī dhanvī medhāvī vikramaḥ kramaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.024a: ajaḥ sarveśvaraḥ siddhaḥ siddhiḥ sarvādir acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.025a: vasur vasumanāḥ satyaḥ samātmā saṃmitaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026c: amṛtaḥ śāśvataḥ sthāṇur varāroho mahātapāḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0002: kiṃ japyaṃ japato nityaṃ bhaved dharmaphalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0003: prasthāne vā praveśe vā pravṛtte vāpi karmaṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0004: daive vā śrāddhakāle vā kiṃ japyaṃ karmasādhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0006: japyaṃ yad brahmasamitaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0011: rātrāv ahani dharmajña yena pāpair na lipyate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0013: āyuṣmān bhavate caiva yaṃ śrutvā pārthivātmaja
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0014: puruṣas tu susiddhārthaḥ pretya ceha ca modate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0017: idam āhnikam avyagraṃ kurvadbhir niyataiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0028: ṛtaś ca pitṛrūpaś ca tryambakaś ca maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0029: vṛṣākapiś ca śaṃbhuś ca havano 'theśvaras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0032: aṃśo bhagaś ca mitraś ca varuṇaś ca jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0033: tathā dhātāryamā caiva jayanto bhāskaras tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0034: tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaivendro dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0035: ity ete dvādaśādityāḥ kāśyapeyā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0036: dharo dhruvaś ca somaś ca sāvitro 'thānilo 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0037: pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0038: nāsatyaś cāpi dasraś ca smṛtau dvāv aśvināv api
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0041: api yajñasya vettāro dattasya sukṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0043: śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi mṛtyuḥ kālaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0049: prāṇānām īśvarān etān kīrtayan prayato naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0050: dharmārthakāmair vipulair yujyate sa hi nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0051: lokāṃś ca labhate puṇyān viśveśvarakṛtāñ śubhān
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0057: pṛthivyāṃ tapasā siddhāḥ sthāvarāś ca carāś ca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0058: himavān girayaś caiva catvāraś ca mahārṇavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0060: viṣṇur devo 'tha jiṣṇuś ca skandaś cāmbikayā saha
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0064: auśijaś caiva kakṣīvān balaś cāṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0065: ṛṣir medhātitheḥ putraḥ kaṇvo barhiṣadas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0068: bhuvi kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma modante divi daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0069: mahendraguravaḥ sapta prācīṃ vai diśam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0071: unmucuḥ pramucuś caiva svastyātreyaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0075: dṛḍheyuś ca ṛteyuś ca parivyādhaś ca kīrtimān
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0076: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś cādityasaṃnibhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0077: atreḥ putraś ca dharmātmā ṛṣiḥ sārasvatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0079: atrir vasiṣṭho bhagavān kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0083: apare munayaḥ sapta dikṣu sarvāsu dhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0085: dharmaḥ kāmaś ca kālaś ca vasur vāsukir eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0087: rāmo vyāsas tathā drauṇir aśvatthāmā ca lomaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0088: ity ete munayo divyā ekaikaḥ saptasaptadhā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0090: yasyāṃ yasyāṃ diśi hy ete tanmukhaḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0093: sāṃkhyayogau nāradaś ca durvāsāś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0096: aputro labhate putraṃ daridro labhate dhanam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0097: tathā dharmārthakāmeṣu siddhiṃ ca labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0098: pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ nṛpavaraṃ pṛthvī yasyābhavat sutā
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0104: gavāmayena yajñena yeneṣṭaṃ vai kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0107: tathā śvetaṃ ca rājarṣiṃ kīrtayet paramadyutim
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0108: sthāṇuḥ prasādito yena yasyārthe hy andhako hataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0114: devān ṛṣigaṇāṃś caiva nṛpāṃś ca jagatīśvarān
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0115: sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca paramaṃ havyaṃ kavyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0119: prayataḥ kīrtayec caitān kalyaṃ sāyaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0120: ete vai yānti varṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0121: ete vināyakāḥ śreṣṭhā dakṣāḥ kṣāntā jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0124: etān vai kalyam utthāya kīrtayañ śubham aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0126: etān kīrtayatāṃ nityaṃ duḥsvapno naśyate nṛṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0127: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ svastimāṃś ca gṛhān vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0128: dīkṣākāleṣu sarveṣu yaḥ paṭhen niyato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0130: rogārto vābhiyukto vā paṭhan pāpāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0132: kṣetramadhye tu paṭhataḥ sarvaṃ sasyaṃ prarohati
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0134: ātmanaś ca sutānāṃ ca dārāṇāṃ ca dhanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0135: bījānām oṣadhīnāṃ ca rakṣām etāṃ prayojayet
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0136: etān saṃgrāmakāle tu paṭhataḥ kṣatriyasya tu
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0137: vrajanti ripavo nāśaṃ kṣemaṃ ca vinivartate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0138: etān daive ca pitrye ca paṭhataḥ puruṣasya hi
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0139: bhuñjate pitaro havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca tridivaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0140: na vyādhiśvāpadabhayaṃ na dvipān na hi taskarāt
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0141: kaśmalaṃ laghutāṃ yāti pāpmanā ca pramucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0142: yānapātre ca yāne ca pravāse rājaveśmani
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0143: parāṃ siddhim avāpnoti sāvitrīṃ hy uttamāṃ paṭhan
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0144: na ca rājabhayaṃ teṣāṃ na piśācān na rākṣasāt
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0147: karoti satataṃ śāntiṃ sāvitrīm uttamāṃ paṭhan
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0148: nāgnir dahati kāṣṭhāni sāvitrī yatra paṭhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0149: na tatra bālo mriyate na ca tiṣṭhanti pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0150: na teṣāṃ vidyate duḥkhaṃ gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0152: gavāṃ madhye tu paṭhato gāvo 'sya bahuvatsalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0153: prasthāne vā praveśe vā sarvāvasthāgataḥ paṭhet
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0154: japatāṃ juhvatāṃ caiva nityaṃ ca prayatātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0155: ṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ japyaṃ guhyam etan narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0158: tad etat te samākhyātaṃ tathyaṃ brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0161: paṭhanti śucayo nityaṃ sāvitrīṃ prāṇināṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0162: abhyāśe nityaṃ devānāṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ dhruvasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0167: sāvitrīm adhigamya śakravasubhiḥ kṛtsnā jitā dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0170: divyāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ kathayec ca nityaṃ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0171: tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya caiva
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0175: syād aśvinau ca parikīrtayato na rogaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0176: eṣā te kathitā rājan sāvitrī brahma śāśvatī
GE07mbh_13_u:135.026d-018_0177: vivakṣur asi yac cānyat tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:135.027c: vedo vedavid avyaṅgo vedāṅgo vedavit kaviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.030a: upendro vāmanaḥ prāṃśur amoghaḥ śucir ūrjitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.030c: atīndraḥ saṃgrahaḥ sargo dhṛtātmā niyamo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.031a: vedyo vaidyaḥ sadāyogī vīrahā mādhavo madhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.035a: amṛtyuḥ sarvadṛk siṃhaḥ saṃdhātā saṃdhimān sthiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.037a: agraṇīr grāmaṇīḥ śrīmān nyāyo netā samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.039c: satkartā satkṛtaḥ sādhur jahnur nārāyaṇo naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.042a: subhujo durdharo vāgmī mahendro vasudo vasuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.045c: kāmahā kāmakṛt kāntaḥ kāmaḥ kāmapradaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.047a: iṣṭo viśiṣṭaḥ śiṣṭeṣṭaḥ śikhaṇḍī nahuṣo vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.050a: aśokas tāraṇas tāraḥ śūraḥ śaurir janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.052a: atulaḥ śarabho bhīmaḥ samayajño havir hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.053a: vikṣaro rohito mārgo hetur dāmodaraḥ sahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.054c: karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kartā vikartā gahano guhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.055c: pararddhiḥ paramaḥ spaṣṭas tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ śubhekṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.056a: rāmo virāmo virato mārgo neyo nayo 'nayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.056c: vīraḥ śaktimatāṃ śreṣṭho dharmo dharmavid uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.057a: vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇadaḥ praṇavaḥ pṛthuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.059a: vistāraḥ sthāvaraḥ sthāṇuḥ pramāṇaṃ bījam avyayam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.061a: yajña ijyo mahejyaś ca kratuḥ satraṃ satāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.062a: suvrataḥ sumukhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sughoṣaḥ sukhadaḥ suhṛt
GE07mbh_13_u:135.064a: dharmagub dharmakṛd dharmī sad asat kṣaram akṣaram
GE07mbh_13_u:135.067c: vinayo jayaḥ satyasaṃdho dāśārhaḥ sātvatāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.075a: trisāmā sāmagaḥ sāma nirvāṇaṃ bheṣajaṃ bhiṣak
GE07mbh_13_u:135.075c: saṃnyāsakṛc chamaḥ śānto niṣṭhā śāntiḥ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.079a: svakṣaḥ svaṅgaḥ śatānando nandir jyotir gaṇeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.086a: stavyaḥ stavapriyaḥ stotraṃ stutiḥ stotā raṇapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.091a: eko naikaḥ savaḥ kaḥ kiṃ yat tat padam anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.092c: vīrahā viṣamaḥ śūnyo ghṛtāśīr acalaś calaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.098c: arko vājasanaḥ śṛṅgī jayantaḥ sarvavij jayī
GE07mbh_13_u:135.103a: aṇur bṛhat kṛśaḥ sthūlo guṇabhṛn nirguṇo mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:135.111a: akrūraḥ peśalo dakṣo dakṣiṇaḥ kṣamiṇāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.114a: anādir bhūr bhuvo lakṣmīḥ suvīro rucirāṅgadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.117a: bhūr bhuvaḥ svas tarus tāraḥ savitā prapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.118c: yajñāntakṛd yajñaguhyam annam annāda eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.122a: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cāpi parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_13_u:135.122c: nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃ cit so 'mutreha ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.123a: vedāntago brāhmaṇaḥ syāt kṣatriyo vijayī bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:135.123c: vaiśyo dhanasamṛddhaḥ syāc chūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:135.124a: dharmārthī prāpnuyād dharmam arthārthī cārtham āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:135.124c: kāmān avāpnuyāt kāmī prajārthī cāpnuyāt prajāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.126a: yaśaḥ prāpnoti vipulaṃ jñātiprādhānyam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.126c: acalāṃ śriyam āpnoti śreyaś cāpnoty anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.127a: na bhayaṃ kva cid āpnoti vīryaṃ tejaś ca vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:135.128a: rogārto mucyate rogād baddho mucyeta bandhanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:135.128c: bhayān mucyeta bhītaś ca mucyetāpanna āpadaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.131a: na vāsudevabhaktānām aśubhaṃ vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:135.133a: na krodho na ca mātsaryaṃ na lobho nāśubhā matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.134a: dyauḥ sacandrārkanakṣatrā khaṃ diśo bhūr mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.136a: indriyāṇi mano buddhiḥ sattvaṃ tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.136c: vāsudevātmakāny āhuḥ kṣetraṃ kṣetrajña eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.139a: yogo jñānaṃ tathā sāṃkhyaṃ vidyāḥ śilpāni karma ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.139c: vedāḥ śāstrāṇi vijñānam etat sarvaṃ janārdanāt
GE07mbh_13_u:135.140a: eko viṣṇur mahad bhūtaṃ pṛthag bhūtāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.140c: trīṃl lokān vyāpya bhūtātmā bhuṅkte viśvabhug avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.141a: imaṃ stavaṃ bhagavato viṣṇor vyāsena kīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.141c: paṭhed ya icchet puruṣaḥ śreyaḥ prāptuṃ sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.141d-0634_02: yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi śreyaḥ prāpnoty anuttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142c: bhajanti ye puṣkarākṣaṃ na te yānti parābhavam arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0635_03: yo māṃ nāmasahasreṇa stotum icchati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0635_04: so 'ham ekena ślokena stuta eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0637_05: eṣa niṣkaṇṭakaḥ panthā yatra saṃpūjyate hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0637_06: kupathaṃ taṃ vijānīyād govindarahitāgamam rudra uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0637_07: rāma rāmeti rāmeti rame rāme manorame
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0638_01: iti stutvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ pārthas tūṣṇīṃ sthitas tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0639_03: ākāśāt patitaṃ toyaṃ yathā gacchati sāgaram
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0639_05: sarvavedeṣu yat puṇyaṃ sarvavedeṣu yat phalam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0639_06: tat phalaṃ puruṣa āpnoti stutvā devaṃ janārdanam
GE07mbh_13_u:135.142d-0640_01: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana
GE07mbh_13_u:136.001a: ke pūjyāḥ ke namaskāryāḥ kathaṃ varteta keṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:136.003a: te pūjyās te namaskāryā vartethās teṣu putravat
GE07mbh_13_u:136.003c: te hi lokān imān sarvān dhārayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136.005a: ramaṇīyāś ca bhūtānāṃ nidhānaṃ ca dhṛtavratāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136.005c: praṇetāraś ca lokānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136.006a: tapo yeṣāṃ dhanaṃ nityaṃ vāk caiva vipulaṃ balam
GE07mbh_13_u:136.006b-0641_01: mahātmanāṃ jñānavidāṃ tapa eva dhanaṃ param
GE07mbh_13_u:136.007c: yān upāśritya jīvanti prajāḥ sarvāś caturvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136.009a: dhuri ye nāvasīdanti viṣame sadgavā iva
GE07mbh_13_u:136.010a: bhojanād eva ye lokāṃs trāyante mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:136.010c: dīpāḥ sarvasya lokasya cakṣuś cakṣuṣmatām api
GE07mbh_13_u:136.014c: samaṃ yeṣāṃ dukūlaṃ ca śāṇakṣaumājināni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:136.015a: tiṣṭheyur apy abhuñjānā bahūni divasāny api
GE07mbh_13_u:136.016a: adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpy adaivatam
GE07mbh_13_u:136.016c: lokān anyān sṛjeyuś ca lokapālāṃś ca kopitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136.018a: devānām api ye devāḥ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:136.018c: pramāṇasya pramāṇaṃ ca kas tān abhibhaved budhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136.019a: yeṣāṃ vṛddhaś ca bālaś ca sarvaḥ saṃmānam arhati
GE07mbh_13_u:136.019b-0642_01: teṣāṃ vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca sarve sanmārgadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:136.020a: avidvān brāhmaṇo devaḥ pātraṃ vai pāvanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:136.021a: avidvāṃś caiva vidvāṃś ca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:136.021c: praṇītaś cāpraṇītaś ca yathāgnir daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:136.022a: śmaśāne hy api tejasvī pāvako naiva duṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:136.022c: havir yajñeṣu ca vahan bhūya evābhiśobhate
GE07mbh_13_u:136.023a: evaṃ yady apy aniṣṭeṣu vartate sarvakarmasu
GE07mbh_13_u:136.023c: sarvathā brāhmaṇo mānyo daivataṃ viddhi tat param
GE07mbh_13_u:137.001a: kāṃ tu brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:137.001c: kaṃ vā karmodayaṃ matvā tān arcasi mahāmate
GE07mbh_13_u:137.002c: pavanasya ca saṃvādam arjunasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:137.005a: svavittaṃ tena dattaṃ tu dattātreyāya kāraṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:137.005c: kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya vinayaṃ śrutam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:137.006a: ārādhayām āsa ca taṃ kṛtavīryātmajo munim
GE07mbh_13_u:137.006c: nyamantrayata saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa dvijaś ca varais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137.007a: sa varaiś chanditas tena nṛpo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:137.008a: mama bāhusahasraṃ tu paśyantāṃ sainikā raṇe
GE07mbh_13_u:137.008e: tāṃ ca dharmeṇa saṃprāpya pālayeyam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137.009a: caturthaṃ tu varaṃ yāce tvām ahaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_13_u:137.010a: ity uktaḥ sa dvijaḥ prāha tathāstv iti narādhipam
GE07mbh_13_u:137.010c: evaṃ samabhavaṃs tasya varās te dīptatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137.011c: abravīd vīryasaṃmohāt ko nv asti sadṛśo mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:137.012c: na tvaṃ mūḍha vijānīṣe brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyād varam
GE07mbh_13_u:137.013a: kuryāṃ bhūtāni tuṣṭo 'haṃ kruddho nāśaṃ tathā naye
GE07mbh_13_u:137.013c: karmaṇā manasā vācā na matto 'sti varo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137.014c: tvayoktau yau tu tau hetū viśeṣas tv atra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:137.015a: brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśritāḥ kṣatraṃ na kṣatraṃ brāhmaṇāśritam
GE07mbh_13_u:137.015c: śritān brahmopadhā viprāḥ khādanti kṣatriyān bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:137.016c: kṣatrād vṛttir brāhmaṇānāṃ taiḥ kathaṃ brāhmaṇo varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137.018a: kathitaṃ hy anayā satyaṃ gāyatryā kanyayā divi
GE07mbh_13_u:137.019a: na ca māṃ cyāvayed rāṣṭrāt triṣu lokeṣu kaś cana
GE07mbh_13_u:137.019c: devo vā mānuṣo vāpi tasmāj jyeṣṭho dvijād aham
GE07mbh_13_u:137.020c: na hi me saṃyuge kaś cit soḍhum utsahate balam
GE07mbh_13_u:137.022c: eteṣāṃ kurvataḥ pāpaṃ rāṣṭrakṣobho hi te bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:137.023a: atha vā tvāṃ mahīpāla śamayiṣyanti vai dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137.024a: taṃ rājā kas tvam ity āha tatas taṃ prāha mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:137.024c: vāyur vai devadūto 'smi hitaṃ tvāṃ prabravīmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:137.025c: yādṛśaṃ pṛthivī bhūtaṃ tādṛśaṃ brūhi vai dvijam
GE07mbh_13_u:137.026a: vāyor vā sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cid brūhi tvaṃ brāhmaṇottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:137.026c: apāṃ vai sadṛśaṃ brūhi sūryasya nabhaso 'pi vā
GE07mbh_13_u:138.001a: śṛṇu mūḍha guṇān kāṃś cid brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_13_u:138.001c: ye tvayā kīrtitā rājaṃs tebhyo 'tha brāhmaṇo varaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.002a: tyaktvā mahītvaṃ bhūmis tu spardhayāṅganṛpasya ha
GE07mbh_13_u:138.002c: nāśaṃ jagāma tāṃ vipro vyaṣṭambhayata kaśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.003a: akṣayā brāhmaṇā rājan divi ceha ca nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:138.003c: apibat tejasā hy āpaḥ svayam evāṅgirāḥ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:138.004a: sa tāḥ piban kṣīram iva nātṛpyata mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.004c: apūrayan mahaughena mahīṃ sarvāṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:138.005a: tasminn ahaṃ ca kruddhe vai jagat tyaktvā tato gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.005c: vyatiṣṭham agnihotre ca ciram aṅgiraso bhayāt
GE07mbh_13_u:138.006c: ahalyāṃ kāmayāno vai dharmārthaṃ ca na hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.007a: tathā samudro nṛpate pūrṇo mṛṣṭena vāriṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:138.007c: brāhmaṇair abhiśaptaḥ saṃl lavaṇodaḥ kṛto vibho
GE07mbh_13_u:138.010a: samo na tvaṃ dvijātibhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ viddhi narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:138.010c: garbhasthān brāhmaṇān samyaṅ namasyati kila prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.012a: tvayā ca vipulaṃ rājyaṃ balaṃ dharmaḥ śrutaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:138.013a: agniṃ tvaṃ yajase nityaṃ kasmād arjuna brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:138.013c: sa hi sarvasya lokasya havyavāṭ kiṃ na vetsi tam
GE07mbh_13_u:138.015c: yenedaṃ nikhilaṃ viśvaṃ janitaṃ sthāvaraṃ caram
GE07mbh_13_u:138.016a: aṇḍajātaṃ tu brahmāṇaṃ ke cid icchanty apaṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.016c: aṇḍād bhinnād babhuḥ śailā diśo 'mbhaḥ pṛthivī divam
GE07mbh_13_u:138.017a: draṣṭavyaṃ naitad evaṃ hi kathaṃ jyāyastamo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.017c: smṛtam ākāśam aṇḍaṃ tu tasmāj jātaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.018a: tiṣṭhet katham iti brūhi na kiṃ cid dhi tadā bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:138.019a: nāsty aṇḍam asti tu brahmā sa rājaṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:138.019c: ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:139.001a: imāṃ bhūmiṃ brāhmaṇebhyo ditsur vai dakṣiṇāṃ purā
GE07mbh_13_u:139.001c: aṅgo nāma nṛpo rājaṃs tataś cintāṃ mahī yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:139.002a: dhāraṇīṃ sarvabhūtānām ayaṃ prāpya varo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.002c: katham icchati māṃ dātuṃ dvijebhyo brahmaṇaḥ sutām
GE07mbh_13_u:139.003a: sāhaṃ tyaktvā gamiṣyāmi bhūmitvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_13_u:139.003c: ayaṃ sarāṣṭro nṛpatir mā bhūd iti tato 'gamat
GE07mbh_13_u:139.004a: tatas tāṃ kaśyapo dṛṣṭvā vrajantīṃ pṛthivīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:139.005c: dharmottarā naṣṭabhayā bhūmir āsīt tato nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:139.006c: triṃśataṃ kaśyapo rājan bhūmir āsīd atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.007c: pṛthivī kāśyapī jajñe sutā tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.008a: eṣa rājann īdṛśo vai brāhmaṇaḥ kaśyapo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:139.008c: anyaṃ prabrūhi vāpi tvaṃ kaśyapāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:139.009a: tūṣṇīṃ babhūva nṛpatiḥ pavanas tv abravīt punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.010a: bhadrā somasya duhitā rūpeṇa paramā matā
GE07mbh_13_u:139.010c: tasyās tulyaṃ patiṃ soma utathyaṃ samapaśyata
GE07mbh_13_u:139.011a: sā ca tīvraṃ tapas tepe mahābhāgā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_13_u:139.011d-0643_01: utathyārthe tu cārvaṅgī paraṃ niyamam āsthitā
GE07mbh_13_u:139.012a: tata āhūya sotathyaṃ dadāv atra yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_13_u:139.012c: bhāryārthe sa ca jagrāha vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇa
GE07mbh_13_u:139.013a: tāṃ tv akāmayata śrīmān varuṇaḥ pūrvam eva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:139.013c: sa cāgamya vanaprasthaṃ yamunāyāṃ jahāra tām
GE07mbh_13_u:139.014a: jaleśvaras tu hṛtvā tām anayat svapuraṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:139.015a: na hi ramyataraṃ kiṃ cit tasmād anyat purottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:139.015c: prāsādair apsarobhiś ca divyaiḥ kāmaiś ca śobhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:139.015e: tatra devas tayā sārdhaṃ reme rājañ jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.017a: tac chrutvā nāradāt sarvam utathyo nāradaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:139.017c: provāca gaccha brūhi tvaṃ varuṇaṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.017e: madvākyān muñca me bhāryāṃ kasmād vā hṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_13_u:139.018c: somena dattā bhāryā me tvayā cāpahṛtādya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:139.019a: ity ukto vacanāt tasya nāradena jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.019c: muñca bhāryām utathyasyety atha taṃ varuṇo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:139.019e: mamaiṣā supriyā bhāryā nainām utsraṣṭum utsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:139.020a: ity ukto varuṇenātha nāradaḥ prāpya taṃ munim
GE07mbh_13_u:139.021c: na prayacchati te bhāryāṃ yat te kāryaṃ kuruṣva tat
GE07mbh_13_u:139.022a: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhaḥ prājvalad aṅgirāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.023a: pīyamāne ca sarvasmiṃs toye vai salileśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.025a: tatas tad iriṇaṃ jātaṃ samudraś cāpasarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.025c: tasmād deśān nadīṃ caiva provācāsau dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.026a: adṛśyā gaccha bhīru tvaṃ sarasvati maruṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:139.026c: apuṇya eṣa bhavatu deśas tyaktas tvayā śubhe
GE07mbh_13_u:139.027a: tasmin saṃcūrṇite deśe bhadrām ādāya vāripaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.027c: adadāc charaṇaṃ gatvā bhāryām āṅgirasāya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:139.028a: pratigṛhya tu tāṃ bhāryām utathyaḥ sumanābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:139.028c: mumoca ca jagad duḥkhād varuṇaṃ caiva haihaya
GE07mbh_13_u:139.029a: tataḥ sa labdhvā tāṃ bhāryāṃ varuṇaṃ prāha dharmavit
GE07mbh_13_u:139.029c: utathyaḥ sumahātejā yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:139.029d-0646_01: muktas tvam āyuḥśeṣeṇa mā bhair gaccha jaleśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:139.029d-0646_02: māvamaṃsthāḥ punar mohān mā tvāṃ ninyur yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_13_u:139.030a: mayaiṣā tapasā prāptā krośatas te jalādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:139.030c: ity uktvā tām upādāya svam eva bhavanaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:139.031a: eṣa rājann īdṛśo vai utathyo brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:139.031c: bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam utathyāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:140.001a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:140.001c: śṛṇu rājann agastyasya māhātmyaṃ brāhmaṇasya ha
GE07mbh_13_u:140.002a: asurair nirjitā devā nirutsāhāś ca te kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.002c: yajñāś caiṣāṃ hṛtāḥ sarve pitṛbhyaś ca svadhā tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:140.003c: bhraṣṭaiśvaryās tato devāś ceruḥ pṛthvīm iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.004a: tataḥ kadā cit te rājan dīptam ādityavarcasam
GE07mbh_13_u:140.005a: abhivādya ca taṃ devā dṛṣṭvā ca yaśasā vṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:140.005c: idam ūcur mahātmānaṃ vākyaṃ kāle janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:140.006a: dānavair yudhi bhagnāḥ sma tathaiśvaryāc ca bhraṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.006c: tad asmān no bhayāt tīvrāt trāhi tvaṃ munipuṃgava
GE07mbh_13_u:140.007a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā devair agastyaḥ kupito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:140.007c: prajajvāla ca tejasvī kālāgnir iva saṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_13_u:140.009a: dahyamānās tu te daityās tasyāgastyasya tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:140.009c: ubhau lokau parityajya yayuḥ kāṣṭhāṃ sma dakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:140.010a: balis tu yajate yajñam aśvamedhaṃ mahīṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.010c: ye 'nye svasthā mahīsthāś ca te na dagdhā mahāsurāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.011a: tato lokāḥ punaḥ prāptāḥ suraiḥ śāntaṃ ca tad rajaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.011c: athainam abruvan devā bhūmiṣṭhān asurāñ jahi
GE07mbh_13_u:140.012a: ity ukta āha devān sa na śaknomi mahīgatān
GE07mbh_13_u:140.012c: dagdhuṃ tapo hi kṣīyen me dhakṣyāmīti ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:140.013a: evaṃ dagdhā bhagavatā dānavāḥ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:140.014a: īdṛśaś cāpy agastyo hi kathitas te mayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:140.014c: bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam agastyāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:140.015a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:140.015c: śṛṇu rājan vasiṣṭhasya mukhyaṃ karma yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.016a: ādityāḥ satram āsanta saro vai mānasaṃ prati
GE07mbh_13_u:140.016c: vasiṣṭhaṃ manasā gatvā śrutvā tatrāsya gocaram
GE07mbh_13_u:140.017a: yajamānāṃs tu tān dṛṣṭvā vyagrān dīkṣānukarśitān
GE07mbh_13_u:140.017c: hantum icchanti śailābhāḥ khalino nāma dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.018a: adūrāt tu tatas teṣāṃ brahmadattavaraṃ saraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.018c: hatā hatā vai te tatra jīvanty āplutya dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.019a: te pragṛhya mahāghorān parvatān parighān drumān
GE07mbh_13_u:140.020a: abhyadravanta devāṃs te sahasrāṇi daśaiva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:140.020c: tatas tair arditā devāḥ śaraṇaṃ vāsavaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.021a: sa ca tair vyathitaḥ śakro vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_13_u:140.021c: tato 'bhayaṃ dadau tebhyo vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.022a: tathā tān duḥkhitāñ jānann ānṛśaṃsyaparo muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.023a: kailāsaṃ prasthitāṃ cāpi nadīṃ gaṅgāṃ mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.023c: ānayat tat saro divyaṃ tayā bhinnaṃ ca tat saraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:140.024a: saro bhinnaṃ tayā nadyā sarayūḥ sā tato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:140.024c: hatāś ca khalino yatra sa deśaḥ khalino 'bhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:140.026a: etat karma vasiṣṭhasya kathitaṃ te mayānagha
GE07mbh_13_u:140.026c: bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvaṃ vasiṣṭhāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:141.001a: ity uktas tv arjunas tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:141.003a: atha te tamasā grastā nihanyante sma dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.005c: asurair iṣubhir viddhau candrādityāv imāv ubhau
GE07mbh_13_u:141.006c: nādhigacchāma śāntiṃ ca bhayāt trāyasva naḥ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:141.007a: kathaṃ rakṣāmi bhavatas te 'bruvaṃś candramā bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:141.007c: timiraghnaś ca savitā dasyuhā caiva no bhava
GE07mbh_13_u:141.008a: evam uktas tadātris tu tamonud abhavac chaśī
GE07mbh_13_u:141.009a: dṛṣṭvā nātiprabhaṃ somaṃ tathā sūryaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:141.009c: prakāśam akarod atris tapasā svena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_13_u:141.010a: jagad vitimiraṃ cāpi pradīptam akarot tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:141.010c: vyajayac chatrusaṃghāṃś ca devānāṃ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:141.011a: atriṇā dahyamānāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā devā mahāsurān
GE07mbh_13_u:141.012a: udbhāsitaś ca savitā devās trātā hatāsurāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.012c: atriṇā tv atha somatvaṃ kṛtam uttamatejasā
GE07mbh_13_u:141.014c: bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam atritaḥ kṣatriyaṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:141.014d-0648_01: evam atrer mahārāja kathitaṃ karma cādbhutam
GE07mbh_13_u:141.015a: ity uktas tv arjunas tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:141.015c: śṛṇu rājan mahat karma cyavanasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.016c: provāca sahitaṃ devaiḥ somapāv aśvinau kuru
GE07mbh_13_u:141.016d-0649_03: nāsatyau balinau rājaṃś cakre vai somapīthinau
GE07mbh_13_u:141.017a: asmābhir varjitāv etau bhavetāṃ somapau katham
GE07mbh_13_u:141.017c: devair na saṃmitāv etau tasmān maivaṃ vadasva naḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018a: aśvibhyāṃ saha necchāmaḥ pātuṃ somaṃ mahāvrata cyavana uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018b-0650_01: yad anyad vakṣyase vipra tat kariṣyāma te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018b-0650_02: pibetām aśvinau somaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sahitāv imau
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018b-0650_03: ubhāv etāv api surau sūryaputrau sureśvara
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018b-0650_04: kriyatāṃ madvaco devā yathā vai samudāhṛtam indra uvāca
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018b-0650_05: etad vaḥ kurvatāṃ śreyo bhaven naitad
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018b-0650_06: aśvibhyāṃ saha somaṃ vai na pāsyāmi dvijottama
GE07mbh_13_u:141.018c: pibantv anye yathākāmaṃ nāhaṃ pātum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_13_u:141.019a: na cet kariṣyasi vaco mayoktaṃ balasūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:141.019c: mayā pramathitaḥ sadyaḥ somaṃ pāsyasi vai makhe
GE07mbh_13_u:141.021a: tat tu karma samārabdhaṃ dṛṣṭvendraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.023a: athendrasya mahāghoraṃ so 'sṛjac chatrum eva ha
GE07mbh_13_u:141.024e: hanus tasyābhavad bhūmāv ekaś cāsyāspṛśad divam
GE07mbh_13_u:141.025a: jihvāmūle sthitās tasya sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.025c: timer āsyam anuprāptā yathā matsyā mahārṇave
GE07mbh_13_u:141.026a: te saṃmantrya tato devā madasyāsyagatās tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:141.026e: aśvibhyāṃ saha somaṃ ca pibāmo vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.027a: tataḥ sa praṇataḥ śakraś cakāra cyavanasya tat
GE07mbh_13_u:141.027b-0651_01: tatheti śakras tasyātha praṇāmam akaron nṛpa
GE07mbh_13_u:141.027c: cyavanaḥ kṛtavāṃs tau cāpy aśvinau somapīthinau
GE07mbh_13_u:141.028a: tataḥ pratyāharat karma madaṃ ca vyabhajan muniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.028c: akṣeṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca pāne strīṣu ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:141.029a: etair doṣair naro rājan kṣayaṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:141.029c: tasmād etān naro nityaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:141.030a: etat te cyavanasyāpi karma rājan prakīrtitam
GE07mbh_13_u:141.030c: bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvaṃ cyavanāt kṣatriyaṃ varam
GE07mbh_13_u:142.001a: tūṣṇīm āsīd arjunas tu pavanas tv abravīt punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.001c: śṛṇu me brāhmaṇeṣv eva mukhyaṃ karma janādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:142.003a: ubhau lokau hṛtau matvā te devā duḥkhitābhavan
GE07mbh_13_u:142.003c: śokārtāś ca mahātmānaṃ brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.004c: cyavanena hṛtā bhūmiḥ kapaiś cāpi divaṃ prabho brahmovāca
GE07mbh_13_u:142.005a: gacchadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ viprān āśu sendrā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.005c: prasādya tān ubhau lokāv avāpsyatha yathā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:142.006a: te yayuḥ śaraṇaṃ viprāṃs ta ūcuḥ kāñ jayāmahe
GE07mbh_13_u:142.006c: ity uktās te dvijān prāhur jayateha kapān iti
GE07mbh_13_u:142.006e: bhūgatān hi vijetāro vayam ity eva pārthiva
GE07mbh_13_u:142.007c: tac chrutvā preṣito dūto brāhmaṇebhyo dhanī kapaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.008a: sa ca tān brāhmaṇān āha dhanī kapavaco yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:142.008c: bhavadbhiḥ sadṛśāḥ sarve kapāḥ kim iha vartate
GE07mbh_13_u:142.009a: sarve vedavidaḥ prājñāḥ sarve ca kratuyājinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.009c: sarve satyavratāś caiva sarve tulyā maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.010a: śrīś caiva ramate teṣu dhārayanti śriyaṃ ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:142.010c: vṛthā dārān na gacchanti vṛthāmāṃsaṃ na bhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:142.011a: dīptam agniṃ juhvati ca gurūṇāṃ vacane sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.012a: upetya śakaṭair yānti na sevanti rajasvalām
GE07mbh_13_u:142.012c: abhuktavatsu nāśnanti divā caiva na śerate garbhiṇīvatsakādiṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:142.013a: etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir guṇair yuktān kathaṃ kapān
GE07mbh_13_u:142.013c: vijeṣyatha nivartadhvaṃ nivṛttānāṃ śubhaṃ hi vaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.014a: kapān vayaṃ vijeṣyāmo ye devās te vayaṃ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.014c: tasmād vadhyāḥ kapāsmākaṃ dhanin yāhi yathāgatam
GE07mbh_13_u:142.015a: dhanī gatvā kapān āha na vo viprāḥ priyaṃkarāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.015c: gṛhītvāstrāṇy atho viprān kapāḥ sarve samādravan
GE07mbh_13_u:142.017d-0654_01: hatvā vai dānavān devāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_13_u:142.017d-0654_02: te nābhyajānan hi tadā brāhmaṇair nihatān kapān
GE07mbh_13_u:142.017d-0654_04: yathā hatā mahābhāgais tejasā brāhmaṇaiḥ kapāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.017d-0654_05: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā prītāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.017e: praśaśaṃsur dvijāṃś caiva brahmāṇaṃ ca yaśasvinam
GE07mbh_13_u:142.018a: teṣāṃ tejas tathā vīryaṃ devānāṃ vavṛdhe tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.019c: pratipūjya mahābāho yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:142.020a: jīvāmy ahaṃ brāhmaṇārthe sarvathā satataṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:142.020c: brahmaṇe brāhmaṇebhyaś ca praṇamāmi ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.021a: dattātreyaprasādāc ca mayā prāptam idaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:142.021c: loke ca paramā kīrtir dharmaś ca carito mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:142.022c: tvayā proktāni kārtsnyena śrutāni prayatena ha
GE07mbh_13_u:142.023c: bhṛgubhyas te bhayaṃ ghoraṃ tat tu kālād bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:143.001c: kaṃ tu karmodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān arcasi narādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:143.002a: kāṃ vā brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvrata
GE07mbh_13_u:143.002c: tān arcasi mahābāho sarvam etad vadasva me
GE07mbh_13_u:143.003a: eṣa te keśavaḥ sarvam ākhyāsyati mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.004a: balaṃ śrotre vāṅ manaś cakṣuṣī ca; jñānaṃ tathā na viśuddhaṃ mamādya
GE07mbh_13_u:143.004c: dehanyāso nāticirān mato me; na cātitūrṇaṃ savitādya yāti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.005a: uktā dharmā ye purāṇe mahānto; brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.005c: paurāṇaṃ ye daṇḍam upāsate ca; śeṣaṃ kṛṣṇād upaśikṣasva pārtha
GE07mbh_13_u:143.006a: ahaṃ hy enaṃ vedmi tattvena kṛṣṇaṃ; yo 'yaṃ hi yac cāsya balaṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.006c: ameyātmā keśavaḥ kauravendra; so 'yaṃ dharmaṃ vakṣyati saṃśayeṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:143.007a: kṛṣṇaḥ pṛthvīm asṛjat khaṃ divaṃ ca; varāho 'yaṃ bhīmabalaḥ purāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.007b-0657_01: sa parvatān vyasṛjad vai diśaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.007c: asya cādho 'thāntarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca; diśaś catasraḥ pradiśaś catasraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.007e: sṛṣṭis tathaiveyam anuprasūtā; sa nirmame viśvam idaṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.008a: asya nābhyāṃ puṣkaraṃ saṃprasūtaṃ; yatrotpannaḥ svayam evāmitaujāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.008c: yenācchinnaṃ tat tamaḥ pārtha ghoraṃ; yat tat tiṣṭhaty arṇavaṃ tarjayānam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.009a: kṛte yuge dharma āsīt samagras; tretākāle jñānam anuprapannaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.009c: balaṃ tv āsīd dvāpare pārtha kṛṣṇaḥ; kalāv adharmaḥ kṣitim ājagāma
GE07mbh_13_u:143.010a: sa pūrvadevo nijaghāna daityān; sa pūrvadevaś ca babhūva samrāṭ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.010c: sa bhūtānāṃ bhāvano bhūtabhavyaḥ; sa viśvasyāsya jagataś cāpi goptā
GE07mbh_13_u:143.011a: yadā dharmo glāyati vai surāṇāṃ; tadā kṛṣṇo jāyate mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_13_u:143.011c: dharme sthitvā sa tu vai bhāvitātmā; parāṃś ca lokān aparāṃś ca yāti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.012a: tyājyāṃs tyaktvāthāsurāṇāṃ vadhāya; kāryākārye kāraṇaṃ caiva pārtha
GE07mbh_13_u:143.012c: kṛtaṃ kariṣyat kriyate ca devo; muhuḥ somaṃ viddhi ca śakram etam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.013a: sa viśvakarmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥ; sa viśvabhṛd viśvasṛg viśvajic ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.013c: sa śūlabhṛc choṇitabhṛt karālas; taṃ karmabhir viditaṃ vai stuvanti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.014a: taṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca nityam; upatiṣṭhante vibudhānāṃ śatāni
GE07mbh_13_u:143.014c: taṃ rākṣasāś ca parisaṃvahante; rāyaspoṣaḥ sa vijigīṣur ekaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.015a: tam adhvare śaṃsitāraḥ stuvanti; rathaṃtare sāmagāś ca stuvanti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.015c: taṃ brāhmaṇā brahmamantraiḥ stuvanti; tasmai havir adhvaryavaḥ kalpayanti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.016a: sa paurāṇīṃ brahmaguhāṃ praviṣṭo; mahīsatraṃ bhāratāgre dadarśa
GE07mbh_13_u:143.016c: sa caiva gām uddadhārāgryakarmā; vikṣobhya daityān uragān dānavāṃś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.017a: tasya bhakṣān vividhān vedayanti; tam evājau vāhanaṃ vedayanti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.017c: tasyāntarikṣaṃ pṛthivī divaṃ ca; sarvaṃ vaśe tiṣṭhati śāśvatasya
GE07mbh_13_u:143.018a: sa kumbharetāḥ sasṛje purāṇaṃ; yatrotpannam ṛṣim āhur vasiṣṭham
GE07mbh_13_u:143.018c: sa mātariśvā vibhur aśvavājī; sa raśmimān savitā cādidevaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.019a: tenāsurā vijitāḥ sarva eva; tasya vikrāntair vijitānīha trīṇi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.019c: sa devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ; tam evāhur yajñavidāṃ vitānam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.020a: sa eva kālaṃ vibhajann udeti; tasyottaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cāyane dve
GE07mbh_13_u:143.020c: tasyaivordhvaṃ tiryag adhaś caranti; gabhastayo medinīṃ tāpayantaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.021a: taṃ brāhmaṇā vedavido juṣanti; tasyādityo bhām upayujya bhāti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.021c: sa māsi māsy adhvarakṛd vidhatte; tam adhvare vedavidaḥ paṭhanti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.022a: sa ekayuk cakram idaṃ trinābhi; saptāśvayuktaṃ vahate vai tridhāmā
GE07mbh_13_u:143.022c: mahātejāḥ sarvagaḥ sarvasiṃhaḥ; kṛṣṇo lokān dhārayate tathaikaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.022e: aśnann anaśnaṃś ca tathaiva dhīraḥ; kṛṣṇaṃ sadā pārtha kartāram ehi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.023a: sa ekadā kakṣagato mahātmā; tṛpto vibhuḥ khāṇḍave dhūmaketuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.023c: sa rākṣasān uragāṃś cāvajitya; sarvatragaḥ sarvam agnau juhoti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.024a: sa evāśvaḥ śvetam aśvaṃ prayacchat; sa evāśvān atha sarvāṃś cakāra
GE07mbh_13_u:143.024c: trivandhuras tasya rathas tricakras; trivṛcchirāś caturasraś ca tasya
GE07mbh_13_u:143.025a: sa vihāyo vyadadhāt pañcanābhiḥ; sa nirmame gāṃ divam antarikṣam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.025c: evaṃ ramyān asṛjat parvatāṃś ca; hṛṣīkeśo 'mitadīptāgnitejāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.026a: sa laṅghayan vai sarito jighāṃsan; sa taṃ vajraṃ praharantaṃ nirāsa
GE07mbh_13_u:143.026c: sa mahendraḥ stūyate vai mahādhvare; viprair eko ṛksahasraiḥ purāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.027a: durvāsā vai tena nānyena śakyo; gṛhe rājan vāsayituṃ mahaujāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.027c: tam evāhur ṛṣim ekaṃ purāṇaṃ; sa viśvakṛd vidadhāty ātmabhāvān
GE07mbh_13_u:143.028a: vedāṃś ca yo vedayate 'dhidevo; vidhīṃś ca yaś cāśrayate purāṇān
GE07mbh_13_u:143.028c: kāme vede laukike yat phalaṃ ca; viṣvaksene sarvam etat pratīhi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.029a: jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca sarvaloke; trayo lokā lokapālās trayaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.029c: trayo 'gnayo vyāhṛtayaś ca tisraḥ; sarve devā devakīputra eva
GE07mbh_13_u:143.030a: saṃvatsaraḥ sa ṛtuḥ so 'rdhamāsaḥ; so 'horātraḥ sa kalā vai sa kāṣṭhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.030c: mātrā muhūrtāś ca lavāḥ kṣaṇāś ca; viṣvaksene sarvam etat pratīhi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.031a: candrādityau grahanakṣatratārāḥ; sarvāṇi darśāny atha paurṇamāsyaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.031c: nakṣatrayogā ṛtavaś ca pārtha; viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat prasūtam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.032a: rudrādityā vasavo 'thāśvinau ca; sādhyā viśve marutāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.032c: prajāpatir devamātāditiś ca; sarve kṛṣṇād ṛṣayaś caiva sapta
GE07mbh_13_u:143.033a: vāyur bhūtvā vikṣipate ca viśvam; agnir bhūtvā dahate viśvarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.033c: āpo bhūtvā majjayate ca sarvaṃ; brahmā bhūtvā sṛjate viśvasaṃghān
GE07mbh_13_u:143.034a: vedyaṃ ca yad vedayate ca vedān; vidhiś ca yaś cāśrayate vidheyān
GE07mbh_13_u:143.034c: dharme ca vede ca bale ca sarvaṃ; carācaraṃ keśavaṃ tvaṃ pratīhi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.035a: jyotirbhūtaḥ paramo 'sau purastāt; prakāśayan prabhayā viśvarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.035c: apaḥ sṛṣṭvā hy ātmabhūr ātmayoniḥ; purākarot sarvam evātha viśvam
GE07mbh_13_u:143.036a: ṛtūn utpātān vividhāny adbhutāni; meghān vidyut sarvam airāvataṃ ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.036c: sarvaṃ kṛṣṇāt sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca; viśvākhyātād viṣṇum enaṃ pratīhi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.037a: viśvāvāsaṃ nirguṇaṃ vāsudevaṃ; saṃkarṣaṇaṃ jīvabhūtaṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_13_u:143.037c: tataḥ pradyumnam aniruddhaṃ caturtham; ājñāpayaty ātmayonir mahātmā
GE07mbh_13_u:143.038a: sa pañcadhā pañcajanopapannaṃ; saṃcodayan viśvam idaṃ sisṛkṣuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.038c: tataś cakārāvanimārutau ca; khaṃ jyotir āpaś ca tathaiva pārtha
GE07mbh_13_u:143.039a: sa sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caivam etac; caturvidhaṃ lokam imaṃ ca kṛtvā
GE07mbh_13_u:143.039c: tato bhūmiṃ vyadadhāt pañcabījāṃ; dyauḥ pṛthivyāṃ dhāsyati bhūri vāri
GE07mbh_13_u:143.039e: tena viśvaṃ kṛtam etad dhi rājan; sa jīvayaty ātmanaivātmayoniḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.040a: tato devān asurān mānuṣāṃś ca; lokān ṛṣīṃś cātha pitṝn prajāś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.040c: samāsena vividhān prāṇilokān; sarvān sadā bhūtapatiḥ sisṛkṣuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.041a: śubhāśubhaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca; viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat pratīhi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.041c: yad vartate yac ca bhaviṣyatīha; sarvam etat keśavaṃ tvaṃ pratīhi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.042a: mṛtyuś caiva prāṇinām antakāle; sākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ śāśvato dharmavāhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.042c: bhūtaṃ ca yac ceha na vidma kiṃ cid; viṣvaksenāt sarvam etat pratīhi
GE07mbh_13_u:143.043a: yat praśastaṃ ca lokeṣu puṇyaṃ yac ca śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_13_u:143.043c: tat sarvaṃ keśavo 'cintyo viparītam ato bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:143.044a: etādṛśaḥ keśavo 'yaṃ svayaṃbhūr; nārāyaṇaḥ paramaś cāvyayaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.044c: madhyaṃ cāsya jagatas tasthuṣaś ca; sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prabhavaś cāpyayaś ca
GE07mbh_13_u:143.044d-0665_01: tādṛśaḥ keśavo devo bhūyo nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.044d-0665_02: ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ ca deśataḥ kālato hariḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:143.044d-0665_03: jagatāṃ tasthuṣāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.001c: vettā tvam asya cārthasya veda tvāṃ hi pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.003c: kiṃ phalaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv asti pūjāyāṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:144.003e: īśvarasya satas tasya iha caiva paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:144.004a: sadā dvijātīn saṃpūjya kiṃ phalaṃ tatra mānada
GE07mbh_13_u:144.004c: etad brūhi pitaḥ sarvaṃ sumahān saṃśayo 'tra me
GE07mbh_13_u:144.005a: ity uktavacanas tena pradyumnena tadā tv aham
GE07mbh_13_u:144.005c: pratyabruvaṃ mahārāja yat tac chṛṇu samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.007a: asmiṃl loke raukmiṇeya tathāmuṣmiṃś ca putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:144.008a: brāhmaṇapramukhaṃ vīryam āyuḥ kīrtir yaśo balam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.009a: tat kathaṃ nādriyeyaṃ vai īśvaro 'smīti putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:144.009c: mā te manyur mahābāho bhavatv atra dvijān prati
GE07mbh_13_u:144.010a: brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtam asmiṃl loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:144.010c: bhasma kuryur jagad idaṃ kruddhāḥ pratyakṣadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.011a: anyān api sṛjeyuś ca lokāṃl lokeśvarāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.011c: kathaṃ teṣu na varteya samyag jñānāt sutejasaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.012e: dīrghebhyaś ca manuṣyebhyaḥ pramāṇād adhiko bhuvi
GE07mbh_13_u:144.013a: sa sma saṃcarate lokān ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.013c: imā gāthā gāyamānaś catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:144.014a: durvāsasaṃ vāsayet ko brāhmaṇaṃ satkṛtaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_13_u:144.014c: paribhāṣāṃ ca me śrutvā ko nu dadyāt pratiśrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.014e: yo māṃ kaś cid vāsayeta na sa māṃ kopayed iha
GE07mbh_13_u:144.015a: taṃ sma nādriyate kaś cit tato 'haṃ tam avāsayam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.016a: sa sma bhuṅkte sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnām annam ekadā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.016c: ekadā smālpakaṃ bhuṅkte na vaiti ca punar gṛhān
GE07mbh_13_u:144.017c: na cāsya vayasā tulyaḥ pṛthivyām abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.018c: kanyāś cālaṃkṛtā dagdhvā tato vyapagataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.018d-0670_01: adahat sa mahātejās tataś cābhyapatat svayam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.019a: atha mām abravīd bhūyaḥ sa muniḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.019c: kṛṣṇa pāyasam icchāmi bhoktum ity eva satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.020a: sadaiva tu mayā tasya cittajñena gṛhe janaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.021c: tad bhuktvaiva tu sa kṣipraṃ tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:144.021e: kṣipram aṅgāni limpasva pāyaseneti sa sma ha
GE07mbh_13_u:144.022a: avimṛśyaiva ca tataḥ kṛtavān asmi tat tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.023a: sa dadarśa tadābhyāśe mātaraṃ te śubhānanām
GE07mbh_13_u:144.024c: tam āruhya rathaṃ caiva niryayau sa gṛhān mama
GE07mbh_13_u:144.025a: agnivarṇo jvalan dhīmān sa dvijo rathadhuryavat
GE07mbh_13_u:144.026a: na ca me stokam apy āsīd duḥkham īrṣyākṛtaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.026c: tataḥ sa rājamārgeṇa mahatā niryayau bahiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.027a: tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryaṃ dāśārhā jātamanyavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.027c: tatrājalpan mithaḥ ke cit samābhāṣya parasparam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.028a: brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:144.028c: ko hy enaṃ ratham āsthāya jīved anyaḥ pumān iha
GE07mbh_13_u:144.030a: tasmin vrajati durdharṣe prāskhalad rukmiṇī pathi
GE07mbh_13_u:144.030c: tāṃ nāmarṣayata śrīmāṃs tatas tūrṇam acodayat
GE07mbh_13_u:144.031a: tataḥ paramasaṃkruddho rathāt praskandya sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.033a: tato vilokya tejasvī brāhmaṇo mām uvāca ha
GE07mbh_13_u:144.033c: jitaḥ krodhas tvayā kṛṣṇa prakṛtyaiva mahābhuja
GE07mbh_13_u:144.034a: na te 'parādham iha vai dṛṣṭavān asmi suvrata
GE07mbh_13_u:144.034c: prīto 'smi tava govinda vṛṇu kāmān yathepsitān
GE07mbh_13_u:144.034e: prasannasya ca me tāta paśya vyuṣṭir yathāvidhā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.035a: yāvad eva manuṣyāṇām anne bhāvo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:144.035c: yathaivānne tathā teṣāṃ tvayi bhāvo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:144.036a: yāvac ca puṇyā lokeṣu tvayi kīrtir bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:144.036c: triṣu lokeṣu tāvac ca vaiśiṣṭyaṃ pratipatsyase
GE07mbh_13_u:144.037a: yat te bhinnaṃ ca dagdhaṃ ca yac ca kiṃ cid vināśitam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.037c: sarvaṃ tathaiva draṣṭāsi viśiṣṭaṃ vā janārdana
GE07mbh_13_u:144.038a: yāvad etat praliptaṃ te gātreṣu madhusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:144.039a: na tu pādatale lipte kasmāt te putrakādya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:144.039c: naitan me priyam ity eva sa māṃ prīto 'bravīt tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.039e: ity ukto 'haṃ śarīraṃ svam apaśyaṃ śrīsamāyutam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.040a: rukmiṇīṃ cābravīt prītaḥ sarvastrīṇāṃ varaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:144.041a: na tvāṃ jarā vā rogo vā vaivarṇyaṃ cāpi bhāmini
GE07mbh_13_u:144.043a: tava mātaram ity uktvā tato māṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:144.044a: eṣaiva te buddhir astu brāhmaṇān prati keśava
GE07mbh_13_u:144.044c: ity uktvā sa tadā putra tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_13_u:144.045c: yat kiṃ cid brāhmaṇo brūyāt sarvaṃ kuryām iti prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:144.046a: etad vratam ahaṃ kṛtvā mātrā te saha putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:144.046c: tataḥ paramahṛṣṭātmā prāviśaṃ gṛham eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:144.047a: praviṣṭamātraś ca gṛhe sarvaṃ paśyāmi tan navam
GE07mbh_13_u:144.047c: yad bhinnaṃ yac ca vai dagdhaṃ tena vipreṇa putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:144.048a: tato 'haṃ vismayaṃ prāptaḥ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_13_u:144.048c: apūjayaṃ ca manasā raukmiṇeya dvijaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.050a: tathā tvam api kaunteya brāhmaṇān satataṃ prabho
GE07mbh_13_u:144.050c: pūjayasva mahābhāgān vāgbhir dānaiś ca nityadā
GE07mbh_13_u:144.051a: evaṃ vyuṣṭim ahaṃ prāpto brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādajām
GE07mbh_13_u:144.051c: yac ca mām āha bhīṣmo 'yaṃ tat satyaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_13_u:145.001a: durvāsasaḥ prasādāt te yat tadā madhusūdana
GE07mbh_13_u:145.001c: avāptam iha vijñānaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:145.002a: mahābhāgyaṃ ca yat tasya nāmāni ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.002c: tattvato jñātum icchāmi sarvaṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_13_u:145.003c: yad avāptaṃ mahārāja śreyo yac cārjitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.004a: prayataḥ prātar utthāya yad adhīye viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:145.004c: prāñjaliḥ śatarudrīyaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_13_u:145.004d-0671_01: śivaḥ sarvagato rudraḥ sraṣṭā yas taṃ śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_13_u:145.005c: śaṃkaras tv asṛjat tāta prajāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.006a: nāsti kiṃ cit paraṃ bhūtaṃ mahādevād viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_13_u:145.006c: iha triṣv api lokeṣu bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.007a: na caivotsahate sthātuṃ kaś cid agre mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.007c: na hi bhūtaṃ samaṃ tena triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:145.008a: gandhenāpi hi saṃgrāme tasya kruddhasya śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.008c: visaṃjñā hatabhūyiṣṭhā vepanti ca patanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:145.009c: śrutvā vidīryed dhṛdayaṃ devānām api saṃyuge
GE07mbh_13_u:145.010a: yāṃś ca ghoreṇa rūpeṇa paśyet kruddhaḥ pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_13_u:145.010b-0672_01: tatkṣaṇād eva kuryāt sa bhasma vahniśikhā yathā
GE07mbh_13_u:145.010c: na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.010e: kupite sukham edhante tasminn api guhāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.011a: prajāpateś ca dakṣasya yajato vitate kratau
GE07mbh_13_u:145.011c: vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:145.011e: dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda ca
GE07mbh_13_u:145.012a: te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ viṣādaṃ lebhire surāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.012c: vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvare
GE07mbh_13_u:145.013c: babhūvur avaśāḥ pārtha viṣeduś ca surāsurāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.014a: āpaś cukṣubhire caiva cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_13_u:145.014c: vyadravan girayaś cāpi dyauḥ paphāla ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.015a: andhena tamasā lokāḥ prāvṛtā na cakāśire
GE07mbh_13_u:145.015c: pranaṣṭā jyotiṣāṃ bhāś ca saha sūryeṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:145.016a: bhṛśaṃ bhītās tataḥ śāntiṃ cakruḥ svastyayanāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:145.019a: tataḥ praṇemur devās te vepamānāḥ sma śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_13_u:145.019c: punaś ca saṃdadhe rudro dīptaṃ suniśitaṃ śaram
GE07mbh_13_u:145.020a: rudrasya vikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.020c: tataḥ prasādayām āsuḥ śarvaṃ te vibudhottamāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.021a: jepuś ca śatarudrīyaṃ devāḥ kṛtvāñjaliṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.022a: rudrasya bhāgaṃ yajñe ca viśiṣṭaṃ te tv akalpayan
GE07mbh_13_u:145.022c: bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedire
GE07mbh_13_u:145.023c: yad yac cāpi hataṃ tatra tat tathaiva pradīyate yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.024-0673_01: tripurāṇi mahābāho jitavān sa maheśvaraḥ vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.024-0673_03: śṛṇu me gadatas tāta yathā dagdhaṃ puratrayam
GE07mbh_13_u:145.024a: asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divi
GE07mbh_13_u:145.024c: āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:145.025a: nāśakat tāni maghavā bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair api
GE07mbh_13_u:145.026a: tata ūcur mahātmāno devāḥ sarve samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.026e: jahi daityān saha purair lokāṃs trāyasva mānada
GE07mbh_13_u:145.027a: sa tathoktas tathety uktvā viṣṇuṃ kṛtvā śarottamam
GE07mbh_13_u:145.027c: śalyam agniṃ tathā kṛtvā puṅkhaṃ vaivasvataṃ yamam
GE07mbh_13_u:145.027e: vedān kṛtvā dhanuḥ sarvāñ jyāṃ ca sāvitrim uttamām
GE07mbh_13_u:145.028a: devān rathavaraṃ kṛtvā viniyujya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.028c: triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.029c: te 'surāḥ sapurās tatra dagdhā rudreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:145.030a: taṃ caivāṅkagataṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.030c: umā jijñāsamānā vai ko 'yam ity abravīt tadā
GE07mbh_13_u:145.031c: savajraṃ stambhayām āsa taṃ bāhuṃ parighopamam
GE07mbh_13_u:145.032a: na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:145.033a: tato dhyātvātha bhagavān brahmā tam amitaujasam
GE07mbh_13_u:145.033c: ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande tam umāpatim
GE07mbh_13_u:145.034a: tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.034c: babhūva sa tadā bāhur balahantur yathā purā
GE07mbh_13_u:145.035a: sa cāpi brāhmaṇo bhūtvā durvāsā nāma vīryavān
GE07mbh_13_u:145.035c: dvāravatyāṃ mama gṛhe ciraṃ kālam upāvasat
GE07mbh_13_u:145.036a: viprakārān prayuṅkte sma subahūn mama veśmani
GE07mbh_13_u:145.036c: tān udāratayā cāham akṣamaṃ tasya duḥsaham
GE07mbh_13_u:145.036d-0676_01: sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so 'gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvajit
GE07mbh_13_u:145.037a: sa devendraś ca vāyuś ca so 'śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.037c: sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.038a: sa kālaḥ so 'ntako mṛtyuḥ sa tamo rātryahāni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:145.038c: māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.039a: sa dhātā sa vidhātā ca viśvakarmā sa sarvavit
GE07mbh_13_u:145.039c: nakṣatrāṇi diśaś caiva pradiśo 'tha grahās tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:145.040a: ekadhā ca dvidhā caiva bahudhā ca sa eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:145.041a: īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:145.041c: na hi śakyā guṇā vaktum api varṣaśatair api
GE07mbh_13_u:146.002a: vadanty agniṃ mahādevaṃ tathā sthāṇuṃ maheśvaram
GE07mbh_13_u:146.002c: ekākṣaṃ tryambakaṃ caiva viśvarūpaṃ śivaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:146.003a: dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.003c: ghorām anyāṃ śivām anyāṃ te tanū bahudhā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.004a: ugrā ghorā tanūr yāsya so 'gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.004c: śivā saumyā ca yā tasya dharmas tv āpo 'tha candramāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.005c: brahmacaryaṃ caraty eṣa śivā yāsya tanus tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:146.006a: yāsya ghoratamā mūrtir jagat saṃharate tayā
GE07mbh_13_u:146.006c: īśvaratvān mahattvāc ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.007a: yan nirdahati yat tīkṣṇo yad ugro yat pratāpavān
GE07mbh_13_u:146.008a: devānāṃ sumahān yac ca yac cāsya viṣayo mahān
GE07mbh_13_u:146.008c: yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.009c: śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eṣa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.010a: dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattiḥ sthitiś ca yat
GE07mbh_13_u:146.010c: sthiraliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.011a: yad asya bahudhā rūpaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavat tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:146.011c: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.012a: dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭīty ata ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:146.012c: viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.013c: cakṣuṣaḥ prabhavas tejo nāsty anto 'thāsya cakṣuṣām
GE07mbh_13_u:146.014a: sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.014c: teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.015a: nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:146.015c: mahayanty asya lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.015d-0677_01: arcayanti ca ye lokāḥ priyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.016a: vigrahaṃ pūjayed yo vai liṅgaṃ vāpi mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.016c: liṅgaṃ pūjayitā nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnute
GE07mbh_13_u:146.017a: ṛṣayaś cāpi devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:146.017c: liṅgam evārcayanti sma yat tad ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitam
GE07mbh_13_u:146.018a: pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.019a: eṣa eva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.020a: viṣamasthaḥ śarīreṣu sa mṛtyuḥ prāṇinām iha
GE07mbh_13_u:146.020c: sa ca vāyuḥ śarīreṣu prāṇo 'pānaḥ śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_13_u:146.021a: tasya ghorāṇi rūpāṇi dīptāni ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_13_u:146.021c: loke yāny asya pūjyante viprās tāni vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.022c: nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:146.023a: vede cāsya vidur viprāḥ śatarudrīyam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:146.023c: vyāsād anantaraṃ yac cāpy upasthānaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.024a: pradātā sarvalokānāṃ viśvaṃ cāpy ucyate mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:146.025a: prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād agnir ajāyata
GE07mbh_13_u:146.025c: grahair bahuvidhaiḥ prāṇān saṃruddhān utsṛjaty api
GE07mbh_13_u:146.026c: āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_13_u:146.027a: sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa evākṣipate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.027c: śakrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:146.028c: aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:146.029a: maheśvaraś ca lokānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:146.029c: bahubhir vividhai rūpair viśvaṃ vyāptam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_13_u:146.029e: tasya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre vaḍavāmukham
GE07mbh_13_u:147.001a: ity uktavati vākyaṃ tu kṛṣṇe devakinandane
GE07mbh_13_u:147.002c: pratyakṣam āgamo veti kiṃ tayoḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:147.003a: nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ kaś cid iti me vartate matiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.003c: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te prājña samyak tvam anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:147.004a: saṃśayaḥ sugamo rājan nirṇayas tv atra durgamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.004c: dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam anantaṃ hi yatra saṃśayadarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:147.005c: nāstīty evaṃ vyavasyanti satyaṃ saṃśayam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:147.006a: atha cen manyase caikaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_13_u:147.007a: tatpareṇaiva nānyena śakyaṃ hy etat tu kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:147.007c: hetūnām antam āsādya vipulaṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:147.009c: śiṣṭācāro bahuvidho brūhi tan me pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:147.010c: saṃsthā yatnair api kṛtā kālena paribhidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:147.011c: tatas tair bhidyate vṛttaṃ śṛṇu caiva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:147.012c: dharmavidveṣiṇo mandā ity uktas teṣu saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.013c: param ity eva saṃtuṣṭās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
GE07mbh_13_u:147.014c: dharma ity eva saṃbuddhās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
GE07mbh_13_u:147.015c: ācāraḥ kāraṇaṃ caiva dharmaś caiva trayaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.015d-0682_01: ye dharmam abhyasūyante te dharmaṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:147.016a: punar eveha me buddhiḥ saṃśaye parimuhyate
GE07mbh_13_u:147.017a: vedāḥ pratyakṣam ācāraḥ pramāṇaṃ tat trayaṃ yadi
GE07mbh_13_u:147.017c: pṛthaktvaṃ labhyate caiṣāṃ dharmaś caikas trayaṃ katham
GE07mbh_13_u:147.018c: yady evaṃ manyase rājaṃs tridhā dharmavicāraṇā
GE07mbh_13_u:147.019a: eka eveti jānīhi tridhā tasya pradarśanam
GE07mbh_13_u:147.019c: pṛthaktve caiva me buddhis trayāṇām api vai tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:147.020a: ukto mārgas trayāṇāṃ ca tat tathaiva samācara
GE07mbh_13_u:147.020c: jijñāsā tu na kartavyā dharmasya paritarkaṇāt
GE07mbh_13_u:147.021a: sadaiva bharataśreṣṭha mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.021c: andho jaḍa ivāśaṅko yad bravīmi tad ācara
GE07mbh_13_u:147.022a: ahiṃsā satyam akrodho dānam etac catuṣṭayam
GE07mbh_13_u:147.023c: tām anvehi mahābāho svargasyaite hi deśikāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.024a: pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ vai yaḥ kuryād abudho naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.024c: na sa pramāṇatām arho vivādajanano hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:147.025a: brāhmaṇān eva sevasva satkṛtya bahumanya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:147.025c: eteṣv eva tv ime lokāḥ kṛtsnā iti nibodha tān
GE07mbh_13_u:148.001a: ye ca dharmam asūyanti ye cainaṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.001c: bravītu bhagavān etat kva te gacchanti tādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.003a: ye tu dharmaṃ mahārāja satataṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.003c: satyārjavaparāḥ santas te vai svargabhujo narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.004a: dharma eva ratis teṣām ācāryopāsanād bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:148.005a: manuṣyā yadi vā devāḥ śarīram upatāpya vai
GE07mbh_13_u:148.006a: prathamaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putraṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.007a: asatāṃ kīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ sādhavaḥ kiṃ ca kurvate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.007c: bravītu me bhavān etat santo 'santaś ca kīdṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.008a: durācārāś ca durdharṣā durmukhāś cāpy asādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.009a: rājamārge gavāṃ madhye goṣṭhamadhye ca dharmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.010a: pañcānām aśanaṃ dattvā śeṣam aśnanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.010c: na jalpanti ca bhuñjānā na nidrānty ārdrapāṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.011c: brāhmaṇaṃ dhārmikaṃ caityaṃ te kurvanti pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.012c: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ rājñāṃ panthānaṃ dadate ca te
GE07mbh_13_u:148.013a: atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:148.013b-0684_01: sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ kuryāt svayaṃ nāgryāśanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_13_u:148.013b-0684_02: na satyārjavadharmasya tulyam anyac ca vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.013b-0684_03: bahulā nāma gaus tena gatim agryāṃ gatā kila
GE07mbh_13_u:148.013b-0684_04: muniśāpād dvijaḥ kaś cid vyāghratāṃ samupāgataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.013b-0684_06: vimucya pītavatsāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā purātanam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.013b-0684_07: jagāma lokān amalān sā svarāṣṭraṃ tathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.014c: nāntarā bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭam upavāsavidhir hi saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.015a: homakāle yathā vahniḥ kālam eva pratīkṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.015c: ṛtukāle tathā nārī ṛtum eva pratīkṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.015e: na cānyāṃ gacchate yas tu brahmacaryaṃ hi tat smṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.016a: amṛtaṃ brāhmaṇā gāva ity etat trayam ekataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.017a: yajuṣā saṃskṛtaṃ māṃsam upabhuñjan na duṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:148.017c: pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ putramāṃsaṃ ca tat samam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.018c: karma vai saphalaṃ kṛtvā gurūṇāṃ pratipādayet
GE07mbh_13_u:148.019c: gurūn abhyarcya vardhante āyuṣā yaśasā śriyā
GE07mbh_13_u:148.020a: vṛddhān nātivadej jātu na ca saṃpreṣayed api
GE07mbh_13_u:148.020c: nāsīnaḥ syāt sthiteṣv evam āyur asya na riṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.021a: na nagnām īkṣate nārīṃ na vidvān puruṣān api
GE07mbh_13_u:148.021c: maithunaṃ satataṃ guptam āhāraṃ ca samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:148.022a: tīrthānāṃ guravas tīrthaṃ śucīnāṃ hṛdayaṃ śuci
GE07mbh_13_u:148.022c: darśanānāṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:148.023a: sāyaṃ prātaś ca vṛddhānāṃ śṛṇuyāt puṣkalā giraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.023c: śrutam āpnoti hi naraḥ satataṃ vṛddhasevayā
GE07mbh_13_u:148.023d-0685_01: dānāgāre gavāṃ caiva brāhmaṇānāṃ ca saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_13_u:148.024a: svādhyāye bhojane caiva dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇim uddharet
GE07mbh_13_u:148.024c: yacched vāṅmanasī nityam indriyāṇāṃ ca vibhramam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.025a: saṃskṛtaṃ pāyasaṃ nityaṃ yavāgūṃ kṛsaraṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.027a: na jātu tvam iti brūyād āpanno 'pi mahattaram
GE07mbh_13_u:148.027c: tvaṃkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.029a: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ karma cchādayante hy asādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.029c: na māṃ manuṣyāḥ paśyanti na māṃ paśyanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.032a: tasmāt pāpaṃ na gūheta gūhamānaṃ vivardhate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.032c: kṛtvā tu sādhuṣv ākhyeyaṃ te tat praśamayanty uta
GE07mbh_13_u:148.033a: āśayā saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ yat kāle nopabhujyate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.033c: anye caitat prapadyante viyoge tasya dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.033d-0686_01: tad dharmasādhanaṃ nityaṃ saṃkalpād dhanam ārjayet
GE07mbh_13_u:148.034c: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni dharmam eva samāsate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.035a: eka eva cared dharmaṃ na dharmadhvajiko bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:148.035c: dharmavāṇijakā hy ete ye dharmam upabhuñjate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036c: nidhiṃ nidadhyāt pāratryaṃ yātrārthaṃ dānaśabditam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0002: tāni me kuruśārdūla yathāvad vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0004: yeṣu samyaṅ naraḥ snātvā prayāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0005: satyaṃ tīrthaṃ kṣamā tīrthaṃ satyam indriyanigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0006: sarvabhūtadayā tīrthaṃ tīrtham ārjavam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0007: dānaṃ tīrthaṃ damas tīrthaṃ saṃtoṣas tīrtham uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0008: brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ ca priyavāditā
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0009: jñānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapas tīrthaṃ dhṛtis tīrtham udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0010: tīrthānām api yat tīrthaṃ viśuddhir manasaḥ parā
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0013: yo lubdhaḥ piśunaḥ krūro dāmbhiko viṣayātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0014: sarvatīrtheṣv api snātaḥ pāpo malina eva saḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0015: na ca gacchanti te svargam aviśuddhamanomalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0016: viṣayeṣv api saṃrāgo mānaso mala ucyate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0017: teṣv eva ca virāgo 'sya nirmalatvam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0018: cittam antargataṃ duṣṭaṃ tīrthasnānair na śudhyati
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0021: tatra tasya kurukṣetraṃ naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0023: yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0024: pāpasya kim adhiṣṭhānaṃ kā prasūtiś ca bhārata bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0025: kiṃ cāsya kāraṇaṃ proktaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0026: lobhaḥ pratiṣṭhā pāpasya prasūtir lobha eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0027: atra te saṃśayo mā bhūl lobhaḥ pāpasya kāraṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0028: lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhād drohaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0029: lobhān mohaś ca māyā ca mānān mātsaryam eva ca
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0030: nārthaiḥ pūrayituṃ śakyo lobho bahuvidhair api
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0033: sarvabhūteṣv ajihmaś ca lobhād bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0035: chettāraḥ saṃśayānāṃ ca lobhagrastāḥ pratyānty adhaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:148.036d-019_0037: lobhavṛddhau ca vardhante nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149.001c: bhāgadheyānvitas tv arthān kṛśo bālaś ca vindati
GE07mbh_13_u:149.001d-0687_01: tat kathaṃ labhate kena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:149.002f-0688_01: sadā prayatnaṃ kṛtvaiva dṛśyate hy adhano naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149.003a: yadi yatno bhaven martyaḥ sa sarvaṃ phalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:149.004a: yadā prayatnaṃ kṛtavān dṛśyate hy aphalo naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149.004c: mārgan nayaśatair arthān amārgaṃś cāparaḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_13_u:149.005a: akāryam asakṛt kṛtvā dṛśyante hy adhanā narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149.005c: dhanayuktās tv adharmasthā dṛśyante cāpare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149.006a: adhītya nītiṃ yasmāc ca nītiyukto na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:149.006c: anabhijñaś ca sācivyaṃ gamitaḥ kena hetunā
GE07mbh_13_u:149.006e: vidyāyukto hy avidyaś ca dhanavān durgatas tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:149.007a: yadi vidyām upāśritya naraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_13_u:149.007c: na vidvān vidyayā hīnaṃ vṛttyartham upasaṃśrayet
GE07mbh_13_u:149.008a: yathā pipāsāṃ jayati puruṣaḥ prāpya vai jalam
GE07mbh_13_u:149.008c: dṛṣṭārtho vidyayāpy evam avidyāṃ prajahen naraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149.010c: ugraṃ tapaḥ samārohen na hy anuptaṃ prarohati
GE07mbh_13_u:149.011c: ahiṃsayā ca dīrghāyur iti prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:149.012a: tasmād dadyān na yāceta pūjayed dhārmikān api
GE07mbh_13_u:150.001a: kāryate yac ca kriyate sac cāsac ca kṛtaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.003a: yadā tv asya bhaved buddhir dharmyā cārthapradarśinī
GE07mbh_13_u:150.004a: etāvan mātram etad dhi bhūtānāṃ prājñalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.005a: yathā hy upasthitaiśvaryāḥ pūjayante narā narān
GE07mbh_13_u:150.005d-0690_01: bhāvaśuddhis tu tapasā devatānāṃ ca pūjayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.006a: na hy adharmatayā dharmaṃ dadyāt kālaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:150.007a: spraṣṭum apy asamartho hi jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.008a: kāryāv etau hi kālena dharmo hi vijayāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009a: tatra kaś cin nayet prājño gṛhītvaiva kare naram
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0004: yat prāg bahulayā proktaṃ tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0009: tatra sā nagarī ramyā yamunātīram āśritā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0030: tena sā nagarī ramyā rājasiṃhena pālitā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0036: purī candravatī nāma dṛṣṭā te yadi vā śrutā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0037: tasyāṃ puryāṃ purā vṛttaṃ tattvaṃ śṛṇu yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0038: kasya cid dvijamukhyasya kalyāṇī dhenur uttamā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0040: godhanasya ca sā mukhyā haṃsavarṇā ghaṭasravā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0045: sā ca yūthasya sarvasya cacārāgre sunirbhayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0047: sāndraṃ supuṣpitaṃ surabhi acchinnaṃ carate tṛṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0058: nandī nāma sa dharmātmā sa ca gopahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0062: abhidravaṃś ca tāṃ vyāghras tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
