GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0063: tvam adya vihito bhakṣaḥ svayaṃ prāptāsi me vanam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0066: vatsaṃ smarati sā dhenuḥ snehārtā gadgadasvarā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0068: rudantī karuṇaṃ sā tu nirāśā putradarśane
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0069: dṛṣṭvā tu bahulāṃ vyāghraḥ krandamānāṃ suduḥkhitām
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0070: uvāca vacanaṃ ghoraṃ bahule kiṃ prarudyate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0071: daivād yathopapannāsi bhakṣas tvaṃ me yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0072: na rudantyā vā hasantyā vā tathā te jīvitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0073: vihitaṃ bhujyate loke svayaṃ prāptāsi dhenuke
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0074: mṛtyus te vihito 'dyaiva vṛthā kim anuśocasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0075: papraccha ca punar vyāghraḥ kimarthaṃ ruditaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0076: kautukaṃ me 'dya saṃjātam aśeṣaṃ kathayasva naḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0077: vyāghrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bahulā vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0078: kṣantum arhasi me nātha kāmarūpa namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0079: tvāṃ samālokya lokasya paritrāṇaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0080: jīvitārthaṃ na śocāmi prāptavyaṃ maraṇaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0081: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0082: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0083: devair api sadā sarvair martavyam avaśair dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0084: tasmāt tan nāham evaikaṃ vyāghra śocāmi jīvitam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0085: kiṃ tu snehavaśād vyāghra duḥkhena ruditaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0086: asti me hṛdi saṃtāpas taṃ ca tvaṃ śrotum arhasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0088: iṣṭaḥ prathamajātas tu sutaś ca mama bālakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0089: kṣīraṃ pibati me vatsas tṛṇaṃ nādyāpi jighrati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0090: sa ca gopakule baddhaḥ kṣudhito mām udīkṣate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0091: sutaṃ tam anuśocāmi kathaṃ jīviṣyate sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0093: pāyayitvā ca taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhani
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0094: sakhīnām arpayitvā ca saṃdiśya ca hitāhitam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0097: bahulāyā vacaḥ śrutvā mṛgendraḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0098: kiṃ te putreṇa kartavyaṃ maraṇaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0099: trasanti sarvabhūtāni māṃ nirīkṣya mriyanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0100: tvaṃ punaḥ kṛpayāviṣṭā putra putreti bhāṣase
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0101: na mantrā na tapo dānaṃ na mātā na pitā sutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0107: pavitraṃ tat pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0108: yat tīrthaṃ sarvatīrthānāṃ ramyāṇāṃ ramyam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0112: yatra vatsāś ca huṃkāraṃ karuṇaṃ mātṛkāṅkṣayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0115: itas tataḥ sthitair vatsair arghyamānaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0116: sarovad bhrājate goṣṭhaṃ śrīmadbhir iva paṅkajaiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0117: tac chrīniketanaṃ ramyaṃ mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ sutam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0119: pañca bhūtāni me bhadre pibantu rudhiraṃ tava bahulā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0120: na nirāśāni bhūtāni vāṅmātreṇa karomy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0121: prathamaṃ dṛṣṭavatsāhaṃ mṛgendra śṛṇu me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0122: dṛṣṭvā sakhījanaṃ bālaṃ gopāṃś ca paricārakān
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0123: gopījanaṃ samāgamya jananīṃ ca viśeṣataḥ vyāghraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0124: śapathair āgamiṣyāmi manyase yadi muñca mām
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0125: śapathāḥ kīdṛśā bhadre ye tvayā parinoditāḥ bahulā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0126: pratyayaṃ caivam ākhyāhi bahule mama yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0127: yadi te nāsti viśvāso mamopari mṛgādhipa
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0128: śapathair āgamiṣyāmi satyaṃ brūyāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0129: mā dadasveti yo brūyād gurvagnibrāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0130: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0131: madhumāṃse ca yat pāpaṃ lākṣāvikrayaṇe tathā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0132: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0133: yo vedavikrayī vipraś catvare paṭhate tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0134: asaṃtoṣī ca yo vipro nityaṃ bhavati yācakaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0135: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0137: kaumāraṃ cāpi bhartāraṃ yā nārī nānumanyate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0139: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0140: svapākaṃ ca parityajya parapākaratāś ca ye
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0141: ye saktā gurudāreṣu svāmidāreṣu ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0142: brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīṃ gatvā na tu tīrthāni sevate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0143: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0145: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0148: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0149: yat pāpaṃ lubdhakānāṃ ca mlecchānāṃ garadāyinām
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0150: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0151: pādena spṛśate gāś ca śirobhir na namanti ye
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0152: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0153: goṣv avajñāṃ prakurvanti śapante tāḍayanti ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0154: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0155: sakṛd dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīyāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0156: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0158: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0160: tena pāpena lipyāmi yat te 'haṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0161: dvibhāryaḥ puruṣo yas tu ekāṃ snehena paśyati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0162: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0163: ekākī mṛṣṭam aśnāti yaḥ kaś cit puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0164: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0165: yas trīn hale balīvardān viṣamaṃ vāhayeta yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0166: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yadi nāyāṃ tavāntikam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0167: ity etaiḥ pātakair ghorair āgamiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0168: labdhvā sa pratyayaṃ vyāghraḥ punar vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0170: kadā cin manyase gatvā mūrkho 'sau vañcito mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0171: loke 'smin nāstikāḥ ke cin mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0172: bhrāmayanti ca te buddhiṃ cakrārūḍha ivekṣaṇam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0173: atathyāny api tathyāni darśayanty api peśalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0177: na taṃ paśyāmi loke 'smin kṛte pratikaroti yaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0178: sarvasya hi kṛtārthasya matir anyā pravartate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0180: kṛtāḥ parasparaṃ pūrvaṃ tan na manyāmahe katham
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0183: mā te buddhir bhaved evaṃ śapathair eva yantritā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0184: tenaivaṃ darśitaṃ pūrvaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ kuru sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0185: bahule gaccha paśya tvaṃ putrakaṃ putravatsale
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0186: pāyayitvā ca taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhani
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0188: satyam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā śīghram āgamanaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0189: evaṃ sā pratyayaṃ kṛtvā bahulā satyavādinī
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0195: sā tu gopakulaṃ gatvā bahulā hṛtavikramā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0198: sa prāptāṃ mātaraṃ vatsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ paripṛcchati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0199: na te paśyāmi saumyatvaṃ durmanā iva lakṣyase bahulā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0200: udvignā cāpi te dṛṣṭir bhītabhītā ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0201: piba putra stanaṃ mahyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadi pṛcchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0202: āgatā ca tava snehāt kuru tṛptiṃ yathepsitām
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0204: ekāham atha māṃ pītvā pratyūṣe kasya pāsyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0205: mayā tu putra gantavyaṃ śapathair āgatā hy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0207: bahulāyā vacaḥ śrutvā vatso vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0208: ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra tvaṃ gantum icchasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0209: ślāghyaṃ mamāpi maraṇaṃ tvayā saha na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0211: yadi māṃ sahitaṃ mātar vane vyāghro haniṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0212: yā gatir mātṛbhaktānāṃ dhruvaṃ sā me bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0213: tasmād avaśyaṃ yāsyāmi tvayā saha na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0214: atha mātaś ca tiṣṭha tvaṃ śapathāḥ santu te mama
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0216: anāthasya vane nityaṃ ko me nātho bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0218: nāsti mātṛsamo nātho nāsti mātṛsamā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0219: nāsti mātṛsamaḥ sneho nāsti mātṛsamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0220: nāsti mātṛsamo deva ihaloke paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0222: ye tu tiṣṭhanti satputrās te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0223: mamaiva vihito mṛtyur na tvaṃ putra gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0224: na cāyam anyajīvānāṃ mṛtyuḥ syād anyamṛtyunā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0225: apaścimam imaṃ putra mātuḥ saṃdeśam uttamam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0227: vane jale ca vicaran mā pramādaṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0229: na ca lobhena vartavyaṃ viṣamasthaṃ tṛṇaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0230: lobhād vināśaḥ sarveṣām iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0232: lobhād akāryam atyugraṃ vidvān api samācaret
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0233: lobhāt pramādād viśrambhāt tribhir vai badhyate pumān
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0234: tasmāl lobhaṃ na kurvīta na pramādaṃ na viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0235: ātmā ca satataṃ putra rakṣitavyaḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0238: viparītāni cittāni na jñāyante ha putraka
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0240: viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ strīṇāṃ veśyājanasya ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0241: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste 'pi na viśvaset
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0242: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0244: tad vyaktimūḍham atyarthaṃ sadā suptaṃ vicārayet
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0246: gāvaḥ paśyanti gandhena vedaiḥ paśyanti brāhmaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0247: cāraiḥ paśyanti rājānaś cakṣurbhyām itare janāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0248: naikas tiṣṭhed vane ghore dharmam ekaś ca cintayet
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0249: na codvegas tvayā kāryaḥ sarvasya maraṇaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0250: yathā hi pathikaḥ kaś cic chāyām āśritya viśramet
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0251: viśramya ca punar gacchet tadvad bhūtasamāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0252: yatrānityaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tatraikaḥ śocyate katham
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0254: śirasy āghrāya taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhani
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0257: putrahīnā jagat sarvaṃ paśyanty andheva sābhavat
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0259: vilapya bahulā putram uvācedaṃ punar vacaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0260: nāsti putrasamaḥ sneho nāsti putrasamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0261: nāsti putrasamā prītir nāsti putrasamā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0262: aputrasya jagac chūnyam aputrasya gṛhaṃ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0263: putreṇa jayate lokān putreṇa narakaṃ jayet
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0264: anṛtaṃ vadate lokaś candanaṃ kila śītalam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0267: puṇyair vinā na paśyanti gaṅgādharam ivātmajam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0268: kiṃ candanena pīyūṣabindunā kiṃ kim indunā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0270: iti putraguṇān uktvā nirīkṣya ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0271: svamātaraṃ sakhīr gopān kramāt tān anupṛcchati
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0274: sāhaṃ bhavantaṃ saṃdraṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ svakulaṃ sutam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0275: āgatā satyavākyena punar yāsyāmi tatra ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0276: mātaḥ kṣamasva tat sarvaṃ bālatve yat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0277: nyāsas tavāyaṃ dauhitraḥ kim anyat prabravīmi te
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0278: vipule campake dāme bhadre surabhi mālini
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0280: ajñānāj jñānato vāpi yad uktaṃ kva cid apriyam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0281: tat kṣamadhvaṃ mahābhāgāḥ paścād yac ca kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0283: sarvāḥ sarvapradā nityaṃ rakṣadhvaṃ mama bālakam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0284: anātham abalaṃ dīnaṃ sīdantaṃ mama putrakam
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0286: bhaginīnām ayaṃ putraḥ sāṃprataṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0287: bālo 'balābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ poṣyaḥ pālyaś ca putravat
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0291: tā dhanyās tāḥ kṛtārthāś ca tāḥ striyas tāś ca mātaraḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0292: modante devalokeṣu tā gāvas tāś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0293: yāḥ pālayanty anāthāṃś ca paraputrān ātmaputravat
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0296: yataḥ sarvasya jātasya sthitaṃ maraṇam agrataḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0297: na cāsmadgamane manyuḥ sakhyaḥ kāryaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0298: śrutvaitad bahulāvākyaṃ mātā sakhyaś ca vihvalāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0299: viṣādaṃ paramaṃ jagmur idam ūcuḥ suvismitāḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0300: aho sumahad āścaryaṃ yad vyāghravadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0303: nāśitavyaṃ prayatnena tat kathaṃ gamyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0304: bahule naiva gantavyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ katamas tava
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0305: yad bālaṃ svakulaṃ tyaktvā satyalobhena gamyate
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0306: atra gāthāḥ purā gītā ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0309: anṛtaṃ tatra vai satyaṃ satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0310: kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavāṃ kārye tathaiva ca bahulā
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0313: nātmārtham utsahe vaktuṃ svalpam apy anṛtaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0314: ekaḥ saṃśliṣyate garbhe jāyetaiko mriyeta ca
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0315: bhuṅkte caikaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ mātaḥ satyaṃ vadāmy aham
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0316: satye pratiṣṭhito loko dharmaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_13_u:150.009d-020_0318: viṣṇave pṛthivīṃ dattvā baliḥ pātālam āśritaḥ
